40001001	Abraham Ccapaw, David Ccapaw Jesu Kri a thokeinaw ciihan ccauh.
40001002	Abraham nynh Isaak a saah, te Isaak nynh Jakob a saah, te Jakob nynh Judah te a uno`ae a saah.
40001003	Te Judah nynh a zu Tamar kyate Farez te Zerah a saah, te Farez nynh Hezron a saah, Hezron nynh Ram a saah.
40001004	Te Ram nynh Amminadab a saah, te Amminadab nynh Nahshon a saah, te Nahshon nynh Salmon a saah.
40001005	Te Salmon nynh a zu Rahab kyate Boaz a saah, te Boaz nynh Ruth kyate Obed a saah, te Obed nynh Jessi a saah.
40001006	Te Jessi nynh siapharan David a saah, te siapharan David nynh Uriah zu lang phe a tang vae paw nopinung kyate Solomon a saah.
40001007	Te Solomon nynh Rehoboam a saah, te Rehoboam nynh Abija a saah, te Abija nynh Asa a saah.
40001008	Te Asa nynh Jehoshafat a saah, te Jehoshafat nynh Jehoram a saah, te Jehoram nynh Uzziah a saah.
40001009	Te Uzziah nynh Jotham a saah, te Jotham nynh Ahaz a saah, te Ahaz nynh Hezekiah a saah.
40001010	Te Hezekiah nynh Manasseh a saah, te Manasseh nynh Amon a saah, te Amon nynh Josiah a saah.
40001011	Te Josiah nynh Jekoniah te a uno`ae kha a saah. Tuh ccyh loukaw khe nynh Jew`ae kha Babilon lang a cciakhae`ae.
40001012	Te minmin kha Babilon lang a cciakhae`ae koute Jekoniah nynh Shealtiel a saah, Shealtiel nynh Zerubbabel a saah.
40001013	Te Zerubbabel nynh Abiud a saah, te Abiud nynh Eliakim a saah, te Eliakim nynh Azor a saah.
40001014	Te Azor nynh Zadok a saah, te Zadok nynh Akhim a saah, te Akhim nynh Eliud a saah.
40001015	Te Eliud nynh Eliazar a saah, te Eliazar nynh Matthan a saah, te Matthan nynh Jakob a saah.
40001016	Te Jakob nynh Meri a vawpaw Josef a saah, tuh-e nung kyate nynh Kri acikuh paw Jesu tuh a pui.
40001017	Tukeiccu Abraham kyate David kyacia she balyn tuh she haw laepali, te David kyate Babilon lang see lang cciakhaenaw kyacia she haw laepali, te Babilon lang see lang cciakhaenaw kyate Kri kyacia she haw laepali acih.
40001018	Atu Jesu Kri puinaw tuh hynhte nynh athua: A nung Meri tuh Josef zu lang hawpah`ae zah minmin pynkheihlan a umkheih`ae maw khe, aning tuh Thyaa Muisaw ccaaw a poi.
40001019	Te a vawpaw Josef tuh adingpaw ccungccaw athua thyhhawte kha-e nung kha zapi malang maethyasah lan ry khyh zah amaw kha aphi te zya mya lan a tuaku.
40001020	Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae kong a tua lyakhe, dotua, a maan kya Bawipaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a kya yn langkuh zah, “David ccapaw Josef, na zu Meri kha namaw kalan hoeiku lanpaw rih nan, pawccecize a kya a poi paw ccaaw kha Thyaa Muisaw kya-e nynh thua.
40001021	Te aning nynh Ccapaw lukheit yn saah cih zah Jesu cite a min na phu cih, pawccecize aning nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha mih seinaw`ae kyate a khum cih`ae,” a cipya.
40001022	Bawipaw nynh profeh kyate a hopaw accing nawlan nynh atu hynh-e balyn tuh acyikuh. Tuh-e a hopaw tuh:
40001023	“Dotua, liaccady nynh ccaaw a poi cih zah Ccapaw a saah cih, te minmin nynh a min kha Immanuel cite a phu cih`ae,” tuh-e asuilan tuh, “Pachia kaening ryte a um,” cipaw nynh thua a ci.
40001024	Oute Josef tuh inaw kyate tho zah Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a hopya hawte cyih zah a kalan a zu kha a hoeiku.
40001025	Te a ccatawccaaw phe a pui cia kha-e nung kha ikhae khyh, te Josef nynh a min kha Jesu cite a phu.
40002001	Atu Herod nynh siapharan lang a tang ccyh lya Judea pee Bethlehem khua kya Jesu he a pui tuh, dotua, nithua langte mihaw`ae nynh Jerusalem lang oun thua`ae zah,
40002002	“A pui paw Jew`ae Siapharan tuh teisangmou a um? Pawccecize nithua langkhe amaw awsi kha phe kae muih zah amaw beik khylan nynh kae thua,” a ci`ae.
40002003	Hynh-e kong kha siapharan Herod nynh he a thae tuh a thinphang, te amaw ryte Jerusalem ccungccaw`ae balyn mih thinphang.
40002004	Te aning nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw`ae kyaze kawbya ccangpatu`ae balyn kha pynkheihlan a suelua`ae koute, Kri tuh teisangmou a pui cih cipaw kha a khia`ae.
40002005	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Judea pee Bethlehem kya nynh thua; pawccecize profeh kyate hynhte azeikuh:
40002006	‘Judah ram kya Bethlehem nang tuh Judah uktu`ae lakuze adih huaccepaw na thua khyh, pawccecize nang na kyate ka ccungccaw Israel`ae a ring lanpaw ram Uktu yn pou cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya`ae.
40002007	Oute Herod nynh mihaw`ae kha aphiru lante zya ko`ae zah paw ccyh kya mou awsi alangku cite minmin kha akaw-aleih a khia`ae.
40002008	Te minmin kha Bethlehem lang saw`ae zah, “La cceih oh lah imohpaw kha thawmawte oun ccung oh, te he nae muih oh te nae hopah bua cih oh, kae mah kae cceihbua cih zah ka beik bua ccaw,” a cipya`ae.
40002009	Siapharan bya he a thae`ae koute minmin tuh a pou`ae; te dotua, nithua lang-e a muih`ae paw awsi tuh mih malang khe a cceih. Imohpaw a umnaw luki kya a thua tuh a thadyn.
40002010	Minmin nynh awsi kha he a muih`ae tuh myaryasangkae mih lungtua.
40002011	Te minmin nynh inn lungkhu he thua`ae tuh Imohpaw kha a nung Meri ryte a muih`ae, te bakhung`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae; te minmin nynh mih sisua`ae kha hung`ae zah lasung`ae sui, frankinsens te mura kha amaw a pya`ae.
40002012	Te minmin tuh Herod kalan a ki vae khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh mih maan kya raeringnaw a pya`ae thyhte, minmin tuh mimaw ram lang ccangpaw laanpi langte nynh a ki`ae.
40002013	Te minmin he a pou`ae te, dotua, maan kya Bawipaw kyae vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Josef kya yn langkuh zah, “Thokuh lah Imohpaw kha laah lah a nung ryte Izip ram lang ccuekhae`ae, te bya kae hopya makhia tuin kyakhe la um, pawccecize Herod nynh Imohpaw kha chia khylan yn ccung vae cih,” a cipya.
40002014	Josef tuh thokuh zah Imohpaw te a nung kha hoei`ae zah khuazi khe Izip ram lang a poukhae`ae.
40002015	Te Herod a chi mawlaezung aning tuh tuin kya nynh a um. Ou tuhte, “Izip ram kyate ka Ccapaw kha phe ka ko vae,” cite Bawipaw nynh profeh kyate a hopaw accing nawlan nynh thua.
40002016	Oute mihaw`ae nynh phe yn ling vae`ae cipaw kha Herod nynh he a nyh tuh myaryamaw a thinria, te ccungccaw saw zah mihaw`ae kha akaw-aleih a khiasah`ae paw accyh thyhhawte, Bethlehem kya te tuh-e area balyn kya um paw, kum ning te akaw lang-e pise imua`ae balyn kha marya a chiasah`ae.
40002017	Oute profeh Jeremiah nynh a hosyapaw bya tuh accing vae. A hopaw tuh:
40002018	“Ramah kya rawnaw te khuinaw te thinlung phe koi paw rawkhuinaw roi tuh thae athua, Rachel tuh a ccaaw`ae a um vae khyh keiccuze rah zah soihbiaku ry vae khyh,” a ci.
40002019	Thuasalama Herod he a chih tuh, dotua, Izip ram kyakhe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh maan kyate Josef kalan yn langkuh zah,
40002020	“Thokuh lah Imohpaw te a nung kha laah`ae lah Israel ram lang cceih ccavae, pawccecize Imohpaw hiinnaw a ccung`ae paw tuh phe chih vae`ae,” a cipya.
40002021	Te Josef tuh thokuh zah Imohpaw te a nung kha cciakhae`ae zah Israel ram lungkhu lang a thua`ae.
40002022	Thuasalama Judea ram kya Arkhelaus nynh a paaw Herod hanpaw a uk cipaw kha Josef nynh he a thae tuh tuh-e kalan ccia lan phe a rih; tuhzemah maan kya Pachia nynh raeringnaw phe a pya vae thyhte, Galilee pee sang kheit lungkhu lang aning tuh a maeleihkuh.
40002023	Te, “Aning tuh Nazarethpaw cite ko athua cih,” acikuh paw profeh`ae nynh a ho`ae paw accing nawlan aning tuh Nazareth acikuh paw khua kya thua zah tuin kyakhe a um vae.
40003001	Ccyh khaw aro koute Baptisma pyatu Johan tuh yn thua zah Judea pee rangkaw khe phungho zah,
40003002	“Nanning ngaesikuh oh, pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,” a ci.
40003003	Pawccecize e paw tuh profeh Isaiah nynh, “Rangkaw kya a sia paw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha paccynpah oh, A laanpi`ae kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ ” cite a honuathepaw kha nynh thua.
40003004	Te Johan tuh kalauk ming te rae paw uccaw kha lawkuh zah a tae kya saving taesung kha a sungku; te a aepaw tuh tungkhipaw`ae te rangkaw e khoitui nynh thua.
40003005	Oute Jerusalem e, Judea pee e te Jordan pepan e ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Johan kalan oun thua`ae zah,
40003006	mih seinaw`ae kha phykute Jordan vaw khe amaw kya baptisma a in`ae.
40003007	Thuasalama Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae patae nynh baptisma-in khylan oun thua`ae paw kha Johan nynh he a muih tuh minmin kha hynhte a cipya`ae, “Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw thinrianaw kyate ccue khylan hung nynh mou nanning kha raering ae pya oh?
40003008	Tukeiccu ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw athae`ae kha oun thuakhae oh,
40003009	te naemaw te naemaw kya, ‘Kaening tuh paaw lang Abraham kae hoi,’ cite ho lan tuakuh nan oh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh hynh-e lung`ae kyate Abraham a ccaaw`ae kha a pousah kho cipaw nanning kae hopya oh.
40003010	Te atu mah hae tuh thingku leihpaw kya nungde athua vae; tukeiccu ahoypaw athae thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua.
40003011	Ngaesikunaw hanlan kae nynh tui kya baptisma kae insah ccaccing oh; thuasalama kamaw koute yn thua lanpaw aning tuh kae laeze alesaehua, tuh-e paw a ccukoh ccyngpya lan kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; aning nynh nanning kha Thyaa Muisaw kya te maee kya baptisma ae insah cih oh.
40003012	A kuih kya ccankung ccyng zah a sarahmin kha thyaapaping lang a cciccae cih, te a chanvui kha byng lungkhu lang a ruin cih, thuasalama asipaw kha tuh a chih kho leipaw maee te a u cih,” a ci.
40003013	Oute Jesu tuh baptisma-in khylan Galilee kyate Jordan vaw lang Johan kalan yn thua.
40003014	Thuasalama Johan nynh, “Kae khaw nang na kya-e baptisma-in lan ka ccan, nang nynh tou kae ka kalan nae cceih?” ci zah amaw kha a khee.
40003015	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Atu ua, pawccecize dingnaw balyn marya accing nawlan ou tuhte aening hanlan accanpaw nynh thua,” a cipya. Oute Johan nynh amaw kha a ua.
40003016	Te baptisma-in koute Jesu tuh tui kyate taloi a pou. Te dotua, amaw hanlan vaawran tuh hungkuh zah Pachia Muisaw nynh vafu hawte yn rungbung zah Jesu tungvaw a ccu paw kha Johan nynh a muih.
40003017	Te vaekheihmawte vaawran kyate roi ccangkheit nynh, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw kya ka lungrythua,” a ci.
40004001	Oute diabolos nynh a tuh-ou ccaw cite rangkaw langkhe Muisaw nynh Jesu kha a cciakhae.
40004002	Te Jesu tuh nin sungpali te zi sungpali looh-ae he a sung tuh a vuelaw vae.
40004003	Te tuh-outu amaw kalan yn thua zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw na thua ze hynh-e lung`ae hynh sanlou lang tang lan kawpyatua,” a cipya.
40004004	Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccathyaa kya, ‘Ccungccaw tuh sanlou kyalya te hiin lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia khalang kyate yn toikuh paw bya miakaw te nynh a hiin cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
40004005	Oute diabolos nynh Jesu kha athyaapaw khuapi lungkhu lang cciakhae thung zah tempal ahang huaccenaw tungvaw khe a umsah.
40004006	Te amaw kha, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw na thua ze namaw te namaw toikubung tua; pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘Nang te asekuh lante Pachia nynh a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha kaw yn pya cih`ae,’ te ‘Lung kya na ccu na thuhku khyh nawlan minmin nynh mih kuih kya ae dua cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
40004007	Jesu nynh, “Ccathyaa kya, ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha nang nynh na syntawtua lan khyh,’ cite bua azeikuh,” a cipya.
40004008	Diabolos nynh myarya ahangpaw mua langkhe bua cciakhae thung zah laephipi peenaw`ae te lesaenaw`ae balyn kha marya a muihsah.
40004009	Te amaw kha, “Na bakhung zah kamaw hynh nae beik lan thua ze hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh marya kae pya cih,” a cipya.
40004010	Oute Jesu nynh, “Setan, la cceih! Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na beik cih zah amaw kyalya kha rya na lawpah cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
40004011	Oute diabolos nynh amaw kha a poutaw; te dotua, vaaw ccungccaw`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha a dooih`ae.
40004012	Johan kha thung a saw`ae cipaw Jesu nynh he a thae tuh Galilee pee lang a cceih.
40004013	Te Nazareth khua kha cciataw te rili phae pe Zebulun phin te Naftali phin ramri kya um paw Kapernaum khua kya thua zah tuin kyakhe a um.
40004014	Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh a hopaw kha accing nawlan nynh thua. A hopaw tuh:
40004015	“Zebulun ram te Naftali ram, rili laanpi pe, Jordan vaw khuraw, Zenta`ae umnaw Galilee ram:
40004016	Mohnaw kya um paw ccungccaw`ae nynh alepaw awnaw kha a muih vae`ae. Te chinaw mynlyh te chinaw ram kya dahung`ae paw kya awnaw tuh yn langkuh vae,” a ci.
40004017	Tuh-e ccyh kyate Jesu nynh, “Ngaesikuh oh, pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,” cite phungho lan a thotakaw vae.
40004018	Te Jesu nynh Galilee Rili pe a ccia lya Piter cite a ko`ae paw Simon te a neitaw Andru, uno luning rili lungkhu mia vua`ae paw kha a muih; pawccecize minmin tuh ngasaw kyngtu`ae nynh thua.
40004019	Te minmin kha, “Kamaw oun zui oh lah nanning kha ccungccaw kyngtu`ae lang kae rae cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
40004020	Te minmin nynh vaekheihmawte mih mia kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
40004021	Te tuin kyate he cceih`ae tuh ccangpaw uno luning, Zebedi ccapaw`ae James te a neitaw Johan tuh kohlung kya mih paaw Zebedi ryte mih mia a thue`ae paw kha muih zah minmin kha a ko`ae.
40004022	Te minmin nynh vaekheihmawte kohlung te mih paaw kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
40004023	Te Jesu tuh Galilee pee balyn po khuaccung zah mih sinakok`ae kya ccangpah`ae zah peenaw thehoypaw kha a hopya`ae, te ccungccaw`ae laku ccinaw aphuinphuin te ccihawnaw aphuinphuin kha a dansah`ae.
40004024	Te a thungpang tuh Siria pee balyn po pazaekuh; te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw, a dung`ae paw, te mih kuihccuchih`ae paw, ccihawnaw aphuinphuin te myarya a ccih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae zah minmin kha marya a dansah`ae.
40004025	Te Galilee pee kyate, Dekapolis pee kyate, Jerusalem kyate, te Judea pee kyate, te Jordan vaw khuraw langte oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
40005001	Te ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh Jesu tuh mua muakheit kalan a kaethung; te he a dahung tuh a zuitu`ae amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
40005002	Te a khalang aw zah minmin kha hynhte a ccangpya`ae:
40005003	“Muisaw kya ryachi`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh minmin kyae nynh thua.
40005004	A rah a khui`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh soihbia athua cih`ae.
40005005	Lungne`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh laephi rho a ccou cih`ae.
40005006	Dingnaw elan vuelaw`ae zah tuihaw`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh bynsah athua cih`ae.
40005007	Ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh ngaethyaumsanaw a mue cih`ae.
40005008	Thinlung athyaa`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kha a muih cih`ae.
40005009	Daenaw raetu`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko athua cih`ae.
40005010	Dingnaw keiccuze a tua a sah`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh minmin kya-e nynh thua.
40005011	“Kamaw keiccuze nanning kha ae sarya oh, ae tua ae sah oh zah ahme lei lante ahoy leipaw aphuinphuin ae honua vae oh ze, nanning tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
40005012	Lungtua oh lah myaryamaw nae lungpaw sah, pawccecize vaawran kya nae ryalaw mee tuh ale; pawccecize nanning maw-e profeh`ae kha mah minmin nynh tuhte a tua a sah`ae.
40005013	“Nanning tuh laephi loi nynh na thua oh; thuasalama loi nynh a enawpaw kha a zosah lanze pawcihtemou esah kho thua ung cih? Pawpaw elan sanmah hoy vae lan khyh, thuasalama dae vua lan zah ccungccaw ccu kaw syde lan nynh accan vae cih.
40005014	“Nanning tuh laephipi awnaw nynh na thua oh. Mua vawlan sak paw khua tuh thuru kho um khyh.
40005015	Ccungccaw`ae nynh maeekhua aw`ae zah kee khung he khyh`ae, thuasalama maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung`ae, te inn kya um`ae paw balyn kha awnaw a pya.
40005016	Ahoypaw nae ryalaw`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh muih`ae zah vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw kha phu-esah nawlan`ae ccungccaw`ae malang nae awnaw kha awsah oh.
40005017	“Kawbya tukhyhze Profeh`ae bya ro khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tua nan oh; kae tuh ro khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama ccingsah khylan nynh kae thua.
40005018	Pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, vaawran te laephi azo cia, Kawbya abalynte accing makhia Kawbya kyaze adih huapaw ccafang te dyhsuapaw kha pawpawte mah roh lan khyh.
40005019	Tukeiccu hunghung zemah hynh-e kawpyapaw`ae kyaze adih huapaw ccangkheit kha a lue lanze, ccungccaw`ae kha mah tuhte a ccangpya ze, aning tuh vaawran peenaw kya adih huapaw nynh athua cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e`ae kha zui zah ming`ae kha a ccangpya ze aning tuh vaawran peenaw kya alepaw athua cih.
40005020	Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, nae dingnaw nynh kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae dingnaw kha alue khyh lanze pawpawte mah nanning tuh vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang na tee lan khyh oh.
40005021	“ ‘Ccungccaw na theih lan khyh, hunghung zemah a theih paw tuh byapianaw kha a tung cih,’ cite kawbya nynh langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
40005022	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah akonglang um leite a unopaw kha a thinrianuapaw tuh byapianaw kha a tung cih, te hunghung zemah a unopaw kha, ‘Raka!’ a cih paw tuh kungsi zung kya byapia athua cih, te hunghung zemah a unopaw kha, ‘Nang tuh mingaeepaw!’ a cih paw tuh kehenna maee kya-e runaw kha a mue cih.
40005023	Tukeiccu silawhang kalan na lasung kha nae ccyng vae ze, te na unopaw nynh nang ae rawse lanpaw kha khe kya na nyku lanze;
40005024	silawhang malang khe na lasung kha cciataw lah la cceih, masaty na unopaw kya ccawkunaw kha rae lah oute rang lah na lasung kha pya.
40005025	“Nang ae rawsetupaw ryte laanpi kya na cciakheih lya oh khe, arangte ccawkuh oh, tukhyh lanze ae rawsetupaw nynh byapiatu kalan ae ah cih zah byapiatu nynh thung uktu kalan ae ah cih, te nang kha thung ae saw cih`ae.
40005026	Byaccaccing kae hopya, na rung lanpaw kuadron phuapia phe ccing lang na rung mawlaezung thunginn kyate na pou lan khyh.
40005027	“ ‘Milae zu milae vawpaw na seikhae lan khyh,’ cite langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
40005028	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah nopinung kha seikhae rynaw te a do lanze a thinlung kya khae nung ryte seinaw phe a rae vae.
40005029	Te na ranglang mit nynh ae seisah ze, poh khoi lah na kyate dae vua; pawccecize na pyn balynte hell lungkhu lang vua na thua lae tuh na pyn kya-e ccangkhakheit aro lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
40005030	Te na ranglang kuih nynh ae seisah ze thoh tya lah na kyate dae vua; pawccecize na pyn balynte hell lungkhu lang vua na thua lae tuh na pyn kya-e ccangkhakheit aro lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
40005031	“ ‘Hunghung zemah a zu kha a mya lanze myakunawpaw ccaw kha kha-e nung kha pyasah,’ cite phe a ho vae`ae.
40005032	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ohhuakunaw keiccu thua leite a zu kha a mya lanze kha-e nung kha milae vawpaw kya a seisahpaw nynh thua; te hunghung zemah a mya`ae paw nopinung kha zu lang a umkhaepaw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua.
40005033	“Tuh-e koute, ‘Ahme leite bya na kinkuh lan khyh, thuasalama na byakinkupaw kha Bawipaw malang na tynsah hahe cih,’ cite langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha mah phe na thae vae oh.
40005034	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, kharyh byakinkuh nan oh, vaawran phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh Pachia kya-e suitungkhung nynh thua;
40005035	laephi phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize hynh-e tuh a ccusy nynh thua; Jerusalem phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh alesaepaw Siapharan kya-e khualipi nynh thua.
40005036	Na lu phyate mah byakinkuh nan, pawccemacize na sang ccangkheit sanmah na rawsah kho khyh, na mangsah kho khyh.
40005037	Thuasalama na ho paw tuh ‘athua’ ze ‘athua,’ ‘thua khyh’ ze ‘thua khyh,’ na ci cih; pawccecize pawpaw bya zemah hynh-e`ae laelan tuh ahoy leipaw kyate nynh yn thua.
40005038	“ ‘Mit ccangkheit hanlan mit ccangkheit, te haw ccangkheit hanlan haw ccangkheit,’ cite a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
40005039	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, mihoy leipaw kha la khee nan oh, thuasalama hunghung nynh zemah na ranglang byaki kha ae bia ze, hawkheit lang kha mah la tuapakuh.
40005040	Te lukhakheit nynh tazaeccoi ae ry zah na angki kha a lawku ze, na angkile kha mah va lawku bia sah.
40005041	Te hung nynh zemah me kheit ccia lan ae riase ze amaw ryte me ning la cceih oh.
40005042	Nang ae ngiakuh paw ccungccaw kha la pya, te na kya-e koi lan ae ry paw kyate la maeleihtawkuh nan.
40005043	“ ‘Na innpaw kha na sungsah cih zah na rhawpaw kha na hua cih’ cite a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
40005044	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh, nanning thya ae law oh paw kha hythuapya oh, nanning ae hua oh paw kha ahoypaw cyipah oh, te nanning kha ae sarya oh zah ae tua ae sah oh paw hanlan sawsangpah oh.
40005045	Ou tuhte nanning tuh vaawran a um paw nae Paaw ccaaw`ae na thua ccaw oh; pawccecize ahoy leipaw te ahoypaw ccungccaw tungvaw a khuanin kha pawsah zah adingpaw te ading leipaw tungvaw khua a rawsah.
40005046	Pawccecize nanning ae sungsah oh paw kyalya kha na sungsah oh ze amee pawmou na mue cih oh? Nguntokhoi`ae paw nynh hei tuhhawte cyih khyh`ae tou?
40005047	Te na uno`ae kyalya kha na beih`ae ze ming`ae laeze pawmou na cyi hua? Nguntokhoi`ae paw nynh hei tuhte cyih khyh`ae tou?
40005048	Tukeiccu vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw tuh accing hawte nanning mah la ccing oh.
40006001	“Ccungccaw`ae nynh muihku khylan minmin malang ryachi bawngnaw na pya khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh; tukhyh lanze vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw kya-e amee na mue lan khyh oh.
40006002	Tukeiccu ryachi bawngnaw he na pya vae ze cyihruh`ae nynh sinakok`ae kya te laanpi`ae kyakhe ccungccaw`ae kya-e phuesanaw ccou khylan a cyi`ae hawte na malang mungkae la tu nan. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee kha phe a mue vae`ae.
40006003	Thuasalama ryachi bawngnaw he na pya vae ze na ranglang kuih nynh paw nynh a cyi cipaw kha na voilang kuih la nysah nan.
40006004	Ou tuhte ryachi bawngnaw na pya paw kha hung nynh san a ny khyh ccaw; te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.
40006005	“Te saw he na sang vae ze cyihruh`ae hawte la cyih nan; pawccecize minmin tuh sinakok`ae kya, te laanpi`ae atungkunaw kya ccungccaw`ae nynh muihku khylan thadyn lante nynh sawsang a ry`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee phe a mue vae`ae.
40006006	Thuasalama nang tuh saw he na sang vae ze na khaan lungkhu lang tee lah na thuakaw he na khaw te, muih leipaw kya um paw na Paaw kalan khe sawsang, te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.
40006007	Thuasalama saw he na sang vae oh ze lawki`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte accakaepaw bya pei hothuipaw kha mang nan oh; pawccecize minmin nynh patae a ho`ae paw liate oun thaepah hua cih`ae cite a tuaku`ae.
40006008	Tukeiccu nanning tuh minmin hawte cyih bua nan oh; pawccecize nae Paaw nynh paw uccaw`ae nynh nanning elan aho cipaw amaw na ngia maw oh phe a ny vae.
40006009	Tukeiccu hynhcihte sawsang oh: Vaawran kya um paw kaening Paaw, na min sawtuanaw um sah.
40006010	Na peenaw thua ccavae sah. Vaawran kya na rynaw acyikuh hawte laephi vawlan cyikuh bua sah.
40006011	Nin takyh kae ae paw looh atunin kaening oun pyabua.
40006012	Te kae tungvaw a sei`ae paw kae ngaethya`ae hawte kae seinaw kha oun ngaethyabua.
40006013	Te tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang oun cciakhae nan, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kyate oun khumtua. Pawccecize peenaw, lesaenaw te phu-enaw tuh zungzae na kya-e nynh thua. Amen.
40006014	“Pawccecize nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae cyiseinaw kha na ngaethya oh ze vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh mah nanning kha ae ngaethya cih oh.
40006015	Thuasalama nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae cyiseinaw kha na ngaethya khyh oh ze, nae Paaw nynh mah nanning cyiseinaw kha ae ngaethya lan khyh oh.
40006016	“Tuhlaeze looh-ae he na sung vae oh ze, cyihruh`ae hawte a ngaethahpaw maesue te la um nan oh; pawccecize minmin tuh ccungccaw`ae malang looh-ae a sung paw hawte langku khylan mih maesue kha a umsaku`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee kha phe a mue vae`ae.
40006017	Thuasalama nang looh-ae he na sung vae ze na lu kha sathothuhkuh lah na mae la phikuh.
40006018	Ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae malang looh-aesung paw hawte na langku khyh ccaw, thuasalama muih leipaw kya a um paw na Paaw malang na langkuh cih; te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.
40006019	“Laehaw te chihhang nynh a ronaw te miruh`ae nynh kiabia`ae zah a runaw`ae laephi vawlan naemaw hanlan sisua`ae kha ccykuh nan oh.
40006020	Thuasalama laehaw te chihhang nynh mah a ro leinaw, te miruh`ae nynh mah a kiabia leinaw`ae te a ru leinaw`ae vaawran kyakhe naemaw elan sisua`ae kha ccykuh oh.
40006021	Pawccecize nae sisua umnaw kya nae thinlung mah a umbua cih.
40006022	“Pyn kya-e awnaw tuh mit nynh thua; tukeiccu na mit tuh ahoy lanze na pyn balyn tuh awnaw te phe beih cih.
40006023	Thuasalama na mit ahoy khyh ze na pyn balyn tuh mohnaw te phe beih cih. Tukeiccu nang na kya um paw awnaw tuh mohnaw athua ze tuh-e mohnaw tuh pawcih babang mou ale!
40006024	“Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah bawi luning ryalawpah kho khyh; pawccecize bawi lukheit kha a hua ze lukheit kha a sungsah cih; tukhyhze lukheitpaw kalan a pang ze lukheitpaw kha pawlangria leite a um cih. Nanning nynh Pachia te phuasui kha rya na lawpah kho khyh oh.
40006025	“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, pawmou kae ae cih, tukhyhze pawmou kae nia ngaw cite nae hiinnaw hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah. Te pawmou kae lawkuh cih cite nae pyn hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah. Hiinnaw tuh aepaw laeze sunghua khyh tou? Te uccaw laeze pyn tuh sunghua khyh tou?
40006026	Vaaw lang-e pavaw`ae khu dotua oh. Minmin tuh ccaciivua khyh`ae, looh mah rue khyh`ae, ccunginn lungkhu lang mah ruinkuh khyh`ae; tuhzemah vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh minmin kha a dang`ae. Nanning tuh minmin laeze patae nae phutehua khyh tou?
40006027	Nanning lakuze hungmou thinphangnaw liate amaw a hangnaw kha dung kheit a hangchih sakuh khopaw um?
40006028	“Tukeiccu pawccemou uccaw hanlan nae lungvawsaw? Rangkaw e lilipaw`ae kha pawcihte nynh a lethung`ae cipaw tuatua oh; minmin tuh loopho khyh`ae, laaw mah sukuh khyh`ae.
40006029	Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, Solomon a phu-enaw balyn nynh heize lilipaw ccangkheit tuhte ccaankuh kho khyh.
40006030	Tukeiccu, pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, atunin um zah awkhualan tahkuamaee lungkhu lang phung athua paw rangkaw-e lonua hei kha Pachia nynh tuhte a ccaan lanze, nanning kha tuhlaeze houh ae ccaan lan khyh oh tou?
40006031	Tukeiccu, ‘Pawmou ah ae cih oh? Tukhyhze pawmou ah neih cih oh? Tukhyhze paw uccaw mou ah lawkuh cih oh?’ cite nae lungriathae nan sah.
40006032	Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh Zenta`ae nynh a ccung`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh nae hanlan aho cipaw phe a ny.
40006033	Thuasalama Pachia peenaw te a dingnaw kha masaty ccung oh, te hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kha pyachih na thua cih oh.
40006034	Tukeiccu awkhualan hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah, pawccecize awkhualan nynh amaw elan a lungriathae cih. Nin kheit hanlan kha-e nin e lungriathaenaw tuh phe azaw.
40007001	“Nanning tuh byapia na thua khyh nawlan oh ming`ae kha byapia nan oh.
40007002	Pawccecize na pianaw oh paw byapianaw thyhte naemaw kha byapia na thua cih oh; te na tounaw oh paw tounawpaw te naemaw kha toupya ru na thua cih oh.
40007003	“Te namaw mit kya um paw thingpyng kha tuaku leite pawccemou na unopaw mit kya um paw athupaw taraw kha na dopya?
40007004	Tukhyhze, namaw mit kya thingpyng phang a um pite, pawtemou na unopaw kha, ‘Na mit kya-e athupaw kha kae khoipah,’ na ci kho?
40007005	Nang cyihruhpaw! Masaty namaw mit kya-e thingpyng kha khoikuh tou; oute nynh na unopaw mit kya-e athupaw kha khoipya lan ccaerarihlan na muih cih.
40007006	“Athyaapaw uccaw kha ui`ae pya nan oh; nae kya-e pale`ae kha mah voh`ae malang sawpah nan oh, tuhte na cyi oh ze, minmin nynh mih ccu kaw a syde cih`ae, te ae maeleihnuakuh cih oh zah naemaw kha phe ae phia cih oh.
40007007	“Ngia oh lah pya na thua cih oh; ccung oh lah na muih cih oh; khua oh lah thuakaw hungpya na thua cih oh.
40007008	Pawccecize a ngia paw miakaw tuh a mue; te a ccung paw tuh a muih; te thuakaw a khua paw tuh hungpya athua cih.
40007009	“ Nanning lakuze lukhakheit kha a ccapaw nynh sanlou a ngiaku ze, lung kha a pya cih tou?
40007010	Tukhyhze ngasaw kha a ngiaku ze, fuparepaw kha pya ngaw ta?
40007011	Tuhte nanning na hoy lei oh pite nae ccaaw`ae kha ahoypaw lasung`ae pawtemou pya lan cipaw na ny oh lanze, vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw nynh amaw kalan a ngiakuh`ae paw kha ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha pawcihmou houh a pya cih`ae?
40007012	“Tukeiccu ccungccaw`ae nynh nae tungvaw cyih`ae sah cite na ry oh paw balyn kha minmin tungvaw tuhhawte cyih bua oh; pawccecize hynh-e tuh Kawbya te Profeh`ae ccauh nynh a ho`ae paw nynh thua.
40007013	“Abypaw koikua kyate tee oh; pawccecize ronaw kalan a cciakhae paw koikua te laanpi tuh ako, te tuh-e kya a tee paw ccungccaw`ae tuh patae acih.
40007014	Pawccemacize hiinnaw kalan a cciakhae paw koikua tuh by zah laanpi tuh aru, te tuh-e a muihkuh paw tuh azya.
40007015	“Tuuphua bongkute nae kalan oun thua`ae paw ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha la raeringkuh oh; pawccecize minmin tuh alungkhu lante arepaw suizaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
40007016	Minmin kha mih thae`ae liate nae nyh cih oh. Ccungccaw`ae nynh misu thae kha tahty ku`ae kyate lo`ae ta? Tukhyhze thaeku thae kha hingpawku`ae kyate lo`ae ta?
40007017	Tuh-e hawte ahoypaw thingku miakaw nynh ahoypaw thingthae kha a thae, thuasalama ahoy leipaw thingku nynh tuh ahoy leipaw thingthae kha nynh a thae.
40007018	Ahoypaw thingku nynh ahoy leipaw thingthae thae kho khyh, ahoy leipaw thingku nynh mah ahoypaw thingthae thae kho khyh.
40007019	Ahoypaw thingthae a thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua.
40007020	Tukeiccuze mih thae`ae liate kha-e ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha nae nyh cih oh.
40007021	“Kamaw kha, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw,’ cite yn ko paw miakaw nynh vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae, thuasalama vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw rynaw a cyih paw nynh a tee cih.
40007022	Tuh-e nin kya ccungccaw patae nynh kamaw kha, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw, na min te profehbya kae ho khyh tou? Na min te raerangsaro kae dee khyh tou? Na min te khuaruaru lan um paw ryalaw patae kae cyih khyh tou?’ oun ci cih`ae.
40007023	Oute minmin kha, ‘Nanning kharyh kae nyh boi khyh oh, kawbya zui lei`ae paw nanning ka kyate pou oh,’ ka ci cih`ae.
40007024	“Tukeiccu hunghung zemah hynh-e ka hopaw bya`ae hynh thae zah a zui paw ccungccaw tuh lungpi vawlan a inn sakkuh paw ahawpaw ccungccaw te nynh ka losakuh cih.
40007025	Khua yn rah zah tui yn le, te khivae yn zaw zah tuh-e inn kha a mung; te kha-e inn tuh lungpi vawlan abingku keiccu pu khyh.
40007026	Te hynh-e ka hopaw bya`ae kha thae zah a zui leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh laesia vawlan a inn sakkuh paw angaeepaw ccungccaw te nynh alokuh cih.
40007027	Te khua yn rah zah tui yn le, te khivae yn zaw zah kha-e inn kha a mung, te kha-e inn tuh phe a pu. Te a pu paw tuh ale raria,” a ci.
40007028	Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh a hopaw kha he a thangsah tuh a ccangpyanaw kya ccungccaw`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua.
40007029	Pawccecize aning nynh kawbya ccangpatu`ae hawte thua leite, kawhoinaw a hoi paw lukheit hawte minmin kha a ccangpya`ae keiccu nynh thua.
40008001	Mua kyate Jesu he a rungbung tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
40008002	Te dotua, vaethyakaepaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha beik zah, “Bawipaw, na ry lanze kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” a cipya.
40008003	Te Jesu nynh a kuih dyn zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte a vaethyaccinaw tuh phe athyaa.
40008004	Te Jesu nynh, “La raeringkuh, hung ccungccaw san la hopah nan; thuasalama la cceih lah ranpibawi kalan namaw kha la dosakuh; te ming`ae kalan ccaekia lang, Mawsi nynh kawpya thyhte silawkunaw kha la rae,” a cipya.
40008005	Te Kapernaum khua lungkhu lang Jesu he a tee tuh, rhawbawipaw lukheit amaw kalan yn thua zah,
40008006	“Bawipaw, ka rya yn lawpatupaw tuh kuihccuchite ccih zah inn kya phang a huekuh, myarya a ccih,” cite amaw kha a ngiaku.
40008007	Te Jesu nynh, “Kae cceih cih zah ka dansah cih,” a cipya.
40008008	Rhawbawipaw nynh khung zah, “Bawipaw, ka inn lungkhu lang nang tee lante kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; thuasalama bya kawkheit kyalya ho lah ka rya yn lawpatupaw tuh a dan cih.
40008009	Pawccecize kae mah kawhoinaw zakaw um paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thua, kamaw kuihkaw rhawkaw`ae ka hoi; te lukheitpaw kha, ‘Cceih,’ ka ci ze a cceih; te ccangpaw kha, ‘Rang,’ ka ci ze yn thua; te ka rya yn lawpatu kha, ‘E hynh cyih,’ ka ci ze a cyih,” a cipya.
40008010	Jesu nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh a ngaeangthua zah amaw a zui`ae paw kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynhcih alepaw zynnaw tuh Israel`ae kya heize ka muih boi khyh!
40008011	Te nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw patae tuh nithua langte niccaw langte oun thua cih`ae zah vaawran peenaw kya Abraham ry, Isaak ry, te Jakob ryte a dahung cih`ae.
40008012	Thuasalama peenaw ccaaw`ae tuh atolang mohnaw lungkhu lang vua athua cih`ae, tuin kya tuh rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih,” a cipya`ae.
40008013	Te Jesu nynh rhawbawipaw kha, “La cceih ccavae; na zyn hawte na hanlan cyipya athua cih,” a cipya. Te a ryalawpatu tuh tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya phe a dan.
40008014	Te Jesu nynh Piter inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh, Piter a zu nung tuh a ngesawling te ccih zah a huekupaw kha a muih.
40008015	Te Jesu nynh a kuih kha hae zah ngesawlingpaw kha-e nung tuh phe dan; te aning tuh thokuh zah minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
40008016	Zete he a thua tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw ccungccaw patae kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; te aning nynh bya te muisaw`ae kha dee zah ngeccih`ae balyn kha a dansah`ae.
40008017	Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh, “Amaw nynh aening nyaanaw`ae kha laah zah aening ccinaw`ae kha a phu,” cite a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
40008018	Te Jesu nynh a pepan e ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh khuraw lang zua lan kaw a pya`ae.
40008019	Te kawbya ccangpatu lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, na ccianaw miakaw lang kae zui cih,” a cipya.
40008020	Te Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Rang-ui`ae nynh laekarung hoi`ae zah vaaw lang-e pavaw`ae nynh bu a hoi`ae; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a lu nungnaw sanmah hoi khyh,” a cipya.
40008021	Te ccangpaw a zuitupaw nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka paaw kha ka la uh hin sah,” a cipya.
40008022	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui, a chih`ae paw nynh mih michi`ae kha la uh`ae sah,” a cipya.
40008023	Te Jesu kohlung lungkhu lang he a tee tuh a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
40008024	Te dotua, rili kya kohlung kha tuileih nynh pung vu lang ciate myarya arupaw khise yn tho, thuasalama Jesu tuh a itheih.
40008025	Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah amaw kha tho`ae zah, “Bawipaw, kaening oun khumbua! Kae chih vae cih!” a cipya`ae.
40008026	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, pawccemou na ri oh?” a cipya`ae. Oute thokuh zah khise te rili kha a pe, tetuh daebabi vae.
40008027	Te ccungccaw`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw pei, khise te rili nynh heize a kaw a ngae`ae?” a ci`ae.
40008028	Te khuhlangraw Kadarene ram lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw ccungccaw luning nynh shawku kyate oun pou`ae zah amaw te a tungkuh`ae; minmin tuh myarya rero`ae keiccu hung ccungccaw sanmah tuh-e laanpi langte cceihngan khyh`ae.
40008029	Te minmin nynh, “Pachia Ccapaw Jesu, nang kha kaening nynh paw kae cyi mou? Accyh azaw maw kaening hynh vawsaw pya khylan tou hynhlang nae thua?” cite a sia`ae.
40008030	Te minmin kyate hary asawnaw lang voh patae`ae phu kheit rangpaekuh`ae paw a um.
40008031	Tukeiccu raerangsaro`ae nynh, “Nang nynh kaening hynh nae dee lanze, voh`ae lungkhu lang tee lan oun ua,” cite amaw kha a ngiaku`ae.
40008032	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Cceih oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh pou`ae zah voh`ae lungkhu lang a tee`ae; te dotua, voh`ae tuh mih balynte apangnaw lang thawmawte ccuebung`ae zah rili lungkhu lang pung a phungkuh`ae, te tui kya pung a chih`ae.
40008033	Te voh a laetu`ae tuh ccue`ae zah khua lungkhu lang a cceih`ae, te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw kya acyikuh paw balyn kha a hopya`ae.
40008034	Te khuaccaw`ae balyn nynh Jesu te tungku khylan oun pou`ae zah amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ram kyate a pou nawlan amaw kha a ngia`ae.
40009001	Te Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah khuraw po zua zah amaw a khua lang a thua.
40009002	Te dotua, iphae vawlan phang i paw a kuihccuchihpaw kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae. Te Jesu nynh mih zynnaw kha he muih tuh, a kuihccuchihpaw kha, “Ka ccapaw, na thawmuin sah, na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
40009003	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang nynh, “E paw hynh Pachia saryate bya a ho!” cite mih thinlung kya a ci`ae.
40009004	Te Jesu nynh mih tuanaw`ae kha nyte, “Pawccemou nae thinlung kya ahoy leipaw na tua oh?
40009005	‘Na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua? Tukhyhze, ‘Thokuh lah cceih ccavae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua? Paw hynh mou azoihua?
40009006	Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh laephi vawlan seinaw ngaethya lan kawhoinaw a hoi cipaw na ny nawlan oh,” ci zah, kuihccuchihpaw kha, ‘Thokuh, na iphae kha lawkuh lah na inn lang cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
40009007	Te aning tuh thokuh zah a inn lang a cceih vae.
40009008	Thuasalama ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah khatahawpaw thungnaw ccungccaw`ae a pyatupaw Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
40009009	Te tuin kyate Jesu po a pou tuh Matthai acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit ngunto khoinaw kya a dahung paw kha a muih. Te Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya. Te aning nynh thokuh zah amaw kha a zui.
40009010	Ou tuhcihte inn kya Jesu tuh ae lan ccaboi kya he a dahung tuh, dotua, nguntokhoi`ae paw patae te misei`ae oun thua`ae zah Jesu te a zuitu`ae ryte a dahungkheih`ae.
40009011	Te Farasi`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh, a zuitu`ae kha, “Pawccemou nae ccangpatupaw hynh nguntokhoi`ae paw te misei`ae ryte a aekheih`ae?” a cipya`ae.
40009012	Te Jesu nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh minmin kha, “A dan`ae paw nynh sibawi peki khyh`ae, thuasalama a ccih`ae paw nynh a peki`ae.
40009013	Thuasalama la cceih oh lah, ‘Kae tuh silawkunaw ka ry khyh, ngaethya-umsanaw nynh ka ry,’ acikuh paw kha na nythya nawlan oh la ccangkuh oh. Pawccecize kae tuh adingpaw ko khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama misei`ae nynh a ngaesiku ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua,” a cipya`ae.
40009014	Oute Johan zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Pawccemou kaening te Farasi`ae tuh atu te atu looh-ae kae sung, thuasalama nang na zuitu`ae tuh looh-aesung khyh`ae rei?” a ci`ae.
40009015	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Zudy ccangvaepaw tuh a uno`ae ryte a um lungkhu balyn tuh-e a uno`ae tuh mih ngaethah kho ngaw ta? Thuasalama zudy ccangvaepaw kha minmin kyate lawpya nin ccyh yn thua cih, oute minmin tuh looh-ae oun sung vae cih`ae.
40009016	Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah arynpaw uccaw kha athawpaw boeibia te bia boi khyh, tuhte a bia lanze bianawpaw nynh arynpaw uccaw kha po laah zah houh aseikuh paleih vae.
40009017	Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah athawpaw misutui kha arynpaw misu-saving bung lungkhu lang ruin boi khyh, tuhte a ruin lanze misu-saving bung tuh apaw cih zah misutui tuh azu cih, te misu-saving bung mah aroh cih; thuasalama athawpaw misutui tuh athawpaw misu-saving bung lungkhu lang nynh a ruin`ae, tuhte tuh paryh akhyn`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40009018	Hynh-e bya`ae kha minmin kya a hopya`ae cciamang lyakhe, dotua, uktupaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha beik zah, “Ka ccanung tuh atumaw khe nynh a chi, thuasalama rang lah a tungvaw na kuih khang lah aning tuh a hiin cih,” a cipya.
40009019	Te Jesu tuh thokuh zah kha-e paw kha a zui, te a zuitu`ae mah a zuikuh bua`ae.
40009020	Te dotua, kum haw laening chii lua ccinaw a hoi paw nopinung lukheit amaw nuhlang yn thua zah a boei rae kha a hae.
40009021	Pawccecize a boei kha me ka hae ze, kae phe ka dan cih cite a thinlung kyate a tuaku.
40009022	Thuasalama Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh, “Ka ccanung, na thinphang nan sah, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya. Te nopinung tuh tuh-e suimilan ccyh kyate phe a dan vae.
40009023	Te uktupaw inn lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh tyngdaw khua`ae paw te a sia a rua`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha muih zah,
40009024	“Pou hin oh, pawccecize imohnung tuh chih khyh, thuasalama a ih,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae. Te minmin nynh a nuinse`ae.
40009025	Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae he a pou`ae te aning tuh tee zah kha-e nung kha a kuih te tho zah imohnung tuh po a tho vae.
40009026	Te hynh-e thungpang tuh tuh-e ram lungkhu balyn po athaan.
40009027	Te tuin kyate Jesu he a pou tuh, mitmoh`ae luning nynh zui`ae zah, “David Ccapaw, kaening hynh ngaethya beih oun um sah!” cite a sia`ae.
40009028	Te inn lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh mitmoh`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae; te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “E hynh cyi lan kae tuh a cyih kho cite na zyn oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Ou, kae zyn Bawipaw,” a ci`ae.
40009029	Oute aning nynh mih mit kha hae zah, “Nae zynnaw thyhte nae tungvaw cyikuh sah,” a cipya`ae.
40009030	Te mih mit`ae tuh oun aw vae; te Jesu nynh, “E hynh hung ccungccaw sanmah la nysah nan oh,” cite minmin kha tyntetyn lang byatawsya`ae.
40009031	Thuasalama minmin nynh he a pou`ae tuh amaw thungpang kha kha-e ram balyn kya pung pazaesaku`ae.
40009032	Minmin he a pou`ae tuh, dotua, raerangsaro bahkuhpaw bya ho kho leipaw ccungccaw lukheit kha Jesu kalan oun thuakhae`ae.
40009033	Te raerangsaro kha deepya he athua tuh, bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya yn ho vae; te ccungccaw zapi tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E tahawpaw Israel kya muihkuh boi khyh!” a ci`ae.
40009034	Thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh, “Raerangsaro`ae uktupaw liate nynh raerangsaro`ae kha aning nynh a dee,” a ci`ae.
40009035	Te Jesu tuh khuapi`ae te khua taraw`ae balyn kalan po khuaccung zah mih sinakok`ae kyakhe a ccangpya`ae; te peenaw thehoypaw kha hopah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae mih ccinaw miakaw te ccihawnaw miakaw kha a dansah`ae.
40009036	Thuasalama Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh minmin kha ngaethya-umsah`ae, pawccemacize minmin tuh mih thawbang zah tuuringtu a hoi leipaw tuu`ae hawte phiariphiarae pung um`ae keiccu nynh thua.
40009037	Oute a zuitu`ae kha, “Loohrue lanpaw tuh alung ccaccing, thuasalama ryalahtu`ae tuh azya.
40009038	Tukeiccu loohruenaw kya-e Bawipaw nynh a loohruenaw lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae yn saw`ae ccaw nanning sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.
40010001	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah minmin kha athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tungvaw thungnaw te dee khonaw, te ccinaw aphuinphuin te ccihawnaw aphuinphuin balyn kha dansah khonaw kaw a pya`ae.
40010002	Locceihtu`ae luhaw laening min`ae tuh: masaty, Piter cite a ko`ae paw Simon, te a neitaw Andru, Zebedi ccapaw James, te a neitaw Johan;
40010003	Filip te Bartholomew; Thomas te nguntokhoipaw Matthai; Alfeas ccapaw James, te Thadde cikuh paw Lebbe;
40010004	Kanaan khua paw Simon, te Jesu a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria nynh thua`ae.
40010005	E luhaw laening hynh Jesu nynh saw`ae zah hynhte kaw a pya`ae: “Zenta`ae ccianaw kalan na cceih lan khyh oh, te Samaria`ae khua lungkhu lang na tee lan khyh oh.
40010006	Thuasalama Israel minphuin kyaze azopaw tuu`ae kalan palia la cceih oh.
40010007	Te na ccia vae oh ze, ‘Vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,’ cite na la hopah cih oh.
40010008	Ngeccih`ae kha la dansah oh, vaethyakae`ae paw kha la thyaasah oh, a chih`ae paw kha la thosah oh, raerangsaro`ae kha la dee oh. Nanning tuh alakaw te nynh na mue oh, te alakaw te la pya oh.
40010009	Nae phuabu`ae kya sui thuasah, ngunphua thuasah, daw phua thuasah la sangkuh nan oh.
40010010	Nae khuaccungnaw hanlan sohrae, angki zung ning, ccukoh`ae te hoitang`ae mah phukuh nan oh; pawccecize ryalahtupaw tuh loohdang lan accan.
40010011	“Te pawtecihpaw khuapi, tukhyhze khua lungkhu lang nanning na tee vae oh ze, tuh-e kya hungmou angaekuh cipaw la khia oh lah tuin kyate na pou mawlaezung oh tuh-e paw inn kya la um oh.
40010012	Te nanning nynh inn lungkhu lang he na tee vae oh ze, ‘Daenaw um sah cite,’ la beih oh.
40010013	Te inn tuh angaeku ze nae kya-e daenaw tuh tuhe innbyn tungvaw la thua sah; thuasalama angaeku khyh ze, nae kya-e daenaw tuh naemaw kalan la ki sah.
40010014	Te hunghung zemah nanning kha innccung ae doih oh zah, nae bya kha mah a ngae khyh ze, tuh-e inn, tukhyhze tuhe khuapi kyate he na pou vae oh ze, nae ccu kya-e laenoi kha la pheihkuhsya oh.
40010015	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, byapia nin kya tuh-e khuapi hanlan laeze Sodom te Komorah ram hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.
40010016	“Dotua oh, suizaw`ae laku tuu`ae saw hawte nanning kha kae saw oh, tukeiccu nanning tuh fupaw`ae hawte nae lunghaw sah lah vafu`ae hawte nae lungne sah.
40010017	Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, pawccecize minmin nynh kungsi`ae kalan ae ah cih oh zah mih sinakok`ae kya ae bua cih oh.
40010018	Te minmin kalan te Zenta`ae kalan ccaekia na thua nawlan oh kamaw keiccuze ram uktu`ae te siapharan`ae malang nanning kha ae thuakhae cih oh.
40010019	Thuasalama minmin nynh he ae thuakhae vae oh ze, pawmou ka ho cih, tukhyhze pawtemou ka ho cih cipaw nae lungvawsaw nan sah. Pawccecize tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya na ho lan oh paw kha pya athua cih.
40010020	Pawccecize a hotupaw tuh nanning thua khyh, thuasalama nae Paaw Pachia kya-e Muisaw nynh nanning kyate a ho.
40010021	“Te uno nynh a uno toulou kha chinaw kalan yn ah cih, te paaw nynh a ccaaw kha yn ah cih; te ccaaw`ae nynh nungpaaw`ae kha oun rawse cih`ae zah minmin kha oun chisah cih`ae.
40010022	Te kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw balyn nynh nanning kha ae hua cih oh. Thuasalama athangnaw cia atynpaw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih.
40010023	Thuasalama khua khuakheit kya nanning kha he ae tua ae sah vae oh ze, ccangpaw khua kalan la ccue oh; pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thua maw nanning nynh Israel khua`ae kalan na cceih kou lan khyh oh.
40010024	“Zuitu tuh a ccangpatu luki um khyh, see mah a bawipaw luki um khyh.
40010025	Zuitu hanlan a ccangpatupaw hawte athua ze azaw vae, te see mah a bawipaw hawte athua ze azaw. Minmin nynh inn hoitu kha Beelzebub a ci`ae lanze a innbyn`ae kha pawcihmou houh a ci cih`ae!
40010026	“Tukeiccu minmin kha la rih nan oh; pawccecize langsaku lei lante phang khung paw pawsang um khyh, te ny lei lante thurupaw mah um khyh.
40010027	“Mohnaw kya kae hopya oh paw kha awnaw kya la ho oh, te nae nakaring kya na thae oh paw kha innccukaly langte la ho oh.
40010028	“Te pyn kha theih kho zah hiinnaw-muisaw a theih kho lei`ae paw kha la rih nan oh; thuasalama hiinnaw-muisaw te pyn kha paryhte hell kya aroh khopaw raw kha la rih oh.
40010029	Ccithya saning tuh daw phuapia piakheit lang zua thua khyh`ae ta? Te kha-e`ae sakheit sanmah nae Paaw kaw leite laekhu lang ccah lan khyh.
40010030	Te nae lu kya-e nae sang`ae kha marya ria athua.
40010031	Tukeiccu rih nan oh, nanning tuh ccithya`ae patae laeze nae phutehua.
40010032	“Tukeiccu hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha ccaekia yn khan ze, kha-e paw kha vaawran um paw ka Paaw malang kae nynh mah ccaekia ka khanru cih.
40010033	Thuasalama hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha yn vua paw tuh vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw malang kae nynh mah ka vuaru cih.
40010034	“Laephi vawlan daenaw thuakhae khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tua nan oh, daenaw thuakhae khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama thaloi saw khylan nynh kae thua.
40010035	“Ccungccapaw kha a paaw rawsesah khylan, te ccanung kha a nung rawsesah khylan, te monung kha a ninnung rawsesah khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua.
40010036	Te ccungccapaw a rhaw`ae tuh amaw innbyn kya-e`ae nynh thua cih.
40010037	“Kamaw laeze a paaw, tukhyhze a nung a sungsah huapaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh; te kamaw laeze ccapaw te ccanung a sungsah huapaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh.
40010038	Te amaw a vaelantung puihku leite kamaw yn zui paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh.
40010039	A hiinnaw a muihkuh paw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha a shung cih, te kamaw keiccuze a hiinnaw a shung paw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha bua a muihkuh cih.
40010040	“Nanning kha ae thuasah oh paw tuh kamaw kha oun thuasah paw nynh thua, te kamaw oun thuasah paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a thuasah paw nynh thua.
40010041	Profeh min te profeh lukheit kha a thuasah paw tuh profeh kya-e law mee kha a mue cih. Te adingpaw ccungccapaw min te adingpaw ccungccaw kha a thuasah paw tuh adingpaw ccungccapaw kya-e ryalaw mee kha a mue cih.
40010042	Te hunghung zemah zuitu lukheit min liate hynh-e imua`ae lukhakheit kha nia lanpaw tuikyaa banang nangkheit a pya lanze, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw tuh a ryalaw mee kha pawpawte mah shung lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
40011001	Ou tuhcihte, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha kawpya paw he a thangsah tuh, tuh-e area kya-e khua`ae kya ccangpya khylan te phungho khylan tuin kyate a pou vae.
40011002	Te Johan nynh thunginn kyate Kri a ryalaw`ae kong kha he a thae tuh, a zuitu`ae luning kha saw`ae zah,
40011003	Jesu kha, “Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua ta? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi ung cih?” cite bya a khiasah`ae.
40011004	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “La cceih oh lah na muih oh paw te na thae oh paw uccaw`ae kha Johan la hopah oh.
40011005	Mitmoh`ae nynh ngawmuih`ae zah ccukhou`ae nynh a cceih vae`ae, vaethyakae`ae paw a dan`ae, te nawpang`ae nynh nawthae`ae zah michi`ae tuh thosah athua vae`ae, te ryachi`ae kalan thehoypaw tuh hopya athua vae.
40011006	Te kae ka keiccuze a lungthang leipaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
40011007	Te minmin he a pou`ae te Jesu nynh Johan konglang ccungccaw zapi kalan a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Nanning nynh paw do khylan mou rangkaw langkhe na ccia oh? Khivae nynh a he paw phaeku do khylan tou?
40011008	Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccapaw do khylan tou? Dotua oh, nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh`ae paw tuh siapharan inn kya nynh a um`ae.
40011009	Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Profehpaw do khylan tou? Athua, nanning kae hopya oh, profeh lukheit lae heize alesaehua paw nynh athua.
40011010	Pawccecize, ‘Dotua, na malang na ccianaw a paccyn cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw,’ cite azeikuh paw kha hynh-e paw kong nynh thua.
40011011	“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nopi`ae kyate a pui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae laku Baptisma pyatu Johan laeze alesae huapaw lukheit san pou boi loh khyh; thuasalama vaawran peenaw kya adih huaccepaw ccungccaw tuh aning laeze alesaehua.
40011012	Te Baptisma pyatu Johan ryalawnaw ccyh kyate tho zah atu rya cia vaawran peenaw tuh nangsenaw kha teing zah a nangse`ae paw nynh kha-e kha thawzung mangte a luade`ae.
40011013	Pawccecize kawbya te profeh`ae ccauh balyn tuh Johan ccyh kyacia nynh profehbya a ho`ae.
40011014	Te hynh-e ka bya hynh nanning nynh na lawku ry oh ze, aning tuh yn thua vae cih paw Elijah nynh thua.
40011015	Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh tuh thae sah!
40011016	“Te hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou ka touse cih`ae? E ciihan tuh kungkunaw hmin`ae kya dahung`ae zah mih ban`ae kha,
40011017	‘Kaening nynh nanning kha phyly kae tupah oh zah na law khyh oh, nae kalan kae rah kae khui zah na rah na khui khyh oh rei,’ cite a hopah`ae paw imua`ae te nynh aloku`ae.
40011018	Pawccecize Johan tuh ae leite nia leite yn thua zah minmin nynh, ‘Aning tuh khozi bahkuhpaw nynh thua,’ a ci`ae.
40011019	Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh aete niate yn thua zah minmin nynh, ‘Dotua oh, aemoh paw te misusanphing khu! Ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae banpaw khu!’ a ci`ae. Thuasalama hawnaw tuh amaw a ccaaw`ae kyate thyaaccousah athua,” a ci.
40011020	Oute athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae alung huacce a langsakunaw kya-e khua`ae nynh a ngaesiku khyh`ae keiccuze Jesu nynh hynhte a pe`ae:
40011021	“Khorazin khua, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Bethsaida khua, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Pawccecize nanning kya acyikuh paw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha Tai khuapi te Sidon khuapi kya a la cyiku lanze minmin tuh buri uccaw lawkuh cih`ae zah, buhaw kya toukute khawlya mawte phe a la ngaesikuh vae cih`ae.
40011022	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, byapianaw nin kya nanning hanlan laeze Tai te Sidon hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.
40011023	Te Kapernaum khua, nang tuh vaawran kyacia hangthung na thua zemah Hades lang sawbung na thua cih; pawccecize nang na kya acyikuh paw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha Sodom khuapi kya a la cyiku ze, kha-e tuh atunin rya cia atyn ung cih paw.
40011024	Thuasalama nang kae hopya, byapianaw nin kya na hanlan laeze Sodom khuapi hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih,” a ci.
40011025	Tuh-e ccyh kya Jesu nynh tho zah, “Vaawran te laephi Bawipaw, Pou Apang, na kalan lungtuabya ka ho; pawccemacize nang nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh a haw`ae paw te a thya`ae paw kyate phe na thuru zah nosi`ae kyakhe na phypya`ae.
40011026	Ou tuhmawte nynh athua Apang, pawccecize na mitmuihnaw kya tuh-e tuh ahoypaw nynh thua.
40011027	“Ka Paaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha kamaw kalan marya yn ah vae; te Paaw holeite hung ccungccaw nynh san Ccapaw kha nyh khyh; Ccapaw te Ccapaw nynh a phypya ry paw ccungccaw holeite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Paaw kha nyh khyh.
40011028	“Riathae`ae paw te phuri`ae paw balyn kamaw kalan rang oh lah hae-ungnaw kae pya cih oh.
40011029	Ka taphu hynh nae tungvaw khangkuh oh lah kamaw hynh yn ccangkuh oh; pawccecize kae tuh a lungnepaw te thinlung kya zakawsangsakuhpaw nynh ka thua; oute nae hiinnaw-muisaw hanlan hae-ungnaw kha na mue cih oh.
40011030	Pawccecize ka taphu tuh nawre um zah ka phupaw tuh azaw,” a ci.
40012001	Tuh-e ccyh lya Jesu tuh Sabbath nin khe loo kya po a cceih; te a zuitu`ae tuh mih vuelaw zah looh avui kha zukuh`ae zah a ae`ae.
40012002	Te Farasi`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh amaw kha, “Dotua, Sabbath nin kya kawbya nynh cyi lan a ua leipaw kha na zuitu`ae nynh a cyi`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40012003	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “David nynh amaw ryte a um`ae paw ry mih vuelaw lya, a cyi paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
40012004	Pachia inn lungkhu lang tee zah amaw hanlan te amaw ryte um`ae paw hanlan Kawbya nynh ae lan a ua leipaw, thuasalama ranpibawi`ae kyalya Kawbya nynh a ua paw, Pachia malang nungpyapaw sanlou kha phe a ae cipaw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
40012005	Tukhyhze, tempal kya ranpibawi`ae nynh Sabbath nin kya Sabbath a thusah`ae zemah seibe thua khyh`ae cipaw kha kawbya kya na ria boi khyh oh tou?
40012006	Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, tempal laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya a um.
40012007	Thuasalama, ‘Silawkunaw tuh ka ry khyh, ngaethya-umsanaw nynh ka ry,’ acikuh paw asuilan hynh phe na ny oh lanze, seibe lan accan leipaw hynh nanning nynh sei na be cih lei oh paw.
40012008	Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Sabbath Bawipaw ccaccei nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
40012009	Te tuin kyate Jesu he a pou tuh mih sinakok lungkhu langkhe a tee.
40012010	Te dotua, tuin kya a kuih hawkheit lang achihpaw ccungccapaw lukheit a la um. Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a seinaw kae kyngpya ccaw cite, “Sabbath nin kya dansah lan kawbya nynh a ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.
40012011	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh tuu sakheit hoi zah kha-e tuh Sabbath nin kya hunghua lungkhu lang phe a ccaw lanze kha-e tuu kha kyng leite, thua leite a um paw na ung cih oh tou?
40012012	Tuu laeze ccungccaw tuh pawcihmou houh aphutehua? Tukeiccu Sabbath nin kya ahoypaw cyi lan tuh accanpaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
40012013	Oute Jesu nynh ccungccapaw kha, “Na kuih kha dyngtua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh a kuih kha dyng zah hawkheit lang-e hawte phe ahoy vae.
40012014	Oute Farasi`ae tuh pou`ae zah amaw kha rawsete pawtemou chia lan cipaw khuakhanku`ae.
40012015	Thuasalama Jesu nynh kha-e kha he a nyh tuh tuin kyate phe a toikuh. Te ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha zui`ae zah minmin balyn kha a dansah`ae.
40012016	Te amaw kha hung nynh thua cipaw na nysah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha bya a tawsya`ae.
40012017	Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh a hosyapaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua. A hopaw tuh:
40012018	“Ka sungsahpaw, ka pokupaw ka rya oun lawpatu khu dotua oh! Amaw kya ka muisaw a lungrythua; amaw tungvaw ka Muisaw ka nung cih, te aning nynh Zenta`ae kha atazaenaw kong a hopah cih`ae.
40012019	“Aning tuh eikuh lan khyh, sia mah sia lan khyh, hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah laanpi kya a roi thae lan khyh.
40012020	Atazaenaw kha taenaw kalan a thuakhae makhia aning nynh a vaemaw um paw phaeku kha khya lan khyh zah maeekhuhpaw liarui kha the lan khyh.
40012021	Te amaw min kha Zenta`ae nynh a doliakuh cih`ae,” a ci.
40012022	Oute raerangsaro nynh bahkuh zah a mitmohpaw, bya ho kho leipaw lukheitpaw kha amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae; te kha-e paw kha a dansah. Oute mitmoh zah bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya ho zah ngaw a muih vae.
40012023	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw tuh David Ccapaw thua khyh ta?” a ci`ae.
40012024	Thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh, “E paw nynh khozi`ae uktupaw Beelzebub leite tuh khozi`ae kha dee khyh,” a ci`ae.
40012025	Te Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha nyh zah minmin kha, “Amaw te amaw kha rawsekuh zah aphiakuhpaw peenaw miakaw tuh ronaw kalan nynh a thua cih; te amaw te amaw kha rawsekuh zah aphiakuhpaw khuapi, tukhyhze inn miakaw tuh tyn kho lan khyh.
40012026	Te Setan nynh Setan kha a dee lanze, aning tuh amaw te amaw a rawsekuhpaw te a phiakuhpaw nynh thua; pawcihtemou a peenaw tuh atyn kho cih?
40012027	Te kae nynh Beelzebub liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, nae ccaaw`ae nynh hung liate mou minmin kha a dee`ae? Tukeiccu nae ccaaw`ae tuh nanning byapiatu`ae athua cih`ae.
40012028	Thuasalama Pachia Muisaw liate raerangsaro`ae kha kae nynh ka dee ze, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kalan yn thua ccaccing vae.
40012029	Tukhyhze ccungccaw lukheit nynh a thawsaepaw ccungccapaw kha masaty a khiide khyh lanze, a inn lungkhu langkhe pawcihtemou a tee kho cih zah a uccaw`ae kha a lua kho cih? A khiidety ze nynh a inn kha a lua kho cih.
40012030	Kamaw ryte a um leipaw ccungccaw tuh kae yn rawsepaw nynh thua; te kamaw ryte a sueluakuh bua leipaw tuh phiariphiarae a um paw nynh thua.
40012031	“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, seinaw miakaw te Pachia saryapaw bya hanlan ccungccaw`ae tuh seingaethya athua cih`ae; thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw saryapaw bya a ho paw ccungccaw`ae tuh seingaethya thua lan khyh`ae.
40012032	Te Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha rawsete bya a ho paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh seingaethya athua cih, thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kha rawsete bya a ho paw ccungccaw tuh, atu she kya mah, yn thua lanpaw she kya mah seingaethya thua lan khyh.
40012033	“Thingku kha ahoy lang rae lah athae ahoy cih, tukhyhze ahoy lei lang rae lah athae hoy lan khyh, pawccecize thingku tuh athae liate ny athua.
40012034	Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae! Pawcihtemou nanning na hoy lei oh pite ahoypaw uccaw`ae kong kha na ho kho cih oh? Pawccecize thinlung kya phe beihpaw kha nynh khalang nynh a ho.
40012035	Ahoypaw ccungccaw nynh thinlung kya-e ahoypaw sisua bung kyate ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha yn poukhae; te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw nynh ahoy leipaw sisua bung kyate ahoy leipaw uccaw`ae kha yn poukhae.
40012036	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw`ae nynh ccakaepaw bya a ho`ae paw miakaw hanlan byapianaw nin kya pawcihte nynh a ho cipaw kha a langsakuh cih.
40012037	Pawccecize na bya`ae liate nang tuh thyaaccousah na thua cih zah na bya`ae liate nang tuh seibe na thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
40012038	Oute kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang te Farasi`ae nynh khung`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, na kyate muihsanaw ccangkheit kae muihtua ry,” a ci`ae.
40012039	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ahoy leipaw te a ohhuakuhpaw ciihan nynh tuh muihsanaw hynh a ccung, thuasalama profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan ccangpaw muihsanaw kha pya thua vae lan khyh.
40012040	Pawccecize Jonah tuh nin thung te zi thung ngapi vuebua kya a um hawte, Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah nin thung te zi thung laephi lungkhu a um cih.
40012041	Byapianaw kya Nineveh khua-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thokuh cih`ae zah hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha sei oun be cih`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh Jonah phunghonaw kya phe a ngaesikuh`ae, te dotua, Jonah laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya nynh a um.
40012042	Byapianaw kya deilang e siapharannung tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte yn thokuh cih zah sei yn be cih`ae, pawccecize aning tuh laephi athangnaw langte Solomon hawnaw bya thae khylan yn thua; te dotua, Solomon laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya a um.
40012043	“Athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh ccungccapaw kyate he a pou tuh aroupaw ahmin`ae lang po a cceih, hae-ungnaw kha ccungkuh zah muihkuh khyh.
40012044	Oute aning nynh, ‘Ka poutawnaw ka inn lang ka ki cih,’ a ci; te he a thua tuh kha-e inn tuh phe la phikuh zah a ccunghangpaw te paccaan athua paw kha a muih.
40012045	Oute aning tuh cceih zah amaw laeze houh ahoy leipaw ccangpaw muisaw lusari`ae kha amaw ry a hoeibua`ae, te minmin tuh tee`ae zah kha-e paw kya a um`ae; te kha-e ccungccapaw kya-e nyalang acyihkuh paw tuh masaty a umtu laeze houh a seihua. Tuh-e hawte nynh hynh-e ahoy leipaw ciihan kya mah acyikuh bua cih,” a cipya`ae.
40012046	Ccungccaw zapi kha bya a hopya cciamang lyakhe, dotua, a nung te a neitapaw`ae tuh atolang khe thadyn`ae zah amaw kha bya hopya lan a ry`ae.
40012047	Oute ccungccaw lukheit nynh amaw kha, “Dotua, na nung te na neitapaw`ae, nang ryte byahoku ry`ae zah atolang nynh a thadyn`ae,” a cipya.
40012048	Thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw kha-e bya a hopah paw kha, “Ka nung tuh hungmou? Te ka neitapaw`ae tuh hungmou?” cite a khung.
40012049	Te a zuitu`ae kalan khe a kuih kha dyng zah, “Ka nung te ka neitapaw`ae hynh dotua oh!
40012050	Pawccecize vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw rynaw a cyih paw, kha-e paw kha nynh ka neitapaw, ka ccia, te ka nung tuh athua,” a ci.
40013001	Tuh-e nin kya Jesu tuh inn kyate pou zah rili kin khe a dahung.
40013002	Te ccungccaw zapi pi tuh amaw kalan a sueluakuh`ae keiccu Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah a dahung; te ccungccaw zapi khaleih tuh varan langkhe a thadyn`ae.
40013003	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te bya patae a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh: “Dotua oh, ccaciivuatu lukheit nynh ccaciivua lan a cceih.
40013004	Te ccacii kha he a vua tuh, ccacii abang tuh laanpi pe khe ccah`ae zah pavaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah phe a tuh kou`ae.
40013005	Abang tuh laephi zya zah lung alungnaw kya a ccah; te laephi thawkalae lang a um khyh keiccuze taloi a po`ae.
40013006	Te khuanin he yn paw tuh minmin kha a rua vae`ae, te tharui a hoi khyh`ae keiccuze karae arou`ae.
40013007	Te abang tuh hingpaw`ae laku ccah zah hingpaw`ae nynh lethin`ae zah minmin kha phang reihde`ae.
40013008	Thuasalama ccangpaw ccacii`ae tuh ahoypaw lae kya ccah`ae zah abang tuh leih zakheit, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, abang tuh leih sungthung athae a thae`ae.
40013009	Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah,” a ci.
40013010	Te zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Pawccemou minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te na hopya`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
40013011	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Pawccemacize vaawran peenaw kya-e byakhupaw`ae kha ny lan nanning tuh pya na thua oh, thuasalama minmin tuh pya thua khyh`ae.
40013012	Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh pyachih athua cih zah pataepi houh a hoi cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh a hoithypaw maw kha lawpya athua cih.
40013013	Tukeiccu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te ka hopya`ae; pawccemacize minmin tuh mang a muih`ae pite muih khyh`ae, te mang a thae`ae pite thae khyh`ae, thae mah thaethya khyh`ae.
40013014	“Te minmin kya Isaiah nynh a hopaw profehbya tuh accing vae; a hopaw tuh: ‘Thae paw tuh na thae cih oh zah na thaethya lan khyh oh, te muihpaw tuh na muih cih oh zah na nyh lan khyh oh.
40013015	Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae mih thinlung tuh phe amoh, te mih nakaring`ae tuh karae arua, te mih mit`ae tuh phang masi`ae; tukhyh lanze ccyhkhakheit kya mih mit`ae khate phe a muih cih`ae paw, mih nakaring`ae te phe a thae cih`ae paw, mih thinlung te phe a thaethya cih`ae paw, te phe a paleihkuh cih`ae paw, te minmin kha phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,’ a ci.
40013016	“Thuasalama nanning nae mit`ae tuh ngawmuih`ae keiccu hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; te nae nakaring`ae tuh nawthae`ae keiccu hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.
40013017	Pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, profeh`ae patae te adingpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh na muih oh paw uccaw`ae hynh muih a ry`ae zemah muih bua khyh`ae, te na thae oh paw hynh thae a ry`ae zemah thaebua khyh`ae.
40013018	“Tukeiccu ccaciivuatupaw tousenaw phungpaw kong hynh nanning ngaetua oh.
40013019	Lukhakheit nynh peenaw kong hopaw bya kha he a thae tuh kha-e kha thaethya khyh, oute mihoy leipaw nynh yn thua zah a thinlung kya vua paw ccacii kha dae a lawpya. Tuh-e paw tuh laanpi zung kya vua paw ccacii a mue paw kha nynh thua.
40013020	Te lung alungnaw kya vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya kha thae zah vaekheihmawte lungtuate a lawkuh paw kha nynh thua.
40013021	Tuhzemah a kya atharui hoi khyh zah sosoh rou nynh atyn, te bya keiccuze vawsawrunaw, tukhyhze tuasakunaw he yn um tuh aro mawze aning tuh phe a maeleihkuh.
40013022	Hingpaw`ae laku vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya athae paw kha nynh athuabua; te hynh-e laephipi uccaw elan thinphangnaw te lingthyapaw hoirungnaw nynh bya kha phang a reihde pya, te aning tuh athae kha thae kho vae khyh.
40013023	Thuasalama ahoypaw lae kya vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya kha thae zah kha-e kha a thaethya paw nynh thua; athae kha thae zah abang tuh leih zakheit, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, abang tuh leih sungthung a pousah paw ccungccaw kha nynh thua,” a ci.
40013024	Jesu nynh ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh a loo kya ahoypaw ccacii a vua paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku.
40013025	Te ccungccaw`ae a i`ae lyakhe a rhawpaw nynh yn thua zah chanvui laku khe lonua mung`ae kha vua zah phe a cceih.
40013026	Thuasalama chanvui tuh yn po zah avui he yn pou tuh lonua`ae mah oun langkuh bua vae`ae.
40013027	Tukeiccu inn hoitu a see`ae nynh a kalan yn thua`ae zah, ‘Bawihaepaw, na loo kya ccacii ahoypaw kha na vua khyh ta? Paw kyate mou lonua`ae hynh oun pou`ae?’ cite a khia`ae.
40013028	Kha-e paw nynh, ‘Rhaw lukheit nynh e hynh a cyih,’ a cipya`ae. See`ae nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze kaening nynh ccianua lan zah kha-e`ae kha marya phoh lan na ry ta?’ a ci`ae.
40013029	Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Tuhte thua khyh, lonua`ae he na khae lya oh, khae` ae ryte chanvui mah phe na khaebia sei cih oh.
40013030	Loohrue ccyh azaw makhia pynkheihlan paryh le`ae sah; te loohrue ccyh kya loohruetu`ae kha, “Nanning lonua`ae kha masaty suelua oh lah maee te rua lan la tung oh, thuasalama chanvui kha ka byng lungkhu lang oun ruin oh,” ka cipah cih`ae,’ a ci,” cite a hopya`ae.
40013031	Jesu nynh ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh ccungccapaw lukheit nynh lah zah a loo kya a vua paw mungngia cii te nynh aloku.
40013032	Mungngia cii tuh ccacii`ae balyn kyaze adih huaccepaw ccaccing nynh thua; thuasalama kha-e nynh he yn le vae tetuh enaw-ekan`ae lakuze ale huapaw lang te thingku lang phe atang; te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh oun zou`ae zah kha-e aran`ae kyakhe bu a luaku`ae,” a ci.
40013033	Ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh ransi te nynh aloku; nopi lukheit nynh kha-e kha laah zah vaepoi kee keethung kya a phing paw, tuh-e vaepoi phe a thosah paw ransi te nynh aloku a ci,” a ci.
40013034	Hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kalan tousenaw phungpaw`ae te nynh a ho; te tousenaw phungpaw leite minmin kha bya hopah khyh`ae.
40013035	Ou tuhte profeh nynh, “Ka khalang ka aw cih zah tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha ka ho cih, laephipi athonaw kyate athurukuh paw uccaw`ae kha ka ho cih,” cite a ho paw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
40013036	Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha cciasah`ae zah inn lungkhu lang a tee; te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Loo kya-e lonua`ae tousenaw phungpaw kong kha kaening oun hopah,” a ci`ae.
40013037	Aning nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ccacii ahoypaw a vuatupaw tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh thua.
40013038	Loo tuh laephipi nynh thua; ccacii ahoypaw tuh peenaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua; thuasalama lonua`ae tuh mihoy leipaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua.
40013039	Tuh-e lonua mung`ae a vua paw rhaw tuh diabolos nynh thua; loohrue ccyh tuh laephi she athangnaw nynh thua; te loohruetu`ae tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh thua.
40013040	Tukeiccu lonua`ae tuh suelua`ae zah maee kya a rua`ae hawte laephi she athangnaw kya acyikuh bua cih.
40013041	Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha yn saw cih`ae zah minmin nynh mingccang`ae a maeleihsakuh`ae paw te kawbya pawlangria lei`ae paw balyn kha a peenaw kyate oun suelua cih`ae.
40013042	Te minmin kha maeephupi lungkhu lang a phung cih`ae, tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih.
40013043	Oute adingpaw ccungccaw`ae tuh mih Paaw peenaw kya khuanin hawte a aw vae cih`ae. Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah!
40013044	“Te vaawran peenaw tuh lei kya thurupaw sisua te nynh aloku; kha-e kha ccungccapaw nynh he a muih tuh zya a thuru, te kha-e elan lungtuanaw te cceih zah a hoi paw balyn kha zua zah kha-e lei kha a re.
40013045	“Te vaawran peenaw tuh myarya ahoypaw pale`ae a ccungkuh paw kungkupaw te nynh aloku.
40013046	Tuh-e paw nynh myarya aphutepaw pale kha he a muih tuh cceih zah a hoi paw balyn kha zua zah kha-e pale kha a re.
40013047	“Te vaawran peenaw tuh rili lungkhu lang vua`ae zah ngasaw aphuinphuin akhung paw mia te nynh aloku.
40013048	Ngasaw te he abeih tuh mia kha ngasaw kyng`ae nynh varan langkhe a sue`ae, te dahung`ae zah ahoypaw ngasaw`ae kha sua lungkhu lang a sang`ae, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kha a vua`ae.
40013049	Tuh-e hawte laephi she athangnaw kya athua cih; vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun rung cih`ae zah mihoy lei`ae kha a ding`ae paw laku kyate thohphia cih`ae.
40013050	Te minmin kha maee phupi lungkhu lang a vua cih`ae; tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih,” a ci.
40013051	Jesu nynh, “E uccaw`ae balyn hynh na thaethya oh ta?” cite zuitu`ae kha a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw,” a ci`ae.
40013052	Oute Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu vaawran peenaw kong ccangpya athua vae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae miakaw tuh amaw a sisua bung lungkhu te athawpaw te arynpaw uccaw`ae yn thuakhae paw inn hoitupaw te nynh aloku,” a cipya`ae.
40013053	Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha he a ho kou tuh tuin kyate phe a pou.
40013054	Te amaw a khua lang he a thua tuh a khuaccaw`ae kha mih sinakok kyakhe a ccangpya`ae; minmin tuh myarya mih ngaeangthua zah, “Paw kyate mou e paw nynh hynh-e hawnaw te e athungpaw ryalaw`ae hynh a mue?
40013055	E paw tuh lehccamapaw ccapaw thua khyh tou? A nung Meri ci`ae paw thua khyh tou? Te a neitaw`ae tuh James, Joses, Simon te Judas thua khyh`ae tou?
40013056	Te a ccia`ae tuh mih balynte aening ryte a um`ae paw kha thua khyh tou? Tuhte lanze paw kyate mou E paw nynh e uccaw`ae balyn hynh a mue?” a ci`ae.
40013057	Tuhte minmin tuh amaw kya mih lung athang. Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Profeh lukheit tuh amaw a ram, te amaw a innbyn kya holeite tuh sawtua leite um khyh`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40013058	Te minmin nynh a zyn khyh`ae keiccuze athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae patae kha khe kya Jesu nynh cyih khyh.
40014001	Tuh-e ccyh kya Herod tetrach nynh Jesu thungpang kha thae zah,
40014002	a ryalawpatu`ae kha, “E paw tuh Baptisma pyatu Johan nynh thua, aning tuh chinaw kyate nynh a tho vae; tukeiccu nynh hynh-e thungnaw`ae hynh amaw kya alangku,” a cipya`ae.
40014003	Pawccecize Herod nynh a neitaw Filip zu Herodia keiccuze Johan kha kyng zah a khii, te thunginn kya a saw.
40014004	Pawccecize Johan nynh Herod kha, “Kha-e nung kha na hanlan na lawku lan ccan khyh,” a la cipya.
40014005	Te aning nynh Johan kha chia lan a ry zemah ccungccaw zapi raw kha a rih. Pawccemacize minmin nynh Johan kha profeh lukheit hawte a tua`ae paw nynh thua.
40014006	Thuasalama Herod a pui nin poi he a tua`ae tuh Herodia ccanung nynh mih malang khe he yn law tuh Herod kha a lungrythuasah.
40014007	Tukeiccu kha-e nopinung nynh a ngiakupaw miakaw kha pya lan Herod nynh ccaesakute byakinpyaku.
40014008	Te a nung nynh phe a hopyaty vae thyhte, kha-e nung nynh, “Hynhlang hin Baptisma pyatu Johan lu kha pakephepaw te yn pya,” a ci.
40014009	Te siapharan tuh a ngaethah; tuhzemah ccaesakupaw keiccu te amaw ryte loohdangkunaw kya a dahungkheih`ae paw keiccuze kha-e nung kha pya lan kaw a pya`ae.
40014010	Te ccungccaw saw zah thunginn kya Johan kha a lu paesah`ae.
40014011	Te a lu kha pakephepaw kya oun ccyng`ae zah liaccanung taraw kha a pya`ae, te aning nynh kha-e kha a nung kalan a ccyng.
40014012	Te Johan zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah a rhua kha laah`ae zah a ccy`ae, te cceih`ae zah Jesu kha a hopya`ae.
40014013	Jesu nynh tuh-e kong he a thae tuh tuin kyate a makhaete rangkaw lang kohlung te phe a pou; te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh khua kyate mih ccu te amaw kha a zui`ae.
40014014	Te Jesu tuh yn pou zah ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh minmin kha ngaethyaumsah` ae zah mih ngeccih`ae kha a dansah`ae.
40014015	Te zete he yn thua tuh a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “E kya tuh rangkaw thua zah khuanin phe anae vae, tukeiccu ccungccaw zapi hynh saw`ae lah minmin nynh khua`ae kalan cceih`ae sah lah mimaw elan aepaw a reku ccaw`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
40014016	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Minmin a pou`ae ho khyh, nanning nynh minmin kha ae lanpaw pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
40014017	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “E kya sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning rou nynh kae hoi,” a cipya`ae.
40014018	Jesu nynh, “Kha-e`ae kha hynhlang kamaw kalan oun ccyng oh,” a ci.
40014019	Te ccungccaw zapi kha lonua vawlan dahung lan kaw a pya, te sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning kha laah zah vaawran lang dothung zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah sanlou`ae kha zuitu`ae a pya, te zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha a pya`ae.
40014020	Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah phe byn`ae; te alaepaw a eihpaw kha khuin`ae zah kee haw laening phe abeih.
40014021	Te tuh-e a ae`ae paw tuh nopi`ae te imua`ae holeite pise piccang thungpangaw loukaw acih`ae.
40014022	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi a saw lya`ae khe, amaw malang khuraw lang cciaty khylan a zuitu`ae kha vaekheihmawte kohlung lungkhu lang a kaesah`ae.
40014023	Te ccungccaw zapi kha he a saw`ae koute a makhaete sawsang lan mua muakheit kalan a kaethung; te zete he a thua tuh tuin kya a makhaete a um.
40014024	Thuasalama kohlung tuh atu rili ngaelung kya um zah khisang nynh arawsekuh lante a mung keiccu tuileih nynh a hesaku.
40014025	Te khuazi santari ccyhpalinaw kya Jesu tuh rili vawlan khe zuitu`ae kalan a cceih.
40014026	Te zuitu`ae nynh amaw rili vawlan yn ccia paw kha he a muih`ae tuh rih`ae zah, “Muihsaw nynh thua!” a ci`ae; te minmin tuh a ri`ae keiccuze thawte a sia`ae.
40014027	Thuasalama Jesu nynh hopah kanmaw`ae zah minmin kha, “Nae thawmuin sah! Kamaw nynh ka thua, rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
40014028	Te Piter nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Bawipaw, namaw na thua ze, tui vawlan te na kalan ccia lan kaw yn pya,” a ci.
40014029	Te Jesu nynh, “Rang,” a ci. Te Piter tuh kohlung kyate sahkuh bung zah Jesu kalan ccia lan tui vawlan khe a cceih.
40014030	Thuasalama khisang arupaw kha he a muih tuh a rih vae, te tui kya he yn ccah takaw tuh, “Bawipaw, yn khum!” cite a sia.
40014031	Te vaekheihmawte Jesu nynh a kuih kha dyng zah a kyng, te amaw kha, “Pou zynnaw azyapaw nang, pawccemou na lunghiin?” a cipya.
40014032	Te minmin nynh kohlung lungkhu lang he oun thua`ae tuh khisang phe adae.
40014033	Oute kohlung kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun cceih`ae zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw ccaccing nynh na thua,” ci`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae.
40014034	Te minmin khuraw he oun zua`ae tuh Kenesaret ram lungkhu lang oun thua`ae.
40014035	Te tuh-e hmin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha he a nyh`ae tuh tuh-e area pepan balyn kalan ccungccaw`ae kha saw`ae zah ngeccih`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae.
40014036	Te minmin nynh a boei dung sankaw hae lan amaw kha a ngiaku`ae; te a hae paw miakaw tuh marya a dan`ae.
40015001	Oute Jerusalem khua e kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae tuh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah,
40015002	“Pawccemou na zuitu`ae nynh langmaw-e piccang`ae phung kha a lue`ae? Pawccecize minmin nynh looh a ae`ae ze mih kuih singkuh khyh`ae,” a ci`ae.
40015003	Thuasalama aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Pawccemou nanning so nae phung keiccuze Pachia kawpyapaw kha na lue oh?
40015004	Pawccecize Pachia nynh, ‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua’; te, ‘A paaw khyhze a nung thyalah paw ccungccaw tuh chia thua sah,’ cite kaw a pya.
40015005	Thuasalama nanning nynh, ‘Hunghung zemah a paaw khyhze a nung kha, “Pawpaw zemah kamaw liate na mue lanpaw bawngnaw tuh lasung nynh thua,” a ci ze,
40015006	a paaw khyhze a nung kha sawtua ho vae khyh,’ na ci oh. Ou tuhte nae phung liate Pachia kawpyapaw kha pawlang um lei lan na rae oh.
40015007	Nanning thyaruhthyaphe` ae! Nanning konglang Isaiah nynh hmerarihlan a la hoty vae. A hopaw tuh:
40015008	‘E ccungccaw`ae nynh mih khalang te kamaw kalan oun naekuh`ae zah mih mung te saw oun tua`ae; thuasalama mih thinlung tuh kamaw kyate asawkuh.
40015009	Te ccungccaw`ae kyae kawpyapaw kha doctrine lang ccangpyate accakaepaw kya kamaw kha oun beik`ae’ a ci,” a cipya`ae.
40015010	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha ko`ae zah minmin kha, “Ngae oh lah thaethya oh:
40015011	Khalang lungkhu lang a tee paw nynh ccungccaw hynh nungsisakuh khyh; thuasalama khalang kyate yn pou paw nynh nynh ccungccaw kha a nungsisakuh,” a cipya`ae.
40015012	Oute a zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Hynh-e na hopaw a thae`ae koute Farasi`ae tuh mih lung phe thang cipaw hynh na nyh ta?” a cipya`ae.
40015013	Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh a ling leipaw aku miakaw tuh marya phoh athua cih.
40015014	Minmin tuh khamawte um`ae sah; minmin tuh mitmoh`ae a cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae nynh thua`ae. Te mitmohpaw nynh mitmohpaw kha a cciakhae lanze paryhte hunghua lungkhu lang a ccah cih`ae,” a ci.
40015015	Oute Piter nynh khung zah amaw kha, “Hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw hynh kaening oun hopah,” a cipya.
40015016	Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning so thaethya leite tou na um ung oh?
40015017	Khalang lungkhu lang a tee paw miakaw tuh vue lungkhu lang ccah zah ia-inn lungkhu lang po a thua cipaw hynh nanning na thaethya la khyh oh tou?
40015018	Thuasalama khalang lungkhu te yn pou paw uccaw`ae tuh thinlung kyate yn pou paw nynh thua; te khae` ae nynh ccungccaw kha a nungsisakuh.
40015019	Pawccecize ahoy leipaw tuanaw`ae, ccungccaw chianaw, milae zu milae vawpaw seikhaenaw, ohhuakunaw, ahme leipaw ccaekiakhannaw, runaw, te milae thethyahonaw`ae tuh thinlung kyate nynh oun pou.
40015020	E uccaw`ae hynh nynh ccungccaw a nungsisakuh; thuasalama kuih singku leite ae paw nynh tuh ccungccaw kha nungsisakuh khyh,” a ci.
40015021	Oute tuin kyate Jesu tuh cceih zah Tai te Sidon pee lungkhu lang a tee.
40015022	Te dotua, Kanaan nopinung lukheit kha-e ram kyate yn thua zah, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah; ka ccanung tuh raerangsaro nynh myarya accih lang a tua,” cite sia zah amaw kha a hopya.
40015023	Thuasalama Jesu nynh bya kawkheit san khung khyh. Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah, “Hynh-e nung hynh cciasah, pawccecize aening nuhlang te pei a sia,” cite amaw kha a ngia`ae.
40015024	Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Israel innbyn kyaze azopaw tuu`ae kalan laelan kae tuh saw ka thua khyh,” a ci.
40015025	Oute tuh-e nung nynh yn cceih zah amaw kha beik zah, “Bawipaw, beih yn bawng!” a ci.
40015026	Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccaaw`ae looh kha law lan zah ui taraw`ae vuapya lan ccan khyh,” a cipya.
40015027	Te tuh-e nung nynh, “Ahme nyng Bawipaw, tuhzemah ui taraw`ae nynh mih bawi`ae ccaboi kyate accah paw loohmoi`ae kha a ae`ae khaw ta,” a ci.
40015028	Oute Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou nopinung, na zynnaw tuh ale raria! Na ry hawte na kya cyikuh sah,” a cipya. Te a ccanung tuh tuh-e suimilan ccyh ccaccei kyate phe a dan.
40015029	Te tuin kyate Jesu pou zah Galilee Rili pe lang a thua; te mua muakheit kalan kaethung zah tuin kyakhe a dahung.
40015030	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh mitmohpaw, ccukhoupaw, bya ho kho leipaw, kuihccu khyn leipaw te ccangpaw ngeccih patae kha mimaw ryte amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae zah Jesu ccu leihpaw khe a nung`ae, te Jesu nynh minmin kha a dansah`ae.
