40015031	Ou tuhcihte bya ho kho leipaw nynh bya yn ho, kuihccu khyn leipaw nynh yn khyn, ccukhoupaw nynh laanpi cceih zah mitmohpaw nynh ngawmuih paw kha ccungccaw zapi nynh he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te minmin nynh Israel Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
40015032	Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah, “Ccungccaw zapi hynh thaw ka ccih`ae, pawccemacize minmin tuh kamaw ryte nin thung po um vae`ae zah ae lanpaw hoi khyh`ae, te minmin hynh ae leite ka saw ry khyh`ae, tuhte saw lanze laanpi kya phe a bawsei cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40015033	Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Hynhzeih ccungccaw zapi phe byn lan`ae rangkaw kyahin paw kyate mou sanlou tuh kae mue cih?” a cipya`ae.
40015034	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Sanlou hozeihmou na hoi oh?” cite khia`ae zah minmin nynh, “Phe sari, te ngasaw taraw ccapyh nynh kae hoi,” a ci`ae.
40015035	Te aning nynh ccungccaw zapi kha lae vawlan dahung lan kawpya`ae.
40015036	Te aning nynh sanlou phe sari te ngasaw`ae kha lah zah lungtuabya ho zah kha-e`ae kha a ia, te a zuitu`ae kha pya`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kalan a nee`ae.
40015037	Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah mih vueso; te minmin nynh a eihpaw alaepaw kha khuin`ae zah kee sari phe abeih.
40015038	Te nopi`ae te imua`ae holeite a ae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh thungpali acih.
40015039	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha a saw`ae, te kohlung kha ccikuh zah Magdala pee lungkhu lang a thua.
40016001	Te Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha syntaw khylan vaawran kyate muihsanaw kha minmin langsahpya lan amaw kha a ngia`ae.
40016002	Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Zete ccyh kya, nanning nynh, ‘Vaawlui ase keiccu khua ahoy cih,’ na ci oh.
40016003	Te awkhua ccyh kya, ‘Vaawlui se zah mae-ui keiccuze atunin tuh khua hoy lan khyh,’ na ci kho oh. Pou cyihruh`ae! Nanning nynh vaawlui mitmae kha na phiathya oh; thuasalama accyh`ae muihsanaw tuh na thaethya khyh oh.
40016004	Ahoy leipaw te a ohhuakuhpaw ciihan nynh tuh muihsanaw kha a ccung; te profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan pawpaw muihsanaw sanmah kha-e ciihan kalan langsapya thua vae lan khyh,” a ci. Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah phe a pou.
40016005	Te a zuitu`ae nynh khuraw lang he oun thua`ae tuh sanlou phuku lanpaw kha phe a ning`ae.
40016006	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ransi kha do oh lah la raeringkuh oh,” a cipya`ae.
40016007	Te minmin nynh, “Aening nynh sanlou ah phuku khyh oh keiccu nynh e bya hynh a ho,” cite mimaw te mimaw kya a hokuh`ae.
40016008	Jesu nynh he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, nanning nynh sanlou nae phuku khyh oh keiccuze pawccemou naemaw te naemaw kya tuhte na hoku oh?
40016009	Na thaethya loh khyh oh tou? Sanlou phe pangaw kha ccungccaw thungpangaw nynh ae`ae zah kee hozeih nynh na khuin oh cipaw so na nyh vae khyh oh tou?
40016010	Sanlou phe sari kha ccungccaw thungpali nynh ae`ae zah kee lepaw te hozeih nynh na khuin oh cipaw so na nyh vae khyh oh tou?
40016011	Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ransi kha nanning na raeringkuh cih oh cite kae hopya oh paw tuh sanlou kong lante thua khyh cipaw kha nanning nynh pawccemou e hynh na thaethya khyh oh?” a cipya`ae.
40016012	Oute zuitu`ae nynh sanlou kya-e ransi kha raeringku lan oun hopya ry paw thua khyh, thuasalama Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ccangpyanaw kong nynh oun hopya ry paw athua cipaw kha minmin nynh oun thaethya vae`ae.
40016013	Jesu tuh Sisaria Filipi pee lungkhu lang he yn thua tuh a zuitu`ae kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh kae Ccungccaw Ccapaw hynh hung oun ci`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae.
40016014	Te minmin nynh, “Ccungccaw abang nynh nang tuh Baptisma pyatu Johan ae ci`ae; abang nynh Elijah ae ci`ae; te abang nynh Jeremiah khyhze profeh lukhakheit nynh thua, ae ci`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
40016015	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama nanning nynh so kae hynh hung nae ci oh mou?” cite a khia`ae.
40016016	Te Simon Piter nynh, “Nang tuh Kri, ahiinpaw Pachia Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
40016017	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Simon Bar-Jonah, nang tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua, pawccecize chii te saw nynh e hynh na kalan ae phypah khyh, thuasalama vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh ae phypah.
40016018	Te nang tuh Piter nynh na thua cipaw kha mah kae hopya; te e lungtung vawlan ka kriccawbu kha ka sak cih; te Hades kya-e koikua`ae nynh e hynh tae kho lan khyh.
40016019	Te vaawran peenaw toh`ae kha nang kae pya cih; te nang nynh laephi vawlan na khiidepaw miakaw tuh vaawran kya mah khiide athua cih; te laephi vawlan na supya paw miakaw tuh vaawran kya mah supya athua cih,” a cipya.
40016020	Oute aning tuh Jesu Kri nynh thua cipaw kha hung ccungccaw sanmah a hopya khyh nawlan`ae a zuitu`ae kha kawpya`ae.
40016021	Tuh-e ccyh kyate Jesu nynh Jerusalem lang a ccia lanpaw, piccang`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae, te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kya-e patae a teing lanpaw, te a chia lan`ae paw, te nin thungnaw kya bua yn thothui lanpaw kong kha a zuitu`ae kalan a langsapyaku vae`ae.
40016022	Oute Piter nynh Jesu kha ccanglang cciakhae zah, “Tuh-e tuh na kyate sawkuh sah, Bawipaw; tuh-e tuh na tungvaw cyikuh nan sah!” cite amaw kha a pe.
40016023	Thuasalama Jesu nynh Piter kalan maekuh zah, “Setan, ka nuhlang thungkuh! Nang tuh kae ka hanlan yn maeleihsakuhtupaw nynh na thua; pawccecize nang tuh Pachia uccaw`ae kha na peki khyh, thuasalama ccungccaw uccaw`ae kha nynh na peki,” a cipya.
40016024	Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn zui ry lanze amaw te amaw kha vuakuh sah lah a vaelantung kha puihkuh sah, te kamaw kha yn zui sah.
40016025	Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh ry paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a shung cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha kae ka keiccuze a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha bua a muihkuh cih.
40016026	Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh laephipi hynh khaleih mue sah lah amaw a hiinnaw-muisaw kha a shung lanze, a hanlan pawmou athane? Tukhyhze a hiinnaw-muisaw hanlan paw uccaw te mou a rulae kho cih?
40016027	Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a Paaw phu-enaw kya a vaaw ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thua vae cih; oute ccungccaw miakaw kha a ryalawnaw thyhte ryalaw mee yn pya cih`ae.
40016028	“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a peenaw kya yn thua paw kha a muih`ae cia chinaw a tytua cih lei`ae paw abang e kya a um`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40017001	Te nin taruh acih koute Jesu nynh Piter, James, te a neitaw Johan kha hoei`ae zah mih makhaete ahangpaw mua muakheit kalan a cciakhae`ae.
40017002	Te minmin malang khe Jesu tuh a muinsan rulaekuh. A mae tuh khuanin hawte phaephae ah zah a uccaw tuh awnaw hawte araw.
40017003	Te dotua, tuin kya mih kalan Mawsi te Elijah oun langkuh`ae zah amaw ryte byahokuh`ae.
40017004	Oute Piter nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, e kya um paw tuh ah hanlan ahoy, na ry ze e kya bu ccangthung kae sak sah, na hanlan ccangkheit, Mawsi hanlan ccangkheit, te Elijah hanlan ccangkheit,” a cipya.
40017005	Tuhte a ho cciamang lyakhe, dotua, a awpaw maeking nynh minmin kha pung a khung`ae; te dotua, maeking lungkhu te roi nynh, “E paw a kya ka lungry kou thua paw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw bya kha la ngae oh!” cite maeking kyate roi yn ccae.
40017006	Te zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh bakhung`ae zah myarya a rih`ae.
40017007	Te Jesu nynh yn thua zah minmin kha tung`ae zah, “Thokuh oh lah rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
40017008	Te minmin nynh he oun dothung`ae tuh Jesu kyalya laelan hung sanmah muih vae khyh`ae.
40017009	Te minmin mua kyate he oun rungbung`ae tuh Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui mawlaezung na muih oh paw vizin hynh hung sanmah la hopah nan oh,” cite zuitu`ae kha kawpya`ae.
40017010	Te a zuitu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Elijah tuh masaty yn thua hahe cih a ci`ae?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.
40017011	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Elijah tuh masaty yn thua ccaccing cih zah pawpaw balyn kha bua yn nungthui cih.
40017012	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, Elijah tuh phe thua vae, te ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama minmin nynh a cyi ry`ae paw miakaw kha amaw kalan phe cyi vae`ae. Tuhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah minmin kuih kyakhe yn teing bua vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
40017013	Oute zuitu`ae nynh mih kalan Baptisma pyatu Johan kong kha nynh a ho cipaw a thaethya vae`ae.
40017014	Te ccungccaw zapi kalan minmin he a thua`ae tuh Jesu kalan ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw malang ccukharutung zah,
40017015	“Bawipaw, ka ccapaw tungvaw ngaethya beih umsah, pawccecize aning tuh dungpaw ccinaw hoi zah myarya a teing; te accyh ccyh vae ze maee lungkhu lang phungkuh zah accyh ccyh vae ze tui lungkhu lang a phungkuh.
40017016	Te kae nynh na zuitu`ae kalan ka cciakhae zah minmin nynh dansah kho khyh`ae,” a cipya.
40017017	Oute Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou zyn lei`ae te a ccouseikuh`ae paw ciihan`ae, hohse cia mou nae kya ka um ung cih? Hohse cia mou kae ngaesangpah ung cih oh? Imohpaw kha kamaw kalan hynhlang oun cciakhae oh,” a ci.
40017018	Te Jesu nynh raerangsaro kha pe zah aning tuh kha-e paw lungkhu te a pou; te imohpaw tuh tuh-e suimilan ccaccei kyate phe a dan.
40017019	Oute zuitu`ae nynh mih makhaete Jesu kalan oun cceih`ae zah, “Pawccemou kaening nynh amaw kha kae dee kho khyh?” cite a khia`ae.
40017020	Te Jesu nynh, “Na zyn khyh keiccu oh; pawccecize nanning byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mungngia mung mungkheit cia zynnaw na hoi oh ze, e mua hynh, ‘E kyate khuhlang khuin nuekuh,’ na ci oh ze a nuekuh cih; te nae hanlan athua kho leipaw pawsang um lan khyh.
40017021	Tuhzemah e tahawpaw raerangsaro tuh loohaesungnaw te sawsangnaw leite tuh pou khyh,” a cipya`ae.
40017022	Te Galilee kya minmin a um`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan oun ah vae cih`ae,
40017023	te minmin nynh oun theih cih`ae zah nin thungnaw kya yn thothui cih,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaethah.
40017024	Te minmin Kapernaum khua kya he a thua`ae tuh tempal phuakhoi drakma a khoi`ae paw nynh Piter kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Nae Ccangpatupaw hynh tempal phuakhoi pya khyh ta?” a ci`ae.
40017025	Piter nynh, “A pya,” a ci. Te Piter inn lungkhu lang he yn tee tuh, Jesu nynh cciadue zah, “Simon, pawte na tua? Laephi siapharan`ae nynh uccaw-phuakhoi, tukhyhze ccungccaw-phuakhoi kha hung`ae kya-e mou a lawku`ae? Mimaw mih ccaaw`ae kya-e tou? Tukhyhze milae`ae kya-e tou?” cite a khia.
40017026	Piter nynh, “Milae`ae kya-e nynh a lawku`ae,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Tuhte lanze ccaaw`ae tuh a lue`ae.
40017027	Tuhzemah minmin tuh aening keiccuze a cyisei khyh ccaw`ae, nang rili kalan la cceih lah ngasabaw kha la sah, te masaty yn kae paw ngasaw kha la kyng; te a khalang he na kei te phua shekel ccangkheit na la muih cih, kha-e phua kha laah lah na hanlan te ka hanlan minmin kha la pya`ae,” a cipya.
40018001	Tuh-e ccyh kya zuitu`ae Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Vaawran peenaw kya hungmou alesae huacce?” cite a khia`ae.
40018002	Te Jesu nynh imua taraw lukheit kha a kalan ko zah, minmin ngaelung khe imohpaw kha nung zah,
40018003	“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning nynh na rulaeku khyh oh zah imua taraw hawte na thua khyh oh ze, vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang kharyh na tee lan khyh oh.
40018004	Tukeiccu hunghung zemah e imua taraw hawte amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsaku lanze tuh-e paw tuh nynh vaawran peenaw kya alesae huaccepaw athua.
40018005	Te hunghung zemah ka min liate e tahawpaw imua taraw lukheit kha a lehkhan ze kamaw kha yn lehkhan paw nynh thua.
40018006	“Thuasalama hunghung zemah kamaw yn zyn paw e imua taraw lukhakheit kha a maeleihsakuh paw tuh a nging kyakhe mianawpaw lung ccangkheit kha sae`ae sah lah rili akhunaw kya phung lanze a hanlan ahoyhua.
40018007	Maeleihsakunaw`ae keiccuze laephi ccungccaw`ae hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Pawccecize maeleihsakunaw`ae yn thua hahe cih; thuasalama maeleihsakunaw a thuasatupaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!
40018008	“Tukeiccu na kuih khyhze na ccu nynh nang kha ae seisah ze thoh tya lah na kyate dae vua; ccukhoute, tukhyhze kuihccu ccing leite hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh, kuih ccangning, ccu ccangning hoibiate zungzae aruapaw maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae na hanlan ahoyhua.
40018009	Te na mit nynh nang ae seisah ze poh khoi lah na kyate dae vua; mit ccangning hoite kehenna maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae tuh mit ccangkheit te hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
40018010	“E imua taraw`ae lukheit san pawlangria leite na um khyh nawlan oh raeringkuh oh; pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, imua`ae kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw mitmae kha pei a muih`ae.
40018011	“Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh azo`ae paw kha khum khylan nynh yn thua.
40018012	Pawtemou na tua oh? Ccungccaw lukheit nynh tuu zakheit hoi zah tuhe` ae kyaze sakheit tuh laanpi phe avae sei ze, sungtakua satakua kha cciataw zah kha-e laanpi phe avae paw kha ccung khylan mua`ae kalan cceih lan khyh tou?
40018013	Te kha-e tuu kha he a muih lan thua ze, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, laanpi vae lei`ae paw sungtakua satakua tungvaw laeze kha-e kya a lungtuahua.
40018014	Tuh-e hawte hynh-e imua taraw`ae kyaze lukheit sanmah aro lanpaw tuh vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw rynaw thua khyh.
40018015	“Tuhlaeze na uno nynh na tungvaw a cyisei ze cceih lah namaw te amaw makhae kya a cyiseinaw kha hopah; aning nynh nang kha ae ngaepya ze na uno kha phe na mue.
40018016	Thuasalama aning nynh ae ngaepya khyh ze, luning khyhze luthung ccaekia`ae khalang kya-e bya miakaw tuh atyn nawlan namaw ryte lukheit khyhze luning la hoeikuh`ae.
40018017	Te aning nynh minmin bya kha a ngae khyh lanze kriccawbu kalan hopah; thuasalama aning nynh kriccawbu bya kha bua a ngae vae khyh lanze amaw kha lawkipaw te nguntokhoipaw hawte la tua ccavae.
40018018	“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, pawpaw zemah laephi vawlan na hee oh paw tuh vaawran kya hee athua cih, te pawpaw zemah laephi vawlan na supya oh paw tuh vaawran kya supya athua cih.
40018019	“Nanning bua kae hopya oh, nanning kyaze ccungccaw luning nynh lunglokute laephi vawlan uccaw ccangkhakheit kha oun ngiaku`ae ze kha-e kha minmin hanlan vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh a cyipah cih`ae.
40018020	Pawccecize luning khyh ze luthung nynh ka min liate pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae kya, tuin kya minmin ngaelaku khe kae ka um,” a cipya`ae.
40018021	Oute amaw kalan Piter yn thua zah, “Bawipaw, ka uno nynh ka tungvaw vae hozeihmou sei ngaw zah amaw kha ka ngaethya cih? Vaesari cia tou?” cite a khia.
40018022	Jesu nynh, “Nang kha vaesari cia kae cipah khyh; thuasalama sungsari leih sari cia, kae cipya.
40018023	Tukeiccu vaawran peenaw tuh a see`ae lae ccazing law a ry paw siapharanpaw lukheit te nynh aloku.
40018024	Te ccazing he a laah tuh talent thung haw laeba um paw lukheit kha amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae.
40018025	Thuasalama pya lanpaw a hoi khyh keiccu a bawipaw nynh amaw ry, a zu te a ccaaw`ae ry, te a hoi paw balyn kha zua sah lah lae kha sang sah cite kaw a pya.
40018026	“Tukeiccu kha-e see nynh bakhungte amaw kha beik zah, ‘Bawipaw, beih yn ngaethya hin lah marya kae pyaru cih,’ a ci.
40018027	Oute tuh-e see a bawipaw nynh ngaethya-umsanaw hoi zah kha-e paw a laeba kha ngaethya zah phe a luesah.
40018028	“Thuasalama tuh-e see tuh po pou zah amaw kya denari phua zakheit laeba um paw ryalahkheih`ae paw see lukheitpaw kha a muih; te kha-e paw kha kyng zah a lotharue meih zah, ‘Laeba nae um paw kha yn pya ccavae,’ a cipya.
40018029	“Te a banpaw kha-e seepaw nynh a ccu leihpaw bakhung zah amaw kha, ‘Yn ngaethya hin lah marya kae sangru cih,’ cite a ngiaku.
40018030	Te aning nynh ngaethya ry khyh, thuasalama cceih zah lae a sang makhia thunginn lungkhu a saw.
40018031	Tukeiccu amaw a ban`ae see`ae nynh a cyipaw kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya mih ngaethah, te cceih`ae zah acyikuh paw balyn kha mih bawipaw kalan pung a hopya`ae.
40018032	“Oute a bawipaw nynh kha-e see kha a ko koute amaw kha, ‘Pou see hoy leipaw, beih yn ngaethya lah cite nae ngiaku keiccuze na laeba balyn marya kae ngaethya.
40018033	Kae nynh na tungvaw ngaethya kae umsah hawte na banpaw see tungvaw ngaethya na umsah lan ccan khyh ta?’ a cipya.
40018034	Te a bawipaw tuh a thinria zah kha-e paw nynh a pya lanpaw balyn a pya makhia aning kha vawsaw pyatu`ae kalan a ah.
40018035	“Tukeiccu tuhhawte vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh mah nanning nae uno`ae mih cyiseinaw`ae kha nae thinlung kyate na ngaethya khyh oh ze nae tungvaw tuhhawte a cyih bua cih,” a cipya`ae.
40019001	Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh tuh-e a ccangpya`ae paw kha he a thangsah tuh Galilee kyate pou zah Judea pee Jordan vaw khuraw langkhe a thua.
40019002	Te ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, te tuin kya minmin kha a dansah`ae.
40019003	Farasi`ae mah amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha syntaw khylan, “Ccangkhakheit konglang keiccuze pisepaw nynh a zu kha mya lan kawbya nynh ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.
40019004	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Atakaw lya a raetu nynh minmin kha pise te nopi nynh a rae cipaw,
40019005	te, ‘Hynh-e keiccu pise nynh a paaw te a nung kha a cciataw cih zah a zu kalan a bekuh cih, te minmin luning tuh ngesaw pynkheit athua vae cih`ae,’ acikuh paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
40019006	Tukeiccu minmin tuh luning thua vae khyh`ae, thuasalama pyn kheit nynh thua vae`ae. Tukeiccu Pachia nynh pynkheihlan a suelua vae paw kha ccungccaw nynh phia nan sah,” a ci.
40019007	Minmin nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawccemou Mawsi nynh zu te vaw myakunawpaw ccaw kha pya lan zah a zu kha mya lan kaw a pya?” cite a khung`ae.
40019008	Jesu nynh, “Nae thinlung akhung keiccu nynh Mawsi nynh nae zu`ae kha mya lan ae ua oh; thuasalama atakaw lya tuhte thua khyh.
40019009	Te nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ohhuakunaw keiccu thua leite a zu kha maah zah ccangpaw zu a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua; te hunghung zemah a mya`ae paw nopi kha a zu lang a hoeikuh paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
40019010	A zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Zu kong pise hanlan tuhte athua lanze zuhoi leipaw tuh san ahoyhua,” a cipya`ae.
40019011	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Hynh-e bya hynh ccungccaw balyn nynh lawkuh kho khyh, mih hanlan pya athua`ae paw rou nynh a lawkuh kho`ae.
40019012	Pawccecize abang tuh mih nung vue kya mawte tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae; te abang tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh tingria`ae paw tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae; te vaawran peenaw keiccuze mimaw te mimaw kha tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae. E bya hynh a lawkuh khopaw ccungccaw nynh lawkuh sah,” cite a hopya`ae.
40019013	Oute mih tungvaw Jesu nynh a kuih a khang ccaw cite, te sawsangpya ccaw`ae cite imua taraw`ae kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh minmin kha a pe`ae.
40019014	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Imua taraw`ae kha ka kalan oun cceih`ae sah, kang nan oh; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh khatahaw`ae paw elan nynh thua,” a ci.
40019015	Te imua`ae tungvaw a kuih kha a khang, te tuin kyate a pou.
40019016	Te dotua, ccungccaw lukheit amaw kalan yn thua zah, “Ccangpatu hoypaw, zungzae hiinnaw ka hoi nawlan paw uccaw hoypaw mou ka cyih cih?” cite a khia.
40019017	Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou kamaw hynh ahoypaw cite nae ko? Pachia lukheit laelan ahoypaw hung sanmah um khyh; thuasalama hiinnaw lungkhu lang na tee ry lanze kawpyapaw`ae kha la zui,” a cipya.
40019018	Aning nynh, “Paw kha mou?” cite amaw kha a khia. Jesu nynh, “ ‘Ccungccaw na theih lan khyh,’ ‘Milae zu na seikhae lan khyh,’ ‘Na ruh lan khyh,’ ‘Ahme leipaw ccaekia lang tang nan,’
40019019	‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua,’ te, ‘Na innpaw kha namaw na sungsaku hawte na sungsah cih,’ cikuh paw kha,” a cipya.
40019020	Ccangvaepaw nynh, “Tuhe` ae balyn tuh ka ngawphue lya mawte phe ka zui vae; pawmou ka bou ung?” a cipya.
40019021	Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh accingpaw na thua ry lanze, cceih lah na hoi paw kha la zua, te ryachi`ae kha la pya`ae, te vaawran kya sisua na hoi cih, oute rang lah kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
40019022	Thuasalama ccangvaepaw nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh ngaethyate phe a cceih, pawccecize aning tuh uccaw`ae patae a hoi keiccu nynh thua.
40019023	Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mihoipaw hanlan vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh kou aru.
40019024	Te bua kae hopya oh, mihoipaw hanlan Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw lae tuh kalauk nynh phynbang khu kya tee lan azoihua,” a cipya`ae.
40019025	A zuitu`ae nynh kha-e bya kha he a thae`ae tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaeangthua zah, “Tuhte lanze hungmou khumnaw tuh a mue kho cih?” a ci`ae.
40019026	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha do`ae zah, “Ccungccaw lante hynh-e tuh thua kho khyh, thuasalama Pachia lante pawpaw balyn tuh athua kho,” a ci.
40019027	Oute Piter nynh khung zah, “Dotua, kaening tuh pawpaw balyn marya kae vuasya zah namaw kha kae zui, tukeiccu pawmou kae mue cih?” a ci.
40019028	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tynre balyn bua raethuinaw ccyh kya Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a phu-enaw suitungkhung kya he yn dahungte kamaw nae zui oh paw nanning mah suitungkhung haw laening vawlan nae dahungbua cih oh zah Israel phin haw laening kha bya nae pia cih oh.
40019029	Te kamaw min keiccuze inn`ae, tukhyhze uno`ae, tukhyhze ccia`ae, tukhyhze paaw, tukhyhze nung, tukhyhze zu, tukhyhze ccaaw`ae, tukhyhze lorang kha a cciataw paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh leih zakheit a mueru cih zah zungzae hiinnaw rhoccou cih.
40019030	Thuasalama masaty e ccungccaw patae tuh nyathyakou thua cih`ae zah nyathyakou e patae tuh masaty thua cih`ae.
40020001	“Pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh a misu khokhu lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae hoh lan cite awkhua takawte a cceih paw khokhu hoitupaw te nynh aloku.
40020002	Te aning nynh nin kheit ze denari kia kheit pya lante ryalahtu`ae ryte nawccawnaw kha rae zah minmin kha a misu khokhu lungkhu lang a saw`ae.
40020003	“Te suimilan ccangthungnaw loukaw khe bua pou zah kungkunaw kya pawsang cyi leite a thadyn`ae paw mingccang`ae kha a muih.
40020004	Te minmin kha, ‘Nanning mah misu khokhu lungkhu lang la cceihbua oh lah accan thyhte kae pya cih oh,’ a cipya`ae. Te minmin mah a cceihbua`ae.
40020005	Suimilan ccangtaruhnaw te ccangtakuanaw loukaw khe bua cceih zah tuhhawte bua a cyi.
40020006	Te suimilan haw laekheitnaw loukaw khe bua cceih zah mingccang`ae pawsang cyi leite a thadyn`ae paw kha muih zah, ‘Nanning pawccemou e kya pawsang cyi leite nin balyn na thadyn oh?’ cite a khia`ae.
40020007	“Minmin nynh, ‘Hung ccungccaw nynh san oun hohku khyh`ae keiccu,’ a ci`ae. Aning nynh minmin kha, ‘Nanning mah misu khokhu lungkhu lang la cceih oh lah accan thyhte na mue cih oh,’ a cipya`ae.
40020008	“Te zete he yn thua tuh misu khokhu hoitupaw nynh a ryaccinkhanpaw kalan khe, ‘Ryalahtu`ae kha ko`ae lah nyathyakou a tee paw kyate tho lah masaty a tee paw kyacia mih ryalaw mee kha pya`ae,’ a cipya.
40020009	“Te suimilan haw laekheitnaw loukaw kya ryalaw a tee`ae paw tuh oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh denari kia kheit cci a mue`ae.
40020010	Thuasalama masaty ryalaw a tee`ae paw he oun thua`ae tuh mimaw tuh alunghua kae mue cih cite a tuaku`ae; te minmin mah tuh-e hawte luraveih nynh denari kia kheit cci a mue`ae.
40020011	Te khate he a mue`ae tuh minmin nynh khokhu hoitupaw kha ccohnuakuh`ae zah,
40020012	‘E`ae nyathyakou oun tee`ae paw tuh suimilan ccangkheit kyalya nynh ryalaw`ae, te minmin kha khuanin so teing`ae zah phupaw a phu`ae paw kaening ryte phe na nginsaku bua`ae,’ a cipya`ae.
40020013	“Thuasalama aning nynh minmin kyaze lukheitpaw kha, ‘Ka ban, na kya ka cyihsei khyh, denari kia kheit te ryalaw lan na naw phe ccah khyh tou?
40020014	Na ccan paw hynh lawkuh lah la cceih ccavae; hynh-e nyathyakou e paw hynh nang te phe anginkuh lan ka pya ry.
40020015	Kamaw uccaw tungvaw ka cyi ry paw cyi lan ka hanlan ccan khyh tou? Kae nynh ka hoy keiccuze nang tuh na eiung tou?’ a cipya.
40020016	“Tukeiccu nyathyakou e`ae tuh masaty thua cih`ae zah masaty e`ae tuh nyathyakou thua cih`ae; pawccecize ccungccaw patae tuh ko athua`ae, thuasalama ccapyh nynh po athua`ae,” a ci.
40020017	Te Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cciathung lya laanpi kya zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha mih makhaete cciakhae`ae zah minmin kha,
40020018	“Dotua oh, aening tuh Jerusalem lang ah cceihthung oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kalan oun ah cih`ae zah minmin nynh amaw kha chia lan sei oun be cih`ae.
40020019	Te amaw kha sarya khylan, bua khylan, te khiade khylan Zenta`ae kalan oun ah cih`ae; te nin thungnaw kya bua yn thothui cih,” a cipya`ae.
40020020	Oute Zebedi ccaaw`ae mih nung tuh a ccaaw`ae ryte Jesu kalan oun thua`ae, amaw kha beik zah a kya-e uccaw ccangkheit a ngiaku.
40020021	Te Jesu nynh, “Pawmou na ry?” cite a khia. Nopinung nynh, “Hynh-e ka ccaaw`ae luning nynh na peenaw kya lukheit na ranglang, te lukheit na voilang a dahungbua nawlan`ae oun pyabua,” a cipya.
40020022	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh paw nynh kae ngia cipaw na nyh khyh oh. Nanning nynh ka neih vae cih paw banang kha na neihbua kho cih oh tou? Te kae nynh baptisma ka in lanpaw kha na in bua kho cih oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kae cyih kho cih,” a ci`ae.
40020023	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh ka banang kha na neih ccaccing cih oh zah baptisma ka in lanpaw kya na in bua cih oh; thuasalama ka ranglang te ka voilang dahung lan pya lanpaw tuh ka kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama ka Paaw nynh mih hanlan a paccynpya`ae paw rou nynh pya athua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
40020024	Te zuitu luhaw nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh uno luning tungvaw myarya mih thinria.
40020025	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Zenta`ae uktu`ae nynh tuh uknaw kaw khate a uk`ae, te a lesae`ae paw nynh kawhoinaw kha a mang`ae cipaw na ny oh.
40020026	Tuhzemah nanning laku tuhte thua lan khyh, thuasalama nanning laku alesaepaw lang a tang ry paw tuh nae rya ae lawpatu oh paw lang tangsah.
40020027	Te nanning laku hunghung zemah lupihua lang a tang ry paw tuh nae seepaw lang tangsah.
40020028	Tuhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh mah rya lawsaku khylan yn thua khyh, thuasalama ming`ae ryalawpya khylan, te ccungccaw patae sawkhawnaw hanlan a hiinnaw kha pyaku khylan nynh yn thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
40020029	Te Jeriko kyate minmin he a pou`ae tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
40020030	Te dotua, laanpi zung a dahung`ae paw mitmoh`ae luning nynh Jesu po a cceih cipaw he a thae`ae tuh, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kaening hynh thaw beih oun ccih!” cite a sia`ae.
40020031	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh minmin kha daetedae lang a um ccaw`ae cite a sianua`ae; thuasalama minmin nynh, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kaening hynh thaw beih oun ccih!” cite houh a sia`ae.
40020032	Te Jesu tuh a thadyn, te minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Nae hanlan pawmou nae cyisah ry oh?” cite a khia`ae.
40020033	Minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, kae mit ngawmuih lanpaw nynh kae ry,” a ci`ae.
40020034	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh ngaethyaumsah` ae zah mih mit kha a hae, te vaekheihmawte mih mit tuh ngawmuih zah minmin nynh amaw kha a zui vae`ae.
40021001	Te Jesu te a zuitu`ae nynh Jerusalem lang naekuh`ae zah Oliv Mua leihpaw Bethfake khua he a thua`ae tuh Jesu nynh zuitu luning kha saw`ae zah,
40021002	“Nanning nae malang um paw khua kalan la cceih oh lah lann a khii`ae paw te lann taraw kha ccaheih na la muih cih oh; khae` ae kha oun supah oh lah kamaw kalan oun sue oh.
40021003	Te lukhakheit nynh ae khia oh ze, nanning nynh, ‘Bawipaw nynh a peki,’ nae cipah cih oh; te kha-e paw nynh palou ae sawpah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
40021004	Profeh nynh a hosyapaw accing nawlan nynh hynh-e`ae balyn tuh marya acyikuh; a hosyapaw tuh:
40021005	“ ‘Dotua, na Siapharan tuh anopaw lann taraw kha yn ccikuh zah lungnenaw te na kalan yn cceih cciamang,’ cite Zion ccanung kha hopah oh,” acikuh.
40021006	Tukeiccu zuitu`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh kawpya`ae hawte a cyi`ae.
40021007	Te lann pinung te lann taraw kha oun thuakhae`ae zah lann`ae tungvaw khe mih uccaw`ae kha de`ae zah kha-e`ae vawlan Jesu kha a ccisaku`ae.
40021008	Te ccungccaw zapi pi nynh mih uccaw`ae kha laanpi kya a phaepya`ae; mingccang`ae nynh thingku kya-e thingran`ae kha loi`ae zah laanpi kya a phaepya`ae.
40021009	Oute malang cceih`ae paw te nuhlang te a zuikuh`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh, “David Ccapaw, Hosanna! BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw tuh hythuaccou sah! Ahang huanaw kya Hosanna thua sah!” cite a sia`ae.
40021010	Te Jesu Jerusalem lungkhu lang he a thua tuh, khualae balyn tuh ngaluin-ngaluin ccae`ae zah, “E paw tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae.
40021011	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh, “E paw tuh Galilee pee e Nazareth paw profeh Jesu nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
40021012	Te Jesu tuh Pachia tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah tempal voidu kya a zua`ae paw te a re`ae paw balyn kha a dee`ae, te phuaru`ae paw mih ccaboi te vafu zua`ae paw tungkhung kha dae dawleihpah`ae zah,
40021013	minmin kha, “ ‘Ka inn tuh sawsangnaw inn ci athua cih,’ cite azeikuh. Thuasalama nanning nynh ‘miruh`ae karung’ lang phe na rae oh,” a cipya`ae.
40021014	Te mitmohpaw te ccukhoupaw amaw kalan tempal kya oun thua`ae zah minmin kha a dansah`ae.
40021015	Te Jesu nynh a cyipaw ngaeang lan um paw uccaw`ae te imua`ae nynh tempal kya, “David Ccapaw kya Hosanna thua sah!” cite a sia`ae paw kha, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh mih thin phe khykuh zah,
40021016	amaw kha, “E imua`ae nynh a ho`ae paw tuh na thae tou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ou ka thae. ‘Imua`ae te mateizu`ae paw nosi`ae khalang lungkhu te phe accingpaw thehoysanaw kha na hoi,’ acikuh paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
40021017	Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah khualae te pou zah Bethani khua lang a cceih; te tuin kya a rya.
40021018	Awkhua khe khualae lang he a ki tuh a vuelaw vae.
40021019	Te laanpi pe thaeku ku kha he a muih tuh a ccianua, thuasalama kha-e kya a naw`ae kyalya laelan pawsang muih khyh; te kha-e kha, “Atu te zungzae cia na kya athae la thae nan vae sah,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte thaeku ku tuh karae arou.
40021020	Te kha-e kha zuitu`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “Pawtepei thaeku ku karae arou kanmaw?” a ci`ae.
40021021	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, lunghiinnaw hoi leite zynnaw na hoi oh ze, thaeku ku kya acyikuh paw kyalya thua leite, hynh-e mua hynh, ‘Nang nuekuh lah rili lungkhu lang phungkuh,’ na ci oh zemah ou tuhte acyikuh cih.
40021022	Te zynte, pawpaw balyn sawsangnaw te na ngia oh paw tuh na mue cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
40021023	Te Jesu tempal lungkhu lang thua zah a ccangpya`ae lyakhe, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Paw kawhoinaw te mou hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi? Te hung nynh mou e kawhoinaw hynh nang ae pya?” cite a khia`ae.
40021024	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae mah bya ccangkheit kae khia cih oh, tuh-e tuh nae hopya oh ze, kae mah e uccaw`ae hynh paw kawhoinaw te nynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah ru cih oh:
40021025	Johan kya-e baptisma hynh paw kyate mou yn thua? Vaawran kyate tou? Tukhyhze ccungccaw`ae kyate tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh mimaw te mimaw hokuh`ae zah, “ ‘Vaawran kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, aning nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze pawccemou amaw kha na zyn khyh oh,’ oun ci cih.
40021026	Thuasalama, ‘Ccungccaw`ae kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, ccungccaw`ae rawri lan a um; pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh Johan tuh profeh lukheit hawte a tua`ae paw nynh thua,” a ciku`ae.
40021027	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha, “Kae nyh khyh,” cite a khung`ae. Te aning nynh, “Kae mah paw kawhoinaw te nynh e uccaw`ae hynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah lan khyh oh.
40021028	“Thuasalama nanning pawte na tua oh? Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh ccaaw pise luning a hoi; aning nynh masaty e paw kalan cceih zah, ‘Ka ccapaw, atunin ka misu khokhu kya ryalaw lan va cceih vae lou,’ a cipya.
40021029	“A ccapaw nynh, ‘Ka cceih lan khyh,’ a ci; thuasalama khuekheih acihte ngaesikuh zah phe a cceih.
40021030	“Te luningnaw e paw kalan cceih zah, tuhhawte bua a hopya. Te aning nynh, ‘Ka la cceih vae sah, bawihaepaw,’ cipah zah cceih khyh.
40021031	“Tuh-e luning`ae lakuze hung tuh mou a paaw rynaw a cyipah?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Masaty e paw,” a ci`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nguntokhoi`ae paw te ohhuanung`ae nynh nae malang khe Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
40021032	Pawccecize Johan tuh dingnaw laanpi kya zuite nanning kalan yn thua zah nanning nynh amaw kha na zyn khyh oh; thuasalama nguntokhoi`ae paw te ohhuanung`ae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae; te nanning nynh kha-e kha na muih oh koute amaw kha na zyn nawlan oh na ngaesikuh khyh oh.
40021033	“Ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw hynh ngaetua oh: Inn hoitu lukheit nynh misu khokhu kha rae zah hohung po a koihlu, te misutui sunawkhu kha karyn zah buhang ccangkheit a sak, te khokhu kha misu ryalahtu`ae hohsakuh`ae zah asawnaw ram lang phe a cceih.
40021034	Te misu thae lo ccyh he a thua tuh misu thae`ae kha mue khylan misu ryalahtu`ae kalan khe a ryalahtu`ae kha a saw`ae.
40021035	“Te misu ryalahtu`ae nynh a ryalahtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah lukheitpaw kha a bua`ae, te lukheit kha a chia`ae, te lukheit kha lung te a deih`ae.
40021036	Aning nynh masaty-e lae alungpaw ccangpaw a ryalahtu`ae kha bua a saw`ae; te minmin nynh khae` ae kha tuhhawte bua a cyi`ae.
40021037	Thuasalama nyathyakou tuh, ‘Minmin nynh ka ccapaw tuh sawtua cih`ae,’ ci zah minmin kalan a ccapaw kha a saw.
40021038	“Thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh a ccapaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ‘E paw tuh rhoccoutu nynh thua, rang oh, amaw hynh theih oh sih lah a rho uccaw hynh lua oh sih,’ cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
40021039	Te kha-e paw kha kyng`ae zah misu khokhu lungkhu te atolang dae vua`ae zah phe a chia`ae.
40021040	“Tukeiccu misu khokhu hoitu he yn thua vae ze kha-e misu ryalahtu`ae kha pawtemou a cyih cih`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
40021041	Minmin nynh, “Kha-e athaharuhpaw ccungccaw`ae kha phe ccihtheih lante a roh cih`ae zah a misu khokhu kha athae ccyh kya athae a pya cih`ae paw ccangpaw misu ccoutu`ae kalan nynh a hohsakuh vae cih,” a ci`ae.
40021042	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “ ‘Lung-inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh inn saknaw kya aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang, hynh-e tuh BAWIPAW nynh a cyi paw nynh thua, te aening muihnaw kya e tuh ngaeang lan um paw nynh thua,’ acikuh paw kha Ccathyaa kya na ria boi khyh oh tou?
40021043	“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kyate lawpya athua cih zah kha-e peenaw athae thae paw minphuin kalan khe pya athua cih.
40021044	Te hunghung zemah hynh-e lung vawlan a ccah paw tuh phe akinkuh cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah e lung nynh a ccawthin paw tuh palae tui lang a mia cih,” a cipya`ae.
40021045	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh tuh-e tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh minmin kong nynh oun honua cipaw a nyku`ae.
40021046	Te minmin nynh amaw kha kyng lan cite he a ccung`ae tuh ccungccaw zapi raw kha a rih`ae; pawccemacize ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw tuh profeh cite a tua`ae paw nynh thua.
40022001	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te bua a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh:
40022002	“Vaawran peenaw tuh a ccapaw hanlan zudy poi a tua paw siapharanpaw te nynh aloku.
40022003	Te zudy poi kalan thuabua lan a ko`ae paw kha kosah lan`ae a see`ae kha a saw`ae; thuasalama minmin tuh oun thua ry khyh`ae.
40022004	“Ccangpaw a see`ae kha bua saw`ae zah, ‘Ko athua vae`ae paw kha hynhte la hopah oh, “Dotua oh, ka loohdangkunaw tuh phe ka paccyn kou vae, ka tangnuapaw`ae te athopaw saring`ae kha phe ka chia vae, te pawpaw balyn tuh paccyn athua vae, zudy poi loohdangkunaw kalan rang ccavae oh,” ’ cite a hosapya`ae.
40022005	“Thuasalama minmin nynh kha-e kha pawlangria khyh`ae zah mih rynaw lang phe cceih`ae, lukheitpaw nynh a lei kalan cceih zah ccangpaw nynh a kungkunaw lang phe a cceih.
40022006	Te tuhlae`ae nynh kha-e see`ae kha kyng`ae zah sarisarya zuenah`ae zah phe a chia`ae.
40022007	Thuasalama siapharan nynh kha-e kong kha he a thae tuh myarya a thinria zah a rhawkaw`ae kha saw`ae zah kha-e ccungccatheih`ae kha phe a chiasah`ae, te mih khuapi kha maee te phe a rua`ae.
40022008	“Oute a see`ae kha, ‘Zudy poi tuh paccyn phe athua vae, thuasalama ko`ae paw tuh ngaekuh vae khyh`ae.
40022009	Tukeiccu nanning nynh laanpi lepaw`ae tungkunaw kalan la cceih oh lah na muih oh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha zudy poi kalan oun ko oh,’ cite a hopya`ae.
40022010	Tukeiccu tuh-e see`ae tuh laanpi lepaw`ae tungkunaw lang cceih`ae zah ahoypaw te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw`ae paryhte a muih`ae paw balyn kha pynkheihlan pung a suelua`ae; te zudy poi tuh mikhia`ae ryte phe abeih vae.
40022011	“Te siapharanpaw nynh mikhia`ae do lan he yn tee tuh zudy poi uccaw a lawkuh leipaw ccungccaw lukheit kha a muih.
40022012	Te kha-e paw kha, ‘Ka ban, pawtemou zudy poi uccaw lawku leite hynhlang nae ccia?’ a cipya. Te aning tuh yccae vae khyh.
40022013	“Oute siapharanpaw nynh a see`ae kha, ‘A kuih te a ccu kha hee oh lah cciakhae oh, te rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a umnaw atolang mohnaw lungkhu langkhe dae vua oh,’ a cipya`ae.
40022014	“Pawccecize ko paw tuh alung, thuasalama popaw tuh azya,” a ci.
40022015	Oute Farasi`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh a hopaw kya pawtemou kaangsyakhaw lan cipaw khuakhankuh`ae.
40022016	Te minmin nynh Herod ccungccaw`ae ryte mimaw zuitu`ae kha Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, nang tuh ahmepaw na thua zah Pachia laanpi kha hmerarihlan na ccangpya, te hung ccungccaw mah pawlang na ria khyh; pawccecize nang tuh ccungccaw`ae mae na do khyh cipaw kae ny.
40022017	Tukeiccu kaening oun hopya tua, pawtemou na tua? Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan accan tou, ccan khyh tou?” cite a khiasah`ae.
40022018	Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih thyaruhnaw kha phe nyh zah, “Cyihruh`ae, pawccemou kamaw hynh nae syntaw oh?
40022019	Phuakhoi phua kha yn dosah tua oh,” a ci. Te minmin nynh denari kia kheit kha oun ccyngpya`ae.
40022020	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Hynh-e hynh hung muinsan te hung ccawzeipyapaw mou?” cite a khia`ae.
40022021	Minmin nynh, “Sizar muinsan te a ccawzeikuh paw,” a ci`ae. Oute Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu Sizar uccaw`ae kha Sizar kalan pya oh lah Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia kalan pya oh,” cite minmin kha a khung`ae.
40022022	Minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te amaw kha cciataw`ae zah phe a cceih`ae.
40022023	Tuh-e nin kya thothuinaw um khyh a cih`ae paw Sadusi`ae tuh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah hynhte a khia`ae:
40022024	“Ccangpatupaw, ‘Ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccaaw hoi leite a chi ze a zu kha a neitapaw nynh a umkhae cih, te a upaw hanlan ciihan a pousah ccaw,’ cite Mawsi nynh a hosya.
40022025	Atu kaening laku kya uno lusari a umbua`ae; atawccapaw nynh zuhoi zah ccaaw hoi leite phe a chih, a zu kha a neitapaw a cciatawpyasya.
40022026	Tuhhawte luningnaw nynh bua a hoi, te luthungnaw kyate lusarinaw kalan phe thua.
40022027	Te tuh-e`ae balyn koute tuh-e nopinung mah phe a chih.
40022028	Tukeiccu thothuinaw kya tuh-e nung tuh lusari`ae kyaze hung zu lang mou a tang cih? Pawccecize minmin balyn nynh phe a umkhae`ae,” a ci`ae.
40022029	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning phe na me oh, Ccathyaa na nyh khyh oh, Pachia thungnaw mah na nyh khyh oh.
40022030	Pawccecize thothuinaw kya tuh zuhoi vae khyh`ae, zudypyaku mah um vae khyh, thuasalama minmin tuh vaawran kya um paw Pachia vaaw ccungccaw`ae hawte nynh athua vae`ae.
40022031	Thuasalama a chih`ae paw thothuinaw konglang te Pachia nynh nanning kalan a hosyapaw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou? A hopaw tuh:
40022032	‘Kae tuh Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia, te Jakob Pachia nynh ka thua,’ a ci. Pachia tuh a chih`ae paw Pachia thua khyh, thuasalama a hiin`ae paw Pachia nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
40022033	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh tuh-e bya he a thae`ae tuh a ccangpyanaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
40022034	Thuasalama Sadusi`ae kha Jesu nynh zya a daesah`ae cipaw kha Farasi`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae.
40022035	Te minmin kyaze kawbyathyapaw lukheit nynh Jesu kha syntaw khylan bya a khia. A khia paw tuh:
40022036	“Ccangpatupaw, kawbya kya tei-e hynh mou abapi huapaw kawpyapaw athua?” a ci.
40022037	Jesu nynh, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na thinlung balynte, na hiinnaw-muisaw balynte, te na tuanaw balynte na sungsah cih,’ acikuh.
40022038	Hynh-e tuh masaty te ale huapaw kawpyapaw nynh thua.
40022039	Te ccangningnaw tuh kha-e te alokuh. ‘Na innpaw kha namaw toulou hawte na sungsah cih,’ acikuh.
40022040	Kawbya balyn te Profeh`ae balyn tuh hynh-e kawpyapaw`ae ccangning kyahin nynh marya a kyngku,” a cipya.
40022041	Farasi`ae pynkheihlan a sueluaku`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh,
40022042	“Kri hynh pawtemou na tua oh? Aning tuh hung Ccaaw mou athua?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “David Ccapaw nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
40022043	Jesu nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawccemou David nynh Muisaw liate amaw kha ‘Bawipaw’ a ci. David nynh a hopaw tuh:
40022044	“ ‘BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” a cipya,’ a ci.
40022045	“David nynh Kri kha ‘Bawipaw’ cite a ko lanze, pawtemou aning tuh a Ccapaw athua cih?” cite a khia`ae.
40022046	Te bya kawkheit a khung khopaw hung sanmah um khyh; tuh-e nin kyate lukhakheit nynh san byakhia ngan vae khyh`ae.
40023001	Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi te a zuitu`ae kha bya a hopya`ae.
40023002	A hopaw tuh: “Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh tuh Mawsi tungkhung kya nynh a dahung`ae.
40023003	Tukeiccu minmin nynh cyi lan ae hopya oh paw miakaw kha hoyte la tuase oh lah la cyih oh; thuasalama mih cyisahnaw`ae hawte la cyih bua nan oh, pawccecize minmin tuh ho`ae zah cyih khyh`ae.
40023004	Pawccecize minmin tuh ri zah phu lan arupaw phupaw kha tung`ae zah ccungccaw`ae mih raw vawlan a khang`ae, thuasalama mimaw tuh mih kuihdung ccangkheit te san nue ry khyh`ae.
40023005	“Thuasalama mih ryalaw`ae balyn kha tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh muih`ae sah cite nynh a law`ae. Mih terui kya te mih kuihbaw kya a khiideku`ae paw saving bung kha kosah`ae zah mih angkile`ae adung kha a ccuasaku`ae.
40023006	Te poi kya ahoy huaccepaw ahangnaw khaan kha ry`ae zah sinakok`ae kya ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw`ae kha a ry`ae.
40023007	Te kungkunaw`ae kya beihkury`ae zah ccungccaw`ae nynh, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ cite koku a ry`ae.
40023008	“Thuasalama nanning tuh ‘Rabbi’ cite la kokuh ry nan oh; pawccecize Kri athua paw, nanning Ccangpatu lukheit rou nynh a um; te nanning balyn tuh uteno`ae nynh na thua oh.
40023009	Te laephi vawlan hung sanmah ‘Apang’ cite ko nan oh; pawccecize vaawran kya a um paw nae Paaw lukheit rou nynh a um.
40023010	‘Ccangpatu’ cite mah la kokuh ry nan oh; pawccecize Kri athua paw, nanning Ccangpatu lukheit rou nynh a um.
40023011	Thuasalama nanning laku ale huaccepaw tuh nanning ryalawpatu athua cih.
40023012	Te hunghung zemah amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw tuh sawbung athua cih; te amaw te amaw zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih.
40023013	“Thuasalama kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize vaawran peenaw kha ccungccaw`ae elan phe na khaw oh, te naemaw mah na tee khyh oh zah a tee ry`ae paw mah na uapah khyh oh.
40023014	Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize numae`ae inn kha na luade oh zah cyisakuthya nawlan saw kha asaepi na sang oh; tukeiccu ale huapaw detahnaw kha na mue cih oh.
40023015	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit a beiknaw rulae khylan rili te laephi kya khua na ccung oh, te he yn rulaekuh tuh kha-e paw kha naemaw laeze leih ning kehenna ccapaw lang na rae oh.
40023016	“Cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Nanning nynh ‘Hunghung zemah tempal liate ccaesaku ze, tuh-e tuh pawtua um khyh; thuasalama hunghung zemah tempal kya-e sui liate ccaesakuh paw tuh a tynsah aho,’ na ci oh.
40023017	Nanning mingaee`ae te mitmoh`ae! Sui tou abapihua, tukhyhze sui a thyaasah paw tempal tou abapihua? Paw hynh mou abapihua?
40023018	Te ‘Hunghung zemah silawhang liate ccaesaku ze, tuh-e tuh pawtua um khyh, thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e vawlan a um paw silawkunawpaw phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh a tynsah aho,’ na ci oh.
40023019	Nanning mingaee`ae te mitmoh`ae! Silawkunawpaw tou abapihua, tukhyhze silawkunawpaw a thyaasahpaw silawhang tou abapihua? Paw hynh mou abapihua?
40023020	Tukeiccu silawhang phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh silawhang te kha-e kya um paw uccaw`ae balyn phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.
40023021	Te tempal phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh tempal te kha-e kya um paw amaw phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.
40023022	Te vaawran phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh Pachia suitungkhung phyate ccaesakuh paw thua zah kha-e vawlan a dahung paw amaw phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.
40023023	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh hangmae, pucinan, te khanmuin kha pumhaw pumkheit na pya oh zah Kawbya kyaze akhingcci huapaw atazaenaw, ngaethyaumsanaw te zyn lan umnaw tuh phe na kawtaw oh; hynh-e`ae hynh na cyi lan oh accanpaw nynh thua, te ccangpaw mah cyi leite na um lan oh paw thua khyh.
40023024	Cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae, masihvaekan kha na ryhbia oh zah kalauk kha po na laang oh!
40023025	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh banang te pake kha avawlan kyalya nynh na sing oh, thuasalama a lungkhu tuh luadenaw te alue lante cyipaw nynh phe abeih.
40023026	Mitmohpaw Farasipaw, pakekhupaw te banang alungkhu kha masaty singty, ou tuhte ze nynh kha-e`ae avawlan kha mah athyaabua cih.
40023027	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh avaw langte phe apuithya sasaw lante langkuh salamah alungkhu tuh michi`ae ru te athu-anangpaw`ae balynte phe beihpaw arawpaw thuhkuhpaw shawku te nynh na loku oh.
40023028	Ou kha-e hawte nanning mah avaw langte tuh ccungccaw`ae malang adingpaw hawte nynh na langku oh, thuasalama nae lungkhu tuh cyiruhnaw te kawbya einaw te nynh phe abia.
40023029	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize profeh`ae shawku kha na raepah oh zah miding`ae shaw lungbing kha na paccaan oh.
40023030	Te ‘Kae minpaaw`ae she lyakhe kae la umbua ze, profeh`ae chii luasanaw kya minmin ryte kae umbua lan khyh,’ na ci oh.
40023031	Tukeiccu nanning tuh profeh`ae a theih`ae paw minmin mih ccaaw`ae nynh kae thua cite naemaw te naemaw hanlan ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.
40023032	Ou tuhte nae minpaaw`ae cyisahnaw tounawpaw kha na biachih oh.
40023033	“Nanning fupaw`ae, fuparepaw ciihan`ae! Pawtemou kehenna kya-e detahnaw kyate na lue kho cih oh?
40023034	Tukeiccu, dotua oh, profeh`ae te ahawpaw ccungccaw`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha nae kalan kae saw`ae; te minmin lakuze abang kha na theih cih oh zah na khiade cih oh; te abang kha nae sinakok`ae kya na bua cih oh zah khua khuakheit kyate khuakheit kyacia na tua na sah cih oh.
40023035	Ou tuhte adingpaw Abel chii kyate, tempal te silawhang laku na chia oh paw Barachiah ccapaw Zakharia chii kyacia laephi vawlan alua paw adingpaw ccungccaw`ae chii balyn tuh nanning tungvaw a thua nawlan.
40023036	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kyahin oun cyikuh cih.
40023037	“Profeh`ae a theih paw, na kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha lung te a deih paw, pou Jerusalem, Jerusalem, awpinung nynh a taw`ae kha a sake kawlan a suelua`ae hawte na ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua lan pei ka ry, thuasalama nang nynh na ry khyh!
40023038	Dotua oh! Nae inn tuh nanning umnaw kho lei lante a um han.
40023039	Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, ‘BAWIPAW min liate yn thua paw Ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,’ cite na ho oh makhia atu kyate nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh,” a ci.
40024001	Te Jesu tuh cceih zah tempal kyate a pou; te a zuitu`ae nynh tempal kya-e innsakkuhpaw`ae kha muihsah khylan amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
40024002	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “E uccaw`ae balyn hynh na muih khyh oh tou? Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tingsah bung leite lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit san a khangthykuh paw e kya um lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
40024003	Te Oliv Mua vawlan a dahung lyakhe zuitu`ae nynh mih makhaete amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “E uccaw`ae hynh hotuhmou yn cyikuh cih? Te nae thuanaw lanpaw te laephi she athangnaw lanpaw paw muihsanaw mou yn langkuh cih? Kaening hynh oun hopah bua,” a ci`ae.
40024004	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Hung ccungccaw nynh san ae ling khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh.
40024005	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh ka min te oun thua cih`ae zah, ‘Kae tuh Kri nynh ka thua,’ oun ci cih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha oun ling cih`ae.
40024006	Te nanning nynh rhawtukkunaw kong te rhawtukkunaw lanpaw kong kha nae thae vae cih oh; tuhzemah nae thinphang nan sah; pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh oun cyikuh hahe cih, thuasalama athangnaw tuh thua loh khyh.
40024007	Pawccecize minphuin phuinkheit te phuinkheit, ram ramkheit te ramkheit oun rhawkuh cih`ae; te ccakangnaw yn thua cih, ccinaw yn thua cih, te khyzawvawkaw kya innrui yn suekuh cih.
40024008	Hynh-e`ae balyn tuh vawsaw teingnaw athotakawnaw nynh thua.
40024009	“Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning kha vawrivawsaw nung khylan ae ah cih oh zah ae theih cih oh; te kamaw min keiccuze minphuin`ae balyn nynh ae hua cih oh.
40024010	Oute ccungccaw patae tuh oun maeleihkuh vae cih`ae, lukheit te lukheit yn pheekuh cih`ae zah lukheit te lukheit yn huakuh cih`ae.
40024011	Te ahme leipaw profeh`ae patae oun langkuh cih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha oun ling cih`ae.
40024012	Te kawngae leinaw alung keiccuze ccungccaw patae kya-e sungsakunaw tuh yn zya bung vae cih.
40024013	Thuasalama athangnaw cia atynpaw tuh khum athua cih.
40024014	Te hynh-e peenaw thehoypaw hynh minphuin`ae balyn kalan ccaekia lang laephipi balyn kya ho athua cih; oute athangnaw tuh yn thua vae cih.
40024015	“Tukeiccu profeh Denial nynh a ho hawte, luathua-ae-ui lang um paw a rohtupaw nynh athyaapaw hmin kya a thadyn paw kha nanning nynh he nae muih vae oh ze, (Ccathyaa a ria paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thaethya sah);
40024016	Judah ram kya um`ae paw nynh mua lang ccue`ae sah.
40024017	Inn tungvaw a um paw nynh a inn lungkhu e ccangkhakheit lawku khylan rungbung nan vae sah.
40024018	Lei kya um paw ccungccaw nynh mah a boeining lawku khylan ki nan vae sah.
40024019	Te tuh-e nin`ae kya ccaawpoipaw nopi`ae te mateizupaw nosi a hoi paw nopi`ae hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang!
40024020	Te nanning na ccuenaw oh ccyh tuh khoccih ccyh athua khyh nawlan te Sabbath nin kya athua khyh nawlan saw la sang oh.
40024021	Pawccecize laephipi atho takawte atu cia a la um boi leipaw, te a um boi vae cih leipaw alepipaw vawsawrunawpi tuh yn thua cih.
40024022	Te tuh-e nin`ae kha dynsah khyh lanze hung sanmah lue lan khyh, thuasalama popaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan kha-e nin`ae kha dynsah athua cih.
40024023	“Oute lukhakheit nynh, ‘Dotua, e kya nynh Kri tuh a um!’ tukhyhze khuin nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la zyn nan oh.
40024024	Pawccecize ahme leipaw kri`ae te ahme leipaw profeh`ae oun langkuh cih`ae zah athua kho ze alepaw muihsanaw te ngaeangnaw kha oun langsakuh cih`ae; ou khate popaw ccungccaw`ae hei kha oun ling cih`ae.
40024025	Dotua oh, nanning kha phe kae hopyaty vae oh.
40024026	“Tukeiccu minmin nynh, ‘Dotua, Kri tuh rangkaw nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la cceih nan oh. ‘Dotua, aning tuh akhaan lungkhu nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la zyn nan oh.
40024027	Pawccecize khozawlaekuhpaw tuh nithua langte yn laekuh zah niccaw langcia a aw hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw mah athua cih.
40024028	Pawccecize michihrua a umnaw`ae miakaw kya langtaw`ae mah pynkheihlan a sueluakuh bua cih`ae.
40024029	“Tuh-e nin`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw koute vaekheihmawte khuanin amoh vae cih zah sawpaw aw vae lan khyh, te awsi`ae tuh vaawlui kyate accah cih`ae zah vaawran kya-e thungnaw`ae tuh oun hy vae cih.
40024030	“Oute vaawran kya Ccungccaw Ccapaw muihsanaw yn langkuh cih; oute laephi kya-e minphuin`ae balyn tuh oun rah oun khui cih`ae, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh thungnaw te alepaw phu-enaw ryte vaaw lang-e maeking`ae kya yn rung paw kha oun muih vae cih`ae.
40024031	Te myarya accaepaw mungkae roi ryte a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha yn saw cih`ae zah amaw nynh a po`ae paw kha minmin nynh laephi kipali kyate, vaawran athangnaw sang kheit kyate sang kheit kyacia pynkheihlan oun suelua cih`ae.
40024032	“Thaeku ku tousenaw phungpaw hynh atu ccangku tua oh; aran ano lya anaw`ae he yn toih tuh hawning ccyh anae vae cipaw na ny oh.
40024033	Tuh-e hawte nanning nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh he nae muih vae oh ze Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh anae vae, thuakaw kin cia yn naekuh vae cipaw la nyh ccavae oh.
40024034	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn acyiku kou makhia atu-e ccungccaw`ae zo lan khyh`ae.
40024035	Vaawran te laephi tuh azo cih, thuasalama ka bya`ae tuh zo lan khyh.
40024036	“Thuasalama tuh-e nin te ccyh tuh hung nynh sanmah nyh khyh, vaawran um paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh mah nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama ka Paaw kyalya nynh a nyh.
40024037	Te Noah ccyh lya hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw mah yn cyikuh cih.
40024038	Pawccecize tuipayn a thua maw nin`ae kya, Noah nynh sanphalung lungkhu lang a tee nin cia, minmin tuh aete, niate, zudykute, zudypyakute nynh a um`ae.
40024039	Te tuipayn thua zah minmin balyn pung a cciakhae`ae cia raeringku lanpaw kha nyh khyh`ae; tuh-e hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thua lanpaw kya acyikuh bua cih.
40024040	Oute tuh-e ccyh lya lei kya a um paw ccungccaw luning laku lukheit kha law athua cih zah lukheit tuh cciataw athua cih.
40024041	Sungmia a mia paw luning laku lukheit kha law athua cih zah lukheit tuh cciataw athua cih.
40024042	“Tukeiccu paw suimilan ccyh kya nynh nae Bawipaw tuh yn thua cih cipaw na ny khyh oh keiccuze paccynkute la ngaw oh.
40024043	Thuasalama e hynh nyh oh; inn hoitu nynh paw ccyh kya nynh miruhpaw yn thua cih cipaw kha phe a ny lanze a inn kha a kiabia khyh nawlan phe a ngaw cih cipaw na ny oh.
40024044	Tukeiccu nanning mah raeringkuh oh, pawccecize na ngaehoi khyh oh ccyh lyakhe Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh yn thua cih.
40024045	“Te a bawipaw nynh a inn kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha accyh azaw vae ze ae lanpaw a neetu lang, a inn lungkhu a uktu lang a khang paw zyn lan um paw te ahawpaw see tuh hungmou athua?
40024046	Tuhte rya a law paw kha a bawipaw nynh yn thua zah a muihpya paw see tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
40024047	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kha-e see kha a uccaw balyn tungvaw uktu lang a tangsah cih.
40024048	Thuasalama see hoy leipaw nynh a thinlung kya, ‘Ka bawipaw yn thua lanpaw tuh aro ung cih,’ ci zah,
40024049	a ban`ae see`ae kha a bua vae`ae, te a neih`ae paw ryte aete niate a um vae.
40024050	Kha-e see nynh a ngaw khyh nin te a ny khyh ccyh lyakhe a bawipaw tuh mang yn thua lanze,
40024051	kha-e see kha ccangning lang thoh bae cih zah a hanpaw tuh cyihruh`ae nynh a ccou`ae paw kha a ccoubua cih; tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih.
40025001	“Te vaawran peenaw tuh zudy ccangvaepaw kha cciadue lan mih maeekhua`ae kha ccyngkuh`ae zah a cceih`ae paw liaccady luhaw te nynh aloku.
40025002	Te minmin kyaze lu pangaw tuh haw`ae zah lu pangaw tuh angaee`ae.
40025003	Angaee`ae paw tuh mih maeekhua`ae ccyngkuh`ae zah maeetui ccyngkuh bia khyh`ae.
40025004	Thuasalama ahaw`ae paw tuh mih maeekhua ryte a bawng kya maeetui kha a ccyngku bia`ae.
40025005	Zudy ccangvaepaw khaw yn ro tuh minmin balyn tuh ngawphukuh`ae zah phe a itheih`ae.
40025006	“Te ziraccyng khe, ‘Dotua oh, zudy ccangvaepaw yn thua vae; amaw te tungku lan nanning oun toikuh ccavae oh!’ cite roi accae.
40025007	“Oute tuh-e liaccady`ae balyn tuh tho`ae zah mih maeekhua`ae kha a paccynku`ae.
40025008	Te angaee`ae paw nynh ahaw`ae paw kha, ‘Nae maeetui abang kha oun pyabua oh, pawccecize kae maeekhua`ae a tui phe athang,’ a cipya`ae.
40025009	“Thuasalama ahaw`ae paw nynh, ‘Tuhte thua khyh, kaemaw hanlan te nanning hanlan zaw lan khyh, a zua`ae paw kalan cceih oh lah naemaw hanlan oun rekuh oh,’ a cipya`ae.
40025010	“Te minmin nynh maeetui reku lan a ccia`ae lyakhe, zudy ccangvaepaw tuh yn thua vae; te paccynkute um`ae paw tuh amaw ryte zudy poi kalan a tee`ae; te thuakaw kha phe a khaw vae`ae.
40025011	“Tuhkoute ccangpaw liaccady`ae tuh mah oun thua`ae zah, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw, kaening mah oun hungpah bua!’ a ci`ae.
40025012	Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning kae nyh khyh oh,’ cite a khung`ae.
40025013	“Tukeiccu nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw nin te ccyh kha na ny khyh oh keiccu tuh phang la ngaw oh.
40025014	“Pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh ccungccaw lukheit nynh asawnaw ram lang khuaccung lan noukuh zah a see`ae kha ko`ae zah a uccaw`ae kha minmin kalan a ahpaw hawte nynh athua.
40025015	Te luraveih kha amaw a cyi khonaw thyhte, lukheit kha talent ccangpangaw a pya, lukheit kha kaw ning a pya, te lukheit kha ccangkheit a pya; oute palou khuaccungtaw`ae.
40025016	Oute talent kaw pangaw a ccou paw nynh cceih zah kha-e te kung a ku, te ccangpaw talent kaw pangaw a mue.
40025017	Te tuh-e hawte talent ccangning a ccou paw nynh mah ccangpaw talent ccangning a mue.
40025018	Thuasalama talent ccangkheit a ccou paw tuh cceih zah laephi kha thae zah a bawipaw phua kha zya a thuru.
40025019	“Ccyhsaepi aro koute tuh-e see`ae mih bawipaw tuh yn thua zah minmin ryte ccazing a tua`ae.
40025020	Te phua talent kaw pangaw a ccou paw nynh yn thua zah ccangpaw talent kaw pangaw kha yn ccyngbia zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang nynh kae kha talent kaw pangaw nae ah; dotua, kha-e laelan talent kaw pangaw bua ka mue,’ a cipya.
40025021	“A bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Ahoy, zyn lan um paw see hoypaw, uccaw ccapyhpaw kya nang tuh zyn lan na um, uccaw patae tungvaw uktu lang kae rae cih, na bawipaw kya-e lungtuanaw lungkhu lang teebua,’ a cipya.
40025022	“Talent kaw ning a ccou paw mah yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang nynh kae kha talent kaw ning nae ah; dotua, kha-e laelan ccangpaw talent kaw ning ka mue,’ a cipya.
40025023	“A bawipaw nynh, ‘Ahoy, zyn lan um paw see hoypaw, uccaw ccapyhpaw kya nang tuh zyn lan na um, uccaw patae tungvaw uktu lang kae rae cih; na bawipaw kya-e lungtuanaw lungkhu lang teebua,’ a cipya.
40025024	“Oute talent ccangkheit a ccou paw nynh yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh myarya a reipaw ccungccaw, na ccouku leinaw kya a ruekuh paw te na vuaku leinaw kya a sueluakuh paw nynh na thua cipaw kha ka ny.
40025025	Tukeiccu ka rih, te ka cceih zah na phua talent kha laephi kya ka thuru; dotua na uccaw tuh e kya phang a um,’ a cipya.
40025026	“A bawipaw nynh khung zah, ‘Seethya-seeruh paw te thawnawpaw, ka ccouku leinaw kya ka ruekupaw te ka vuaku leinaw kya ka sueluakupaw kha na ny.
40025027	Tukeiccu nang nynh ka phua kha phuarutu`ae kalan na nung lan accan, ou tuhte he kae thua te ka phua tuh amia ryte ka mue vae cih.
40025028	“Tukeiccu a talent phua kha a kyate laah oh lah talent kaw haw a hoi paw kha pya oh.
40025029	Pawccecize a hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pyachih athua cih zah pataepi a hoi cih; thuasalama a hoi leipaw ccungccaw kyate a hoithypaw kha heize lawpya athua cih.
40025030	Te nanning nynh ccungkia leipaw see kha rawnaw te hawzynaw a umnaw atolang mohnaw lungkhu langkhe dae vua oh,’ a cipya`ae.
40025031	“Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a phu-enaw te, athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae balyn ryte he yn rung te, a phu-enaw suitungkhung vawlan yn dahung vae cih.
40025032	Te amaw malang minphuin`ae balyn tuh oun sueluakuh cih`ae; te tuuringtu nynh a tuu`ae kha mia`ae kyate a phia hawte aning nynh minmin kha lukheit kyate lukheit yn phia cih`ae.
40025033	Te tuu`ae kha a ranglang yn nung cih`ae, thuasalama mia`ae kha a voilang khe a nung cih`ae.
40025034	“Oute Siapharan nynh a ranglang um`ae paw kha, ‘Ka Paaw kya-e hythuaccou`ae paw nanning rang oh, laephipi athonaw kyate nae hanlan paccynpaw peenaw hynh rhoccou oh.
40025035	Pawccecize kae ka vuelaw lya aepaw nae pya oh, ka tuihaw lya nia lanpaw nae pya oh, kae mikhiapaw ka thua lya innccung nae ua oh;
40025036	ka sasete ka um lya uccaw nae lawsaku oh, ka ccih zah nae dooih oh, thunginn kya ka um zah nae via oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae.
40025037	“Oute a ding`ae paw nynh, ‘Bawipaw, hotuh lya mou na vuelawpaw kae muih zah aepaw kae dang? Tukhyhze na tuihaw zah nia lanpaw kae pya?
40025038	Hotuh lya mou mikhiapaw lang na tang paw kha kae muih zah nang kha kae thua sah? Tukhyhze na sasete na um zah uccaw kae lawsaku?
40025039	Tukhyhze hotuh lya mou na cci paw te thunginn kya na um paw kha kae muih zah kae paebua?’ cite oun khung cih`ae.
40025040	“Te Siapharan nynh a khung cih`ae zah minmin kha, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e ka uno`ae lakuze adih huapaw lukheit tungvaw na cyi oh paw miakaw kha kamaw kya na cyi oh paw nynh thua,’ a cipah cih`ae.
40025041	“Oute a voilang um`ae paw kha mah, ‘Nanning thyalaw`ae paw, diabolos te a vaaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan paccynpya paw zungzae tynpaw maee lungkhu langkhe, kamaw kyate pou oh.
40025042	Pawccecize kae tuh ka vuelaw zah looh nae pya khyh oh, ka tuihaw zah nia lanpaw nae pya khyh oh.
40025043	Kae tuh mikhiapaw lang ka tang zah nae thuasah khyh oh; sasete ka um zah uccaw nae lawsakuh khyh oh; ka ccih, te thunginn kya ka um zah nae paebua khyh oh,’ cite oun cipah cih`ae.
40025044	“Oute minmin nynh mah, ‘Bawipaw, hotuh lya mou na vuelawpaw kae muih, tukhyhze na tuihaw paw, mikhiapaw lang na tang paw, sasete na um paw, na cci paw, thunginn kya na um paw kha kae muih zah na hanlan ryalawpya leite kae um?’ cite oun khung cih`ae.
40025045	“Oute aning nynh minmin kha, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e`ae lakuze adih huaccepaw lukheit tungvaw na cyi khyh oh paw miakaw kha kamaw tungvaw na cyi khyh oh paw nynh thua,’ cite yn khung cih`ae.
40025046	“Te hynh-e`ae tuh zungzae detahnaw lungkhu lang nynh a cceih cih`ae, thuasalama a ding`ae paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw lungkhu lang nynh a cceih cih`ae,” a ci.
40026001	Ou tuhcihte hynh-e a hopaw balyn hynh Jesu nynh he a thangsah tuh a zuitu`ae kha,
40026002	“Nin ning koute Kawtaw Poi a um cipaw kha nanning nynh na ny oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh khiade khylan ah athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
40026003	Oute alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae tuh Kaiafas acikuh paw ranpibawi lupi inn maepaw langkhe oun sueluakuh`ae zah,
40026004	te minmin nynh Jesu kha lingte kae kyngsah lah kae chia ccaw cite khuakhanku`ae.
40026005	Thuasalama, “Ccungccaw`ae oun pookuh sei cih`ae, poi nin tuh thua nan sah,” a ci`ae.
40026006	Te Bethani khua kya vaethyakaepaw Simon inn kya Jesu a um lyakhe,
40026007	nopinung lukheit nynh myarya aphutepaw mynkhuhpaw satho alabasta lung tuihinbu bukheit kha amaw kalan ccyng zah ae lan cite a dahung lyakhe kha-e kha a lu kya a bu.
40026008	Thuasalama a zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya mih thinria zah, “Pawccemou e hynh alakaw lang a tangsah han?
40026009	Pawccecize hynh-e mynkhuhpaw satho hynh phua patae lang zuate ryachi`ae kha pya lanpaw,” a ci`ae.
40026010	Kha-e kha Jesu nynh he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Pawccemou nopinung kha vawsaw na pya oh? Pawccecize aning nynh ka tungvaw ahoypaw rya kha phe a law vae.
40026011	Pawccecize ryachi`ae tuh nanning kya pei a um`ae, thuasalama kae tuh nae kya pei ka um khyh.
40026012	Pawccecize hynh-e mynkhuhpaw satho ka pyn vawlan a bu paw kya aning nynh e hynh ka rhua ccynaw hanlan a paccynpaw nynh thua.
40026013	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, lae vawlan balyn kya hynh-e thehoypaw honaw miakaw kya, hynh-e nopinung nynh a cyipaw hynh mah amaw liathui nawlan hobia athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
40026014	Oute luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw, Judas Iskaria acikuh paw tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan cceih zah,
40026015	“Aning kha nae kalan kae ah ze pawmou nae pya cih oh?” a ci. Te minmin nynh ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha a riapya`ae.
40026016	Te tuh-e ccyh kyate Judas nynh amaw kha phee khylan ccyhhoy kha a ccungku vae.
40026017	Te Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi masaty nin kyakhe zuitu`ae nynh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Kawtaw Poi na ae nawlan pawkyamou na hanlan nae paccynsah ry?” cite a khia`ae.
40026018	Te Jesu nynh, “Khua lungkhu lang la cceih oh lah ccungccapaw lukheit kha, ‘Ccangpatu nynh, “Ka ccyh anae vae, na inn kyakhe ka zuitu`ae ryte Kawtaw Poi kae mang cih,” a ci,’ cite la hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.
40026019	Te zuitu`ae nynh Jesu nynh a hopya`ae hawte a cyi`ae; te minmin nynh Kawtaw Poi dangkunaw kha a paccyn`ae.
40026020	Te zete he a thua tuh aning tuh luhaw laening ryte ae lan a dahung`ae.
40026021	Te he a ae`ae tuh Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning laku-e lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn ah cih,” a ci.
40026022	Te minmin tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaethah zah, “Bawipaw, tuh-e paw tuh kae ka thua zaw?” cite luraveih nynh amaw kha a khia`ae.
40026023	Te aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw ryte pake kya a kuih a pubua paw ccungccapaw nynh kamaw hynh yn phee cih.
40026024	Amaw konglang azeikuh thyhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a cceih ccaccing cih; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw a pheetupaw ccungccapaw hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Tuh-e paw hanlan a la pui khyh ze ahoyhua cih paw,” a cipya`ae.
40026025	Oute amaw a pheetu Judas nynh tho zah, “Rabbi, tuh-e paw tuh kae tou?” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Na ho paw tuh athua,” a ci.
40026026	Te he a ae`ae tuh Jesu nynh sanlou kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho, te kha-e kha eih zah a zuitu`ae kha pya`ae zah, “Lawkuh oh, ae oh, e tuh ka pyn nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
40026027	Te banang kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute minmin kha a pya`ae; te, “Nanning balyn e hynh neih oh.
40026028	Pawccecize e tuh ccungccaw patae seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan luasah paw byakin thawpaw kya-e ka chiise nynh thua.
40026029	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, ka Paaw peenaw kya nanning ryte athawpaw misutui ka nia nin a thua makhia, atu koute hynhtahawpaw misutui hynh ka neih boi vae lan khyh,” a ci.
40026030	Te thehoysanaw law ccangkheit kha a sah kou`ae te minmin tuh Oliv Mua lang a cceih vae`ae.
40026031	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu khuazi kamaw keiccuze nanning balyn tuh nae lung oun thang cih; pawccecize, ‘Tuuringtu kha ka bua cih zah tuuphu`ae tuh pung a phiakuh cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh.
40026032	“Thuasalama kae tuh ka thothui koute nae malang Galilee lang ka la cceihty cih,” a cipya`ae.
40026033	Piter nynh tho zah, “Nang na keiccuze hynh-e`ae balyn tuh a maeleihku`ae zemah kae tuh kharyh ka maeleihkuh lan khyh,” a ci.
40026034	Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya, atu khuazi awkhungpaw a khua maw, kamaw hynh vaethung nae vua cih,” a cipya.
40026035	Piter nynh, “Namaw ryte phe ka chibua lan zemah nang kha kae vua lan khyh,” a ci. Tuhe hawte zuitu`ae balyn nynh mah a ci`ae.
40026036	Oute Jesu tuh minmin ryte Kethsemane a ci`ae paw ahmin kya oun thua zah zuitu`ae kha, “Khuhlang khuin ka la cceih cih zah saw ka sang loukaw nanning e kya la dahung hin oh,” a cipya`ae.
40026037	Te Piter te Zebedi ccaaw`ae luning kha a hoeibua`ae; te a ngaethah vae zah myarya a lungvawsaw vae.
40026038	Oute minmin kha, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw tuh chi lan ciate myaryasangkae a ngaethah; nanning e kya um oh lah kamaw ryte ngaw oh,” a cipya`ae.
40026039	Te ccapyh asawnaw malang rakyh cceih zah bakhung zah, “Pou ka Paaw, athua kho ze e banang nynh kae hynh yn kawtaw sah; tuhzemah kae ka ry hawte thua nan sah, thuasalama na ry hawte thua sah,” cite sawsang.
40026040	Te zuitu`ae kalan thua zah a i`ae paw kha a muih, te Piter kha, “Pawte! Kamaw kha suimilan ccangkheit san nae ngaw kho khyh oh tou?
40026041	Tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na phungku khyh nawlan oh ngaw oh lah sawsang oh; muisaw nynh tuh a ry ccaccing, thuasalama pynsaw tuh a thawzya,” a cipya.
40026042	Vaeningnaw, bua cceih zah, “Pou ka Paaw, hynh-e banang hynh kae nynh nia leite athua kho khyh ze kamaw hynh yn kawtaw khyh nawlan na rynaw thyhte thua sah,” cite saw bua a sang.
40026043	Te yn thua zah zuitu`ae bua a i`ae paw kha a muih; pawccecize mih mit tuh daekuh vae khyh.
40026044	Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah bua a cceih, te bya phe alokuh lante vaethungnaw bua saw a sang.
40026045	Oute a zuitu`ae kalan yn thua zah minmin kha, “Na i ung oh zah na hae-ung ung oh tou? Dotua oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh misei`ae kuih kalan ah ccyh yn thua vae.
40026046	Tho ccavae oh, cceih ccavae oh sih; dotua oh, kamaw yn pheetupaw tuh yn thua vae,” a cipya`ae.
40026047	Te a ho cciamang lya, dotua oh, luhaw laening kyaze lukheitpaw Judas tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw zapi ry thaloi te tungbang pung ccyngkute oun thua vae`ae.
40026048	Te amaw a pheetupaw nynh, “Kae nynh kae myng paw ccungccapaw kha tuh Jesu nynh thua, amaw kha kyng oh,” cite minmin kha syntawnaw pya`ae zah a hopya`ae.
40026049	Te Jesu kalan palou yn cceih zah, “Rabbi, na dan khaw!” cite beih zah amaw kha a myng.
40026050	Te Jesu nynh, “Ka ban, paw khylan mou nae thua?” a ci. Oute minmin nynh oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha kyng`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
40026051	Te Jesu ryte a um`ae paw lukheitpaw nynh a kuih thua zah a thaloi kha dungkuh zah ranpibawi lupi seepaw lukheit kha a nakua thoh pae lang a bae.
40026052	Oute Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Na thaloi kha a umnaw kyakhe bua nung; pawccecize thaloi a lawkuh`ae paw balyn tuh thaloi te nynh a chih cih`ae.
40026053	Ka Paaw nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha atumaw legion haw laening lae alung yn pya nawlan ka Paaw kalan atu sawsangkuh kho lan khyh cite tou na tua?
40026054	Tuhte lanze ‘Hynhte acyikuh cih,’ acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh pawtemou accing vae cih?” a cipya.
40026055	Tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha, “Miruhpaw a kyng`ae hawte kamaw hynh kyng lan thaloi ry, tungbang ryte tou nae ccianua oh? Tempal kya ccangpyate kae tuh nanning ryte nin takyh ka dahung, te nae kyng khyh oh.
40026056	Thuasalama profeh`ae kya-e Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh hynh-e balyn tuh acyikuh,” a cipya`ae. Oute zuitu`ae balyn nynh amaw kha vua`ae zah pung ccuetaw vae`ae.
40026057	Te Jesu a kyng`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha kawbya ccangpatu`ae te piccang`ae a sueluakunaw`ae ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas kalan a cciakhae`ae.
40026058	Thuasalama Piter nynh ranpibawi lupi maepaw kyacia amaw kha asawpi te a zui. Tuh-e maepaw kalan teebua zah athangnaw kha muih khylan tempal ngawtu`ae kyakhe a dahungbua.
40026059	Atu alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae, te Sanhedrin kungsi`ae balyn nynh Jesu kha rawsete chia khylan ahme leipaw ccaekia a ccungpya`ae.
40026060	Thuasalama muih khyh`ae; athua, ahme leipaw ccaekia`ae patae athua`ae zemah a seinaw kha muih khyh`ae. Nyathyakou ahme leipaw ccaekia luning oun thua`ae zah,
40026061	“Hynh-e paw nynh, ‘Pachia tempal hynh ka roh kho zah nin thung lungkhu ka sakthui kho,’ a ci,” a ci`ae.
40026062	Te ranpibawi lupi nynh thokuh zah Jesu kha, “Kaw kheit san na khung khyh`ae rei? Nang ae rawse`ae paw e ccaekia`ae hynh pawte?” a ci.
40026063	Thuasalama Jesu tuh daetedae lang nynh a um. Te ranpibawi lupi nynh tho zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw Kri na thua lanze yn hopya tua, a hiinpaw Pachia liate nang kha ccae kae sahsaku,” a cipya.
40026064	Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh mang na ho latu. Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, atu koute nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh thungnaw ranglang kya a dahung paw te vaawran e maeking`ae kya yn rung paw kha nae muih cih oh,” a cipya.
40026065	Oute ranpibawi lupi nynh a uccaw kha ccarae sei zah, “Pachia saryapaw bya kha phe a ho vae, tuh laelan paw ccaekia mou aening aho ung? Dotua oh, atu Pachia a saryapaw bya kha phe na thae vae oh.
40026066	Pawte na tua oh?” a ci. Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh chi lan accan,” a ci`ae.
40026067	Oute a mae kya mih tuin te thoi`ae zah a thung`ae, te ccungccaw abang nynh mih kuihphe te bia`ae zah,
40026068	“Nang Kri, nang ae bia paw hynh hungmou? Profeh hawte oun hopya tua?” a ci`ae.
40026069	Tuhlya Piter tuh atolang maepaw kyakhe a dahung; te ryalawpatu nung taraw lukheit nynh a kalan yn thua zah, “Nang mah Galilee paw Jesu ryte a umbua paw nynh na thua,” a ci.
40026070	Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin balyn malang pheikuh zah, “Paw nynh na ho cipaw ka nyh khyh,” a ci.
40026071	Te Piter tuh maepaw khunglang he a pou te ccangpaw ryalawpatunung nynh muih zah tuin kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha, “E paw mah Nazareth paw Jesu ryte a umbua paw nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
40026072	Thuasalama Piter nynh ccaesaku biate, “Tuh-e paw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite bua a pheiku.
40026073	Te khuekheih aro koute tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw nynh Piter kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Thanccingte nang mah minmin kyaze lukheit nynh na thuabua, pawccecize na byaho nynh namaw kha phe ae langsaku,” a ci`ae.
40026074	Oute Piter nynh, “Tuh-e Ccungccapaw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite thyalawkuh zah byakinku vae. Te awkhungpaw palou a khua vae.
40026075	Te, “Awkhungpaw a khua mawze nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,” cite Jesu nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae. Te atolang pou zah thawmawte a rah.
40027001	Awkhua he a thua tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae balyn nynh Jesu kha rawsete chia lante khuakhan`ae.
40027002	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a hee kou`ae te, cciakhae`ae zah ram uktu Pontias Pilat kalan a ah`ae.
40027003	Oute Jesu a pheetu Judas nynh Jesu kha chia lante seibe`ae paw kha he a muih tuh ngaesikuh zah ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae kalan bua ccyng zah,
40027004	“Seinaw a hoi leipaw chii ka phee paw tuh phe ka sei vae,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Tuh-e tuh kaening te pawmou asekuh? Tuh-e tuh namaw la do,” a ci`ae.
40027005	Te aning nynh ngunphua phuaccang`ae kha tempal kya dae vua zah phe a pou; te cceih zah amaw te amaw a nging phe a oku.
40027006	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh ngunphua phuaccang`ae kha khuin`ae zah, “E`ae tuh chii mee athua keiccuze tempal sisua bung lungkhu lang nung lan ccan khyh,” a ci`ae.
40027007	Te minmin nynh khuakhan`ae zah mikhia`ae u nawlan cite lae-ang raetupaw laekua kha tuh-e phua`ae khate a re`ae.
40027008	Tukeiccu tuh-e laekua kha, ‘Chii Laekua’ cite atunin cia ko athua.
40027009	Ou tuhte profeh Jeremiah nynh, “Israel ccungccaw`ae nynh amee a khya`ae paw amaw mee ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha minmin nynh laah`ae zah,
40027010	BAWIPAW nynh kamaw yn hopyasya thyhhawte, kha-e phua`ae kha lae-ang raetupaw laekua mee lang a pya`ae,” cite a hopaw bya tuh yn ccing vae.
40027011	Te Jesu tuh ram uktu malang thadyn zah ram uktu nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite a khia. Te Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh mang na ho latu,” a cipya.
40027012	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh amaw kha seibe`ae zah kawkheit san khung khyh`ae.
40027013	Oute Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Nang kha rawsete minmin nynh ccaekia hozeih nynh a khan`ae cipaw hynh na thae khyh tou?” a cipya.
40027014	Te Jesu nynh bya kawkheit san khung khyh, tukeiccuze ram uktu tuh myarya a ngaeangthua.
40027015	Te Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw zapi nynh a ry`ae paw thungccahpaw lukheit kha ccungccaw`ae kalan ram uktu nynh leih a sawpya`ae.
40027016	Ou tuhlya Barabbas acikuh paw a minthaanpaw thungccahpaw lukheit a la um.
40027017	Tukeiccu ccungccaw`ae pynkheihlan he oun sueluakuh`ae te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nae kalan hungmou nae sawsah ry oh? Barabbas tou? Tukhyhze Kri acikuh paw Jesu tou?” cite a khia`ae.
40027018	Pawccecize alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mih eiung keiccu nynh Jesu kha a ah`ae cipaw Pilat nynh phe a ny.
40027019	Te byapianaw tungkhung vawlan Pilat he a dahung tuh, a zu nynh a kalan ccungccaw yn saw zah, “Kha-e adingpaw Ccungccapaw kha pawsang mah la cyih nan; pawccecize amaw keiccuze atunin ka maan kya myarya ka teing,” cite a hopya.
40027020	Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh Barabbas kha ngiaku lan zah Jesu kha chiasah lan cite ccungccaw zapi kha a hy`ae.
40027021	Ram uktu nynh, “Hynh-e luning`ae kyaze hung hynh mou nae kalan nae sawsah ry oh?” cite minmin kha a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Barabbas,” a ci`ae.
40027022	Pilat nynh, “Tuhte lanze Kri acikuh paw Jesu hynh pawtemou ka cyih cih,” cite a khia`ae. Minmin balyn nynh, “Amaw tuh khiade thuasah,” a ci`ae.
40027023	Te ram uktu nynh, “Pawccemou, paw hoyleinaw mou a cyi?” cite a khia`ae. Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw tuh khiade thuasah,” cite houh a sia`ae.
40027024	Pilat nynh pawpawte mah ka tae kho vae lan khyh`ae, thuasalama keisukeilae houh yn um vae cih`ae cipaw kha he a muih tuh tui kha lawkuh zah ccungccaw zapi malang a kuih kha singkuh zah, “Hynh-e adingpaw Ccungccapaw chiise kyate kae tuh ka lue, e tuh nanning la do ccavae oh,” a ci.
40027025	Oute ccungccaw balyn nynh khung`ae zah, “Amaw chiise tuh kaening tungvaw te kae ccaaw`ae tungvaw thua vae sah,” a ci`ae.
40027026	Oute Pilat nynh Barabbas kha mih kalan a sawpya`ae. Te Jesu kha buasah`ae zah khiade khylan a ah vae.
40027027	Oute ram uktu a rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang cciakhae`ae zah rhawkawphu phukheit khaleihte Jesu kalan a sueluakuh`ae.
40027028	Te minmin nynh a uccaw kha phae`ae zah asepaw boeikhua kha a zingsah`ae.
40027029	Te hingpaw lukhung kha a khepah`ae koute a lu vawlan a khungsah`ae, te a ranglang kuih kya phaeku kha a ccyngsah`ae; te a malang ccukharutung`ae zah, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” cite amaw kha a sarya`ae.
40027030	Oute amaw kha mih tuin te a thoi`ae, te phaeku kha lawkuh`ae zah a lu kha a bua`ae.
40027031	Te he a sarya kou`ae te minmin nynh boeikhua kha phae`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha bua a lawsaku`ae, te khiade lan a poukhae vae`ae.
40027032	Te oun ccia lya`ae, minmin nynh Sairenia khua paw Simon acikuh paw ccungccapaw kha he muih`ae tuh Jesu vaelantung kha puih lan a riase`ae.
40027033	Te Luru Hmin a ci`ae paw Golgotha cikuh paw hmin kya he a thua`ae tuh,
40027034	akhahpaw ryte apykuhpaw misuriapaw kha nia lan Jesu kha a pya`ae; te he a tangtua tuh neih ry vae khyh.
40027035	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha khiade`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha ccungthy dungte a neeku`ae; ou tuhte, “Minmin nynh ka uccaw`ae kha a neeku`ae, te ka uccaw kya minmin nynh ccungthy a dung`ae,” cite profeh nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
40027036	Te dahungte minmin nynh khe kya Jesu kha phang a ngaw`ae.
40027037	Te, “E PAW TUH JEW`AE SIAPHARAN JESU NYNH THUA,” cite azeikuh paw, amaw seibenawpaw ccaw kha a lu luki khe a tawpya`ae.
40027038	Tuh-e ccyh kya damiah`ae luning kha, a ranglang lukheit, te a voilang lukheit amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae.
40027039	Te laanpi cceih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a sarya`ae, mih lu thuhpah`ae zah,
40027040	“Tempal kha roh zah nin thung lungkhu phe a sakthui paw nang, namaw te namaw kha khumku tua! Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze vaelantung kyate yn rungtua,” a ci`ae.
40027041	Tuh-e hawte kawbya ccangpatu`ae ryte piccang`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mah sarya`ae zah,
40027042	“Aning nynh ming`ae kha a khum`ae, amaw te amaw tuh khumkuh kho khyh. Aning tuh Israel Siapharan athua lanze atumaw vaelantung kyate yn rungtua sah lah amaw kha kae zyn cih.
40027043	Aning tuh Pachia kha a doliakuh, Pachia nynh a ry lanze atumaw amaw kha luesah tua sah; pawccecize, ‘Kae tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh ka thua,’ a ciku,” a ci`ae.
40027044	Amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae paw damiah`ae nynh mah tuhhawte a saryabua`ae.
40027045	Suimilan ccangtaruhnaw te ccangtakuanaw cia tuh-e ram balyn tuh pung amoh.
40027046	Te zete suimilan ccangthung loukaw khe Jesu nynh, “Eli, Eli, lama sabach thani,” cite thawte a sia. Asuilan tuh, “Ka Pachia, ka Pachia, pawccemou kae hynh phe nae vuasya?” cipaw nynh thua.
40027047	Tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh tuh-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, “E paw hynh Elijah nynh a koku,” a ci`ae.
40027048	Te minmin lakuze lukheit nynh vaekheihmawte ccue zah phuesi tungkheit kha laah zah misuriapaw kyakhe a dung, te phaeku kya hede zah nia lan a pya.
40027049	Tuhlae`ae nynh, “Amaw khate umtua sah, Elijah tuh e paw khum khylan yn thua ta, yn thua khyh ta dotua oh sih,” a ci`ae.
40027050	Jesu nynh thawte bua a sia koute, a muisaw kha a ah vae.
40027051	Te dotua, tempal kya-e boei zokhawpaw tuh alu te alia cia ccangning lang ccarae seikuh, te innruisuekuh zah lung`ae akoi.
40027052	Te shaw`ae hungkuh zah a ih`ae paw mithyaa`ae pyn patae tuh tho`ae zah,
40027053	amaw thothuinaw koute, shaw`ae kyate oun toikuh`ae; athyaapaw khuapi lungkhu lang cceih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kalan a langkuh`ae.
40027054	Tuhlya rhawbawipaw te amaw ryte a um`ae paw nynh Jesu kha phang ngaw`ae zah innruisuekuh paw te tuh-e acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya rih`ae zah, “Thanccingte e paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua!” a ci`ae.
40027055	Te Galilee ram kyate Jesu kha ryalawpah`ae zah a zui`ae paw nopi`ae patae mah asawpi langte do`ae zah tuin kya a um`ae.
40027056	Tuh-e`ae laku Magdala khua nung Meri, te James te Joses mih nung Meri, te Zebedi ccaaw`ae mih nung a umbua`ae.
40027057	Zete he yn thua tuh Arimathia khua paw Josef acikuh paw mihoipaw tuh tuhlang yn thua, amaw tuh Jesu zuitu mah a thua.
40027058	Tuh-e paw nynh Pilat kalan cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a ngiaku. Oute Pilat nynh Jesu rhua kha pya lan kaw a pya`ae.
