40027059	Te Josef nynh a rhua kha he a lawkuh koute athyaapaw boeirawpaw khate a lung.
40027060	Te lung kya a karyn paw athawpaw amaw shaw kyakhe kha-e kha a ccy; te alepipaw lung kha shaw khu mohrae kalan tounua zah phe a cceih.
40027061	Te Magdala khua nung Meri te ccangpaw Meri tuh shaw te ahawiliakuh lante dahung`ae zah tuin kya a um`ae.
40027062	Paccynkunaw Nin koute, awkhualan nin kya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae tuh pynkheihlan Pilat kalan oun sueluakuh`ae zah,
40027063	“Bawihaepaw, kha-e ccungccaw lingtupaw nynh a hiin lyaze, ‘Nin thung koute bua ka thothui cih,’ cite a hopaw kha kae syntaw.
40027064	Tukeiccu nin thungnaw abia makhia shaw kha varyn ring lan kawpya`ae, tukhyh lanze a zuitu`ae nynh khuazi khe oun cceih cih`ae zah phe oun ruh cih`ae, te ccungccaw`ae kha, ‘Aning tuh chinaw kyate phe tho vae,’ oun cipah cih`ae; tukeiccu nyathyakou e hyngbya tuh masaty-e laeze houh aseihua vae cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
40027065	Pilat nynh, “Nanning a ngawtu phang na hoi oh, la cceih oh, na cyi khonaw oh thyhte akhyn lan la ngawsah oh,” a cipya`ae.
40027066	Tukeiccu minmin tuh cceih`ae zah lung kha tazeih khiate, te a ngawtu kha nungte shaw kha akhyn lan a rae`ae.
40028001	Sabbath nin thang zah lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin khuadae takaw lang he yn cih tuh Magdala khua nung Meri te ccangpaw Meri tuh shaw do lan oun thua`ae.
40028002	Te dotua, myarya arupaw innruisuekuh; pawccecize Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh vaawran kyate yn rung zah yn thua, te shaw thufu kyate lung kha tou zah kha-e lung vawlan khe a dahung.
40028003	A mitmae tuh khozaw hawte thua zah a uccaw tuh vuiraw hawte araw.
40028004	Te amaw rawri`ae keiccuze shaw a ngawtu`ae tuh thyngkuh`ae zah ccungccaw achihpaw hawte nynh thua`ae.
40028005	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh nopi`ae kha, “Nanning rih nan oh, pawccecize nanning nynh a khiade`ae paw Jesu kha na ccung oh cipaw ka ny.
40028006	Aning tuh e kya um vae khyh, pawccecize a ho hawte phe a tho vae. Rang oh, Bawipaw a ccynaw`ae hmin hynh oun dotua oh.
40028007	Te arangte la cceih oh lah a zuitu`ae kha aning tuh chinaw kyate phe a tho vae cite la hopah oh; te dotua oh, Galilee lang nae malang a cceih cih, tuin kya amaw kha na la muih cih oh; nanning kha kae hopya vae oh,” a cipya`ae.
40028008	Te nopi`ae tuh ribiate, lungtuanaw alepi te shaw kyate arangte cceih`ae zah a zuitu`ae kha tuh-e thungpang hopya khylan a ccue`ae.
40028009	Te a zuitu`ae kha hopya khylan a ccia`ae lyakhe, dotua, Jesu nynh minmin kha cciadue`ae zah, “Nae lungtua sah!” a ci. Te minmin nynh amaw kalan thua`ae zah a ccu kha pum`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae.
40028010	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rih nan oh; cceih oh lah ka neitapaw`ae kha Galilee lang a ccia ccaw`ae la hopah oh, tuin kya minmin nynh kamaw kha oun muih cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
40028011	Atu tuh-e nopi`ae a ccia`ae lyakhe, dotua, shaw ngawtu`ae abang nynh khuapi lungkhu lang oun thua`ae zah acyihkuh paw uccaw balyn kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan a hopya`ae.
40028012	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae tuh piccang`ae ryte sueluakuh`ae zah khuakhan`ae koute rhawkaw`ae kha phua patae pya`ae zah,
40028013	“Nanning nynh, ‘Kae itheih lya khuazi khe a zuitu`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah a rhua kha phe a ru`ae,’ nae ci cih oh.
40028014	Te hynh-e kong ram uktu nynh yn thae ze amaw kha kae soihbia cih zah nanning kha kae khynsah cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
40028015	Tukeiccu minmin nynh phua kha lawkuh`ae zah a ccangpya`ae thyhte a cyi`ae; te hynh-e bya tuh Jew`ae laku atunin cia po pazaekuh lan a ho ung`ae.
40028016	Oute zuitu luhaw laekheit tuh Galilee ram lang Jesu nynh a tawsya`ae paw mua muakheit kalan a cceih`ae.
40028017	Te amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh minmin nynh amaw kha a beik`ae; thuasalama abang tuh mih lunghiin.
40028018	Te Jesu nynh yn thua zah, “Vaawran kya te laephi vawlan kawhoinaw balyn tuh kamaw hynh pya athua vae.
40028019	Tukeiccu nanning la cceih oh lah minphuin`ae balyn kha zuitu`ae lang la rae oh, minmin kha Paaw, Ccapaw te Thyaa Muisaw min kya baptisma-insah oh.
40028020	Nanning kaw kae pyasya oh paw balyn kha a zui nawlan`ae la ccangpah oh; te dotua oh, laephi she athangnaw cia kae tuh nae kya tyty ka um,” cite a zuitu`ae kha a hopya`ae. Amen.
41001001	Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri thehoypaw athotakawnaw.
41001002	Profeh`ae ccauh kya, “Dotua, na ccianaw a paccyn cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw.
41001003	Rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha paccynpah oh, a laanpi kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ a ci,” cite azeiku hawte;
41001004	Johan nynh rangkaw khe baptisma insah`ae zah seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha a ho.
41001005	Te Judah ram um`ae paw balyn te Jerusalem kya um`ae paw balyn tuh Johan kalan oun cceih`ae zah mih seinaw`ae phykute Jordan Vaw khe amaw kya marya baptisma in`ae.
41001006	Te Johan tuh kalauk ming te rae paw uccaw kha lawkuh zah a tae kyakhe saving taesung kha a sungkuh, te tungkhipaw`ae te rangkaw e khoitui kha nynh a ae.
41001007	Te aning nynh, “Kae laeze athung huapaw kamaw koute yn thua cih, tuh-e paw ccukoh rui kha bakhungnua lan zah phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh.
41001008	Kae nynh nanning kha tui kya baptisma kae insah ccaccing oh, thuasalama aning nynh tuh Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma ae insah cih oh,” cite phung a ho.
41001009	Ou tuhte tuin nin`ae kyakhe Galilee pee Nazareth khua kyate Jesu yn thua zah Jordan vaw kyakhe Johan nynh baptisma a insah.
41001010	Te tui lungkhu te ccahe yn pou tuh vaawran ahungkuhpaw kha muih zah Muisaw nynh vafu hawte amaw tungvaw khe yn ccuh.
41001011	Te vaawran kyate roi ccangkheit yn ccae zah, “Nang tuh na kya ka lungrythuapaw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
41001012	Te vaekheihmawte Muisaw nynh Jesu kha rangkaw langkhe a cciakhae.
41001013	Te Jesu tuh rangkaw khe nin sungpali um zah Setan nynh a tuh-ou; te rangsaw`ae ryte umkheih`ae zah vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh a dooih`ae.
41001014	Atu Johan kha thung a sah kou`ae te, Jesu tuh Pachia peenaw thehoypaw kha hote, Galilee pee lungkhu lang yn thua zah,
41001015	“Accyh phe accing vae, te Pachia peenaw tuh anae vae, nanning ngaesikuh oh lah thehoypaw hynh zyn oh,” a ci.
41001016	Te Galilee Rili pe Jesu po a cceih tuh, Simon te a neitaw Andru nynh rili lungkhu mia vua`ae paw kha a muih, pawccecize minmin tuh ngasaw kyngtu`ae nynh thua`ae.
41001017	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kamaw oun zui oh lah nanning kha ccungccaw kyngtu`ae lang kae rae cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
41001018	Te vaekheihmawte minmin nynh mih mia kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
41001019	Te tuin kyate rakyh asawnaw lang he thua tuh, kohlung lungkhu mih mia a thue cciamang`ae paw, Zebedi ccapaw James te a neitaw Johan kha Jesu nynh a muih`ae.
41001020	Te minmin kha palou a ko`ae; te minmin nynh a hoh`ae paw ryalawpatu`ae ryte mih paaw Zebedi kha kohlung kya cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
41001021	Te minmin tuh Kapernaum khua lang cceih`ae zah Sabbath nin lya Jesu tuh sinakok lungkhu lang palou tee zah a ccangpya`ae.
41001022	Te a thae`ae paw tuh a ccangpyanaw kha mih ngaeangthua, pawccecize kawbya ccangpatu`ae hawte thua leite, kawhoinaw a hoi paw lukheit hawte minmin kha a ccangpya`ae keiccu nynh thua.
41001023	Atu mih sinakok kya athyaa leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccaw lukheit a um, te tuh-e paw nynh,
41001024	“Kae makhaete kae um sah! Nazareth paw Jesu, nang te kaening pawmou kae sekuh? Kaening ro khylan tou nae thua? Nang tuh hung nynh na thua cipaw kae ny, Pachia kya-e Athyaapaw Lukheit nynh na thua!” cite a sia.
41001025	Te Jesu nynh pe zah, “Yccae nan, kha-e paw lungkhu kyate toikuh,” a cipya.
41001026	Te athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh kha-e paw kha karae ho lang he a reih koute raerae sia zah kha-e paw lungkhu kyate phe a toikuh.
41001027	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E hynh paw ang mou? E hynh paw athawpaw ccangpyanaw aa mou? Pawccecize kawhoinaw te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae heize kawpya zah minmin nynh a kaw phe a ngae`ae ccarei,” cite mimaw te mimaw laku bya a khiakuh`ae.
41001028	Te vaekheihmawte a thungpang tuh Galilee pepan balyn pung apazaekuh.
41001029	Te sinakok kyate he oun pou`ae te James te Johan ryte Simon te Andru tuh inn lungkhu lang palou a tee`ae.
41001030	Thuasalama Simon a zu nung tuh ngesawling te ccih zah a ih cipaw kha minmin nynh Jesu kalan palou a hopya`ae.
41001031	Te Jesu nynh cceih zah a kuih te kyng zah a tho, te a ngesawlingpaw vaekheihmawte phe dan zah aning nynh minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
41001032	Te zete khuanin he ccah tuh, ccinaw hoi`ae paw balyn te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae.
41001033	Te khuapi balynte thuakawzung khe oun sueluakuh`ae.
41001034	Te ccinaw aphuinphuin te a ccih`ae paw patae kha dansah`ae zah raerangsaro patae a dee; te raerangsaro`ae kha bya ho lan kaw ua khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh amaw kha a ny`ae.
41001035	Te awkhua takaw khuadae maw Jesu tuh tho zah a pou, te ccungccaw um leinaw langkhe cceih zah tuin kya sawsang.
41001036	Te Simon te amaw ryte um`ae paw nynh Jesu kha a ccung`ae.
41001037	Te amaw kha he muih`ae tuh, “Ccungccaw balyn nynh nang kha ae ccung`ae,” cite amaw kha a hopya`ae.
41001038	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Anaenaw khua`ae kalan cceih oh sih, tuin kya phung ka ho ccaw, pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua,” a cipya`ae.
41001039	Te Galilee pepan balyn mih sinakok`ae kya po phungho zah raerangsaro`ae kha a dee.
41001040	Te vaethyakaepaw lukheit nynh a kalan yn thua zah a malang bakhungte, “Na ry lanze kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” cite Jesu kha a ngiaku.
41001041	Te Jesu nynh ngaethya-umsah pawte a kuih kha dyng zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Kae nynh ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya.
41001042	Te tuhte he a ho kou tuh vaekheihmawte vaethyaccinaw tuh a kyate phe toikuh zah aning tuh phe athyaa vae.
41001043	-
41001044	Te Jesu nynh, “Hung ccungccaw sanmah bya kaw kheit san la hopah nan, thuasalama la cceih lah namaw kha ranpibawi`ae kalan la dosakuh`ae, te Mawsi nynh kawpya paw kha-e silawnaw kha minmin kalan ccaekia ccangkheit lang na thyaanaw elan la rae,” cite tyntetyn lang byatawsya zah kha-e paw kha palou a saw.
41001045	Thuasalama tuh-e paw nynh cceih zah kha-e kha houh yn phy tuh kha-e thungpang kha pung pazaesaku, tukeiccu Jesu tuh khuapi lungkhu lang alangkuh lante tee kho vae khyh; thuasalama atolang rangkaw khe nynh a um vae, te mih umnaw raveih kyate ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
41002001	Te nin sosoh aro koute Jesu tuh Kapernaum khua lungkhu lang bua yn tee zah aning tuh inn lungkhu a um cipaw kha a thae`ae.
41002002	Te vaekheihmawte ccungccaw patae tuh pynkheihlan oun sueluakuh`ae, tukeiccu thuakaw kin cia umnaw um lei lan inn nynh ccung khyh`ae; te Jesu nynh minmin kha phung hopya`ae.
41002003	Te ccungccaw lupali nynh oun puih`ae paw a kuihccuchihpaw ngeccih lukheit kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae.
41002004	Te ccungccaw zapi keiccuze amaw kalan naekuh kho khyh`ae zah a umnaw luki innccukaly kha a kia`ae; te poh a uasah`ae te ngeccihpaw kha a inawpaw iphae ryte a sawbung`ae.
41002005	Jesu nynh mih zynnaw kha he a muih tuh kuihccuchihpaw kha, “Ka ccapaw, na seinaw tuh ngaethya thua vae,” a cipya.
41002006	Thuasalama tuin kya a dahung`ae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang nynh mih thinlung kya,
41002007	“E paw hynh pawccemou tuhte Pachia saryapaw bya`ae a ho? Pachia laelan hungmou seinaw a ngaethya kho?” cite a tuaku`ae.
41002008	Te Jesu nynh a thinlung kyate mih thinlung kya a tuaku`ae paw kha ccaheih he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae thinlung kya hynh-e kong tuhte na tuaku oh?
41002009	Kuihccuchihpaw ngeccihpaw kha, ‘Na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua, tukhyhze, ‘Thokuh lah na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua?
41002010	Thuasalama nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh laephi vawlan seinaw ngaethya lan kaw a hoi cipaw na ny nawlan oh,” ci zah, kuihccuchihpaw kha,
41002011	Jesu nynh, “Nang kae hopya, thokuh lah na iphae kha lawkuh lah na inn lang cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
41002012	Te vaekheihmawte aning tuh a thokuh, iphae kha lawkuh zah tuh-e`ae balyn malang khe a cceih vae, ou tuhte minmin balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “Atu e hawte kharyh kae muih boi khyh,” ci`ae zah Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
41002013	Te Jesu tuh rili kin lang bua cceih zah ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh a kalan oun thua`ae, te minmin kha a ccangpya`ae.
41002014	Te he a cceih tuh ngunto khoinaw kya a dahung paw Alfeas ccapaw Levi kha muih zah, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya. Te aning nynh thokuh zah amaw kha a zui.
41002015	Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Levi inn zete looh-aenaw kya a dahung lya, ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae patae mah Jesu te a zuitu`ae ryte pynkheihlan a koihbua`ae, pawccecize tuin kya ccungccaw patae um`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
41002016	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae ryte a aekheih`ae paw kha he muih`ae tuh minmin nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Pawcce aning nynh ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae ryte aekheih`ae zah a niakheih`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
41002017	Tuh-e bya kha Jesu nynh he thae tuh minmin kha, “Adan`ae paw nynh sibawi peki khyh`ae, thuasalama a ccih`ae paw nynh a peki`ae, kae tuh adingpaw ko khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama misei`ae nynh a ngaesiku ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua,” a cipya`ae.
41002018	Johan zuitu`ae te Farasi`ae zuitu`ae tuh looh-ae leih a sung`ae, te minmin nynh oun cceih`ae zah Jesu kha, “Pawccemou Johan zuitu`ae te Farasi`ae zuitu`ae tuh looh-ae kae sung, thuasalama nang na zuitu`ae ze sung khyh`ae rei?” a cipya`ae.
41002019	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Zudy ccangvaepaw tuh poi oun too`ae paw a uno`ae ry phang a um lya zudy poi oun too`ae paw a uno`ae nynh looh-aesung ngaw`ae ta? Zudy ccangvaepaw minmin ryte a um lungkhu balyn tuh looh-aesung lan khyh`ae.
41002020	Thuasalama zudy ccangvaepaw minmin kyate lawpya nin yn thua cih, oute tuin nin`ae kya minmin nynh looh-ae oun sung cih`ae.
41002021	“Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah athawpaw uccaw khate arynpaw uccaw kha bianah boi khyh, a bianaw lanze kha-e athawpaw nynh arynpaw kha poh laah zah houh aseikuh paleih.
41002022	Te hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah athawpaw misutui kha arynpaw misu-saving bung lungkhu lang ruin boi khyh. A ruin lanze misutui athawpaw nynh misusaving bung kha phae pawsah zah misutui azu, te misu-saving bung tuh aroh; thuasalama athawpaw misutui tuh athawpaw misu-saving bung kya nynh ruin lan accan,” a cipya`ae.
41002023	Ou tuhcihte Sabbath nin kya Jesu tuh loo kyakhe po he a cceih tuh, a cceih lalia`ae lante, a zuitu`ae nynh looh avui`ae kha a zuku`ae.
41002024	Te Farasi`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Dotua, pawccemou Sabbath nin kya kawbya nynh cyi lan a ua leipaw minmin nynh a cyi`ae,” cite a khia`ae.
41002025	Te Jesu nynh, “David nynh a vuelaw zah ahobou lya amaw ryte um`ae paw ryte paw nynh a cyi cipaw kharyh na ria boi khyh oh tou?
41002026	Ranpibawi lupi Abiathar nin ccyh lyaze Pachia inn lungkhu lang tee zah ranpibawi laelan hung nynh sanmah ae lan kawbya nynh a ua leipaw, Pachia malang nungpyapaw sanlou kha ae zah amaw ryte um`ae paw kha mah a pyabua`ae paw kha pawcihte?” cite minmin kha a khung`ae.
41002027	Te Jesu nynh, “Sabbath tuh ccungccaw hanlan nynh rae athua, te ccungccaw tuh Sabbath hanlan thua khyh.
41002028	Tukeiccu Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Sabbath Bawipaw mah athua,” a cipya`ae.
41003001	Te Jesu tuh sinakok lungkhu lang bua tee zah, tuin kya a kuih hawkheit lang achihpaw ccungccapaw lukheit a la um.
41003002	Te minmin nynh seibe khylan, Sabbath nin kyakhe kha-e paw kha yn dansah ta, yn dansah khyh ta cite amaw kha a dokhaw`ae.
41003003	Te Jesu nynh a kuih achihpaw ccungccapaw kha, “Malang yn cceih,” a cipya.
41003004	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Sabbath nin kya ahoypaw cyi lan kawbya nynh a ua tou? Tukhyhze ahoy leipaw cyi lan tou a ua? Hiinnaw kha so khum lan a ua tou? Tukhyhze chia lan tou a ua?” cite a khia`ae. Thuasalama minmin tuh daetedae lang zya um`ae.
41003005	Te thinria te minmin kha po lekuh lang he a do`ae tuh mih thinlung akhung paw elan a ngaethah zah kha-e paw kha, “Na kuih kha dyngtua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh a kuih kha dyng zah hawkheit lang hawte phe ahoy vae.
41003006	Te Farasi`ae tuh pou`ae zah Jesu kha rawsete pawtemou chia lan cipaw kha Herod ccungccaw`ae ryte vaekheihmawte khuakhanku`ae.
41003007	Thuasalama Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte rili pe lang a nuekuh`ae, te Galilee pee kyate, Judah pee kyate,
41003008	Jerusalem kyate, Idumia kyate, te Jordan vaw khuraw lang kyate ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae; te Tai khua te Sidon khua pepan um`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh Jesu nynh a cyi paw alepipaw uccaw`ae kong kha he thae`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
41003009	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha phang lungnuaku khyh nawlan`ae, kohlung ccangkheit a pe tyty nungpya lan Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha a hopya`ae.
41003010	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae a dansah`ae keiccuze ccinaw hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw kha tung khylan a kalan a tuh-eihkuh`ae.
41003011	Te athyaa leipaw muisaw bahkuh`ae paw nynh amaw kha he muih`ae tuh a malang bakhung`ae zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh na thua,” cite raerae sia`ae.
41003012	Te Jesu nynh amaw kong kha na nysah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha tyntetyn lang byatawsya`ae.
41003013	Te Jesu tuh mua vawlan kaethung zah a ry paw ccungccaw`ae kha amaw kalan khe ko`ae zah minmin tuh a kalan a thua`ae.
41003014	Te Jesu nynh luhaw laening kha amaw ryte um khylan te minmin kha phungho lan saw khylan,
41003015	ccinaw`ae dansah khylan te raerangsaro`ae a dee kho nawlan`ae kawhoinaw a mue ccaw`ae cite a khang`ae.
41003016	Tuh-e a khang`ae paw tuh: Piter cite min a phuthui paw Simon;
41003017	te Zebedi ccapaw James, te James neitaw Johan, te minmin kha Boaneke cite min a phuthui`ae, asuilan tuh, ‘Ria ccapaw`ae,’ cipaw nynh thua.
41003018	Te Andru, te Filip, Bartholomew, Matthai, Thomas, Alfeas ccapaw James, Thadde, te Kanaan khua paw Simon,
41003019	amaw pheetupaw Judas Iskaria nynh thua`ae; te minmin tuh inn lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
41003020	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh pynkheihlan bua oun thua`ae keiccu minmin tuh aepaw ae thya vae khyh`ae.
41003021	Te, “Jesu tuh a lungkyh vae khyh,” a ci`ae paw kha a vaeccaw`ae nynh he thae`ae tuh amaw kha kyng lan a cceih`ae.
41003022	Te Jerusalem khuapi kyate oun cceihbung`ae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh, “Aning tuh Beelzebub a hoi, te khozi`ae uktupaw liate nynh khozi`ae kha a dee,” a ci`ae.
41003023	Te aning nynh minmin kha amaw kalan khe ko`ae zah tousenaw phungpaw te a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Pawtemou Setan nynh Setan tuh a dee kho cih?
41003024	Te peenaw ccangkheit nynh amaw te amaw kha rawsekute a phiaku lanze kha-e peenaw tuh tyn kho lan khyh.
41003025	Te inn innkheit nynh amaw te amaw rawsekute a phiaku lanze kha-e inn tuh tyn kho lan khyh.
41003026	Te Setan nynh amaw te amaw kha rawsekuh zah a phiaku lanze tyn kho lan khyh, thuasalama phe azo cih.
41003027	Athawsaepaw ccungccapaw kha masaty khiity khyh lanze hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a inn lungkhu lang tee kho lan khyh zah a uccaw`ae kha lua kho lan khyh, a khiity ze rou nynh a inn kha a ropah kho cih.
41003028	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ccungccaw ccaaw`ae tungvaw e seinaw`ae balyn tuh ngaethya athua cih, te saryapaw bya`ae hopaw miakaw mah ngaethya athua cih.
41003029	Thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kha rawsete a saryapaw tuh seingaethyanaw mue boi lan khyh, thuasalama zungzae detahnaw accanpaw nynh thua,” a ci.
41003030	Pawccemacize minmin nynh, “Aning tuh athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh a hoi,” a ci`ae keiccu nynh thua.
41003031	Oute a nung te a neitapaw`ae oun thua`ae zah atolang khe a thadyn`ae, te a kalan ccungccaw oun saw`ae zah a kosah`ae.
41003032	Te amaw pepan a dahung`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha, “Dotua, na nung te na neitapaw`ae atolang khe nang kha ae ccung`ae,” a cipya`ae.
41003033	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Hungmou ka nung, tukhyhze hungmou ka neitapaw`ae tuh?” a ci.
41003034	Te amaw pepan a dahung`ae paw kha po do`ae zah, “Dotua oh, ka nung te ka neitapaw`ae hynh!
41003035	Pawccecize hunghung zemah Pachia rynaw a rae paw, ou tuh-e paw tuh nynh ka neitapaw, ka ccia, te ka nung athua,” a ci.
41004001	Te Jesu nynh rili pe khe bua a ccangpya`ae. Te amaw kalan ccungccaw zapi oun sueluaku`ae keiccu rili vawlan um paw kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah a dahung, te ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh rili kalan hawite varan langkhe a um`ae.
41004002	Te aning nynh tousenaw phungpaw`ae khate minmin kha patae a ccangpya`ae, te a ccangpyanaw kya minmin kha,
41004003	“Ngaetua oh! Dotua, ccaciivuatu lukheit nynh ccaciivua lan a cceih.
41004004	Ou tuhcihte he a vua tuh ccacii abang tuh laanpi pe a ccah, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah phe a tuh kou`ae.
41004005	Te abang tuh laephi azyanaw lung alungnaw lae kya a ccah; te laephi thawkalae lang a um khyh keiccuze taloi a po`ae.
41004006	Thuasalama khuanin he yn tang tuh oun naan vae`ae, te tharui a hoi khyh`ae keiccuze karae arou`ae.
41004007	Te abang tuh hingpaw`ae laku khe a ccah, te hingpaw`ae nynh lethin`ae zah kha-e kha varyn a reihde keiccuze athae thae kho khyh.
41004008	Te abang tuh laehoy kya ccah zah a po, a pungthung, te athae thae zah abang tuh leih sungthung, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, te abang tuh leih zakheit avoi,” a cipya`ae.
41004009	Te minmin kha, “Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah,” cite a hopya`ae.
41004010	Te Jesu a makhaete a um lyakhe, zuitu luhaw laening ryte amaw pe a um`ae paw nynh tousenaw phungpaw kong kha a khia`ae.
41004011	Te Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw kya-e byakhupaw ny lan nanning tuh pya na thua oh, thuasalama atolang um`ae paw tuh pawpaw balyn kha tousenaw phungpaw te nynh hopya athua;
41004012	tuhte, ‘Minmin nynh muihpaw tuh mang muih`ae zemah nyhthya khyh`ae, te thae paw tuh mang thae`ae zemah thaethya khyh`ae, tukhyh lanze minmin tuh a paleihkuh cih`ae zah mih seinaw ngaethya thua cih`ae paw,’ aciku hawte,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
41004013	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “E tousenaw phungpaw hynh na thaethya khyh oh tou? Tuhte lanze ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw`ae balyn kha pawtemou na thaethya vae cih oh?
41004014	Ccaciivuatu nynh bya kha nynh a vua.
41004015	Te laanpi pe kya vua paw bya tuh hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua: bya kha minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh Setan nynh vaekheihmawte yn cceih zah mih thinlung kya a vua`ae paw bya kha phe a lawpya`ae.
41004016	Tuhhawte lung alungnaw kya vua paw bya tuh hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua, bya kha he a thae`ae tuh lungtuate palou a lawku`ae;
41004017	te mimaw kya tharui a saw khyh keiccu sosoh rou nynh atyn. Tuhkoute bya keiccuze vawsawnaw te tuasakunaw he yn thua tuh vaekheihmawte minmin tuh phe a maeleihkuh`ae.
41004018	Te hingpaw`ae laku vua paw bya tuh hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua, minmin nynh bya kha a thae`ae,
41004019	te hynh-e laephipi e lungriathaenaw, te hoirungnaw nynh lingnaw, te ccangpaw uccaw`ae duanaw yn tee zah bya kha varyn a reihde, tetuh athae thae kho vae khyh.
41004020	Te laehoy kya vua paw bya tuh hynh-e`ae nynh thua: minmin nynh bya kha thae`ae zah a lawku`ae, te abang tuh leih sungthung, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, te abang tuh leih zakheit athae avoi,” a cipya`ae.
41004021	Te Jesu nynh, “Maeekhua tuh kee te khung khylan, tukhyhze ikhung kaw nung khylan tou oun ccyng`ae? Maee awnawpaw vawlan khang lan oun ccyng khyh`ae tou?
41004022	Pawccecize langsaku lei lante thurupaw pawsang um khyh, pawsang mah aphirute nung khopaw um khyh, thuasalama pung alangkuh cih.
41004023	Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah,” cite a hopya`ae.
41004024	Te Jesu nynh, “Na thae oh paw kha raeringkuh oh, na tounaw oh paw khate nanning kha mah toupya ru athua cih, te na thae oh paw nanning kha houh lung pya athua cih.
41004025	Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh pyachih athua cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh a hoithypaw maw kha lawpya athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
41004026	-
41004027	Te Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw tuh hynh hawte nynh thua. Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh lae kya ccacii a vua, te khuazi khe ih zah khuadae a tho. Ccacii tuh po zah a lethung, pawcihte cipaw amaw nynh a ny khyh hawkhate nynh athua.
41004028	Pawccecize laephi nynh khamawte ccathae kha a pousah; masaty adung atoih, oute avui, tuhkoute avui kya aphaw yn um.
41004029	Thuasalama aphaw he yn voi tuh aning nynh rungkou te taloi a nungde vae, pawccemacize loohrue ccyh phe azaw vae,” a ci.
41004030	Te Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw hynh pawtemou ah losakuh cih oh? Tukhyhze pawtahawpaw tousenaw phungpaw te pei touse lan oh?
41004031	Mungngia cii te nynh aloku, kha-e kha laephi kya he vua vae ze laephi kya vua paw ccacii balyn laeze adihhua.
41004032	Thuasalama he vua vae tetuh lethung zah enaw-ekan`ae balyn laeze alehua, te aran alepaw toih zah vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh a mynlyh kaw khe bu a luaku`ae,” a ci.
41004033	Te minmin nynh a thaethya`ae thyhte tuhtahawpaw tousenaw phungpaw patae khate minmin kha bya a hopya`ae.
41004034	Thuasalama tousenaw phungpaw leite minmin kha bya hopah khyh`ae, te mih makhaete um`ae lyakhe pawpaw balyn kha a zuitu`ae kha a ccaesapya`ae.
41004035	Te tuh-e nin zete he a thua tuh Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Khuraw lang khuin zua oh sih,” a cipya`ae.
41004036	Te minmin nynh ccungccaw zapi kha a cciataw`ae koute kohlung kya a umty vae paw Jesu kha a cciakhae`ae. Te ccangpaw kohlung taraw`ae mah amaw ryte a cceihbua`ae.
41004037	Te myarya arupaw khise yn tho zah tuileih nynh kohlung lungkhu lang yn thekuh tuh kohlung kya tui phe abeih.
41004038	Te Jesu tuh kohlung alu langsang, lungngya ngyate a ih, te minmin nynh tho`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, aening ah chih vae cih oh, pawlangria leite tou na ung cih?” a cipya`ae.
41004039	Te Jesu nynh thokuh zah khisang kha a pe, te rili kha, “Dae, zyadae ccavae!” a cipya. Te khisang tuh dae zah kyaatekyaa vae.
41004040	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou hynhcih balang na ri oh? Pawccemou zynnaw na hoi khyh oh?” a cipya`ae.
41004041	Te minmin tuh myaryamaw rih`ae zah, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw mou? Khisang te rili nynh heize a kawngae`ae!” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
41005001	Te minmin tuh rili khuraw lang Kadarene ram lungkhu lang oun thua`ae.
41005002	Te Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu te he toikuh tuh athyaa leipaw muisaw bakuhpaw ccungccapaw nynh vaekheihmawte shawku kyate yn pou zah Jesu te a tungkuh`ae.
41005003	Tuh-e paw a umnaw tuh shawku`ae laku thua zah hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah sivarui te khii kho khyh`ae.
41005004	Pawccemacize aning tuh tunglua saw`ae zah sivarui te pei khii`ae zemah sivarui kha thoh pae zah tunglua kha palae tui lang leih a khya; hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ngaesah kho khyh.
41005005	Te khuazi khuadae shawku kya te mua`ae kyakhe pei um zah raerae siate amaw te amaw kha lung`ae te leih a tyaku he.
41005006	Thuasalama asawpi te Jesu kha he a muih tuh a kalan ccue zah amaw kha a beik.
41005007	Te raerae sia zah, “Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia Ccapaw Jesu, nang kha paw kae cyi mou? Kae hynh vawsaw nae pya khyh nawlan Pachia min te bya yn kinpakuh,” a cipya.
41005008	Pawccecize Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Nang athyaa leipaw muisaw, ccungccapaw kyate yn pou,” cite phe a cipya vae keiccu nynh thua.
41005009	Te Jesu nynh, “Na min hungmou?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh khung zah, “Ka min tuh Legion nynh thua, pawccecize kaening tuh patae kae cih,” a cipya.
41005010	Te tuh-e ram kyate asawnaw lang minmin kha a dee khyh`ae ccaw cite aning nynh Jesu kha thawte a ngia.
41005011	Atu tuin pe mua vawlan rangpaekuh`ae paw, myarya alungpaw voh phu a um.
41005012	Te raerangsaro`ae balyn nynh, “Voh`ae lungkhu lang kae tee ccaw minmin kalan oun saw,” cite Jesu kha a ngiaku`ae.
41005013	Te vaekheihmawte Jesu nynh minmin kha pounawkaw pya`ae. Te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tuh cceih`ae zah voh`ae lungkhu lang a tee`ae, te voh phu tuh rili kin apangnaw lang thawte ccuebung`ae zah rili kya pung phungkuh`ae; voh`ae tuh thungning loukaw acih`ae.
41005014	Te voh a laetu`ae tuh ccue`ae zah kha-e kong kha khuapi kya te khua taraw lang balyn a ho`ae. Te ccungccaw`ae tuh tuh-e acyikuh paw kha do khylan a cceih`ae.
41005015	Te Jesu kya he thua`ae tuh raerangsaro bahkuh zah legion a hoi paw ccungccapaw nynh uccaw lawkuh zah a lungkyh lante a dahung paw kha he muih`ae tuh a rih`ae.
41005016	Te kha-e a muih`ae paw nynh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw kya pawte nynh acyikuh cipaw te voh`ae kya acyikuh paw kha minmin a hopya`ae.
41005017	Te minmin nynh mih khua mih ram kyate a pou nawlan Jesu kha a ngia`ae.
41005018	Te Jesu nynh kohlung lungkhu lang he a tee tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw ccungccapaw nynh amaw kya umbua lan a ngiaku.
41005019	Tuhzemah Jesu nynh ua khyh, thuasalama amaw kha, “Na ban`ae kalan inn lang la cceih lah na hanlan Bawipaw nynh pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae nynh ae cyipya cipaw te na tungvaw ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi paw kha la hopah`ae,” a cipya.
41005020	Te aning nynh cceih zah Jesu nynh pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a hanlan a cyipya cipaw kha Dekapolis ram kyakhe a ho vae, te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua.
41005021	Te Jesu tuh kohlung te ccangpaw khuraw lang bua zua zah rili pe a um lyakhe ccungccaw patae tuh amaw kalan oun sueluakuh`ae.
41005022	Te dotua, sinakok uktu`ae lakuze lukheit, a min Jairu cikuh paw nynh yn thua zah Jesu kha he a muih tuh a ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah,
41005023	“Ka ccanung taraw vyavya a chih, a dan ccaw, a hiin ccaw, rang lah a tungvaw na kuih beih yn khang,” cite thawte a ngia.
41005024	Te Jesu tuh tuh-e paw ryte cceih`ae zah ccungccaw patae nynh zui`ae zah amaw kha phang lungnuaku`ae.
41005025	Te kum haw laening cia chii lua ccinaw a hoi paw nopinung lukheit tuh,
41005026	sibawi patae kyate pataepi teing zah a hoi paw balyn pung a thangku zemah kharyh hoyhua khyh, thuasalama houh acihhua.
41005027	Kha-e nung nynh Jesu kong he a thae tuh ccungccazaw laku nuhlang te yn cceih zah Jesu boei kha a hae.
41005028	Pawccecize aning nynh, “A boei kha ka hae lanze phe ka dan cih,” a ciku.
41005029	Te vaekheihmawte a chii luapaw tuh phe akang, te a pyn kya tuh-e ccinaw kyate phe ka dan vae cipaw a nyku.
41005030	Te Jesu nynh amaw kyate thungnaw a pou cipaw ccahe a nyh tuh ccungccaw zapi kalan maeleihkuh zah, “Hungmou ka boei a hae?” a ci.
41005031	Te a zuitu`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw zapi nynh phang ae lungnuaku`ae paw mang na muih pite, ‘Hungmou yn hae?’ na ci,” a cipya`ae.
41005032	Te kha-e a cyih paw kha muih khylan Jesu nynh a pepan khe a do.
41005033	Thuasalama nopinung nynh a kya acyikuh paw kha nyte rih zah thyngkute Jesu kalan khe cceih zah a malang khe bakhung zah acyikuh paw balyn kha hmerarihlan a hopya.
41005034	Te Jesu nynh, “Ka ccanung na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae, daebabilan la cceih lah na ccinaw kyate dan ccavae,” a cipya.
41005035	Tuhte a ho cciamang lyakhe, sinakok uktupaw inn kyate ccungccaw yn thua zah, “Na ccanung kha phe chih vae, pawccemou Ccangpatupaw hynh vawsaw na pya ry ung?” cite sinakok uktu kha a cipya.
41005036	Tuh-e bya kha Jesu nynh ccahe a thae tuh sinakok uktupaw kha, “Rih nan, zyn kyalya zyn,” a cipya.
41005037	Te Jesu nynh Piter, James te James neitaw Johan laelan hung ccungccaw sanmah amaw zuibua lan ua khyh`ae.
41005038	Te sinakok uktupaw inn lang he a thua tuh siarisiarae um`ae paw, te thawte a rah`ae paw te a khui`ae paw kha a muih.
41005039	Te a lungkhu lang tee zah minmin kha, “Pawccemou siarisiarae na um oh zah na raw oh? Imohnung tuh chih khyh, thuasalama a ih,” a cipya`ae.
41005040	Te minmin nynh saryate a nuinse`ae. Thuasalama minmin balyn kha he a pousah`ae koute imohnung a paaw te a nung, te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw ry imohnung a inaw langkhe a tee`ae.
41005041	Te imohnung kha a kuih te kyng zah, “Talitha, kumi,” cite a hopya; tuh-e asuilan tuh, “Imohnung taraw, thokuh kae cipya,” cipaw nynh thua.
41005042	Te vaekheihmawte imohnung tuh thokuh zah a cceih, pawccecize aning tuh kum haw laening acih vae paw nynh thua. Te minmin tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaeangthua.
41005043	Te kha-e kong kha hung sanmah a nysah khyh nawlan`ae minmin kha tyntetyn lang byatawsya`ae; te kha-e nung a ae lan ccangkhakheit pya oh cite a hopya`ae.
41006001	Te Jesu tuh tuin kyate cceih zah amaw a khua lang a thua, te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
41006002	Te Sabbath nin he a thua tuh sinakok kya a ccangpya`ae, te a thae`ae paw ccungccaw patae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E uccaw`ae hynh e paw nynh paw kyate mou a mue? Aning nynh a mue paw e hawnaw tuh pawtecihpaw hawnaw mou? Hynhcih athungpaw ryalaw`ae heize a kuih te a cyi kho rei!
41006003	E paw tuh Meri Ccapaw, lehccamapaw, James, Joses, Judah te Simon mih upaw kha thua khyh tou? Te a ccia`ae tuh aening ryte e kya a um`ae paw kha thua khyh tou?” cite a ho`ae. Te minmin tuh a kya mih lungroh.
41006004	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Profeh lukheit tuh amaw a ram kya, amaw vaeccaw`ae laku te amaw innbyn kya holeite tuh sawtua leite um khyh`ae,” a cipya`ae.
41006005	Te tuin kya ngeccih`ae abang tungvaw a kuih khang zah a dansah`ae paw laelan athungpaw ryalaw lah kho vae khyh.
41006006	Te a zyn leinaw`ae keiccu Jesu a ngaeangthua. Te tuin pepan e khua`ae kalan cceih zah a ccangpya`ae.
41006007	Te zuitu luhaw laening kha ko`ae zah luning luning ccite minmin kha a saw`ae; te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tungvaw thungnaw kha a pya`ae.
41006008	Te mih khuaccungnaw kya hoitang ccangkheit laelan pawpaw sanmah ccyngku lei lan; sohrae, sanlou phuku lei lan, phuabu kya phua sangku lei lan;
41006009	thuasalama phanah nawku lan, te angkiccua zung ning kiku lei lan kawpya`ae.
41006010	Te minmin kha, “Teitei hmin kya zemah inn innkheit lungkhu lang na tee vae oh ze, kha-e hmin kyate na pou makhia oh kha-e inn kyakhe la um oh.
41006011	Te hunghung zemah nanning kha innccung ae doih oh zah nae bya a ngae khyh`ae ze, tuin kyate he na pou oh te, minmin rawsetu ccaekia lang nae ccu kaw-e vuiping kha la pheihkuh oh. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, byapia nin kya tuh-e khuapi hanlan laeze Sodom te Komorah khua hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih!” a cipya`ae.
41006012	Te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah ccungccaw`ae tuh ngaesiku lan accan cite phungho`ae.
41006013	Te minmin nynh raerangsaro patae dee`ae zah accihpaw patae kha chitui thuhpah`ae zah a dansah`ae.
41006014	Te Jesu tuh a min athaan keiccuze Herod Siapharan nynh amaw kong kha thae zah, “Baptisma pyatu Johan nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui vae, tukeiccu nynh thungnaw`ae amaw kya alangku,” a ci.
41006015	Mingccang`ae nynh, “Elijah nynh thua,” a ci`ae. Te mingccang`ae nynh, “Profeh nynh thua, tukhyhze profeh lukheit hawte nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
41006016	Thuasalama Herod nynh he a thae tuh, “Aning tuh a lu ka paesah`ae paw Johan nynh thua, a chih`ae paw kyate phe a thothui vae,” a ci.
41006017	Pawccecize Herod nynh a neitapaw Filip zu, Herodia kha a zu lang phe a lawku keiccuze ccungccaw saw zah Johan kha kyngsahte khiisah`ae zah thung a sawsah`ae.
41006018	Pawccecize Johan nynh Herod kha, “Na neitapaw zu tuh na lawku lan ccan khyh,” cite phe a hopya vae.
41006019	Tukeiccu Herodia nynh Johan kha lung-umtungpah zah phe chia lan a ry; thuasalama theih kho khyh.
41006020	Pawccecize Johan tuh adingpaw te athyaapaw ccungccaw nynh thua cipaw kha Herod nynh nyh zah a raw a rih; te amaw kha a pangkhaw. Te a bya kha he a ngae vae ze, uccaw patae a rae; te a bya kha lungtuate a ngae.
41006021	Te Herod nynh a puinin kya a ccungccaw bapihua`ae, rhawbawi`ae te Galilee pee-e a lesae`ae paw elan loohdangnaw kha he a rae tuh Herodia hanlan ccyhhoy yn thua vae.
41006022	Herodia ccanung nynh tee zah he yn law tuh Herod te amaw ryte a dahungkheih`ae paw kha mih lungrythuasah`ae zah Herod nynh liaccanung kha, “Na ry paw miakaw yn ngiakuh lah kae pya cih,” a cipya.
41006023	Te, “Nae ngiakupaw miakaw kae pya cih, ka peenaw akhankuh cia heize kae pya cih,” cite kha-e nung kha byakinpyaku.
41006024	Te kha-e nung nynh toikuh zah a nung kha, “Pawmou ka ngiakuh cih?” cite a khia. Te a nung nynh, “Baptisma pyatu Johan a lu kha ngiakuh,” a cipya.
41006025	Te vaekheihmawte siapharan kalan rangsakute yn tee zah, “Baptisma pyatu Johan a lu kha pakephepaw te atumaw yn pya ci nynh ka ry,” cite a ngiaku.
41006026	Te siapharan tuh myaryasangkae a ngaethah, tuhzemah a byakinkupaw keiccu te amaw ryte a dahungkheih`ae paw keiccuze kha-e nung kha ei ry vae khyh.
41006027	Te siapharan nynh ccungccaw theihtu kha palou saw zah Johan lu thuakhae lan kaw a pya, te tuh-e paw nynh cceih zah thunginn kyakhe Johan lu kha a pae.
41006028	Te a lu kha pakephepaw kya yn ccyng zah liaccanung kha a pya; te liaccanung nynh kha-e kha a nung kalan a pya.
41006029	Te kha-e kong Johan zuitu`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh oun cceih`ae zah a rhua kha laah`ae zah shaw kya a ccy`ae.
41006030	Te locceihtu`ae nynh Jesu kalan oun sueluakuh`ae zah a cyi`ae paw te a ccangpya`ae paw balyn kha a hopya`ae.
41006031	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nae makhaete rangpakaw lang rang oh lah sosoh hae-ung oh,” a cipya`ae; pawccecize a tee paw te a pou paw ccungccaw myarya lung`ae zah minmin tuh aenaw ccyh san hoi khyh`ae.
41006032	Te minmin tuh mih makhaete rangpakaw lang kohlung te phe a pou`ae.
41006033	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin a pou`ae paw kha muih`ae zah amaw cipaw kha he nyh`ae tuh khua takyh kyate mih ccu te oun ccue`ae zah locceihtu`ae kha phe thoih`ae zah Jesu kalan pynkheihlan pung oun thua`ae.
41006034	Te Jesu nynh he pou zah ccungccaw zapi kha a muih`ae tuh minmin kha ngaethya-umsah`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh tuuringtu a hoi leipaw tuu`ae hawte athua`ae keiccu nynh thua; te minmin kha patae a ccangpya`ae.
41006035	Te khuazi lan he cih tuh, a zuitu`ae nynh a kalan oun cceih`ae zah, “E kya tuh rangkaw thua zah atu khua yn zi vae cih.
41006036	E ccungccaw`ae nynh hynh loukaw khua taraw`ae te khua`ae kalan cceih`ae sah lah mimaw elan sanlou a reku ccaw`ae minmin hynh saw`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh ae lanpaw hoi khyh`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
41006037	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Nanning nynh minmin kha ae lanpaw pya oh,” a ci. Te minmin nynh, “Kae cceih cih zah denari phuapia zaning mee sanlou kae re cih zah tetou minmin ae lan kae pya cih`ae?” cite a khung`ae.
41006038	Jesu nynh, “Sanlou hozeihmou na hoi oh? Cceih oh lah dotua oh,” a ci. Te minmin nynh he a nyh`ae te, “Sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning,” a ci`ae.
41006039	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha lonua ahinpaw vawlan aphuphu te dahungsah lan minmin kha kaw a pya`ae.
41006040	Te ccungccaw`ae tuh zakheit phu, sungpangaw phu, cite aphuphu te a dahung`ae.
41006041	Te Jesu nynh sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning kha laah zah vaawran lang dothung zah hythua a pya, te sanlou`ae kha eih zah ccungccaw`ae malang nyapya lan a zuitu`ae kha a pya`ae, te ngasaw zawning kha minmin balyn pung a nee`ae.
41006042	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh ae`ae zah phe byn`ae.
41006043	Te minmin nynh ngasaw te sanlou a eihpaw kha kee haw laening phe beih lang a khuin`ae.
41006044	Te sanlou a ae`ae paw tuh pise thungpangaw loukaw acih`ae.
41006045	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi a saw lya`ae khe, a zuitu`ae kha vaekheihte kohlung kya ccisakuh`ae zah khuraw lang-e Bethsaida khua lang amaw malang a cciasaty`ae.
41006046	Te minmin kha he a saw`ae koute Jesu tuh sawsang lan mua langkhe a cceih.
41006047	Te zete he a thua tuh kohlung tuh rili ngaelung kya um zah Jesu tuh a makhaete laerou kya nynh a um.
41006048	Te khisang nynh arawsekuh lante azaw keiccu zuitu`ae nynh thawte kohlung a zaw`ae paw kha a muih; te khuazi santari ccyhpalinaw loukaw khe minmin pe po ccia lan cite mih kalan rili vawlan khe a cceih.
41006049	Thuasalama minmin nynh rili vawlan a ccia paw kha he muih`ae tuh khozi nynh thua cite tua`ae zah raerae sia`ae.
41006050	Pawccecize minmin balyn nynh amaw kha muih`ae zah a rih`ae. Te Jesu nynh bya hopah kanmaw`ae zah minmin kha, “Nae thinphang nan sah! Kamaw nynh ka thua, rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
41006051	Te kohlung lungkhu lang minmin kalan khe kaebua zah khisang tuh phe adae; te minmin tuh ho kho um lei lan mih ngaeangthua zah mih khuaruaru.
41006052	Pawccecize mih thinlung akhung keiccuze sanlou kya a langsakupaw kha minmin nynh thaethya khyh`ae.
41006053	Te minmin tuh khuraw he zua`ae te, Kenesaret ram lungkhu lang thua`ae zah varan langkhe kohlung kha a thadynsah`ae.
41006054	Te kohlung kyate he oun pou`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha taloi a ny`ae.
41006055	Te tuin pepan ram balyn po ccue`ae zah Jesu a um cite a thaenaw`ae langkhe ngeccih`ae kha iphae te a puih`ae.
41006056	Te Jesu a teenaw khua`ae, khuapi`ae te khua taraw lang ngeccih`ae kha kungkunaw hmin kya nung`ae zah minmin nynh a boei dung sankaw kha a hae ccaw`ae cite amaw kha a ngia`ae; te kha-e a hae paw miakaw tuh a dan`ae.
41007001	Oute Farasi`ae te Jerusalem kyate oun cceih`ae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang tuh Jesu kalan pynkheihlan oun thua`ae.
41007002	Jesu zuitu`ae abang nynh anungsikuhpaw athua paw, kuih singku leite sanlou a ae`ae paw kha he muih`ae tuh mih seinaw a muihpya`ae.
41007003	Pawccecize langmaw-e piccang`ae phung zuite Farasi`ae te Jew`ae balyn tuh mih kuih singku leite tuh ae khyh`ae.
41007004	Te kungkunaw hmin kyate oun ki`ae vae ze, a singku khyh`ae ze ae khyh`ae. Te banang`ae singpaw, ang`ae singpaw, sohin angphe`ae singpaw, te dahungnawpaw singpaw tahawpaw a zui`ae paw ccangpaw patae a um.
41007005	Oute Farasi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou na zuitu`ae nynh langmaw-e piccang`ae phung thyhte zui leite kuih singku leite sanlou a ae`ae?” cite Jesu kha a khia`ae.
41007006	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Thyaruh`ae nanning konglang Isaiah nynh hmerarihlan a hosya vae; ‘E ccungccaw`ae nynh mih mung te kamaw kha saw oun tua`ae, thuasalama mih thinlung tuh kamaw kyate asawkuh.
41007007	Ccungccaw`ae kya-e kawpyapaw kha doctrine lang ccangpyate kamaw kha accakaepaw kya oun beik`ae,’ cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
41007008	“Pawccecize nanning nynh Pachia kawpyapaw kha na vua oh zah ang`ae, banang`ae singpaw ccungccaw`ae phung kha na zui oh zah khahtahawpaw ccangpaw patae kha na cyi oh,” a cipya`ae.
41007009	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Naemaw nae phung na zui nawlan oh, Pachia kawpyapaw kha phe na vua ccaccing oh.
41007010	Pawccecize Mawsi nynh, ‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua’; te, ‘Hunghung zemah paaw, tukhyhze nung thyalah paw tuh chia thua sah,’ a ci.
41007011	Thuasalama nanning nynh, ‘Ccungccaw lukheit nynh a paaw, tukhyhze a nung kha, “Kamaw liate na mue lanpaw bawngnaw tuh Korban nynh thua,” a ci,’ lanze, (tuh-e tuh Pachia hanlan lasung cipaw nynh thua),
41007012	kha-e paw kha a paaw hanlan, tukhyhze a nung hanlan pawsang mah na cyisah vae khyh oh.
41007013	Tuhcihte po na lawku oh paw nae phung liate Pachia bya kha pawlang um lei lan na rae oh; te nanning nynh khahtahawpaw patae na cyi oh,” a cipya`ae.
41007014	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha a kalan ko`ae zah minmin kha, “Lu raveih nynh ka bya hynh ngae oh lah thaethya oh:
41007015	Ccungccaw a nungsisakuh khopaw atolang kyate ccungccaw lungkhu lang a tee paw pawsang um khyh; thuasalama ccungccaw lungkhu kyate a pou paw uccaw`ae nynh ccungccaw kha a nungsisaku kho.
41007016	Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah,” a cipya`ae.
41007017	Te ccungccaw zapi kyate inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh, a zuitu`ae nynh tousenaw phungpaw kong kha a khia`ae.
41007018	Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning so thaethya leite tou na umbua oh? Atolang kyate ccungccaw lungkhu lang a tee paw pawpaw uccaw nynh mah ccungccaw tuh thusah kho khyh cipaw na thaethya khyh oh tou?
41007019	Pawccemacize atolang e tuh a thinlung lungkhu lang tee khyh, thuasalama vue lungkhu lang nynh a tee; te aepaw balyn kha thyaasah zah ia-inn lungkhu lang po a cceih cipaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou?” cite a hopya`ae.
41007020	Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw lungkhu kyate a pou paw nynh ccungccaw tuh a nungsisaku.
41007021	Pawccecize ahoy leipaw tuanaw, milae zu seikhaenaw, ohhuakunaw, ccungccaw chianaw,
41007022	runaw, karangkunaw, hoyleinaw, lingnaw, nungsikunaw, seirynaw mitdae, thethyahonaw, tansakunaw, ngaeenaw`ae tuh ccungccaw thinlung lungkhu kyate nynh oun pou.
41007023	E ahoy leipaw uccaw`ae balyn tuh lungkhu lante oun pou zah ccungccaw a nungsisaku,” a ci.
41007024	Te Jesu tuh tuin kyate thokuh zah Tai te Sidon ram lang a cceih. Te inn innkheit lungkhu lang a tee paw kha hung ccungccaw san nysah ry khyh; thuasalama thurukuh kho khyh.
41007025	Pawccecize athyaa leipaw muisaw a hoi paw liaccaw taraw a nung nynh Jesu kong thae zah a kalan oun cceih zah a ccu leihpaw khe a bakhung.
41007026	Nopinung tuh Greek nung, Siria Finisia ram kya a pui nung nynh thua; te a ccanung kyate raerangsaro kha a deepya ccaw cite Jesu kha banban a ngia.
41007027	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Ccaaw`ae masaty bynhin`ae sah; pawccecize ccaaw`ae looh kha law lan zah ui taraw`ae vuapya lan ccan khyh,” a cipya.
41007028	Te nopinung nynh, “Athua, Bawipaw; tuhzemah ccaaw`ae nynh a hei`ae paw loohmoi kha ui`ae nynh ccaboi kaw te leih a ae`ae,” cite a ci.
41007029	Te Jesu nynh, “E na hopaw na bya keiccu la cceih ccavae, na ccanung kyate raerangsaro phe a pou vae,” a cipya.
41007030	Te tuh-e nung nynh a inn lang he a thua tuh, raerangsaro phe a pou paw te a ccanung tuh ikhung vawlan a i paw kha a muih.
41007031	Te Tai te Sidon ram kyate bua pou zah Jesu tuh Dekapolis ram kya po a cceih, te Galilee Rili lang a thua.
41007032	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh a nawpang zah bya a ho kho leipaw ccungccapaw kha a kalan oun cciakhae`ae zah a tungvaw khe a kuih khang lan a ngia`ae.
41007033	Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha ccungccaw zapi kyate toikhaekuh zah a kuihdung kha a nakaring lungkhu lang a pu, te a tuinthoi zah a lae kha a tungpya.
41007034	Te vaawran lang dothung zah a hy puin a saw; te kha-e paw kha, “Effatha,” a cipya. Asuilan tuh, “Ua ccavae sah,” cipaw nynh thua.
41007035	Te vaekheihmawte a nakaring ua zah a laezan ne zah ccaepapeih lang bya a ho vae.
41007036	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha kha-e kong hung ccungccaw san a hopya khyh nawlan`ae bya a tawsya`ae; thuasalama minmin kha ho lei lan bya houh taw`ae zemah minmin nynh houh a phy paleih`ae.
41007037	Te ho kho um lei lan mih ngaeangthua zah, “Aning nynh pawpaw balyn kou hoy lang a rae; a nawpangpaw naw phe thaesah zah bya ho kho leipaw bya phe a hosah kho,” a ci`ae.
41008001	Tuin nin`ae kya, ccungccaw tuh myarya lung`ae zah ae lanpaw pawsang hoi khyh`ae, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha a kalan ko`ae zah minmin kha,
41008002	“Ccungccaw zapi hynh ngaethya ka umsah`ae, pawccemacize minmin tuh kamaw ryte atu nin thung po um vae`ae zah, ae lanpaw hoi khyh`ae.
41008003	Te ae leite mimaw inn lang ka saw`ae ze laanpi kya phe baw cih`ae, pawccecize minmin lakuze abang tuh asawnaw langte oun thua`ae paw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
41008004	Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “E rangkaw kyahin hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou ccungccaw lukheit nynh sanlou phe byn lan`ae a dang kho cih?” cite a khung`ae.
41008005	Te Jesu nynh, “Sanlou phe hozeihmou na hoi oh?” cite khia`ae zah minmin nynh, “Phe sari,” a ci`ae.
41008006	Te ccungccaw zapi`ae kha lae vawlan dahung lan kaw a pya`ae; te sanlou phe sari kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute sanlou kha eih zah mih malang nyapya lan a zuitu`ae kha a pya`ae; te minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae malang a nyapya`ae.
41008007	Te minmin tuh ngasaw taraw mah ccapyh hoi`ae zah hythua a pya koute mih malang nyapya lan a hopya`ae.
41008008	Te minmin tuh ae`ae zah phe a byn`ae, te a eihpaw alaepaw kha khuin`ae zah alepaw kee kaw sari acih.
41008009	Te a ae`ae paw ccungccaw tuh thungpali loukaw acih; oute minmin kha a saw`ae.
41008010	Te vaekheihmawte a zuitu`ae ryte kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Dalmanutha ram lang a thua`ae.
41008011	Te Farasi`ae tuh oun pou`ae zah Jesu ryte bya eikuh`ae zah amaw kha syntaw khylan vaawran kyate muihsanaw a ngia`ae.
41008012	Te a muisaw kya a hy puin saw zah, “Pawccepei e ciihan nynh muihsanaw hynh a ccung? Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, e ciihan kalan pawpaw muihsanaw sanmah pya thua lan khyh,” a ci.
41008013	Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah kohlung lungkhu lang bua tee zah ccanglang khuraw lang a pou.
41008014	Atu zuitu`ae nynh sanlou phuku lan phe ning`ae zah kohlung kya minmin nynh sanlou ccangkheit laelan hoi vae khyh`ae.
41008015	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Farasi`ae ransi te Herod ransi kha do oh lah raeringkuh oh,” cite byatawsya`ae.
41008016	Te minmin nynh, “Aening sanlou ah hoi khyh oh keiccu nynh e hynh a ho,” cite mimaw te mimaw kya a hoku`ae.
41008017	Te Jesu nynh kha-e kha he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Sanlou na hoi khyh oh keiccuze, pawccemou tuhte na hoku oh? Na muihthya loh khyh oh tou? Na thaethya loh khyh oh tou? Nae thinlung tuh phang akhung ung tou?
41008018	Mit phang na hoi oh pite na muih khyh oh tou? Te nakaring phang na hoi oh pite na thae khyh oh tou? Te na syntaw vae khyh oh tou?
41008019	Ccungccaw thungpangaw hanlan sanlou phe pangaw ka ia lyakha, a eihpaw kee hozeihmou phe beih lang na khuin oh?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kee haw laening,” a ci`ae.
41008020	“Te ccungccaw thungpali halan sanlou phe sari ka ia lyakha so, a eihpaw kha kee lepaw phe beih lante hozeihmou na khuin oh?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Kee sari,” a ci`ae.
41008021	Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou e hynh na thaethya khyh oh?” a cipya`ae.
41008022	Te Jesu tuh Bethsaida lang a thua, te mitmohpaw kha a kalan oun cciakhae`ae zah khae paw kha a hae ccaw cite a ngia`ae.
41008023	Te mitmohpaw kha a kuih te kyng zah khua kyate a toikhaekuh koute a mit kha thoi zah a tungvaw a kuih he a khang te, ngaw na muih vae ta cite a khia.
41008024	Te aning nynh dothung zah, “Ccungccaw`ae thingku hawte a ccia`ae paw ka muih,” a ci.
41008025	Tuhkoute a kuih kha a mit tungvaw bua khang zah ngaw a dosah. Te aning tuh amaw thathyh lang phe dan zah ccungccaw miakaw kha ccaerarihlan a muih vae.
41008026	Te Jesu nynh, “Khua lungkhu lang la tee nan, e hynh khua lungkhu hung sanmah la hopah nan,” cite hopah zah a inn lang a saw.
41008027	Te Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte Sisaria Filipi khua`ae kalan cceih`ae zah laanpi kyakhe a zuitu`ae kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh kae hynh hung oun ci`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae.
41008028	Te minmin nynh, “Abang nynh baptisma pyatu Johan ae ci`ae; abang nynh Elijah ae ci`ae; te mingccang`ae nynh profeh lukhakheit ae ci`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
41008029	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama nanning nynh so kae hynh hung nae ci oh mou?” cite a khia`ae. Te Piter nynh, “Nang tuh Kri nynh na thua,” a ci.
41008030	Te Jesu nynh amaw kong kha hung sanmah na hopah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha tyntetyn lang bya a taw`ae.
41008031	Te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh uccaw patae yn teing hahe cih zah piccang`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh oun vua cih`ae zah chia athua cih, te nin thungnaw kya yn thothui cih cipaw zuitu`ae ccangpyapaw kha a tho vae.
41008032	Te kha-e bya kha ccaerarihlan a ho. Te Piter nynh amaw kha cciakhae zah a pe vae.
41008033	Thuasalama Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah a zuitu`ae kha dote, Piter kha, “Setan, ka nuhlang thungkuh! Pawccecize nang tuh Pachia uccaw`ae kha na peki khyh, thuasalama ccungccaw uccaw`ae kha nynh na peki,” ci zah a pe.
41008034	Te a zuitu`ae ryte ccungccaw`ae kha ko`ae zah minmin kha, “Hunghung zemah kamaw yn zui ry lan thua ze, amaw te amaw kha yn vuakuh sah lah a vaelantung kha puihkuh sah, te kamaw yn zui sah.
41008035	Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hiinnaw a khumkuh ry paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a shung cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah kamaw te thehoypaw keiccuze a hiinnaw a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh cih.
41008036	Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh laephipi hynh khaleih a mue zeso a hiinnaw-muisaw a shung lanze a hanlan pawmou athane?
41008037	Tukhyhze a hiinnawmuisaw te rulae nawlan ccungccaw nynh pawmou a pya cih?
41008038	Tukeiccu ohhuakuh zah a seipaw hynh-e ciihan kya hunghung zemah kamaw te ka bya kha mae yn thyakhae paw tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh mah a Paaw phu-enaw kya athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae ryte he oun rung vae ze kha-e paw kha maethyakhae ru cih,” a cipya`ae.
41009001	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, thungnaw ryte yn thua paw Pachia peenaw kha a muih`ae cia chinaw a tytua cih lei`ae paw, ccungccaw abang e kya a um`ae,” a cipya`ae.
41009002	Te nin taruh acih koute Jesu nynh Piter, James te Johan kha hoei`ae zah ahangpaw mua lang mih makhaete a cciakhae`ae; te minmin malang Jesu tuh a muinsan rulaekuh.
41009003	Te a uccaw tuh phaephae ah zah vuiraw hawte myarya araw; tuh-e hawte laephi vawlan hung uccawsuh paw nynh sanmah rawsah kho lan khyh.
41009004	Te Elijah te Mawsi tuh minmin kya oun langkuh`ae zah Jesu ryte byahokuh`ae.
41009005	Te Piter nynh tho zah Jesu kha, “Rabbi, e kya um paw tuh kaening elan ahoy; te bu ccangthung kae sak; nang na hanlan ccangkheit, Mawsi hanlan ccangkheit, te Elijah hanlan ccangkheit,” a cipya.
41009006	Minmin tuh myarya a ri`ae keiccuze paw nynh ho lan cipaw Piter nynh a ny khyh keiccu nynh tuhte a ho.
41009007	Te maeking yn zi zah minmin kha pung a khung`ae, te, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw bya kha la ngae oh,” cite maeking kyate roi yn ccae.
41009008	Te vaekheihmawte minmin nynh mih pepan he a do`ae tuh, mimaw ryte Jesu laelan hung sanmah muih vae khyh`ae.
41009009	Te minmin mua kyate he oun rungbung`ae tuh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui mawlaezung minmin nynh a muih`ae paw kha hung sanmah a hopya khyh nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya`ae.
41009010	Te minmin nynh a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw cipaw tuh pawmou a hory cite mimaw te mimaw kha khiakuh`ae zah kha-e a hopaw bya kha mimaw kya a ccykeku`ae.
41009011	Te minmin nynh, “Pawccemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Elijah tuh masaty yn thua cih a ci`ae?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.
41009012	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Elijah tuh masaty yn thua ccaccing cih zah pawpaw balyn kha yn nungthui cih; te aning tuh patae a teing cih zah pawlangria lan khyh`ae cite Ccungccaw Ccapaw kong azeikuh paw hynh pawte athua?
41009013	Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, Elijah tuh phe a thua ccaccing vae; te amaw kong kha azeikuh thyhte ccungccaw`ae nynh a cyi ry`ae hawte a tungvaw phe a cyi vae`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
41009014	Te zuitu`ae kalan he a thua tuh ccungccaw zapi pi nynh minmin kha phang a koih`ae paw te kawbya ccangpatu`ae ryte bya eiku`ae paw kha a muih.
41009015	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kha ccahe a muih`ae tuh myarya mih ngaeangthua zah a kalan ccue`ae zah amaw kha bya a beih`ae.
41009016	Te Jesu nynh kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha, “Minmin ryte pawmou na eiku oh?” cite a khia`ae.
41009017	Te ccungccaw zapi lakuze lukheitpaw nynh khung zah, “Ccangpatu, bya ho leipaw muisaw abahkuhpaw ka ccapaw kha na kalan kae cciakhae.
41009018	Te a bahkunaw kya miakaw aning kha laephi kya zianah zah a khalang kyate a taraphue a pou, a hawzy zah karae aho; tuh-e muisaw a dee ccaw`ae cite na zuitu`ae ka hopah`ae zah dee kho khyh`ae,” cite a hopya.
41009019	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou zyn lei`ae ciihan, hohse cia mou nae kya ka um ung cih? Hohse cia mou kae ngaesangpah ung cih oh? Imohpaw kha ka kalan oun cciakhae oh,” a ci.
41009020	Te minmin nynh imohpaw kha a kalan cciakhae`ae. Te tuh-e paw nynh amaw kha he a muih tuh vaekheihmawte muisaw nynh karaehosah zah laephi kalan a khuliakuh, te a taraphue thua lante laephi kya a toukuh.
41009021	Te Jesu nynh imohpaw a paaw kha, “Hynhte a cyi paw hohsemou saw vae?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh, “A imua lya mawte a cyih vae.
41009022	Imohpaw hynh ro khylan maee lungkhu lang te tui lungkhu lang pei a phungsaku. Thuasalama na cyi kho lanze kaening hynh thaw oun ccih lah oun bawng,” a ci.
41009023	Jesu nynh, “Na zyn ngan lanze, a zyn paw ccungccaw hanlan pawpaw balyn tuh athua kho,” a cipya.
41009024	Te imohpaw a paaw tuh vaekheihmawte sia zah mitphi ryte, “Bawipaw, ka zyn, ka zyn leinaw nang nynh yn bawng,” a cipya.
41009025	Ccungccaw`ae nynh pynkheihlan oun ccue`ae paw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh, “Nawpang zah bya ho leipaw muisaw, imohpaw kyate pou lah bua tee nan vae, nang kha kaw kae pya!” cipah zah tuh-e ahoy leipaw muisaw kha a pe.
41009026	Te muisaw tuh raerae sia zah imohpaw kha karaehosah zah a kyate phe a pou; imohpaw tuh achihpaw hawte thua zah ccungccaw patae nynh, “Phe chih vae,” a ci`ae.
41009027	Thuasalama Jesu nynh a kuih te kyng zah a tho; te aning tuh po a tho.
41009028	Te inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh a zuitu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou kaening nynh amaw kha kae dee kho khyh,” cite mih makhaete a khia`ae.
41009029	Te Jesu nynh, “Hynhtahawpaw tuh sawsangnaw te, looh-aesungnaw te rou nynh dee kho athua,” a cipya`ae.
41009030	Te minmin tuh tuin kyate pou`ae zah Galilee pe po a ccia`ae paw kha Jesu nynh hung sanmah nysah ry khyh.
41009031	Pawccecize, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kuih lungkhu lang oun ah cih`ae zah oun theih cih`ae; te a theih`ae koute nin thungnaw kya thothui cih,” cite a zuitu`ae kha ccangpah`ae zah a hopya`ae.
41009032	Tuh-e a hopaw kha minmin nynh a thaethya khyh`ae zemah amaw kha khia lan phe a rih`ae.
41009033	Te Jesu tuh Kapernaum khua khe thua zah inn lungkhu a um lyakhe minmin kha, “Laanpi kya kha naemaw te naemaw pawmou na eiku oh?” cite a khia`ae.
41009034	Thuasalama minmin tuh yccae khyh`ae; pawccecize minmin nynh laanpi khe mimaw lakuze hungmou alehua cih cipaw kha a eikuh`ae.
41009035	Te Jesu tuh dahung zah luhaw laening kha ko`ae zah, “Lukhakheit nynh laanmasue lang athua ry ze, nyathyakou lang athua cih zah ccungccaw balyn ryalawpatu lang athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
41009036	Te imua taraw kha laah zah minmin laku khe a nung; te a kuih kya dua zah minmin kha,
41009037	“Hunghung zemah ka min liate hynhtahawpaw imua`ae lukheit kha a lehkhan paw tuh kamaw kha oun lehkhan paw nynh thua; te hunghung zemah kamaw oun lehkhan paw tuh kamaw kyalya oun lehkhan paw thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw kha mah lehkhan paw nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
41009038	Te Johan nynh, “Ccangpatu, kaening oun zui leipaw lukheitpaw nynh na min te raerangsaro`ae a dee paw kha kae muih; te kaening oun zui khyh keiccu amaw kha kae khee,” cite Jesu kha a hopya.
41009039	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Tuh-e paw kha khee nan oh, pawccecize kamaw min liate athungpaw ryalaw a lah paw nynh tuh kamaw kha taloi thethya oun ho kho lanpaw hung san um khyh.
41009040	Pawccecize aening oun rawse leipaw tuh aening kalan a pang paw nynh thua.
41009041	Pawccecize nanning tuh Kri kya-e na thua oh keiccuze, hunghung zemah ka min liate nia lanpaw tui banang nangkheit ae pya oh paw tuh, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw tuh a ryalaw mee shung lan khyh.
41009042	“Te hunghung zemah kamaw oun zyn paw e imua taraw lukhakheit kha a maeleihsakuh paw ccungccaw tuh a nging kyakhe mianawpaw lung ccangkheit kha sae`ae sah lah rili lungkhu lang vua lanze a hanlan ahoyhua.
41009043	Te na kuih nynh ae seisah ze, kha-e kha thoh tya. Kuih ccangning hoite achih kho leipaw hell maee lungkhu lang ccia lanpaw lae tuh kuihccung te hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
41009044	“ ‘Tuin kya tuh zangpaw chih khyh zah maee mah chih khyh.’
41009045	“Te na ccu nynh ae seisah ze, kha-e kha thoh tya; ccu ccangning hoite achih kho leipaw hell maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae tuh ccukhoute hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
41009046	“ ‘Tuin kya tuh zangpaw chih khyh zah maee mah chih khyh.’
41009047	Te na mit nynh ae seisah ze, kha-e kha poh khoi; mit ccangning hoite hell maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae tuh mit ccangkheit te Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
41009048	Tuin kya tuh zangpaw chih khyh zah maee mah chih khyh.
41009049	“Pawccecize ccungccaw miakaw kha maeeloi phing athua cih, te silawnawpaw miakaw kha loi phing athua cih.
41009050	“Loi tuh ahoy, thuasalama loi nynh a e paw kha phe a zosah ze, pawtemou na esah kho ung cih oh? Naemaw kyakhe loi hoi oh, te lukheit te lukheit ccawkuh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
41010001	Te tuin kyate Jesu tuh thokuh zah Jordan vaw khuraw langkhe cceih zah Judah ram akin langkhe a thua; te ccungccaw`ae nynh a kalan bua oun sueluakuh`ae zah leih a cyimae hawte minmin kha bua a ccangpya`ae.
41010002	Te Farasi`ae nynh a kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha syntaw khylan, “Pise lukheit nynh a zu kha mya lan kawbya nynh ua tou?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.
41010003	Te Jesu nynh, “Mawsi nynh pawtemou kawbya ae pya oh?” cite a khung`ae.
41010004	Te minmin nynh, “Mawsi nynh myakunaw ccaw zei lan zah mya lan a ua,” cite a khung`ae.
41010005	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Nae thinlung akhung keiccu nynh e kawpyapaw hynh a zei.
41010006	Thuasalama raenaw athotakaw lya tuh Pachia nynh minmin kha pise te nopi nynh a rae.
41010007	Hynh-e keiccuze pise nynh a paaw te a nung kha a cciataw cih zah a zu te a umkheih cih`ae;
41010008	te minmin luning tuh ngesaw pyn kheit lang tang cih`ae; tukeiccu minmin tuh luning thua vae khyh`ae, thuasalama ngesaw pyn kheit nynh thua vae`ae.
41010009	Tukeiccu Pachia nynh pynkheihlan a suelua vae paw kha hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah phia nan sah,” a ci.
41010010	Te inn lungkhu khe a zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kong kha bua a khia`ae.
41010011	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Hunghung zemah a zu maah zah ccangpaw zu a hoi paw tuh nopi ccangpaw kha a seikhaepaw nynh thua.
41010012	Te nopinung nynh a vawpaw maah zah ccangpaw vawpaw a hoi ze pise ccangpaw kha a seikhaepaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
41010013	Te Jesu nynh a kuih te a hae ccaw`ae cite imua`ae kha a kalan oun cciakhae`ae; te a zuitu`ae nynh oun cciakhaetu`ae kha a pe`ae.
41010014	Thuasalama Jesu nynh he a muih tuh a thinria zah minmin kha, “Imua taraw`ae kha ka kalan oun cceih`ae sah, kang nan oh; pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh khatahaw`ae paw elan nynh thua.
41010015	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah Pachia peenaw kha imua taraw hawte a lawku khyh lanze, tuh-e peenaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
41010016	Te imua`ae kha a dua`ae, a kuih kha mih tungvaw khang zah hythua a pya`ae.
41010017	Te laanpi kya a ccia lya, lukheitpaw nynh a kalan yn ccue zah a malang ccukharutungte, “Ccangpatu hoypaw, zungzae hiinnaw rho ka ccou nawlan pawmou ka cyih cih?” cite amaw kha a khia.
41010018	Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou kamaw hynh ahoypaw cite nae ko? Pachia lukheit laelan ahoypaw hung sanmah um khyh.
41010019	Kawpyapaw`ae kha na ny: ‘Milae zu seikhae nan, ccungccaw theih nan, ruh nan, ahme leipaw ccaekia lang tang nan, ccungccaw hyngpah nan, na paaw te na nung sawtua,’ cipaw kha,” a cipya.
41010020	Te aning nynh khung zah, “Ccangpatu, tuh-e`ae balyn tuh ka ngawphue lya mawte phe ka zui vae,” a cipya.
41010021	Oute Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha sungsah zah dobiate, “Nang tuh ccangkheit na bou ung; la cceih lah na hoi paw miakaw kha la zua lah ryachi`ae kha la pya`ae, te vaawran kya sisua na hoi cih; te rang lah vaelantung kha puihkuh lah kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
41010022	Te aning tuh uccaw`ae patae a hoi paw athua keiccuze tuh-e bya kya a maesue hoy khyh zah ngaethyate po a cceih.
41010023	Te Jesu nynh a pepan khe do zah, “A hoirung`ae paw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh pawcihmou aru ngaw!” cite a zuitu`ae kha a hopya`ae.
41010024	Te a zuitu`ae tuh a bya kya mih ngaeangthua. Thuasalama Jesu nynh bua khung`ae zah minmin kha, “Ka ccaaw oh, hoirungnaw a doliakuh`ae paw hanlan Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh pawcihmou aru!
41010025	Mihoipaw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang a tee lanpaw lae tuh Kalauk nynh phynbang khu kya tee lan azoihua,” a cipya`ae.
41010026	Te minmin tuh myarya mih ngaeangthua zah mimaw te mimaw laku, “Tuhte lanze hungmou khumnaw a mue kho cih?” a ciku`ae.
41010027	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha do`ae zah, “Ccungccaw hanlan tuh thua kho khyh, thuasalama Pachia hanlan athua kho leipaw um khyh; pawccecize Pachia hanlan pawpaw balyn tuh athua kho,” a ci.
41010028	Oute Piter nynh tho zah amaw kha, “Dotua, kaening tuh pawpaw balyn phe kae cciataw zah namaw kae zui,” a cipya.
41010029	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kamaw keiccu te thehoypaw keiccuze inn, uteno`ae, ccia`ae, paaw, tukhyhze nung, zu, ccaaw`ae, lei`ae a cciataw paw tuh,
41010030	atu hynh-e ccyh kya inn`ae, uteno`ae, ccia`ae, nung`ae, ccaaw`ae te lei`ae kha tuasakunaw ryte leih zakheit a mue cih; te bua yn thua lanpaw she kya zungzae hiinnaw kha a mue cih.
41010031	Thuasalama masaty e ccungccaw patae tuh nyathyakou e athua cih`ae zah nyathyakou e tuh masaty e athua cih`ae,” a ci.
41010032	Te minmin Jerusalem lang a cciathung lya`ae laanpi kyakhe, Jesu tuh mih malang a cceih; te minmin tuh mih ngaeangthua zah ribiate amaw kha a zui`ae. Te aning nynh luhaw laening kha bua cciakhae`ae zah amaw kya paw nynh yn cyikuh vae cih cipaw kha a hopya vae`ae:
41010033	“Dotua oh, aening tuh Jerusalem lang nynh ah cciathung oh; te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kalan ah athua cih; te minmin nynh chia lan seibe cih`ae zah Zenta`ae kalan a ah cih`ae;
41010034	te minmin nynh amaw kha a sarya cih`ae zah a bua cih`ae, te mih tuin te a thoi cih`ae zah a theih cih`ae; te nin thungnaw kya aning tuh bua a thothui cih,” a ci.
41010035	Te Zebedi ccaaw`ae James te Johan nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Ccangpatu, kaening nynh kae ngiakupaw nae cyipya nawlan kae ry,” cite a hopya`ae.
41010036	Te aning nynh, “Pawmou nae hanlan nae cyisah ry oh?” cite a khia`ae.
41010037	Minmin nynh, “Na phu-enaw kya lukheit na ranglang, te lukheit na voilang kae dahungbua nawlan oun ua,” a ci`ae.
41010038	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh paw nynh kae ngia cipaw na nyh khyh oh; ka nia paw banang kha na neih kho cih oh tou? Te baptisma ka in paw kha na in kho cih oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
41010039	Te minmin nynh, “Kae cyih kho cih,” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka nia paw banang kha na neihbua ccaccing cih oh; te baptisma ka innaw kya na in bua cih oh.
41010040	Thuasalama ka ranglang te ka voilang dahung lan pya lanpaw tuh ka kya-e thua khyh; thuasalama mih hanlan a paccynpya`ae paw rou nynh pya athua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
41010041	Te zuitu luhaw nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh James te Johan tungvaw myarya mih thinria.
41010042	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Zenta`ae tungvaw uktu`ae lang tua athua`ae paw nynh tuh mih bawithuanaw khate a uk`ae, te mih kya a lesae`ae paw nynh minmin tungvaw kawhoinaw a mang`ae cipaw na ny oh.
41010043	Thuasalama nanning laku tuhte thua lan khyh; thuasalama hunghung zemah nanning laku lesae a ry paw tuh nanning ryalawpatu athua cih.
41010044	Te nanning laku hunghung zemah lupihua lang a tang ry paw tuh ccungccaw balyn see lang a tang cih.
41010045	Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw hei nynh ryalawsahpyaku khylan yn thua khyh, thuasalama ming`ae kha ryalawpya khylan nynh yn thua, te ccungccaw patae sawkhawnaw hanlan a hiinnaw kha pyaku khylan nynh yn thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
41010046	Te minmin tuh Jeriko khua a thua`ae; te a zuitu`ae ry, ccungccaw pataepi ryte Jeriko kyate he a pou`ae tuh, Timae ccapaw mitmohpaw Bartimu tuh laanpi kin khe ccungccaw ngiakute a la dahung.
41010047	Te Nazareth paw Jesu cipaw he a thae tuh, “David Ccapaw Jesu, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah,” cite thawte a sia.
41010048	Te ccungccaw patae nynh zya adae ccaw cite a raw`ae; thuasalama aning nynh, “David Ccapaw, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah,” cite houh ccae lang a sia.
41010049	Te Jesu tuh zya dahang zah kha-e paw kha a kosah`ae. Te mitmohpaw kha ko`ae zah, “Na thawmuin sah, thokuh, nang kha ae ko,” cite a hopya`ae.
41010050	Te aning nynh a uccaw kha ccaring vuate, thokuh zah Jesu kya a thua.
41010051	Te Jesu nynh, “Na hanlan pawmou cyisah nae ry?” cite a khia. Mitmohpaw nynh, “Rabboni, ngawmuih nynh ka ry,” a cipya.
41010052	Te Jesu nynh, “La cceih ccavae, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte ngawmuih zah laanpi kya Jesu kha a zui vae.
41011001	Te Jesu te a zuitu`ae nynh Jerusalem lang naekuh`ae zah, Oliv Mua leihpaw e Bethfake khua te Bethani khua khe he a thua`ae tuh a zuitu`ae luning kha Jesu nynh saw`ae zah,
41011002	“Nae malang um paw khua kalan la cceih oh lah kha-e lungkhu lang he na tee miakaw oh te, hung ccungccaw nynh san a cciku boi lei`ae paw lann taraw a khii`ae paw kha na la muih cih oh, kha-e kha oun supah oh lah oun cciakhae oh.
41011003	Te lukhakheit nynh, ‘Pawccemou khate na cyi oh?’ cite ae khia oh ze, ‘Bawipaw nynh a peki,’ cite la khung oh, te aning nynh kha-e kha hynhlang palou oun saw cih,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
41011004	Te minmin tuh cceih`ae zah sakoih akhunglang laanpi atungkunaw kya a khii`ae paw lann taraw kha muih`ae zah a supya`ae.
41011005	Te tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw abang nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou lann taraw kha na supya oh?” a ci`ae.
41011006	Te minmin nynh Jesu nynh kawpya`ae hawte a hopya`ae; te minmin nynh a cciasah`ae.
41011007	Te zuitu`ae nynh lann taraw kha Jesu kalan cciakhae`ae zah a tungvaw khe mih uccaw de`ae zah Jesu nynh a cciku.
41011008	Te ccungccaw patae nynh mih uccaw kha laanpi kya a phaepya`ae; te abang nynh anaw lungpaw thingnge`ae kha loi`ae zah laanpi kya a phaepya`ae.
41011009	Te malang cceih`ae paw te a zuikuh`ae paw nynh, “Hosanna! ‘BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw tuh hythuaccou sah!’
41011010	Bawipaw min te yn thua paw, ah paaw David peenaw tuh hythuaccou sah! Ahang huaccenaw kya Hosanna thuasah!” cite a sia`ae.
41011011	Te Jesu tuh Jerusalem lungkhu lang te tempal lungkhu lang a tee; te pawpaw balyn kha pung a do koute zete he athua tuh luhaw laening ryte Bethani khua lang a cceih`ae.
41011012	Te awkhualan Bethani khua te he a ki`ae tuh Jesu tuh a vuelaw.
41011013	Te anaw a sae paw thaeku ku kha asawpi te muih zah khe kya ccangkhakheit ka muihkuh cih vosi cite a ccianua; te he a thuanua tuh anaw`ae laelan pawsang muih vae khyh; pawccecize thaeku a thae ccyh thua loh khyh.
41011014	Te Jesu nynh, “Atu koute zungzae cia hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah na thae la ae nan vae sah,” cite thaeku ku kha a cipya, kha-e kha a zuite`ae nynh phe a thae`ae.
41011015	Te minmin tuh Jerusalem a thua`ae; te Jesu tuh tempal voidu lungkhu lang tee zah khe kya a zua`ae paw te a re`ae paw kha a dee`ae, te phuaru`ae paw ccaboi te valaele zua`ae paw tungkhung kha phya dawleihpya`ae.
41011016	Te tempal voidu lungkhu lang uccaw`ae teekhae lan hung ccungccaw sanmah ua khyh.
41011017	Te ccangpah`ae zah, “ ‘Ka inn tuh minphuin`ae balyn sawsangnaw inn cite ko athua cih,’ cite zeikuh khyh tou? Thuasalama nanning nynh miruh`ae karung lang phe na rae oh,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
41011018	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh amaw kha pawcihtemou chia lan cipaw a ccung`ae; pawccecize minmin nynh amaw raw a rih`ae, pawccemacize ccungccaw balyn nynh a ccangpyanaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
41011019	Te zete he a thua tuh khua kyate phe a pou.
41011020	Te awkhua minmin nynh laanpi kya a ccia lya`ae, thaeku ku atharui kyate karae aroupaw kha a muih`ae.
41011021	Te Piter nynh liathui zah amaw kha, “Rabbi, dotua! Ccae na sah paw thaeku ku karae rou vae,” a cipya.
41011022	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pachia kya zynnaw hoi oh.
41011023	Pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah e mua kha, ‘Nang nuekuh lah rili lungkhu lang phungkuh,’ cipah zah lunghiinnaw hoi leite, a hopaw tuh acyikuh cih cite a zyn lanze, a ho hawte acyikuh cih.
41011024	Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, na peki oh paw uccaw balyn kha sawsangnaw te he na ngia vae oh ze, kha-e kha kae mue vae cite zyn oh lah na mue cih oh.
41011025	Te sawsang te he na thadyn vae oh ze, lukhakheit kha ccangkhakheit seibe lanpaw na hoi oh ze la ngaethya oh; ou khate vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh mah nae seinaw kha ae ngaethya cih oh.
41011026	Thuasalama na ngaethya khyh oh ze, vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh mah nae seinaw kha ae ngaethya lan khyh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
41011027	Te minmin tuh Jerusalem bua oun thua`ae. Te aning tempal voidu kya a ccia lyakhe, amaw kalan alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae, te piccang`ae oun thua`ae zah,
41011028	“Paw kawhoinaw te mou e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi? E uccaw`ae cyi lan hung nynh mou e kawhoinaw hynh nang ae pya?” cite a khia`ae.
41011029	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae mah bya ccangkheit kae khia cih oh zah nae hopah cih oh, oute e uccaw`ae hynh paw kawhoinaw te nynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah ru cih oh:
41011030	Johan kya-e baptisma hynh vaawran kyate tou yn thua? Tukhyhze ccungccaw`ae kyate tou? Yn hopya tua oh,” cite a khia`ae.
41011031	Te minmin tuh mimaw te mimaw hokuh`ae zah, “Aening nynh, ‘Vaawran kyate’ ah ci oh ze, aning nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze pawccemou amaw kha na zyn khyh oh’ yn ci cih.
41011032	Thuasalama ‘Ccungccaw`ae kyate’ ah ci oh ze-,” minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae raw kha a rih`ae; pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh Johan tuh profeh ccaccing cite a tua`ae paw nynh thua.
41011033	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha, “Kae nyh khyh,” a cipya`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Kae mah paw kawhoinaw te nynh e uccaw`ae hynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
41012001	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw te bya hopya`ae: “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh misu khokhu a rae, te hohung po a sak lui, te misutui tuanawpaw nung nawlan akhu karyn zah buhang ccangkheit a sak, te misu khokhu kha misu ryalahtu`ae kalan hohsakuh`ae zah asawnaw ram lang phe a cceih.
41012002	Te misu thae lo ccyh kya aning nynh khokhu kya-e misu athae kha ahohtu misu ryalahtu`ae kyate ka mue ccaw cite misu ahohtu`ae kalan ryalahtu lukheit a saw.
41012003	Te minmin nynh kha-e paw kha kyng`ae zah bua`ae zah a kuih ccakaete a kisah`ae.
41012004	Te aning nynh minmin kalan ccangpaw ryalahtu kha bua a saw; te minmin nynh lung te deih`ae zah a lu kya vaemaw muesah`ae zah maethya te a kisah`ae.
41012005	Te aning nynh ccangpaw bua a saw; te minmin nynh phe a chia`ae; te ccangpaw patae kha mah abang kha bua`ae zah abang kha a chia`ae.
41012006	“Tukeiccu a sungsahpaw ccapaw lukheit kyalya hoi ung zah, ‘Minmin nynh ka ccapaw tuh sawtua cih`ae,’ ci zah nyathyakou tuh a ccapaw kha minmin kalan a saw.
41012007	“Thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh, ‘E paw tuh rhoccoutu nynh thua, rang oh, theih oh sih lah a rho uccaw tuh ah kya-e lang a tang ccaw,’ cite mimaw te mimaw kha a hoku`ae.
41012008	Te minmin nynh amaw kha kyng`ae zah phe a chia`ae, te misu khokhu atolang khe dae a vua`ae.
41012009	“Tukeiccu misu khokhu hoitupaw nynh pawtemou a cyi cih? Aning nynh yn thua cih zah misu ryalahtu`ae kha marya a roh cih zah misu khokhu kha mingccang`ae kalan nynh a pya cih.
41012010	Te, ‘Lung-inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang.
41012011	Hynh-e tuh BAWIPAW nynh a cyi paw thua zah e tuh aening mitmuihnaw kya ngaeang lan um paw nynh thua,’ cite azeikuh paw e Ccathyaa hynh na ria boi khyh oh tou?” a ci.
41012012	Te minmin nynh tousenaw phungpaw hynh kaening nynh yn honua cipaw a nyku`ae keiccuze amaw kha kyng lan cite a ccung`ae; thuasalama ccungccaw zapi raw a ri`ae keiccuze amaw kha phe cciataw`ae.
41012013	Te minmin nynh amaw bya ho paw kha kyngpya khylan Farasi`ae te Herod ccungccaw`ae abang kha amaw kalan a saw`ae.
41012014	Te minmin he thua`ae tuh amaw kha, “Ccangpatu, nang tuh ahmepaw zah hung ccungccaw mah pawlang na ria khyh cipaw kae ny; pawccecize nang tuh ccungccaw`ae mae na do khyh, thuasalama Pachia laanpi kha hmerarih lang na ccangpya; Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan accan tou, ccan khyh tou?
41012015	Kaening kae pya cih tou, kae pya lan khyh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Thuasalama aning nynh mih thyaruhnaw kha nyh zah minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae syntawtua oh? Denari kiakheit kha ka dotua ccaw yn cciakhae oh,” a ci.
41012016	Te minmin nynh kha-e kha a cciakhae`ae. Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Hynh-e hynh hung muinsan te hung ccawzeipya paw mou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Sizar muinsan te a ccawzeipyapaw,” a ci`ae.
41012017	Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Sizar uccaw`ae kha Sizar kalan pya oh lah Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia kalan pya oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh amaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
41012018	Oute thothuinaw um khyh a ci`ae paw Sadusi`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha,
41012019	“Ccangpatu, ‘Ccungccapaw lukheit a upaw nynh ccaaw saah leite chih zah a zu kha a cciataw lanze kha-e a upaw ciihan azo khyh nawlan a zu kha a neitapaw nynh a umkhae cih,’ cite Mawsi nynh kaening kha oun zeipya.
41012020	Atu uteno lusari acih`ae paw a um`ae. Te masaty e paw nynh zuhoi zah ccaaw leite phe a chih.
41012021	Te luningnaw e paw nynh kha-e nung kha umkhae zah ccaaw leite phe bua a chih; te luthungnaw e paw nynh tuhhawte a chitaw.
41012022	Te lusari mawte kha-e nung kha umkhae`ae zah ccaaw hoi khyh`ae; tuh-e`ae balyn koute tuh-e nopinung mah phe a chihbua.
41012023	Tukeiccu thothuinaw kya, minmin he thothui`ae te nopinung tuh hung zu lang mou a tang cih? Pawccecize lusari mawte kha-e nung kha zu lang phe a umkhae`ae,” cite a khia`ae.
41012024	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ccathyaa te Pachia thungnaw kha na ny khyh keiccu oh ze phe na me khyh oh tou?
41012025	Pawccecize a chih`ae paw kyate he thothui`ae tetuh zu te vaw umkheih ci um vae lan khyh, zudyku ci mah um vae lan khyh; thuasalama vaawran kya um paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae hawte nynh athua vae`ae.
41012026	Te a chih`ae paw thothuinaw kong lante Pachia nynh, ‘Kae tuh Abraham Pachia, te Isaak Pachia te Jakob Pachia nynh ka thua,’ cite Mawsi kalan thabu kyate a hopya paw kha Mawsi ccauh kya na ria boi khyh oh tou?
41012027	Pachia tuh achih`ae paw Pachia thua khyh, thuasalama ahiin`ae paw Pachia nynh thua, tukeiccu nanning myarya na me oh,” a cipya`ae.
41012028	Te kawbya ccangpatu lukheit yn thua zah minmin a eiku`ae paw kha thae zah Jesu nynh ahoyte a phipya`ae paw kha a nyh tuh, “Kawpyapaw balyn kyaze paw kawpyapaw hynh mou abapihua?” cite a khia.
41012029	Te Jesu nynh, “Kawpyapaw balyn kyaze abapi huapaw kawpyapaw tuh: ‘Pou Israel paw, ngaetua, ah Pachia BAWIPAW tuh BAWIPAW ccangkheit kyalya nynh thua.
41012030	“Te na Pachia BAWIPAW kha na thinlung balynte, na hiinnaw-muisaw balynte, na tuanaw-thinlung balynte, te na thawzung balynte na sungsah cih.’ E hynh nynh abapi huapaw kawpyapaw tuh thua.
41012031	Te ccangningnaw tuh: ‘Na innpaw kha namaw toulou hawte na sungsah cih.’ E`ae laeze abapi huapaw kawpyapaw ccangpaw um vae khyh,” a cipya.
41012032	Te kawbya ccangpatu nynh, “Ahoy, Ccangpatupaw, byaccing nynh na ho, pawccecize Pachia ccangkheit rou nynh um; te amaw laelan ccangpaw Pachia um lae vae khyh.
41012033	Te amaw kha thinlung balynte, te nythyanaw balynte, te hiinnaw-muisaw balynte, te thawzung balynte sungsah lanpaw te innpaw kha amaw hawte sungsah lanpaw tuh apynpi te maee te u paw silawkunaw`ae te silawkunawpaw`ae balyn laeze abapi huapaw nynh thua,” cite amaw kha a hopya.
41012034	Te aning nynh hawrarih lante a khung paw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh amaw kha, “Nang tuh Pachia peenaw kyate na sawkuh khyh,” a cipya. Te tuh-e koute hung nynh sanmah byakhia ngan vae khyh`ae.
41012035	Te Jesu nynh tempal kya a ccangpya`ae lyakhe khung`ae zah, “Pawtemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Kri tuh David Ccapaw nynh thua a ci`ae?
41012036	Pawccecize David amaw ccaccei nynh Thyaa Muisaw liate, ‘BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” a cipya,’ a ci.
41012037	Tukeiccu David amaw ccaccei nynh Kri kha ‘Bawipaw’ cite a ko lanze pawtemou aning tuh a Ccapaw athua cih?” a ci. Te ranzae ccungccaw`ae nynh lungtuate a bya kha a ngae`ae.
41012038	Te a ccangpyanaw kya Jesu nynh, “Kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha la raeringkuh oh. Minmin tuh uccaw ccuabalaepaw lawkute innlaepaery`ae zah kungkunaw kya sawtuate byabeihku a ry`ae;
41012039	te sinakok kya tungkhung ahoy huaccepaw ry`ae zah poi kya ahoy huaccenaw kyakhe a umry`ae;
41012040	minmin tuh numae`ae inn kha luade`ae zah cyisakuthya nawlan saw kha asaepi a sang`ae; minmin tuh ale huapaw detahnaw kha a mue cih`ae,” a ci.
41012041	Te Jesu tuh sisua bung te ahawiliakuh lante dahung zah ccungccaw`ae nynh sisua bung lungkhu lang pawte nynh phua a sang`ae cipaw kha a do; te a hoirung`ae paw patae nynh patae te a sang`ae.
41012042	Te a ryachipaw numaenung lukheit yn thua zah kuadron ccangkheit aphupaw daw phuapia pianing kha a sang.
41012043	Te a zuitu`ae kha ko`ae zah minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, sisua bung lungkhu lang a sang`ae paw balyn laeze e a ryachipaw numaenung nynh alunghua a sang vae.
41012044	Pawccecize minmin balyn tuh phe beih lang a hoi`ae paw kya-e nynh a sang`ae; thuasalama e nung tuh a ryachi pi mawte a vuekuaku nawlan a hoithypaw balyn marya a sang,” a cipya`ae.
41013001	Te Jesu tuh tempal kyate ccahe a pou tuh a zuitu`ae kyaze lukheitpaw nynh, “Ccangpatupaw, dotua, e lung`ae te inn`ae nynh ale babang hynh!” cite amaw kha a hopya.
41013002	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “E alepipaw lung-inn`ae hynh na muih khaw? Tingsah bung leite lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit san a khangthykuh paw um lan khyh,” a cipya.
41013003	Te Oliv Mua vawlan, tempal te ahawiliakuh lante a dahung lya, Piter, James te Johan te Andru nynh mih makhaete,
41013004	“E uccaw`ae hynh hotuhmou oun cyikuh cih? Te e uccaw`ae balyn oun ccing lan vae ze paw muihsanaw mou yn langkuh vae cih? Oun hopah,” cite a khia`ae.
41013005	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Hung ccungccaw nynh san ae ling khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh.
