41013006	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh ka min te oun thua cih`ae zah, ‘Kae tuh amaw nynh ka thua,’ oun ci cih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha oun ling cih`ae.
41013007	Te nanning nynh rhawtukkunaw kong te rhawtukkunaw lanpaw kong kha he nae thae vae oh ze, nae vawsaw nan sah; pawccecize tuhtahawpaw oun cyikuh hahe cih, thuasalama athangnaw tuh thua la ngaw khyh.
41013008	Pawccecize minphuin phuinkheit te phuinkheit yn rawkuh cih`ae zah ram ramkheit te ramkheit yn rawkuh cih`ae. Te khyzawvawkaw kya innrui yn suekuh cih zah ccakangnaw te vawsawnaw`ae yn um cih. Hynh-e`ae tuh vawsaw teingnaw athotakawnaw nynh thua.
41013009	“Thuasalama naemaw te naemaw kha la raeringkuh oh; pawccecize minmin nynh nanning kha kungsi`ae kalan ae ah cih oh; te sinakok`ae kya ae bua cih oh. Kae ka keiccuze minmin a rawsepaw ccaekia lang uktu`ae te siapharan`ae malang ae thuakhae cih oh.
41013010	Te thehoypaw hynh minphuin`ae balyn kalan masaty hopya athua hahe cih.
41013011	Thuasalama minmin nynh ae kyng oh zah he ae ah vae oh ze, paw nynh ka ho cih cipaw tuakuhty nan oh lah paccynkuhty nan oh; thuasalama kha-e ccyh kya ho lan na mue oh paw kha ho oh; pawccecize a ho paw tuh nanning thua khyh, thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw nynh thua.
41013012	“Te uteno nynh a uteno toulou kha chinaw kalan yn ah cih zah paaw nynh a ccaaw kha yn ah cih; te ccaaw`ae nynh nungpaaw`ae kha oun rawse cih`ae zah oun chisah cih`ae.
41013013	Te kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw balyn nynh nanning kha ae hua cih oh; thuasalama athangnaw cia a tyn paw tuh khum athua cih.
41013014	“Thuasalama profeh Denial nynh a ho hawte, ro a mang paw, luathua–ae-ui lang um paw uccaw nynh um lan accan leinaw kya a thadyn paw kha he na muih vae oh ze (Hynh-e ccaw a ria paw ccungccaw tuh thaethya sah), Judah ram kya um`ae paw nynh mua lang ccue`ae sah.
41013015	Te inn tungvaw um paw ccungccaw nynh a inn lungkhu-e ccangkhakheit law khylan inn lungkhu lang rung nan vae sah lah tee nan vae sah.
41013016	Te lei kya um paw ccungccaw nynh a boeining lawku khylan ki nan vae sah.
41013017	Thuasalama tuin nin`ae kya ccaawpoi`ae paw nopi`ae te mateizu paw nosi a hoi`ae paw nopi`ae hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang!
41013018	Te nanning na ccuenaw oh ccyh tuh khoccih ccyh athua khyh nawlan sawsang oh.
41013019	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a rae paw raenaw athotakawnaw kyate atu ccyh cia a la um boi leipaw te nyalang mah a um boi vae cih leipaw vawsawrunaw tuh tuin nin`ae kya yn thua cih.
41013020	Te Bawipaw nynh tuh-e nin`ae kha adynsah khyh lanze hung ccungccaw sanmah lue lan khyh`ae; thuasalama amaw nynh a po`ae paw ccungccaw`ae hanlan tuh-e nin`ae kha a dynsah cih.
41013021	Oute lukhakheit nynh, ‘Dotua, e kya nynh Kri tuh a um!’ Tukhyhze, ‘Dotua, khuin nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la zyn nan oh.
41013022	Pawccecize ahme leipaw kri`ae te ahme leipaw profeh`ae oun langkuh cih`ae zah athua kho ze po`ae paw hei kha ling khylan muihsanaw`ae te ngaeangnaw`ae kha oun langsakuh cih`ae.
41013023	Thuasalama la raeringkuh oh; dotua, kha-e`ae balyn kha marya kae hopyaty vae oh.
41013024	“Thuasalama tuh-e vawsawrunaw koute, tuh-e nin`ae kya khuanin a moh cih zah sawpaw aw vae lan khyh.
41013025	Vaawran e awsi`ae accah cih`ae zah vaawran kya um paw thungnaw`ae tuh oun hy cih.
41013026	“Oute Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw thungnaw te phuenaw ryte maeking`ae kya yn rung paw kha oun muih cih`ae.
41013027	Oute aning nynh a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha a saw cih`ae zah amaw nynh a po`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha asaw huanaw laephi kyate asaw huanaw vaawran cia, laephi kipali kyate pynkheihlan oun suelua cih`ae.
41013028	“Atu thaeku ku kyate hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw hynh ccangkuh oh: Thaeku ku nynh aran yn no zah anaw he yn toih vae ze hawning ccyh anae vae cipaw kha na ny oh.
41013029	Tuh-e hawte nanning mah kha-e uccaw`ae yn cyikupaw kha he na muih vae oh ze Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh thuakaw kin cia yn naekuh vae cipaw la nyh ccavae oh.
41013030	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn acyiku kou makhia atu e ccungccaw`ae zo lan khyh`ae.
41013031	Vaawran te laephi tuh azo cih, thuasalama ka bya`ae tuh zo lan khyh.
41013032	“Thuasalama tuh-e nin te ccyh tuh hung nynh sanmah nyh khyh, vaawran um paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae te Ccapaw nynh mah nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama Paaw rou nynh a nyh.
41013033	Raeringkuh oh, tuh-e ccyh tuh hotuh cipaw na ny khyh oh keiccuze raeringkute ngaw oh lah sawsang oh.
41013034	Pawtemou aloku ci ze, asawnaw ram lang khuaccung lan a cih paw ccungccapaw nynh a inn kha cciataw zah a see`ae kha kawhoinaw a pya`ae, te luraveih kha ryalaw pya`ae zah thuakaw ngawtupaw kha thuakaw ngaw lan kawpya paw te nynh aloku.
41013035	Tukeiccu, inn hoitupaw tuh zete ccyh tou, tukhyhze ziraccyng tou, tukhyhze awhykhua ccyh tou, tukhyhze khuadae takaw tou, hotuh ccyh nynh yn thua cih cipaw na ny khyh oh keiccuze, raeringkute la ngaw oh.
41013036	Tukhyh lanze tua lei pite mang yn thua cih zah na i oh paw kha ae muih sei cih oh.
41013037	Te nanning kae hopya oh paw hynh ccungccaw balyn kha mah ka hopya: Raeringkute ngaw oh!” a ci.
41014001	Nin ning koute Kawtaw Poi te Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi a um. Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Jesu kha pawtemou kae phee cih zah chia lan kae kyng cih cite a ccung`ae.
41014002	Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Poi lya tuh thua nan sah, tukhyh lanze ccungccaw`ae pung oun pookuh sei cih`ae,” a ci`ae.
41014003	Te Bethani khua kya, vaethyakaepaw Simon inn kya Jesu a um lya, ae lan ccaboi pe a dahung lyakhe, nopinung lukheit nynh myarya aphutepaw spaiknard satho bu alabasta lung tuihinbu bukheit kha oun ccyng zah kha-e tuihinbu kha koi zah Jesu lu kha a bu.
41014004	Te minmin laku ccungccaw abang tuh mih thinria zah, “Pawccemou e mynkhuhpaw satho hynh alakaw lang a tangsah hang?
41014005	Pawccecize denari phua zathung lae lang zua lan zah ryachi`ae pya lanze ahoypaw,” ci`ae zah kha-e nung kha a seisah`ae.
41014006	Te Jesu nynh, “Kha-e nung kha khamawte um sah, pawccemou vawsaw na pya oh? Ahoypaw ryalaw kha ka tungvaw phe a law vae.
41014007	Pawccecize nae kya ryachi`ae tuh pei a um`ae, te na ry takyh oh vae ze mih kya hoynaw na rae kho oh; thuasalama kae tuh nae kya pei ka um lan khyh.
41014008	Aning nynh a cyi khopaw kha phe a cyi vae; aning tuh ka rhua ccynaw hanlan ka pyn hynh sathothuh khylan yn thuaty vae.
41014009	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, laephipi khaleih kya hynh-e thehoypaw honaw miakaw kya, hynh-e nopinung nynh a cyi paw hynh mah amaw liathui nawlan hobia athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
41014010	Te luhaw laening lakuze lukheit athua paw Judas Iskaria tuh mih kalan Jesu kha ah khylan alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan khe a cceih.
41014011	Te kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh minmin tuh mih lungtua zah amaw kha phua pya lan byakinpyaku`ae. Te aning nynh accanthya lya amaw kha pawtepei ah lan cipaw kha a ccung vae.
41014012	Te Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi masaty nin, Kawtaw Poi elan saw he theih`ae tuh, a zuitu`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Kawtaw Poi na ae nawlan, kaening nynh kae cceih cih zah teisangmou paccynsah nae ry?” cite a khia`ae.
41014013	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luning kha saw`ae zah, “Khuapi lungkhu lang la cceih oh lah dawre te tui yn the paw ccungccapaw kha na la tungkuh cih oh; amaw kha la zui oh.
41014014	Te aning nynh a teenaw lang la teebua oh lah inn hoitupaw kha, ‘Ccangpatu nynh, “Ka zuitu`ae ryte Kawtaw Poi kae ae ccaw teisangmou mikhia khaan tuh a um?” a ci,’ cite la hopah oh.
41014015	Te aning nynh phe paccynty vae paw, akopaw palung khaan kha ae la muihsah cih oh; tuin kyakhe aening hanlan la paccyn oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
41014016	Te a zuitu`ae tuh cceih`ae zah khuapi lungkhu a thua`ae, te Jesu nynh mih kya a hopya`ae hawte a muih`ae; te minmin nynh Kawtaw Poi dangkunaw kha a paccyn`ae.
41014017	Te zete ccyh khe aning tuh zuitu luhaw laening ryte oun thua`ae.
41014018	Te minmin tuh dahung`ae zah a ae`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kamaw ryte a aekheih paw nanning laku-e lukheit nynh kamaw hynh yn ah cih,” a ci.
41014019	Te zuitu`ae tuh mih ngaethah vae, te amaw kha, “Kae tou? Kae ka thua zaw?” cite lukheit koute lukheit nynh a khia`ae.
41014020	Te aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Tuh-e paw tuh luhaw laening lakuze lukheit, kamaw ryte pake kya a pukheih paw nynh thua.
41014021	Amaw kong azeiku thyhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a cceih ccaccing cih; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw a pheetupaw ccungccapaw hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Tuh-e paw hanlan a la pui khyh ze ahoy cih paw,” a cipya`ae.
41014022	Te a ae`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh sanlou kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho, te kha-e kha eih zah minmin kha pya`ae zah, “Lawkuh oh, ae oh; e tuh ka pyn nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
41014023	Te banang kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute minmin kha pya`ae zah mih balynte a neih`ae.
41014024	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “E tuh ccungccaw patae hanlan luasah paw byakin thawpaw kya-e ka chiise nynh thua.
41014025	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw kya athawpaw misutui ka nia nin a thua makhia misu ku kya-e misutui kharyh ka neih boi vae lan khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
41014026	Te thehoysanaw law lakheit a sah kou`ae te minmin tuh Oliv Mua lang a cceih vae`ae.
41014027	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu khuazi kamaw keiccuze nanning balyn tuh ka kyate pung nae maeleihkuh cih oh; pawccecize, ‘Tuuringtu kha ka buatheih cih zah tuuphu`ae tuh pung a phiakuh cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh.
41014028	“Thuasalama kae tuh ka thothui koute, nae malang Galilee lang ka la cceihty cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
41014029	Thuasalama Piter nynh, “E`ae balyn tuh a maeleihku`ae zemah kae tuh na kyate ka maeleihkuh lan khyh,” a cipya.
41014030	Te Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya, atunin, atu khuazi ccaccei, awkhungpaw vaening a khua maw, kae hynh vaethung nae vua cih,” a cipya.
41014031	Thuasalama Piter nynh houh ccih lante, “Namaw ryte phe ka chibua lan zemah nang kha kae vua lan khyh,” a ci. Tuhhawte minmin balyn nynh a ci`ae.
41014032	Te Kethsemani acikuh paw ahmin kya oun thua`ae zah Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Saw ka sang lya, nanning e kya la dahung oh,” a cipya`ae.
41014033	Te amaw ryte Piter, James te Johan kha a hoeibua`ae; te a lungvawsaw zah myarya a lungriathae vae.
41014034	Te minmin kha, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw tuh chi lan ciate myaryasangkae a ngaethah; e kya la um oh lah la ngaw oh,” a cipya`ae.
41014035	Te malang rakyh cceih zah laephi kya bakhung zah athua kho ze suimilan ccyh tuh amaw kyate alia ccaw cite saw a sang.
41014036	Te, “Abba, Apang, pawpaw balyn tuh na hanlan athua kho; e banang hynh ka kyate yn lawpah; tuhzemah kae ka ry hawte thua nan sah, thuasalama na ry hawte thua sah,” a ci.
41014037	Te yn thua zah minmin a ih`ae paw kha muih zah Piter kha, “Simon, na i tou? Suimilan ccangkheit san na ngaw kho khyh tou?
41014038	Nanning nynh tuhounaw lungkhu lang na phungku sei khyh nawlan oh sawsang oh lah ngaw oh. Muisaw nynh tuh a ry ccaccing, thuasalama pynsaw tuh a thawzya,” a cipya.
41014039	Te bua cceih ki zah a hoty paw bya`ae kha ho zah saw a sang.
41014040	Te he a ki tuh minmin bua a ih`ae paw kha a muih, pawccecize mih mit tuh daekuh vae khyh; te amaw kha pawte nynh khung lan cipaw nyh khyh`ae.
41014041	Te vaethungnaw bua thua zah minmin kha, “Atu tetuh ih ccavae oh, hae-ung ccavae oh. Azaw vae, accyh a thua vae. Dotua oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh misei`ae kuih kalan ah athua vae.
41014042	Tho oh, cceih ccavae oh sih. Dotua oh, kamaw yn pheetupaw tuh yn thua vae,” a cipya`ae.
41014043	Tuhte a ho cciamang lyakhe luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw Judas tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae, kawbya ccangpatu`ae te piccang`ae nynh oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw zapi ryte, thaloi`ae te tungbang`ae ccyngkute vaekheihmawte oun thua vae`ae.
41014044	Te amaw a pheetupaw nynh, “Kae nynh kae myng paw kha tuh Jesu nynh thua; amaw kha kyng oh lah khyndadyhlan cciakhae oh,” cite hopah`ae zah minmin kha syntawnaw a pya`ae.
41014045	Te aning nynh he yn thua miakaw te Jesu kalan palou cceih zah, “Rabbi, Rabbi,” ci zah amaw kha a myng.
41014046	Oute minmin nynh a tungvaw kuihsaw`ae zah amaw kha a kyng`ae.
41014047	Te a pe a thadyn paw ccungccapaw lukheit nynh thaloi kha thuakuh zah ranpibawi a seepaw kha a nakua thoh pae lang a bae.
41014048	Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh miruhpaw a kyng`ae hawte, kamaw hynh kyng lan thaloi te tungbang ryte tou nae ccianua oh?
41014049	Kae tuh tempal kya ccangpyate nin takyh nanning ry ka um zah kamaw kha nae kyng khyh oh; Ccathyaa tuh accing hahe cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
41014050	Oute zuitu`ae balyn nynh amaw kha cciataw`ae zah pung ccuetaw vae`ae.
41014051	Te boei zungkheit a zingkuh paw ccangvaepaw lukheit nynh amaw kha a zui; te ccangvae`ae nynh kha-e paw kha a kyng`ae;
41014052	te aning nynh boei kha phe ccuetaw zah minmin kyate a sasete po a ccue.
41014053	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha ranpibawi lupi kalan a cciakhae`ae; te amaw ryte alepaw ranpibawi`ae balyn, piccang`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae tuh a la sueluakuh`ae.
41014054	Te Piter nynh ranpibawi lupi umnaw maepaw kyacia Jesu kha asawpi te a zui; te aning tuh tempal ngawtu`ae kyakhe dahungbua zah maee a ekuh bua.
41014055	Atu alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Sanhedrin kungsi`ae balyn nynh Jesu kha rawsete chia khylan ccaekia a ccungnua`ae; thuasalama kharyh muih khyh`ae.
41014056	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh amaw rawsete ahme leipaw ccaekia a khan`ae, thuasalama mih ccaekia`ae tuh lokuh khyh`ae.
41014057	Te ccungccaw abang nynh tho`ae zah amaw rawsete ahme leipaw ccaekia kha hynhte a khan`ae:
41014058	“E paw nynh, ‘Kuih te rae paw e tempal hynh ka roh cih zah kuih te rae leipaw ccangpaw tempal kha nin thung lungkhu ka sak cih,’ cite a ho paw kae thae,” a ci`ae.
41014059	Thuasalama mih ccaekia mah lokuh khyh.
41014060	Te ranpibawi lupi nynh angaelung khe thadyn zah Jesu kha, “Kawkheit san na khung khyh`ae rei? Nang ae rawsepaw e ccaekia`ae hynh pawte?” cite a khia.
41014061	Thuasalama aning nynh yccae khyh, kawkheit san khung khyh. Ranpibawi lupi nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh Thehoysapaw Pachia Ccapaw, Kri na thua tou?” cite bua a khia.
41014062	Te Jesu nynh, “Ka thua; te nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Thungnaw ranglang kya a dahung paw te vaawran e maeking`ae ryte yn rung paw kha nae muih cih oh,” a ci.
41014063	Oute ranpibawi lupi nynh a uccaw kha ccarae sei zah, “Tuh laelan paw ccaekia mou aening aho ung?
41014064	Pachia saryate bya a ho paw phe na thae vae oh! Pawte na tua oh?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin balyn nynh chi lan accan cite amaw kha seibe`ae.
41014065	Te abang nynh amaw kha tuin te a thoi`ae, A mae kha phang bong`ae zah a thung vae`ae, te, “Profehbya hotua!” a ci`ae. Te tempal ngawtu`ae nynh mih kuihphe te amaw kha a bia`ae.
41014066	Te Piter tuh akaw lang innvoidu kya a um lyakhe ranpibawi lupi a ryalawpatu nopinung lukheit yn thua zah,
41014067	Piter nynh maee a ekupaw kha he a muih tuh, amaw kha rirido zah, “Nang mah Nazareth paw Jesu ryte a umbua paw nynh na thua,” a ci.
41014068	Thuasalama Piter nynh ei zah, “Na hopaw tuh ka nyh khyh, thae mah ka thaethya khyh,” a ci. Te Piter tuh maepaw lang po a pou; te awkhungpaw a khua.
41014069	Te ryalawpatu nopinung nynh Piter kha bua muih zah, tuin pe a thadyn`ae paw kha, “E paw hynh minmin kyaze lukheit nynh athuabua,” a cipya`ae.
41014070	Thuasalama Piter nynh kha-e kha bua a ei. Te khuekheih cih koute, tuin a thadyn`ae paw nynh Piter kha, “Thanccingte nang tuh minmin kyaze lukheit nynh na thua; pawccecize nang tuh Galilee paw nynh na thua, te na byaho mah phe alokuh bua,” a ci`ae.
41014071	Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Na ho oh paw Ccungccapaw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite thyalawkuh zah byakinku vae.
41014072	Te vaeningnaw awkhungpaw a khua. Te, “Awkhungpaw vaening a khua mawze, nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,” cite Jesu nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae. Te kha-e kha he a tua tuh a rah vae.
41015001	Te awkhua khe alepaw ranpibawi`ae tuh piccang`ae ry, kawbya ccangpatu`ae te kungsi`ae balyn ryte arangte khuakhankuh`ae zah; Jesu kha a hee`ae, te cciakhae`ae zah Pilat kalan a ah`ae.
41015002	Te Pilat nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite amaw kha a khia. Te aning nynh, “Na ho hawte nynh thua,” cite a khung.
41015003	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh amaw kha patae seibe`ae; thuasalama aning nynh kawkheit san khung khyh`ae.
41015004	Te Pilat nynh, “Kawkheit san na khung khyh`ae rei? Dotua, nang kha rawsete minmin nynh ccaekia hozeihmou a khan`ae!” cite amaw kha bua a khia.
41015005	Thuasalama Jesu nynh kawkheit san bua khung khyh, tukeiccuze Pilat tuh a ngaeangthua.
41015006	Te tuh-e Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw`ae nynh a ngiaku`ae paw thungccahpaw lukheit kha Pilat nynh leih a luesah he.
41015007	Te doukunaw kya ccungccaw theihtu Barabbas acikuh paw tuh amaw ryte doukunaw a raekheih`ae paw ryte thungccah`ae.
41015008	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh mimaw kalan leih a cyipya`ae hawte oun cyipya ccaw cite thawte sia`ae zah Pilat kha a ngia`ae.
41015009	Thuasalama Pilat nynh, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw hynh nae kalan kae luesahpya oh ze na ry oh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
41015010	Pawccecize, alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mih eiung keiccu nynh Jesu kha a ah`ae cipaw Pilat nynh phe a ny.
41015011	Thuasalama Pilat nynh Barabbas kha mih hanlan oun sawpya ccaw cite alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha phe a hy vae`ae.
41015012	Te Pilat nynh bua khung`ae zah, “Tuhte lanze Jew`ae Siapharan na ci oh paw amaw hynh pawtemou nae cyisah ry oh?” cite bua a khia`ae.
41015013	Te minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade!” cite bua a sia`ae.
41015014	Oute Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou? Paw ahoy leipaw mou aning nynh a cyi?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade!” cite houh a sia`ae.
41015015	Te Pilat nynh ccungccaw zapi kha lunghoysah ry zah Barabbas kha mih kalan a sawpya`ae; te Jesu kha buasah`ae zah khiade khylan a ah vae.
41015016	Te Jesu kha rhawkaw`ae nynh Praetorium acikuh paw Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang a teekhae`ae; te minmin nynh rhawkawphu khaleih kha a kobua`ae.
41015017	Te minmin nynh sekakungpaw uccaw kha zingsah`ae zah hingpaw lukhung kha khepah`ae zah a lu kya a khungsah`ae.
41015018	Te, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” cite amaw kha a beih`ae.
41015019	Te minmin nynh a lu kha phaekute a bua`ae, te mih tuin te a thoi`ae, te ccukharutungte amaw kha a beik`ae.
41015020	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a sarya kou`ae te sekakungpaw uccaw kha phae`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha bua a lawsaku`ae, te khiade lan a cciakhae vae`ae.
41015021	Te Alexanda te Rufas mih paaw, Sairin khua paw, Simon tuh khua taraw langte yn thua zah a cceih paw kha Jesu vaelantung puih lan minmin nynh a riase`ae.
41015022	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha Luru Hmin acikuh paw, Golgotha hmin kalan khe a cciakhae`ae.
41015023	Te minmin nynh amaw kha mura te apykuhpaw misutui kha nia lan a pya`ae; thuasalama aning nynh neih khyh.
41015024	Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a khiade`ae tuh milu raveih nynh ccungthy dungte a uccaw`ae kha a neeku`ae.
41015025	Te awkhua suimilan ccangtakua ccyh khe minmin nynh amaw kha a khiade`ae.
41015026	Te amaw seibenaw`ae paw a luki kya ccawtawpya paw tuh: “JEW`AE SIAPHARAN,” ci nynh thua.
41015027	Te amaw ryte damiah`ae luning kha mah, lukheit a ranglang, te lukheit a voilang a khiade bua`ae.
41015028	Ou tuhte, “Aning tuh kawbya ei`ae paw ryte ria athua,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh accing vae.
41015029	Te khe pe a cceih`ae paw nynh mih lu thuhpah`ae zah, “Ah nopang! Tempal kha roh zah nin thung te phe a sakthui paw nang,
41015030	namaw te namaw kha khumkuh lah vaelantung kyate yn rungtua!” cite a sarya`ae.
41015031	Tuhhawte alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh mah, “Aning nynh mingccang`ae kha tuh a khum`ae, amaw te amaw tuh khumkuh kho khyh.
41015032	Kaening nynh kae muih sah lah kae zyn ccaw Israel Siapharan, Kri tuh atu vaelantung kyate yn rungtua sah,” cite amaw kha saryate mimaw te mimaw laku a ho`ae. Te amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae paw nynh mah amaw kha a saryabua`ae.
41015033	Te ninthu suimilan haw laening ccyh he thua te zete suimilan ccangthung ccyh cia ram balyn tuh pung amoh.
41015034	Te zete suimilan ccangthung ccyh kya Jesu nynh, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabach thani?” cite thawte a sia. Asuilan tuh, “Ka Pachia, ka Pachia, pawccemou kae hynh phe nae vuasya?” cipaw nynh thua.
41015035	Te a pe thadyn`ae paw abang nynh he a thae`ae tuh, “Dotua oh, aning nynh Elijah nynh a koku,” a ci`ae.
41015036	Te lukheitpaw nynh ccue zah phuesitung kha misutui ariapaw kya dung zah phaeku dung kya a hede koute nia lan pya zah, “Amaw khate um tua sah; Elijah nynh amaw law lan yn rungnuabung tah yn rungnuabung khyh tah dotua oh sih,” a ci.
41015037	Te Jesu tuh thawte sia zah a hy athang vae.
41015038	Te tempal lungkhu boei zokhawpaw tuh alu te alia cia ccangning lang ccarae seikuh.
41015039	Te amaw malang a thadyn paw rhawbawipaw nynh thawte sia zah a hy athangpaw kha he a muih tuh, “Thanccingte e Ccungccapaw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua!” a ci.
41015040	Asawpi langte a do`ae paw nopi`ae mah a um`ae; tuh-e`ae laku Meri Magdalin, te adih huapaw James te Joses mih nung Meri, te Salomi;
41015041	E`ae tuh Jesu Galilee ram kya a um lyaze amaw kha zui`ae zah ryalawpah`ae paw nynh thua`ae, te amaw ryte Jerusalem lang oun cceihkheih`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae patae a um`ae.
41015042	Te zete he a thua tuh, Paccynkunaw Nin athua keiccuze, tuh-e nin tuh, Sabbath nin thua maw nin nynh thua;
41015043	sawtua lan um paw kungsi memba lukheit athua paw, Pachia peenaw kha a ngaehoibua paw, Arimathia khua paw Josef tuh yn thua zah rhawhoyte Pilat kalan tee zah Jesu rhua kha a ngia.
41015044	Te Pilat nynh Jesu tuh phe chih kanmaw vae ngaw tang cite a ngaeangthua zah rhawbawipaw kha ko zah aning tuh phe chih ccaccing vae tou cite a khia.
41015045	Te rhawbawipaw kyate he a nyh te, Pilat nynh Jesu rhua kha Josef a pya.
41015046	Te Josef nynh nebaleihpaw boei kha re zah amaw kha vaelantung kyate sahbung zah boei nepaw khate a lung vae. Te lung kya a karyn`ae paw shaw lungkhu khe ccy zah shaw khu kha lungphepi tounua zah a fusung.
41015047	Te Meri Magdalin te Joses a nung Meri nynh a rhua a ccynaw`ae kha a do`ae.
41016001	Te Sabbath nin he alia te, Meri Magdalin te James a nung Meri, te Salomi nynh ccia lan zah amaw kha thuh khylan mynkhuhpaw satho kha a re`ae.
41016002	Te lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khuanin thua dyn khe minmin tuh shawku lang a cceih`ae.
41016003	Te mimaw te mimaw kya, “Shaw thufu kyate lung kha hung nynh mou aening oun nuepah cih?” cite a hokuh`ae.
41016004	Te minmin nynh he a do`ae tuh, lung tuh phe a nuekuh vae paw kha a muih`ae; tuh-e lung tuh myarya alepaw nynh thua.
41016005	Te shaw lungkhu lang tee`ae zah arawpaw uccaw ccuabalaepaw a kikuh paw ccangvaepaw lukheit ranglang te a dahung paw kha a muih`ae tuh a rih`ae.
41016006	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Nae ngaeangthua nan sah, a khiade`ae paw Nazareth paw Jesu kha nanning nynh na ccung oh. Aning tuh phe a tho vae! E kya um vae khyh. Amaw a ccynaw`ae hmin kha dotua oh.
41016007	Thuasalama la cceih oh lah a zuitu`ae te Piter kha aning tuh nae malang Galilee lang nynh a ccia; nae kya a ho hawte tuin kya amaw kha na la muih cih oh cite la hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.
41016008	Te minmin tuh shawku kyate thokuh`ae zah arangte a cceih`ae; minmin tuh thyngkuh`ae zah mih ngaeangthua; a ri`ae keiccuze hung sanmah kharyh hopah khyh`ae.
41016009	Atu Jesu tuh lonaw kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khe he a thothui tuh, a kyate raerangsaro lusari a deepya paw Meri Magdalin kyakhe masaty a langkuh.
41016010	Te Meri nynh cceih zah Jesu ryte langmaw lya a umkheih`ae paw nynh khui`ae zah a raw`ae lyakhe, kha-e kong kha a hopya`ae.
41016011	Te minmin nynh Jesu tuh a hiin vae cipaw te Meri nynh a muih cipaw he thae`ae tuh zyn khyh`ae.
41016012	Tuh-e koute zuitu`ae luning nynh khua taraw lang a ccia lya`ae khe, Jesu tuh ccangpaw muinsan lante mih kalan a langkuh.
41016013	Te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah kha-e kha tuhlaepaw kyakhe a hopya`ae; thuasalama minmin nynh kha-e kha zyn lae khyh`ae.
41016014	Tuhkoute luhaw laekheit nynh aepaw a koih lya`ae khe Jesu mih kyakhe a langkuh, te a thothuipaw Jesu a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae bya kha a zyn khyh`ae keiccuze, mih zyn leinaw te mih lungkhungnaw elan minmin kha a pe`ae.
41016015	Te Jesu nynh, “Laephipi balyn lang nanning la cceih oh lah rae paw miakaw kyakhe thehoypaw la ho oh.
41016016	Zyn zah baptisma-in paw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih; thuasalama a zyn leipaw ccungccaw tuh seibe athua cih.
41016017	Te a zyn`ae paw tuh e muihsanaw`ae nynh a zuiding cih`ae: Ka min liate minmin nynh raerangsaro`ae a dee cih`ae; minmin nynh bya thawpaw te a ho cih`ae;
41016018	minmin nynh fupaw`ae kha a kyng cih`ae; te a chisah khopaw asy kha a nia`ae zemah, pawtua um lan khyh`ae; ngeccih`ae tungvaw kuih khang cih`ae zah minmin kha a dansah cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
41016019	Ou tuhte Bawipaw nynh minmin kha a hopah`ae koute amaw tuh vaawran lang lawthung thua zah Pachia a ranglang khe a dahung vae.
41016020	Te minmin tuh cceih`ae zah ahmin takyh kya phungho`ae, Bawipaw nynh minmin ryte ryalah zah mih kya a zuikuh paw muihsanaw`ae liate bya kha a tynsah. Amen.
42001001	Kaening laku acyikuh paw, zyn athua ccaccing paw, a ho`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ccaw te ccakhung khylan ccungccaw patae nynh phe a tho vae`ae.
42001002	Tuhhawte atakaw lyaze mit te a muih`ae paw ccaekia`ae te bya hanlan ryalahtu`ae nynh kha-e`ae kha kaening kalan oun hopya`ae.
42001003	Tukeiccu kae mah atakaw te pawpaw balyn kha ahoyte phe ka thaethya koute kha-e kha na kalan athua thathyhte zei lan ahoypaw ka losah, sawtua lan um huaccepaw Theophilas.
42001004	Ou tuhte phe ae ccangpya vae`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ahmepaw ccaccing nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan nynh thua.
42001005	Judah ram e siapharan Herod ccyh lya Abija aphu kya-e paw Zakharia acikuh paw ranpibawi lukheit a um, te a zu tuh Aaron ccanung`ae kya-e thua zah a min tuh Elizabeth nynh thua.
42001006	Te minmin luning tuh Bawipaw kawpyapaw`ae balynte phung`ae kha ccaenaw um lei lan marya a zui`ae paw thua zah Pachia malang paryh adingpaw nynh thua`ae.
42001007	Te Elizabeth tuh a tin keiccuze minmin tuh ccaaw hoi khyh`ae, te mih luning te paryh mih kum phe atang vae.
42001008	Ou tuhte Zakharia tuh amaw a phu`ae ryte Pachia malang ranpibawi rya a law lyakhe,
42001009	ranpibawi ryalaw phung thyhte, ccungthy dung`ae zah aning tuh Bawipaw kya-e athyaapaw tempal lungkhu lang tee lan zah mynkhuhpaw-upaw kha u lan accan.
42001010	Te mynkhuhpaw-upaw a u ccyh lya tuin ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh athyaapaw tempal atolang khe sawsang`ae.
42001011	Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh a kalan langkuh zah mynkhuhpaw-upaw ccaboi ranglang khe a thadyn.
42001012	Te Zakharia nynh he a muih tuh a lungvawsaw zah rinaw a tungvaw accah.
42001013	Thuasalama vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Zakharia, rih nan, pawccecize na sawsangnaw tuh thaepya athua, te na zu Elizabeth nynh ccapaw ae sakpah cih zah a min tuh Johan cite na phu cih.
42001014	Te lungtuanaw te lungpawnaw na hoi cih zah a puinaw kya ccungccaw patae mih lungtua cih.
42001015	Pawccecize aning tuh Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kya a lesae cih, te misutui te aruikuh khopaw kha neih lan khyh; te aning tuh a nung vue ccaccei kya mawte Thyaa Muisaw te abeih cih.
42001016	Te Israel ccaaw`ae patae kha aning nynh mih Pachia Bawipaw kalan a paleih cih`ae.
42001017	Te paaw`ae thinlung kha ccaaw`ae hanlan paleih khylan, te kawngae lei`ae paw kha a ding`ae paw hawnaw kalan paleih khylan, Bawipaw hanlan ccungccaw`ae kha raeringkute paccyn khylan aning tuh Elijah kya-e muisaw thungnaw te Bawipaw malang a cceih cih,” a cipya.
42001018	Te Zakharia nynh vaaw ccungccapaw kha, “Pawcihtemou e hynh ka nyh cih? Pawccecize kae tuh a taw vae paw ccungccaw nynh ka thua, te ka zu mah a kum phe atang vae,” a cipya.
42001019	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Kae tuh Pachia umnaw kya a thadyn paw Gabriel nynh ka thua; te kae tuh nang kha hynh-e lungtua lan um paw thungpang hynh hopya lan te muihsah khylan saw paw nynh ka thua.
42001020	Te dotua, nang tuh e uccaw`ae accing makhia bya na ho lan khyh zah bya ho kho leite na um cih, pawccemacize accyh zawte accing cih paw ka bya`ae hynh na zyn khyh keiccu,” a cipya.
42001021	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh Zakharia kha ngaw`ae zah tempal kya khaw aro keiccu mih ngaeangthua.
42001022	Te aning he yn pou tuh mih kalan bya ho kho vae khyh; te minmin nynh aning tuh tempal kya vizin nynh a muih cite a tuase`ae; pawccecize aning nynh minmin kha kuih te tangpah`ae zah bya ho kho leite nynh a um vae.
42001023	Ou tuhte a ranpibawi ryalawpaw nin`ae he athang tuh Zakharia tuh a inn lang a ki.
42001024	Te tuh-e nin`ae koute a zu Elizabeth tuh ccaawpoi vae, te sawpaw sapangaw inn kya a khungkuh.
42001025	Te Elizabeth nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae laku te ka maethyanaw kha lawpya khylan kamaw yn do ccyh lya Bawipaw nynh hynhte yn cyipya,” a ci.
42001026	Te sawpaw sataruhnaw kya vaaw ccungccapaw Gabriel tuh Pachia kyate Galilee ram e Nazareth acikuh paw khua kalan,
42001027	David ciihan paw, a min Josef acikuh paw ccungccapaw kalan a chiapya vae`ae paw liaccady kalan saw athua; tuh-e liaccady a min tuh Meri acikuh.
42001028	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh tuh-e nung kalan thua zah, “Hei, maehoyccou nung, Bawipaw tuh nang ryte a um, nopi`ae lakuze nang tuh hythuaccou nung nynh na thua,” a cipya.
42001029	Te Meri nynh he a muih tuh a hopya paw kya a lungvawsaw zah hynh-e tuh pawtecihpaw byabeihkupaw mou athua ngaw cite a thinlung kya a tua.
42001030	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Meri, rih nan, pawccecize nang tuh Pachia kya-e maehoynaw kha na mue.
42001031	Te dotua, na vue kya ccaaw na hoi cih zah Ccapaw lukheit na saah cih, te a min kha JESU cite na phu cih.
42001032	Aning tuh a lesae cih zah Ahang huaccepaw Pachia Ccapaw cite ko athua cih, te Bawipaw Pachia nynh amaw kha a paaw David suitungkhung kha a pya cih.
42001033	Te aning nynh Jakob ciihan tungvaw zungzae a uk cih zah a peenaw tuh thangnaw um lan khyh,” a cipya.
42001034	Oute Meri nynh vaaw ccungccapaw kha, “Pise ka nyh leite pawtemou tuh-e tuh athua kho cih?” a cipya.
42001035	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh khung zah, “Thyaa Muisaw na tungvaw yn thua cih zah Ahang huaccepaw thungnaw nynh nang kha ae khung cih; tukeiccuze tuh-e athyaapaw lukheit nang na kyate yn pui cih paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw cite ko athua cih.
42001036	Te dotua, na pui oh paw Elizabeth, a tinnung a ci`ae paw mah a kum tang vae mawte ccaawpoi zah atu hynh sawpaw sataruh acih vae.
42001037	Pawccecize Pachia ryte tuh athua kho leipaw um lan khyh,” a cipya.
42001038	Te Meri nynh, “Dotua, Bawipaw a seenung nynh ka thua, na bya thyhhawte ka tungvaw thua vae sah,” a ci. Te vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Meri kyate phe a pou.
42001039	Te tuh-e nin`ae kya Meri tuh thokuh zah mua zung kya a um paw Judah khua langkhe arangte a cceih.
42001040	Te Zakharia a inn lungkhu lang tee zah Elizabeth kha a beih.
42001041	Ou tuhte Meri nynh bya beih paw kha Elizabeth nynh he a thae tuh, a vue kya neitaw tuh a thohkuh, oute Elizabeth tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih.
42001042	Te aning nynh roi accae lante a hopaw tuh: “Nopi`ae lakuze nang tuh hythuaccou nung nynh na thua, te na vue kya-e athae imua mah hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
42001043	Te ka Bawipaw a nung nynh kamaw kalan thua lante pawtemou e hynh kamaw kya acyikuh?
42001044	Pawccecize dotua, na bya beih paw roi ka nakaring kya ccahe accae te ka vue kya neitaw nynh a lungtua zah a thohkuh.
42001045	Te a zyn paw nopinung tuh hythuaccou nung nynh thua; pawccecize kha-e nung kya Bawipaw nynh a hopya paw bya tuh accing cih paw nynh thua,” a ci.
42001046	Te Meri nynh, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw nynh Bawipaw kha phu-esah,
42001047	te ka muisaw tuh ka Khumtu Pachia kya a lungtua.
42001048	Pawccecize a seenung kya-e zakawsangnaw kha a tuapya; pawccecize, atu kyate ciihan`ae balyn nynh kae tuh hythuaccou nung cite oun ko vae cih`ae.
42001049	Pawccecize athungpaw Bawipaw nynh alepaw uccaw`ae kha kamaw kya phe yn cyipya vae; te a min tuh athyaapaw nynh thua.
42001050	Te a ngaethya-umsanaw tuh amaw rawrih`ae paw tungvaw kya ciihan kyate ciihan kyacia atyn.
42001051	A kuihthaw te thawzung a langsaku; mih thinlung-tuakunaw kya a tansakuh`ae paw kha pung a phiasaku`ae.
42001052	Athungpaw ccungccaw`ae kha mih suitungkhung kyate sahbung`ae zah zakawsangsakuh`ae paw kha a hangthung`ae.
42001053	A vuelaw`ae paw kha kou ahoy lang a dang`ae, thuasalama a hoirung`ae paw kha sasete a kisah`ae.
42001054	-
42001055	Ah minpaaw`ae kya, Abraham kya, te a ciihan kya zungzae a hosya vae hawte, a ngaethyaumsanaw liathuinaw kya a seepaw Israel kha phe a bawng vae,” a ci.
42001056	Te Meri tuh Elizabeth ryte sawpaw sathung loukaw a umkheih`ae koute amaw a inn lang a ki.
42001057	Te Elizabeth tuh ccaawpui lan accyh he azaw tuh ccaaw pise lukheit a saah.
42001058	Te a innpaw`ae te a vaeccaw`ae nynh alepaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha Bawipaw nynh pawcihte nynh a tungvaw a langsapyaku cipaw he a thae`ae tuh amaw ryte mih lungtua`ae.
42001059	Ou tuhte nin taryanaw kya imua vindung aw lan minmin tuh oun thua`ae; te minmin nynh a paaw min thyhte Zakharia cite a min a phu`ae.
42001060	Te a nung nynh, “Tuhte thua khyh, thuasalama Johan cite nynh ko lan,” a ci.
42001061	Te minmin nynh, “Na pui oh paw kya hynh-e min a phukuh paw lukheit san um boi khyh,” a ci`ae.
42001062	Te minmin nynh a paaw kha pawtemou min na phury cite tangpya te a khia`ae.
42001063	Te a paaw nynh zei nawlan ccalung kha ngiakuh`ae zah, “A min tuh Johan nynh thua,” cite a zei. Te minmin balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua.
42001064	Te a khalang tuh vaekheihmawte yn ua zah a lae apia vae, te bya ho zah Pachia kha thehoysah.
42001065	Te mih pe um`ae paw balyn tuh a rih`ae, te hynh-e thungpang tuh Judah pee mua kya um`ae paw balyn kalan po athaan.
42001066	Te a thae`ae paw balyn nynh kha-e kha mih thinlung kya ccykekuh`ae zah, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw imua mou athua ngaw?” a ci`ae. Te Bawipaw kuih nynh imohpaw kha a umkhae.
42001067	Te a paaw Zakharia tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah profehbya a ho,
42001068	“Israel Pachia Bawipaw tuh thehoysah thuasah, pawccecize a ccungccaw`ae kha paebua zah a sawkhaw`ae.
42001069	Te a seepaw David ciihan kyate aening hanlan khumnaw ki kha a langsaku vae.
42001070	Laephipi athotakaw te a um paw amaw kya-e athyaapaw profeh`ae khalang kyate a ho hawte,
42001071	ah rhaw`ae kyate aening kha khum khylan, te aening oun hua`ae paw balyn kuih kyate luesah khylan,
42001072	ah minpaaw`ae kalan byakinpyakupaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha ccingsah khylan, te amaw kya-e athyaapaw byakin kha liathui khylan,
42001073	ah paaw Abraham kalan kae pya cih oh cite ccaesakute bya a kinkupaw byakinnaw kha ccingsah khylan,
42001074	-
42001075	ah rhaw`ae kuih kyate luesah ah thua vae oh thyhte, Pachia malang ah hiin lungkhu oh balyn, thyaanaw te dingnaw te, rinaw hoi leite aening nynh amaw rya ah lawpya nawlan oh nynh thua.
42001076	Te imohpaw, nang tuh Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia profeh cite ko na thua cih, pawccecize nang tuh Bawipaw a laanpi kha paccynpya khylan Bawipaw malang na cceih cih,
42001077	mih seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw liate a ccungccaw`ae kalan khumnaw kong nynaw pya khylan;
42001078	Ah Pachia kya-e nevyalyapaw ngaethyaumsanaw liate, ou tuh-e liate khuaninpaw paw nynh ahangnaw kyate aening kha oun paebua vae.
42001079	Mohnaw te chinaw mynlyh kya a dahung`ae paw kha awnaw pya khylan, daenaw laanpi lungkhu lang aening ccu kha cciakhae khylan nynh thua,” cite a ho.
42001080	Te imohpaw tuh lethung zah muisaw kya a thawsae, te Israel`ae kalan a langku nin a thua makhia aning tuh rangkaw nynh a um.
42002001	Oute tuh-e nin`ae kya Sizar Aukastas nynh ram pynpi balyn milu ccazing lawku athua cih cite kaw a tho.
42002002	E milu ccazing lawkunaw tuh Kuirinias hynh Siria ram uktu athua lyaze masaty ccazing lawkunaw nynh thua.
42002003	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh milu ccazing lawku khylan mimaw mih khua raveih lang a cceih`ae.
42002004	Te Josef mah David ciihan athua keiccuze, Galilee pee Nazareth khua kyate Judah pee Bethlehem acikuh paw David khuapi kalan khe,
42002005	a zu lang a hoiku paw, ccaaw a poi paw Meri ryte ccazing lawku khylan a cceih`ae.
42002006	Te minmin tuin kya a um`ae lyakhe, Meri tuh neitaw pui lan a ninsaw accing.
42002007	Te Meri nynh a Ccatawccaaw kha puisah zah nolung uccaw te lung zah saring looh-aenaw kua kya a isah; pawccemacize mikhia thuanaw inn kya minmin hanlan akhaan um vae khyh.
42002008	Te tuin ram kya khuazi khe mih tuuphu kha ring`ae zah rangkaw kya a um`ae paw tuuring`ae a um`ae.
42002009	Te dotua, Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mih kalan yn thua zah Bawipaw phu-enaw tuh mih pepan phaephae a aw; te minmin tuh myarya a rih`ae.
42002010	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh minmin kha, “Rih nan oh, pawccecize dotua oh, ccungccaw balyn hanlan myarya lungtua lan um paw thungpang hoypaw kha kae thuakhaepya oh.
42002011	Pawccecize atunin David khuapi kya Bawi Kri athua paw Khumtu kha nanning hanlan a pui vae.
42002012	Te e hynh nanning hanlan muihsanaw athua cih, nanning nynh nolung uccaw te a lung`ae paw nosi, saring aenaw kua kya a isah`ae paw kha na la muih cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
42002013	Te vaaw ccungccapaw ryte vaawran e vaaw ccungccaw zapi tuh vaekheihmawte oun langkuh`ae zah Pachia kha thehoysah`ae zah,
42002014	“Ahang huaccenaw kya Pachia tuh phuesah thua sah, te laephi vawlan daenaw um sah, ccungccaw`ae kalan a ngaethya-umsanaw um sah!” a ci`ae.
42002015	Ou tuhte vaaw ccungccaw`ae tuh minmin kyate vaawran lang he a cceih`ae tuh tuuring`ae nynh, “Atu Bethlehem lang cceih oh sih lah Bawipaw nynh aening oun nysah paw hynh-e uccaw acyikuh paw hynh dotua oh sih,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
42002016	Te minmin tuh arangte cceih`ae zah Meri te Josef, te saring looh-aenaw kua kya a ih paw Nosi kha a muih`ae.
42002017	Te minmin nynh he a muih`ae tuh kha-e Imohpaw konglang mimaw a hopya`ae paw kha thungpang po athaansah`ae.
42002018	Te tuuring`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya a thae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh e uccaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
42002019	Thuasalama Meri nynh e uccaw`ae balyn kha a thinlung kya ccykekuh zah pei a tua a roih.
42002020	Te tuurin`ae nynh mimaw kha a hopya`ae hawte a thae`ae paw te a muih`ae paw uccaw`ae balyn hanlan Pachia kha phu-esah`ae zah thehoysah biate a ki`ae.
42002021	Te Imua vindung awkunaw hanlan nin tarya he accing te, vue kya a poi mawze vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a phuty vae paw min khate JESU cite min a phu`ae.
42002022	-
42002023	Te Bawipaw Kawbya kya, “Ccatawccaaw pise miakaw tuh BAWIPAW kalan athyaa ci athua cih,” cite azeiku hawte, Mawsi Kawbya thyhhawte Meri ccikannaw nin he accing tuh minmin nynh imohpaw kha Bawipaw kalan thuakhae khylan Jerusalem lang a cciakhae`ae.
42002024	Te “Vafu saning, tukhyhze valaele” saning te silawnaw rae lan cite Bawipaw Kawbya kya a hoku thyhhawte silawnaw rae khylan a cceih`ae.
42002025	Te dotua, a min Simeon acikuh paw ccungccaw lukheit Jerusalem kya a um. Tuh-e paw tuh adingpaw te Pachia kalan a pyakuh paw nynh thua, Israel`ae ngaengannaw kha a ngaehoi paw thua zah Thyaa Muisaw a tungvaw a um.
42002026	Te aning tuh Bawipaw kya-e Kri a muih makhia chih la ngaw khyh cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh amaw kha a la phypya.
42002027	Te aning tuh Muisaw liate tempal voidu kya a thua; te a nung te a paaw nynh Kawbya phung thyhte a hanlan cyipya lan cite Imua Jesu kha he a teekhae`ae tuh,
42002028	Simeon nynh Imua kha a kuih kya dua zah Pachia kha hythuapya zah,
42002029	“Lesae huapaw Bawipaw, na bya thyhhawte atu na seepaw hynh daebabilan yn pousah ccavae;
42002030	Pawccecize na khumnaw kha ka mit nynh phe a muih vae,
42002031	Tuh-e tuh ccungccaw balyn muihnaw malang na paccynpaw;
42002032	Zenta`ae a awsah cih paw awnaw te na ccungccaw Israel`ae hanlan phuenaw nynh thua,” cite a ho.
42002033	Amaw konglang a ho`ae paw uccaw`ae kya Josef te a nung tuh mih ngaeangthua.
42002034	-
42002035	Te Simeon nynh minmin kha hythuapya`ae zah a nung Meri kha, “Dotua, e Imua tuh Israel`ae patae khuliaku nawlan te thoku nawlan, ccungccaw patae thinlung-tuanaw`ae kha a langsaku nawlan thethya oun ho cih`ae paw muihsanaw hanlan paccynde paw nynh thua. Oute thaloi nynh na hiinnaw-muisaw kha mah ae thuin cih,” a cipya.
42002036	Te Asher phin, Fanuel ccanung Anna acikuh paw profehnung lukheit a um. Aning tuh a kum phe tang vae, te vawpaw a hoinaw te kum sari cia a vawpaw ryte a umkheih`ae.
42002037	Te aning tuh a kum sungtarya kum pali cia numae zah sawsangnaw te loohaesungnaw te khuazi khuadae Pachia rya kha laah zah tempal kyate a pou lei nung nynh thua.
42002038	Te aning mah khahlya khe yn tee zah Bawipaw kalan lungtuabya a ho, te Jerusalem kya sawkhawnaw a ngaehoi`ae paw balyn kalan khe kha-e imohpaw kong kha a hopya`ae.
42002039	Te a nung te a paaw nynh Bawipaw Kawbya thyhhawte pawpaw balyn kha phe a cyih`ae koute Galilee pee mimaw mih khua Nazareth lang a ki`ae.
42002040	Te Imua tuh lethung zah muisaw kya a thawsae, hawnaw te phe abeih; te Pachia thawccinaw tuh a tungvaw a um.
42002041	Te a nung te a paaw tuh Kawtaw Poi kya kum takyh Jerusalem lang leih a cceih`ae.
42002042	Te Jesu tuh kum haw laening he acihte Kawtaw Poi phung thyhhawte minmin tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung`ae.
42002043	Te poi nin`ae he athang te a nung te a paaw tuh a ki`ae, Imohpaw Jesu tuh Jerusalem kya zya a umhy ung, te Josef te a nung nynh kha-e kha nyh khyh`ae.
42002044	Thuasalama minmin nynh a kikheih`ae paw kya nynh a umbua cih cite tua`ae zah nin kheit laanccia cia a cceih`ae; te mih vaeccaw`ae te a nyhkuh`ae paw kya a ccung`ae.
42002045	Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a muih vae khyh`ae tuh Jerusalem lang bua ki`ae zah a ccung`ae.
42002046	Ou tuhcihte nin thung a ccung`ae koute, minmin nynh amaw kha tempal kya ccangpatu`ae laku dahung zah mih bya kha ngae zah minmin bya a khia`ae paw kha a muih`ae.
42002047	Te amaw bya a thae`ae paw balyn nynh a thaethyanaw te a byakhungnaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
42002048	Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te a nung nynh, “Ka Ccapaw, pawccemou kaening hynh hynhte nae cyi? Dotua, na paaw te kae tuh thinphang te nang kha kae ccung,” a cipya.
42002049	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou kae tuh nae ccung oh? Ka Paaw rya ka law lan accan cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
42002050	Te minmin nynh mih kya a hopya`ae paw bya kha thaethya khyh`ae.
42002051	Te aning tuh a nung ry a paaw ryte cceihbung`ae zah Nazareth kya a thua`ae. Aning tuh minmin kaw a ngae; thuasalama a nung nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae kong balyn kha a thinlung kya a ccykeku.
42002052	Te Jesu tuh a pynsaw lethung zah hawnaw kya a kaethung, te Pachia te ccungccaw kya maehoynaw a mue.
42003001	Te Tiberias Sizar uknaw kum haw laepangaw lya, Pontias Pilat tuh Judah pee uktu thua zah Herod tuh Galilee pee kya tetrach thua zah a neitaw Filip tuh Iturea pee te Trakhonitis pee kya tetrarch thua zah Lysanias tuh Abilene pee kya tetrach thua zah,
42003002	Annas te Kaiafas tuh ranpibawi lupi`ae athua`ae lya, rangkaw kyakhe Pachia bya tuh Zakharia ccapaw Johan kalan yn thua.
42003003	Te Johan tuh Jordan vaw pepan ram balyn kya yn thua zah seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha a ho.
42003004	Profeh Isaiah bya`ae kha ccauh kya azeiku thyhhawte, a hopaw tuh: “Rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW laanpi kha paccynpah oh, a laanpi kha lawbabinlan raepah oh.
42003005	Hunghua miakaw kha bia thua cih zah mua alepaw te mua taraw miakaw tingbung athua cih, te akoupaw laanpi`ae kha dingsah athua cih zah doungih-doungae a um paw laanpi`ae kha hoysah, nginsah athua cih.
42003006	Te ccungccaw balyn nynh Pachia kya-e khumnaw kha a muih cih`ae,’ a ci,” a ci.
42003007	Oute Johan nynh amaw kyae baptisma-in lan oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi kha, “Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw thinrianaw kyate ccue khylan hung nynh mou nanning kha raering ae pya oh?
42003008	Tukeiccu ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw athae kha thaetua oh, te naemaw te naemaw kya, ‘Kaening nynh paaw lang Abraham kae hoi,’ cite mazi ci nan oh, pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia tuh hynh-e lung`ae balyn hynh Abraham ccaaw`ae lang a tangsah khopaw nynh thua.
42003009	Te atu mah hae tuh thingku leihpaw kya nungde athua vae, tukeiccu ahoypaw athae thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua,” a ci.
42003010	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite Johan kha a khia`ae.
42003011	Aning nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “Angki zung ning a hoi paw nynh a hoi leipaw kha pyabua sah, te aepaw a hoi paw nynh tuh-e hawte cyih sah,” a cipya`ae.
42003012	Oute nguntokhoi`ae paw mah baptisma-in lan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
42003013	Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Nanning kaw ae pya oh paw laelan la khoi nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
42003014	Te tuhhawte rhawkaw`ae nynh amaw kha, “Pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae. Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Hung ccungccaw sanmah la luade nan oh, hung sanmah ahme lei lante seibede nan oh, te na mue oh paw amee khate nae lungryachih sah,” a cipya`ae.
42003015	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh Johan hynh Kri thua vema, thua khyh vema cipaw mih balynte ngaehoinaw te mih thinlung kya a tua`ae lyakhe;
42003016	Johan nynh minmin balyn kha khung`ae zah a hopaw tuh: “Kae nynh nanning kha tui kya baptisma kae insah oh; thuasalama kamaw laeze athung huapaw Lukheit yn thua cciamang, tuh-e paw a ccukoh rui phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; aning nynh nanning kha Thyaa Muisaw kya te maee kya baptisma ae insah cih oh.
42003017	A zawnawpaw pahraw tuh a kuih kya um zah a sarahmin kha thyaapapinglan a cciccae cih, te chanvui kha a byng lungkhu lang a ruin cih, thuasalama asipaw tuh a chih kho leipaw maee te a rua cih,” a ci.
42003018	Te ccangpaw bya patae te thuihei`ae zah thehoypaw kha ccungccaw`ae kalan a hopya`ae.
42003019	Thuasalama tetrarch Herod kha a neitaw Filip zu Herodia konglang te Herod nynh a cyi paw ahoy leipaw balyn kha Johan nynh seinaw a muihsaku keiccuze,
42003020	Herod nynh a seinaw balyn vawlan, e hynh biachihte Johan kha thunginn kya a saw.
42003021	Te tuhcihte ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh baptisma-in`ae zah Jesu mah baptisma-in bua. Te saw he a sang tuh vaawran hungkuh zah,
42003022	Thyaa Muisaw tuh vafu hawte pyn lante yn langkuh zah Jesu tungvaw a ccuh, te vaawran kyate roi yn ccae zah, “Nang tuh na kya ka lungrythua paw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
42003023	Te Jesu kum sungthung loukaw acih tetuh ryalaw a tho. Ccungccaw`ae nynh Josef ccapaw cite a tua`ae; Josef tuh Heli ccapaw,
42003024	Heli tuh Matthat ccapaw, Matthat tuh Levi ccapaw, Levi tuh Melkhi ccapaw, Melkhi tuh Janna ccapaw, Janna tuh Josef ccapaw,
42003025	Josef tuh Mattathias ccapaw, Mattathias tuh Amos ccapaw, Amos tuh Nahum ccapaw, Nahum tuh Esli ccapaw, Esli tuh Naggai ccapaw,
42003026	Naggai tuh Maath ccapaw, Maath tuh Mattathias ccapaw, Mattathias tuh Semei ccapaw, Semei tuh Josef ccapaw, Josef tuh Judah ccapaw,
42003027	Judah tuh Joanna ccapaw, Joanna tuh Rhesa ccapaw, Rhesa tuh Zerubbabel ccapaw, Zerubbabel tuh Shealtiel ccapaw, Shealtiel tuh Neri ccapaw;
42003028	Neri tuh Melkhi ccapaw, Melkhi tuh Addi ccapaw, Addi tuh Kosam ccapaw, Kosam tuh Elmodam ccapaw, Elmodam tuh Er ccapaw,
42003029	Er tuh Joshua ccapaw, Joshua tuh Eliazar ccapaw, Eliazar tuh Jorim ccapaw, Jorim tuh Matthat ccapaw, Matthat tuh Levi ccapaw,
42003030	Levi tuh Simeon ccapaw, Simeon tuh Judah ccapaw, Judah tuh Josef ccapaw, Josef tuh Jonan ccapaw, Jonan tuh Eliakim ccapaw,
42003031	Eliakim tuh Melea ccapaw, Melea tuh Menan ccapaw, Menan tuh Mattatha ccapaw, Mattatha tuh Nathan ccapaw, Nathan tuh David ccapaw,
42003032	David tuh Jessi ccapaw, Jessi tuh Obed ccapaw, Obed tuh Boaz ccapaw, Boaz tuh Salmon ccapaw, Salmon tuh Nahshon ccapaw;
42003033	Nahshon tuh Amminadab ccapaw, Amminadab tuh Ram ccapaw, Ram tuh Hezron ccapaw, Hezron tuh Farez ccapaw, Farez tuh Judah ccapaw,
42003034	Judah tuh Jakob ccapaw, Jakob tuh Isaak ccapaw, Isaak tuh Abraham ccapaw, Abraham tuh Terah ccapaw, Terah tuh Nahor ccapaw,
42003035	Nahor tuh Serug ccapaw, Serug tuh Reu ccapaw, Reu tuh Peleg ccapaw, Peleg tuh Eber ccapaw, Eber tuh Shelah ccapaw,
42003036	Shelah tuh Kainan ccapaw, Kainan tuh Arphasad ccapaw, Arphasad tuh Shem ccapaw, Shem tuh Noah ccapaw, Noah tuh Lamek ccapaw,
42003037	Lamek tuh Methuselah ccapaw, Methuselah tuh Enok ccapaw, Enok tuh Jared ccapaw, Jared tuh Mahalalel ccapaw, Mahalalel tuh Kainan ccapaw,
42003038	Kainan tuh Enos ccapaw, Enos tuh Seth ccapaw, Seth tuh Adam ccapaw, Adam tuh Pachia ccapaw nynh thua.
42004001	Te Jesu tuh Thyaa Muisaw te beih zah Jordan vaw kyate a ki, te Muisaw nynh rangkaw langkhe a cciakhae.
42004002	Nin sungpali cia diabolos nynh a tuh-ou. Te tuh-e nin`ae kya aning tuh pawpaw sanmah ae khyh, te tuh-e nin`ae he athang tuh a vuelaw vae.
42004003	Te diabolos nynh amaw kha, “Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze e lung hynh sanlou lang a tang ccaw kawpya,” a cipya.
42004004	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘Ccungccaw tuh sanlou kyalya te hiin lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia bya miakaw te nynh a hiin cih,’ cite Ccathyaa kya azeikuh,” a cipya.
42004005	Te diabolos nynh Jesu kha ahangpaw mua kalan cciakhae thung zah ccyh sosoh kya laephipi peenaw`ae balyn kha marya a muihsah.
42004006	Te diabolos nynh Jesu kha, “Kawhoinaw balynte mih phu-enaw tuh kamaw kalan pya athua vae keiccu, ka pya ry paw ccungccaw kha ka pya, te nang kha hynh-e kawhoinaw balyn hynh marya kae pya cih.
42004007	Tukeiccu kamaw hynh nae beik lanze hynh-e`ae balyn tuh na kya-e athua cih,” a cipya.
42004008	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Setan, ka nuhlang thungkuh! Pawccecize, ‘Na Pachia BAWIPAW kha na beik cih, amaw kyalya kha rya na lawpah cih,’ cite Ccathyaa kya azeikuh,” a ci.
42004009	Te Setan nynh Jesu kha Jerusalem lang cciakhae zah tempal avawlan paccy kya nung zah amaw kha, “Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze, namaw te namaw e kyate toikubung tua.
42004010	Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘Nang khynsah khylan, a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha nang na hanlan kawpya cih`ae.
42004011	Na ccu kha lung kya na thuhku khyh nawlan minmin nynh mih kuih te ae dua cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
42004012	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha nang nynh na syntaw lan khyh,’ cite Ccathyaa nynh a ci,” a cipya.
42004013	Te diabolos nynh tuh-ounaw miakaw kha he a thangsah te Jesu kyate ccyh sosoh a poutaw.
42004014	Te Jesu tuh Muisaw thungnaw te Galilee lang ki zah amaw the tuh tuin ram pepan balyn po athaan.
42004015	Te Jesu nynh sinakok`ae kyakhe ccangpah`ae zah ccungccaw balyn nynh thehoysah`ae.
42004016	Te Jesu tuh a lethungnaw khua, Nazareth kyakhe thua zah leih a cyimae hawte, Sabbath nin kya sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah Ccathyaa ria lan a thadyn.
42004017	Te profeh Isaiah ccaleih kha amaw kalan a pya`ae. Te Jesu nynh ccaleih kha he a kia tuh hynhte azeikunaw kya a muih:
42004018	“BAWIPAW Muisaw tuh kamaw tungvaw a um, pawccemacize aning nynh ryachi`ae kha thehoypaw hopya khylan kamaw kha satho phe yn thuh vae; thinlung a koi`ae paw dansah khylan, ccungccaw`ae nynh a kyng`ae paw kalan sawkhawnaw kong hopya khylan, te mitmoh`ae kha ngawmuihnaw kong hopya khylan, vawsaw teing`ae paw kha luesah khylan,
42004019	BAWIPAW kya-e ngaehoi lan um paw kum kha hopya khylan, kamaw kha phe oun saw vae,” acikuh.
42004020	Te aning nynh ccaleih kha kue zah a ccytupaw kha a pya, oute a dahung. Te sinakok kya um`ae paw balyn mit nynh amaw kha riri a do`ae.
42004021	Te Jesu nynh tho zah minmin kha, “Atunin hynh-e Ccathyaa tuh nae nakaring kya na thae oh hawte phe accing vae,” a cipya`ae.
42004022	Te ccungccaw balyn nynh amaw kha ccaekiakhan`ae zah a khalang kyate a toikuh paw thawccinaw bya`ae kya mih ngaeangthua. Te minmin nynh, “E paw hynh Josef ccapaw thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
42004023	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh, ‘Sibawipaw, namaw te namaw kha dansakuh tua! Kapernaum khua kya na cyipaw kae thae hawkhate hynhe namaw na khua kya mah cyi tua,’ cite e phungtangbya hynh kamaw kalan nae ho ccaccing cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
42004024	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, profeh hung sanmah amaw khua kya tuh maehoynaw mue boi khyh.
42004025	Thuasalama thanccingte kae hopya oh, Elijah ccyh lya kum thung te sataruh cia vaawran thuakaw khaw thua zah ram balyn kya myarya ccakangcci lya, Israel ram kya numae`ae patae a um`ae.
42004026	Thuasalama tuh-e`ae lukheit kalan san Elijah kha saw thua khyh, thuasalama Sidon ram e Zarephath khua kya um paw numaenung kalan rou nynh saw athua.
42004027	Te profeh Elisha ccyh lya Israel ram kya vaethyakaepaw patae a um`ae, thuasalama Siria paw Naaman laelan hung sanmah thyaasah thua khyh,” a ci.
42004028	Te sinakok kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh hynh-e bya`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh myarya mih thinria.
42004029	Te thokuh`ae zah Jesu kha khua kyate dee`ae zah tuh-e khua a saahnaw`ae mua zung, chiadung lante dae dawleihkuh lang tu lan cite a cciakhae`ae.
42004030	Thuasalama Jesu tuh minmin ngaelaku te po pou zah po a cceih.
42004031	Oute Galilee ram e Kapernaum khua lang cceihbung zah Sabbath nin kya a ccangpya`ae.
42004032	Te kawhoinaw te bya a ho keiccuze ccungccaw`ae tuh a ccangpyanaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
42004033	Atu sinakok kya athyaa leipaw raerangsaro muisaw a hoi paw ccungccaw lukheit a um. Te aning nynh,
42004034	“Kae makhaete kae um sah! Nazareth paw Jesu, nang ryte kaening pawmou kae sekuh? Nang tuh kaening ro khylan tou nae thua? Nang tuh hung nynh na thua cipaw ka ny, Pachia kya-e Athyaapaw nynh na thua!” cite thawte a sia.
42004035	Te Jesu nynh pe zah, “Yccae nan kha-e paw lungkhu kyate pou,” a cipya. Te raerangsaro nynh kha-e paw kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya phe vuasakuh zah maw muihsah leite a kyate phe a pou.
42004036	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E bya hynh pawtecihpaw bya mou! Pawccecize kawhoinaw te thungnaw ryte athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae kha kawpya zah minmin phe a pou`ae,” cite mimaw laku kya a hokuh`ae.
42004037	Te a thungpang tuh tuh-e ram pepan e ahmin takyh kya balyn po athaan.
42004038	Te Jesu tuh sinakok kyate thokuh zah Simon inn lungkhu lang a tee. Te Simon a zu nung tuh myarya a nge ling zah minmin nynh a hanlan Jesu kha a ngiapya`ae.
42004039	Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung pe khe thadyn zah ngelingpaw kha a pe, te kha-e nung tuh phe dan, te nopinung tuh vaekheihmawte thokuh zah minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
42004040	Te khuanin he ccah tuh ccinaw aphuinphuin te a ccih`ae paw ngeccih`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae, te Jesu nynh tuhe` ae milu raveih tungvaw khe a kuih khang zah minmin kha a dansah`ae.
42004041	Te raerangsaro`ae nynh mah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw Kri nynh na thua,” cite sia`ae zah ccungccaw patae kyate a pou`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha pe`ae zah bya ho lan kaw ua khyh`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh aning tuh Kri nynh thua cipaw kha a ny`ae.
42004042	Te khua he yn dae tuh, Jesu tuh pou zah rangkaw langkhe a cceih. Te ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha ccung`ae zah amaw kalan a thua`ae, te minmin kyate a pou khyh nawlan a kang`ae.
42004043	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pachia peenaw kong hynh ccangpaw khua`ae kalan mah ka ho hahe cih, pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh kamaw tuh saw ka thua,” a cipya`ae.
42004044	Te Galilee pee e sinakok`ae kyakhe phung a ho.
42005001	Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Kenesaret kuaapi pe thadyn zah ccungccaw`ae nynh Pachia bya ngae khylan amaw kha phang lungnuaku`ae lyakhe,
42005002	kuaapi akin lang a um paw kohlung ccangning kha a muih; thuasalama ngasaw kyngtu`ae tuh kohlung kyate pou`ae zah mih mia`ae kha a sing`ae.
42005003	Te Jesu tuh kohlung ccangning lakuze ccangkheit, Simon kya-e lungkhu langkhe tee zah kuaapi akin kyate ccapyh nuesaku lan Simon kha a ngia. Te kohlung kya dahung zah ccungccaw`ae kha a ccangpya`ae.
42005004	Te bya a hopaw he a thangsah te, Simon kha, “Akhunaw langkhe zaw lah ngasaw kyng khylan nae mia`ae kha vuatua oh,” a cipya.
42005005	Te Simon nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Bawipaw, khuazi zidae kae vua zah ccangkheit san kae kyng khyh; thuasala zemah na bya thyhte mia ka vua cih,” a cipya.
42005006	Te minmin nynh tuhte he a vua`ae tuh myarya alungpaw ngasaw`ae kha bung`ae zah mih mia tuh vyavya a pae vae.
42005007	Te minmin nynh ccangpaw kohlung kya um`ae paw miavuakheih`ae paw kha oun cceih`ae sah lah oun bawng`ae ccaw cite mih kuih te a ko`ae. Te minmin tuh oun thua`ae zah kohlung ccangning te vya phungkuh lan ngasaw kha phe a bia`ae.
42005008	Kha-e kha Simon Piter nynh he a muih tuh, Jesu ccukharu kin khe bakhung zah, “Pou Bawipaw, kae tuh a seipaw ccungccaw nynh ka thua, ka kyate beih pou,” a cipya.
42005009	Pawccecize Simon te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw balyn tuh a kyng`ae paw ngasaw`ae kya mih ngaeangthua keiccu nynh thua.
42005010	Te Simon ryte a mungkuh`ae paw Zebedi ccaaw`ae James te Johan mah mih ngaeangthua. Te Jesu nynh Simon kha, “Rih nan, atu kyate nang tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh na kyng vae cih,” a cipya.
42005011	Te mih kohlung`ae kha laerang lang he thuakhae`ae tuh marya cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
42005012	Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh khua khuakheit kya a um lyakhe, dotua oh, vaethyaccinaw te phe abeihpaw ccungccapaw nynh Jesu kha he a muih tuh bakhung zah, “Bawipaw, na ry lan thua ze, kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” cite a ngiaku.
42005013	Te Jesu nynh a kuih dyng zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte vaethyaccinaw tuh phe athyaa.
42005014	Te Jesu nynh, “E kong hynh hung ccungccaw san la hopah nan cite kaw a pya, thuasalama la cceih lah ranpibawi kalan namaw kha la muihsakuh, te Mawsi kawbya thyhhawte minmin kalan ccaekia lang, nang thyaasah na thua paw hanlan silawkunaw kha la rae,” cite bya a tawsya.
42005015	Te amaw the tuh houhouh thaan zah ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw bya thae khylan te mih ccinaw kyate dan khylan oun sueluakuh`ae.
42005016	Te Jesu tuh rangkaw langkhe leih cceih zah saw a sang he.
42005017	Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh, Jesu nynh a ccangpya`ae lyakhe, Jerusalem kya te Judah pee te Galilee pee e khua`ae balyn kyate oun thua`ae paw Farasi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae tuh a dahung`ae, te minmin dansah khylan Bawipaw thungnaw tuh a langkuh.
42005018	Te dotua, ccungccaw`ae nynh kuihccuchihpaw ccungccapaw kha inawpaw te oun puih`ae zah amaw malang khe nung khylan teekhaenaw kha a ccungku`ae.
42005019	Te ccungccaw zapi keiccuze teekhaenaw he a muih vae khyh`ae tuh, innccukaly lang kaekhae`ae zah innccukaly kha kia`ae zah ngeccih kha inawpaw ryte ccungccaw`ae laku Jesu malang khe a sawbung`ae.
42005020	Te Jesu nynh mih zynnaw kha he a muih tuh, ngeccih paw kha, “Ccungccapaw, na seinaw`ae ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
42005021	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh, “Pachia sarya paw bya ho paw e paw tuh hungmou? Pachia kyalya laelan hungmou seinaw a ngaethya kho?” cite a hokuh`ae.
42005022	Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Nae thinlung kya pawccemou tuhte na tuaku oh?
42005023	‘Na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua, tukhyhze, ‘Thokuh lah cceih,’ cipya paw tou azoihua?
42005024	Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh laephi vawlan seinaw ngaethya lan kaw a hoi cipaw na ny nawlan oh,” cipah`ae zah, kuihccuchihpaw kha, “Nang kae hopya, thokuh lah na iphae kha lawkuh lah na inn lang cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
42005025	Te tuh-e paw tuh minmin malang vaekheihmawte thokuh zah a inawpaw kha lawkuh zah Pachia kha phu-esahte a inn lang a cceih.
42005026	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah rinaw te phe beih`ae zah, “Atunin ngaeang lan um paw uccaw`ae phe ah muih vae oh,” ci`ae zah Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
42005027	Te e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh pou zah ngunto khoinaw kya a dahung paw, Levi acikuh paw, ngunto khoitupaw kha a muih; te Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
42005028	Te aning nynh pawpaw balyn kha cciataw te thokuh zah amaw kha a zui.
42005029	Te Levi nynh a inn kya Jesu elan poi pi kha a tuapya, te tuin kya ngunto khoitu`ae patae te ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae um`ae zah Jesu te zuitu`ae ryte aepaw a koihkheih`ae.
42005030	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Pawccemou nanning nynh ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae ryte na aekheih oh zah na niakheih oh?” cite a seisah`ae.
42005031	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “A dan`ae paw nynh sibawi peki khyh`ae; thuasalama a ccih`ae paw nynh a peki`ae.
42005032	Kae tuh a ding`ae paw ko khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama misei`ae nynh a ngaesiku ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua,” cite a khung`ae.
42005033	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Johan zuitu`ae tuh pei looh-aesung`ae zah sawsangnaw a rae`ae. Tuhhawte Farasi`ae zuitu`ae mah a cyihbua`ae, thuasalama nang na zuitu`ae tuh pawccemou ae`ae zah a nia`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
42005034	Te Jesu nynh, “Zudy ccangvaepaw ryte a um`ae lya zudy ccangvaepaw a uno`ae kha looh-ae na sungsah kho cih oh tou?
42005035	Thuasalama, zudy ccangvaepaw kha a uno`ae kyate lawpya nin ccyh yn thua cih, te tuin nin`ae kya minmin tuh looh-ae a la sung cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
42005036	Te minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Hung nynh sanmah uccaw arynpaw kha uccaw athawpaw te bia boi khyh, tuhte a bia lanze uccaw athawpaw nynh arynpaw kha phe siasahkuh cih, bianawpaw athawpaw tuh uccaw arynpaw te ccawkuhthya khyh.
42005037	Te hung nynh sanmah misutui athawpaw kha arynpaw misu-saving bung kya ruin boi khyh, tuhte a ruin lanze misutui athawpaw nynh misu-saving bung kha phae pawsah cih zah misutui pung azu cih, te misu-saving bung mah phe aroh cih.
42005038	Thuasalama misutui athawpaw tuh athawpaw misusaving bung lungkhu lang ruin hahe lanpaw nynh thua, oute nynh paryhte akhyn`ae.
42005039	Arynpaw misutui kha phe a neih koute tuh hung nynh sanmah athawpaw misutui kha taloi ry he khyh, pawccecize, ‘Arynpaw nynh athuahua,’ a ci,” cite a hopya`ae.
42006001	Ou tuhcihte masaty Sabbath athang koute, vaeningnaw Sabbath nin kya Jesu tuh loo kya po cceih zah, a zuitu`ae nynh looh avui kha zukuh`ae zah mih kuih te noi`ae zah a ae`ae.
42006002	Te Farasi`ae abang nynh minmin kha, “Sabbath nin kya kawbya nynh cyi lan a ua leipaw kha pawccemou nanning nynh na cyi oh?” a ci`ae.
42006003	Te Jesu nynh, “David nynh amaw ryte um`ae paw ry mih vuelaw lya a cyi paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
42006004	Pachia inn lungkhu lang tee zah ranpibawi laelan hung nynh sanmah ae lan kawbya nynh a ua leipaw Pachia malang nungpyapaw sanlou kha lawkuh zah a ae, te amaw ry um`ae paw kha mah a pyabua`ae paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
42006005	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Sabbath Bawipaw mah athua,” a cipya`ae.
42006006	Ou tuhcihte ccangpaw Sabbath nin kya Jesu tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah a ccangpya`ae, te tuin kya a ranglang kuih achihpaw ccungccapaw lukheit a la um.
42006007	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh Jesu tungvaw seibenaw ccungpya khylan, Sabbath nin kya kha-e paw kha yn dansah ta, yn dansah khyh ta cite a dokhaw`ae.
42006008	Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha phe nyh zah a kuih achihpaw ccungccapaw kha, “Thokuh lah e kya thadyn,” a cipya. Te aning tuh thokuh zah a thadyn.
42006009	Oute Jesu nynh, “Nanning kha ccangkheit kae khia tua cih oh: Sabbath nin kya ahoypaw cyi lan kawbya nynh a ua tou? Tukhyhze ahoy leipaw cyi lan tou a ua? Hiinnaw kha so khum lan a ua tou? Tukhyhze chia lan tou a ua?” cite a khia`ae.
42006010	Te minmin balyn pepan khe do zah, Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Na kuih kha dyngtua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh a kuih kha dyng zah hawkheit lang hawte phe ahoy vae.
42006011	Te minmin tuh thinrianaw te phe beih`ae zah Jesu kha pawte cyi lan cipaw lukheit te lukheit byahokuh`ae.
42006012	Ou tuhcihte tuin nin`ae kya Jesu tuh sawsang lan mua lang cceih zah zi balyn Pachia kalan sawsangnaw a mang.
42006013	Te khua he dae te a zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah, luhaw laening kha a po`ae, minmin kha locceihtu`ae cite min a phu`ae.
42006014	Tuh-e`ae tuh: Piter cite min a phu paw Simon te a neitaw Andru, James te Johan, Filip te Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthai te Thomas, Alfeas ccapaw James, Zelot acikuh paw Simon,
42006016	James ccapaw Judas, te Jesu a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria nynh thua`ae.
42006017	Te minmin ryte Jesu tuh mua kyate rungbung zah bialae kyakhe, a bya ngae khylan te mih ccinaw dan khylan Judah pee balyn kyate, Jerusalem kyate, rili kin um paw Tai khua te Sidon khua kyate oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi te a zuitu`ae pataepi ry,
42006018	te athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh vawsaw a pya`ae paw ryte a thadyn`ae. Te minmin tuh dansah athua`ae.
42006019	Te Jesu kyate thungnaw pou zah ccungccaw`ae a dan`ae keiccuze ccungccaw zapi balyn nynh amaw kha hae khylan a ccung`ae.
42006020	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kalan khe dothung zah, “Nanning ryachi`ae, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh nae kya-e nynh thua.
42006021	Atu vuelaw`ae paw nanning, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize nae vue sosah athua cih. Atu a rah`ae paw nanning, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize nae nuin cih oh.
42006022	Ccungccaw Ccapaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae nynh ae hua oh zah mih kyate ae phia oh zah sarisarya ae nung oh zah nae the ae thyasah vae oh ze, nanning tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh.
42006023	Kha-e nin kya nanning lungtua oh lah lungpawnaw hanlan thohkuh oh! Pawccecize vaawran kya nae ryalaw mee tuh ale ccaccing; pawccecize kha-e hawte nynh mih minpaaw`ae nynh mah profeh`ae kha a la cyi`ae.
42006024	“Thuasalama a hoirung`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nanning tuh ngaengannaw kha phe na mue vae oh.
42006025	Vueso`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nae vuelaw cih. Atu a nuin`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nae rah nae khui cih oh.
42006026	Ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh thehoy ae ho vae oh ze nanning tuh paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize mih minpaaw`ae nynh ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha khate a la cyi`ae.
42006027	“Thuasalama ka bya a thae`ae paw nanning kae hopya oh, nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh lah nanning ae hua oh paw kha ahoypaw cyipah oh.
42006028	Nanning thya ae law oh paw kha hythuapya oh lah nanning ae sarya oh paw hanlan sawsangpah oh.
42006029	Te na mae hawkheit lang ae bia paw kha ccanglang kha mah tuapakuh; te na angkiccua ae lawpah paw kha na angkile lawku lan mah la kang nan.
42006030	Nang ae ngiakuh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pya lah na uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccaw kha bua ngia nan vae.
42006031	Te naemaw nae kya ccungccaw`ae nynh cyih`ae sah cite na ry oh hawte ming`ae kalan mah cyih bua oh.
42006032	“Pawccecize nanning ae sungsah oh paw kha na sungsahru oh ze, paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize mimaw a sungsah`ae paw kha a sungsahru`ae khaw.
42006033	Te nae kya hoynaw a rae`ae paw kalan hoynaw na raeru oh ze, paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize tuh-e hawte a cyibua`ae khaw.
42006034	Te bua yn pyaru cih cite na ngaehoi oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha phua na koisaku oh ze paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize patae bua mueru lan cite misei`ae kha a koisaku`ae khaw.
42006035	Thuasalama nanning nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh lah ahoypaw kha cyih oh, te pawpaw sanmah ngaehoi leite phua kha koisakuh oh; te nae ryalaw mee tuh ale cih zah nanning tuh Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia ccaaw`ae na thua cih oh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh lungtuabya ho lan a nyhthya leipaw te mihoy leipaw kalan thawcci thyapaw nynh thua.
42006036	Tukeiccu nae Paaw nynh mah ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi hawte nanning mah ngaethya-umsanaw hoi oh.
42006037	“Ming`ae kha byapia nan oh lah nanning byapia na thua lan khyh oh, ming`ae kha seibe nan oh lah nanning seibe na thua lan khyh oh, ming`ae seinaw kha ngaethya oh lah nae seinaw ngaethya athua ru cih.
42006038	Ming`ae kha pyabua oh lah nanning pyaru na thua cih oh, phe dybiate phe ryhbiate ahoyte toupah oh, te phe aleikuh lante ccungccaw`ae nynh nae by phe thua lang ae pyaru cih oh. Pawccecize na tounaw oh paw ccaccei khate nanning kha mah bua toupya ru na thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
42006039	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit hynhte a hopya`ae: “Mitmohpaw nynh mitmohpaw kha cciakhae kho cih ta? Mih luning te paryh hunghua lungkhu lang ccah lan khyh`ae ta?
42006040	Siaimua tuh a ccangpatu laeze thyahua khyh, thuasalama phe ccing lang ccangpya athua paw siaimua miakaw tuh a ccangpatupaw hawte athua cih.
42006041	Te namaw na mit kya um paw thingpyng kha tuaku leite, pawccemou na unopaw mit kya um paw athupaw taraw kha na dopya?
42006042	Namaw na mit kya um paw thingtung kha muihku leite, pawccemou na unopaw kha, ‘Ka unopaw na mit kya-e athupaw taraw kha kae la khoipah,’ cite na ho kho? Pou cyihruh paw, namaw mit kya-e ccungthy kha masaty khoikuh ty lah oute na unopaw mit kya-e athupaw taraw kha khoipya lan ahoyte na muih cih.
42006043	“Pawccecize ahoypaw thingku nynh ahoy leipaw athae thae khyh, ahoy leipaw thingku nynh zemah ahoypaw athae thae khyh.
42006044	Pawccecize thingku miakaw tuh amaw athae te ny athua. Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh hingpaw ku kyate thaeku lo boi khyh`ae, tahty ku kyate mah misu thae lo boi khyh`ae.
42006045	Ahoypaw ccungccaw nynh a thinlung kya-e ahoypaw sisua bung kyate ahoypaw uccaw kha a pousah, te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw nynh a thinlung kya-e ahoy leipaw sisua bung kyate ahoy leipaw uccaw kha a pousah; pawccecize thinlung kya-e phe beihpaw thyhte khalang nynh leih a ho.
42006046	“Te ka ho paw kha na cyih lei oh pite, pawccemou, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw,’ cite nae ko oh?
42006047	Hunghung zemah kamaw kalan yn cceih zah ka ho paw kha thae zah a cyih paw tuh hung te mou aloku cipaw kae muihsah cih oh:
42006048	Aning tuh phe khutheih lang tungkhu ccou zah lung vawlan tungpi bing zah inn a sak paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku; te tuileih tho zah tui nynh kha-e inn kha thawte asoh zemah hy khyh, pawccecize lung vawlan abingku keiccu nynh thua.
42006049	Thuasalama ka bya kha thae zah a zui leipaw ccungccaw tuh tungpi bing leite laephi vawlan inn sak paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku; kha-e kha tui nynh thawte he asoh tuh vaekheihmawte phe apu, te kha-e inn tuh khaleih aroh,” a ci.
42007001	Te ccungccaw`ae thaenaw kya a bya ho paw balyn kha he a thangsah koute Jesu tuh Kapernaum khua lungkhu lang a tee.
42007002	Te rhawbawipaw lukheit a ryalawpatu tuh ccih zah a chih vae cih, aning tuh a bawipaw nynh kou sungsahpaw nynh thua.
42007003	Te Jesu kong kha rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh, a rya lawpatu a dansah ccaw cite ngia khylan Jew piccang`ae kha Jesu kalan a saw`ae.
42007004	Te minmin nynh Jesu kalan he thua`ae te, “Aning tuh e hynh cyipya lan angaekuhpaw nynh thua a cipya`ae.
42007005	Pawccecize aning tuh kaening minphuin hynh sungsah zah kaening elan sinakok oun saahpah paw nynh thua,” cite Jesu kha thawte a ngia`ae.
42007006	Oute Jesu tuh minmin ryte a cceihbua. Te inn kyate asaw leinaw kya he a thua tuh rhawbawipaw nynh a ban`ae kha Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, namaw te namaw kha vawsaw pyakuh nan; pawccecize ka inn lungkhu lang nang tee lante kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh.
42007007	Tuhhawte kamaw te kamaw mah nang na kalan ccia lan ka ngaekuh cite ka tuakuh khyh, thuasalama bya kawkheit ho lah ka rya yn lawpatu tuh a dan cih.
42007008	Pawccecize kae mah kawhoinaw zakaw a um paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thua, ka kuihkaw rhawkaw`ae ka hoi zah lukheit kha, ‘Cceih,’ ka ci ze a cceih; te ccangpaw kha, ‘Rang,’ ka ci ze yn thua; te ka rya yn lawpatu kha, ‘E hynh cyih,’ ka ci ze a cyih,” cite a hosapya`ae.
42007009	E bya`ae kha Jesu nynh he a thae tuh a ngaeangthua zah nuhlang maeleihkuh zah amaw a zui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha, “Nanning kae hopya oh, hynhcih alepaw zynnaw tuh Israel`ae kya heize ka muih boi khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42007010	Te rhawbawipaw nynh yn saw`ae paw tuh inn lang ki`ae zah accihpaw ryalawpatu tuh phe a dan vae paw kha a muih`ae.
42007011	Ou tuhcihte awkhualan Jesu tuh Nain acikuh paw khua kalan cceih zah a zuitu`ae patae te ccungccaw patae nynh a zui`ae.
42007012	Te Jesu tuh khua koikua pe he a thua tuh, dotua, lukheit kyalya paw, numaenung ccapaw, achihpaw ccungccapaw oun cciakhae`ae paw a um, te khuapi kya-e ccungccaw patae tuh numaenung ryte oun cceih`ae.
42007013	Te Bawipaw nynh kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh ngaethyaumsanaw hoi zah amaw kha, “Rah nan,” a cipya.
42007014	Te Jesu nynh naekuh zah taang kha a hae; te kha-e a puih`ae paw tuh a thadyn`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ccangvaepaw, nang kae hopya, thokuh,” a ci.
42007015	Te achihpaw ccungccaw tuh dahung zah bya yn ho vae. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha a nung kalan a pya.
42007016	Te mih balynte mih ri mih kaw thua zah Pachia kha thehoysah`ae. Abang nynh, “Aening laku alesaepaw profeh nynh yn langkuh vae,” a ci`ae. Te abang nynh, “Pachia nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha yn paebua vae,” a ci`ae.
42007017	Te amaw konglang hynh-e thungpang tuh Judah ram balyn te a pepan e ram`ae balyn kalan po athaan.
42007018	Te Johan zuitu`ae nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kong kha Johan marya a hopya`ae.
42007019	Te Johan nynh a zuitu`ae luning kha ko`ae zah Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi cih?” cite a khiasah`ae.
42007020	Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae nynh Jesu kalan he a thua`ae te, minmin nynh, “Baptisma pyatu Johan nynh kaening hynh na kalan oun saw zah, ‘Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi ung cih,’ cite bya oun khiasah,” a cipya`ae.
42007021	Te tuin ccyh kya Jesu nynh ccungccaw patae kha mih ccihawnaw kyate thuasah, ahoy leipaw ccinaw kyate thuasah, ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae kyate thuasah a dansah`ae. Te mitmoh`ae patae kha ngawmuihsah`ae.
42007022	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “La cceih oh lah nanning nynh na muih oh paw te na thae oh paw uccaw`ae kha Johan la hopah oh. Mitmoh`ae nynh ngawmuih vae`ae, ccukhou`ae nynh a cceih vae`ae, vaethyakae`ae paw a dan`ae, nawpang`ae nawthae`ae, a chih`ae paw thosah athua vae`ae, ryachi`ae kalan thehoypaw kha hopya athua vae.
42007023	Te kae ka keiccuze a maeleihkuh leipaw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
42007024	Te Johan nynh a saw`ae paw he a pou`ae te, Jesu nynh Johan konglang ccungccaw zapi kalan a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Nanning nynh paw do khylan mou rangkaw langkhe na ccia oh? Khivae nynh a he paw phaeku do khylan tou?
42007025	Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccapaw do khylan tou? Dotua oh, lyccaccu lang uccaw lawkuh`ae zah kou hoy lang um`ae paw tuh siapharan inn kya nynh a um he`ae.
42007026	Thuasalama paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Profeh lukheit do khylan tou? Athua, nanning kae hopya oh, profeh lukheit lae heize alesae huapaw nynh thua.
42007027	“Ccathyaa kya, ‘Dotua, na malang na ccianaw ae paccynpah cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw,’ cite azeikuh paw kha kha-e paw kha nynh a honuathepaw athua.
42007028	“Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, nopi`ae nynh a saah`ae paw ccungccaw`ae laku Baptisma pyatu Johan laeze alesae huapaw profeh lukheit san um khyh; thuasalama Pachia peenaw kya adih huaccepaw ccungccaw tuh aning laeze a lesaehua,” a ci.
42007029	Te amaw bya kha ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh he a thae`ae tuh, ngunto khoitu`ae nynh heize Johan kya-e baptisma kha inte Pachia kha thyaaccousah`ae.
42007030	Thuasalama Farasi`ae te kawbya thya`ae paw tuh mih hanlan Pachia khuakhannaw kha ei`ae zah Johan kya-e baptisma kha in khyh`ae.
42007031	Te Bawipaw nynh, “E ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou ka losakuh cih? Minmin hynh pawtemou aloku`ae?
42007032	Minmin tuh kungkunaw hmin kya dahung`ae zah lukheit te lukheit kokuh`ae zah, ‘Phyly kae tupah oh zah na law khyh oh, michi law kae sahpah oh zah mah na rah khyh oh rei,’ cite a cih`ae paw imua`ae te nynh aloku`ae.
42007033	“Pawccecize Baptisma pyatu Johan tuh sanlou mah ae leite misutui mah nia leite yn thua zah nanning nynh, ‘Aning tuh khozi bahkuhpaw nynh thua,’ na ci oh.
42007034	Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh aete niate yn thua zah nanning nynh, ‘Dotua oh, aemoh paw te misu-sanphing khu! Misei`ae te ngunto khoitu`ae banpaw khu!’ na ci oh.
42007035	Thuasalama hawnaw tuh amaw a ccaaw`ae balyn nynh thyaaccousah athua,” a ci.
42007036	Te Farasipaw lukheit nynh amaw ryte looh-aekheih lan Jesu kha a ko. Te Jesu tuh Farasipaw inn lang cceih zah ae lan a dahung.
42007037	Te dotua, tuh-e khua kya um paw nopinung, miseinung nynh Farasipaw inn kya ae lan Jesu a dahung cipaw kha he a nyh tuh mynkhuhpaw satho alabasta lung tuihinbu bukheit kha ccyng zah,
42007038	Jesu nuhlang a ccu leihpaw khe thadyn zah a rah, te a ccu kha a mitphi te singpah zah a lu kya-e a sang te a fupya, te a ccu kha myng zah satho a thuh.
42007039	Te aepaw a kopah paw Farasipaw nynh kha-e kha he a muih tuh, “E ccungccapaw hynh profeh athua lanze amaw a hae paw nopinung hynh hung nynh thua cipaw te pawtecihpaw cipaw phe a nyh cih; pawccecize e nung tuh miseinung nynh thua,” a ciku.
42007040	Te Jesu nynh, “Simon, kae hopya ry paw ccangkheit a um,” a cipya. Te Simon nynh, “Ccangpatu, ho ccaleih,” a ci.
42007041	Jesu nynh, “Phuasawtupaw lukheit la um zah a laeba umtu`ae luning a um`ae; lukheitpaw nynh denari phua zapangaw laeba um zah mingccangpaw tuh sungpangaw laeba um.
42007042	Te minmin nynh pyaru lanpaw kharyh he hoi khyh`ae tuh kha-e paw nynh paryh mawte phe a ngaethya`ae. Tukeiccu yn hopya tua, kha-e luning`ae kyaze hung nynh mou phuasawtupaw kha a sungsah hua cih?” cite a khia.
42007043	Simon nynh khung zah, “Alunghua a ngaethya paw ccungccapaw kha nynh thua cih cite ka tua,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “Hmerarihlan nynh bya na pia,” a cipya.
42007044	Te Jesu nynh nopinung kalan maeleihkuh zah Simon kha, “E nopinung hynh na muih tou? Kae tuh na inn lungkhu lang ka tee zah ka ccu singkunaw lanpaw tui nae pya khyh, thuasalama e nung nynh ka ccu hynh a mitphi te yn singpah zah a sang te yn fupya vae.
42007045	Nang tuh kae hynh nae myng khyh, thuasalama e nung tuh inn kalan he ka tee ccyh te ka ccu hynh apaekuh lei lan po a myng.
42007046	Nang tuh ka lu hynh satho nae thuh khyh, thuasalama e nung nynh ka ccu hynh mynkhuhpaw satho te phe yn thuhpya.
42007047	Tukeiccu nang kae hopah, e nung a seinaw`ae pataepi kha ngaethya athua vae keiccu aning tuh pataepi a sungsah; thuasalama ccapyhpaw seinaw ngaethya athua paw ccungccaw nynh tuh ccapyh nynh a sungsah,” a cipya.
42007048	Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung kha, “Na seinaw`ae tuh ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
42007049	Te amaw ryte ccaboi kya a dahungkheih`ae paw nynh mimaw te mimaw kya, “Seinaw balyn a ngaethya paw hynh-e paw tuh hungmou?” cite a hokuh`ae.
42007050	Te Jesu nynh nopinung kha, “Na zynnaw nynh phe ae khum vae, daebabilan la cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
42008001	Ou tuhte, tuh-e koute, Jesu tuh Pachia peenaw kong thehoypaw kha hote, phyte khuapi te khua taraw kalan po khua a ccung. Te zuitu`ae luhaw laening tuh amaw ryte a mungkuh`ae.
42008002	Te ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae kyate, te ccihawnaw`ae kyate a dan`ae paw nopi`ae abang, raerangsaro`ae lusari a kyate a pou paw Magdalin a ci`ae paw Meri,
42008003	te Herod kya-e synriatu Chuza a zu Joanna, te Susanna te mih uccaw`ae khate Jesu a bawng`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae patae a umbua`ae.
42008004	Te ccungccaw patae tuh khua takyh kyate amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah pynkheihlan he sueluakuh`ae tuh Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh:
42008005	“Ccaciivuatu lukheit nynh a ccacii vua lan a cceih; te he a vua tuh ccacii abang tuh laanpi kin ccah zah ccu te syde thua zah vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh phe a tuh kou`ae.
42008006	Te abang tuh lung vawlan ccah zah ccahe a kei takaw mawte laedahpaw a um khyh keiccu karae arou.
42008007	Te abang tuh hingpaw`ae laku ccah zah hingpaw`ae ryte pokheih`ae zah hingpaw`ae nynh varyn a reihde`ae.
42008008	Te abang tuh laehoy kya ccah zah a po, te leih zakheit athae a thae,” a ci. Te hynh-e kong he a ho koute, “Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah!” cite a sia.
42008009	Te a zuitu`ae nynh, “Hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw asuilan tuh pawmou?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.
42008010	Te Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw kya-e byakhupaw`ae kong ny lan nanning tuh pya na thua oh; thuasalama mingccang`ae tuh, ‘mang muih`ae zah nyh khyh`ae, te mang thae`ae zemah a thaethya khyh`ae,’ keiccuze tousenaw phungpaw te hopya athua.
42008011	“Atu tousenaw phungpaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Ccacii tuh Pachia bya nynh thua.
42008012	Laanpi kin ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya a thae`ae paw nynh thua, te minmin nynh oun zyn cih`ae zah khumnaw oun muesei cih`ae cite diabolos nynh yn cceih zah mih thinlung kyate Pachia bya phe a lawpya`ae paw kha nynh thua.
42008013	Lung vawlan ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha he a thae`ae te lungtuate a lawkuh`ae paw nynh thua, te tuh-e`ae tuh sosoh hung zyn`ae zah tuh-ounaw ccyh kya phe khuliakuh`ae paw, atynpaw tharui a hoi lei`ae paw kha nynh thua.
42008014	Te hingpaw`ae laku ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha a thae kou`ae te cceih`ae zah thinphangnaw hoirungnaw te laephi hiin hoysanaw`ae nynh varyn ve`ae zah piccangthua lan athae thae lei`ae paw kha nynh thua.
42008015	Thuasalama laehoy kya ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha he a thae`ae te athyaapaw, ahoypaw thinlung te ccykekuh`ae zah lungsaenaw te athae thae`ae paw kha nynh thua.
