42008016	“Hung nynh sanmah maeekhua he a tyh te kee te khung khyh, ikhung kaw lang mah nung khyh, thuasalama oun tee`ae paw nynh awnaw kha a muih ccaw`ae cite maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung.
42008017	Pawccecize alangkuh lei lanpaw aphirupaw uccaw pawsang um khyh, ny lei lanpaw te muih lei lanpaw thuru khopaw uccaw pawsang um khyh.
42008018	Tukeiccu nanning pawtemou na thae oh cipaw raeringkuh oh, pawccecize hunghung zemah a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh houh pyachih athua cih, te hunghung zemah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh a hoi vosi cipaw hei kha lawpya athua cih,” bua a ci.
42008019	Oute a nung te a neitapaw`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw zapi alung keiccuze a kalan naekuh kho khyh`ae.
42008020	Te ccungccaw abang nynh, “Na nung te na neitapaw`ae namaw ae muih ry`ae zah atolang nynh phang thadyn`ae,” cite amaw kha a hopya`ae.
42008021	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ka nung te ka neitapaw`ae tuh Pachia bya thae`ae zah a zui`ae paw hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua,” a ci.
42008022	Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae ryte kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah minmin kha, “Kuaapipi khuraw lang khuin zua oh sih,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh kohlung te a cceih vae`ae.
42008023	Thuasalama kohlung te he a cceih`ae tuh Jesu tuh a ih, te kuaapipi vawlan khise yn tho zah kohlung tuh tui te phe beih zah minmin tuh vawsawpi a tung`ae.
42008024	Te zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan cceih`ae zah a tho`ae; te, “Bawipaw, Bawipaw, aening ah chih vae cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae. Te Jesu nynh thokuh zah khise te tuileih atho paw kha a pe`ae, te tuileih te khise tuh dae zah daebabi vae.
42008025	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nae zynnaw tuh teisangmou?” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh rih`ae zah mih ngaeangthua, te, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw aa mou! Khisang te tui balyn kawpya zah minmin nynh a kaw a ngae`ae!” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
42008026	Te minmin tuh Galilee ram te arawsekuhpaw Kadarene ram lang a thua`ae.
42008027	Te Jesu nynh laerang lang he thua tuh ccyhsaepi cia raerangsaro nynh bahkuh zah angki kiku leite, innvaw mah um leite, shawku kya leih um paw, tuin khua e ccungccapaw nynh yn tungku.
42008028	Jesu kha he a muih tuh, raerae sia zah amaw malang khe bakhung zah, “Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia Ccapaw Jesu, nang kha paw kae cyi mou? Kae hynh vawsaw beih yn pya nan cite kae ngiaku,” cite thawte a sia.
42008029	Pawccecize Jesu nynh athyaa leipaw muisaw kha kha-e paw kyate pou lan kaw phe a pya vae. Pawccecize kha-e muisaw nynh kha-e paw kha leih a kyng he; te kha-e paw kha sivarui te ccukhiinawpaw te khii`ae zah khia kya a nung`ae; te aning nynh a khiinaw`ae paw kha thoh pae zah raerangsaro nynh rangkaw langkhe leih a dee he keiccu nynh thua.
42008030	Te Jesu nynh, “Na min hungmou?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh, “Legion,” a ci; pawccemacize raerangsaro`ae patae tuh amaw lungkhu langkhe a tee`ae keiccu nynh thua.
42008031	Te raerangsaro`ae nynh mimaw kha akhunaw lungkhu lang ccia lan kaw a pya khyh nawlan Jesu kha a ngiaku`ae.
42008032	Te tuin kya mua vawlan voh`ae phu kheit rangpaekuh`ae paw a um, te minmin nynh khae` ae lungkhu lang tee lan kaw a ua nawlan amaw kha a ngiaku`ae. Te Jesu nynh kaw a ua`ae.
42008033	Oute raerangsaro`ae tuh ccungccapaw kyate pou`ae zah voh`ae lungkhu lang a tee`ae; te voh phu tuh apangnaw kyate kuaapi lungkhu lang thawmawte ccuebung`ae zah pung a phungkuh`ae.
42008034	Te voh a laetu`ae nynh kha-e acyikuh paw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ccue`ae zah kha-e kong kha khuapi kya te khua taraw lang balyn a ho`ae.
42008035	Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh acyikuh paw kha do khylan oun cceih`ae zah Jesu kalan oun thua`ae, te a kyate raerangsaro`ae a pou paw ccungccapaw tuh Jesu ccu leihpaw khe dahung zah uccaw a lawku paw te a thinlung akyh vae paw kha he muih`ae tuh a rih`ae.
42008036	Raerangsaro`ae bahkuhpaw ccungccapaw tuh pawcihte nynh a dan cipaw kha a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae paw kha a hopyabua`ae.
42008037	Oute Kadarene ram kya um`ae paw ccungccaw zapi balyn nynh eih rih kaesy`ae zah mih kyate a pou nawlan Jesu kha a ngia`ae; te Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah phe a ki.
42008038	Te a kyate raerangsaro a pou vae paw ccungccapaw nynh Jesu ryte umbua lan a ngiaku. Thuasalama Jesu nynh,
42008039	“Namaw na inn lang la ki lah Pachia nynh na hanlan pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae nynh ae cyipya cipaw kha la ho,” cite hopah zah a saw. Te aning nynh cceih zah Jesu nynh pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a hanlan a cyipya cipaw kha khuapi balyn kya a hopya`ae.
42008040	Ou tuhcihte Jesu he a ki tuh, ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae, pawccecize minmin balyn nynh amaw kha a ngaw`ae keiccu nynh thua.
42008041	Te, dotua, sinakok uktu, Jairu acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit yn thua zah Jesu ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah a inn lang ccia lan amaw kha a ngiaku.
42008042	Pawccecize aning nynh kum haw laening loukaw acih vae paw, ccanung lukheit kyalya hoi zah tuh-e nung tuh vyavya a chih. Thuasalama Jesu he a cceih tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh phang lungnuaku`ae.
42008043	Te kum haw laening cia chii lua ccinaw hoi zah a hoi paw balyn sibawi`ae kya marya thangkuh salamah hung kyate san a dan kho vae leipaw nopinung lukheit nynh,
42008044	amaw nuhlang khe yn thua zah a boei dung kha zya a hae; te vaekheihmawte a chii lua paw tuh phe akang.
42008045	Te Jesu nynh, “Hungmou yn hae?” a ci. Ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kae nyh khyh he a ci`ae tuh Piter te amaw ryte a umkheih`ae paw nynh, “Bawipaw, ccungccaw zapi nynh phang ae lungnuakuh`ae zah ae bekuh`ae pite, nang nynh, ‘Hungmou yn hae?’ na ci,” cite a cipya`ae.
42008046	Te Jesu nynh, “Lukhakheit nynh phe yn hae, pawccecize ka kyate thungnaw a pou paw kha ka ny,” a ci.
42008047	Te nopinung nynh kae hynh ka thurukuh kho vae lan khyh cipaw kha he a nyh tuh thyngkute cceih zah amaw malang khe bakhung zah pawkeiccu nynh ka hae cipaw te vaekheihmawte phe a dannawpaw kong kha ccungccaw balyn malang khe a hopya.
42008048	Te Jesu nynh, “Ka ccanung, na thawmuin sah, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae, daebabilan la cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
42008049	Tuhte a ho cciamang lya tuin sinakok uktupaw inn kyate ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha, “Na ccanung kha phe chih vae, Ccangpatupaw kha vawsaw pya nan vae,” a cipya.
42008050	Thuasalama Jesu nynh kha-e kha he a thae tuh, “Rih nan, zyn kyalya zyn lah na ccanung tuh a dan cih,” cite sinakok uktupaw kha a hopya.
42008051	Te inn kya he a thua tuh, Piter, James te Johan, te imohnung a nung te a paaw laelan hung sanmah inn lungkhu lang tee lan Jesu nynh ua khyh`ae.
42008052	Te inn lungkhu e ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh rah`ae zah a khui`ae; thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Rah nan oh, imohnung tuh chih khyh, thuasalama a i,” a ci.
42008053	Te a chih cipaw phe ny`ae paw thua zah minmin nynh Jesu kha saryate a nuinse`ae.
42008054	Te Jesu nynh minmin balyn kha pousah`ae zah imohnung kha a kuih te kyng zah, “Imohnung, thokuh,” cite a ko.
42008055	Te a muisaw tuh bua thua zah, imohnung tuh vaekheihmawte po a thokuh; te amaw kha aepaw pya oh cite kaw a pya`ae.
42008056	Te a paaw te a nung tuh mih ngaeangthua, thuasalama Jesu nynh acyikuh paw kha hung ccungccaw sanmah na hopah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha byatawsya`ae.
42009001	Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah raerangsaro`ae balyn tungvaw thungnaw te ccinaw`ae dansah nawlan minmin kha kawhoinaw a pya`ae.
42009002	Te aning nynh Pachia peenaw kong ho khylan te ngeccih`ae dansah khylan minmin kha a saw`ae.
42009003	Te minmin kha, “Nae khuaccungnaw hanlan pawsang mah phukuh nan oh, hoitang, zaw, sanlou, phua mah phukuh nan oh.
42009004	Te pawtecihpaw inn kya na tee oh thua zemah tuin kyakhe la um oh lah kha-e kyate la pou oh.
42009005	Te hunghung zemah nanning kha innccung ae doih oh thua ze, kha-e khua kyate he na pou oh te minmin arawsetu ccaekia lang nae ccu kyate vuiping kha la pheihkuh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42009006	Te minmin tuh pou`ae zah thehoypaw kha hote ahmin takyh kya ngeccih dansah biate khua takyh langkhe khua a ccung`ae.
42009007	Atu Jesu nynh a cyipaw balyn kha Herod tetrach nynh a thae tuh a ngaeangthua, pawccemacize ccungccaw abang nynh Johan tuh a chih`ae paw kyate phe a thothui vae cite a ho`ae.
42009008	Te abang nynh Elijah nynh yn langkuh vae a ci`ae, te mingccang`ae nynh arynpaw profeh`ae lukhakheit nynh bua yn thothui vae a ci`ae.
42009009	Te Herod nynh, “Johan tuh kae nynh a lu phe ka paesah vae`ae, thuasalama hynhcihte a thungpang ka thae paw tuh-e paw tuh hungmou athua?” a ci. Tukeiccu Jesu kha muih lan a ccung.
42009010	Te locceihtu`ae nynh he oun ki`ae tuh mimaw nynh a cyi`ae paw balyn kha amaw kha a hopya`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah Bethsaida acikuh paw khua te asekuhpaw rangkaw langkhe mih makhaete a cciakhae`ae.
42009011	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e kha he a nyh`ae tuh amaw kha a zui`ae, te Jesu nynh minmin kha lehkhan`ae zah mih kalan Pachia peenaw kong kha a hopya`ae, te dansah ahopaw ccungccaw`ae kha a dansah`ae.
42009012	Te khuazi lan he cih tuh, luhaw laening nynh oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Ccungccaw`ae hynh hin pepan e khuapi`ae kalan te khua taraw`ae kalan cceih`ae sah lah ryanaw te aepaw a mueku ccaw`ae minmin hynh saw`ae; pawccecize aening tuh e rangkaw kya nynh ah um oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42009013	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Minmin kha ae lanpaw pya oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Kaening nynh kae cceih cih zah e ccungccaw`ae balyn hanlan aepaw kae re khyh lanze, sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning laelan pawsang kae hoi khyh,” a ci`ae.
42009014	Pawccecize tuin kya pise piccang`ae thungpangaw loukaw a um`ae. Te a zuitu`ae kha, “Phu kheit kya sungpangaw ccite minmin kha dahungsah oh,” a cipya`ae.
42009015	Te zuitu`ae nynh ou tuhte cyih`ae zah minmin balyn kha a dahungsah`ae.
42009016	Oute Jesu nynh sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning kha laah zah vaawran lang dothung zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah ccungccaw zapi malang nyapya lan a zuitu`ae kha a pya`ae.
42009017	Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah mih vue phe so kou, te alaepaw a eihpaw kha kee haw laening a khuin`ae.
42009018	Te ou tuhte Jesu tuh a makhaete sawsang lyakhe, a zuitu`ae oun thuabua`ae zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw hynh hung oun ci`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae.
42009019	Te minmin nynh, “Baptisma pyatu Johan ae ci`ae, thuasalama abang nynh Elijah ae ci`ae, te mingccang`ae nynh langmaw lya-e profeh lukhakheit nynh bua a thothui vae ae ci`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
42009020	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama nanning nynh so kae hynh hung nae ci oh mou?” cite a khia`ae. Piter nynh, “Nang tuh Pachia kya-e Kri nynh na thua,” a ci.
42009021	Te Jesu nynh kha-e uccaw kha hung sanmah a hopya khyh nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya`ae zah tyntetyn lang byataw`ae.
42009022	Te, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh patae yn teing hahe cih, te piccang`ae, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh oun vua cih`ae, oun theih cih`ae, te nin thungnaw kya yn thothui cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
42009023	Te mih balyn kyakhe, “Lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn zui ry lan thua ze, amaw te amaw kha yn vuakuh sah lah nin takyh a vaelantung kha puihkuh sah, te kamaw yn zui sah.
42009024	Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh ry paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a shung cih, thuasalama hunghung zemah kamaw keiccuze a hiinnaw kha a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh cih.
42009025	Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh laephipi hynh khaleih a mue ze so amaw te amaw kha a shung lanze, tukhyhze ro athua ze, a hanlan pawmou athane?
42009026	Pawccecize hunghung zemah kamaw te ka bya kha a mae yn thyakhae paw tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh amaw phu-enaw, a Paaw phu-enaw te athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae phu-enaw ry he yn thua te kha-e paw kha a maethyakhae ru cih.
42009027	Thuasalama nanning kha byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw kha a muih`ae cia chinaw a tytua cih lei`ae paw ccungccaw abang e kya a um`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42009028	Ou tuhcihte e bya a ho koute nin tarya loukaw he acih tuh Jesu nynh Piter, Johan te James kha cciakhae`ae zah sawsang lan mua langkhe a cceihthung.
42009029	Te saw he a sang tuh a mae muinsan tuh rulaekuh zah a uccaw arawpaw tuh phaephae a ah.
42009030	Te, dotua, ccungccaw luning tuh amaw ryte byahokuh`ae; tuh-e`ae tuh Mawsi te Elijah nynh thua`ae.
42009031	Minmin tuh phu-enaw te oun langkuh`ae zah Jerusalem kya Jesu nynh a ccingsah vae cih paw a chi lanpaw kong kha a ho`ae.
42009032	Thuasalama Piter te a ban`ae tuh a ngawphukuh`ae; te he a thaekuh`ae tuh, Jesu phu-enaw te amaw ryte a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw luning kha a muih`ae.
42009033	Ou tuhte minmin nynh amaw kyate he phiakuh`ae tuh Piter nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, e kya um paw tuh kaening elan ahoy; te bu ccangthung kae sak sah, na hanlan ccangkheit, Mawsi hanlan ccangkheit te Elijah hanlan ccangkheit,” cite paw nynh ka ho cipaw ny leite a hopya.
42009034	Tuhte a ho cciamang lya, maeking yn langkuh zah minmin kha pung a khung`ae, te maeking lungkhu lang a tee`ae tuh minmin tuh a rih`ae.
42009035	Te maeking kyate roi yn ccae zah, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw bya kha la ngae oh,” a ci.
42009036	Te roi he adae kou tuh Jesu makhae nynh a muih vae`ae. Te zuitu`ae nynh khahlya a muih`ae paw kha hung kya sanmah ho leite daetedae lang nynh a um`ae.
42009037	Ou tuhcihte, awkhualan minmin tuh mua kyate he oun rungbung`ae tuh ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
42009038	Te, dotua, ccungccaw zapi kyate lukheitpaw nynh sia zah, “Ccangpatupaw, ka ccapaw nae dopya nawlan kae ngiaku, pawccecize aning tuh lukheit kyalya paw ka ccaaw nynh thua.
42009039	Te, dotua, muisaw nynh kyng zah vaekheihmawte raerae leih a sia, te a taraphue phe thua lan a reih, te phe ccihtheih lang tua zah a kyate poutaw lan kou arusah.
42009040	Te kha-e kha dee lan na zuitu`ae ka ngia`ae zah minmin nynh dee kho khyh`ae,” cite a hopya.
42009041	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou zyn lei`ae te a ccouseikuh`ae paw ciihan`ae, hohse cia mou nae kya ka um ung cih zah kae ngaesangpah ung cih oh? Na ccapaw tuh hynhlang yn cciakhae,” a ci.
42009042	Te imohpaw nynh he a cceih tuh raerangsaro nynh laephi kya khulia zah karaehosah. Te Jesu nynh athyaa leipaw muisaw kha pe zah imohpaw kha a dansah, te a paaw kalan bua a pya.
42009043	Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Pachia a lesaenaw kya mih ngaeangthua. Thuasalama Jesu nynh a cyipaw balyn kya ccungccaw miakaw mih ngaeangthua lyakhe, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha,
42009044	“Hynh-e bya`ae hynh nae nakaring lungkhu lang tee sah, pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan ah a thua vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
42009045	Thuasalama hynh-e a bya hopaw tuh minmin kyate thuru thua zah minmin nynh nyhthya khyh`ae zah thaethya khyh`ae, te tuh-e a bya hopaw konglang minmin nynh amaw khia lan mah phe a rih`ae.
42009046	Oute zuitu`ae laku hungmou alesae huacce cih cipaw eikunaw a um.
42009047	Te Jesu nynh mih thinlung-tuanaw kha nyte imua lukheit kha laah zah amaw pe khe a nung,
42009048	te minmin kha, “Hunghung zemah hynh-e imua taraw hynh ka min te a lawkuh paw tuh kamaw kha yn lawkuh paw nynh thua, te hunghung zemah kamaw kha yn lawkuh paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a lawkuh paw nynh thua. Pawccecize nanning balyn lakuze adih huaccepaw tuh alesaepaw athua cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
42009049	Te Johan nynh, “Bawipaw, lukheitpaw nynh na min te raerangsaro a dee paw kha kaening nynh kae muih, te aning tuh kaening ryte a zuiku bua khyh keiccu kaening nynh kae khee,” a cipya.
42009050	Te Jesu nynh, “Kha-e paw kha khee nan oh, pawccecize aening kha oun rawse leipaw tuh aening kalan a pang paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
42009051	Ou tuhcihte amaw kha vaaw lang lawthung lan accyh he azaw tuh, Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang ccia lan phang a noukuh.
42009052	Te zeccuetu`ae kha a malang a saw`ae, te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah amaw hanlan paccyn lan Samaria`ae khua khuakheit lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
42009053	Jerusalem lang po suhlue lan a nouku keiccu kha-e khuaccaw`ae nynh amaw kha thua sah khyh`ae.
42009054	Te a zuitu`ae James te Johan nynh kha-e kha he muih`ae tuh, “Bawipaw, Elijah nynh a cyi hawte, minmin hynh marya usah khylan vaawran kyate maee ccawsah bung lan kawpya lan nae ry ta?” cite a khia`ae.
42009055	Thuasalama Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah, “Nanning tuh pawtahawpaw muisaw kya-e nynh kae thua cipaw na nyhkuh khyh oh.
42009056	Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae hiinnaw ro khylan yn thua khyh, thuasalama khum khylan nynh yn thua,” cite minmin kha a pe`ae. Te minmin tuh ccangpaw khua kalan khe a cceih`ae.
42009057	Ou tuhcihte minmin tuh laanpi kya a ccia`ae lyakhe, ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, na ccianaw miakaw lang kae zui cih,” cite a cipya.
42009058	Te Jesu nynh, “Rang-ui`ae nynh laekarung a hoi`ae, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh bu a hoi`ae, thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a lu nungnaw san hoi khyh,” a cipya.
42009059	Te Jesu nynh mingccangpaw kha, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya. Thuasalama aning nynh, “Bawipaw, masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka paaw kha ka la uh hin sah,” a ci.
42009060	Jesu nynh, “A chih`ae paw nynh mih michi`ae kha la uh`ae sah, thuasalama nang tuh cceih lah Pachia peenaw kong kha la ho,” a cipya.
42009061	Te mingccangpaw nynh mah, “Bawipaw, namaw kae zui cih, thuasalama masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka inn kya um`ae paw kha ka la beihsya hin`ae,” a cipya.
42009062	Te Jesu nynh, “Hung zemah, thuetung kha kyng zah nuhlang a maeleihkuh paw tuh Pachia peenaw hanlan ngaekuh khyh,” a cipya.
42010001	E uccaw`ae koute Bawipaw nynh ccangpaw sungsari kha mah khang`ae zah amaw a cceih vae cihnaw lang khua takyhte ahmin takyh langkhe, minmin kha luning luning ccite amaw malang khe a saw`ae.
42010002	Oute minmin kha, “Loohrue lanpaw tuh alung ccaccing, thuasalama loohruetu`ae tuh azya, tukeiccu nanning nynh, loohruetu Bawipaw nynh a loohruenaw lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae yn saw nawlan sawsang oh.
42010003	Nanning la cceih oh; dotua oh, suizaw`ae laku tuu`ae saw hawte nanning kha kae saw oh.
42010004	Phuabu thuasah, sohrae thuasah, ccukoh thuasah phukuh nan oh, te laanpi kya hung ccungccaw sanmah la beih nan oh.
42010005	“Te pawpaw inn kya na tee oh thua zemah, ‘E inn kya daenaw um sah,’ cite masaty la ho oh.
42010006	Te daenaw ccapaw tuh tuin kya a um lanze, na ho oh paw daenaw tuh tuin kya a um cih, a um khyh lanze nae kalan bua yn ki cih.
42010007	Te tuh-e inn kyakhe um oh lah ae pya oh paw kha la ae oh lah neih oh, pawccecize ryalahtu tuh a ryalaw mee mue lan accan. Inn kheit kyate inn kheit kalan la cceih nan oh.
42010008	“Te pawpaw khua lungkhu lang na tee oh zah ae thuasah oh ze, nae malang ae nyapya oh paw kha la ae oh.
42010009	Te khe kya a um paw ngeccih`ae kha la dansah oh lah minmin kha, ‘Pachia peenaw tuh nae kalan yn naekuh vae,’ cite la hopah oh.
42010010	Thuasalama pawpaw khua lungkhu lang na tee oh zah ae thuasah khyh oh ze, tuh-e khua kya-e laanpi`ae kalan khe po la cceih oh lah,
42010011	‘Kaening kya abekuhpaw nae khua-e vuiping ccaccei hynh nanning rawsete kae pheihku, tuhzemah Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kalan yn naekuh vae cipaw hynh la nyh ccaccing oh,’ cite minmin kha la hopah oh.
42010012	Thuasalama tuh-e Nin kya tuh-e khua hanlan laeze Sodom khuapi hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih cipaw nanning kae hopya oh.
42010013	“Khorazin, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Bethsaida, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Pawccecize nanning kya acyikuh paw khuaruaru ryalawnaw`ae hynh Tai khua te Sidon khua kyakhe a la cyiku lanze, minmin tuh buri uccaw lawkute buhaw kya dahungte khawlya mawte phe a la ngaesikuh vae cih`ae.
42010014	Thuasalama byapianaw kya nanning hanlan laeze Tai te Sidon hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.
42010015	Te Kapernaum, nang tuh vaawran phe thua lang hangthung na thua zemah Hades lang sawbung na thua cih.
42010016	“Nae bya a ngae paw tuh kamaw bya a ngae paw nynh thua, te nanning ae ei oh paw tuh kamaw kha yn ei paw nynh thua, te kamaw yn ei paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a ei paw nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
42010017	Te sungsari`ae tuh lungtuate bua oun ki`ae zah, “Bawipaw, na min liate raerangsaro`ae nynh heize kae kaw te a um`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42010018	Te Jesu nynh, “Khozawlaekuhpaw hawte Setan tuh vaawran kyate a ccawbung paw kha ka muih.
42010019	Dotua oh, nanning tuh fupaw`ae te zekang`ae syde kho nawlan te nae rhawpaw tae kho nawlan kawhoinaw balyn kae pya oh, te pawpaw nynh sanmah nanning kha maw ae muesah lan khyh oh.
42010020	Tuhzemah muisaw`ae nynh nae kaw te a um`ae paw, tuh-e kyakhe nae lungtua nan sah, thuasalama nae min tuh vaawran kya zei athua paw kyahin nae lungtua sah,” a cipya`ae.
42010021	Tuh-e ccyh kya Jesu tuh Muisaw kya lungtua zah, “Vaawran te laephi Bawipaw, Pou Apang, nang nynh ahawpaw te athyapaw ccungccaw kyate e uccaw`ae hynh phe na thuru zah imua`ae kalan phe na phy vae keiccu na kalan lungtuabya kae ho. Athua nyng, Apang, hynhte acyikuh paw tuh na mitmuihnaw kya ahoypaw nynh thua.
42010022	Pawpaw balyn tuh Apang nynh kamaw kalan marya yn ah vae, te Paaw laelan hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Ccapaw hynh hung nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh, te Paaw hynh hung nynh thua cipaw kha Ccapaw te Ccapaw nynh a phypya ry paw ccungccaw laelan hung nynh san nyh khyh,” a ci.
42010023	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kalan maeleihkuh zah, “Atu na muih oh paw uccaw`ae a muih paw mit`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.
42010024	Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, profeh`ae patae te siapharan`ae patae nynh na muih oh paw hynh muih a ry`ae zemah muih khyh`ae, te na thae oh paw hynh thae a ry`ae zemah thaebua khyh`ae,” cite mih makhaete a hopya`ae.
42010025	Te, dotua, kawbya thyapaw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Ccangpatupaw, zungzae hiinnaw rhoccou khylan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite Jesu kha a syntawtua.
42010026	Jesu nynh, “Kawbya kya pawmou azeikuh? Pawtemou na ria?” a cipya.
42010027	Te aning nynh khung zah, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na thinlung balyn te, na hiinnawmuisaw balyn te, na thawzung balyn te, te na tuanaw balynte na sungsah cih; te na innpaw kha namaw toulou hawte na sungsah cih,’ acihkuh,” a cipya.
42010028	Te Jesu nynh, “Na hopaw tuh athua, tuhte la cyih lah na hiin cih,” a cipya.
42010029	Thuasalama, aning nynh amaw te amaw kha thyaaccousaku ry zah Jesu kha, “Te ka innpaw tuh hungmou?” a ci.
42010030	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccungccapaw lukheit tuh Jerusalem kyate Jeriko khua lang cceihbung zah damiah`ae laku phe a phungkuh, te damiah`ae nynh a uccaw kha phae`ae zah a bua`ae, te vya chih lante nung`ae zah phe cciataw`ae.
42010031	Te kha-e laanpi kyakhe ranpibawi lukheit cceihbung zah kha-e paw kha he a muih tuh ccanglang te phe a sibia.
42010032	Te tuhhawte Levi paw lukheit nynh tuh-e kya he a thua tuh kha-e paw kha do zah ccanglang te sibia zah phe a cciataw.
42010033	Thuasalama Samariapaw lukheit tuh khuaccung zah tuh-e paw umnaw kyakhe a thua; te he a muih tuh ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi.
42010034	Te ccianua zah a vaemaw kha chitui te misutui bupah zah uccaw te a hepya, te amaw a saring tungvaw khe khang zah balah-inn langkhe cciakhae zah a dooih.
42010035	Te awkhualan ccia lan he cih tuh denari kianing kha thuakuh zah balah-inn ngawtupaw kha pya zah, ‘E paw hynh la dooih lah tuhlae na thangpaw kha bua kae thua te kae pyaru cih,’ a cipya.
42010036	“Tuh-e luthung`ae lakuze hungmou tuh-e damiah`ae laku a phungkuh paw ccungccapaw a innpaw athua ngaw cite na tua?” a ci.
42010037	Te kawbyathyapaw nynh, “Tuh-e paw tungvaw ngaethyaumsanaw a hoi paw nynh athua,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “La cceih lah nang mah tuh-e hawte la cyihbua,” a cipya.
42010038	Ou tuhcihte Jesu te a zuitu`ae tuh khuaccung`ae zah khua khuakheit kya he a tee tuh Martha acikuh paw nopinung lukheit nynh Jesu kha a inn lang a thuasah.
42010039	Te Martha nynh Meri acikuh paw a neitanung lukheit a hoi. Tuh-e nung tuh Jesu ccu leihpaw khe dahung zah a bya kha a ngae.
42010040	Thuasalama Martha tuh thohae ryasuh paw te a thinlung sokhaekuh, te Jesu kalan cceih zah, “Bawipaw, ka neitanung nynh ka makhaete oun thohae sah paw hynh pawlang nae riapah khyh tou? Tukeiccu kamaw rya bawng lan hopah,” a cipya.
42010041	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Martha, Martha, nang tuh uccaw patae konglang na lungvawsaw zah na thinphang.
42010042	Thuasalama ahoboupaw uccaw ccangkheit rou nynh a um; tuh-e ahoypaw apung kha Meri nynh phe a poku vae, tuh-e apung tuh a kyate lawpya thua vae lan khyh,” a ci.
42011001	Ou tuhcihte ahmin sang kheit kya Jesu nynh sawsang zah he a thangsah tuh, a zuitu`ae lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, Johan nynh mah a zuitu`ae kha a ccangpya`ae hawte, kaening hynh sawsang lan oun ccangpabua,” a cipya.
42011002	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning saw he na sang vae oh ze: ‘Vaawran kya um paw kaening Paaw, na min sawtuanaw um sah. Na peenaw thua ccavae sah. Vaawran kya na rynaw acyikuh hawte laephi vawlan cyikuh bua sah.
42011003	Nin takyh kae aepaw looh kha atunin kaening yn pyabua.
42011004	Te kae tungvaw a sei`ae paw miakaw kha kaening nynh mah kae ngaethya`ae keiccu kae seinaw kha oun la ngaethyabua. Te kaening hynh tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang oun cciakhae nan, thuasalama mihoy leipaw kyate oun khungtua,’ cite la ho oh,” a cipya`ae.
42011005	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh ruiban hoi zah ziraccyng khe a banpaw kalan cceih zah, ‘Ka ban, sanlou phethung yn ccoibua hin.
42011006	Pawccecize, ka banpaw lukheit tuh a khuaccungnaw kyate ka kya yn thua zah loohdang lanpaw, pawsang mah ka hoi khyh,’ a cipya.
42011007	“Te inn lungkhu a um paw nynh, ‘Mithyhmitpaw yn nung nan vae; atu thuakaw phe khawkuh vae, te ka ccaaw`ae mah kamaw ryte ikhung kya phe ih vae`ae, ka tho kho vae khyh zah kae pya kho vae khyh,’ cite a khung cih.
42011008	Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw nynh tho leite um zah a pya khyh zemah, a banpaw athua keiccu umtaw leite banban pei a ngiaku keiccu tuh tho ngaw zah ahobou zeih kha a pya cih.
42011009	“Te nanning kae hopya oh, ngia oh lah pya na thua cih oh, ccung oh lah na muih cih oh, khua oh lah hungpya na thua cih oh.
42011010	Pawccecize a ngia paw miakaw tuh a mue, te a ccung paw tuh a muih, te thuakaw a khua paw tuh hungpya athua cih.
42011011	“Nanning lakuze paaw athua paw lukhakheit nynh, a ccapaw nynh sanlou a ngiaku ze lung kha pya ngaw ta? Tukhyhze ngasaw a ngiaku ze ngasaw hanpaw fuparepaw kha pya ngaw ta?
42011012	Tukhyhze awtui kha a ngiaku ze zekang kha pya ngaw ta?
42011013	Nanning nynh na hoy lei oh pite, ahoypaw lasung`ae kha nae ccaaw`ae pya lan na ny oh lanze, vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh amaw kalan a ngiakuh`ae paw kha Thyaa Muisaw kha pawcihmou houh a pya cih`ae?” cite a hopya`ae.
42011014	Te bya ho kho leipaw raerangsaro kha Jesu nynh a dee. Ou tuhte raerangsaro he a pou tuh bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya a ho vae, te ccungccaw zapi tuh mih ngaeangthua.
42011015	Thuasalama ccungccaw abang nynh, “Aning nynh khozi`ae uktupaw Beelzebub liate nynh khozi`ae kha a dee,” a ci`ae.
42011016	Te abang nynh amaw kha syntaw khylan vaawran kyate muihsanaw kha a ngia`ae.
42011017	Thuasalama, Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha phe nyh zah minmin kha, “Amaw te amaw aphiakuhpaw peenaw miakaw tuh aroh cih, te amaw te amaw aphiakuhpaw innbyn tuh a khuliakuh cih.
42011018	Te Setan mah amaw te amaw a phiaku lanze pawtemou a peenaw tuh atyn kho cih? Pawccemacize nanning nynh kamaw kha Beelzebub liate nynh raerangsaro`ae a dee nae ci oh.
42011019	Te kae nynh Beelzebub liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, hung liate mou nae ccaaw`ae nynh minmin kha a dee`ae? Tukeiccu minmin tuh nanning byapiatu`ae athua cih`ae.
42011020	Thuasalama kae nynh Pachia kuihdung liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kya athua ccaccing vae.
42011021	“A thawsaepaw ccungccaw nynh zunghe ryte a inn kha a ngaw lya tuh a uccaw`ae akhyn.
42011022	Thuasalama amaw laeze a thawsae huapaw nynh he yn thua vae tetuh amaw kha phe a tae cih, te a doliakupaw a zunghe balyn kha a kyate a lawpah cih zah a lua paw uccaw`ae kha pung a nee cih.
42011023	Kae ryte a um leipaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn rawsepaw nynh thua, te kae ryte a sueluakuh bua leipaw ccungccaw tuh a phiakuhpaw nynh thua.
42011024	“Athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh ccungccapaw kyate he pou tuh arounaw hmin`ae lang po a cceih, hae-ungnaw kha ccungkuh zah muihkuh khyh, aning nynh, ‘Ka poutawnaw ka inn lang ka ki cih,’ a ci.
42011025	Te he a thua tuh, kha-e inn tuh phe la phikuh zah a paccaankuh`ae paw kha a muih.
42011026	Oute aning tuh cceih zah amaw laeze houh athahhua`ae paw ccangpaw muisaw lusari`ae kha a hoeibua`ae; te minmin tuh tee`ae zah kha-e paw kya a um`ae; te kha-e ccungccapaw kya-e nyalang acyihkuh paw tuh masaty e laeze houh seihua vae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42011027	Ou tuhcihte, e uccaw`ae kong a ho lyakhe, kha-e phu kya-e nopinung lukheit nynh sia zah Jesu kha, “Nang ae saah paw vue te nang ae kua paw matei tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya.
42011028	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Athua, Pachia bya kha thae zah a zui`ae paw tuh houh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
42011029	Te ccungccaw`ae pataepi a sueluakuh`ae lyakhe, Jesu nynh tho zah, “E ccungccaw`ae tuh ahoy leipaw ciihan nynh thua`ae, minmin nynh muihsanaw kha a ngiaku`ae; te profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan ccangpaw muihsanaw tuh pya thua lan khyh`ae.
42011030	Pawccecize Jonah tuh Nineveh`ae hanlan muihsanaw athua hawte, Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah e ccungccaw`ae hanlan muihsanaw athua cih.
42011031	Byapianaw kya Deilang-e siapharannung tuh e ciihan kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte yn thokuh cih zah minmin kha seibe cih`ae, pawccecize aning tuh laephi athangnaw langte Solomon hawnaw bya kha thae khylan yn thua; te dotua, Solomon laeze alesae huapaw tuh e kya nynh a um.
42011032	Byapianaw kya Nineveh khua-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thokuh cih`ae zah hynh e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha sei oun be cih`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh Jonah phunghonaw kya phe a ngaesikuh`ae; te dotua, Jonah laeze a lesae huapaw tuh e kya nynh a um.
42011033	“Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah maeekhua kha he a tyh vae ze muih leinaw kya nung boi khyh, kee khung he khyh, thuasalama oun tee paw ccungccaw`ae nynh a awpaw kha a muih ccaw`ae cite maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung.
42011034	Pyn kya-e awnaw tuh mit nynh thua, tukeiccu na mit he ahoy vae ze na pyn balyn mah awnaw te phe beih, thuasalama na mit he ahoy vae khyh ze, na pyn balyn mah mohnaw te phe beih.
42011035	Tukeiccu na kya um paw awnaw tuh mohnaw athua khyh nawlan la raeringkuh.
42011036	Te na pyn balyn tuh mohnaw um leite awnaw te phe bia lanze, maeekhua a awpaw nynh awnaw ae pya hawte, na pyn khaleih tuh awnaw te phe beih cih,” a ci.
42011037	Te tuhte a ho lya, Farasipaw lukheit nynh Jesu kha aepaw a kopya; te Jesu tuh cceih zah ae lan a dahung.
42011038	Te zerya a ae maw a kuih a singkuty khyh paw kha Farasipaw nynh he a muih tuh a ngaeangthua.
42011039	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Atu nanning Farasi`ae tuh banang te pake kha avawlan kyalya nynh na sing oh, thuasalama nae lungkhu tuh karangkunaw te hoyleinaw te nynh phe bia.
42011040	Nanning mingaee`ae! Avawlan a raetu nynh alungkhu kha mah rae bia khyh tou?
42011041	Thuasalama na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae kha ryachi`ae pyabua oh; te dotua, pawpaw balyn tuh nae hanlan athyaapaw nynh thua.
42011042	“Thuasalama Farasi`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize, nanning nynh hangmae te pucinan te enaw-ekan`ae balyn kha pumhaw pumkheit na pya oh zah Pachia atazaenaw te a sungsanawpaw kha phe na kawtaw oh; e`ae hynh na cyi lan oh ccan zah ccangpaw mah cyi leite na um lan oh paw thua khyh.
42011043	“Farasi`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh sinakok kya ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw kha na ry oh zah kungkunaw kya sawtuate beihku na ry oh.
42011044	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh alang leipaw shawkhu te nynh na loku oh. Kha-e avawlan cceih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh shawkhu a um paw hei kha nyh khyh`ae,” a cipya.
42011045	Oute kawbya thya`ae paw kyaze lukheitpaw nynh khung zah, “ Ccangpatupaw, tuhte na hopaw tuh kaening mah nae sarya paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
42011046	Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning, kawbya thya`ae paw mah paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh phu lan myarya aripaw phupaw kha ccungccaw`ae na khang oh zah naemaw tuh nae kuihdung ccangkheit te san na tung khyh oh.
42011047	“Nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh profeh`ae shawku kha na raepah oh zah nae minpaaw`ae nynh minmin kha a chia`ae.
42011048	Thanccingte nanning nynh nae minpaaw`ae cyisahnaw kha nae nawccah cipaw alang; pawccecize minmin nynh profeh`ae kha phe a chia ccaccing`ae, te nanning nynh shawku`ae kha na raepya oh.
42011049	Tukeiccu Pachia kya-e hawnaw nynh mah, ‘Minmin kalan profeh`ae te locceihtu`ae kha ka saw cih`ae, te minmin nynh abang kha theih ngaw`ae zah abang kha a tua-a sah cih`ae,’ a ci.
42011050	Ou tuhte laephipi athonaw kyate alua paw profeh`ae balyn chii mee kha hynh-e ciihan`ae kya ngia athua nawlan.
42011051	Abel chii kyate tho zah silawhang te tempal laku kya a chia`ae paw Zakharia chii kyacia ngia athua cih`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e tuh e ccungccaw`ae kya ngia athua cih.
42011052	“Kawbya thya`ae paw, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh nynawpaw toh kha phe na law oh; naemaw mah na tee khyh oh zah a tee`ae paw kha mah phang na khaw oh,” a ci.
42011053	Tuhte hynh-e uccaw`ae kong a hopya`ae lyakhe, kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh bya patae yn hosei ccaw cite Jesu kha thinriasah khylan thawte a ei`ae.
42011054	A khalang kyate yn pou paw kha kyngpya lan zah seibe khylan amaw kha phang a dokhaw`ae.
42012001	Tuin ccyh lya, riatae lei ccungccaw zapi pi tuh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah lukheit te lukheit sydekute a um`ae lyakhe, Jesu nynh tho zah a zuitu`ae kha, “Cyiruhnawpaw Farasi`ae ransi kha la raeringkuh oh.
42012002	Pawccecize langsaku lei lante bong paw pawsang um khyh; ny lei lante thuruh paw mah um khyh.
42012003	Tukeiccu amohnaw kya na ho oh paw miakaw kha a awnaw kya thae athua cih; te alungkhu e akhaan kya nakaring kya na ho oh paw kha innccukaly kyate siakhae athua cih.
42012004	“Te ka ban oh, nanning kae hopya oh, pyn kha theih`ae zah tuhkoute pawsang cyih kho vae lei`ae paw raw kha rih nan oh.
42012005	Thuasalama hungmou ri lan accan cipaw kae hopah cih oh; pyn a theih koute kehenna maee lungkhu lang vua lan kawhoinaw a hoitupaw raw kha rih oh; athua, nanning kae hopya oh, amaw raw kha rih oh.
42012006	“Ccithya sapangaw kha daw phuapia pianing lang khaw a zua`ae? Te kha-e ccithya sakheit sanmah Pachia nynh ning khyh.
42012007	Thuasalama nae lu kya-e nae sang`ae heize marya ria athua. Tukeiccu rih nan oh; nanning tuh ccithya`ae patae laeze nae phutehua.
42012008	“Nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha ccaekia yn khan paw tuh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang kha-e paw kha ccaekia a khan cih.
42012009	Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha yn vua paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang vua ru athua cih.
42012010	Te hunghung zemah Ccungccaw Ccapaw rawsete bya kawkheit a ho paw tuh ngaethya athua cih; thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kha rawsete a sarya paw ccungccaw tuh ngaethya thua lan khyh.
42012011	“Te nanning kha sinakok`ae kalan, te uktu`ae te kawhoitu`ae kalan he ae thuakhae vae oh ze pawtemou ka khung cih, pawmou ka khung cih, tukhyhze pawmou ka ho cih cipaw nae lungvawsaw nan sah.
42012012	Pawccecize Thyaa Muisaw nynh kha-e ccyh ccaccei kyakhe na ho lan oh accanpaw kha ae ccangpah cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42012013	Te ccungccaw zapi kyate lukheitpaw nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, rho uccaw yn nee bua nawlan ka upaw hynh hopah,” a cipya.
42012014	Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccapaw, hung nynh mou kae hynh nanning tungvaw byapiatu lang, tukhyhze rho neetu lang yn khang?” a cipya.
42012015	Te Jesu nynh, “Nae lungkyh sah lah karangkunaw hynh raeringkuh oh; pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit hiinnaw tuh phe beih lang a hoi paw uccaw`ae kyakhe um khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42012016	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Mihoipaw lukheit kya-e lorang tuh looh myarya a voi.
42012017	Te a thinlung kya tuakuh zah, ‘Ka looh nungnaw ka hoi vae khyh zah pawmou ka cyih cih?’ a ciku.
42012018	“ ‘Te hynhte ka cyih cih, ka ccung-inn`ae kha ka phou cih zah ale huapaw ka sak cih, te tuin kya ka looh`ae te ka uccaw`ae balyn kha ka nung cih.
42012019	Te ka hiinnawmuisaw kha, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw, nang tuh kum patae hanlan uccaw patae kha ccakhungpya na thua vae, hung um ccavae, ae lah neih, te lungtuate um, ka cipah cih,” ’ a ci.
42012020	“Thuasalama tuhte a tuaku lyakhe, Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Mingaeepaw, atu khuazi ccacceimaw na hiinnaw-muisaw kha lawpya athua cih, te na ccakhung paw uccaw`ae kha hung elan mou a tang cih?’ a cipya.
42012021	“Tukeiccu amaw hanlan sisua a ccakhungkuh paw ccungccaw tuh tuh-e paw te nynh aloku, te aning tuh Pachia malang a hoirungpaw thua khyh,” a ci.
42012022	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, nae hiinnaw hanlan pawmou ka ae cih cite nae thinphang nan sah, nae pyn hanlan mah pawmou ka lawku cih cipaw nae thinphang nan sah.
42012023	Pawccecize hiinnaw tuh aepaw laeze sunghua zah pyn tuh uccaw laeze asunghua.
42012024	Va-aw`ae kha tuatua oh, pawccecize minmin tuh ccaciivuakuh khyh`ae zah looh mah rue khyh`ae, sua-inn mah hoi khyh`ae zah byng mah hoi khyh`ae, te Pachia nynh minmin kha looh a dang`ae, pavaw`ae laeze nanning tuh pawcihmou houh nae phutehua?
42012025	Te nanning lakuze hungmou thinphangnaw liate amaw ahangnaw kha dung kheit a hangchih sahkuh khopaw um?
42012026	Tuh-e adih huapaw uccaw san na cyikuh kho khyh oh lanze, pawccemou ccangpaw uccaw hanlan nae thinphang?
42012027	“Lilipaw`ae pawcihte nynh a lethung`ae cipaw kha tuatua oh; minmin tuh loopho khyh`ae, law mah su khyh`ae; tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, Solomon a phu-enaw balyn nynh heize lilipaw ccangkheit tuhte ccaankuh kho khyh.
42012028	Atunin um zah awkhualan tahkuamaee lungkhu lang phung athua paw rangkaw e lonua heize Pachia nynh tuhte a ccaan lan thua ze, nanning kha tuh-e laeze houh ae ccaan lan khyh oh tou? Pou zyn zya`ae?
42012029	Pawmou kae ae cih, tukhyhze pawmou kae nia ngaw cite ccung nan oh; lungriathae te mah um nan oh.
42012030	Pawccecize laephipi-e minphuin`ae nynh e uccaw`ae balyn hynh a ccung`ae paw nynh thua, te nanning nae Paaw nynh e uccaw`ae hynh nae hanlan aho cipaw phe a ny.
42012031	Thuasalama nanning tuh Pachia peenaw palia kha ccung oh; te e uccaw`ae balyn tuh pyachih na thua cih oh.
42012032	“Tuuphu taraw`ae, rih nan oh; pawccecize peenaw kha nanning pya lanpaw tuh nae Paaw a lungrythua paw nynh thua.
42012033	“Na hoi oh paw kha zua oh lah ryachi`ae kha pyabua oh, te apue kho leipaw phuabu kha raekuh oh, miruh nynh a thuanua kho leinaw te laehaw nynh a ro kho leinaw, vaawran kyakhe athang kho leipaw sisua kha ccykuh oh.
42012034	Pawccecize nae sisua umnaw kya nae thinlung mah a umbua cih.
42012035	“Nae cce kha taesung sungkuh oh lah, nae maeekhua kha awkuh oh.
42012036	Te zudy poi kyate mih bawipaw yn ki ngaw zah he yn thua te, thuakaw kha he a khua tuh vaekheihmawte thuakaw hungpya khylan cite a ngaw`ae paw see`ae hawte naemaw mah la um oh.
42012037	See`ae nynh phang a ngaw`ae paw kha mih bawipaw nynh he yn thua te a muih ze, tuh-e see`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mih bawipaw nynh taesung a sungkuh cih zah minmin kha ccaboi kya koihsah ngaw`ae zah amaw ccaccei nynh loohdang cih`ae.
42012038	Te khuazi santari ccyhningnaw kya thuasah, ccyhthungnaw kya thuasah, a bawipaw nynh yn thua zah ou tuhte a muih lanze, tuh-e see`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.
42012039	Thuasalama e hynh nyh oh, inn hoitupaw nynh paw ccyh kya nynh miruhpaw yn thua cih cipaw kha phe a ny lanze, a inn kha a kiabia khyh nawlan phe a ngaw cih cipaw na ny oh.
42012040	Tukeiccu nanning mah raeringkuh oh; pawccecize na ngaehoi khyh oh ccyh lyakhe Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh yn thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
42012041	Te Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, e tousenaw phungpaw hynh kaening hanlan tou na ho, tukhyhze ccungccaw balyn hanlan tou?” cite a khia.
42012042	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Accyh zaw vae ze mih hanpaw looh neesah lan, a inn kya um`ae paw tungvaw uktu lang, a bawipaw nynh a khang lanpaw, zyn lan um paw te ahawpaw synriatu tuh hungmou?
42012043	Tuh-e see nynh tuhte a cyi paw kha a bawipaw nynh he yn thua lya a muih ze, tuh-e see tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
42012044	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, a bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha a hoi paw balyn tungvaw uktu lan a khang cih.
42012045	Thuasalama tuh-e see nynh a thinlung kyate, ‘Ka bawipaw yn thua lanpaw tuh aro ung cih,’ ci zah see pise`ae te nopi`ae kha bua`ae zah, ae zah neih zah a rui lya,
42012046	tuh-e see nynh a ngawdae khyh nin kya te a tua khyh ccyh lya, a bawipaw tuh yn thua lanze, kha-e paw kha ccangning lang thoh bae cih zah a hanpaw kha zyn leitu`ae ryte a nungpah cih.
42012047	“Te a bawipaw rynaw kha nyh zah a paccynkuh leipaw, a bawipaw rynaw a cyipah leipaw see tuh ccungbua patae a mue cih.
42012048	Thuasalama a bawipaw rynaw kha nyh khyh zah ccungbua lan accanpaw a cyih paw see tuh ccungbua ccapyh nynh a mue cih. Pawccecize patae pya athua paw ccungccaw tuh patae a sangru cih; te pataepi a ccysah`ae paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh patae a ngiaru cih`ae.
42012049	“Kae tuh laephi vawlan maee saw khylan nynh kae thua; te ka ry paw tuh, kha-e kha phe la rua ccavae sah ci nynh thua!
42012050	Thuasalama ka in lanpaw baptisma ka hoi ung, tuh-e accing mawlaezung tuh pawcih babang mou ka lungriathae!
42012051	Laephi vawlan daenaw pya khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tou na tua oh? Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama phiakunaw khylan nynh kae thua.
42012052	Pawccecize atu kyate tho ngaw zah inn innkheit kya ccungccaw lupangaw`ae tuh luthung nynh luning kha rawsete, luning nynh luthung kha rawsete a phiakuh cih`ae.
42012053	Paaw nynh ccapaw kha rawsete, ccapaw nynh paaw kha rawsete, te nung nynh ccanung kha a rawsete, ccanung nynh nung kha rawsete, te ninnung nynh monung kha rawsete, monung nynh ninnung kha rawsete a phiakuh cih`ae,” a ci.
42012054	Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha mah, “Nanning nynh niccaw langte maeking a pouthung paw kha na muih vae oh ze, ‘Khua yn rah cih,’ na ci oh; te khua arah sasaw.
42012055	Te deilang te khivae azaw paw kha he na muih vae oh ze, ‘Khuanin yn so cih,’ na ci oh; te khuanin aso sasaw.
42012056	Cyihruh`ae! Nanning nynh laephi mitmae te vaawlui mitmae kha na phiathya oh; thuasalama pawccemou atu e ccyh hynh na thaethya khyh oh?
42012057	“Athua, pawccemou naemaw ccaccei nynh so ahmepaw kha bya na pia khyh oh tou?
42012058	Nang ae rawsetupaw ryte byapiatu kalan na cciakheih lya oh laanpi kyakhe, ccawku kho nawlan thawte la zuakuh; tukhyh lanze byapiatu kalan ae cciakhae cih zah byapiatu nynh thung uktu kalan ae ah cih, te thung uktu nynh thung ae saw cih.
42012059	Nang kae hopya, na rung lanpaw daw phuapia phe accing lang na pya makhia thung kyate na pou lan khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42013001	Tuh-e ccyh lya, Galilee`ae mih chii kha mih silawkunaw`ae paw ryte Pilat nynh pung a pyde pya`ae cipaw kong Jesu a hopah`ae paw ccungccaw abang a um`ae.
42013002	Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Tuh-e Galilee`ae tuh tuhte a teing`ae keiccuze ccangpaw Galilee`ae balyn laeze a seihua`ae paw cite tou na tua oh?
42013003	Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama nanning mah na ngaesiku khyh oh ze, tuh-e hawte nae balynte marya na chih mamin cih oh.
42013004	Tukhyhze, Siloam kya innhangpaw nynh mih tungvaw tingthin`ae zah phe chia`ae paw luhaw laetarya`ae kha Jerusalem kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn laeze a seihua`ae paw cite tou na tua oh?
42013005	Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama nanning mah na ngaesiku khyh oh ze, tuh-e hawte nae balynte marya na chih mamin cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
42013006	Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw hynh mah a ho: “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh a misu khokhu kyakhe thaeku kukheit a la lin; te yn cceih zah kha-e ku kya a thae kha fui zah muih khyh.
42013007	Oute misu khokhu ngawtupaw kha, ‘Dotua, kum thung lungkhu hynh-e thaeku ku kalan kae cceih zah athae ka ccung zah ka muih khyh; nge ccavae; pawccemou laephi hynh a thangsah han?’ cite a hopya.
42013008	“Te aning nynh khung zah, ‘Bawipaw, atunin kum tuh hynh mawte umhin sah, a pepan lae ka thualeipah cih zah ia ka pungnua ung cih.
42013009	Te athae yn thae ze, ahoy; te yn thae vae khyh ze, khahkoute nge vae,’ a cipya,” a ci.
42013010	Te Jesu nynh Sabbath nin kya sinakok ccangkheit kyakhe a ccangpya`ae.
42013011	Te, dotua, kum haw laetarya cia nyaakhaekunaw muisaw a hoi paw nopinung lukheit a um; tuh-e nung tuh a ke karae ky zah kharyh law kho khyh.
42013012	Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh ko zah, “Nopinung, na nyakhaekunaw kyate na lue vae,” a cipya.
42013013	Te kha-e nung tungvaw a kuih khang zah vaekheihmawte a ke tuh phe alaw vae; te aning nynh Pachia kha phu-esah.
42013014	Tuhte Jesu nynh Sabbath nin kya a dansah keiccuze, sinakok uktu nynh thinria te tho zah ccungccaw`ae kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh ryalaw lawkunaw lanpaw nin taruh a um, ou kha-e nin`ae kyakhe oun cceih oh lah dannaw kha oun mue oh, Sabbath nin kya tuh mue nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
42013015	Oute Bawipaw nynh khung zah, “Cyiruhpaw! Nanning milu raveih nynh Sabbath nin kya nae tangnuapaw, khyh ze nae lann kha a inn kyate na supah oh zah tui nia lan na cciakhae khyh oh tou?
42013016	Te, dotua, kum haw laetarya cia Setan nynh phang a hee paw, Abraham ccanung athua paw, e nopinung hynh hynh-e khiinaw kyate Sabbath nin kya supya lan ccan khyh tou?” a ci.
42013017	Te hynhte he a ho tuh, amaw rawsetu`ae balyn tuh maethya pung bongkuh`ae; te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Jesu nynh a cyipaw phu-e lan um paw uccaw`ae hanlan mih lungtua.
42013018	Oute Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw tuh pawtemou aloku? Te pawtemou ka touse cih?
42013019	Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh lawkuh zah a khokhu lungkhu lang a vua paw mungngia mung te nynh aloku; kha-e a mung tuh lethung zah a kupi lang phe a tang, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh kha-e aran`ae kyakhe bu a luaku`ae,” a ci.
42013020	Te Jesu nynh bua tho zah, “Pachia peenaw tuh pawtemou ka touse cih?
42013021	Tuh-e tuh, nopinung lukheit nynh laah zah vaepoi kawthung kya a phing paw, tuh-e vaepoi phe a thosah paw ransi te nynh aloku,” a ci.
42013022	Te Jesu tuh khuapi`ae te khua taraw`ae kalan po cceih zah ccangpya biate Jerusalem langkhe khuaccung.
42013023	Oute ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, khumnaw a mue`ae paw tuh azya`ae tou?” cite a khia. Te Jesu nynh,
42013024	“Abypaw koikua kyate tee lan zuakuh oh; pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw patae nynh kha-e kya tee lan oun ccung cih`ae zah tee kho lan khyh`ae.
42013025	Inn hoitupaw nynh vaekheit thokuh zah thuakaw kha phe a khaw koute, nanning nynh atolang khe na thadyn oh zah na khua oh, te, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw thuakaw oun hungpah,’ na ci oh; te aning nynh nanning kha, ‘Nanning paw kyate nae thua oh paw cipaw kae nynh khyh oh,’ ae cipah cih oh.
42013026	Oute nanning nynh, ‘Namaw ry kae ae zah kae neihbua, kae khua laanpi`ae kya nae ccangpah,’ nae ci cih oh.
42013027	Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Nanning kae hopya oh, nanning paw kya-e cipaw kae nyh khyh oh; ccouseikunaw ryalahtu`ae nanning balyn kamaw kyate pou oh,’ ae cipah cih oh.
42013028	Nanning nynh Abraham, Isaak te Jakob te profeh`ae balyn kha Pachia peenaw kya na muih oh zah naemaw tuh atolang dae vua na thua oh paw kha he nae muih oh tuh rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw oun um cih.
42013029	Te minmin tuh nithua, niccaw, palung lang, deilang te oun thua cih`ae zah Pachia peenaw kya oun dahung cih`ae.
42013030	Te, dotua, masaty athua cih`ae paw nyathyakou`ae um zah nyathyakou athua cih`ae paw masaty`ae a um,” a ci.
42013031	Tuh-e nin kya Farasi`ae abang oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha, “Toikuh lah e kyate pou, pawccecize Herod nynh chia lan ae ry,” a cipya`ae.
42013032	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning la cceih oh lah kha-e rang-ui kha, ‘Dotua, kae nynh raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee zah atunin te awkhualan ka dansah`ae, te nin thungnaw kya kae tuh ccingsah ka thua cih,’ cite la hopah oh.
42013033	Tuhzemah atunin, awkhualan te sarakheih kae tuh solei ka cceih ung cih; pawccecize Jerusalem atolang khe profeh lukheit a chi lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.
42013034	“Pou Jerusalem, Jerusalem, profeh`ae a theih paw, te na kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha lung te a deih paw nang! Awpinung nynh a taw`ae kha a sake kawlan a suelua`ae hawte na ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua lan pei ka ry zah nang nynh na ry khyh!
42013035	Dotua oh, nae inn tuh nanning umnaw kho lei lante a um han; te byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ‘BAWIPAW min liate oun thua paw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua!’ cite nanning nynh na ho mawlaezung oh nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
42014001	Ou tuhcihte Sabbath nin kya Jesu nynh aepaw ae lan Farasi lupipaw lukheit inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh minmin nynh a dophi`ae.
42014002	Te, dotua oh, tuipoipaw ccinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw lukheit a malang khe a um.
42014003	Te Jesu nynh tho zah kawbya thya`ae paw te Farasi`ae kha, “Sabbath nin kya dansah lan kawbya nynh a ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.
42014004	Te minmin tuh daebabilan zya um`ae. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha laah zah a dansah, te a cciasah.
42014005	Te minmin kha, “Nanning lakuze a vaetua, tukhyhze a lann kha Sabbath nin kya hunghua lungkhu lang a ccaw ze palou thua leite a um paw hungmou a um cih?” cite a khia`ae.
42014006	Te minmin nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae kya mah bua khung kho khyh`ae.
42014007	Te ko paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw a poku`ae paw kha he a muih tuh, minmin kha Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae:
42014008	“Nang kha zudy poi kalan lukhakheit nynh ae kobua ze ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw kya la dahung nan, na dahung lanze, nang laeze sawtua lan um paw ccungccapaw kha kha-e paw nynh a kobua ze,
42014009	nang te kha-e paw a kotupaw nynh na kalan yn cceih ngaw zah, ‘E paw hynh dahungnaw pya,’ ae cipya ze, nang tuh maethya te ane huapaw dahungnaw lawku lan yn ccan vae cih.
42014010	Thuasalama nang kha ae kobua`ae ze, cceih lah ane huapaw dahungnaw kyakhe la dahung; ou khate nang ae kotupaw he yn thua vae ze, namaw kha, ‘Ka ban, ahang huapaw kalan khe dahung,’ ae cipya ccaw; oute tuh namaw ryte na dahungkheih oh paw malang khe nang tuh sawtuanaw na mue vae cih.
42014011	Pawccecize hunghung zemah amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw tuh sawbung athua cih, te amaw te amaw zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih,” a ci.
42014012	Oute Jesu nynh amaw a kotupaw kha mah, “Nang nynh awkhua loohdangkunaw, tukhyhze zete loohdangkunaw na rae vae ze, na ban`ae, na uno`ae, na vaeccaw`ae, a hoirung`ae paw innpaw`ae kha la ko nan`ae; tuhte na ko`ae ze minmin nynh mah bua ae ko ru cih`ae zah amee phe ae sangru cih`ae.
42014013	Thuasalama nang nynh poi na tua vae ze, ryachi`ae, kuihccu mitnaw ccing lei`ae paw, ccukhou`ae te mitmoh`ae kha la ko`ae.
42014014	Oute nang tuh hythuaccoupaw na thua cih. Pawccecize minmin nynh ae sangru kho khyh`ae keiccu, a ding`ae paw thothuinaw kya nang tuh amee sangru na thua cih,” a cipya.
42014015	Te amaw ryte aenaw kya a dahungkheih`ae paw lukheit nynh e bya`ae kha he a thae tuh Jesu kha, “Pachia peenaw kya sanlou a ae cih paw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua!” a cipya.
42014016	Oute Jesu nynh tuh-e paw kha, “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh zerya poipi kha rae zah ccungccaw patae a ko.
42014017	Te ko athua`ae paw kha, ‘Rang ccavae oh, pawpaw balyn atu paccyn athua vae,’ cite hosapya lan zerya ae ccyh kyakhe a seepaw kha a saw.
42014018	“Thuasalama minmin balyn nynh pung a seisah`ae. Masaty e paw nynh, ‘Laekua kuakheit ka re zah do lan ka ccia phe aho ung, beih yn ngaethya hin,’ a cipya.
42014019	“Te mingccangpaw nynh, ‘Tangnua toi pangaw ka re zah syntawtua lan ka la cceih ung cih, yn ngaethya hin,’ cite a ngiaku.
42014020	“Te mingccangpaw nynh, ‘Zu phe ka hoi ung, tukeiccu kae cceih kho la khyh,’ a ci.
42014021	“Tukeiccu tuh-e seepaw nynh oun thua zah kha-e`ae kong kha a bawipaw kalan a hopya. Oute inn hoitupaw tuh a thinria zah a seepaw kha, ‘Khuapi e laanpi`ae te laan laku`ae langkhe la cceih kanmaw lah ryachi`ae, te kuihccu mitnaw ccing lei`ae paw, te ccukhou`ae te mitmoh`ae kha hynhlang oun cciakhae`ae,’ a cipya.
42014022	“Te a seepaw nynh, ‘Bawipaw, kaw nae pya thyhhawte phe ka cyi vae, tuhzemah akhaan mang accung ung,’ a ci.
42014023	“Te a bawipaw nynh a seepaw kha, ‘Laanpi lepaw`ae te ku`ae kalan la cceih lah ka inn phe abia ccaw ccungccaw`ae kha tee lan oun nangse`ae.
42014024	Pawccecize nang kae hopya, ko paw ccungccaw`ae hung nynh sanmah ka zerya hynh tangtua lan khyh`ae,’ a cipya,” cite a hopya.
42014025	Te ccungccaw zapi pi tuh amaw ryte a cceih`ae. Te Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah minmin kha,
42014026	“Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kalan yn cceih zah a paaw, a nung, a zu, a ccaaw`ae, a uno`ae, a ccia`ae, te amaw hiinnaw hei kha a hua khyh lanze aning tuh ka zuitu lang thua kho lan khyh.
42014027	Te hunghung zemah a vaelantung puihku leite kamaw yn zui paw tuh ka zuitu thua kho lan khyh.
42014028	“Pawccecize nanning lakuze lukhakheit nynh innhangpaw innkheit sak lan a paccynku ze, kha-e phe thangsah lan, phua azaw lan hoi ta, cipaw ny khylan masaty dahung leite a um cih tou?
42014029	Tukhyh lanze innhangpaw atung-accaw kha phe a bing koute kha-e kha a thangsah kho khyh ze, kha-e a muih`ae paw balyn nynh amaw kha sarya ngaw`ae zah,
42014030	‘E ccungccapaw tuh sak lan mang tho zah thangsah kho khyh,’ cite a ci cih`ae.
42014031	“Tukhyhze, siapharan lukheit nynh ccangpaw siapharanpaw kha rhawtuk lan a nouku ze, ccungccaw thungkuin te oun thokuh paw siapharanpaw kha ccungccaw thunghaw te ka dou kho ngaw ta cipaw masaty dahungty leite, tuakuty leite um ngaw ta?
42014032	A dou kho lan khyh ze, kha-e siapharanpaw laan sawpi a um lyakhe, zeccuetu kha saw zah ccawkunaw kha a ngiaku.
42014033	Tukeiccu, tuhhawte nanning laku hunghung zemah a hoi paw balyn khaleih a cciataw leipaw tuh ka zuitu lang thua kho lan khyh.
42014034	“Loi tuh ahoy; thuasalama loi nynh a enaw kha phe azo lanze pawtemou esah kho thua ung cih?
42014035	Kha-e loi tuh laephi hanlan mah, athupaw pumnaw hanlan mah hoy vae khyh; ccungccaw`ae nynh ccaring a vua vae`ae. Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw nynh tuh thae sah!” a ci.
42015001	Oute ngunto khoitu`ae balynte misei`ae nynh amaw bya ngae khylan amaw kalan oun naekuh`ae.
42015002	Te Farasi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh, “E ccungccapaw hynh misei`ae kha lehkhan zah minmin ryte a aekheih,” cite a ccokuh`ae.
42015003	Te Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw hynh minmin kha a hopya`ae:
42015004	“Nanning kya tuu zakheit a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh sakheit kha a zosah lanze, sungtakua satakua kha rangkaw khe cciataw zah azopaw kha a muih makhia ccung khyh tou?
42015005	Te kha-e kha he a muih vae ze lungtuate a raw vawlan khe a khangku.
42015006	Te innvaw he a thua tuh a ban`ae te innpaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah minmin kha, ‘Lung oun tuakhae oh, pawccecize azopaw ka tuu kha phe ka muih vae,’ a cipya`ae.
42015007	Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhhawte ngaesikunaw aho leipaw adingpaw ccungccaw`ae sungtakua lutakua tungvaw laeze a ngaesikuh paw misei lukheit tungvaw vaawran kya lungtuanaw houh a um hua cih.
42015008	“Tukhyhze, nopinung lukheit nynh ngunphua piahaw hoi zah, piakheit phe a zosah lanze maeekhua kha awkuh zah a muih makhia inn kha phi zah ahoyte ccung khyh tou?
42015009	Te he a muih tuh a ban`ae te innpaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah, ‘Lung oun tuakhae oh, pawccecize ka zosah paw phuapia kha phe ka muih vae,’ cite a hopya`ae.
42015010	Tuhhawte, nanning kae hopya oh, a ngaesikuh paw misei lukheit tungvaw Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae umnaw kya lungtuanaw a um,” a ci.
42015011	Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh ccapaw luning a hoi.
42015012	Te asoipaw nynh a paaw kha tho zah, ‘Apang, rho uccaw`ae kyaze ka ccou lan accanpaw ka hanpaw kha yn pya ccavae,’ a cipya. Te aning nynh a hoi paw uccaw`ae kha minmin a nee`ae.
42015013	“Te nin eih aro mawze, asoipaw ccapaw nynh a uccaw balyn kha lawkuh zah asawnaw ram lang khuaccung zah tuin ram kya a uccaw`ae kha keisukeilae phya a mang.
42015014	Te a hoi paw balyn marya a mang kou tuh tuh-e ram kya myarya ccakangccih zah aning tuh a ryachi vae.
42015015	Te tuh-e ram kya-e ccungccapaw lukheit kalan cceih zah a la umbua, te aning nynh amaw kha voh`ae loohdang lan a loo lungkhu lang a saw.
42015016	Te aning tuh voh`ae nynh a ae`ae paw bia kaloh`ae hei kha a vue phe so lang ae a ry zemah hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah looh pya khyh`ae.
42015017	“Te amaw te amaw he yn nyhkuh tuh, ‘Ka paaw kya vaeluakuh`ae paw patae tuh sanlou ae tae lei a hoi`ae, te kae tuh vuelaw te ka chih vae cih!
42015018	Ka thokuh cih zah ka paaw kalan ka cceih cih zah amaw kha, “Apang, Pachia malang te na malang phe ka sei vae.
42015019	Te kae tuh na ccapaw cite ko lan ka ngaekuh vae khyh, na kya vaeluakuh`ae paw lukheit hawte yn nungbua,” ka cipah cih,’ a ciku.
42015020	“Te thokuh zah a paaw kalan a cceih. Thuasalama laan sawpi a thua lyakhe a paaw nynh he a muih tuh ngaethya-umsanaw hoi zah ccuenua zah a nging kya pum zah a myng.
42015021	Te a ccapaw nynh, ‘Apang, Pachia malang te na malang phe ka sei vae, te na ccaaw cite ko lan kharyh ka ngaekuh vae khyh,’ a cipya.
42015022	“Thuasalama a paaw nynh a see`ae kha, ‘Ahoy huaccepaw uccaw kha oun laah oh lah amaw hynh lawsakuh oh, te a kuih kya kuihpu kha pusah oh lah a ccu kya ccukoh nawsah oh.
42015023	Te athopaw tohlaw kha hynhlang oun cciakhae oh lah theih oh, te ah ae cih oh zah lungtuanaw ah rae cih oh.
42015024	Pawccecize hynh-e ka ccapaw tuh a chih, te bua a hiin, aning tuh azo, te bua muih athua vae,’ a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh lungtuanaw a tho vae`ae.
42015025	“Te a ccapaw atawccapaw tuh loo kya a la um, te yn cceih zah inn pe he a thua tuh tyngdaw te lawpaw roi kha a thae.
42015026	Te see`ae lukheit kha ko zah tuhe tuh pawmou cite a khia.
42015027	Te aning nynh, ‘Na neitapaw kha phe yn thua vae, te na paaw nynh amaw kha ngedante bua a muihthui keiccuze, athopaw tohlaw kha a chiapya,’ a cipya.
42015028	“Te aning tuh a thinria zah inn lungkhu lang tee vae khyh, tukeiccu a paaw nynh yn toikuh zah a soihbia.
42015029	Te aning nynh tho zah a paaw kha, ‘Dotua, kum patae cia na rya ka laah, na kawpyapaw mah vaekheit san kae ei boi khyh, tuhzemah ka ban`ae ryte lungtuanaw kae rae ccaw cite mia taraw sakheit san nae pya boi khyh.
42015030	Thuasalama ohhuanung`ae ryte na hoi paw uccaw marya a mang kou paw e na ccapaw tuh he yn thua mawte, athopaw tohlaw kha a hanlan na chiapya,’ a ci.
42015031	“Te a paaw nynh, ‘Ka ccapaw, nang tuh kamaw ryte tyty na um, te ka hoi paw balyn tuh na kya-e nynh thua.
42015032	Lungtuanaw ah rae lan oh ccan zah lungpaw lan accan, pawccecize e na neitapaw tuh chih zah atu a hiinthui vae, te zo zah atu muih thui athua vae,’ a cipya,” a ci.
42016001	Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha mah a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Mihoipaw lukheit nynh synriatu lukheit a hoi, tuh-e synriatu nynh a bawipaw uccaw`ae kha phya a mang kou cite a bawipaw kalan seibe`ae.
42016002	Te a bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha ko zah, ‘Na konglang ka thae paw tuh pawtemou? Synriatu rya na lawnawpaw ccazing kha yn pya, pawccecize synriatu na thua kho vae lan khyh,’ a cipya.
42016003	“Oute synriatu nynh a thinlung kya, ‘Pawmou ka cyih vae cih? Ka bawipaw nynh synriatuthuanaw kha ka kyate phe yn lawpya vae, lae thae lan ka thae kho khyh, ngiaku lan ka maethah.
42016004	Synriatuthuanaw kyate he ka ccaw vae ze ming`ae nynh mih inn lang oun thuasah nawlan`ae pawte cyi lan cipaw ka nyku vae,’ a ci.
42016005	“Te a bawipaw kya-e laeba um`ae paw miakaw kha ko`ae zah, lukheitpaw kha, ‘Ka bawipaw kya hozeihmou laeba na um?’ cite a khia.
42016006	“Te aning nynh, ‘Chitui bath zakheit,’ a ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Na ccazing kha lawkuh lah arangte dahung lah sungpangnaw cite zeikuh,’ a cipya.
42016007	“Oute mingccangpaw kha, ‘Nang so hozeihmou lae na um?’ cite a khia. Te tuh-e paw nynh, ‘Chanvui kor zakheit,’ a ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Na ccazing kha lawkuh lah sungtarya cite zeikuh,’ a cipya.
42016008	Te atazae leipaw synriatu nynh hawrarih lante a cyi keiccu a bawipaw nynh thehoysah. Pawccecize hynh-e laephi ccungccaw`ae tuh mimaw mih she kya awnaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ahawhua`ae.
42016009	Te nanning kae hopya oh, he na shung vae oh ze zungzae umnaw lungkhu lang nanning ae lehkhan lan oh paw ruiban`ae kha ading leipaw phuasui khate raekuh oh.
42016010	Pyhtaripaw uccaw kya zyn lan um paw tuh pataepi kya mah zyn lan um paw nynh thua, te pyhtaripaw uccaw kya atazae leipaw tuh pataepi kya mah atazae leipaw nynh thua.
42016011	Tukeiccu ading leipaw phuasui kya nanning nynh zyn lan na um khyh oh ze, ahmepaw hoirungnaw kha hung nynh mou nae kalan ae ah cih oh?
42016012	Te mingccangpaw ccungccaw uccaw kya nanning nynh zyn lan na um khyh oh ze, hung nynh mou nae uccaw kha ae pya cih oh?
42016013	“See hung nynh sanmah bawi luning rya la kho khyh; pawccecize bawi lukheit kha a hua lanze lukheit kha a sungsah cih, tukhyhze lukheit kalan a pang ze lukheit kha pawlangria leite a nung cih. Pachia te phuasui kha paryh na ryaa kho khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
42016014	Te phua a ry`ae paw Farasi`ae nynh mah kha-e bya`ae balyn kha thae`ae zah Jesu kha a nuinse`ae.
42016015	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh ccungccaw`ae malang naemaw te naemaw na dingsakuh oh paw nynh na thua oh; thuasalama Pachia nynh nae thinlung kha a ny; pawccecize ccungccaw`ae laku myarya ahang lante tua paw uccaw tuh Pachia malang luathua-ae-ui lang um paw nynh thua.
42016016	“Kawbya te profeh`ae tuh Johan kyacia hanlan nynh thua. Johan ccyh kyate vae tuh Pachia peenaw thehoypaw kha ho thua vae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh kha-e peenaw lungkhu lang a nangkuh`ae.
42016017	Kawbya kya-e ccafang taraw ccangkheit azo laeze vaawran te laephi zo azoihua.
42016018	“Hunghung zemah a zu kha maah zah ccangpaw nopi kha zu lang a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua; te a vawpaw nynh a mya paw nopinung kha zu lang a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua.
42016019	“Sekakungpaw uccaw te uccaw nebaleihpaw leih lawkuh zah myarya hoysahte nin takyh leih um paw mihoipaw lukheit a um.
42016020	Te milae a ngiakuh paw, Lazaruh acikuh paw lukheit um zah aning tuh vaemaw te a pyn kya phe beih zah mihoipaw sakoih zung khe phang a huekuh.
42016021	Te mihoipaw ccaboi kyate accah paw loohmoi`ae kha ae lan a ry; tuhlaeze ui`ae nynh oun cceih`ae zah a vaemaw`ae kha a lya`ae.
42016022	“Ou tuhcihte Lazaruh tuh chih zah vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Abraham by vawlan a cciakhae`ae. Mihoipaw mah chih zah a u`ae.
42016023	Te Hades kya myarya accih lang teingte, dothung zah asawpi e Abraham te a by vawlan um paw Lazaruh kha a muih.
42016024	Te sia zah, ‘Apang Abraham, thaw beih yn ccih lah Lazaruh kha beih yn sawpah, a kuihdung kha tui kya yn dungsah lah ka lae hynh yn kyaasahpya ccaw, pawccecize kae tuh hynh-e maeephu kya myarya accih lang ka teing,’ a ci.
42016025	“Thuasalama Abraham nynh, ‘Ka ccapaw, laephi vaw na hiin ccyh lya ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha na mue, te tuhhawte Lazaruh tuh athahpaw uccaw`ae kha a mue cipaw kha liathuitua; thuasalama atu aning tuh ngaengansah athua vae, te nang tuh myarya accih lan teingsah na thua.
42016026	Te tuh-e`ae balyn laeze, kaening te nanning alaku kya myarya akhupaw hunghua pi kha rae athua vae. Tukeiccu e kyate nanning kalan a zua ry`ae paw nynh zua kho khyh`ae, khahlang te kaening kalan a zua ry`ae paw mah zua kho khyh`ae,’ a cipya.
42016027	“Te mihoipaw nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze, apang, ka paaw inn lang Lazaruh kha yn la sawpah cite kae ngia.
42016028	Pawccecize kae tuh uno lu pangaw ka hoi, minmin nynh hynh-e vawsaw teingnaw hmin lungkhu lang oun thuabua khyh ccaw`ae, aning nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae ccaw,’ a ci.
42016029	“Abraham nynh, ‘Minmin tuh Mawsi te profeh`ae mang a hoi`ae, minmin bya kha la ngae`ae sah,’ a cipya.
42016030	“Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Apang Abraham, tuhte thua khyh; chinaw kyate lukheit nynh thothui zah minmin kalan a ccia lanze, minmin tuh a ngaesikuh cih`ae,’ a ci.
42016031	“Te Abraham nynh, ‘Minmin nynh Mawsi te profeh`ae bya kha a ngae khyh`ae ze lukheit nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a tho zemah minmin tuh soih kho um lae vae lan khyh`ae,’ a cipya,” cite a hopya`ae.
42017001	Oute Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Maeleihsakunaw um leite thua kho lan khyh, thuasalama maeleihsakunaw a thuasah paw ccungccaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!
42017002	Hynh-e imua taraw`ae lukhakheit kha a maeleihsaku lae tuh a nging kyakhe mianawpaw lung ccangkheit kha sae`ae sah lah rili lungkhu lang ccaring vua lanze a hanlan ahoyhua cih.
42017003	“Naemaw te naemaw kha raeringkuh oh; na uno nynh na tungvaw a cyisei ze amaw kha la pe, te a ngaesiku ze la ngaethya.
42017004	Te nin kheit lungkhu na tungvaw vae sari sei zah nin kheit lungkhu vae sari na kalan yn ki zah, ‘Ka ngaesikuh,’ ae cipya ze na la ngaethya cih,” a cipya`ae.
42017005	Te locceihtu`ae nynh Bawipaw kha, “Kae zynnaw oun lungsapah,” a ci`ae.
42017006	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Nanning nynh mungngia mung mungkheit cia zynnaw na hoi oh ze hynh-e thaeku ku hynh, ‘Na tharui kyate phohkuh lah rili lungkhu lang la bingkuh,’ na cipya oh ze kha-e nynh nae kaw phe ae ngae cih oh.
42017007	“Thuasalama nanning lakuze lukhakheit nynh see lukheit hoi zah kha-e see nynh lei a thue ze thuasah, tukhyhze saring a ring ze thuasah, loo kyate he yn thua vae ze, ‘Rang lah ae lan dahung kanmaw,’ cite hung nynh mou na ci cih oh?
42017008	Thuasalama kha-e see kha, ‘Ka hanlan zerya yn hyngpah, te na tae kha cciakuh lah phe ka ae kou, phe ka neih kou cia aepaw kha yn dang, ou tuhkoute nynh nang na ae na neih ung cih,’ cite na cipah lan khyh oh tou?
42017009	Kawpya thyhhawte see nynh a cyipya keiccu, kha-e see kha a bawipaw nynh a kalan lungtuabya hopah cih ta? Lungtuabya hopah cih cite ka tua khyh.
42017010	Tuhhawte nanning mah ryalaw ae naw oh paw balyn kha he na cyi vae oh ze, ‘Aening tuh angae-aduakuh leipaw see`ae nynh ah thua oh, ah cyi lan oh paw rya kyalya nynh ah cyi oh,’ na ci cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42017011	Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang cceih zah Samaria te Galilee laku kyate po a cceih.
42017012	Te khua khuakheit lungkhu lang a tee tuh, asawpi lang a thadyn`ae paw, vaethyakae`ae paw ccungccaw luhaw nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
42017013	Te minmin nynh mih roi saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw Jesu kaening hynh ngaethya oun umsah!” a ci`ae.
42017014	Te Jesu nynh he a muih`ae tuh minmin kha, “Cceih oh lah naemaw te naemaw kha ranpibawi`ae kalan la dosakuh oh,” a cipya`ae. Ou tuhcihte minmin nynh he a cceih`ae tuh mih vaethya phe athyaa kou.
42017015	Te minmin lakuze lukheitpaw nynh a vaethya phe athyaapaw kha he a muihkuh tuh, ki zah roi accae lante Pachia kha phuesah zah,
42017016	Jesu ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah lungtuabya a ho; te tuh-e paw tuh Samariapaw nynh thua.
42017017	Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Vaethya athyaa`ae paw kha luhaw thua khyh ta? Lutakua`ae so teisangmou a um`ae?
42017018	Hynh-e minphuin ccangpaw holeite Pachia phu-e pya lan oun ki paw muih lan um khyh rei,” a ci.
42017019	Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Thokuh, la cceih ccavae, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya.
42017020	Te Farasi`ae nynh Pachia peenaw tuh hotuhmou yn thua cih cite Jesu kha he a khia`ae tuh, Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Pachia peenaw tuh mitmuihnaw te yn thua khyh.
42017021	‘E kyahin dotua!’ ‘Khuin kya dotua!’ cite mah oun ci lan khyh`ae; pawccecize dotua oh, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning lungkhu nynh a um,” a ci.
42017022	Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nin`ae kya-e nin kheit kha muih lan na ry oh ccyh yn thua cih zah na muih lan khyh oh.
42017023	Te, ‘E kyahin do! Tukhyhze khuin kya khuin do!’ ae cipah cih oh; la cceih nan oh lah zui nan oh.
42017024	Pawccecize khozaw nynh vaawlui sang kheit kaw te laekuh zah ccanglang vawlui kaw lang a aw hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah amaw nin ccyh kya athua cih.
42017025	Thuasalama aning tuh masaty patae a teing hahe cih zah hynh-e ciihan`ae nynh oun vua cih`ae.
42017026	“Te Noah ccyh lya a la cyiku hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw ccyh kya mah oun cyikuh cih.
42017027	Noah nynh sanphalung lungkhu lang phe a tee nin kyacia, ccungccaw`ae tuh ae`ae, neih`ae, zu hoeikuh`ae, zudykuh`ae, te tuipayn thua zah minmin balyn kha marya a ro`ae.
42017028	“Tuhhawte nynh Lot she lya mah a la cyiku; ccungccaw`ae tuh a ae`ae, a neih`ae, uccaw a re`ae, a zua`ae, thingthae ccou`ae, inn sak`ae.
42017029	Thuasalama Lot nynh Sodom khua kyate a pou nin ccaccei khe vaawran kyate maee te kemaee khuarah zah minmin balyn kha marya a ro`ae.
42017030	“Ou tuhhawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw he yn langku nin kya yn cyikuh cih.
42017031	Tuh-e nin kya, inn tungvaw um paw ccungccaw nynh inn lungkhu um paw a uccaw`ae lawku khylan rungbung nan vae sah; te lei kya um paw ccungccaw mah tuhhawte inn lang ki nan vae sah.
42017032	Lot a zu kha liathuitua oh.
42017033	Hunghung zemah a hiinnaw khumku khylan a ccungkuh paw tuh hiinnaw kha a shung cih, te hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a khynsah cih.
42017034	Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e khuazi kya ikhung ccangkheit kya ccungccaw luning um`ae paw kha, lukheit law athua cih zah lukheitpaw kha cciataw athua cih.
42017035	Pynkheihlan sungmia`ae paw nopi luning kha, lukheit law athua cih zah lukheit cciataw athua cih.
42017036	Lei kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw luning kha, lukheit law thua cih zah lukheit kha cciataw athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
42017037	Te minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Teilangmou law athua cih`ae Bawipaw?” cite a khia`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Michihrua a umnaw kya, langtaw`ae mah pynkheihlan a sueluakuh bua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
42018001	Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae tuh lungthang leite zungzae sawsang lan accan cite minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae.
42018002	A hopaw tuh: “Khuapi khuakheit kya Pachia rawrih khyh zah ccungccaw mah pawlangria leipaw byapiatu lukheit a um.
42018003	Te tuh-e khuapi kya numaenung lukheit a la um. Te aning nynh tuh-e paw kalan cceih zah, ‘Kamaw yn rawsetupaw kha ccae yn liapah,’ a cipya.
42018004	“Te aning nynh khaw cia cyipya leite a um; thuasalama ou tuhkoute byapiatu nynh amaw te amaw kya, ‘Pachia raw mah ka rih khyh zah ccungccaw mah pawlang ka ria khyh zemah,
42018005	hynh-e numaenung nynh vawsaw yn pya keiccu tuh a hanlan ccae ka liapah cih, tukhyh lanze banban pei yn cceih cih zah phe yn bangsah cih,’ a ciku,” a ci.
42018006	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Atazae leipaw byapiatu nynh a hopaw kha thae oh.
42018007	Te khaw cia a ngaesang zemah, Pachia nynh amaw kalan khuazi khuadae a sia`ae paw, amaw nynh a po`ae paw kha ccaeliapya leite um ngaw ta?
42018008	Nanning kae hopya oh, minmin kha arang mawte ccaeliapah cih`ae. Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw he yn thua vae ze aning nynh laephi vawlan zynnaw hynh muih ung vema?” a ci.
42018009	Te Jesu nynh mimaw te mimaw kha a ding`ae paw lang riakuh`ae zah mingccang`ae a dothatheih`ae paw kalan khe e tousenaw phungpaw hynh a ho:
42018010	“Ccungccaw luning nynh sawsang lan tempal kalan a cceihthung`ae; lukheit tuh Farasipaw thua zah lukheit tuh ngunto khoitu nynh thua.
42018011	Farasipaw nynh thadyn zah a makhaete hynhte sawsangku, ‘Pou Pachia, kae tuh ccungccaw uccaw a luade`ae paw, atazae lei`ae paw, milae zu a seikhae`ae paw, te hynh-e ngunto khoitupaw hawte mah ka thua khyh keiccu, na kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
42018012	Lonaw nawkheit ze vaening looh-ae ka sung, ka hoi paw abalyn kya-e pumhaw pumkheit ka pya,’ a ci.
42018013	“Te ngunto khoitu tuh asawnaw langkhe thadynte, a mit mah vaawran lang dothung ngan leite, thuasalama a by kha tukuh zah, ‘Pou Pachia, miseipaw kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!’ a ci.
42018014	“Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw tuh Farasipaw laeze thyaaccoute a inn lang a ki; pawccecize amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw miakaw tuh sawbung athua cih; te amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih,” a ci.
42018015	Te Jesu nynh a hae ccaw`ae cite nosi`ae kha mah amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh minmin kha a pe`ae.
42018016	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Imua taraw`ae kha ka kalan oun cceih`ae sah, kang nan oh; pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh khatahaw`ae paw elan nynh thua.
42018017	Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah Pachia peenaw kha imua taraw hawte a lawku khyh ze, tuh-e peenaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh,” a ci.
42018018	Te uktu lukheit nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatu hoypaw, zungzae hiinnaw rho ka ccou nawlan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite a khia.
42018019	Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou kamaw hynh ahoypaw cite nae ko? Pachia lukheit laelan ahoypaw hung sanmah um khyh.
42018020	‘Milae zu seikhae nan,’ ‘Ccungccaw theih nan,’ ‘Ruh nan,’ ‘Ahme leipaw ccaekia lang tang nan,’ ‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua,’ acikuh paw kawpyapaw`ae kha na nyh khaw!” a cipya.
42018021	Te aning nynh, “Tuh-e`ae balyn tuh ka dih lya mawte phe ka zui kou vae,” a ci.
42018022	Te Jesu nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh kha-e paw kha, “Ccangkheit na bou ung, na hoi paw balyn kha zua lah ryachi`ae kha la nee`ae, te vaawran kya sisua na hoi cih, oute rang lah kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
42018023	Te aning nynh hynh-e bya kha he a thae tuh myarya a ngaethah, pawccecize aning tuh myarya a hoirungpaw nynh thua.
42018024	Te kha-e paw myarya a ngaethyapaw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh, “A hoirung`ae paw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh pawcihmou aru!
42018025	Pawccecize mihoipaw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang a tee lanpaw lae tuh kalauk nynh phynbang khu kya tee lan a zoihua,” a ci.
42018026	Te tuh-e a thae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh, “Tuhte lanze hungmou khumnaw a mue kho cih?” a ci`ae.
42018027	Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw hanlan athua kho leipaw kha Pachia hanlan tuh athua kho,” a ci.
42018028	Oute Piter nynh, “Dotua, kaening tuh pawpaw balyn marya kae cciataw zah namaw kha kae zui,” a ci.
42018029	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw keiccuze inn thuasah, nungpaaw`ae thuasah, uteno`ae thuasah, zu thuasah, te ccaaw`ae thuasah a cciataw paw tuh,
42018030	atu ccyh kya aleih patae mue leite um lan khyh, te yn thua lanpaw she kya zungzae hiinnaw mue leite um lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42018031	Oute Jesu nynh zuitu luhaw laening kha ccanglang cciakhae`ae zah, “Dotua oh, aening tuh Jerusalem lang nynh ah ccia oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw te asekuh lante profeh`ae nynh a zei`ae paw balyn tuh marya accing cih.
42018032	Pawccecize aning tuh Zenta`ae kalan pya athua cih, sarya athua cih, te dothatheih athua cih zah tuin te thoi athua cih.
42018033	Te a tua a sah cih`ae zah a theih cih`ae, te nin thungnaw kya bua a thothui cih,” a cipya`ae.
42018034	Te minmin nynh hynh-e`ae hynh ccangkheit san thaethya khyh`ae, te hynh-e bya hopaw tuh minmin kyate thuru athua, minmin nynh a hopaw uccaw`ae kong kha nyh khyh`ae.
42018035	Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Jeriko te anaekunaw lang he a thua tuh, mitmohpaw lukheit tuh ngiakute laanpi pe a dahung.
42018036	Te ccungccaw zapi a ccia`ae paw kha he a thae tuh, “Tuh-e tuh pawmou?” cite a khia.
42018037	Te minmin nynh Nazareth paw Jesu nynh yn cceih cite a hopya`ae.
42018038	Te aning nynh, “David Ccapaw, Jesu kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!” cite a sia.
42018039	Te malang a cceih`ae paw nynh zya a dae ccaw cite kha-e paw kha a sianua`ae, thuasalama aning nynh, “David Ccapaw, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!” cite houh a sia.
42018040	Te Jesu tuh thadyn zah kha-e paw kha oun cciakhae oh cite kawpya`ae, te a pe lang he a naekuh te Jesu nynh,
42018041	“Na hanlan pawmou cyisah nae ry?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, ngawmuih nynh ka ry,” a ci.
42018042	Te Jesu nynh, “Ngawmuih ccavae, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya.
42018043	Te vaekheihmawte ngawmuih zah Pachia kha phu-esah biate amaw kha a zui; te ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
42019001	Te Jesu tuh Jeriko khua lang tee zah po a cceih.
42019002	Te dotua, ngunto khoitu`ae lakuze lupi athua paw, Zakia acikuh paw um zah aning tuh a hoirung.
42019003	Te aning nynh Jesu tuh hungmou thua cite muih a ry; te ccungccaw alung keiccuze muih kho khyh, pawccemacize aning tuh ane.
42019004	Te malang ccue khaw zah Jesu muih khylan thaeku ku kalan a kae; pawccecize Jesu tuh tuhlang po ccia lan acih vae.
42019005	Te tuh-e hmin kya Jesu he a thua tuh dothung zah kha-e paw kha a muih. Te amaw kha, “Zakia, rangsakuh lah yn rungbung, atunin na inn kya ka thua cih,” a cipya.
42019006	Te Zakia nynh arangte rungbung zah lungtuate amaw kha a thuasah.
42019007	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh, “Miseipaw lukheit a mikhiapaw lang thua lan nynh phe a ccia vae,” cite mih balynte a ccohkuh`ae.
42019008	Te Zakia nynh thadyn zah Bawipaw kha, “Bawipaw, dotua, ka uccaw`ae akhankuh kha ryachi`ae ka pya`ae, te lukhakheit kya-e uccaw ccangkhakheit kha ahme lei lante phe ka lawpyaku ze, leih pali ka pyaru,” a cipya.
42019009	Te Jesu nynh, “E paw mah Abraham ccapaw athua thyhhawte, atunin hynh-e inn kya khumnaw tuh a thua vae.
42019010	Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh azopaw ccung khylan te khum khylan nynh yn thua,” a cipya.
42019011	Te hynh-e bya`ae a thae`ae lyakhe, Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a naeku vae keiccu te minmin nynh Pachia peenaw tuh vaekheihmawte yn thua vae cih cite a tua`ae keiccuze Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit biachih zah a hopya`ae.
42019012	Tukeiccu a hopaw tuh: “Bawi lukheit tuh amaw hanlan peenaw kha lawku lan zah bua ki lan cite asawnaw ram langkhe a cceih.
42019013	A ccia maw, a see`ae luhaw kha ko`ae zah mina phua kiahaw pya`ae zah, ‘Bua kae thua cia kung la kunah oh,’ a cipya`ae.
42019014	“Thuasalama a ramccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e paw kha a hua`ae, te a nuhlang te ccungccaw saw`ae zah, ‘E paw nynh kaening oun uk lanpaw kae ry khyh,’ cite a hosapya`ae.
42019015	“Ou tuhcihte, tuh-e bawi tuh peenaw kha yn lawkuh zah he yn ki tuh phua a pyasya`ae paw see`ae nynh hozeihmou mue`ae cipaw ny khylan minmin kha amaw kalan a kosah`ae.
42019016	“Oute masaty e paw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, na mina phua kha mina ccanghaw amia,’ cite a hopya.
42019017	“Te aning nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Ahoy, nang see hoypaw, nang tuh myarya adihpaw uccaw kya zyn lan na um keiccuze khuapi khuahaw tungvaw kawhoinaw la hoi,’ a cipya.
42019018	“Te luningnaw e paw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, na mina phua kha mina pangaw amia,’ cite a hopya.
42019019	“Te aning nynh tuhhawte, ‘Nang mah khuapi khuapangaw tungvaw kawhoinaw la hoy,’ a cipya.
42019020	“Te ccangpaw lukheitpaw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, pavua kya ka tung zah kae ccypya paw hynh-e na mina phua hynh do.
42019021	Pawccecize, nang tuh na ccyku leipaw kha na lawkuh zah na ccouku leipaw kha na ruekuh paw, eih cih kaesypaw ccungccaw na thua keiccu na raw kae rih,’ cite a hopya.
42019022	“Te aning nynh, ‘Na khalang kya-e thyhte bya kae pia cih, nang see hoy leipaw, kae tuh ka ccyku leipaw kha ka lawkuh zah ka ccouku leipaw ka ruekuh paw, eih cih kaesypaw cipaw mang na nyh paw nynh,
42019023	pawccemou ka phua tuh bank kya na nung khyh? He kae thua vae ze ka phua tuh phuato ryte ka mue cih paw,’ a cipya.
42019024	“Te aning nynh a pe thadyn`ae paw kha, ‘A kya-e mina phua kha laah oh lah ccanghaw a hoitupaw kha pya oh,’ a cipya`ae.
42019025	Te minmin nynh, ‘Bawipaw, aning tuh mina ccanghaw a hoi khaw tou,’ a ci`ae.
42019026	Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, ‘A hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pyachih athua cih zah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw kyate a hoi thypaw kha heize lawpya athua cih.
42019027	Thuasalama kae nynh ka uk lanpaw a ry lei`ae paw ka rhaw`ae kha hynhlang oun cciakhae oh lah ka malang mawhin theih oh,’ a cipya`ae,” a ci.
42019028	Te tuhte he a ho koute Jesu tuh malang cceih zah Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
42019029	Ou tuhcihte Oliv acikuh paw mua leihpaw, Bethfake te Bethani khua pe he a thua tuh a zuitu`ae luning kha saw`ae zah,
42019030	“Nae malang a um paw khua langkhe la cceih oh, tuin kya na teenaw oh kyakhe, hung ccungccaw nynh san a cciku boi leipaw lann taraw a khikuh paw kha na la muih cih oh, kha-e kha oun supah oh lah hynhlang oun cciakhae oh.
42019031	Te lukhakheit nynh, ‘Pawccemou na supya oh?’ cite ae khia oh ze, ‘Bawipaw nynh a peki keiccu,’ cite nae hopah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
42019032	Te a saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh mih kya a hopya`ae hawkhate a muih`ae.
42019033	Te lann taraw kha he a supah`ae tuh, a hoitu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou lann taraw kha na supya oh?” a ci`ae.
42019034	Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw nynh a peki,” a ci`ae.
42019035	Te minmin nynh lann taraw kha Jesu kalan a cciakhae`ae, te minmin nynh lann taraw tungvaw mih uccaw`ae kha de`ae zah Jesu kha a tungvaw a ccisaku`ae.
42019036	Te he a cceih tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh mih uccaw`ae kha laanpi kya a phaepya`ae.
42019037	Te Oliv Mua kyate rungbungnaw pe kya he a thua tuh zuitu`ae zapi khaleih nynh a muih`ae paw athungpaw ryalaw`ae balyn hanlan mih lungtua zah Pachia kha roi accae lante thehoysah`ae zah,
