42019038	“BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw Siapharan tuh hythuaccou sah! Vaawran kya daenaw um sah lah ahang huaccenaw kya phu-enaw um sah!” cite a sia`ae.
42019039	Te ccungccaw zapi laku-e Farasi`ae abang nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, na zuitu`ae hynh pe`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42019040	Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Nanning kae hopya oh, hynh-e`ae nynh daetedae lang a um`ae zemah lung`ae nynh vaekheihmawte a sia cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42019041	Te Jerusalem pe Jesu he a thua tuh khualae kha do zah kha-e elan a rah:
42019042	“Nang na kya-e daenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae hynh namaw ccyh kya atunin, nang ccaccei nynh na ny lanze ahoy cih paw! Thuasalama atu khae` ae tuh na mit kyate thuru athua.
42019043	Pawccecize na rhaw`ae nynh na pepan kya rhawhu ae sahkhaw cih`ae zah ki pali kyate nang kha varyn ae koih cih`ae.
42019044	Namaw te na lungkhu e na ccaaw`ae kha laephi te phe ngingkuh lang ae nung cih oh. Te minmin nynh na kya lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit akhanthykuh lante ae cciatawpah lan khyh`ae. Tuhe nin ccyh na tungvaw yn thua cih. Pawccemacize Pachia nynh nang ae paebuanaw ccyh kha na ny khyh keiccu,” a ci.
42019045	Te tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah tuin kya a zua`ae paw te a re`ae paw kha dee`ae zah,
42019046	minmin kha, “ ‘Ka inn tuh sawsangnaw inn nynh thua,’ cite azeikuh; thuasalama nanning nynh miruh`ae karung lang phe na rae oh,” a cipya`ae.
42019047	Te Jesu nynh nin takyhte tempal kya a ccangpya`ae. Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te ccungccaw`ae kyaze lupi`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan a ccung`ae.
42019048	Tuhzemah ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw bya kha myarya a ngae ry`ae keiccuze, minmin nynh cyi khonaw muihkuh khyh`ae.
42020001	Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh Jesu nynh tempal kya ccungccaw`ae kha ccangpah`ae zah thehoypaw a ho lyakhe, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae tuh piccang`ae ryte oun thua`ae zah,
42020002	amaw kha, “Paw kawhoinaw te mou e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi? Tukhyhze hung nynh mou hynh-e kawhoinaw hynh nang ae pya? Kaening oun hopya tua,” a ci`ae.
42020003	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae mah bya ccangkheit kae khia cih oh zah nae hopah cih oh.
42020004	Johan kya-e baptisma kha vaawran kyate tou, tukhyhze ccungccaw`ae kyate tou?” cite a khia`ae.
42020005	Te minmin nynh mimaw te mimaw hokuh`ae zah, “Aening nynh, ‘Vaawran kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, aning nynh, ‘Pawccemou te amaw kha na zyn khyh oh?’ he oun ci cih.
42020006	Thuasalama, ‘Ccungccaw`ae kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh lung te oun deih cih`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh Johan tuh profeh nynh thua cite a zyn`ae,” a ciku`ae.
42020007	Oute minmin nynh, “Paw kyate cipaw kae nyh khyh,” cite a ci`ae.
42020008	Te Jesu nynh, “Kae mah paw kawhoinaw te nynh e uccaw`ae hynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
42020009	Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae kha hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw hynh a hopya`ae: “Ccungccaw lukheit nynh misu khokhu kha rae zah misu ryalahtu`ae kha a hohsaku`ae, te asawnaw ram lang khaw ro lang khua a ccung.
42020010	Te athae lo ccyh kya misu ryalahtu`ae nynh khokhu e misu thae abang kha oun pya ccaw`ae cite mih kalan ryalahtu lukheit a saw; thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh kha-e paw kha bua`ae zah kuih ccakaete a kisah`ae.
42020011	Te ccangpaw ryalahtu kha bua a saw, te minmin nynh kha-e paw kha mah vaemaw phe mue lan bua`ae zah maethya kou um lang tua`ae zah kuih ccakaete bua a kisah`ae.
42020012	Te luthungnaw bua a saw ki, te minmin nynh kha-e paw kha mah vaemaw phe mue lan bua`ae zah dae a vua`ae.
42020013	“Te khokhu hoitupaw nynh, ‘Pawtepei ka cyih cih? Ka sungsahpaw ka ccapaw nynh ka saw vae cih, minmin nynh amaw kha he oun muih vae`ae ze a saw poh tua kho`ae,’ a ci.
42020014	“Thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ‘E paw tuh rhoccoutu nynh thua; rang oh, amaw kha theih oh sih lah a rho uccaw tuh ah kya-e lang a tang ccaw,’ cite mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
42020015	Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha khokhu kyate atolang dae vua`ae zah phe a chia`ae. Tukeiccu khokhu hoitupaw nynh minmin kha pawtemou a cyih cih`ae?
42020016	Khokhu hoitupaw tuh yn thua cih zah tuh-e misu ccoutu`ae kha phe theih cih`ae zah misu khokhu kha mingccang`ae kalan nynh a pya vae cih,” a ci. Te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, “Tuhte tuh thua nan sah!” a ci`ae.
42020017	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha do`ae zah, “ ‘Lung-inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang oun tang,’ cite azeikuh paw kha pawmou a hory?
42020018	“Hunghung zemah kha-e lung vawlan a ccah paw tuh phe akinkuh cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e lung nynh a ccawthin paw tuh palae tui lang a mia cih,” a ci.
42020019	Tuh ccyh lya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh kha-e tousenaw phungpaw kha kaening nynh oun honua cipaw a nyku`ae keiccuze amaw kha kyng lan a ccung`ae; tuhzemah minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae raw a rih`ae.
42020020	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha dokhaw`ae zah a hopaw a bya kha kyngpya khylan, te ram uktu thungnaw te kawhoinaw kalan ah khylan cite adingpaw ccungccaw`ae lang a tang`ae paw dophitu`ae kha amaw kalan a saw`ae.
42020021	Te dophitu`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, nang tuh hmerarihlan na ho zah na ccangpya cipaw kae ny, ccungccaw laesanaw na hoi khyh, Pachia kya-e ccianaw kha hmerarihlan na ccangpya cipaw kae ny.
42020022	Kaening nynh Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan accan tou? Ccan khyh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
42020023	Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih thyaruhnaw kha phe nyh zah minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae syntawtua oh?
42020024	Denari kiakheit kha yn dosatua oh. Kha-e kya hung muinsan te hung kya-e ccawzeipyapaw mou a um?” a ci. Minmin nynh, “Sizar kya-e,” cite a khung`ae.
42020025	Te Jesu nynh, “Sizar uccaw`ae kha Sizar kalan pya oh lah Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia kalan pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
42020026	Te minmin nynh a bya kha ccungccaw`ae malang kyngpah kho khyh`ae, te a khung`ae paw bya kha mih ngaeangthua zah daetedae lang zya um`ae.
42020027	Oute thothuinaw um khyh cite a ei`ae paw Sadusi`ae nynh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha,
42020028	“Ccangpatupaw, ‘Zu a hoi vae paw ccungccaw nynh ccaaw hoi leite phe a chi lanze, kha-e a upaw ciihan azo khyh nawlan a zu kha a neitapaw nynh a umkhae cih,’ cite Mawsi nynh kaening kha oun zeipya.
42020029	Atu uteno lusari acih`ae paw a um`ae. Atawccapaw nynh zuhoi zah ccaaw saah leite phe a chih.
42020030	Te luningnaw nynh kha-e nung kha a zu lang umkhae zah ccaaw leite phe bua a chih.
42020031	Te luthungnaw nynh kha-e nung kha bua a umkhae, te tuhhawte lusarinaw nynh mah a umkhae, te minmin tuh ccaaw saah leite phe chih kou`ae.
42020032	Tuh-e`ae balyn koute tuh-e nopinung mah phe a chih.
42020033	Tukeiccu thothuinaw kya tuh-e nung tuh minmin lakuze hung zu lang mou a tang cih? Pawccecize lusari mawte kha-e nung kha zu lang phe a umkhae`ae,” cite a khia`ae.
42020034	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Atu she e ccaaw`ae tuh zuvaw tang`ae zah zuvaw tangnaw a rae`ae.
42020035	Thuasalama nyalang e she kha thuasah, te a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kha thuasah ccou lan angaekuh cite tua athua`ae paw nynh tuh zuvaw tang vae khyh`ae zah zuvaw tangnaw mah rae vae khyh`ae.
42020036	Minmin tuh kharyh chih kho vae khyh`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae te nynh aloku vae`ae, thothuinaw ccaaw`ae athua vae`ae thyhte Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh athua vae`ae.
42020037	Te a chih`ae paw a thothui`ae cipaw tuh Mawsi nynh Bawipaw kha, ‘Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia te Jakob Pachia,’ cite thabu kya a ko lyakhe phe a langsaku vae.
42020038	Pawccecize Pachia tuh a chih`ae paw Pachia thua khyh, thuasalama a hiin`ae paw Pachia nynh thua, pawccecize ccungccaw balyn tuh amaw kya nynh a hiin`ae,” a ci.
42020039	Oute kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang nynh tho`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, na ho paw kou ahoy,” a ci`ae.
42020040	Tuhkoute tuh minmin nynh byakhia ngan vae khyh`ae.
42020041	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pawtemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Kri tuh David Ccapaw nynh thua a ci`ae?
42020042	-
42020043	Te Sam Ccauh kya David amaw ccaccei nynh, ‘BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” a cipya,’ a ci.
42020044	Tukeiccu David nynh Kri kha ‘Bawipaw’ cite a ko lanze, pawtemou aning tuh a Ccapaw athua cih?” cite a khia`ae.
42020045	Oute ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh a thaenaw`ae khe, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha,
42020046	“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha raeringkuh oh. Minmin tuh uccaw ccuabalaepaw kikute innlaepae ry`ae zah kungkunaw kya sawtuate byabeihku a ry`ae, te sinakok`ae kya ahoy huaccepaw tungkhung`ae kya dahung ry`ae zah poi kya ahoy huaccepaw akhaan kya um a ry`ae.
42020047	Minmin tuh numae`ae inn kha luade`ae zah cyisakuthya nawlan asaepi sawsang`ae; minmin tuh ale huapaw detahnaw kha a mue cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42021001	Te Jesu nynh ngawdo zah mihoi`ae nynh sisua bung lungkhu lang mih lungsing`ae a sang`ae paw kha a muih.
42021002	Te a ryachipaw numaenung lukheit mah tuh-e kya daw phuapia pianing a sang paw kha a muih.
42021003	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e a ryachipaw numaenung nynh minmin balyn laeze alunghua a sang vae.
42021004	Pawccecize minmin balyn tuh mih hoirungpaw pataepi kya-e kha Pachia hanlan lungsing lang a sang`ae, thuasalama aning tuh a ryachi pite a vuekuaku nawlan a hoithypaw balyn kha marya a sang vae,” a ci.
42021005	Te ccungccaw abang nynh tempal tuh apuithyapaw lung`ae te a hlu`ae paw uccaw`ae ryte paccaan athua paw kong kha a ho`ae; te Jesu nynh,
42021006	“Hynh-e uccaw`ae atu na muih oh paw hynh lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit san a khangthykuh paw um vae leite, marya tingsah bung ccyh yn thua cih,” a ci.
42021007	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, tuh-e uccaw`ae tuh hotuhmou yn cyikuh cih? Te tuh-e uccaw`ae yn thua nin ccyh yn nae vae ze paw muihsanaw mou yn langkuh cih?” cite a khia`ae.
42021008	Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning ling na thua khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh, pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh ka min te oun thua cih`ae zah, ‘Kae tuh Kri nynh ka thua,’ cite te, ‘Accyh anae vae,’ oun ci cih`ae; tukeiccu minmin nuhlang la zuikuh nan oh.
42021009	Te nanning nynh rhawtukkunaw kong te rhawtukkunaw lanpaw kong kha na thae vae oh ze la rih nan oh, pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh masaty yn thuaty cih, thuasalama athangnaw taloi thua la lan khyh,” a ci.
42021010	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Minphuin phuinkheit te phuinkheit, ram ramkheit te ramkheit yn rawkuh cih`ae.
42021011	Te khyzawvawkaw kya myarya arupaw innruisuekunaw, ccakangnaw te khuarang ccinaw yn thua cih, te vaawran kyate ri lan um paw uccaw te alepaw muihsanaw yn langkuh cih.
42021012	“Thuasalama tuh-e`ae balyn acyikuh maw, kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw`ae nynh ae kyng cih oh zah ae tua ae sah cih oh, sinakok kalan ae cciakhae cih oh zah thunginn lungkhu lang ae phang cih oh, siapharan`ae te uktu`ae malang ae thuakhae cih oh.
42021013	Te tuh-e tuh nae hanlan ccaekia lan a tang cih.
42021014	Tukeiccu pawtemou kae khung cih cipaw na tuakuty khyh nawlan oh nae thinlung kya la rya ccavae sah.
42021015	Pawccecize nanning ae rawsetu oh paw balyn nynh a ei kho lei`ae paw te a khee kho lei`ae paw hawnaw te ho khonaw kha kae nynh kae pya cih oh.
42021016	Te nanning kha nungpaaw`ae, uteno`ae te vaeccaw`ae te ruiban`ae nynh ae phee cih oh, te nanning abang kha minmin nynh ae chiasah cih oh.
42021017	Te kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw balyn nynh nanning kha ae hua cih oh.
42021018	Thuasalama nae lu kya-e nae sang ccangkheit sanmah roh lan khyh.
42021019	Na ngaesangnaw oh liate nae hiinnaw-muisaw kha mue oh.
42021020	“Te Jerusalem khuapi kha rhawkaw`ae nynh a koih`ae paw he nae muih vae oh ze, kha-e ronaw tuh anae vae cipaw la nyh ccavae oh.
42021021	Oute Judah ram kya a um`ae paw nynh mua lang ccue`ae sah, te khuapi lungkhu a um`ae paw nynh pou`ae sah, te khua taraw kya um`ae paw nynh khuapi lungkhu lang tee nan`ae sah.
42021022	Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya azeikuh paw balyn accing nawlan tuh-e nin tuh ccaeliarunaw nin nynh athua.
42021023	Tuh-e nin ccyh kya ccaawpoi paw te mateizu paw imua a hoi paw nopi`ae tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang! Pawccecize Judah ram kya alepipaw vawsawrunaw yn thua cih zah hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tungvaw bungpawnaw yn thua cih.
42021024	Te minmin tuh ahepaw thaloi te khulia athua cih`ae zah minphuin balyn kalan see lang tang lan cciakhae athua cih`ae; te Jerusalem tuh Zenta`ae ccyh azaw mawlaezung Zenta`ae nynh a syde cih`ae.
42021025	“Te khuanin kya, sawpaw kya te awsi`ae kya muihsanaw yn langkuh cih, te laephi vawlan minphuin`ae kya vawsawrunaw te muihsanaw oun um cih, rili te tuileih`ae oun tho cih.
42021026	Laephi vawlan oun cyikuh lanpaw uccaw`ae kha ngaehoi paw te ccungccaw`ae thinlung tuh rinaw keiccuze thawzung oun thang cih; pawccecize vaawran kya-e thungnaw`ae tuh oun hy cih.
42021027	Oute minmin nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw phu-enaw te thungnaw ryte maeking kya yn rung paw kha oun muih cih`ae.
42021028	Te hynh-e uccaw`ae he yn cyiku takaw vae ze nae lu`ae kha hangthung oh lah dothung oh, pawccecize nanning sawkhawnaw tuh anae vae,” a cipya`ae.
42021029	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Thaeku ku te thingku`ae balyn kha dotua oh.
42021030	Anaw he yn toih paw kha na muih vae oh ze hawning ccyh tuh anae vae cipaw na ny oh.
42021031	Ou tuh-e hawte, hynh-e uccaw`ae yn cyikupaw he nae muih vae oh ze, Pachia peenaw tuh anae vae cipaw kha la nyh ccavae oh.
42021032	“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn acyiku kou makhia atu-e ccungccaw`ae zo lan khyh`ae.
42021033	Vaawran te laephi tuh azo cih, thuasalama ka bya`ae tuh zo lan khyh.
42021034	“Te naemaw te naemaw kha la raeringkuh oh, tukhyh lanze ccyhkhakheit kya, eih rui lan niapaw te, ruinaw te, hynh-e hiinnaw elan thinphangnaw te nae thinlung tuh a vawsaw cih, te tua lei pite tuh-e Nin tuh nae tungvaw yn thua cih.
42021035	Pawccecize laephi vawlan khaleih kya a um paw ccungccaw balyn tungvaw khe kaang hawte tuh-e Nin tuh yn thua cih.
42021036	Tukeiccu nanning tuh yn thua vae cih paw hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kyate lue lan angaekuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw malang thadyn lan angaekuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh zungzae sawsang oh lah la ngaw oh,” a ci.
42021037	Oute khuadae ccyh kya Jesu nynh tempal kyakhe a ccangpya`ae, te khuazi ccyh kya pou zah Oliv acikuh paw mua kyakhe a rya.
42021038	Te awkhua takawte ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw bya kha ngae khylan amaw kalan tempal voidu lungkhu lang oun thua`ae.
42022001	Te Kawtaw Poi a ci`ae paw, Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi tuh anae vae.
42022002	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae raw a ri`ae keiccuze Jesu kha pawtemou chia lan cipaw a ccung`ae.
42022003	Te Setan nynh locceihtu luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athuabua paw Judas Iskaria lungkhu langkhe a tee.
42022004	Te kha-e paw nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae kalan cceih zah Jesu kha pawtemou kae phee cih cipaw minmin kha bya hokhae`ae.
42022005	Te minmin tuh mih lungtua zah phua kae pya cih cite byakinpyaku`ae.
42022006	Te aning nynh mah byakinkuh zah ccungccaw zapi a um khyh`ae lyakhe Jesu kha minmin kalan ah khylan ccyhhoypaw kha a ccungku vae.
42022007	Oute Kawtaw Poi elan tuutaw chia lan accan nin Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi nin ccyh tuh a thua vae.
42022008	Te Jesu nynh Piter te Johan kha, “Aening ah ae ccaw oh, la cceih oh lah Kawtaw Poi kha ah hanlan la paccyn oh,” cite hopah`ae zah a saw`ae.
42022009	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pawkyamou nae paccynsah ry?” cite a khia`ae.
42022010	Te Jesu nynh, “Dotua oh, khua lungkhu lang he na tee oh te tui re yn phu paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ae la tungkuh cih oh, aning nynh a teenaw inn lungkhu lang amaw kha la zui oh.
42022011	Te nanning nynh inn hoitu kha, ‘Ccangpatu nynh ka zuitu`ae ryte Kawtaw Poi kae aenaw lanpaw mikhia khaan tuh teisangmou a um? ae ci,’ cite la hopah oh.
42022012	Te aning nynh phe paccynty paw akopaw palung khaan kha ae la muihsah cih oh, tuin kyakhe la paccyn oh,” a cipya`ae.
42022013	Te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh mih kya a hopya`ae hawte a muih`ae, te minmin nynh Kawtaw Poi dangkunaw kha a paccyn`ae.
42022014	Te accyh he azawte Jesu tuh locceihtu luhaw laening ryte ccaboi kya a dahung`ae.
42022015	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka teing maw hynh-e Kawtaw Poi hynh nanning ryte aekheih lan myarya ka peki.
42022016	Pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw kya Kawtaw Poi accing makhia e poi hynh ka ae boi vae lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42022017	Te banang kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute, “E banang hynh lawkuh oh lah naemaw kha neekuh oh.
42022018	Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw yn thua makhia cia, misutui kya-e niapaw hynh ka neih vae lan khyh,” a ci.
42022019	Te sanlou kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah minmin kha pya`ae zah, “E tuh nanning hanlan pya paw ka pyn nynh thua, kamaw liathui nawlan e hynh mang oh,” a ci.
42022020	Tuhhawte zerya a ae`ae koute, banang kha mah lah zah, “E banang tuh nanning hanlan luasah paw ka chiise kya-e byakin thawpaw nynh thua.
42022021	Thuasalama, dotua oh, kamaw yn ahtupaw kuih tuh ccaboi vawlan kamaw ryte a pukheih.
42022022	Te laerui-awde athua vae thyhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a cceih ccaccing cih; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw a pheetupaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!” a ci.
42022023	Te zuitu`ae nynh hynh-e uccaw tuh hung nynh mou yn cyih vae cih cipaw mimaw te mimaw laku oun khiakuh vae`ae.
42022024	Te zuitu`ae laku hungmou alehua lang tua athua cih cite mimaw kya eikunaw mah a um.
42022025	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Zenta siapharan`ae nynh uknaw kaw te a uk`ae, te mih tungvaw kawhoinaw a langsakutu`ae paw kha hoynaw oun raepatu cite a ko`ae.
42022026	Thuasalama nanning tuh tuhte na cyih lan khyh oh; thuasalama nanning laku ale huapaw ccungccaw tuh ano huapaw hawte thua sah; te cciakhaetu athua paw nynh ryalawpatu hawte thua sah.
42022027	Pawccecize aepaw a koih paw ccungccaw tou alehua? Tukhyhze a thohae paw tou alehua? Aepaw a koih paw alehua khazaw? Thuasalama kae tuh nanning laku a thohae paw hawte nynh ka thua.
42022028	Nanning tuh tuh-ounaw ka tungnaw kya kamaw ryte po na umbua oh paw nynh na thua oh.
42022029	Te ka Paaw nynh peenaw ccangkheit yn pya hawte, kae nynh nanning kha peenaw kae pya oh.
42022030	Ka peenaw kya, ka ccaboi kya nanning nynh na ae bua, na nia bua nawlan oh, te Israel phin haw laening kha byapiate suitungkhung vawlan na dahungbua nawlan oh kaw kae pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
42022031	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Simon, Simon, dotua, chanvui kha pasaryh te ryh hawte nanning kha ryh lan Setan nynh ae peki oh.
42022032	Thuasalama na zynnaw aro khyh nawlan na hanlan saw kae sangpah; te ka kalan nae paleihku vae ze na uno`ae kha varyn la tynsah`ae,” a cipya.
42022033	Te Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, namaw ryte tuh thunginn lungkhu lang thuasah, chinaw kalan thuasah ccia lan paccynkute ka um,” a cipya.
42022034	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Piter, nang kae hopya, nang nynh kamaw hynh ka nyh khyh cite vaethung nae vua maw, atunin awkhungpaw yn khua la lan khyh,” a cipya.
42022035	Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Phuabu, sohrae, ccukoh phuku leite nanning kae saw lya oh kha, ccangkhakheit na ho na bou oh paw um tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Pawsang um khyh,” a ci`ae.
42022036	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama atu tuh phuabu a hoi paw nynh kha-e kha ccyngkuh sah lah sohrae a hoi paw mah tuhhawte ccyngkuh sah, te thaloi a hoi leipaw nynh a uccaw kha zua sah lah thaloi kha rekuh sah.
42022037	Pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, ‘Aning tuh kawbya zui leitu`ae ryte riakheih athua,’ cite azeikuh paw tuh kamaw tungvaw yn ccing cih, pawccecize ka konglang te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae tuh accing cih,” a cipya`ae.
42022038	Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, dotua, e kya thaloi zung ning a um,” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Azaw vae,” a cipya`ae.
42022039	Te Jesu tuh yn pou zah leih a cyi hawte, Oliv Mua lang a cceih, te a zuitu`ae nynh mah amaw kha a zui`ae.
42022040	Te ahmin kya he a thua tuh, minmin kha, “Nanning tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na tee khyh nawlan oh sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.
42022041	Te minmin kyate lung oi khing loukaw asawnaw langkhe phiatawkuh`ae zah ccukharutung zah sawsang paw tuh:
42022042	“Apang, na rynaw athua ze, hynh-e banang hynh ka kyate oun lawpah; tuhzemah kamaw rynaw thua leite, namaw rynaw kha cyikuh sah,” a ci.
42022043	Te vaawran langte vaaw ccungccapaw nynh amaw kalan yn langkuh zah amaw kha thawzung a pya.
42022044	Te myarya a lungriathae pawte aning tuh thawmawte houh sawsang; te a vaesaw tuh laephi kalan accah paw chii hawte nynh thua.
42022045	Te sawsangnaw kyate thokuh zah a zuitu`ae kalan he a thua tuh mih ngaethyanaw keiccuze minmin a i`ae paw kha a muih.
42022046	Te minmin kha, “Pawccemou nanning na i oh? Tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na tee khyh nawlan oh, tho oh lah sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.
42022047	Te tuhte a ho cciamang lyatuin dotua, ccungccaw zapi oun thua`ae, te luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw, Judas acihkuh paw nynh minmin kha oun cciakhae`ae zah Jesu kha myng lan amaw kalan yn naeku.
42022048	Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Judas, Ccungccaw Ccapaw hynh nang nynh myngte tou na phee?” cite a khia.
42022049	Te Jesu ryte um`ae paw nynh yn cyikuh lanpaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh thaloi te kae bae cih`ae tou?” cite a khia`ae.
42022050	Te lukheitpaw nynh ranpibawi paw a seepaw kha thoh bae zah a ranglang nakua thoh apae.
42022051	Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Azaw vae,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw a nakua kha hae zah a dansah.
42022052	Oute Jesu nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae paw alepaw ranpibawi`ae, tempal ngawtu`ae, te piccang`ae kha, “Miruhpaw kyng lan a ci`ae hawte thaloi ry tungbang ryte tou nae ccianua oh?
42022053	Tempal kya nanning ryte nin takyh ka um he lyaze kamaw kha kyng lan na zuakuh khyh oh; thuasalama atu tuh nanning ccyh te mohnaw kya-e kawhoinaw ccyh nynh athua,” a cipya`ae.
42022054	Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha kyng`ae zah ranpibawi lupi paw inn langkhe a cciakhae`ae. Te Piter nynh asawpi te a zui.
42022055	Te minmin nynh inn maepaw angaelung kyakhe maee tua`ae zah pynkheihlan he a dahung`ae tuh Piter mah minmin laku a dahungbua.
42022056	Te Piter nynh maee pe a dahung paw kha ryalawpatu liaccanung nynh he a muih tuh ahoy mawte do zah, “E paw mah Jesu ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
42022057	Te Piter nynh, “Nopinung, amaw kha ka nyh khyh,” cite Jesu kha a vua.
42022058	Te khuekheih aro koute mingccangpaw nynh Piter kha muih zah, “Nang mah minmin kya a umbua paw nynh na thua,” a cipya. Te Piter nynh, “Ccungccapaw, ka thua khyh!” a ci.
42022059	Te suimilan ccangkheit loukaw aro koute mingccangpaw lukheit nynh, “Thanccingte e paw mah Jesu ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh thua, pawccecize aning tuh Galileepaw nynh thua,” cite zynkute a ho.
42022060	Te Piter nynh, “Ccungccapaw, paw nynh na ho cipaw ka nyh khyh,” a ci. Te tuhte a ho cciamang lya, vaekheihmawte awkhungpaw a khua.
42022061	Te Bawipaw nynh maeleihkuh zah Piter kha a do. Te, ‘Awkhungpaw a khua mawze, nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,’ cite Bawipaw nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae.
42022062	Te Piter tuh atolang pou zah thawmawte a rah.
42022063	Te Jesu a kyng`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha sarya`ae zah a bua`ae.
42022064	Te minmin nynh a mae kha phang bong`ae zah a mae kya a bia`ae, te, “Nang ae bia paw hynh hungmou? Hotua!” cite a khia`ae.
42022065	Te minmin nynh amaw kha sarisarya lante ccangpaw uccaw kong patae a honua`ae.
42022066	Te khua he adae tuh, ccungccaw piccang`ae, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh sueluakuh`ae zah Jesu kha kungsi zung lungkhu lang cciakhae`ae zah,
42022067	“Nang tuh Kri na thua lanze oun hopah,” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning kha kae hopya oh ze, na zyn lan khyh oh.
42022068	Te kae nynh mah kae khia oh ze, nae khung lan khyh oh zah saw mah nae saw lan khyh oh.
42022069	Thuasalama atu koute Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Pachia kya-e thungnaw ranglang kya nynh a dahung vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
42022070	Oute minmin balyn nynh, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw tou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ka thua cipaw na ho oh latu,” a cipya`ae.
42022071	Te minmin nynh, “Paw ccaekia mou ahopaw a um ung? Pawccecize amaw a khalang kya-e aening ccaccei nynh phe ah thae vae oh,” a ci`ae.
42023001	Te ccungccaw zapi khaleih nynh thokuh`ae zah Jesu kha Pilat kalan a cciakhae`ae.
42023002	Te minmin nynh tho`ae zah, “E paw nynh ah minphuin phe a cciakhaesei paw kha kae muih, te Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan a khee, amaw te amaw hynh Kri, Siapharan nynh ka thua a ciku,” cite amaw kha seibe`ae.
42023003	Te Pilat nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite Jesu kha a khia. Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Na ho hawte nynh thua,” a ci.
42023004	Oute Pilat nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw`ae kha, “E Ccungccapaw nynh a cyiseimenaw ka muih khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42023005	Te minmin tuh mih thin houh khykuh zah, “Aning nynh Galilee kyate tho zah hynh-e hmin kyacia, Judah ram balyn po ccangpah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha lungtho lan a hy`ae,” a ci`ae.
42023006	Pilat nynh Galilee cipaw he a thae tuh tuh-e paw tuh Galileepaw thua ta thua khyh ta cipaw a khia.
42023007	Herod kawhoinaw zakaw kya a um paw nynh thua cipaw ccahe a nyh tuh, Jesu kha Herod kalan a saw; tuh-e ccyh lya Herod mah Jerusalem kya nynh a um.
42023008	Te Herod nynh Jesu kha he a muih tuh myaryamaw a lungtua, pawccecize Jesu konglang kha patae thae vae zah langmawpi te Jesu kha muih lan a ry vae paw nynh thua; te Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw ccangkhakheit kha muih lan a ngaehoi.
42023009	Oute Herod nynh Jesu kha bya patae a khia; thuasalama Jesu nynh kaw kheit san khung khyh.
42023010	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah Jesu kha thawmawte seibe`ae.
42023011	Te Herod te a rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha pawlangria leite a sarya`ae, te lyccaccupaw uccaw kha lawsakuh`ae zah Pilat kalan bua a saw`ae.
42023012	Te tuh-e nin ccaccei kya Pilat te Herod tuh hoyccaw lang a tang`ae; pawccecize langmaw tuh lukheit te lukheit a la rhawkuh`ae paw nynh thua.
42023013	Te Pilat nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae, uktu`ae te ccungccaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah,
42023014	“Nanning nynh e Ccungccapaw hynh ccungccaw`ae a cciakhaeseipaw hawte ka kalan nae cciakhae oh; te dotua oh, nae malang khe akaw-aleih bya ka khia zah nanning nynh sei na be oh paw konglang te hynh-e Ccungccapaw kya seimenaw ka muih khyh.
42023015	Herod nynh mah muih khyh, pawccecize Herod kalan nanning kae sawsah vae oh; te dotua oh, chi lan accanpaw Jesu nynh a cyi paw kharyh um khyh.
42023016	Tukeiccu amaw hynh de ka tah cih zah ka luesah cih,” a cipya`ae.
42023017	Pawccecize tuh-e Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw`ae kalan lukhakheit kha a sawpya aho.
42023018	Te minmin balyn nynh, “E Ccungccapaw tuh theih lah kaening kalan Barabbas kha oun sawpah,” cite vaekheihmawte a sia`ae.
42023019	Tuh-e Barabbas tuh khualae kya rhawkunaw a rae keiccu, te ccungccaw a chia keiccuze thung a ccah paw nynh thua.
42023020	Te Pilat nynh Jesu kha a luesah ry keiccuze minmin kha bua a hopya`ae.
42023021	Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade, khiade!” cite a sia`ae.
42023022	Te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou? Paw hoyleinaw mou a rae? Chinaw aphah paw seimenaw amaw kya ka muih khyh, tukeiccu amaw hynh de kae tah sah lah kae luesah,” cite vaethungnaw bua a ci.
42023023	Thuasalama minmin nynh Jesu tuh khiade thuasah cite roi accae lante thawmawte a ngia`ae. Te minmin roi te alepaw ranpibawi`ae roi nynh phe a tae.
42023024	Te Pilat nynh minmin nynh a ngia`ae hawte thuasah cite bya a pae.
42023025	Te khualae rhawkunaw a pousah keiccu te ccungccaw chianaw keiccuze thung a ccah paw, minmin nynh a ngiaku`ae paw kha Pilat nynh a sawpya`ae; thuasalama Jesu kha mih rynaw kalan a ah.
42023026	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha he cciakhae`ae tuh, khua taraw langte yn cceih paw, Sairin ram e paw Simon acikuh paw kha kyng`ae zah a tungvaw khe vaelantung kha khang`ae zah Jesu nuhlang te a puihsah`ae.
42023027	Te ccungccaw aphupi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae; te amaw elan a rah a khui`ae paw nopi`ae mah a um`ae.
42023028	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kalan maeleihkuh zah, “Jerusalem ccanung`ae, kae ka hanlan rah nan oh, thuasalama naemaw hanlan te nae ccaaw`ae hanlan palia rah oh.
42023029	Pawccecize, dotua oh, ‘Atinpaw, ccaawsaah boi leipaw vue`ae te imua nynh a zu boi leipaw matei`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,’ cite oun ho cih`ae paw nin`ae tuh yn thua cih.
42023030	Oute minmin nynh, mua`ae kha, ‘Kaening hynh oun tingthin oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae zah mua taraw`ae kha, ‘Kaening hynh oun nethin oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae.
42023031	Pawccecize, ahinpaw thingku kya hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh minmin nynh a cyi`ae lanze aroupaw thingku kya pawmou acyikuh cih?” a ci.
42023032	Te ccungccahoy lei`ae luning kha mah Jesu ryte chia khylan a cciakhae bua`ae.
42023033	Te Kalvari acikuh paw ahmin kya he a thua`ae tuh, tuin kya Jesu ryte tuh-e ccungccahoy lei`ae kha, a ranglang lukheit, a voilang lukheit a khiade`ae.
42023034	Oute Jesu nynh, “Apang, minmin hynh ngaethya`ae, pawccecize paw nynh kae cyi cipaw nyh khyh`ae,” a ci. Te minmin nynh ccungthy dung`ae zah a uccaw kha a neeku`ae.
42023035	Te ccungccaw`ae tuh phang dote a thadyn`ae. Te minmin ryte uktu`ae nynh mah nuinse`ae zah, “Aning nynh ming`ae kha a khum`ae; aning tuh Pachia nynh popaw Kri athua lanze amaw te amaw kha khumkuh sah,” a ci`ae.
42023036	Te rhawkaw`ae nynh mah amaw kha a sarya`ae, amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah misutui ariapaw kha pya`ae zah,
42023037	“Nang tuh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua ze, namaw te namaw kha khumkuh tua,” a ci`ae.
42023038	Te, “E PAW TUH JEW‘AE SIAPHARAN NYNH THUA,” cite Greek, Latin, Hebru ccaw te ccawzeipyapaw kha mah a luki khe a tawpya`ae.
42023039	Te ccungccahoy lei`ae luning lakuze lukheitpaw nynh, “Nang tuh Kri na thua ze namaw te namaw kha khumkuh lah kaening hynh mah yn khum,” cite Jesu kha sarisarya a ci.
42023040	Thuasalama lukheitpaw nynh kha-e paw kha khung zah, “Nang tuh e paw te phe alokuhpaw detahnaw kya mang na um pite Pachia raw na rih khyh tou?
42023041	Aening tuh ah cyisahnaw thyhte angaekuh lante amee ah mue paw thua zah accanpaw nynh thua; thuasalama e Ccungccapaw tuh pawsang mah a cyisei paw um khyh,” cite a pe.
42023042	Te aning nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, na peenaw lungkhu lang he na thua vae ze kae hynh oun ning nan vae ii,” a cipya.
42023043	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya, atunin nang tuh kamaw ryte Paradis kya na umbua vae cih,” a cipya.
42023044	Te tuh-e ccyh tuh ninthu suimilan haw laening loukaw thua zah zete suimilan ccangthung cia laephipi balyn tuh pung amoh.
42023045	Te khuanin phe amoh; te tempal kya zokhawpaw boei tuh zung ning lang aseikuh.
42023046	Te Jesu nynh thawte a sia koute, “Apang, ka muisaw hynh na kuih kya kae ah,” a ci. Tuhte he a ho koute a hy athang.
42023047	Acyikuh paw kha rhawbawipaw nynh he a muih tuh, “Thanccingte, e paw tuh adingpaw Ccungccaw nynh thua!” cite Pachia kha phu-esah.
42023048	Te tuh-e kya a thua paw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh, khe kya acyikuh paw balyn kha do`ae zah mih by kha tukuh`ae zah a ki`ae.
42023049	Te amaw ryte a nyhkuh`ae paw balynte Galilee kyate amaw oun zui`ae paw nopi`ae tuh asawpi langkhe thadyn`ae zah acyikuh paw kha a do`ae.
42023050	Te dotua oh, Josef acikuh paw, kungsi memba lukheit um zah aning tuh ahoypaw te adingpaw ccungccaw nynh thua.
42023051	Aning tuh kungsi memba`ae khuakhannaw te cyisahnaw kya a nawccahbua khyh; Jew`ae khuapi, Arimathia khua paw thua zah amaw mah Pachia peenaw a ngaehoi paw nynh thua.
42023052	E paw nynh Pilat kalan cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a ngiaku.
42023053	Te Jesu rhua kha sahbung zah boeirawpaw te a lung, te lung kya a karyn`ae paw, hung ccungccaw sanmah a ccynaw boi lei`ae paw, shawkhu kyakhe a ccy.
42023054	Te tuh-e nin tuh Paccynku nin thua zah Sabbath nin thuanaw anae vae.
42023055	Te Galilee kyate amaw ryte oun cceihkheih`ae paw nopi`ae mah zuikuh bua`ae zah a rhua kha pawcihte nynh a ccy`ae cipaw shaw kyakhe phe a dobua`ae.
42023056	Te minmin tuh ki`ae zah amynthuapaw zimuin te mynkhuhpaw satho kha a paccyn`ae. Te kawpyapaw thyhte Sabbath nin kya tuh a hae-ung`ae.
42024001	Te lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khe, tuh-e nopi`ae tuh ccangpaw nopi`ae ryte, a paccyn`ae paw amynthuapaw kha ccyng`ae zah shaw kalan khe a cceih`ae.
42024002	Te minmin nynh shaw kyate lung a nuekuh paw kha a muih`ae.
42024003	Te minmin nynh a lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Bawipaw Jesu rhua kha muih vae khyh`ae.
42024004	Ou tuhte minmin tuh tuh-e konglang myarya mih ngaeangthua lyakhe, dotua oh, phaephae ahpaw uccaw a lawkuh`ae paw ccungccaw luning tuh mih pe khe a thadyn`ae.
42024005	Te nopi`ae tuh rih`ae zah laephi kalan mih mae phang a tebing`ae lyakhe, tuh-e`ae nynh, “Pawccemou a chih`ae paw laku khe a hiinpaw kha nanning nynh na ccung oh?
42024006	Aning tuh e kya um vae khyh, phe a tho vae! Galilee pe kya a um lyaze nanning ae hopya oh paw,
42024007	‘Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh misei`ae kuih kalan pya athua cih zah khiade athua cih, te nin thungnaw kya bua a tho cih,’ a cipaw kha liathuitua oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
42024008	Te nopi`ae nynh a bya kha a liathui vae`ae.
42024009	Te shaw kyate ki`ae zah hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kha luhaw laekheit kalan te tuhlaepaw zuitu`ae balyn kalan a hopya`ae.
42024010	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong locceihtu`ae kalan a hopah`ae paw tuh: Meri Magdalin, Joanna, James a nung Meri, te minmin ryte a um`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae nynh thua`ae.
42024011	Te mih bya`ae kha phungpaw huataw olante tua`ae zah locceihtu`ae nynh zyn khyh`ae.
42024012	Thuasalama Piter tuh thokuh zah shaw kalan khe a ccue; te baling zah arawpaw uccaw amaw te a um paw kha a muih, te acyikuh paw kha a ngaeangthua zah a inn lang phe a ki.
42024013	Te dotua, zuitu`ae luning tuh tuh-e nin kya Jerusalem kyate me sari loukaw asawpaw Emmaus acikuh paw khua langkhe a cceih`ae.
42024014	Te minmin tuh acyikuh paw uccaw`ae balyn kong kha lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
42024015	Te ou tuhte minmin nynh pynkheihlan byaruakute byahoku`ae lyakhe, Jesu tuh yn naekuh zah minmin ryte a cceihbua.
42024016	Thuasalama mih mit tuh phang khaw thua zah amaw kha nyh khyh`ae.
42024017	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Na cceih lalia lang oh te lukheit te lukheit na hoku oh paw nae bya tuh pawtecihpaw mou? Pawccemou nae ngae a thya?” cite a khia`ae.
42024018	Te minmin kyaze Klopas acikuh paw nynh khung zah, “Nang hynh Jerusalem kya mikhia tou hung na thua, te atu loukaw tuin kya acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kha na nyh khyh tou?” a ci.
42024019	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Paw uccaw`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu kong. Aning tuh Pachia malang te ccungccaw balyn malang cyisahnaw kya te bya kya athungpaw Profeh nynh thua.
42024020	Te amaw kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kaening oun uktu`ae nynh a chi ccaw cite seibe khylan ah`ae zah phe khiade`ae.
42024021	Thuasalama aning tuh Israel`ae kha oun sawkhaw vae cih paw nynh thua cite kaening nynh kae la ngaehoi; te hynh-e balyn laeze hynh-e uccaw`ae acyikunaw te atunin hynh nin thungnaw nynh thua.
42024022	Te kaening kae phu kya-e, awkhua takawte shaw kalan a thua`ae paw, nopi`ae abang nynh kae ngaeang oun thuasah`ae.
42024023	Minmin nynh a rhua kha he muih vae khyh`ae tuh oun ki`ae zah Jesu tuh phe a hiin vae cite a hopah`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kya-e vizin kha mah kae muih cite oun hopya`ae.
42024024	Te kaening ry a um`ae paw abang nynh shaw kalan khe cceih`ae zah nopi`ae nynh a ho`ae hawkhate a muih`ae; thuasalama Jesu tuh muih khyh`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
42024025	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pou mingaee`ae, profeh`ae nynh a hosya`ae paw balyn zyn lan thinlung khysung`ae paw!
42024026	Kri tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh teing lan te a phu-enaw lungkhu lang tee lan ccan khyh tou?” a cipya`ae.
42024027	Te Mawsi kyate tho zah Profeh`ae balyn nynh azei`ae paw, amaw kong te asekuhpaw Ccathyaa balyn kha minmin kalan ccaeteccae lang a hopya`ae.
42024028	Te minmin a ccianaw lang`ae khua kya vyavya a thua`ae tuh, Jesu tuh po suhlue lan acih paw hawte a umsaku.
42024029	Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Kae kya umbua hin, pawccecize khuanin vyavya nae vae, khua yn zi vae cih,” cite thawmawte a kang`ae. Te aning tuh minmin ryte um lan a teebua.
42024030	Te ou tuhcihte minmin ry ccaboi kha ccahe a koih`ae tuh Jesu nynh sanlou kha laah zah hythua a pya, te eih zah minmin kha a pya`ae.
42024031	Te mih mit tuh oun aw vae zah amaw kha a ny vae`ae; te aning tuh mih muihnaw kyate phe azo.
42024032	Te minmin nynh, “Laanpi kya aening bya oun hopya lya te Ccathyaa oun ccaesapya lya kha aening ah thinlung kya u mawte oun u khazaw?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
42024033	Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya minmin tuh thokuh`ae zah Jerusalem lang a ki`ae; te luhaw laekheit te minmin ryte pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae paw, ming`ae kha a muih`ae.
42024034	Tuh-e`ae nynh, “Bawipaw tuh phe a thothui ccaccing vae, te Simon kalan phe a langkuh vae!” a ci`ae.
42024035	Te minmin nynh laanpi kya acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kong te sanlou a ia lya minmin nynh amaw a ny`ae paw kong kha a ho`ae.
42024036	Te tuhte minmin nynh a ho`ae lyakhe Jesu amaw ccaccei tuh minmin ngaelaku khe thadyn zah minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah,” a cipya`ae.
42024037	Thuasalama minmin nynh khozithurae hynh sang phe kae muih vae cite tua`ae zah ohsikuh`ae zah a rih`ae.
42024038	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae lungvawsaw? Pawccemou nae thinlung kya lunghiinnaw a um?
42024039	Ka kuih te ka ccu hynh dotua oh! Kamaw sou ka thua, oun haetua oh lah oun dotua oh; pawccecize muisaw nynh tuh, kae nynh ka hoi paw na muih oh hawte, ngesaw te ru`ae hoi khyh,” a cipya`ae.
42024040	Te tuhte he a ho koute, a kuih te a ccu kha a dosah`ae.
42024041	Te minmin tuh mih ngaeangthua zah mih lungtua keiccu a zyn kho la khyh lya`ae khe, Jesu nynh, “E kya ae lanpaw ccangkhakheit na hoi oh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
42024042	Te minmin nynh aruakuhpaw ngasaw pae kheit te khoilutui kha a pya`ae.
42024043	Te Jesu nynh kha-e kha lawkuh zah mih malang khe a ae.
42024044	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Mawsi Kawbya kya thuasah, Profeh`ae ccauh kya thuasah, Sam kya thuasah kamaw te asekuh lante azeikuh paw miakaw tuh marya accing hahe cih cite nanning ryte ka um lyaze nanning kae hopya oh paw bya`ae tuh hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
42024045	Oute minmin nynh Ccathyaa kha a thaethya ccaw`ae cite mih thinlung-tuanaw kha a hungpya`ae.
42024046	Te minmin kha, “Hynhte azeikuh, te hynhte Kri tuh a teing ho zah nin thungnaw kya a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui aho.
42024047	Te ngaesikunaw te seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw tuh Jerusalem kyate tho ngaw zah minphuin`ae balyn kalan amaw min liate ho athua cih.
42024048	Te nanning tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae kong ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.
42024049	Dotua oh, ka Paaw kya-e Byakinpyakupaw kha nae tungvaw ka saw; thuasalama vaawran kyate thungnaw kha pya na thua oh makhia Jerusalem khuapi kyakhe la umhin oh,” a cipya`ae.
42024050	Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha Bethani khua phe thua lang cia a cciakhae`ae, te a kuih kha hangthung zah minmin kha hythuapya`ae.
42024051	Ou tuhte, minmin kha hythuapya`ae lyakhe aning tuh minmin kyate phia thua zah vaawran langkhe lawthung athua vae.
42024052	Te minmin nynh amaw kha beiksya`ae zah lungtuanaw alepi te Jerusalem lang a ki`ae.
42024053	Te Pachia kha thehoysah te, phu-esah te tempal kya pei a um`ae. Amen.
43001001	Athotakaw lya Bya a um, te Bya tuh Pachia ryte a um`ae, te Bya tuh Pachia nynh thua.
43001002	Tuh-e Bya tuh athotakaw lya Pachia ryte a um`ae.
43001003	Tynre balyn tuh amaw liate nynh rae athua, te rae paw hynh amaw leite ccangkheit san a raekuh paw um khyh.
43001004	Amaw kya tuh hiinnaw a um, te hiinnaw tuh ccungccaw`ae awnaw nynh thua.
43001005	Te awnaw tuh mohnaw kya a aw, thuasalama mohnaw nynh kha-e kha nyhthya khyh.
43001006	A min Johan cikuh paw, Pachia kyate saw paw ccungccaw lukheit a um.
43001007	Tuh-e paw tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw liate a zyn nawlan`ae, Awnaw kong ccaekiakhan khylan, ccaekia lang nynh yn thua.
43001008	Aning tuh tuh-e Awnaw thua khyh, thuasalama tuh-e Awnaw kong ccaekiakhan khylan saw paw nynh thua.
43001009	Tuh-e Awnaw tuh ahmepaw Awnaw nynh thua, tuh-e nynh laephipi kalan thuate ccungccaw miakaw kha a awsah.
43001010	Aning tuh laephipi kya um zah laephipi tuh amaw liate rae athua, tuhzemah laephipi nynh amaw kha nyh khyh.
43001011	Aning tuh amaw ccungccaw`ae kalan yn thua, thuasalama amaw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha lehkhan khyh`ae.
43001012	Thuasalama amaw kha lehkhan`ae paw miakaw, amaw min a zyn`ae paw ccaccei kha Pachia ccaaw`ae lang thuanaw kaw aning nynh a pya`ae.
43001013	Minmin tuh chiisaw te saah paw thua khyh`ae, pynsaw rynaw te saah paw thua khyh`ae, ccungccapaw rynaw te saah paw mah thua khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia rynaw thyhte saah paw nynh thua`ae.
43001014	Te Bya tuh pynsaw lang yn tang, Paaw nynh lukheit kyalya a saah paw a phu-enaw kha kaening nynh kae muih. Aning tuh thawccinaw te byaccing te phe beih.
43001015	Johan nynh tuh-e paw kong kha ccaekiakhan zah, “E paw tuh, ‘Kamaw koute yn thua cih paw ccungccapaw tuh kamaw laeze a lesaehua, pawccecize aning tuh kamaw laeze a umty,’ cite a kong ka hopaw kha nynh thua,” cite thawte a sia.
43001016	Te amaw ccingnaw kyate thawccinaw tungvaw thawccinaw kha aening balyn nynh ah mue oh.
43001017	Pawccecize Kawbya tuh Mawsi liate pya athua, thuasalama thawccinaw te byaccing tuh Jesu Kri liate nynh oun thua.
43001018	Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ccyhkhakheit kya san Pachia kha muih boi khyh, Paaw by vawlan a um paw, lukheit kyalya saah paw Ccapaw rou nynh amaw kha yn langsapya.
43001019	Te hynh-e tuh Jew`ae nynh, “Nang hungmou?” cite Johan kha khia khylan, ranpibawi`ae te Levi`ae kha Jerusalem kyate a saw lya`ae ze Johan kya-e ccaekia nynh thua.
43001020	Te aning nynh vuankhan zah eikuh khyh, thuasalama, “Kae tuh Kri ka thua khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
43001021	Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh hungmou? Elijah na thua tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te aning nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci. “Nang tuh tuh-e Profeh tou?” cite bua a khia`ae. Te aning nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci.
43001022	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh hungmou? Kaening oun saw`ae paw kalan kae la hopya ccaw`ae namaw te namaw kha hung na ciku mou?” cite a khia`ae.
43001023	Johan nynh, “ ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ cite profeh Isaiah nynh a ho vae hawte, kae tuh rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh ka thua,” a ci.
43001024	Te a saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Farasi`ae nynh thua`ae.
43001025	Te minmin nynh Johan kha khia`ae zah, “Nang tuh tuh-e Kri na thua khyh, Elijah mah na thua khyh, tuh-e Profeh mah na thua khyh lanze, pawccemou nang nynh baptisma na insah`ae?” a cipya`ae.
43001026	Johan nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh tui kya baptisma ka insah`ae, thuasalama nanning laku a thadyn paw, nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw Lukheit a um.
43001027	Aning tuh kamaw koute yn thua paw, kae laeze a lesae huapaw nynh thua, amaw ccukoh rui phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh,” a ci.
43001028	Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh Jordan vaw khuraw lang, Johan nynh baptisma insahnaw Bethabara khua kya nynh acyiku.
43001029	Awkhualan Johan nynh Jesu a kalan yn ccia paw kha muih zah, “Dotua oh, laephipi seinaw cciakhaetupaw Pachia Tuutaw khu!
43001030	‘Kamaw koute yn thua cih paw Ccungccapaw tuh kae laeze a lesae huapaw nynh thua,’ cite a konglang ka hopaw kha-e paw lahyn athua, pawccecize aning tuh kae laeze a umty.
43001031	Te amaw kha ka la nyh khyh, thuasalama aning tuh Israel`ae kalan langsapyaku athua cih cite ka ny, tukeiccu kae tuh tui kya baptisma insahte kae thua,” a ci.
43001032	Te Johan nynh hynhte ccaekiakhan, “Vafu hawte vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw Muisaw kha ka muih, te kha-e nynh amaw tungvaw khe a hae-ung.
43001033	Te amaw kha ka la nyh khyh, thuasalama tui kya baptisma-insah lan kamaw yn sawtupaw nynh kae kha, ‘A tungvaw Muisaw rungbung zah a hae-ung paw na muih paw ccungccapaw, kha-e paw tuh Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma insahtupaw nynh thua,’ cite yn hopya.
43001034	Te kae nynh ka muih zah e paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite ccaekia ka khan,” a ci.
43001035	Bua awkhualan Johan te a zuitu`ae luning a thadyn`ae koute,
43001036	Johan nynh Jesu a ccia paw kha do zah, “Dotua oh, Pachia Tuutaw khu!” a ci.
43001037	Te zuitu`ae luning nynh a hopaw kha thae`ae zah Jesu kha a zui`ae.
43001038	Te Jesu nynh maeleikuh zah minmin nynh a zui`ae paw kha a muih, te minmin kha, “Pawmou na ccung oh?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Rabbi” (tuh-e tuh he leih lanze Ccangpatu cipaw nynh thua), “Teisangmou na um?” a ci`ae.
43001039	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rang oh lah oun dotua oh,” a cipya`ae. Minmin nynh cceih`ae zah a umnaw kha a muih`ae, te tuin nin amaw ryte a umkheih`ae, pawccecize khahlya kha suimilan ccanghawnaw loukaw acih vae.
43001040	Johan nynh a hopaw thae`ae zah Jesu zui`ae paw luning lakuze lukheit tuh Simon Piter neitapaw Andru nynh thua.
43001041	Aning nynh masaty amaw a upaw Simon kha muih zah amaw kha, “Messiah” (Kri cite asuilan leih athua paw) “kha kaening nynh phe kae muih vae,” a cipya.
43001042	Te Simon kha Jesu kalan a cciakhae. Te Jesu nynh amaw kha he a muih tuh, “Nang tuh Jonah ccapaw Simon nynh na thua, nang tuh Sefas” (Lungtung cite asuilan leih athua paw) “cite ko na thua cih,” a cipya.
43001043	Awkhualan Jesu tuh Galilee pee lungkhu lang ccia ry zah Filip kha a muih, te, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
43001044	Filip tuh Andru te Piter`ae mih khua, Bethsaida paw nynh thua.
43001045	Filip nynh Nathania kha muih zah, “Mawsi nynh Kawbya kya zei zah profeh`ae nynh a konglang a zei`ae paw Josef ccapaw, Nazareth paw Jesu kha kaening nynh phe kae muih vae,” cite a hopya.
43001046	Te Nathania nynh, “Nazareth lungkhu te ahoypaw uccaw ccangkhakheit pou kho ngaw tou?” cite a khung. Filip nynh, “Rang lah yn dotua,” a cipya.
43001047	Jesu nynh amaw kalan Nathania yn ccia paw kha muih zah, “Dotua oh, a kya thyaruhnaw a um leipaw Israelpaw ccaccing khu!” cite a konglang a ho.
43001048	Nathania nynh amaw kha, “Pawtemou nang nynh kae hynh nae ny?” a ci. Jesu nynh khung zah, “Filip nynh nang ae ko maw, thaeku ku kaw na um lyakha phe kae muih vae,” a cipya.
43001049	Nathania nynh, “Rabbi, nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw, nang tuh Israel Siapharan nynh na thua!” cite a khung.
43001050	Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘Thaeku ku kaw phe kae muih vae,’ cite kae hopya keiccu tou nae zyn? Hynh-e uccaw`ae laeze ale huapaw nae muih ung cih,” a cipya.
43001051	Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, atu koute vaawran ahungkuhpaw kha nae muih cih zah Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tungvaw a rungbung`ae paw te a kaethung`ae paw kha nae muih cih,” a cipya.
43002001	Te nin thungnaw kya Galilee pee Kana khua kya zudy poi a um; te Jesu a nung tuin kya a umbua.
43002002	Te Jesu te a zuitu`ae mah paryhte zudy poi kalan a kobua`ae.
43002003	Te misutui he thang tuh, Jesu a nung nynh amaw kha, “Minmin misutui hoi vae khyh`ae,” a cipya.
43002004	Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, nang te kae nynh e kya pawmou ah sekuh bua? Ka ccyh thua loh khyh,” a cipya.
43002005	A nung nynh thohae`ae kha, “Aning nynh nanning kalan ae hopya oh paw miakaw kha cyih vae oh lou,” cite a hopya`ae.
43002006	Te tuin kya Jew`ae ccikankunawpaw phung thyhte, zungkheit ze galan kawkuin, sungthung accung paw, tui nungnawpaw lungre retaruh a nung`ae.
43002007	Jesu nynh thohae`ae kha, “Lungre`ae kha tui bia oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh kha-e`ae kha arae phe thua lan tui a bia`ae.
43002008	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu sua oh lah thohae piccangpaw kalan cciakhae oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh a cciakhae`ae.
43002009	Thohae piccangpaw nynh misutui lang rae athua paw tui kha he a niatua tuh, kha-e kha paw kyate yn thua cipaw nyh khyh, (thuasalama tui sua`ae paw thohae`ae nynh tuh phe ny`ae), thohae piccangpaw nynh zudy ccangvaepaw kha ko zah,
43002010	amaw kha, “Ccungccaw miakaw nynh atakaw lya tuh athuapaw misutui kha a nee`ae, te ccungccaw`ae phe a byn`ae koute tuh athua leipaw kha nynh a ruin he`ae, thuasalama nang tuh athuapaw misutui kha atu cia phe na nung,” a cipya.
43002011	Hynh-e muihsanaw`ae athotakawnaw hynh Jesu nynh Galilee pee Kana khua kyakhe rae zah a phu-enaw kha a langsapya`ae, te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
43002012	Hynh-e koute Jesu tuh a nung ry, a neitapaw`ae te a zuitu`ae ryte Kapernaum khua lang a cceihbung`ae, te tuin kya nin patae um khyh`ae.
43002013	Te Jew`ae Kawtaw Poi tuh nae vae zah Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
43002014	Te tempal voidu kya vaetua tangnua`ae, tuu`ae te valaele`ae a zua`ae paw te phuaru`ae paw a dahung`ae paw kha a muih.
43002015	Te adihpaw liarue`ae khate bua`ae zah tuu`ae te tangnua`ae te minmin balyn kha tempal voidu kyate phe a dee`ae, te phuaru`ae paw phua kha phya phaepah`ae zah ccaboi`ae kha phe buleihpya`ae.
43002016	Te valaele zua`ae paw kha, “E uccaw`ae hynh e kyate cciakhae oh, ka Paaw inn hynh kungkunaw inn lang rae nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
43002017	Oute a zuitu`ae nynh, “Na inn kya-e duanaw rynaw thinlung nynh kamaw kha phe yn ae,” cite azeikuh paw kha a liathui vae`ae.
43002018	Oute Jew`ae nynh tho`ae zah Jesu kha, “Nang nynh e uccaw`ae hynhte na cyi paw hynh kaening kalan paw muihsanaw mou nae langsapyaku ngaw?” cite a khia`ae.
43002019	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “E tempal hynh roh oh lah nin thung lungkhu ka thosah cih,” a cipya`ae.
43002020	Oute Jew`ae nynh, “Hynh-e tempal saknaw kya sungpali kum taruh aro, te nang nynh e hynh nin thung kya phe nae sakthui cih tou?” a ci`ae.
43002021	Thuasalama Jesu nynh tuh amaw pyn athua paw tempal kha nynh a ho.
43002022	Tukeiccu a chih`ae paw kyate Jesu he thothui te a zuitu`ae nynh e bya, Jesu nynh mih kalan a hopya`ae paw kha a liathui`ae, te minmin nynh Ccathyaa te Jesu nynh a hosyapaw bya kha a zyn`ae.
43002023	Atu Jerusalem khua Kawtaw Poi kya Jesu a um lya, poi nin kya, ccungccaw patae nynh Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw kha muih`ae zah amaw min kha a zyn`ae.
43002024	Thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw te amaw kha minmin kalan ahkuh khyh, pawccemacize ccungccaw balyn kha marya a ny.
43002025	Te ccungccaw lungkhu paw nynh a um cipaw kha phe a ny keiccuze, ccungccaw konglang hung nynh sanmah ccaekiakhan lan hosah khyh.
43003001	Jew`ae uktu, Nikodemas cikuh paw Farasipaw ccungccaw lukheit a um.
43003002	Tuh-e paw nynh khuazi khe Jesu kalan yn thua zah, “Rabbi, nang tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw ccangpatu nynh na thua cipaw ka ny, pawccecize Pachia nynh a umkhae khyh lanze hynh-e na rae paw muihsanaw`ae hynh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah rae kho lan khyh,” cite a hopya.
43003003	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kha kae hopya, ccungccaw lukheit nynh a puithui khyh lanze Pachia peenaw kha muih kho lan khyh,” a cipya.
43003004	Nikodemas nynh, “A kum phe tang vae paw ccungccaw nynh pawtemou bua a pui kho ung cih? A nung vuebua lungkhu lang vaeningnaw bua a tee kho ung cih tou? Te bua pui kho ung ngaw zaw?” cite a khung.
43003005	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, ccungccaw lukheit nynh tui te Muisaw te a pui khyh lanze Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee kho lan khyh.
43003006	Pynsaw kyate pui paw tuh pynsaw thua zah Muisaw kyate pui paw tuh muisaw nynh thua.
43003007	‘Nanning na puithui hahe oh aho,’ cite kae hopya paw hynh na ngaeangthua nan sah.
43003008	Khisang nynh a rynaw lang azaw he, te nang nynh kha-e roi kha na thae, thuasalama paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw te teilang nynh a ccia cipaw na nyh kho khyh, Muisaw kyate a pui paw miakaw tuh tuh-e hawte nynh athua,” a cipya.
43003009	Nikodemas nynh khung zah, “Hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh pawtemou athua kho cih?” a ci.
43003010	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang tuh Israel`ae ccangpatu na thua pite hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na nyh khyh tou?
43003011	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, kaening tuh kae ny paw kha kae ho zah kae muih paw kha ccaekia kae khan, thuasalama kae ccaekia kha nanning nynh na lehkhan khyh oh.
43003012	Laephi uccaw`ae kong hynh nanning kae hopah oh zah na zyn lei oh pite vaawran e uccaw`ae kong kae hopya oh ze pawtemou na zyn vae cih oh?
43003013	Te hung ccungccaw sanmah vaawran kalan a kaethung paw um khyh, thuasalama vaawran kya a um paw, vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw Ccungccaw Ccapaw rou nynh a kae.
43003014	Te Mawsi nynh fupaw kha rangkaw kya a saethung hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah saethung athua cih.
43003015	Ou tuhte hunghung zemah amaw a zyn paw tuh aro vae khyh nawlan, thuasalama zungzae hiinnaw a hoi nawlan nynh thua.
43003016	“Pawccecize hunghung zemah Pachia Ccapaw a zyn paw tuh aro vae khyh ccaw, thuasalama zungzae hiinnaw a hoi ccaw cite Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha myarya a sungsah pawte a hoithypaw a Ccapaw kha oun pya.
43003017	Pawccecize Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha byapia khylan a Ccapaw kha laephipi kalan yn saw khyh, thuasalama amaw liate laephi ccungccaw`ae hynh khum athua`ae ccaw cite nynh yn saw.
43003018	Amaw a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh byapia thua vae khyh, thuasalama a zyn leipaw tuh byapia phe athua vae, pawccemacize Pachia nynh a hoithypaw Ccapaw min kha a zyn khyh keiccu nynh thua.
43003019	Te byapianaw tuh hynhte nynh thua; awnaw tuh laephipi kalan yn thua zah ccungccaw`ae nynh awnaw laeze mohnaw kha a ryhua`ae, pawccemacize mih ryalaw`ae tuh aseipaw athua keiccu.
43003020	Pawccecize ahoy leipaw a cyih paw miakaw nynh awnaw kha a hua, a cyisahnaw`ae kha yn langsakuh sei cih cite awnaw kalan mah yn thua khyh.
43003021	Thuasalama byaccing kha a cyih paw ccungccaw nynh tuh a cyisahnaw`ae tuh Pachia hanlan ryalawpaw nynh thua cite langsaku khylan awnaw kalan nynh yn thua,” a cipya.
43003022	Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu te a zuitu`ae tuh Judah ram lungkhu lang oun thua`ae zah tuin kya minmin ryte um`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha baptismainsah` ae.
43003023	Te Johan mah Salim khua te anaekunaw Enon kyakhe baptisma insah`ae. Pawccemacize tuin kya tuh tui alung; te ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah baptisma in`ae.
43003024	Pawccecize Johan tuh thunginn lungkhu lang saw thua loh khyh.
43003025	Oute Johan a zuitu`ae abang te Jew`ae laku ccikankunaw kong lante byaeikunaw yn pou.
43003026	Te Johan zuitu`ae nynh Johan kalan cceih`ae zah, “Rabbi, Jordan vaw khuraw lang namaw ryte na um oh zah namaw nynh a kong ccaekia na khan paw, dotua, kha-e paw nynh baptisma insah`ae, te ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
43003027	Johan nynh khung`ae zah, “Vaawran kyate pya athua khyh lanze, ccungccaw lukheit nynh pawsang mah mue kho lan khyh.
43003028	‘Kae tuh Kri ka thua khyh,’ thuasalama, ‘Amaw malang saw paw nynh ka thua,’ cite ka hopaw kya, naemaw ccaccei hynh kamaw ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.
43003029	Akaepaw liaccanung a hoitu tuh zudy ccangvaepaw nynh thua, thuasalama zudy ccangvaepaw pe thadyn zah zudy ccangvaepaw roi a thae paw a banpaw tuh amaw roi a thae keiccuze myarya a lungtua; tuhhawte e ka lungtuanaw tuh accing.
43003030	Aning tuh a kaethung cih, thuasalama kae tuh ka nyaabung cih.
43003031	“Vaawran langte yn thua paw tuh pawpaw balyn kyaze lupihua nynh thua; laephi kya-e ccungccaw tuh laephi ccungccaw thua zah laephi uccaw kong nynh a hothya. Vaawran kyate yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh pawpaw balyn kyaze lupihua nynh thua.
43003032	Te aning nynh a muih paw te a thae paw kha ccaekiakhan zah a ccaekiakhan paw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san lehkhan khyh`ae.
43003033	A ccaekia kha lehkhan vae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh Pachia tuh ahme cite kha-e kha tazeih phe a khia`ae.
43003034	Pawccecize Pachia nynh yn saw paw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia kya-e bya`ae kha nynh a ho; pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha tou kho um lei lan Muisaw kha a pya.
43003035	Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha sungsah zah pawpaw balyn kha a kuih lungkhu lang marya a ah vae.
43003036	Ccapaw kha a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw kha a hoi, te Ccapaw kha a zyn leipaw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha muih lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia thinrianaw kha a tungvaw atyn,” a ci.
43004001	Tukeiccu Johan laeze ccungccaw alunghua kha Jesu nynh zuitu lang tangsah`ae zah baptisma insah`ae cipaw kha Farasi`ae nynh phe thae vae`ae cite Bawipaw nynh he a nyh tuh,
43004002	(Jesu amaw ccaccei nynh baptisma-insah khyh`ae, thuasalama a zuitu`ae nynh baptisma insah`ae),
43004003	Judah pee kha cciataw zah Galilee ram lungkhu lang Jesu tuh bua a pou.
43004004	Te Jesu tuh Samaria ram kha po a cciabia aho.
43004005	Oute Jakob nynh a ccapaw Josef a pya paw laekua pe, Samaria ram kya-e Sikha cikuh paw khua kyakhe a thua.
43004006	Tuin kya Jakob tuisung a um. Jesu tuh a khuaccungnaw kyate phe a bang keiccuze tuisung pe tuin a dahung. Accyh tuh suimilan ccangtaruhnaw loukaw athua vae.
43004007	Tuh-e kalan Samaria nopinung lukheit tui the lan yn thua zah Jesu nynh, “Nia lanpaw tui yn pyabua,” a cipya.
43004008	Pawccecize a zuitu`ae tuh aepaw re khylan khua lungkhu lang phe a la cceih`ae.
43004009	Oute Samaria nopinung nynh, “Pawtemou nang Jewpaw na thua paw nynh kae Samaria nopinung ka thua paw kya-e nia lanpaw nae ngiakupaw tuh?” a ci. Pawccecize Jew`ae tuh Samaria`ae ryte ccuepekunaw hoi khyh`ae.
43004010	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang nynh Pachia lasung hynh na la ny lanze thuasah, te, ‘Nia lanpaw tui yn pyabua,’ cite nang ae hopatupaw hynh na ny lanze thuasah, amaw kya-e hynh nang nynh phe na ngiakuh paleih cih zah aning nynh hiinnaw tui kha ae pya cih paw lahyn,” a cipya.
43004011	Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, tui thenaw lanpaw pawsang na hoi khyh, te tuisung tuh akhu; paw kyate mou nang nynh tuh-e hiinnaw tui kha na hoi?
43004012	Nang tuh hynh-e tuisung kaening oun pyatupaw, a ccaaw`ae te a saring`ae mah hynh-e kya-e a nia`ae hawte amaw mah a neihbua paw kaening minpaaw Jakob laeze na lesaehua tou?” a cipya.
43004013	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Hunghung zemah hynh-e tui a neih paw tuh tui bua a haw cih.
43004014	Thuasalama kae nynh ka pya cih paw tui a neih paw ccungccaw tuh a tuihaw boi vae lan khyh; thuasalama kae nynh ka pya cih paw tui tuh kha-e paw kya zungzae hiinnaw hanlan aphyhthung paw tuidy athua cih,” a cipya.
43004015	Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, ka tuihaw vae khyh ccaw, tui the lan hynhlang mah ka ccia vae khyh ccaw tuh-e tui tuh yn pyabua,” a cipya.
43004016	Jesu nynh, “La cceih, na vawpaw kha yn ko lah hynhlang yn thuakhae,” a cipya.
43004017	Nopinung nynh khung zah, “Vawpaw ka hoi khyh,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “ ‘Vawpaw ka hoi khyh,’ na cipaw tuh akyhpaw nynh na ho.
43004018	Pawccecize nang tuh vawpaw lu pangaw na hoi vae, te atu na hoi paw hynh na vawpaw thua khyh, hynh-e kya nang tuh hmerarihlan nynh na ho,” a cipya.
43004019	Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, nang tuh profeh lukheit nynh na thua cipaw ka tuasethya.
43004020	Kaening kae minpaaw`ae tuh hynh-e mua kya nynh a la beik`ae; te nanning Jew`ae nynh tuh ccungccaw nynh beik lan accannaw hmin tuh Jerusalem kya nynh thua na ci oh,” a ci.
43004021	Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, kamaw hynh yn zyn, nanning nynh hynh-e mua kya mah thua vae leite, Jerusalem kya mah thua vae leite Paaw kha nae beik vae cih oh paw accyh tuh yn thua cciamang.
43004022	Nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw kha na beik oh, kaening tuh kae ny paw kha kae beik, pawccecize khumnaw tuh Jew`ae kyate nynh yn thua.
43004023	Thuasalama ahmepaw a beiktu`ae paw nynh Paaw kha muisaw te thuasah, byaccing te thuasah oun beik cih`ae paw ccyh tuh yn thua cih. Tuh-e ccyh tuh atu yn thua cciamang. Pawccecize Paaw nynh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha amaw beiktu`ae lang a ccung.
43004024	Pachia tuh Muisaw nynh thua; te amaw a beik paw ccungccaw`ae nynh muisaw te thuasah, byaccing te thuasah a beik`ae aho hahe,” a ci.
43004025	Nopinung nynh, “Messiah (Kri cikuh paw) yn thua vae cih cipaw ka ny; he yn thua te kaening kha pawpaw balyn pung oun hopah vae cih,” a cipya.
43004026	Jesu nynh, “Na kalan bya a hopaw kae hynh Messiah nynh ka thua,” a cipya.
43004027	Tuh ccyh lya a zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah nopinung ryte byahoku`ae paw kha mih ngaeangthua. Tuhzemah hung nynh sanmah, “Pawmou na peki?” Tukhyhze, “Pawccemou kha-e nung ryte bya na hoku oh?” cite khia khyh`ae.
43004028	Oute nopinung nynh a dawre kha phe cciataw zah khua lungkhu langkhe cceih zah ccungccaw`ae kha,
43004029	“Ka cyi boi paw balyn marya yn hopah paw Ccungccapaw hynh rang oh lah oun dotua oh, tuh-e paw tuh Kri thua lan khyh tou?” a cipya`ae.
43004030	Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh khua lungkhu te pou`ae zah amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
43004031	Tuh ccyh lyatuin zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Rabbi, ae hin,” cite a soihbia`ae.
43004032	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw ae lanpaw looh ka hoi,” a cipya`ae.
43004033	Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ae lanpaw phe a ccyngpya vae vosi?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
43004034	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka looh tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw rynaw cyipya lanpaw te a ryalaw thangsah lanpaw hynh nynh thua.
43004035	‘Sawpaw sapali a um ung, tuhkoute loohrue ccyh yn thua vae cih,’ na ci khyh oh tou? Dotua oh, nanning kae hopya oh, dothung oh lah loo`ae khu dotua oh, pawccecize kha-e`ae tuh loohrue lan phe azaw vae.
43004036	Te loohruepaw ccungccaw tuh ryalaw mee kha mue zah zungzae hiinnaw a thuasah paw athae apaw kha a ccakhung; ou tuhte, ccaciivua paw ccungccaw te loohruepaw ccungccaw pynkheihlan paryh mih lungtua ccaw.
43004037	Ou tuhte, ‘Lukheitpaw nynh ccaciivua zah mingccangpaw nynh loohrue,’ cite a hokuh paw bya tuh e kyahin akyh.
43004038	Naemaw nynh rya na law leinaw oh kya looh na rue ccaw oh cite nanning kha kae saw oh; ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh ryalah`ae zah nanning tuh minmin mih ryalawnaw lungkhu lang na tee oh,” a cipya`ae.
43004039	Te, “Kae nynh ka cyi boi paw balyn pung yn hopya,” cite ccaekiakhan paw nopinung bya liate kha-e khua kya-e Samaria`ae patae nynh Jesu kha a zyn`ae.
43004040	Tukeiccu Samaria`ae nynh amaw kalan he thua`ae tuh mimaw ryte a umhin ccaw cite amaw kha a ngia`ae; te Jesu tuh tuin kya nin ning a um.
43004041	Te ccungccaw houh alunghua nynh amaw bya keiccuze a zyn`ae.
43004042	Nopinung kha, “Atu kaening kae zyn paw tuh nang nynh na hopaw keiccu thua vae khyh; pawccecize kaemaw ccaccei nynh a hopaw hynh phe kae thae vae zah e paw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae Khumtu athua paw, Kri ccaccing nynh thua cipaw kae ny,” a cipya`ae.
43004043	Te nin ning acih koute Jesu tuh tuin kyate pou zah Galilee pee lang a cceih.
43004044	Pawccecize, profeh lukheit tuh amaw umnaw ram kya sawtuanaw mue khyh cite Jesu amaw ccaccei nynh ccaekiakhan vae.
43004045	Oute Jesu tuh Galilee lang he a thua tuh Galilee ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha lehkhan`ae, pawccecize minmin mah poi kalan cceihbua`ae zah Jerusalem khua poi kya Jesu nynh a cyi paw balyn kha phe a muih bua`ae.
43004046	Tukeiccu Jesu tuh tui kha misutui lang a raenaw hmin Galilee pee Kana khua lang bua a thua. Te Kapernaum khua kya a ccapaw accihpaw bawi lukheit a um.
43004047	Tuh-e paw nynh Judah pee kyate Galilee pee lungkhu lang Jesu yn thua cipaw he a thae tuh, a kalan cceih zah a ccapaw kha dansah khylan cciabung lan thawte a ngia, pawccecize a ccapaw tuh a chih vae cih.
43004048	Oute Jesu nynh, “Muihsanaw`ae te ngaeangnaw`ae hynh nanning nynh na muih khyh oh lanze kharyh na zyn lan khyh oh,” a ci.
43004049	Tuh-e bawi nynh amaw kha, “Bawihaepaw, ka ccaaw a chi maw beih yn cceihbung,” a cipya.
43004050	Jesu nynh, “La cceih ccavae, na ccapaw mang a hiin,” a cipya. Te tuh-e paw nynh Jesu nynh a kalan a hopaw bya kha zyn zah phe a cceih.
43004051	Te aning tuh a cciabung cciamang lyakhe, a see`ae nynh oun cciadue`ae zah, “Na ccapaw mang a hiin,” cite a hopya`ae.
43004052	Oute aning nynh minmin kha a ccapaw ahoyhua ccyh kha a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Inkhawnin suimilan ccangsarinaw ccyh kya a ngelingpaw phe ahoy vae,” a cipya`ae.
43004053	Tukeiccu a paaw nynh, ou tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya nynh, Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Na ccapaw mang a hiin,” a cipya ccyh athua cipaw a ny; te amaw ccaccei te a innbyn khaleih nynh a zyn`ae.
43004054	Hynh-e tuh Jesu nynh Judah pee kyate Galilee pee lungkhu lang he yn thua te bua a rae paw vaeningnaw muihsanaw nynh thua.
43005001	Hynh-e koute Jew`ae poi ccangkheit a um, te Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
43005002	Jerusalem kya Tuu koikua pe Hebru bya te Bethesda acikuh paw kuaa ccangkheit a um, tuh-e kuaa kyatuin saeleih dawkuhpaw ccangpangaw a um.
43005003	Tuh-e saeleihdawkuhpaw`ae kya a mitmohpaw, ccukhoupaw, te a ngesawroupaw, te ccinaw hoi paw ccungccaw pataepi nynh tui yn theku lanpaw kha ngawte a huekuh`ae.
43005004	Pawccecize, vaaw ccungccapaw nynh ccyhkhakheit kya kuaa lungkhu langkhe rungbung zah tui kha a piasah; ou tuhte tui he a pia koute masaty a phungkuh paw ccungccaw tuh pawpaw tahawpaw ccinaw a hoi zemah phe a dan.
43005005	Te sungthung kum tarya cia a ccih paw ccungccapaw lukheit tuin kya a la um.
43005006	Kha-e paw phang a huekupaw kha Jesu nynh he muih zah khaw cia a um vae hynhsan cipaw he a nyh tuh, “Na dan ry tou?” cite a khia.
43005007	Ngeccih paw nynh, “Bawihaepaw, tui kha piasah he athua vae ze kuaa lungkhu lang kae yn phungbua lanpaw hung ccungccaw san ka hoi khyh, thuasalama he ka ccia lya mingccangpaw nynh ka malang phe a phungku,” cite a khung.
43005008	Jesu nynh, “Thokuh, na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
43005009	Te vaekheihmawte tuh-e paw tuh dansah athua vae, te a iphae kha lawkuh zah a cceih vae. Tuh-e nin tuh Sabbath nin nynh thua.
43005010	Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh dansah athua paw ccungccapaw kha, “Sabbath nin nynh thua, na iphae puihku lan ccan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43005011	Thuasalama aning nynh, “Kamaw yn dansah paw ccungccapaw nynh, ‘Na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,’ yn cipya,” cite a khung`ae.
43005012	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “ ‘Na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,’ ae cipah paw tuh hungmou?” cite a khia`ae.
43005013	Thuasalama dansah athua paw ccungccapaw nynh hung nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh; pawccecize tuin kya ccungccaw zapi a um`ae lyakhe Jesu tuh zya a pou vae.
43005014	Tuhkoute Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha tempal voidu kya muih zah amaw kha, “Dotua, nang tuh phe na dan vae; houh athah huapaw uccaw na tungvaw a thua khyh nawlan la sei nan vae,” a cipya.
43005015	Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh pou zah amaw kha a dansah paw tuh Jesu nynh thua cite Jew`ae kha a hopya`ae.
43005016	Te kha-e uccaw`ae kha Sabbath nin kya phe a cyi keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh Jesu kha a tua-a sah`ae, te chia lan a nouku`ae.
43005017	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka Paaw tuh atu cia ryalah, te kae mah rya ka lah,” cite a khung`ae.
43005018	Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan cite houh a nounuaku`ae, pawkeiccumacize, “Sabbath nin a ro kyalya thua leite Pachia kha mah a Paaw cikuh zah tuhte amaw te amaw kha Pachia ryte a nginsaku,” a ci`ae.
43005019	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing, nanning kae hopya oh, Ccapaw nynh amaw te amaw pawsang mah cyih kho khyh, thuasalama Paaw nynh a cyi paw a muih paw rou nynh a cyi kho; pawccecize Paaw nynh a cyi paw miakaw kha Ccapaw nynh mah khahawte a cyibua.
43005020	Pawccecize Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha sungsah zah amaw ccaccei nynh a cyipaw balyn kha Ccapaw marya a muihsah, te nanning nae ngaeangthua nawlan hynh-e`ae laeze ale huapaw ryalaw`ae kha Ccapaw kha a muihsah ung cih.
43005021	Pawccecize Paaw nynh a chih`ae paw kha thosah zah a hiinsah`ae hawte, ou tuhhawte Ccapaw nynh mah a ry paw ccungccaw`ae kha a hiinsah`ae.
43005022	Pawccecize Paaw nynh hung ccungccaw sanmah byapia khyh, thuasalama byapianaw miakaw kha Ccapaw kalan khaleih a ah.
43005023	Ou tuhcihte ccungccaw balyn nynh Paaw kha sawtua`ae hawte Ccapaw mah sawtua ccaw`ae cite. Ccapaw sawtua leipaw ccungccaw tuh Ccapaw a sawtupaw Paaw kha sawtua leipaw nynh thua.
43005024	“Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, ka bya thae zah kamaw yn sawtupaw a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi, te byapia thua vae lan khyh; thuasalama chinaw kyate hiinnaw kalan phe a khung vae.
43005025	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, achihpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Pachia Ccapaw roi oun thae cih`ae zah roi a thae`ae paw nynh oun hiin cih`ae ccyh, tuh-e ccyh tuh atu hynh yn thua cciamang.
43005026	Pawccecize Paaw nynh amaw te amaw kya hiinnaw a hoi hawte, Ccapaw nynh amaw te amaw kya hiinnaw a hoi nawlan kaw a pya.
43005027	Te aning tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw thua keiccuze byapianaw tungvaw kawhoinaw kha mah amaw kha a pya.
43005028	“E uccaw kya nae ngaeangthua nan sah; pawccecize shaw`ae kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh amaw roi kha oun thae cih`ae zah,
43005029	oun pou cih`ae paw accyh tuh yn thua cih; ahoypaw a cyih`ae paw tuh hiinnaw thothuinaw kalan, te ahoy leipaw a cyih`ae paw tuh seibyapianaw thothuinaw kalan a pou cih`ae.
43005030	Kae tuh kamaw te kamaw liate pawsang ka cyih kho khyh, kae tuh ka thae thyhte nynh bya ka pia; te ka byapianaw tuh ahme, pawccemacize kae tuh kamaw rynaw kha ka ccung khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw rynaw nynh ka ccung.
43005031	“Kae nynh kamaw konglang kha ccaekia ka khan lanze ka ccaekia tuh kyh khyh.
43005032	Kamaw konglang ccaekiakhantu mingccangpaw a um, te aning nynh kae ka konglang ccaekiakhan paw ccaekia tuh akyh cipaw ka ny.
43005033	“Nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae kha Johan kalan na saw oh, te aning nynh byaccing hanlan ccaekia a khan.
43005034	Thuasalama kae tuh ccungccaw kyate ccaekia ka mue khyh, thuasalama nanning tuh khum na thua ccaw oh cite nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh ka ho.
43005035	Johan tuh aruapaw te a awpaw maeekhua nynh thua: te nanning tuh amaw awnaw kyakhe sosoh hoysah lan na ry oh.
43005036	“Thuasalama kae tuh Johan kya-e laeze ale huapaw ccaekia ka hoi; pawccecize Paaw nynh phe thangsah lan kamaw yn pya paw ryalaw`ae kha kae nynh ka law, kha-e ka ryalaw`ae nynh kae tuh Paaw nynh a saw paw cipaw ccaekia a khan.
43005037	Te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh mah kamaw konglang ccaekia a khan. Nanning nynh amaw roi kha vaekheit san na thae boi khyh oh, amaw muinsan mah na muih boi khyh oh.
43005038	Te amaw bya nanning kya tyn khyh; pawccecize aning nynh a saw paw kha na zyn khyh oh.
43005039	“Nanning nynh Ccathyaa kha thawte na ccung oh, pawccecize kha-e`ae kya nynh zungzae hiinnaw kae hoi cite na tuaku oh, te Ccathyaa`ae tuh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan paw nynh thua.
43005040	Te hiinnaw hoi khylan nanning nynh kamaw kalan nae thua ry khyh oh.
43005041	“Kae tuh ccungccaw`ae kyate phu-enaw ka ccou khyh.
43005042	Thuasalama nanning kya Pachia sungsanaw na hoi khyh oh cipaw ka ny.
43005043	Kae tuh ka Paaw min liate kae thua zah nanning nynh leh nae khan khyh oh, mingccangpaw nynh amaw min liate yn thua lanze, kha-e paw kha leh nae khan cih oh.
43005044	Lukheit te lukheit kyate thehoynaw kha na ccou oh zah Pachia kyalya kyate yn thua paw thehoynaw na peki lei oh paw nanning nynh pawtemou na zyn kho cih oh?
43005045	“Paaw malang kae nynh nanning kha sei kae be cih oh cite tuakuh nan oh, nanning kha sei ae be oh paw lukheit a um, tuh-e paw tuh nanning nynh na ngaehoiku oh paw Mawsi kha nynh thua.
43005046	Pawccecize, Mawsi kha na zyn oh lanze, kae hynh phe nae zyn cih oh paw, pawccecize aning tuh kamaw konglang nynh a zei.
43005047	Thuasalama aning nynh a zei paw kha nanning nynh na zyn khyh oh ze, pawtemou ka bya`ae hynh na zyn rou cih oh?” a ci.
43006001	Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh Tiberias Rili cikuh paw Galilee Rili khuhlangraw a zua.
43006002	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh ngeccih`ae tungvaw Jesu nynh a cyi paw muihsanaw kha a muih`ae keiccu.
43006003	Te Jesu tuh mua vawlan khe kae zah tuin kya a zuitu`ae ryte a dahung`ae.
43006004	Te Jew`ae poi athua paw, Kawtaw Poi tuh anae vae.
43006005	Oute Jesu nynh ngawdo zah ccungccaw zapi a kalan oun thua`ae paw kha he a muih tuh Filip kha, “Hynh-e`ae nynh a ae ccaw`ae teilangmou sanlou ah re cih oh?” a cipya.
43006006	Te hynh-e a hopaw tuh Filip kha syntaw khylan nynh a ho, pawccecize paw nynh ka cyi vae cih cipaw amaw ccaccei nynh phe a ny paw nynh thua.
43006007	Filip nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Hynh-e`ae milu raveih nynh ccapyh cci a mue nawlan`ae denari phuapia zaning mee sanlou tuh minmin hanlan zaw lan khyh,” a ci.
43006008	Amaw zuitu lukheit athua paw, Simon Piter a neitapaw Andru nynh,
43006009	“Barli sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw taraw zawning a hoi paw imohpaw e kya mang a um; thuasalama hynhzeih ccungccaw laku kya e`ae nynh pawlangmou tang cih?” a cipya.
43006010	Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae kha dahungsah oh,” a ci. Tuin kya lonua patae asae, tukeiccu milu lante thungpangaw loukaw acih paw ccungccaw`ae tuh a dahung`ae.
43006011	Te Jesu nynh sanlou`ae kha laah zah lungtuabya he ho koute a zuitu`ae kalan ne`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh a dahung`ae paw kha a nee`ae. Te tuhhawte ngasaw`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh a ry`ae zeih a nee`ae.
43006012	Ccungccaw`ae phe a byn`ae te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Pawsang avae khyh ccaw, alaepaw a eihpaw kha ccakhung oh,” a cipya`ae.
43006013	Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae nynh a ae`ae paw kyate alaepaw kha ccakhung`ae zah barli sanlou phe pangaw kya-e a eihpaw, alaepaw tuh adihpaw kee haw laening phe abeih.
43006014	Ou tuhte Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw kha kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh, “E paw tuh laephipi kalan yn thua cih paw Profeh ccaccing nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
43006015	Ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua vae cih`ae zah amaw kha siapharan lang tang lan oun nangde cih`ae cipaw Jesu nynh phe a ny keiccuze, Jesu tuh a makhaete mua muakheit kalan bua a cceih.
43006016	Te zete he thua tuh a zuitu`ae tuh rili kalan a cceihbung`ae.
43006017	Te kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Kapernaum khua lang rili kha a zua`ae. Te phe moh vae zah Jesu tuh minmin kalan thua loh khyh.
43006018	Te myarya arupaw khisang azaw keiccuze, tuileih a tho.
43006019	Tukeiccu minmin nynh me thung, me pali loukaw cia he a zaw`ae te, Jesu nynh rili vawlan yn cceih zah kohlung kalan yn naekupaw kha a muih`ae, te minmin tuh a rih vae`ae.
43006020	Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kamaw nynh ka thua, rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
43006021	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha lungtuate kohlung lungkhu lang a teesah`ae, te kohlung tuh minmin a ccianaw`ae lang varan lang sosoh mawte phe thua kanmaw.
43006022	Tuh-e nin koute rili hawkheit lang raw kya a thadyn paw ccungccaw`ae nynh a zuitu`ae nynh a teenaw`ae paw kohlung ccangkheit laelan ccangpaw kohlung um vae khyh cipaw, te Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte kohlung lungkhu lang teebua khyh, thuasalama a zuitu`ae makhae nynh a cceih`ae cipaw kha he a muih`ae tuh,
43006023	tuhzemah Bawipaw nynh lungtuabya ho koute sanlou a la ae naw`ae te anaekunaw hmin kalan Tiberias khua kyate ccangpaw adihpaw kohlung`ae oun thua`ae.
43006024	Ccungccaw`ae nynh Jesu tuh tuin kya um khyh cipaw, te a zuitu`ae mah um khyh`ae cipaw kha he a muih`ae keiccuze minmin mah kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Jesu kha ccung khylan Kapernaum khua lang oun thua`ae.
43006025	Te minmin nynh Jesu kha rili hawkheit langraw kya he muih`ae tuh, “Rabbi, e kya hotuhmou na thua?” cite a khia`ae.
43006026	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, muihsanaw`ae na muih oh keiccuze nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung khyh oh, thuasalama nanning nynh sanlou`ae na ae oh zah nae vueso keiccu nynh nae ccung oh.
43006027	Arohthyapaw aepaw hanlan ryalah nan oh, thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh nanning ae pya cih oh paw zungzae hiinnaw kalan cia atynpaw aepaw hanlan ryalah oh; pawccecize amaw kha Paaw Pachia nynh tazeih phe khia vae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
43006028	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pachia nynh a ry paw ryalaw kae law nawlan, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
43006029	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pachia nynh yn saw paw amaw kha na zyn oh paw, kha-e kha nynh Pachia nynh a ry paw ryalaw tuh athua,” cite a khung`ae.
43006030	Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Kaening nynh kae muih zah nang kae zyn nawlan paw muihsanaw mou nae langsapyaku? Paw rya mou na law?
43006031	‘Pachia nynh minmin ae lanpaw sanlou kha vaawran kyate a pya`ae,’ cite azeiku hawte, kaening kae minpaaw`ae nynh manna kha rangkaw kya a ae`ae,” a ci`ae.
43006032	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Mawsi nynh kha-e sanlou kha vaawran kyate nanning ae pya khyh oh, thuasalama ka Paaw nynh vaawran kyate accaccingpaw sanlou kha nanning ae pya oh.
43006033	Pawccecize Pachia kya-e sanlou tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung zah laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan hiinnaw a pyatupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
43006034	Oute minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, tuh-e sanlou tuh pei oun pya,” a ci`ae.
43006035	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh hiinnaw sanlou nynh ka thua. Kamaw kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh a vuelaw boi vae lan khyh, te kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh a tuihaw boi vae lan khyh.
43006036	Thuasalama nanning nynh kamaw hynh phang nae muih oh zemah nae zyn khyh oh cite kae hopya vae oh.
43006037	Paaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kamaw kalan oun thua cih`ae; te kamaw kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh kharyh ka dee boi lan khyh.
43006038	Pawccecize kae tuh kamaw rynaw kha cyi khylan vaawran kyate kae rungbung khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw rynaw cyi khylan nynh kae rungbung.
43006039	Te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw a rynaw tuh, kamaw yn pya paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha lukheit san ka zosah khyh nawlan, thuasalama nyathyakou nin kya minmin kha bua thosathui khylan nynh thua.
43006040	Te kamaw yn sawtupaw a rynaw tuh, Ccapaw kha muih zah amaw kha a zyn paw miakaw nynh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi ccaw`ae cipaw nynh thua; te nyathyakou nin kya kha-e paw kha kae nynh ka thosah cih,” a ci.
43006041	Oute, “Kae tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh ka thua,” cite a ho keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh amaw kong kha byalung`ae.
43006042	Te minmin nynh, “E paw tuh Josef ccapaw Jesu thua khyh tou? A paaw te a nung tuh ah ny oh paw khaw? Pawtemou, ‘Kae tuh vaawran kyate kae rungbung paw,’ a ciku?” a ci`ae.
43006043	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Naemaw te naemaw laku ccohkuh nan oh.
43006044	Kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw nynh a soih khyh lanze hung ccungccaw sanmah kamaw kalan thua kho lan khyh, te yn thua paw ccungccaw kha nyathyakou nin kya ka thosah cih.
43006045	‘Te minmin balyn tuh Pachia nynh a ccangpya`ae paw thua cih`ae,’ cite Profeh`ae ccauh kya azeikuh. Tukeiccu Paaw kya-e thae zah a ccangkuh paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh kamaw kalan oun thua`ae.
43006046	Pachia kyate yn thua paw aning nynh Paaw kha a muih, aning laelan hung ccungccaw nynh san Paaw kha muih khyh.
43006047	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi.
43006048	Kae tuh hiinnaw sanlou nynh ka thua.
43006049	Nae minpaaw`ae nynh rangkaw kya manna kha a ae`ae, thuasalama phe chih`ae.
43006050	E tuh ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ae sah lah a chi vae khyh ccaw cite vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh thua.
43006051	Kae tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw ahiinpaw sanlou nynh ka thua, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh hynh-e sanlou hynh a ae lanze zungzae a hiin vae cih; te kae nynh ka pya lanpaw sanlou tuh ka ngesaw nynh thua; tuh-e tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae hiinnaw hanlan nynh thua,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
43006052	Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh, “Pawtemou e ccungccapaw nynh amaw ngesaw kha aening ae lan yn pya kho cih?” cite mimaw te mimaw laku thawte a eikuh`ae.
43006053	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw a ngesaw kha na ae khyh oh zah a chii kha na nia khyh oh lanze nanning kya hiinnaw na hoi khyh oh.
43006054	Hunghung zemah ka ngesaw kha ae zah ka chii a neih paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi, te kha-e paw kha nyathyakou nin kya ka thosah cih.
43006055	Pawccecize ka ngesaw tuh aepaw ccaccing thua zah ka chii tuh niapaw ccaccing nynh thua.
43006056	Ka ngesaw kha ae zah ka chii a neih paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kya um zah kae mah a kya ka um.
43006057	Ahiinpaw Paaw nynh kamaw hynh yn saw zah Paaw liate kae ka hiin hawte, kamaw yn ae paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw liate a hiin cih.
43006058	E tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh thua, nae minpaaw`ae nynh manna a ae`ae pite a chi`ae hawte thua leite, hynh-e sanlou a ae paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae a hiin vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
43006059	E uccaw`ae kong hynh Jesu nynh Kapernaum khua kya a ccangpya`ae lya sinakok kya nynh a ho.
43006060	Tukeiccu a zuitu`ae patae nynh e kong he a thae`ae tuh, “E bya tuh arupaw byaho nynh thua, hung nynh mou a thaethya kho cih?” a ci`ae.
43006061	A zuitu`ae nynh tuh-e kong a ccohku`ae paw kha Jesu nynh a lung te he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Hynh-e bya nynh nanning nae lung ae thangsah oh tou?
43006062	Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh langmaw a umnaw kalan a kaethung paw kha na muih oh lanze pawte thua ngaw?
43006063	Hiinnaw a pyatu tuh Muisaw nynh thua, pynsaw tuh pawsang ccungkia khyh; nanning kalan ka ho paw bya`ae hynh muisaw thua zah hiinnaw mah athua.
43006064	Thuasalama nanning laku a zyn leipaw abang a um,” a cipya`ae. Pawccecize Jesu nynh atakaw lya mawte a zyn lei`ae paw tuh hung`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw te hung nynh amaw kha yn phee cih cipaw kha phe a ny vae.
