43006065	Te Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu ka Paaw nynh kawpya khyh lanze hung ccungccaw sanmah kamaw kalan yn thua kho lan khyh cite nanning kalan phe kae hopya vae oh,” a ci.
43006066	Tuh-e ccyh kyate a zuitu`ae patae tuh nuhlang ki`ae zah amaw ryte cceihkheih vae khyh`ae.
43006067	Oute Jesu nynh zuitu luhaw laening kha, “Nanning so na cceihbua ry oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
43006068	Oute Simon Piter nynh khung zah, “Bawipaw, hung kalan mou kae cceih cih? Nang nynh zungzae hiinnaw bya`ae na hoi.
43006069	Te kaening nynh nang tuh Kri, a hiinpaw Pachia Ccapaw nynh na thua cipaw kae zyn zah kae ny,” a ci.
43006070	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nanning luhaw laening hynh kamaw nynh kae po khyh oh tou? Tuhzemah nanning lakuze lukheit tuh diabolos nynh thua,” a ci.
43006071	A honuapaw tuh Simon ccapaw, Judas Iskaria nynh thua; pawccecize aning tuh luhaw laening kyaze lukheit mang athua pite amaw kha a phee vae cih paw nynh thua.
43007001	Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh Galilee pee kya khua a ccung; pawccecize Jew`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan cite a ccung`ae keiccu Judah pee kya khuaccung ry khyh.
43007002	Atu Jew`ae Bu Poi tuh anae vae.
43007003	Tukeiccu a neitapaw`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Na zuitu`ae nynh mah na cyi paw ryalaw`ae kha a muih bua ccaw`ae, e kyate toikuh lah Judah pee lungkhu lang cceih ccavae.
43007004	Pawccecize amaw te amaw kha oun nyh`ae sah cite a ccungkuh paw ccungccaw nynh tuh pawsang mah aphirute cyih boi khyh. Nang nynh e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi lan thua ze, laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan namaw te namaw kha langku tua,” a cipya`ae.
43007005	Pawccecize amaw a neitapaw`ae nynh heize amaw kha zyn khyh`ae.
43007006	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka ccyh thua loh khyh, thuasalama nanning ccyh tuh pei paccynku athua.
43007007	Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning ae hua kho khyh oh, thuasalama kamaw tuh oun hua`ae, pawkeiccumacize mih ryalawnaw`ae tuh aseipaw nynh thua cite kae nynh ccaekia ka khan keiccu.
43007008	Tuh-e poi kalan nanning la cceih oh, kae tuh tuh-e poi kalan ka cceih loh lan khyh, pawccecize ka ccyh phe ccing lan thua loh khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43007009	Hynh-e bya`ae hynh minmin kalan a ho koute Jesu tuh Galilee pee kya a um ung.
43007010	Thuasalama a neitapaw`ae nynh he cceihthung`ae tuh Jesu mah poi kalan a cceihthung bua, thuasalama alangkuh lei lante aphiru lante nynh a ccia.
43007011	Oute Jew`ae nynh poi kya amaw kha ccung`ae zah, “Jesu tuh teisangmou a um?” a ci`ae.
43007012	Te amaw te asekuh lante ccungccaw zapi laku kya byalungnaw patae a um; pawccecize ccungccaw abang nynh, “Aning tuh ccungccahoypaw nynh thua,” a ci`ae. Mingccang`ae nynh, “Ccungccahoypaw thua khyh, thuasalama aning nynh ccungccaw`ae kha a hyngpya`ae,” a ci`ae.
43007013	Tuhzemah Jew`ae rawri`ae keiccuze hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah amaw kong kha alangkuh lante ho khyh`ae.
43007014	Atu tuh-e poi akhankuh loukaw he acihte Jesu nynh tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah a ccangpya`ae.
43007015	Te Jew`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E ccungccapaw hynh a ccangkuh lei pite pawtepei ccaw a thya?” a ci`ae.
43007016	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ka ccangpyanaw tuh kamaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw kya-e nynh thua.
43007017	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh Pachia rynaw kha a cyi ry lanze, ka ccangpyanaw kong kha a nyh cih, kha-e tuh Pachia kya-e tou? Tukhyhze kamaw kya-e tou ka ho cipaw a nyh cih.
43007018	Amaw te amaw kya-e a ho paw ccungccaw tuh amaw phu-enaw nynh a ccungku; thuasalama a sawtupaw phuenaw a ccung paw ccungccaw tuh ahmepaw thua zah dingleinaw amaw kya um khyh.
43007019	Mawsi nynh nanning kha Kawbya ae pya khyh oh tou? Tuhzemah nanning lakuze hung nynh san Kawbya kha na zui khyh oh rei? Pawccemou kamaw hynh chia lan nanning nynh nae ccung oh?” a ci.
43007020	Ccungccaw`ae nynh khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw hynh sang na thua, nang chia khylan hungmou ae ccung?” a ci`ae.
43007021	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh ryalaw ccangkheit ka laah zah nanning balyn nae ngaeangthua.
43007022	Mawsi nynh nanning kha vindung awkunaw ae pya oh; kha-e tuh Mawsi kyate yn tho paw thua khyh, thuasalama minpaaw`ae kyate nynh a tho; te nanning nynh Sabbath nin kya ccungccapaw kha vindung na aw oh.
43007023	Mawsi Kawbya tuh ro athua khyh nawlan, ccungccapaw lukheit tuh Sabbath nin kya vindung a awkuh lanze, kae nynh Sabbath nin kya ccungccaw lukheit ka dansah keiccu tou nanning nynh ka tungvaw nae thinria?
43007024	Muihnaw te byapia nan oh, thuasalama adingpaw byapianaw te byapia oh,” a cipya`ae.
43007025	Oute Jerusalem khua e ccungccaw abang nynh, “E paw tuh minmin nynh chia lan cite a ccung`ae paw kha thua khyh tou?
43007026	Te dotua oh, aning tuh rawhoyte byaho, thuasalama minmin nynh paw bya san khung khyh`ae. Uktu`ae nynh, e paw tuh Kri ccaccing nynh thua cipaw hynh nyh ccaccing`ae vema?
43007027	Tuhzemah kaening nynh e paw tuh paw kyate yn thua paw cipaw kae ny; thuasalama Kri tuh he yn thua vae ze, paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw hung ccungccaw nynh san nyh lan khyh,” a ci`ae.
43007028	Oute Jesu nynh tempal kya a ccangpya`ae lyakhe thawte sia zah, “Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ny oh, te paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw mah nae ny oh; kae tuh kamaw ka rynaw te kae thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh ahmepaw nynh thua, amaw kha nanning nynh na nyh khyh oh.
43007029	Thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka ny; pawccecize kae tuh amaw kyate nynh kae thua, te aning nynh kamaw hynh yn saw,” a ci.
43007030	Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha kyng lan a ccung vae`ae; thuasalama hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize amaw ccyh zaw loh khyh.
43007031	Te ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha zyn`ae zah, “Kri he yn thua vae ze, hynh-e ccungccapaw nynh a rae paw hynh-e muihsanaw`ae lae muihsanaw alunghua yn rae cih vema?” a ci`ae.
43007032	Amaw konglang ccungccaw`ae nynh tuhte pei ccohku`ae paw kha Farasi`ae nynh a thae`ae; te Farasi`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh amaw kha kyng khylan tempal ngawtu`ae kha a saw`ae.
43007033	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh nanning ryte sosohtari nynh ka um, oute kamaw yn sawtupaw kalan ka cceih cih.
43007034	Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung cih oh zah nae muih lan khyh oh, te ka umnaw kalan nae thua kho lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
43007035	Oute Jew`ae nynh mimaw te mimaw laku, “Aening nynh ah muih khyh nawlan oh aning tuh teilangmou a cceih vae cih? Greek`ae laku um`ae paw a phiakuh`ae paw Jew`ae kalan aning nynh cceih ngaw zah Greek`ae kha ccangpah ngaw`ae tou?
43007036	‘Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung cih oh zah nae muih lan khyh oh; te ka umnaw kalan nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ cite aning nynh a hopaw hynh paw a horynaw mou athua?” cite a hoku`ae.
43007037	Tuh-e poi, alesaepaw nin, nyathyakou nin kya, Jesu nynh thadyn zah, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh a tuihaw lanze kamaw kalan rang sah lah neih sah.
43007038	Kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh, Ccathyaa nynh a ho hawte, a lungkhu langte ahiinpaw tuidy alua cih,”cite thawte a sia.
43007039	Thuasalama hynh-e a hopaw tuh amaw zyn`ae paw nynh a mue vae cih`ae paw Muisaw kha nynh a honuathe; pawccecize Thyaa Muisaw kha pya thua loh khyh, pawkeiccumacize Jesu tuh phuesah thua loh khyh.
43007040	Tukeiccu ccungccaw patae nynh hynh-e bya he thae`ae tuh, “E paw tuh profeh ccaccing nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
43007041	Mingccang`ae nynh, “E paw tuh Kri nynh thua,” a ci`ae. Thuasalama abang nynh, “Kri tuh Galilee kyate yn pou ngaw zaw?
43007042	Kri tuh David ciihan kyate, David umnaw khua, Bethlehem kyate nynh yn pou cih cite Ccathyaa nynh ho khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
43007043	Tukeiccu amaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae laku phu phiakunaw a um.
43007044	Te ccungccaw abang nynh amaw kha kyng lan a ry`ae; thuasalama hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae.
43007045	Oute tempal ngawtu`ae tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae kalan oun thua`ae; te minmin nynh, “Pawccemou amaw kha nae cciakhae khyh oh?” cite tempal ngawtu`ae kha a khia`ae.
43007046	Tempal ngawtu`ae nynh, “E paw nynh a ho hawte hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah bya ho boi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
43007047	Oute Farasi`ae nynh, “Nanning so phe ae hyngpyabua vae oh tou?
43007048	Uktu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh amaw zyn paw lukheit san a um tou?
43007049	Thuasalama Kawbya a nyh lei`ae paw tuh-e ccungccaw zapi tuh thyalaw athua`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
43007050	Farasi`ae kyaze lukheit athua paw, langmaw lya khuazi Jesu kalan a thua paw Nikodemas nynh minmin kha,
43007051	“Ccungccaw nynh a ho paw kha a thaety leite, a cyi paw a nyhty leite, ccungccaw kha aening ah Kawbya nynh byapia tou?” a cipya`ae.
43007052	Minmin nynh, “Nang so Galilee paw tou na thua? Galilee kyate profeh lukheit san pou boi khyh cipaw kha ccung lah dotua,” cite a khung`ae.
43007053	Te ccungccaw miakaw mih inn raveih lang phe cceih`ae.
43008001	Thuasalama Jesu tuh Oliv Mua kalan a cceih.
43008002	Te awkhua takawte tempal voidu kalan bua cceih zah ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae; te Jesu tuh dahung zah minmin kha a ccangpya`ae.
43008003	Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh a vawpaw thua leipaw pise ryte a seipaw nopinung lukheit kha kyng`ae zah amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae, te minmin nynh kha-e nung kha angaelaku kya he a nung`ae koute,
43008004	Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, hynh-e nopinung hynh a vawpaw thua leipaw pise ryte a sei cciamang lya kyng paw nynh thua.
43008005	Te Kawbya kya khatahawpaw nopi`ae kha lung te deih lan Mawsi nynh kaw oun pya, thuasalama nang pawte na ho cih?” a cipya`ae.
43008006	Hynh-e minmin nynh a ho`ae paw tuh amaw kha seibe khylan a syntawnaw`ae paw nynh thua. Thuasalama Jesu nynh baling zah a kuihdung te laephi kya ccaw a zei. A thae leipaw hawte nynh a um.
43008007	Minmin nynh amaw kha pei he khia`ae tuh, Jesu nynh thokuh zah minmin kha, “Nanning lakuze seinaw a hoi leipaw ccungccaw nynh kha-e nung kha masaty lung te deih sah,” a cipya`ae.
43008008	Te bua baling zah lae vawlan ccaw a zei ki.
43008009	Te kha-e bya a thae`ae paw minmin tuh athya-ahoy nynawpaw thinlung nynh mih seinaw kha nysakuh`ae zah kum tang huapaw kyate tho zah nyathyakou um paw kyacia lukheit koute lukheit phya cceih`ae; te Jesu tuh a makhaete cciataw`ae zah nopinung tuh angaelaku kya phang thadyn.
43008010	Jesu nynh he thokuh tuh nopinung laelan hung sanmah muih vae khyh, te kha-e nung kha, “Nopinung, nang sei ae be`ae paw teisangmou um`ae? Hung nynh san seibya ae pia khyh`ae tou?” a cipya.
43008011	Nopinung nynh, “Hung nynh san yn pia khyh, Bawipaw,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “Kae nynh mah nang hynh seibya kae pia khyh; la cceih lah la sei nan vae,” a cipya.
43008012	Oute Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh laephipi awnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw yn zui paw ccungccaw tuh mohnaw kya cceih lan khyh, thuasalama hiinnaw kya-e awnaw kha a hoi cih,” cite bua a hopya`ae.
43008013	Tukeiccu Farasi`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh namaw konglang namaw nynh ccaekia na khan; na ccaekia tuh kyh khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43008014	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh kamaw konglang ccaekia ka khan zemah ka ccaekia tuh akyh; pawccecize kae tuh paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw ka nyh zah teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw ka ny; thuasalama nanning nynh kae paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw na nyh khyh oh.
43008015	Nanning tuh ccungccaw lante nynh bya na pia oh; kae tuh hung sanmah bya ka pia khyh.
43008016	Tuhzemah kae tuh bya ka pia ze, ka byapianaw tuh ahme, pawccecize kae tuh ka makhae thua khyh, thuasalama kae tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw ryte nynh kae um.
43008017	Nae Kawbya kya mah ccungccaw luning ccaekia tuh akyh cite azeikuh.
43008018	Kae tuh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan paw lukheit ka thua, te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw nynh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan,” a ci.
43008019	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Na Paaw tuh teisangmou um?” cite a khia`ae. Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh kamaw mah nae nyh khyh oh, ka Paaw mah na nyh khyh oh; kamaw hynh phe nae la ny oh thua ze, ka Paaw mah phe na nyh cih oh paw,” a ci.
43008020	Jesu nynh e bya`ae hynh tempal voidu kya a ccangpya`ae lya phua nungnaw kyakhe nynh a ho; te hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae, pawccecize amaw ccyh zaw loh khyh.
43008021	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae ka la cceih cih zah nanning nynh kamaw kha nae ccung cih oh, te nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh, ka ccianaw lang nae thua kho lan khyh oh,” bua a cipya`ae.
43008022	Oute Jew`ae nynh, “ ‘Ka ccianaw lang nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ a cipaw tuh amaw te amaw tou a theihkuh cih?” a ci`ae.
43008023	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh akaw lang-e nynh na thua oh, kae tuh luki lang-e nynh ka thua; nanning tuh hynhe laephipi kya-e nynh na thua oh; kae tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh.
43008024	Tukeiccu nanning kha, ‘Nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh,’ cite kae hopya oh; pawccecize kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw na zyn khyh oh ze, nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
43008025	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh atakaw lya mawte nanning kae hopya oh hawte nynh ka thua.
43008026	Nanning konglang ka ho lanpaw te byapia lanpaw patae a um; thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh ahme, te amaw kyate ka thae paw uccaw`ae kha nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan ka ho,” a cipya`ae.
43008027	Paaw kong kha nynh Jesu nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae cipaw minmin nynh nyh khyh`ae.
43008028	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha nanning nynh he nae saethung vae oh te, kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw nae nyh cih oh, kamaw kaw te pawsang ka cyih khyh cipaw kha nae nyh cih oh; thuasalama ka Paaw nynh yn ccangpya hawte nynh hynhe` ae hynh ka ho.
43008029	Te kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh kamaw ryte nynh a um, Paaw nynh ka makhaete yn nungsya khyh, pawccecize amaw lungrythua paw uccaw`ae kha nynh kae tuh pei ka cyi he,” a cipya`ae.
43008030	E bya`ae hynh Jesu nynh he a ho tuh ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
43008031	Oute Jesu nynh amaw zyn`ae paw Jew`ae kha, “Nanning nynh ka bya kya na tyn oh ze, ka zuitu`ae ccaccing na thua cih oh.
43008032	Te nanning nynh byaccing kha nae nyh cih oh zah byaccing nynh nanning kha ae luesah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
43008033	Minmin nynh amaw kha, “Kaening tuh Abraham ciihan kae thua zah hung ccungccaw kya-e seetangnaw kya san kae um boi khyh; pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Nanning tuh luesah na thua cih oh,’ nae cipaw tu?” cite a khung`ae.
43008034	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah seinaw ryalah paw tuh seinaw see nynh athua.
43008035	Te see tuh inn kya zungzae um boi khyh; thuasalama ccapaw tuh zungzae a um.
43008036	Tukeiccu Ccapaw nynh nanning kha ae luesah oh ze, nanning tuh na lue ccaccing cih oh.
43008037	Nanning tuh Abraham ciihan nynh na thua oh cipaw ka ny; thuasalama kamaw chia lan nae ccung oh, pawkeiccumacize ka bya nanning kya umnaw hoi khyh.
43008038	Kae tuh ka Paaw kya ka muih paw uccaw kha nynh ka ho; te nanning tuh nae paaw kya na muih oh paw kha na cyi oh,” a ci.
43008039	Minmin nynh khung`ae zah amaw kha, “Abraham tuh kaening paaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh Abraham ccaaw`ae na thua oh ze, Abraham ryalaw`ae khaw na lahbua cih oh.
43008040	Thuasalama Pachia kya-e ka thae paw byaccing kha nanning kalan ae hopah oh paw, Ccungccapaw kamaw hynh chia lan atu nanning nynh nae ccung oh; Abraham tuh hynhte cyih khyh.
43008041	Nanning tuh nae paaw cyisahnaw nynh na cyi oh,” a cipya`ae. Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Kaening tuh ohhuakunaw kyate a pui paw kae thua khyh, kaening nynh Paaw lukheit kae hoi, tuh-e tuh Pachia nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
43008042	Jesu nynh, “Pachia tuh nae Paaw a la thua ze, kamaw hynh nae sungsah cih oh; pawccecize kae tuh Pachia kyate kae pou zah kae thua, kamaw kaw te kae thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh kamaw hynh yn saw.
43008043	Pawccemou nanning nynh ka bya hynh na thaethya khyh oh? Nanning nynh ka bya na thae kho khyh oh keiccu nynh thua.
43008044	Nanning tuh nae paaw diabolos kya-e nynh na thua oh, te nae paaw rynaw kha nanning nynh na cyi ry oh. Aning tuh atakaw lya mawte ccungccaw theihtupaw thua zah byaccing kya tyn khyh. Pawccecize amaw kya byaccing um khyh. Hyngbya he a ho vae ze amawthuanaw kha nynh a ho; pawccecize aning tuh mihyngpaw thua zah hyngbya paaw nynh athua.
43008045	Te byaccing hynh kae hopya keiccu oh, nanning nynh kamaw nae zyn khyh oh.
43008046	Nanning lakuze hung nynh mou kamaw hynh seinaw yn nysakuh? Te kae nynh byaccing ka ho lanze pawccemou nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae zyn khyh oh?
43008047	Pachia kya-e ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia bya`ae kha a ngae, nanning tuh Pachia kya-e na thua khyh oh keiccu a bya`ae kha na ngae khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
43008048	Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh Samariapaw nynh na thua cipaw te raerangsaro bahkuhpaw nynh na thua cipaw hmerarihlan kae hopah khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
43008049	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw ka thua khyh, thuasalama ka Paaw hynh saw ka tua, te nanning nynh kamaw hynh saw nae tua khyh oh.
43008050	Kae tuh kamaw phu-enaw ka ccung khyh; phu-enaw ccung zah byapia paw lukheit a um.
43008051	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya hynh a ngae lanze chinaw tung boi vae lan khyh,” a ci.
43008052	Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw cipaw atu kae ny. Abraham tuh a chih, te profeh`ae mah chih`ae, te nang nynh, ‘Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya a ngae lanze chinaw tung boi vae lan khyh,’ na ci.
43008053	Nang tuh a chih vae paw kaening paaw Abraham laeze na lesaehua tou? Profeh`ae mah chih`ae; namaw te namaw hynh hunglangmou na riakuh?” a ci`ae.
43008054	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw te kamaw phu-e ka pyaku ze, ka phu-enaw tuh accakaepaw nynh thua, kamaw phu-e yn pya paw tuh ka Paaw nynh thua; amaw kha nanning nynh, ‘Aning tuh kaening Pachia,’ na ci oh.
43008055	Tuhzemah nanning nynh amaw kha na nyh khyh oh, thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka ny; te kae nynh, ‘Amaw kha ka nyh khyh,’ ka ci lanze, kae tuh nanning hawte mihyngpaw nynh ka thua cih, thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka nyh zah a hopaw kha ka ngae.
43008056	Nanning nae paaw Abraham nynh kamaw ninsaw kha muih lan myarya a lungtua; te kha-e kha muih zah a lungtua,” a ci.
43008057	Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh kum sungpangaw na cih loh leite Abraham tuh phe na muih tou?” a ci`ae.
43008058	Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Abraham a la um mawze kae tuh ka um,” a cipya`ae.
43008059	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha deih lan lung`ae a khuinnuaku`ae; thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw te amaw rekuh zah minmin ngaelaku te cceih zah tempal voidu kyate po a pou.
43009001	Te Jesu nynh po a cceih tuh a pui takawte a mitmohpaw ccungccapaw lukheit kha a muih.
43009002	Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Rabbi, e paw nynh mitmohte a pui paw hynh, hung nynh sei keiccu mou, amaw tou a sei, tukhyhze a nung te a paaw tou sei`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
43009003	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “E ccungccapaw mah sei khyh, a nung te a paaw mah sei khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia ryalaw`ae amaw kya langsaku ry keiccu nynh thua.
43009004	Ninthu ccyh lya kamaw yn sawtupaw ryalaw`ae kha ka laah cih; hung ccungccaw nynh san ryalaw kho khyh ccyh khuazi yn thua cih.
43009005	Laephipi kya kae ka um lungkhu balyn kae tuh laephipi awnaw nynh ka thua,” a ci.
43009006	Tuh-e he a ho koute Jesu nynh laephi kha a tuinthoi zah tuin kyate ccingccua kha rae zah mitmohpaw mit kha ccingccua a thuhpya.
43009007	Te amaw kha, “La cceih, Siloam kuaa kya la singkuh,” a cipya. (Siloam cipaw asuilan tuh ‘Saw’ cipaw nynh thua). Tukeiccu aning nynh cceih zah a singku, te ngawmuihte a ki.
43009008	Tukeiccu a innpaw`ae te aning tuh mitmohpaw nynh thua cipaw langmaw lya a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh, “E paw hynh leih dahung zah a ngiakuh he paw kha thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
43009009	Ccungccaw abang nynh, “Kha-e paw nynh thua,” a ci`ae; mingccang`ae nynh, “Kha-e paw nynh alo,” a ci`ae; thuasalama amaw nynh, “Kae tuh aning nynh ka thua,” a ci.
43009010	Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pawcihtemou na mit a aw?” a ci`ae.
43009011	Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Jesu acikuh paw ccungccapaw nynh ccingccua rae zah ka mit kya yn thuhpya, te, ‘Siloam kuaa kalan la cceih lah la singkuh,’ yn cipya, te ka cceih zah ka singkuh, te ngaw ka muih,” a ci.
43009012	Oute minmin nynh, “Aning tuh teisangmou a um?” cite a khia`ae. Aning nynh, “Ka nyh khyh,” a ci.
43009013	Minmin nynh langmaw lya a mitmohpaw kha Farasi`ae kalan a cciakhae`ae.
43009014	Te Jesu nynh ccingccua rae zah kha-e paw mit a awsah lyakha Sabbath nin nynh thua.
43009015	Oute Farasi`ae nynh mah kha-e paw kha pawcihtemou ngaw na muih cite bua a khia`ae. Aning nynh minmin kha, “Aning nynh ka mit kya ccingccua yn thuhpah zah ka singbiakuh, te ngaw ka muih,” a cipya`ae.
43009016	Tukeiccu Farasi`ae abang nynh, “Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw thua khyh, pawccemacize Sabbath nin sung khyh,” a ci`ae. Mingccang`ae nynh, “Pawcihtemou miseipaw lukheit nynh khatahawpaw muihsanaw a rae kho cih?” a ci`ae. Te minmin laku kya phiakunaw a um.
43009017	Minmin nynh mitmohpaw kha, “Na mit ae awsah keiccu tuh-e paw tuh pawtemou na tua?” cite bua a khia`ae. Mitmohpaw nynh, “Aning tuh Profeh lukheit nynh thua,” a ci.
43009018	Thuasalama ngaw bua a muih paw a nung te a paaw kha a ko makhia`ae tuh kha-e paw tuh a mitmoh zah ngaw bua a muih paw nynh thua cite Jew`ae nynh zyn khyh`ae.
43009019	Te minmin nynh a nung te a paaw kha, “E paw hynh a pui lya mawte a mitmoh na ci oh paw nae ccapaw thua tou? Tuhte lanze atu pawcihtemou ngaw a muih?” cite a khia`ae.
43009020	A nung te a paaw nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “E paw tuh kae ccapaw nynh thua cipaw te a pui lya mawte a mitmoh cipaw kae ny.
43009021	Thuasalama pawcihte nynh atu ngaw a muih cipaw kae nyh khyh, hung nynh a mit awsah cipaw mah kae nyh khyh; aning tuh piccangthua vae, amaw kha khia oh, amaw hanlan amaw nynh yn hokuh cih,” a ci`ae.
43009022	A nung te a paaw nynh Jew`ae rawri`ae keiccu nynh e bya`ae hynh a ho`ae; pawccecize Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite lukhakheit nynh ccaekiakhan lanze tuh-e paw tuh sinakok kyate dee lan cite Jew`ae nynh nawccawnaw phe a rae vae`ae.
43009023	Tukeiccu nynh a nung te a paaw nynh, “Aning tuh piccangthua vae, amaw kha khia oh,” a ci`ae.
43009024	Tukeiccu mitmohpaw kha minmin nynh bua ko`ae zah, “Pachia hynh phu-enaw pya, kha-e paw tuh miseipaw nynh thua cipaw kaening nynh kae ny,” a ci`ae.
43009025	Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh miseipaw athua te thua khyh ka nyh khyh, ccangkheit ka ny paw tuh, kae tuh ka mit a la moh, atu ngaw ka muih vae,” a ci.
43009026	Oute minmin nynh, “Aning nynh na tungvaw pawmou a cyi? Na mit pawcihtemou ae awsah?” cite bua a khia`ae.
43009027	Aning nynh, “Nanning phe kae hopya vae oh, te na ngae khyh oh, pawccemou bua na thaery oh? Nanning so a zuitu`ae lan na tang ry oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
43009028	Oute minmin nynh amaw kha sarya`ae zah, “Nang nynh amaw zuitu na thua, thuasalama kaening tuh Mawsi zuitu`ae nynh kae thua.
43009029	Pachia nynh Mawsi kalan byahopya cipaw kae ny, thuasalama e paw tuh paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw kae nyh khyh,” a ci`ae.
43009030	Tuh-e ccungccapaw nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning nynh ka mit phe yn awsah pite, aning tuh paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw na ny khyh oh paw tuh ngaeang lan um paw uccaw nynh thua.
43009031	Pachia nynh misei`ae bya tuh thaepah khyh`ae cipaw aening ah nyh oh; thuasalama lukhakheit nynh Pachia kha beik zah a rynaw kha a cyi lanze, kha-e paw kha Pachia nynh a thaepya.
43009032	Mitmohte a pui paw ccungccapaw mit kha ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh phe awsah cipaw laephipi thotakaw te thae boi lan um khyh.
43009033	E ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw a la thua khyh lanze, aning nynh pawsang mah cyi kho lan khyh,” a ci.
43009034	Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh seinaw`ae kya khaleih na pui paw nynh na thua, nang nynh tou kaening nae ccangpah?” a ci`ae. Te minmin nynh amaw kha phe a dee`ae.
43009035	Farasi`ae nynh mitmohpaw kha phe dee`ae cipaw Jesu nynh a thae; te Jesu nynh mitmohpaw kha he a muih tuh, “Pachia Ccapaw kha na zyn tou?” cite a khia.
43009036	Aning nynh, “Bawipaw, kae nynh amaw kha ka zyn lanpaw aning tuh hungmou?” cite a khung.
43009037	Te Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh amaw kha phe na muih vae, te nang ryte atu bya hopaw hynh aning nynh thua,” a cipya.
43009038	Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, ka zyn!” ci zah amaw kha a beik.
43009039	Te Jesu nynh, “Ngawmuih lei`ae paw kha ngawmuihsah khylan, te ngawmuih`ae paw kha mitmohsah khylan, kae tuh byapia khylan nynh hynh-e laephipi kalan kae thua,” a ci.
43009040	Te Jesu ryte a um`ae paw Farasi`ae abang nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh thae`ae zah amaw kha, “Kaening so kae mitmoh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
43009041	Jesu nynh, “Nanning tuh nae mit a la moh lanze seinaw na hoi cih lei oh paw, thuasalama atu nanning nynh, ‘Ngaw kae muih,’ na ci oh; keiccuze nae seinaw tuh phang a um.
43010001	“Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tuu khiaa lungkhu lang sakoih kyate tee leite, ccangpaw kyate a kae paw ccungccaw tuh miruh te damiah nynh thua.
43010002	Thuasalama sakoih kyate a tee paw tuh tuu`ae a ringtu nynh thua.
43010003	Kha-e paw kha sakoih ngawtupaw nynh sakoih a hungpya, te tuu`ae nynh a roi a syntaw`ae, te a tuu`ae kha mih min te ko`ae zah a poukhae`ae.
43010004	Te a tuu`ae kha he a poukhae vae ze, mih malang khe cciapah`ae zah tuu`ae nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh a roi kha a syntaw`ae.
43010005	Te mikhiapaw kha minmin nynh zui lan khyh`ae, thuasalama kha-e paw kha a ccuetaw cih`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh mikhiapaw roi kha nyh khyh`ae,” a ci.
43010006	E tousenaw hynh Jesu nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae, thuasalama aning nynh a hopya`ae paw kha paw kong nynh athua cipaw minmin nynh thaethya khyh`ae.
43010007	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha bua hopah`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kae tuh tuu`ae teenaw sakoih nynh ka thua.
43010008	Kamaw malang oun thuaty`ae paw balyn tuh miruh`ae te damiah`ae nynh thua`ae, thuasalama tuu`ae nynh minmin roi kha ngaepah khyh`ae.
43010009	Kae tuh sakoih nynh ka thua, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kyate a tee lanze, aning tuh khum athua cih. Te aning tuh a tee, a pou cih zah rangpaw a muihkuh cih.
43010010	Miruh tuh ru khylan, chia khylan te syro khylan rou nynh yn thua; kae tuh tuu`ae nynh hiinnaw a hoi ccaw`ae cite, te kha-e kha phe beih lang a hoi ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua.
43010011	“Kae tuh ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh ka thua; ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh tuh a hiinnaw kha tuu`ae hanlan a pyaku.
43010012	Thuasalama tuuringtu athua leipaw, tuu`ae a hoitu athua leipaw, hohpaw ccungccaw nynh tuh suizaw yn thua paw he a muih vae ze, tuu`ae kha cciataw zah phe a ccuetaw, te suizaw nynh tuu`ae kha kyng`ae zah pung phiasaku`ae.
43010013	Hohpaw ccungccaw nynh tuh a ccuetaw he, pawccemacize aning tuh hohpaw athua keiccu tuu`ae hanlan tua khyh.
43010014	“Kae tuh ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh ka thua, te ka tuu`ae kha ka nyh zah ka tuu`ae nynh mah kamaw kha oun ny`ae.
43010015	Kamaw kha ka Paaw nynh yn ny hawte, kae nynh mah ka Paaw kha ka ny, te ka hiinnaw kha tuu`ae hanlan ka pyaku.
43010016	Te hynh-e tuu khiaa kya a umbua leipaw ccangpaw tuu`ae kha ka hoi, minmin kha mah ka cciakhae hahe cih`ae zah minmin nynh ka roi a ngae cih`ae; te tuuringtu lukheit zakaw tuuphu phukheit lang oun tang cih`ae.
43010017	Kae nynh ka hiinnaw kha ka pyakuh zah ka hiinnaw kha bua ka lawkuh cih keiccuze ka Paaw nynh kamaw kha yn sungsah.
43010018	Hung ccungccaw nynh san kha-e hiinnaw kha ka kyate yn lawpah khyh, thuasalama kamaw lungryte nynh kha-e kha ka pyaku. Ka hiinnaw kha pyaku lan kawhoinaw te kha-e kha bua lawku lan kawhoinaw ka hoi. Hynh-e kawpyapaw hynh ka Paaw kyate nynh ka mue,” a ci.
43010019	Hynh-e bya`ae keiccuze Jew`ae laku phiakunaw bua a um.
43010020	Te minmin lakuze ccungccaw patae nynh, “Aning tuh raerangsaro bahkuh zah angaee, pawccemou amaw bya kha na ngae oh?” a ci`ae.
43010021	Abang nynh, “E bya`ae tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw bya`ae thua khyh, raerangsaro nynh mitmohpaw mit kha a awsah kho cih tou?” a ci`ae.
43010022	Te khoccihsaw lyakhe Jerusalem kya Tempal Ahnaw Poi um zah,
43010023	Jesu tuh tempal voidu lungkhu Solomon saeleih dawkuhpaw kya a cceih.
43010024	Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha phang koihlu`ae zah, “Hohse cia mou nang nynh kaening hynh lunghiinnaw nae hoisah ung cih? Nang tuh Kri na thua lanze ccaerarihlan oun hopah,” a ci`ae.
43010025	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nanning phe kae hopya vae oh, te na zyn khyh oh; ka Paaw min te ka cyipaw ryalaw`ae nynh kamaw kong ccaekiakhan`ae.
43010026	Thuasalama nanning tuh ka tuuphu lungkhu e na thua khyh oh keiccu nae kalan ka ho vae hawte nanning nynh nae zyn khyh oh.
43010027	Ka tuu`ae nynh ka roi kha ngae`ae zah minmin kha ka ny`ae, te minmin nynh kamaw kha oun zui`ae.
43010028	Te minmin kha zungzae hiinnaw ka pya`ae, te minmin tuh kharyh roh boi vae lan khyh`ae, hung nynh sanmah minmin kha ka kuih kyate yn lua kho vae lan khyh.
43010029	Minmin kha kamaw kalan yn pyatupaw ka Paaw tuh hunghung balyn laeze a lesaehua, te hung nynh sanmah minmin kha ka Paaw kuih kyate lua kho lan khyh.
43010030	Kae te ka Paaw tuh ccangkheit nynh kae thua,” a ci.
43010031	Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha deih lan cite lung bua a khuinnuaku`ae.
43010032	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Ka Paaw kya-e ahoypaw ryalaw patae kha nanning phe kae langsapyaku vae oh, khae` ae kyaze pawtecihpaw ryalaw keiccu mou nanning nynh lung te deihbia lan nae ci oh?” a ci.
43010033	Jew`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Ahoypaw ryalaw keiccu nang kha kae deih lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia thethyasabya na ho keiccu, te nang tuh ccungccaw mang na thua pite namaw te namaw Pachia lang na tangsaku keiccu nynh kae deih cih,” a ci`ae.
43010034	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nae Kawbya kya, ‘Nanning tuh pachia`ae nynh na thua oh, ka ci,’ cite zeikuh khyh tou?
43010035	Pachia bya mih kalan a thua paw minmin kha aning nynh pachia`ae a ci lanze, (te Ccathyaa tuh roh kho lan khyh).
43010036	Paaw nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw te laephipi kalan a saw vae paw amaw kha, ‘Kae tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh ka thua,’ ka ci keiccuze, nanning nynh, ‘Nang tuh Pachia thethyasabya na ho,’ nae ci oh tou?
43010037	Ka Paaw ryalaw`ae kha ka law khyh lanze, kamaw hynh oun zyn nan oh.
43010038	Thuasalama ka law lanze, kamaw hynh nae zyn khyh oh zemah ryalaw`ae kha zyn oh, ou tuhte Paaw tuh kamaw kya um zah kae tuh amaw kya ka um paw kha nae nyh cih oh zah nae zyn oh ccaw,” a ci.
43010039	Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha kyng lan bua a ccung`ae, thuasalama mih kuih kyate phe a lue.
43010040	Te Jesu tuh Jordan vaw khuraw langkhe bua cceih zah Johan nynh masaty baptisma insahnaw kyakhe a um.
43010041	Te ccungccaw patae amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Johan nynh muihsanaw kharyh langsakuh khyh; thuasalama hynh-e Ccungccapaw konglang Johan nynh a hopaw balyn tuh marya ahme,” a ci`ae.
43010042	Te tuin kyakhe ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
43011001	Meri te a unung Martha`ae khua, Bethani khua paw Lazaruh cikuh paw lukheitpaw tuh a la ccih.
43011002	Accihpaw Lazaruh a ccianung tuh Bawipaw kha mynkhuhpaw sathothuhpah zah a ccu kha a sang te a fupah paw Meri nynh thua.
43011003	Tukeiccu a ccianung`ae nynh Bawipaw kalan ccungccaw saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, dotua, na sungsahpaw ccungccapaw tuh accih,” cite a hosapya`ae.
43011004	Jesu nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh, “Hynh-e ccinaw tuh chinaw phah lanpaw thua khyh; thuasalama Pachia phu-enaw hanlan, ou tuhte Pachia Ccapaw phu-e ccou nawlan nynh thua,” a ci.
43011005	Jesu nynh Martha, a neitanung, te Lazaruh kha a sungsah`ae.
43011006	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh Lazaruh accih cipaw he a thae te, tuin a umnaw kya maw khe nin ning bua a um ung.
43011007	Ou tuhkoute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Judah ram lang bua cceih ccavae oh sih,” a cipya`ae.
43011008	Zuitu`ae nynh, “Rabbi, Jew`ae nynh atumaw khaw nang kha lung te deih lan ae ccung`ae, te tuhlang tuh ccia lan bua na cih tou?” a cipya`ae.
43011009	Jesu nynh, “Khuadae kya suimilan haw laening um khyh tou? Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh khuadae kya a ccia ze thykuh khyh, pawkeiccumacize hynh-e laephipi kya-e awnaw liate ngaw a muihkuh.
43011010	Thuasalama ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh khuazi kya a ccia ze a thykuh, pawkeiccumacize amaw kya awnaw um khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
43011011	Hynh-e`ae kong hynh Jesu nynh a ho, te he a ho koute, “Ah banpaw Lazaruh tuh a ih, tuhzemah amaw kha tho khylan kae ka cceih cih,” a cipya`ae.
43011012	Oute a zuitu`ae nynh, “Bawipaw, aning tuh a i lanze, phe yn hoy cih,” a ci`ae.
43011013	Tuhzemah Jesu nynh tuh Lazaruh a chinaw kong kha nynh a ho, thuasalama minmin nynh tuh a i ccaccing paw nynh a ho cite a tua`ae.
43011014	Oute Jesu nynh, “Lazaruh tuh a chih vae,” cite ccaerarihlan a hopya`ae.
43011015	“Te nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, tuin kya kae ka la um khyh paw tuh nae hanlan ka lungtua, atu amaw kalan aening cceih oh sih,” a ci.
43011016	Oute Didymas acikuh paw Thomas nynh, “Bawipaw ryte ah chibua ccaw oh, aening mah cceihbua oh sih,” cite zuitu a ruiban`ae kha a hopya`ae.
43011017	Oute Jesu he yn thua tuh, Lazaruh kha shaw lungkhu a ccynaw`ae te nin pali phe acih vae cipaw a ny.
43011018	Atu Bethani khua tuh Jerusalem te anaekuh, me ning loukaw nynh asaw.
43011019	Te Martha te Meri tuh mih raepaw a chi keiccu minmin kha umkhae khylan Jew`ae patae oun thua`ae.
43011020	Oute Martha nynh Jesu yn thua cipaw he a thae tuh, cceih zah Jesu kha a duehaw; thuasalama Meri tuh innvaw nynh phang a dahung.
43011021	Oute Martha nynh, “Bawipaw, e kya nang na um lanze, ka rae paw a chih cih leipaw.
43011022	Thuasalama atumaw Pachia kalan nang nynh na ngia paw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh ae pya cih cipaw ka ny,” cite Jesu kha a hopya.
43011023	Jesu nynh, “Na rae paw bua yn tho cih,” a cipya.
43011024	Martha nynh, “Nyathyakou nin kya, thothuinaw kya aning tuh bua yn tho cih cipaw tuh ka ny,” cite a khung.
43011025	Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh thothuinaw te hiinnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh a chi zemah bua a hiin cih.
43011026	Te kamaw yn zyn zah a hiinpaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh chih boi vae lan khyh. Hynh-e bya hynh na zyn tou?” cite a khia.
43011027	Martha nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang tuh laephipi kalan yn thua paw, Pachia Ccapaw, Kri nynh na thua cipaw ka zyn,” cite a khung.
43011028	Te tuhcihte he a ho koute, Martha nynh cceih zah a neitanung Meri kha aphiru lante zya ko zah, “Ccangpatupaw yn thua vae, te nang kha ae ko,” a cipya.
43011029	Tuh-e bya kha Meri nynh he a thae tuh, arangte thokuh zah Jesu kalan a cceih.
43011030	Jesu tuh tuh-e ccyh lya khualae lungkhu lang yn thua loh khyh, thuasalama Martha te a tungkunaw`ae kya nynh a um ung.
43011031	Innvaw kya Meri a umkhae`ae paw Jew`ae nynh, Meri nynh arangte thokuh zah a ccia paw kha he muih`ae tuh, “Shawku lang raw khylan nynh a ccia,” cih`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
43011032	Oute Meri nynh Jesu a umnaw kyakhe thua zah amaw kha he a muih tuh, a ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah, “Bawipaw, e kya nang na um ze, ka raepaw a chih cih leipaw,” cite a hopya.
43011033	Meri te amaw ryte oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh a raw`ae paw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh myarya a thinlungccih zah a lungvawsaw.
43011034	Te, “Teisangmou Lazaruh kha na ccy oh?” a ci. Minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, rang lah yn dotua,” a ci`ae.
43011035	Jesu a rah.
43011036	Oute Jew`ae nynh, “Dotua oh, Lazaruh kha pawcih babang mou a sungsah!” a ci`ae.
43011037	Te abang nynh, “Mitmohpaw a mit a awsah paw e Ccungccapaw nynh Lazaruh kha chi leite umsah kho khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
43011038	Tuhkoute Jesu tuh a thinlungccih ki zah shaw kalan a thua. Tuh-e shaw tuh lungkarung thua zah lung te phang a fu`ae.
43011039	Jesu nynh, “Lung kha nue oh,” a ci. Te achihpaw a ccianung Martha nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, atu tuh phe thuh vae cih, pawccecize a chinaw te nin pali acih vae,” cite a hopya.
43011040	Jesu nynh Martha kha, “Na zyn lanze Pachia phu-enaw na muih cih cite nang kha kae hopah khyh tou?” a cipya.
43011041	Oute minmin nynh achihpaw a ccynaw`ae kyate lung kha a nue`ae. Te Jesu nynh dothung zah, “Apang, ka bya nae thaepya vae keiccu na tungvaw ka lungtua.
43011042	Te ka bya hynh nang nynh pei leih nae thaepya cipaw ka ny; thuasalama ka pe thadyn paw ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw tuh nang nynh na saw paw cipaw kha a zyn ccaw`ae cite, minmin khylan nynh hynhte ka ho,” a ci.
43011043	Te hynhcihte Jesu nynh he a ho koute, “Lazaruh, yn pou!” cite thawte a sia.
43011044	Te achihpaw ccungccapaw tuh yn pou zah a kuih te a ccu kha shaw uccaw te phang vekuh. A mae mah pavua te phang khiidekuh. Te Jesu nynh, “Amaw kha phoupah oh lah cceih sah,” a ci.
43011045	Oute Meri kalan oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae patae nynh Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw kha muih`ae zah amaw kha a zyn`ae.
43011046	Thuasalama ccungccaw abang tuh Farasi`ae kalan cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw kong kha a hopya`ae.
43011047	Oute alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh Sanhedrin kungsi meting ko`ae zah, “Aening nynh pawte cyi lan? Pawccecize e paw nynh muihsanaw`ae patae a langsaku vae.
43011048	Amaw kha hynhcihte aening nynh ah sawphah oh lanze, ccungccaw balyn nynh amaw kha oun zyn cih`ae, te Rom`ae nynh oun thua cih`ae zah ah umnaw oh te ah minphuin hynh phe oun lawpah cih`ae,” a ci`ae.
43011049	Te minmin lakuze tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi lupi lukheit athua paw Kaiafas nynh, “Nanning pawsang kharyh na nyh khyh oh.
43011050	Minphuin khaleih aro khyh nawlan, ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccungccaw`ae hanlan a chi lanpaw tuh aening hanlan ahoyhua cipaw mah na tuase khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
43011051	Te hynh-e bya hynh amaw kaw te ho khyh, thuasalama tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi athua thyhhawte, Jesu tuh kha-e minphuin hanlan yn chih vae cih cipaw te,
43011052	kha-e minphuin hanlan kyalya thua leite, phe a phiakuh`ae paw Pachia ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua khylan, yn chih cih cipaw profehbya a ho paw nynh thua.
43011053	Oute kha-e nin kyate vae tuh amaw kha chia lan minmin tuh khuakhankuh vae`ae.
43011054	Tukeiccu Jesu tuh Jew`ae laku phe alangkuh lante cceih vae khyh, thuasalama tuin kyate rangkaw te anaekunaw Efrim cikuh paw khua lungkhu lang cceih zah tuin kya a zuitu`ae ryte a um`ae.
43011055	Te Jew`ae Kawtaw Poi tuh nae vae zah ccungccaw patae nynh Kawtaw Poi maw mimaw te mimaw ccikanku khylan khua taraw kyate Jerusalem lang oun cceihthung`ae.
43011056	Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha a ccung`ae; te tempal kin thadyn`ae zah, “Pawcihte na tua oh? Aning tuh poi kalan yn thuabua lan khyh tou?” cite mimaw te mimaw a hokuh`ae.
43011057	Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh Jesu kha teikya nynh um cipaw a ny lanze amaw kha kyng khylan, minmin kalan a thaesah cih,” cite kaw phe a pya vae`ae.
43012001	Oute Kawtaw Poi azaw maw nin taruh ary kya, phe chih zah a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Lazaruh umnaw Bethani khua khe Jesu yn thua.
43012002	Tuin kya minmin nynh amaw kha zerya paccynpah`ae zah Martha tuh a thohae; thuasalama Lazaruh tuh Jesu ryte ccaboi kya a dahung`ae paw kya a umbua.
43012003	Oute Meri nynh myarya aphutepaw, accipaw spaiknard satho pound kheit kha lawkuh zah Jesu ccu kha thuh zah a ccu kha a sang te a fupya; te inn tuh satho myn te phe abeih.
43012004	Oute a zuitu`ae lukheit athua paw, Jesu kha a phee vae cih paw, Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria nynh,
43012005	“Pawccemou hynh-e spaiknard satho hynh denari phua zathung lang a zua khyh, te ryachi`ae kha a pya khyh?” a ci.
43012006	Hynhte a hopaw tuh ryachi`ae hanlan a tua keiccu thua khyh, thuasalama aning tuh miruhpaw athua keiccu phua bawng kha ccy zah kha-e lungkhu lang a sang`ae paw kha leih a lawku keiccu nynh thua.
43012007	Oute Jesu nynh, “E nung hynh khamawte um sah; ka rhua ccy nin hanlan hynh-e hynh a cyi paw nynh thua.
43012008	Pawccecize ryachi`ae tuh nanning kya pei a um he`ae, thuasalama kae tuh nanning kya pei ka um lan khyh,” a ci.
43012009	Oute Jew ccungccaw`ae patae nynh Jesu tuh tuin kya a um cipaw a ny`ae, te minmin nynh Jesu a um keiccu kyalya thua leite a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Lazaruh kha mah muih khylan cite oun thua`ae.
43012010	Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh Lazaruh kha mah chia lan cite khuakhanku`ae.
43012011	Pawkeiccumacize amaw keiccuze Jew`ae patae nynh pou`ae zah Jesu kha a zyn`ae.
43012012	Tuh-e nin koute poi kalan oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw patae nynh Jesu Jerusalem lang yn thua cipaw he a thae`ae tuh,
43012013	saruitah ku ange`ae kha ccyngkute Jesu kha duehaw lan cceih`ae zah, “Hosanna! BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw Israel Siapharan tuh hythuaccou sah!” cite a sia`ae.
43012014	Te Jesu nynh anopaw lann kha he a muih tuh a tungvaw a cciku; tuh-e tuh;
43012015	“Zion ccanung rih nan; dotua, na Siapharan tuh anopaw lann tungvaw ccikute yn thua cciamang,” cite azeiku hawkhate nynh thua.
43012016	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh a zuitu`ae nynh atakaw lya tuh thaethya khyh`ae, thuasalama Jesu phu-esah he athua vae te, hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh amaw konglang azeikuh paw cipaw te hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kalan nynh a cyi`ae cipaw kha minmin nynh a liathui vae`ae.
43012017	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh shaw lungkhu kya-e Lazaruh kha ko zah a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah lyaze amaw ryte a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae.
43012018	Kha-e muihsanaw kha aning nynh phe a langsaku cipaw a thae`ae keiccu ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
43012019	Tukeiccu Farasi`ae nynh mimaw te mimaw laku, “Nanning nynh na tae vae lan khyh oh cipaw hynh nykuh oh, dotua oh, laephipi tuh amaw nuhlang nynh a zuiku vae!” cite a hoku`ae.
43012020	Te Pachia beik khylan cite poi kalan oun thua`ae paw laku Greek`ae abang a umbua`ae.
43012021	Tukeiccu kha-e`ae nynh Galilee pee, Bethsaida khua paw Filip kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Bawihaepaw, kaening nynh Jesu kha kae muih ry,” cite a ngia`ae.
43012022	Filip nynh cceih zah Andru kha a hopya; te Andru te Filip nynh Jesu kha bua a hopya`ae.
43012023	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha phu-esah nawlan accyh athua vae.
43012024	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, chanvui ccacii nynh laephi lungkhu lang ccah khyh zah a chi khyh lanze amawte nynh phang a um; thuasalama a chi lanze athae patae a poukhae.
43012025	Amaw hiinnaw kha a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh kha-e kha a shung cih; te hynh-e laephipi kya amaw hiinnaw kha a hua paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e kha zungzae hiinnaw hanlan a ccykuh cih.
43012026	Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kha rya yn lawpya ze, kamaw hynh yn zui sah; te kamaw ka umnaw kya, rya yn lawpatu mah a umbua cih; lukhakheit nynh kamaw kha rya yn lawpya ze, kha-e paw kha ka Paaw nynh sawtuanaw a pya cih.
43012027	“Atu ka hiinnaw-muisaw a lungriathae, te pawcihte ka ho cih? ‘Apang, hynh-e ccyh kyate yn khum,’ thuasalama e konglang nynh e ccyh kalan ka thua.
43012028	Apang, na min hynh phu-esah,” a ci. Oute tuin kya vaawran kyate roi yn ccae zah, “Phe phu ka esah vae, te bua phu ka esah ung cih,” a ci.
43012029	Tukeiccu tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e roi kha thae`ae zah, “Kholung thyh,” cite a ho`ae; abang nynh, “Vaaw ccungccapaw nynh amaw kalan byaho,” a ci`ae.
43012030	Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw hanlan hynh-e roi tuh yn thua khyh, thuasalama nanning hanlan nynh yn thua.
43012031	Atu hynh-e laephipi tuh byapia athua, atu hynh-e laephipi uktu tuh ccaring dee athua cih.
43012032	Te kae tuh laephi kyate saethung ka thua vae ze, ccungccaw`ae balyn kha kamaw kalan ka dungbua cih`ae,” a ci.
43012033	Hynh-e bya a hopaw tuh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh ka chih vae cih cipaw kha a langsapya`ae paw nynh thua.
43012034	Ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Kri tuh zungzae atyn cih cite Kawbya kyate kaening nynh kae thae, te pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh saethung yn thua cih,’ na cipaw tu? Tuh-e Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae.
43012035	Oute Jesu nynh, “Sosohtari kya awnaw tuh nanning kya a um, awnaw na hoi lya oh hin cceih oh, tukhyhze mohnaw nynh ae kyng sei cih oh, pawccecize mohnaw kya a cceih paw ccungccaw tuh teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw nykuh khyh.
43012036	Awnaw na hoi lya oh hin awnaw ccaaw`ae na thua oh ccaw, awnaw kha zyn oh,” a cipya`ae. Jesu nynh hynh-e`ae a ho koute minmin kyate pou zah zya a rekuh.
43012037	Jesu nynh muihsanaw`ae patae kha minmin malang a langsaku zemah minmin nynh amaw kha zyn khyh`ae.
43012038	Profeh Isaiah nynh, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh kae hopaw bya kha hung nynh mou a zyn? BAWIPAW kuihthaw tuh hung kalan mou langsapyakute a um?” cite a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
43012039	Tukeiccu minmin nynh zyn kho khyh`ae; pawkeiccumacize Isaiah nynh bua a hopaw tuh;
43012040	“Minmin nynh mih mit te a muih khyh nawlan`ae, mih thinlung te a thaethya khyh nawlan`ae, mih mit kha mohsah`ae zah mih thinlung kha a khungsah`ae, tukhyh lanze phe paleihkuh cih`ae zah phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,” a ci.
43012041	Isaiah nynh Bawipaw phuenaw kha he muih zah amaw konglang a ho lyakhe nynh hynhe bya`ae hynh a ho.
43012042	Tuhzemah uktu`ae patae nynh heize amaw kha a zyn`ae; thuasalama Farasi`ae keiccuze minmin nynh kae zyn cite ccaekiakhan khyh`ae. Ccaekiakhan`ae ze sinakok kyate phe a dee cih`ae.
43012043	Pawccecize minmin tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh thehoysapaw kha Pachia nynh thehoysapaw laeze a ryhua`ae.
43012044	Jesu nynh thawte sia zah, “Kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kyalya yn zyn paw thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a zyn paw nynh thua.
43012045	Te kamaw yn muih paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a muih.
43012046	Kamaw yn zyn paw miakaw nynh mohnaw kya pei a um khyh nawlan`ae kae tuh awnaw hawte laephipi kalan kae thua.
43012047	“Te ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya thae zah a zyn khyh ze, amaw kha bya ka pia khyh; pawccecize kae tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae byapia khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae khum khylan nynh kae thua.
43012048	Kamaw kha yn vua zah ka bya a lawkuh leipaw ccungccaw kha byapia cih paw a um; ka hopaw ka bya ccaccei nynh amaw kha nyathyakou nin kya byapia cih.
43012049	Pawccecize kamaw kaw te bya ka ho khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw nynh ka ho lanpaw te ka ccae lanpaw kha kaw phe yn pya vae.
43012050	Te a kawpyapaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua cipaw ka ny, tukeiccu ka hopaw miakaw tuh ka Paaw nynh kamaw kalan yn hopya thyhte nynh ka ho,” a ci.
43013001	Kawtaw Poi a thua maw, Jesu nynh hynh-e laephipi kyate Paaw kalan a pou nawlan accyh azaw vae cipaw he a nyh tuh, laephipi kya a um`ae paw amaw a ccungccaw`ae kha sungsah`ae zah athangnaw cia minmin kha a sungsah`ae.
43013002	Te zerya a ae`ae koute Jesu kha phee lan diabolos nynh Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria thinlung lungkhu lang phe a sang vae.
43013003	Paaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha amaw kuih lungkhu lang marya a pya vae paw kha thuasah, aning tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw kha thuasah, te Pachia kalan a ccia lanpaw kha thuasah Jesu nynh a ny pawte,
43013004	zerya aenaw kyate thokuh zah avawlan e uccaw`ae kha khakuh zah fukunawpaw pavua kha lawkuh zah a cce kya a veku.
43013005	Tuhkoute tui kha pakekhupaw lungkhu lang ccae zah a zuitu`ae ccu kha a singpya`ae, te a cce kya a vekupaw fukunawpaw pavua khate a fupya`ae.
43013006	Te Simon Piter kya he a thua tuh, Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, nang nynh ka ccu nae sing cih tou?” a ci.
43013007	Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ka cyi paw hynh atu nang nynh na nyh khyh, thuasalama nyalang nae nyh cih,” a cipya.
43013008	Piter nynh amaw kha, “Nang nynh ka ccu kharyh nae sing lan khyh!” a cipya. Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang kha kae sing khyh ze, nang tuh kamaw te na sekuh bua lan khyh,” a cipya.
43013009	Simon Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, ka ccu kyalya thua leite ka kuih te ka lu kha mah yn sing bia,” a cipya.
43013010	Jesu nynh, “Tui phe singkuh vae paw ccungccaw tuh khaleih phe thyaa vae zah a ccu kyalya nynh sing aho vae; te nanning tuh na thyaa vae oh, thuasalama nae balynte tuh na thyaa khyh oh,” a cipya.
43013011	Pawccecize hung nynh amaw kha yn phee cih cipaw phe a ny vae; tukeiccu nynh, “Nae balynte tuh na thyaa khyh oh,” a ci.
43013012	Te mih ccu`ae kha phe a sing koute, a uccaw kha lawkuh zah bua a dahung, te, “Nanning kya ka cyi paw hynh na nyh oh tou?
43013013	Nanning nynh kamaw hynh Ccangpatu cite, Bawipaw cite nae ko oh; te na ho oh paw tuh akyhpaw nynh thua, pawccecize kae tuh ka thua sasaw.
43013014	Oute nae Bawipaw te Ccangpatu ka thua pite, kae nynh nae ccu`ae kha kae singpya oh ze, nanning mah lukheit te lukheit nae ccu`ae na singpyaku oh aho.
43013015	Pawccecize nanning kya ka cyi hawte nanning nynh mah na cyibua oh ccaw cite dosuinku lanpaw phe kae pyasya vae oh.
43013016	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, see tuh a bawipaw laeze lehua khyh, saw paw ccungccaw mah a sawtupaw laeze lehua khyh.
43013017	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh na nyh oh zah na cyi oh lanze nanning tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh.
43013018	“Nanning balynte asekuh lante ka ho khyh, ka po`ae paw kha ka ny`ae, thuasalama Ccathyaa accing nawlan, ‘Kamaw ryte sanlou a aekheih paw nynh kamaw kha rawsete a ccu yn hangnua,’ cikuh paw Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh thua.
43013019	Tuh-e he yn cyiku vae ze kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw nae zyn nawlan oh, kha-e acyiku maw atu nanning kae hopya oh.
43013020	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ka saw paw lehkhan paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kha yn lehkhan; te kamaw yn lehkhan paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a lehkhan paw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
43013021	Jesu nynh tuhte he a ho koute, a muisaw a lungvawsaw zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning laku-e lukheit nynh kamaw hynh yn ah cih,” cite ccaekiakhan zah a ho.
43013022	Oute zuitu`ae tuh lukheit te lukheit dokuh`ae zah hung vema a honuathe cite a tuakuh`ae.
43013023	Zuitu`ae laku Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw lukheitpaw tuh Jesu by kya phang a ngeikuh.
43013024	Tukeiccu hung vema a honuathe cipaw kha a khia ccaw cite Simon Piter nynh kha-e paw kha syntawnaw a pya.
43013025	Oute Jesu by kya a ngeikuh paw nynh, “Bawipaw, aning tuh hungmou athua?” cite Jesu kha a khia.
43013026	Jesu nynh, “Aning tuh sanlou paekia kha moh he ka dung te ka pya cih paw ccungccaw nynh athua,” cite a khung. Te sanlou paekia kha moh dung zah kha-e kha Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria kha a pya.
43013027	Te sanlou paekia kha Judas nynh a lawkuh koute Setan nynh a lungkhu lang a tee vae. Te Jesu nynh, “Na cyi paw kha arangte cyih,” a cipya.
43013028	Pawkeiccumou e bya hynh kha-e paw kalan a ho cipaw kha ccaboi kya a ae`ae paw laku lukheit nynh sanmah nyh khyh`ae.
43013029	Pawccecize Judas Iskaria tuh phua bu a ccytu thua keiccuze, Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Poi kya ah hanlan ahopaw uccaw`ae kha la re,” a cipya, tukhyhze ryachi`ae kha ccangkhakheit a pya ccaw cite nynh, hynhte a hopya cite abang nynh a tua`ae.
43013030	Oute Judas Iskaria tuh sanlou paekia kha he a lawkuh koute vaekheihmawte po a pou; tuh-e ccyh tuh khuazi nynh thua.
43013031	Tuhte aning he a pou tuh Jesu nynh, “Atu Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh phu-esah thua vae zah Pachia mah Ccungccaw Ccapaw liate phu-esah athua vae.
43013032	Pachia tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw liate phu-esah thua ze, Pachia nynh mah aning kha amaw ccaccei kya phu-esah cih, te aro mawze Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha phu-esah cih.
43013033	“Ccaaw taraw`ae, kae tuh nanning ryte sosoh taraw nynh ka um cih. Nanning nynh kamaw kha nae ccung cih oh, te, ‘Ka ccianaw lang nanning nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ cite Jew`ae kha ka hopya vae`ae hawte, atu nanning mah kae hopya oh.
43013034	“Nanning lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh. Kae nynh nanning kae sungsah oh hawte nanning mah lukheit te lukheit na sungsaku nawlan oh athawpaw kawpyapaw kha nanning kae pya oh.
43013035	Nanning nynh lukheit te lukheit sungsakunaw na hoi oh ze, kha-e liate ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nanning tuh kamaw zuitu`ae cipaw ae nyh cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
43013036	Simon Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, teilangmou na cceih cih?” cite a khia. Jesu nynh, “Ka ccianaw lang atu nang nynh nae zui kho lan khyh, thuasalama nyalang nang nynh nae zui cih,” cite a khung.
43013037	Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, pawccemou atu nang kae zui kho lan khyh? Na hanlan ka hiinnaw ka pyakuh cih,” a cipya.
43013038	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ka hanlan na hiinnaw tuh na pyakuh cih tou? Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya, nang nynh kamaw hynh vaethung nae vua cia awkhungpaw yn khua la lan khyh.
43014001	“Nae thinlung vawsaw nan sah, Pachia kha zyn oh lah kamaw mah oun zyn oh.
43014002	Ka Paaw inn kya umnaw khaan patae a um; a um khyh lanze um khyh cipaw phe kae hopah vae cih oh. Nanning hanlan umnaw paccyn khylan ka la cceih cih.
43014003	Te kae nynh ka cceih zah nanning hanlan umnaw he kae paccyn vae ze, bua kae thua cih zah nanning kha kamaw kalan kae hoeibua cih oh, ou khate kamaw ka umnaw kya nanning mah na umbua ccaw oh.
43014004	Te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw na nyh oh zah ccianaw kha na ny oh,” a ci.
43014005	Thomas nynh, “Bawipaw, teilang nynh na ccia cipaw kae nyh khyh, te pawtemou ccianaw tuh kae nyh kho cih?” a cipya.
43014006	Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh laanpi byaccing te hiinnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw leite tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Paaw kalan thua kho khyh.
43014007	“Nanning nynh kamaw hynh phe nae ny oh ze, ka Paaw kha mah phe na nyh cih oh paw; te atu kyate Paaw kha na nyh oh zah amaw kha phe na muih vae oh,” a ci.
43014008	Filip nynh, “Bawipaw, Paaw kha kaening oun muihsah lah tuh-e tuh kaening hanlan azaw vae,” a cipya.
43014009	Jesu nynh, “Nanning ryte kae tuh khaw cia ka um vae, te kamaw hynh nae nyh loh khyh oh tou Filip? Kamaw phe yn muih vae paw ccungccaw tuh Paaw kha mah phe a muih vae; te pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Paaw kha kaening oun muihsah,’ na cipaw tuh?
43014010	Kae tuh Paaw kya ka um zah Paaw tuh kamaw kya a um cipaw hynh na zyn khyh tou? Nanning kalan ka hopaw bya`ae hynh kamaw kaw te ka ho khyh, thuasalama kamaw kya a um paw Paaw nynh ryalaw a lah.
43014011	Kae tuh Paaw kya ka um cipaw te Paaw tuh kamaw kya a um cipaw hynh oun zyn oh, tukhyh zemah kha-e ryalaw`ae keiccu kamaw hynh oun zyn oh.
43014012	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh ka cyi paw ryalaw`ae kha a cyihbua cih; te hynh-e`ae lae alepaw ryalaw kha mah a cyi cih; pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih.
43014013	Te Paaw tuh Ccapaw kya phu-e a ccou nawlan nanning nynh ka min te nae ngia oh paw miakaw kha kae cyipah cih oh.
43014014	Nanning nynh ka min te ccangkhakheit nae ngia oh ze, nae ngia oh paw kha kae cyipah cih oh.
43014015	“Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh ze ka kawpyapaw`ae hynh zui oh.
43014016	Te kae nynh Paaw kha kae ngia cih zah aning nynh ccangpaw Pangkhaetu kha nanning ae pya cih oh, ou tuhte aning tuh nanning ryte zungzae a um ccaw.
43014017	Aning tuh byaccing nysatupaw Muisaw nynh thua, tuh-e Muisaw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh ccou kho khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize amaw kha muih khyh`ae zah nyh khyh`ae; thuasalama nanning nynh amaw kha na ny oh, pawccecize aning tuh nanning ryte um zah nanning kya a um cih.
43014018	Ngawraw`ae hawte nanning kha kae cciataw lan khyh oh; nanning kalan bua kae thua cih.
43014019	Sosoh acih koute laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw hynh oun muih vae lan khyh`ae, thuasalama nanning nynh tuh nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka hiin, nanning mah na hiinbua cih oh.
43014020	Tuh-e nin kya kae tuh ka Paaw kya ka um paw te nanning kamaw kya na um oh paw, te kae nanning kya ka um paw kha nanning nynh nae nyh cih oh.
43014021	Ka kawpyapaw`ae kha hoi zah kha-e`ae a zui paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sungsahpaw nynh thua, te kamaw yn sungsahpaw kha ka Paaw nynh a sungsah cih, te kae nynh mah ka sungsah cih zah kamaw kha a kalan ka muihsakuh cih,” a ci.
43014022	Iskaria athua leipaw, ccangpaw Judas nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, namaw kha laephi ccungccaw`ae muihsaku leite pawcihtemou kaening kha nae muihsakuh vae cih?” a cipya.
43014023	Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw yn sungsah lanze, ka bya`ae kha a ngae cih; te ka Paaw nynh amaw kha a sungsah cih, te kaening nynh amaw kalan kae thua cih zah amaw ryte umnaw kae raekuh cih.
43014024	Kamaw yn sungsah leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh ka hopaw bya kha ngae khyh, te na thae oh paw bya hynh kamaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw kya-e nynh thua.
43014025	“Nanning ryte phang ka um lya hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh nanning kae hopya vae oh.
43014026	Thuasalama ka min liate Paaw nynh yn saw lanpaw Pangkhaetu, Thyaa Muisaw nynh pawpaw balyn ae ccangpah cih oh zah nanning kae hopya oh paw miakaw kha ae liathuisah cih oh.
43014027	Daenaw nanning kya kae cciatawpya oh, ka kya-e daenaw kha nanning kae pya oh; laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a pya`ae hawte nanning kae pya khyh oh. Nae thinlung vawsaw nan sah lah ri mah rih nan sah.
43014028	“ ‘Kae ka la cceih cih zah nanning kalan bua kae thua cih,’ cite kae hopya oh paw kha phe na thae vae oh. Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh ze, ‘Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,’ ka ci keiccu tuh nae lungtua cih; pawccecize ka Paaw tuh kae laeze a lesaehua.
43014029	Te kha-e he yn cyiku vae ze, nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, kha-e acyiku maw atu nanning kha phe kae hopya vae oh.
43014030	Atu koute kae tuh nanning ryte bya patae ka ho vae lan khyh, pawccecize hynh-e laephipi uktupaw tuh yn thua cciamang, tuhzemah aning nynh kamaw kya pawsang mah kaw hoi khyh.
43014031	Thuasalama kae nynh Paaw kha ka sungsah cipaw te, Paaw nynh kamaw kha kaw yn pya thyhhawte kae nynh ka cyi cipaw kha laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a ny nawlan`ae nynh thua. Thokuh oh, e kyate cceih ccavae oh sih.
43015001	“Kae tuh misu ku ccaccing nynh ka thua, te ka Paaw tuh khokhu dooihtupaw nynh thua.
43015002	Kamaw kya athae thae leipaw aran miakaw kha aning nynh phya bae kou, te athae thae paw aran miakaw kha houh a thae nawlan teihpah zah a ccikanpya.
43015003	Kae hopya oh paw bya liate atu nanning tuh na thyaa vae oh.
43015004	Kamaw kya tyn oh lah kae mah nanning kya ka tyn cih. Aran nynh misu ku kya atyn khyh lanze amaw te amaw athae thae kho khyh hawte, nanning mah kamaw kya na tyn khyh oh ze na thae kho lan khyh oh.
43015005	“Kae tuh misu ku, nanning tuh aran`ae; kamaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh kae mah amaw kya ka tyn, kha-e paw tuh athae patae thae; pawccecize kamaw leite nanning nynh pawsang na cyih kho khyh oh.
43015006	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh kamaw kya atyn khyh lanze aning tuh aran hawte ccaring vua athua, te karae arou; khahtahawpaw aran`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh suelua`ae zah maee lungkhu lang moh phung`ae, te maee nynh pung a u.
43015007	Nanning nynh kamaw kya na tyn oh zah ka bya`ae nynh nanning kya atyn ze, na ry oh paw kha nae ngia cih oh zah kha-e kha nanning hanlan cyipya athua cih.
43015008	Nanning nynh athae patae na thae oh liate ka Paaw tuh phu-esah athua, ou tuhte nanning tuh ka zuitu`ae na thua cih oh.
43015009	“Paaw nynh kamaw kha yn sungsah hawte nanning kha kae sungsah oh; ka sungsanaw kyahin tyn oh.
43015010	Kae nynh ka Paaw kawpyapaw`ae kha ka zui zah a sungsanaw kya ka tyn hawte nanning nynh ka kawpyapaw`ae hynh na zui oh ze ka sungsanaw kya na tyn cih oh.
43015011	Nanning kya ka lungtuanaw a um nawlan te nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh kae hopya oh.
43015012	Ka kawpyapaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, kae nynh nanning kae sungsah oh hawte nanning mah lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh.
43015013	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh a ban`ae hanlan a hiinnaw pyakupaw, hynh-e lae ale huapaw sungsakunaw tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah hoi khyh.
43015014	Kaw kae pya oh paw miakaw kha nanning nynh na cyi oh ze nanning tuh ka ban`ae nynh na thua oh.
43015015	Atu te nanning hynh see`ae kae ci vae khyh oh; pawccecize see nynh tuh a bawipaw nynh a cyi paw kha nyh khyh; thuasalama nanning kha ka ban`ae kae ci vae oh; pawccecize ka Paaw kyate ka thae paw balyn kha nanning kalan marya kae nysah oh.
43015016	Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae pokuh khyh oh; thuasalama kae nynh nanning kha kae po oh; te nanning nynh na cceih oh zah athae na thae nawlan oh, te nanning nae thae tuh atyn nawlan, te nanning nynh ka min te Paaw kya-e na ngiaku oh paw miakaw aning nynh ae pya nawlan oh nanning kha kae khang vae oh.
43015017	Nanning lukheit te lukheit na sungsaku nawlan oh hynh-e`ae hynh kaw kae pya oh.
43015018	“Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning kha ae hua oh ze, nanning kha ae hua maw oh khe kamaw kha oun hua`ae cipaw la nyh oh.
43015019	Nanning tuh laephipi kya-e na thua oh ze, laephipi nynh amaw kya-e tuh a sungsah cih; thuasalama nanning tuh laephipi kya-e na thua khyh oh keiccu, te kae nynh laephipi kyate phe kae po vae oh, tukeiccu nynh laephipi nynh nanning kha ae hua oh.
43015020	‘See tuh a bawipaw laeze lehua khyh,’ cite kae hopya oh paw ka bya kha liathui oh. Minmin nynh kamaw kha oun tua oun sah`ae ze nanning kha mah ae tua ae sah cih oh; minmin nynh ka bya kha a ngae`ae ze nanning bya kha mah a la ngae cih`ae.
43015021	Thuasalama kamaw min keiccuze minmin nynh hynh-e`ae balyn hynh nanning kalan a la cyi cih`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha nyh khyh`ae.
43015022	Kae nynh kae thua khyh zah mih kalan ka la ho khyh zetuh minmin tuh seinaw la hoi lan khyh`ae paw, thuasalama atu mih seinaw hanlan a dansaku nawlan`ae paw hoi khyh`ae.
43015023	Kamaw yn hua paw ccungccaw tuh ka Paaw kha mah a hua paw nynh thua.
43015024	Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a cyi leipaw ryalaw`ae kha minmin laku kae nynh phe ka la cyi khyh ze, minmin tuh seinaw la hoi lan khyh`ae paw, thuasalama atu minmin nynh phe muih vae`ae zah kamaw te ka Paaw kha paryh oun hua`ae.
43015025	Thuasalama, ‘Akong um leite kamaw hynh minmin nynh oun hua`ae,’ cite mih Kawbya kya azeikuh paw bya accing nawlan nynh hynh-e hynh acyikuh.
43015026	“Thuasalama Paaw kyate nanning kalan kae nynh kae saw lanpaw, Paaw kyate yn pou paw, byaccing Muisaw athua paw, Pangkhaetu tuh he yn thua vae ze, aning nynh kamaw kong kha ccaekia yn khan cih.
43015027	Te atakaw te kamaw ryte na um oh keiccuze nanning mah ccaekia na la khan cih oh.
43016001	“Nanning nae lungthang khyh nawlan hynh-e bya`ae hynh kae hopya oh.
43016002	Minmin nynh nanning kha sinakok kyate ae dee cih oh; athua, nanning ae theih oh paw ccungccaw nynh Pachia rya nynh ka law cite a tuaku ccyh tuh yn thua vae cih.
43016003	Te minmin nynh Paaw kha nyh khyh`ae zah kamaw mah oun ny khyh`ae keiccuze hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh oun cyih cih`ae.
43016004	Thuasalama accyh he yn thua te hynh-e`ae kong kha phe kae hopya vae oh cipaw nanning nynh na liathui nawlan oh hynhe` ae hynh nanning kae hopya vae oh. Te kae tuh nanning ryte ka um keiccuze atakaw lyakha hynh-e`ae hynh nanning kae hopah khyh oh.
43016005	“Thuasalama atu kamaw yn sawtupaw kalan ka cceih cih; te nanning lakuze hung nynh sanmah, ‘Teilangmou na cceih cih?’ cite kamaw hynh nae khia khyh oh.
43016006	Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae kong nanning kalan phe kae hopya vae oh keiccuze nae thinlung kya ngaethyanaw phe abeih.
43016007	Tuhzemah byaccing kha nanning kae hopya oh, nanning thanenaw hanlan ka la cceih cih; pawccecize kae nynh ka ccia khyh ze Pangkhaetu nanning kalan yn thua lan khyh, thuasalama ka ccia ze amaw kha nae kalan kae saw cih.
43016008	Te aning he yn thua te, aning nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha seinaw kong, dingnaw kong te byapianaw kong kha oun nysakuh cih`ae.
43016009	Minmin nynh kamaw kha yn zyn khyh`ae keiccuze seinaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
43016010	Kae nynh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih zah nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh keiccuze dingnaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
43016011	Hynh-e laephipi uktupaw tuh byapia athua vae keiccuze byapianaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
43016012	“Nanning kalan ho lanpaw patae ka hoi ung, thuasalama nanning nynh kha-e`ae kha atu na lawkuh kho loh khyh oh.
43016013	Tuhzemah byaccing kya-e Muisaw he yn thua te nanning kha byaccing balyn lungkhu lang ae cciakhae cih oh, pawccecize aning nynh amaw a kaw te yn ho lan khyh; thuasalama aning nynh a thae paw miakaw kha yn ho cih; te yn thua lanpaw uccaw`ae kha ae hopah cih oh.
43016014	Aning nynh kamaw kha phu-enaw yn pya cih, pawccecize aning nynh kamaw kya-e kha yn lawkuh cih zah kha-e kha nanning kalan ae hopah cih oh.
43016015	Paaw nynh a hoi paw uccaw balyn tuh kamaw kya-e cci nynh thua; tukeiccu, ‘Aning nynh kamaw kya-e kha yn lawkuh cih zah kha-e kha nanning kalan ae hopah cih oh,’ cite kae hopya oh.
43016016	“Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh; te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,” a ci.
43016017	Oute amaw zuitu`ae abang nynh, “ ‘Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh, te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,’ cite aening kalan hynh-e a ho paw hynh pawmou a hory?” cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
43016018	Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Aning nynh, ‘Sosoh cihte,’ cite hynh-e a hopaw hynh pawmou a hory? A hopaw bya hynh ah nyh khyh oh,” a ci`ae.
43016019	Minmin nynh amaw kha byakhia a ry`ae cipaw Jesu nynh phe nyh zah minmin kha, “ ‘Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh, te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh,’ cite ka hopaw kong naemaw te naemaw tou na khiakuh oh?
43016020	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning tuh nae rah nae khui cih oh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae tuh mih lungtua cih; te nanning tuh nae ngaethah cih, thuasalama nae ngaethyanaw tuh lungtuanaw lang yn tang cih.
43016021	Nopinung nynh neitangia he cci vae ze ngaethyanaw a hoi, pawccemacize amaw ccyh phe azaw vae, thuasalama imua ccahe yn pui vae tetuh a vawsawnaw kha kharyh liathui vae khyh, pawccecize laephipi kalan ccungccaw lukheit a pui paw lungtuanaw keiccu nynh thua.
43016022	Tukeiccu nynh nanning mah atu ngaethyanaw na hoi oh; thuasalama kae nynh nanning kha bua kae muih cih oh zah nae lung oun tua cih, te nae lungtuanaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san nae kyate ae lawpah lan khyh oh.
43016023	Te tuh-e nin kya nanning nynh kamaw hynh pawsang nae khia vae lan khyh oh. Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ka min te nanning nynh Paaw kalan nae ngiaku oh paw miakaw kha aning nynh ae pya cih oh.
43016024	Atu cia nanning nynh ka min te pawsang na ngia khyh oh, nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan ngia oh lah na mue cih oh.
43016025	“Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kalan tousenaw bya te nynh kae hopya oh; thuasalama nanning kalan tousenaw bya te kae hopya vae khyh oh ccyh yn thua cih, thuasalama Paaw kong kha ccaerarihlan kae hopah cih oh.
43016026	Tuh-e nin kya nanning nynh ka min te nae ngia cih oh; te nanning hanlan Paaw kalan kae ngiapah cih oh cite nanning kae hopah khyh oh;
43016027	pawccecize Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh nanning kha ae sungsah oh, pawkeiccumacize nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh zah kae tuh Pachia kyate nynh kae thua cipaw kha na zyn oh.
43016028	Kae tuh Paaw kyate kae pou zah laephipi kalan kae thua vae; laephipi kyate bua ka pou cih zah Paaw kalan ka cceih ung cih,” a cipya`ae.
43016029	A zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Dotua, atu nang tuh tousenaw bya mang vae leite ccaerarihlan nynh na ho.
43016030	Nang tuh pawpaw balyn na nyh zah hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah nang hynh byakhia ho vae khyh cipaw atu kae ny vae. Hynh-e liate nang tuh Pachia kyate nae thua paw cipaw kaening nynh kae zyn,” a cipya`ae.
43016031	Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Atu na zyn oh tou?
43016032	Dotua oh, nanning milu raveih nynh naemaw umnaw raveih lang nae phiakuh cih oh zah ka makhaete nae ccuetaw cih oh paw ccyh tuh yn cceih zah atu yn thua vae; tuhzemah kae tuh ka makhae thua khyh, pawkeiccumacize kamaw kha Paaw nynh yn umkhae.
43016033	“Nanning nynh kamaw kya daenaw na hoi nawlan oh hynh-e bya`ae hynh nanning kae hopya oh, laephipi kya nanning nynh vawsawnaw na la tung cih oh; thuasalama nae thawmuin sah; laephipi tuh phe ka tae vae,” a ci.
43017001	Hynh-e bya`ae hynh he a ho koute Jesu nynh vaawran lang dothung zah, “Apang, accyh phe azaw vae; na Ccapaw nynh namaw kha phu ae esah nawlan na Ccapaw hynh phu-esah.
43017002	Ccungccaw balyn tungvaw kya kawhoinaw kha amaw phe na pya vae hawte, nang nynh Ccapaw kalan na pya`ae paw ccungccaw miakaw kha Ccapaw nynh zungzae hiinnaw a pya nawlan Ccapaw hynh phuesah.
43017003	Te zungzae hiinnaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, ahmepaw Pachia nang kyalya te nang nynh na saw paw Jesu Kri hynh minmin nynh a ny`ae paw kha nynh thua.
43017004	Laephi vawlan namaw kha kae nynh phu phe kae esah vae; ka cyi lanpaw, nae pya paw ryalaw kha phe ka thangsah vae.
43017005	Te Pou Apang, laephipi a um mawze namaw ryte ka hoi vae paw phuenaw khate namaw ccaccei nynh atu phu yn esah.
43017006	“Laephipi kyate nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae kalan na min kha phe ka langsah vae, minmin tuh na kya-e thua`ae zah kamaw kha nae pya; minmin nynh na bya kha a ngae`ae.
43017007	Nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw balyn tuh namaw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw kha atu minmin nynh phe a ny vae`ae.
43017008	Pawccecize nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw bya`ae kha kae nynh minmin kha ka pya`ae, te minmin nynh a lawku`ae, te kae tuh namaw kyate ka thua paw cipaw phe nyh ccaccing`ae zah kae tuh namaw nynh nae saw cipaw minmin nynh a zyn`ae.
43017009	Minmin hanlan saw ka sang; laephi ccungccaw`ae hanlan saw ka sang khyh; thuasalama nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae hanlan nynh saw ka sang, pawccecize minmin tuh namaw kya-e nynh thua`ae.
43017010	Te kamaw kya-e balyn tuh namaw kya-e thua zah na kya-e tuh ka kya-e nynh thua, te minmin kya kae tuh phu-esah ka thua.
43017011	Te atu te kae tuh laephipi kya ka um vae lan khyh, thuasalama minmin tuh laephipi kya nynh um`ae, te kae tuh namaw kalan kae cceih cih. Athyaapaw Apang, aening tuh ccangkheit ah thua hawte, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ccangkheit athua nawlan`ae minmin kha namaw min kya khynsah`ae.
43017012	E laephipi kya minmin ryte ka um lyaze minmin kha na min kya ka khynsah`ae; ronaw ccapaw holeite nang nynh nae pya`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha ka khynsah`ae zah hung sanmah ka zosah khyh, ou tuhte Ccathyaa accing nawlan.
43017013	“Te atu na kalan kae cceih vae cih zah minmin nynh kamaw kya-e lungtuanaw hynh mimaw kya phe beih lang a hoi nawlan`ae hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh laephipi kya ka ho.
43017014	Na bya kha minmin phe ka pya vae`ae; te laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin kha a hua`ae, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh hawte minmin mah laephipi kya-e thua khyh`ae.
43017015	Laephipi kyate minmin hynh nang nynh na law ccaw`ae cite kae ngia khyh, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kyate minmin kha na khynsah ccaw`ae cite nynh kae ngia.
43017016	Kae tuh laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh hawte minmin mah laephipi kya-e thua khyh`ae.
43017017	Na byaccing liate minmin hynh thyaasah`ae. Na bya tuh byaccing nynh thua.
43017018	Nang nynh kamaw hynh laephipi kalan nae saw hawte kae nynh mah minmin hynh laephipi kalan ka saw`ae.
43017019	Te byaccing liate minmin mah thyaasah athua nawlan`ae, minmin hanlan kamaw te kamaw kha ka thyaasaku.
43017020	“Hynh-e`ae hanlan kyalya saw ka sang khyh, thuasalama minmin mih bya liate kamaw oun zyn cih`ae paw hanlan mah saw ka sang.
43017021	Nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a zyn nawlan`ae, Apang, nang tuh kamaw kya na um zah kae tuh namaw kya ka um hawte, minmin mah aening kya pynkheit athua nawlan`ae, minmin balyn tuh pynkheit athua nawlan`ae saw ka sang.
43017022	Te aening tuh pynkheit ah thua hawte, minmin mah pynkheit athua nawlan`ae nang nynh nae pya vae paw phuenaw kha kae nynh minmin ka pya`ae.
43017023	Minmin tuh pynkheit kya ccingsah athua nawlan`ae, kae minmin kya ka um zah nang kamaw kya na um, te nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw te nang nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah hawte minmin mah na sungsah`ae cipaw laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a ny nawlan`ae, saw ka sang.
43017024	Apang, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ka phu-enaw kha minmin nynh a muih bua ccaw`ae, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae mah ka umnaw kya kamaw ryte a umbua ccaw`ae ci ka ry, pawccecize laephipi atho mawze nang nynh kamaw hynh phe nae sungsah vae.
43017025	Pou adingpaw Apang! Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh namaw hynh ae nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama kae nynh namaw kha kae nyh zah nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw hynh-e`ae nynh a ny`ae.
43017026	Nang nynh kamaw nae sungsanawpaw sungsanaw tuh minmin kya a um nawlan, te kae minmin kya ka um nawlan, na min kha minmin kalan kae nynh phe ka nysah vae`ae zah bua ka nysah cih`ae,” a ci.
43018001	Hynh-e bya`ae hynh Jesu nynh he a ho koute, a zuitu`ae ryte Kedron vaw khuraw lang a zua`ae, tuin kya khokhu ccangkheit um zah a zuitu`ae ry tuh-e lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
43018002	Te amaw a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria mah tuh-e ahmin kha a nyh; pawccecize Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte khalang khe pei leih a tungkuh he`ae.
43018003	Oute Judas tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh oun saw`ae paw tempal ngawtu`ae te rhawkawphu phukheit kha oun cciakhae`ae zah maeekhua ry, maeeccaw ry zunghe`ae ryte khalang khe oun thua`ae.
43018004	Jesu nynh amaw tungvaw yn thua lanpaw uccaw balyn kha marya a ny keiccu cceih zah minmin kha, “Hungmou na ccung oh?” cite a khia`ae.
43018005	Minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu,” cite a khung`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua,” a cipya`ae. Te amaw a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria mah minmin ryte a thadyn bua.
43018006	Minmin kha, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua,” cite he a hopah`ae tuh, minmin tuh nuhlang thungkuh`ae zah laephi kya a khuliakuh`ae.
43018007	Oute Jesu nynh, “Hungmou na ccung oh?” cite minmin kha bua a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu nynh kae ccung,” a ci`ae.
43018008	Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua cite phe kae hopya vae oh, tukeiccu nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung oh ze, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh la cceih`ae sah,” cite a khung`ae.
43018009	“Nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae kha hung sanmah ka zosah khyh`ae,” cite amaw nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh hynhte a ho.
43018010	Oute Simon Piter nynh a ccyngkupaw thaloi kha thuakuh zah ranpibawi a seepaw kha thoh bae zah a ranglang nakua thoh pae. Tuh-e seepaw a min tuh Malkhas acikuh.
43018011	Oute Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Na thaloi kha a bu lungkhu lang sang, ka Paaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw banang tuh ka neih lan khyh tou?” a cipya.
43018012	Oute rhawkawphu`ae, rhawbawi`ae te Jew`ae kya-e tempal ngawtu`ae nynh Jesu kha kyng`ae zah a khii`ae.
43018013	Te Annas kalan masaty a cciakhae`ae, pawccecize Annas tuh tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas a zu paaw nynh thua.
43018014	Atu Kaiafas tuh ccungccaw`ae hanlan ccungccaw lukheit nynh a chi lanze ahoyhua cite Jew`ae kalan khuakhankhaetu kha nynh thua.
43018015	Te Simon Piter te ccangpaw zuitu lukheit nynh Jesu kha a zui`ae; tuh-e zuitu tuh ranpibawi lupi nynh a ny paw thua zah Jesu ryte ranpibawi lupi umnaw maepaw lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
43018016	Thuasalama Piter tuh thuakaw pe atolang khe a thadyn. Tukeiccu ranpibawi lupi nynh a ny paw tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu tuh pou zah thuakaw a ngawtu nopinung kha hopah zah Piter kha a teekhae.
43018017	Oute thuakaw a ngawtu nopinung nynh Piter kha, “Nang so hynh-e ccungccapaw zuitu`ae kyaze lukheit na thuabua khyh tou?” cite a khia. Piter nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci.
43018018	Te see`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae tuh maeehue maeetuakuh`ae zah tuin kya a thadyn`ae; pawccecize tuh ccyh lya tuh akyaa, te minmin tuh maee ekuh`ae, te Piter tuh minmin ryte thadyn zah maee ekuhbua.
43018019	Oute ranpibawi lupi nynh Jesu kha a zuitu`ae konglang te a ccangpyanaw konglang bya a khia.
43018020	Jesu nynh, “Laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan alangkuh lante phe ka ho vae; Jew`ae pynkheihlan pei leih tungkunaw`ae sinakok kya, te tempal voidu kya pei ka ccangpah`ae zah aphiru lante pawsang mah ka ho khyh.
43018021	Pawccemou kamaw hynh nae khia? Kae nynh minmin kalan paw nynh ka ho cipaw kha kamaw kya-e a thae paw ccungccaw`ae kha khia`ae; dotua, minmin nynh ka hopaw kha a ny`ae,” cite a khung.
43018022	Te tuhte he a ho tuh a pe thadyn paw tempal ngawtu lukheit nynh, “Nang nynh ranpibawi lupi kha tuhte cceih na khung ii?” cite Jesu kha a kuihphe te a bia.
43018023	Jesu nynh, “Kae nynh ahoy leipaw ka ho ze ahoy khyhnaw kong ccaekia yn langsapah; thuasalama ahoypaw ka ho ze pawccemou nang nynh nae bia?” cite a khung.
43018024	Te Annas nynh Jesu kha phang a hee`ae mawte ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas kalan a ky.
43018025	Tuh ccyh lya Simon Piter tuh thadyn zah maee a ekuh. Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Nang mah amaw zuitu`ae kyaze lukheit na thuabua khyh tou?” cite a khia`ae. “Ka thua khyh,” cite Piter nynh bua a ci.
43018026	Piter nynh a nakua thoh pae lang a bae paw, vaeccaw athua paw ranpibawi see`ae lukheit nynh, “Nang tuh Jesu ryte khokhu kya na um oh paw kha kae muih khyh ngaw ii?” a ci.
43018027	Oute Piter nynh bua a ei, te vaekheihmawte awkhungpaw a khua.
43018028	Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha Kaiafas kyate Byapianaw Khaan lang a cciakhae`ae; te tuh ccyh tuh awkhua takaw nynh thua, te mimaw tuh Kawtaw Poi toobua lan a nouku`ae pawte phe kae thusei cih cite Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang teebua khyh`ae.
43018029	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh minmin kalan toikuh zah, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw tungvaw paw seibenaw mou na hoi oh?” a ci.
43018030	Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh ccungccahoy leipaw athua khyh lanze na kalan kaening nynh kae ah lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43018031	Oute Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Amaw hynh nanning nynh lawkuh oh lah nae kawbya thyhte amaw kha byapia oh,” a cipya`ae. Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh, “Kaening tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah chianaw kaw kae hoi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
43018032	Tuhte a ho`ae paw tuh, Jesu nynh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh amaw kha ka chih vae cih cipaw a muihsah paw, Jesu nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
43018033	Oute Pilat tuh Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang bua tee zah Jesu kha ko zah, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite a khia.
43018034	Jesu nynh, “Hynh-e bya hynh namaw lungte na ho paw tou? Tukhyhze mingccang`ae nynh tou kamaw kong hynh nang ae hopah`ae?” cite a khung.
43018035	Pilat nynh, “Kae tuh Jew paw lukheit ka thua tou? Na ccungccaw`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh nang kha kamaw kalan ae ah`ae, nang nynh pawmou phe na cyi?” cite a khia.
43018036	Jesu nynh, “Ka peenaw tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e thua khyh, ka peenaw tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e athua ze kae tuh Jew`ae kalan ah ka thua khyh nawlan ka ccungccaw`ae nynh rhaw phe oun tukpah cih`ae; thuasalama atu ka peenaw tuh hynh-e kya thua khyh,” cite a khung.
43018037	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh siapharan tou na thua?” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Siapharan nynh ka thua cipaw na ho latu. Byaccing kalan ccaekiakhan khylan kae tuh kae pui zah hynh-e khylan nynh laephipi kalan kae thua. Byaccing te asekuhpaw ccungccaw miakaw nynh ka bya hynh a ngae,” cite a khung.
43018038	Pilat nynh, “Byaccing tuh pawmou?” cite a khia. Te hynh-e a ho koute Pilat tuh Jew`ae kalan bua cceih zah minmin kha, “Amaw nynh a cyiseimenaw kharyh ka muih khyh.
43018039	“Thuasalama Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw lukheit kha nanning kalan kae luesahpya he oh paw aphung kha na hoi oh; tukeiccu Jew`ae Siapharanpaw hynh nanning kalan kae luesahpya oh ze na ry oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
43018040	Oute minmin balyn nynh, “Hynh-e paw kae luesah ry khyh, thuasalama Barabbas nynh kae luesah ry,” cite bua sia`ae. Tuh-e Barabbas tuh damiah nynh athua.
43019001	Oute Pilat nynh Jesu kha lawsah`ae zah liarue te a buasah`ae.
43019002	Te rhawkaw`ae nynh hingpaw lukhung kha khepah`ae zah a lu vawlan khungsah`ae, te minmin nynh sekakungpaw boeikhua kha a tungvaw zingsah`ae zah
43019003	“Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” a ci`ae. Te minmin nynh mih kuih te amaw kha a bia`ae.
43019004	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh bua toikuh zah, “Dotua oh, amaw kya cyiseimenaw kharyh ka muih khyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny nawlan oh amaw hynh nae kalan kae cciakhae,” a cipya`ae.
43019005	Oute Jesu tuh hingpaw lukhung khungkuh zah sekakungpaw boeikhua zingkute yn pou. Te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “E ccungccapaw hynh la do oh!” a cipya`ae.
43019006	Tukeiccu alepaw ranpibawi`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae nynh Jesu kha he muih`ae tuh, “Amaw kha khiade oh, amaw kha khiade oh!” cite a sia`ae. Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh amaw hynh lawkuh oh lah khiade oh, kae tuh amaw kya cyiseinaw kharyh ka muih khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43019007	Jew`ae nynh, “Kaening nynh kawbya ccangkheit kae hoi, te kae kawbya liate aning tuh chi lan accan, pawkeiccumacize aning nynh amaw te amaw kha Pachia Ccapaw a ciku,” cite a khung`ae.
43019008	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh houh a rih.
43019009	Te Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang bua tee zah Jesu kha, “Nang hynh paw kyate mou nae thua?” cite a khia. Thuasalama Jesu nynh kaw kheit san khung khyh.
43019010	Oute Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Kamaw kalan bya na ho khyh tou? Kae tuh nang khiadenaw kaw te luesanaw kaw ka hoi paw hynh na nyh khyh tou?” a cipya.
43019011	Jesu nynh, “Vaaw langte nang hynh kawpya athua khyh ze nang nynh ka tungvaw kya paw kaw sanmah na hoi kho khyh, tukeiccu nang na kalan kamaw yn ah paw ccungccaw tuh ale huapaw seinaw a hoi,” cite a khung.
