43019012	Te tuin ccyh kyate tho zah Pilat nynh Jesu kha luesanaw a ccung; thuasalama Jew`ae nynh, “E ccungccapaw hynh nang nynh na luesah lan thua ze, nang tuh Sizar banpaw na thua khyh; hunghung zemah amaw te amaw siapharan lang a tangsakuhpaw tuh Sizar kha rawsete bya ho paw nynh thua,” cite a sia`ae.
43019013	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh Jesu kha poukhae zah Hebru bya te Gabbatha cikuh zah, ‘Lungphae’ a ci`ae paw, byapianaw tungkhung kya a dahung.
43019014	Te tuh-e ccyh tuh Kawtaw Poi hanlan paccynnaw nin thua zah suimilan taruhnaw loukaw nynh thua, te Pilat nynh Jew`ae kha, “Nae Siapharanpaw hynh dotua oh!” a cipya`ae.
43019015	Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw kha poukhae oh, amaw kha poukhae oh, amaw kha khiade oh!” cite a sia`ae. Pilat nynh, “Nae Siapharanpaw tuh ka khiade cih tou?” cite a khia`ae. Alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh, “Sizar laelan kaening siapharan kae hoi khyh!” cite a khung`ae.
43019016	Tukeiccu Pilat nynh Jesu kha khiade khylan rhawkaw`ae kalan a ah. Te minmin nynh Jesu kha lawkuh`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
43019017	Te Jesu tuh a vaelantung puihkute ‘Luru hmin’ a ci`ae paw ahmin kalan a cceih, tuh-e hmin tuh Hebru bya te ‘Golgotha’ cikuh.
43019018	Tuin kya minmin nynh Jesu kha ccangpaw ccungccaw luning ryte a khiade`ae, te a voilang lukheit a ranglang lukheit, Jesu tuh angaelaku nynh a um.
43019019	Te Pilat nynh ccawtawpya paw ccangkheit zei zah vaelantung vawlan khe a taw. Ccawtawpya paw kya azeikuh paw tuh, “JEW`AE SIAPHARAN, NAZARETH PAW JESU,” ci nynh thua.
43019020	Oute hynh-e ccawtawpya paw hynh Jew`ae patae nynh a ria`ae. Pawccecize Jesu a khiadenaw`ae ahmin tuh khua kyate anaekuh, te tuh-e ccawtawpyapaw tuh Hebru bya, Greek bya, Latin bya te zei athua.
43019021	Oute Jew`ae kyaze alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh Pilat kha, “ ‘Jew`ae Siapharanpaw,’ cite zei nan, thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh Jew`ae Siapharan nynh ka thua,’ a ci, cite zei,” a cipya`ae.
43019022	Pilat nynh, “Phe ka zei vae paw tuh phe ka zei vae,” cite a khung`ae.
43019023	Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha he a khiade`ae koute a uccaw`ae kha lawkuh`ae zah zung pali lang phia`ae zah lukheit ze zungkheit cci te a neeku`ae, te a angkiccua kha mah a khah`ae; tuh-e angkiccua tuh asuikunaw um leite alu te alia cia akuakuhpaw nynh thua.
43019024	Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “E tuh phia nan oh sih, thuasalama hungmou a ccou cih cipaw ccungthy dung oh sih,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae. Tuh-e tuh, “Minmin nynh ka uccaw kha a neeku`ae, te ka uccaw kya minmin nynh ccungthy a dung`ae,” cite Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw accing nawlan nynh thua. Tukeiccu nynh rhawkaw`ae nynh hynhte a cyi`ae.
43019025	Tuh ccyh lya Jesu vaelantung pe khe Jesu a nung, a nung neitanung, Kleofas zu Meri, te Meri Magdalin a thadyn`ae.
43019026	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh a nung te amaw nynh a sungsahpaw zuitu a thadyn`ae paw kha he a muih tuh, a nung kha, “Nopinung, na ccapaw kha la do!” a cipya.
43019027	Oute zuitu kha, “Na nung kha la do!” a cipya. Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kyate tuh-e zuitu nynh a nung kha amaw a inn lang a cciakhae.
43019028	Hynh-e koute, pawpaw balyn tuh atu marya accing vae cipaw Jesu nynh nyte, Ccathyaa accing nawlan, “Ka tuihaw,” a ci.
43019029	Te tuin kya ariapaw misutui phe beihpaw lungre zungkheit a um, te minmin nynh phuesi tungkheit kha ariapaw misutui lungkhu lang moh dung`ae zah hyssop aran kya hede`ae zah Jesu a mung kalan a nungde`ae.
43019030	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh ariapaw misutui kha a lyatua koute, “Athang vae,” a ci; te a lu tuh ting zah a muisaw kha a ah vae.
43019031	Tuh-e nin tuh Paccynku Nin thua zah awkhualan Sabbath nin tuh nin lesaepaw athua keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh michi rhua`ae kha Sabbath nin kya tuh vaelantung vawlan phang a um vae khyh ccaw cite, mih ccu`ae kha khyasah lan te mih rhua`ae kha law athua ccaw cite Pilat kha a ngiaku`ae.
43019032	Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah Jesu ryte a khiade`ae paw lukheitpaw ccu kha a khya`ae, te ccangpaw ccu kha mah a khya`ae.
43019033	Thuasalama minmin nynh Jesu kya he thua`ae tuh phe chih vae cipaw kha muih`ae zah a ccu kha khya vae khyh`ae.
43019034	Thuasalama rhawkaw`ae kyaze lukheit nynh a naw kya ccoi te thuin zah chii te tui palou a pou.
43019035	Te kha-e a muih paw ccungccaw nynh ccaekiakhan, te a ccaekia tuh ahme, te nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh aning nynh a hopaw tuh ahme cipaw kha aning nynh a ny.
43019036	Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae acyikupaw tuh, “Amaw a ru ccangkheit san khya thua lan khyh,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh thua.
43019037	Te ccangpaw kya Ccathyaa nynh, “A thuin`ae paw ccungccapaw kha ccungccaw`ae nynh oun do cih`ae,” bua a ci.
43019038	Te hynh-e koute, Jew`ae rawri keiccu aphiru lante Jesu zuitu athua paw, Arimathia khua paw Josef nynh Jesu rhua kha lawku lan Pilat kha a ngiaku, te Pilat nynh a ua. Tukeiccu aning nynh cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a lawku.
43019039	Te langmaw lya khuazi Jesu kalan a thua paw Nikodemas mah pound zakheit loukaw aripaw mura te aloe a pydekuhpaw mynkhuhpaw kha yn ccyng zah tuhlang yn thuabua.
43019040	Oute minmin nynh Jesu rhua kha laah`ae zah Jew`ae rhuaccykunaw phung thyhte, mynkhuhpaw ryte boei nebaleihpaw te a rhua kha a lung`ae.
43019041	Atu Jesu a khiadenaw`ae hmin kya khokhu ccangkheit a um, te tuh-e khokhu kya ccungccaw lukheit san a ccynaw boi loh lei`ae paw athawpaw shaw ccangkheit a um.
43019042	Jew`ae Paccynku Nin athua keiccu te shaw tuh anae keiccu tuin kyakhe Jesu rhua kha minmin nynh a ccy`ae.
43020001	Lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw, phang amoh ung lyakhe Meri Magdalin tuh shaw kalan yn thua zah a fu`ae paw lung kha shaw kyate phe a nuekuh paw kha a muih.
43020002	Oute Meri tuh ccue zah Simon Piter te Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw ccangpaw zuitu kalan thua zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw rhua kha shaw kyate phe a law vae`ae, te paw kya nynh amaw kha a nung`ae cipaw kae nyh khyh,” a cipya`ae.
43020003	Tukeiccu Piter te tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu tuh thokuh`ae zah shawku kalan a cceih`ae.
43020004	Te mih luning te paryh ccue`ae zah ccangpaw zuitu nynh Piter kha po thoih zah shaw kalan masaty a thua.
43020005	Te baling zah a do tuh nebaleihpaw boei phang a um paw kha a muih, tuhzemah a lungkhu lang tee khyh.
43020006	Oute Simon Piter tuh yn dekuh bua zah yn thua, te shaw lungkhu lang po tee zah uccaw rawpaw amaw te phang a um paw kha a muih.
43020007	Te a lu henawpaw pavua tuh nebaleihpaw boei ryte pynkheihlan um leite a makhaete phang bikuh paw kha a muih.
43020008	Oute shaw kalan masaty a thua paw, tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu mah teebua zah a muih tuh a zyn.
43020009	Pawccecize aning tuh a chih`ae paw kyate bua a tho hahe cih cipaw Ccathyaa kha minmin nynh la nyh loh khyh`ae.
43020010	Oute zuitu`ae tuh mimaw mih inn lang bua a ki`ae.
43020011	Thuasalama Meri tuh shaw atolang khe rawte phang thadyn, te a rah lalia lante baling zah shaw lungkhu lang a do.
43020012	Te Jesu rhua a ccynaw`ae kyakhe, a lu lang lukheit, a ccu lang lukheit, vaaw ccungccaw`ae luning nynh arawpaw uccaw lawkute a dahung`ae paw kha a muih.
43020013	Te minmin nynh Meri kha, “Nopinung, pawccemou na raw?” a cipya`ae. Meri nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh ka Bawipaw kha phe a law vae`ae, te pawkya nynh a nung`ae cipaw ka ny khyh keiccu nynh ka raw,” cite a khung`ae.
43020014	Te tuhte aning nynh he a ho koute, nuhlang khe maeleihkuh zah Jesu a thadyn paw kha a muih, tuhzemah Jesu nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh.
43020015	Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, pawccemou na raw? Hungmou na ccung?” a cipya. Meri nynh khokhu ngawtupaw vosi cite tua zah amaw kha, “Bawihaepaw, hynh-e kyate amaw kha phe na cciakhae vae thua ze, teisangmou na nung kamaw hynh beih yn hopah lah kae nynh amaw kha ka lawkuh cih,” a cipya.
43020016	Jesu nynh, “Meri!” cite a ko. Meri nynh maeleihkuh zah amaw kha, “Rabboni!” a ci, (tuh-e tuh Ccangpatu cipaw nynh thua).
43020017	Jesu nynh, “Yn tung nan hin, pawccecize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka kaethung loh khyh, thuasalama ka neitaw`ae kalan la cceih lah, kae tuh ka Paaw te nanning nae Paaw, ka Pachia te nanning nae Pachia kalan ka kaethung cih cipaw kha minmin kha la hopah`ae,” a cipya.
43020018	Meri Magdalin nynh cceih zah Bawipaw kha phe ka muih vae cipaw, te Bawipaw nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh ka kalan yn hopya cipaw kha zuitu`ae kalan a hopya`ae.
43020019	Oute lonaw kyaze masaty nin athua paw tuh-e nin kya zete he athua tuh, Jew`ae rawri keiccuze zuitu`ae pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae kya thuakaw`ae kha pung he a khaw`ae tuh, Jesu yn thua zah angaelaku khe thadyn zah minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah,” a cipya`ae.
43020020	Te tuhte he a ho te, a kuih te a naw kha minmin kalan a muihsah`ae. Oute zuitu`ae nynh Bawipaw kha he muih`ae tuh mih lungtua.
43020021	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah; ka Paaw nynh kamaw hynh yn saw hawte, nanning kha kae saw oh,” bua a cipya`ae.
43020022	Te hynh-e he a ho koute, Jesu nynh minmin tungvaw hysaw zah, “Nanning nynh Thyaa Muisaw hynh mue oh;
43020023	nanning nynh ccungccaw lukhakheit seinaw`ae kha na ngaethya oh ze, mih seinaw`ae tuh ngaethya athua, nanning nynh lukhakheit seinaw`ae kha na tynsah oh ze, mih seinaw`ae tuh phang atyn,” a cipya`ae.
43020024	Thuasalama luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw Didymas cikuh paw Thomas tuh Jesu a thua lya zuitu`ae ryte umbua khyh.
43020025	Tukeiccu ccangpaw zuitu`ae nynh, “Kaening nynh Bawipaw kha phe kae muih vae,” cite a hopya`ae. Thuasalama aning nynh, “A kuih kya-e thingkhia vaemaw ka muih khyh ze, thingkhia vaemaw lungkhu lang ka kuihdung te ka putua khyh ze, a naw lungkhu lang ka kuih te ka putua khyh ze ka zyn lan khyh,” a ci.
43020026	Te nin tarya acih koute a zuitu`ae tuh inn lungkhu lang bua um`ae zah Thomas mah minmin ryte a umbua, thuakaw`ae tuh phang khawkuh pite Jesu yn thua zah angaelung khe thadyn zah, “Daenaw nanning kya um sah,” a ci.
43020027	Oute aning nynh Thomas kha, “Na kuihdung kha hynhlang yn putua lah ka kuih`ae hynh dotua, te na kuih kha hynhlang yn dyng lah ka naw lungkhu lang putua, te zyn leite um nan, thuasalama zyn ccavae,” a cipya.
43020028	Te Thomas nynh, “Ka Bawipaw te ka Pachia,” cite amaw kha a khung.
43020029	Jesu nynh, “Thomas, nang tuh kamaw hynh nae muih keiccuze na zyn, kamaw hynh yn muih leite a zyn`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
43020030	Te hynh-e ccauh kya azeikuh leipaw ccangpaw muihsanaw`ae patae kha mah Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae mitmuihnaw kya a langsaku ccaccing.
43020031	Thuasalama Jesu tuh Kri, Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cipaw nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, te tuhte na zyn oh zah amaw min liate nanning nynh hiinnaw na hoi ccaw oh cite nynh hynh-e`ae tuh zei athua.
43021001	Hynh-e`ae koute Tiberias rili pe khe Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kalan amaw te amaw kha bua a langkuh, te a langkupaw tuh hynhcihte nynh athua:
43021002	Simon Piter te Didymas cikuh paw Thomas, te Galilee pee Kana khuapaw Nathania, te Zebedi ccaaw`ae, te ccangpaw a zuitu`ae luning pynkheihlan la um`ae.
43021003	Simon Piter nynh minmin kha, “Ngasaw kyng lan ka cceih cih,” a cipya`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kaening mah kae cceihbua cih,” a ci`ae. Minmin tuh cceih`ae zah kohlung lungkhu lang vaekheihmawte a tee`ae, te kha-e khuazi tuh zawkheit san kyng khyh`ae.
43021004	Thuasalama khua he yn dae tuh Jesu tuh varan langkhe phang thadyn; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh Jesu nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh`ae.
43021005	Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka ccaaw oh, ae lanpaw ccangkhakheit san na hoi oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kae hoi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
43021006	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kohlung ranglang khe mia kha vua oh lah na kyng cih oh,” a cipya`ae. Tukeiccu minmin nynh mia kha vua`ae zah ngasaw eih lung keiccu mih mia kha sue kho vae khyh`ae.
43021007	Tukeiccu Jesu nynh a sungsah paw tuh-e zuitu nynh Piter kha, “E tuh Bawipaw nynh thua,” a cipya. Tukeiccu Simon Piter nynh Bawipaw nynh thua cipaw he a thae tuh avawlan e angki kha kikuh zah, (pawccecize ryalaw lya angki phe phaeku), rili lungkhu lang a sakuh bung.
43021008	Te ccangpaw zuitu`ae tuh ngasaw`ae kha mia ryte oun dungbia`ae zah kohlung taraw te oun thua`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh varan langte eih sawkuh khyh`ae, dung zaning loukaw nynh a sawkuh`ae.
43021009	Varan lang he oun thua`ae tuh tuin kya maeehue maee-e, te kha-e vawlan ngasaw ruakuh paw, te sanlou kha a muih`ae.
43021010	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu na kyng oh paw ngasaw abang kha oun cciakhae oh,” a cipya`ae.
43021011	Simon Piter nynh kohlung kalan kae zah alepaw ngasaw zakheit sungpangaw zawthung te phe beihpaw mia kha varan langkhe a dung, te ngasaw patae aci zemah mia tuh pae khyh.
43021012	Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rang oh lah awkhua looh hynh oun ae oh,” a cipya`ae. Bawipaw nynh athua cipaw kha a ny`ae keiccu zuitu`ae kyaze hung nynh sanmah, “Nang hungmou na thua?” cite khia ngan vae khyh`ae.
43021013	Oute Jesu nynh yn thua zah sanlou kha laah zah minmin kha a pya`ae, tuhhawte ngasaw kha mah a pya`ae.
43021014	Hynh-e tuh Jesu a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui koute a zuitu`ae kalan amaw a langkupaw vaethungnaw nynh thua.
43021015	Awkhua looh kha a ae`ae koute Jesu nynh Simon Piter kha, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, hynh-e`ae nynh oun sungsah`ae laeze kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite a khia. Simon nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuutaw`ae kha looh la dang`ae,” a cipya.
43021016	Jesu nynh, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaeningnaw bua a khia. Simon nynh amaw kha, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuu`ae kha la dooih`ae,” a cipya.
43021017	Jesu nynh, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaethungnaw bua a khia. Bawipaw nynh, “Kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaethung cia a khia keiccu Piter a thinlungccih. Te Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, nang tuh pawpaw balyn marya na ny, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuu`ae kha looh la dang`ae.
43021018	Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya, na no lya tuh namaw te namaw na cciakuh cih zah na rynaw lang na cceih cih, thuasalama he nae taw vae tetuh na kuih`ae kha na zo cih zah ming`ae nynh ae hede cih`ae zah na ry leinaw lang ae cciakhae cih`ae,” a cipya.
43021019	Jesu nynh hynh-e a hopaw tuh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh Piter nynh Pachia kha phu yn esah cih cipaw a langsapya paw nynh thua. Te hynhte he a ho koute, Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
43021020	Oute langmaw lya zerya aenaw kya Jesu by kha ngeikuh zah, “Bawipaw, nang ae phee cih paw tuh hungmou?” cite a khiatu, Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw zuitu mah yn zuiku bua paw kha Piter nynh maeleihkuh zah a muih.
43021021	Kha-e paw kha Piter nynh he a muih tuh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, hynh-e paw so pawcihte athua cih?” cite a khia.
43021022	Jesu nynh, “Kamaw kae thua cia aning kha ka umsah ry ung ze, nang te pawmou asekuh? Nang tuh kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
43021023	Oute hynh-e bya tuh uteno`ae laku kya, “Tuh-e zuitu tuh chih lan khyh a ci,” cite athaan; thuasalama aning tuh chih lan khyh cite Jesu nynh a kalan ho khyh, thuasalama, “Kamaw kae thua cia aning kha ka umsah ry ung ze, nang te pawmou asekuh?” cite rou nynh a ho.
43021024	Hynh-e`ae kong ccaekiakhan paw tuh tuh-e zuitu thua zah hynh-e`ae kong a zeitu nynh thua, te a ccaekia tuh ahme cipaw kaening nynh kae ny.
43021025	Te Jesu nynh a cyi paw ccangpaw uccaw mah patae a um ung, kha-e`ae kha khaleih zei athua ze, zeinaw lanpaw ccauh`ae kha laephipi nynh heize ccung kho lan khyh cite nynh ka tua. Amen.
44001001	-
44001002	Pou Theophilas, Jesu nynh a popaw locceihtu`ae kalan Thyaa Muisaw liate kaw a pya`ae koute, amaw lawthung athua nin cia, a cyi paw te a ccangpyapaw balyn kha langmaw lya-e ccaw kya phe ka zei vae.
44001003	A teing koute kha-e locceihtu`ae kalan khe a sei kho leipaw ccaekia`ae patae te amaw a hiinnawpaw kong kha a langsapya`ae, nin sungpali cia minmin nynh a muih`ae, te Pachia peenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha a hopya`ae.
44001004	Te locceihtu`ae ryte pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah minmin nynh Jerusalem kyate a pou khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama Paaw kya-e Byakinpyakupaw kha a ngaw nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya`ae. “Tuh-e tuh, nanning nynh ka kyate phe na thae vae oh;
44001005	pawccecize Johan nynh tui kya baptisma a insah ccaccing`ae, thuasalama nanning tuh atu te nin patae aro maw Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma-insah nae thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae paw kha nynh thua.
44001006	Tukeiccu locceihtu`ae nynh pynkheihlan he sueluakuh`ae tuh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, atu lyahin nang nynh peenaw kha Israel`ae kalan bua na pyathui cih`ae tou?” cite a khia`ae.
44001007	Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Paaw nynh amaw kawhoinaw kya a nung paw ccyh te kumvaelori tuh nanning nynh ny ho khyh.
44001008	Thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw nanning tungvaw he yn thua te nanning nynh thungnaw kha nae mue cih oh; te nanning tuh Jerusalem kya, Judea ram balyn kya, Samaria ram kya te laephi adianaw kyacia kamaw ccaekia`ae na la thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
44001009	Te hynh-e bya`ae he a ho koute minmin nynh a do`ae cciamang lyakhe Jesu tuh lawthung thua zah maeking nynh minmin mitmuihnaw kyate amaw kha zya a law.
44001010	Khahte lawthung athua paw Jesu kha locceihtu`ae nynh vaawran lang riri a do`ae cciamang lyakhe ccungccaw luning nynh arawpaw uccaw kha lawkute minmin pe khe oun thadyn`ae.
44001011	Te kha-e`ae nynh, “Galilee ccungccaw`ae, pawccemou nanning nynh vaawran langkhe na dothung oh? Hynh-e paw Jesu, nanning kyate vaawran lang lawthung athua paw na muih oh hawte ou khahcihte bua yn thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
44001012	Oute minmin tuh Jerusalem kyate Sabbath ninkheit laanccia asawpaw Oliv cikuh paw mua kyate Jerusalem lang a ki`ae.
44001013	Te minmin nynh he thua`ae tuh Piter, James, Johan, Andru, Filip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthai, Alfeas ccapaw James, Simon Zelot, te James neitaw Judas tuh a thuanaw`ae inn palung khaan langkhe a kaethung`ae.
44001014	Hynhe` ae balyn tuh Jesu a nung Meri te a neitaw`ae ry, nopi`ae ryte lunglokute sawsangnaw kya thawte a pyakuh`ae.
44001015	Te tuh-e ccyh kya milu lante zakheit lukuin loukaw acih`ae paw zuitu`ae laku Piter nynh thadyn zah,
44001016	“Uteno`ae, Jesu a kyng`ae paw kha a cciakhaetu Judas konglang Thyaa Muisaw nynh David khalang kyate a hoty paw Ccathyaa hynh accing aho.
44001017	Pawccecize aning tuh aening ryte riabua thua zah hynh-e Pachia ryalaw hynh a muebua.
44001018	“Atu kha-e paw nynh cyiseimenaw amee te laekua sang kheit a re; te a lutabing lante ccahbung zah a vue ngaelung te phae paw zah a ring balyn pung toikuh.
44001019	Te tuh-e kong Jerusalem kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh pung a ny`ae, tukeiccu mimaw mih bya te kha-e laekua kha, ‘Akeldama,’ a ci`ae, asuilan tuh, ‘Chii laekua,’ cipaw nynh thua.
44001020	“Pawccecize Sam ccauh kya hynhte azeikuh: ‘Aning umnaw hmin tuh ccungccaw um leinaw lang tangsah lah hung ccungccaw nynh san khe kya um nan sah’; te, ‘Amaw ryalaw kha mingccangpaw nynh lawkuh sah,’ cite azeikuh.
44001021	-
44001022	“Tukeiccu Johan nynh baptisma insahnaw kyate tho zah Jesu tuh aening kyate lawthung athua nin cia, Bawipaw Jesu nynh aening laku tee zah pou te a um ccyh lya, aening ryte po a mungkuh bua`ae paw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kyaze lukheit tuh amaw thothuinaw kong ho lan aening ryte ccaekia athua hahe aho,” a ci.
44001023	Te minmin nynh ccungccaw luning, Jastas cite minphu`ae paw Barsabas cite a ko`ae paw Josef te Matthias kha a po`ae.
44001024	Te minmin nynh, “Ccungccaw balyn thinlung a nyhtu, Bawipaw, nang nynh hynh-e luning`ae kyaze hungmou na po cipaw oun langsapakuh cite sawsang`ae.
44001025	Ou khate Judas nynh amaw ungnaw lang ccia khylan cyiseimenaw liate phe a ccuetaw paw hynh-e ryalawnaw te locceihtuthuanaw kha na popaw ccungccaw nynh a muebua ccaw,” cite sawsang`ae.
44001026	Te minmin nynh ccungthy kha dung`ae zah ccungthy tuh Matthias nynh a mue; te aning tuh locceihtu luhaw laekheit ryte riabua athua vae.
44002001	Te Pentikos nin he thua tuh minmin balyn tuh ahmin sang kheit kya pynkheihlan pung a um`ae.
44002002	Te myarya arupaw khise hawte roi ccangkheit tuh vaawran langte vaekheihmawte tuin kya yn thua zah minmin a umnaw`ae kha-e inn kyakhe phe abeih.
44002003	Te maee lo zah akuekuhpaw lae`ae tuh minmin kya oun langkuh zah milu raveih tungvaw kya accah.
44002004	Te minmin balyn tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih`ae zah Muisaw nynh honaw a pya`ae thyhhawte minmin nynh ccangpaw bya te a ho`ae.
44002005	Te tuh-e ccyh lya vaawran zakaw um paw minphuin miakaw kyaze Pachia kalan a pyakuh`ae paw Jew`ae tuh Jerusalem kya a la um`ae.
44002006	Tuh-e roi tuh he accae te ccungccaw zapi tuh pynkheihlan oun thua`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh a ho`ae paw kha mimaw mih bya raveihte a thae`ae keiccuze mih ngaeangthua.
44002007	Te minmin balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua, mih khuaruaru zah, “Dotua oh, hynh-e`ae balyn tuh Galilee bya a ho`ae paw thua khyh`ae tou?
44002008	Te pawcihtemou aening nynh ah puikhae oh paw ahmaw bya raveihte ah thae oh paw tuh?
44002009	Parthian`ae, Medes`ae, Elamit`ae te Mesopotamia ram kya, Judah ram kya, Kapadosia ram kya, Pontas ram kya, Asia ram kya,
44002010	Frikia ram kya, Pamfilia ram kya, Izip ram kya, te Libia ram kya, Sirene pepan kya um`ae paw te Rom ram kya-e mikhia`ae, Jew`ae te beiknaw kalan a tee thaw`ae paw,
44002011	Kretan`ae te Arab`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya`ae hynh aening nynh ahmaw bya te ah thae oh paw tuh khuaruaru lan um paw Pachia ryalaw nynh athua,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
44002012	Tukeiccu minmin balyn tuh mih khuaruaru, mih ngaeangthua zah, “Hynh-e hynh paw suilan mou?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
44002013	Ccungccaw abang nynh, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh athawpaw misutui te nynh phe bia`ae,” cite sarisarya lante a ci`ae.
44002014	Thuasalama Piter nynh luhaw laekheit ryte thadynte a roi saw zah minmin a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Judah ccungccaw`ae, nanning te Jerusalem kya na um oh paw nae balynte hynh-e hynh nyh oh lah ka bya hynh oun ngaepya tua oh.
44002015	Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh nanning nynh na tua oh hawte rui khyh`ae, pawccecize atu tuh awkhua suimilan ccangthungnaw rou nynh acih ung.
44002016	Thuasalama hynh-e tuh profeh Joel nynh a la hosyapaw kha nynh athua. A ho paw tuh:
44002017	‘Pachia nynh, nyathya nin kya hynhcihte yn cyikuh cih, minphuin balyn tungvaw kya ka Muisaw kha ka bu cih; te nae ccapaw`ae te nae ccanung`ae nynh profehbya ho cih`ae, te nae ccangvae`ae nynh vizin oun muih cih`ae, te nae pawpi`ae nynh maan oun sah cih`ae.
44002018	Tuh-e ccyh kya ka seepaw`ae te ka seenung`ae tungvaw ka Muisaw ka bu cih zah minmin nynh profehbya ho cih`ae.
44002019	Te luki lang vaawlui kya ngaeangnaw ka langsah cih zah akaw lang laephi vawlan chii, maee te maeekhuh muihsanaw`ae ka langsah cih.
44002020	BAWIPAW kya-e alesaepaw te ri lan umpaw nin a thua maw khuanin tuh mohnaw lang tang cih zah sawpaw tuh chii lang yn tang cih.
44002021	Te ou tuhcihte hunghung zemah BAWIPAW min a ko paw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih,’ a ci.
44002022	“Israel ccungccaw`ae, hynh-e bya`ae hynh ngaetua oh; naemaw nynh mah na ny oh hawte, Nazareth paw Jesu tuh nanning laku kya Pachia nynh nawccawkhaepaw ccungccaw nynh thua, amaw liate nynh nanning laku kya Pachia nynh ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw`ae, khuaruarunaw`ae te muihsanaw`ae kha a langsaku.
44002023	Pachia kya-e nytynaw te paccynty paw khuakhannaw liate Jesu tuh ah athua, nanning nynh na kyng oh zah kawbya zui lei`ae paw kuih te na khiade oh zah phe na chia oh.
44002024	Aning tuh chinaw kya-e ccinaw nynh phang kyngde lan athua kho khyh keiccuze kha-e ccinaw kyate Pachia nynh supah zah amaw kha phe a thosah vae.
44002025	Pawccecize amaw konglang te David nynh a hopaw tuh: ‘Ka mitmaevaw kya BAWIPAW kha pei ka muih, pawccecize kae ka pia khyh nawlan aning tuh ka ranglang kya a um.
44002026	Tukeiccu ka thinlung a lungpaw zah ka lae tuh a lungtua; tuhlaeze ka ngesaw mah ngaehoinaw kya a hae-ung cih.
44002027	Pawccecize nang nynh ka hiinnaw-muisaw kha Hades kya na nungsya lan khyh zah, namaw kya-e Athyaapaw kha mah na thuhsah lan khyh.
44002028	Nang nynh kamaw kha hiinnaw laanpi phe nae nysah vae. Na umnaw kya kamaw kha lungtuanaw te phe nae biasah cih,’ a ci.
44002029	“Uteno`ae, ciihan kyaze paaw athua paw David kong hynh rhawhoyte kae hopya tua oh, David tuh chih zah u athua, te a shawku tuh aening kya atunin cia phang a um.
44002030	Aning tuh profeh athua keiccu, pynsaw lante amaw ciihan lungkhu te Kri kha Pachia nynh yn thosah cih zah amaw suitungkhung vawlan dahungsah lan amaw kya Pachia nynh byakankupaw byakan kha phe a ny.
44002031	Hynh-e hynh muihty te, Kri thothuinaw kong kha, a muisaw tuh Hades kya cciataw thua khyh, a ngesaw nynh mah thuhnaw kha muih khyh, cite a ho.
44002032	Hynh-e Jesu hynh Pachia nynh phe thosah vae, hynh-e konglang kaening balyn tuh ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.
44002033	Tukeiccu aning tuh Pachia ranglang khe hangthung thua vae zah byakinpyakupaw Thyaa Muisaw kha Paaw kyate phe mue vae zah atu nanning nynh na muih oh zah na thae oh paw hynh-e hynh phe a bu vae.
44002034	-
44002035	“Pawccecize David tuh vaawran lang kae khyh; thuasalama David nynh amaw a hokupaw tuh: ‘ “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia cia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” cite BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha a cipya.’
44002036	“Tukeiccu nanning nynh na khiade oh paw Jesu ccaccei kha Pachia nynh Bawi lang te Kri lang phe a rae vae cipaw kha Israel minphuin balyn nynh ccaerarihlan nyh oh,” cite Piter nynh a ci.
44002037	Atu hynh-e bya kha minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih bung kya sua`ae zah Piter te ccangpaw locceihtu`ae kha, “Uteno`ae, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
44002038	Oute Piter nynh minmin kha, “Nae seinaw ngethya athua nawlan, ngaesikuh oh lah nanning milu raveihte Jesu Kri min kya baptisma-in oh, ou khate Thyaa Muisaw lasung kha na mue cih oh.
44002039	Pawccecize byakinpyakupaw tuh nanning hanlan, nanning nae ccaaw`ae hanlan te asaw lang um`ae paw kya ah Bawipaw Pachia nynh a ko`ae paw balyn hanlan nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
44002040	Te ccangpaw bya patae te ccaekiakhan zah, “Thinlung kyh leipaw hynh-e ciihan kyate khumnaw muebua oh,” cite thawte a hy`ae.
44002041	Oute a bya kha lungtuate a lawkuh paw ccungccaw`ae tuh baptisma-in`ae; te tuh-e nin kya ccungccaw thungthung loukaw biachih athua.
44002042	Te minmin tuh locceihtu`ae ccangpyanaw kya te vaeccawkunaw kya, sanlou ianaw kya te sawsangnaw kya tynkaring lang po a umbua`ae.
44002043	Te ccungccaw miakaw nynh rinaw a hoi`ae, te ngaeangnaw patae te muihsanaw`ae kha locceihtu`ae nynh a langsaku`ae.
44002044	Te a zyn`ae paw balyn tuh pynkheihlan um`ae zah pawpaw balyn kha a hoikheih`ae.
44002045	Te mih hoi paw te mih uccaw`ae kha zua`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw kalan ahobou thyhte a nee`ae.
44002046	Te minmin tuh tempal kya nin takyh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah inn kheit koute inn kheit sanlou iathungku te, thinlung pynkheit te, lungtuate mih looh kha leih a ae`ae.
44002047	Pachia kha thehoysah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae balyn malang maehoynaw kha a mue`ae. Te Bawipaw nynh khumnaw mue`ae paw kha nin takyhte kriccawbu kalan a biachih.
44003001	Zete suimilan ccangtakuanaw sawsang ccyh lyakhe Piter te Johan tuh tempal kalan pynkheihlan a cceihthung`ae.
44003002	Te a nung vue kya mawte a ccukhoupaw ccungccapaw lukheit kha oun puih`ae; tempal lungkhu lang a tee`ae paw kha bawngnaw ngiaku khylan ‘Puithya’ acikuh paw sakoih pe khe kha-e paw kha nin takyh leih a nung`ae.
44003003	Tempal lungkhu lang tee lan cih vae`ae paw Piter te Johan kha kha-e paw nynh he a muih tuh, ‘Yn pyabua oh’ cite a ngiaku`ae.
44003004	Te Piter nynh Johan ryte kha-e paw kha rirido zah, “Kaening hynh oun dotua,” a cipya.
44003005	Te aning nynh minmin kyate ccangkhakheit ka mue vae cih cite ngaehoite minmin kha a do.
44003006	Oute Piter nynh, “Phua te sui ka hoi khyh; thuasalama ka hoi paw kha nang kae pya; Nazareth paw Jesu Kri min te thokuh lah cceih,” a cipya.
44003007	Te a ranglang kuih te kyng zah a tho; te vaekheihmawte a ccu te a ccukhilua ru`ae tuh thawzung a mue`ae.
44003008	Te aning tuh thohkuh zah a thadyn, te cceih zah minmin ryte tempal lungkhu lang a tee`ae; laanpi cciate, thohkute Pachia kha thehoysah.
44003009	Tuhte cciabiate Pachia thehoysah te a um paw kha ccungccaw balyn nynh a muih`ae.
44003010	Te minmin nynh aning tuh tempal voidu kya Puithya Sakoih zung khe bawngnaw ngiaku lan leih dahung paw nynh athua cipaw kha a nyh`ae, te amaw kya acyikuh paw kong kha mih khuaruaru zah mih ngaeangthua.
44003011	Te dansah athua vae paw ccukhoupaw nynh Piter te Johan kyakhe phang a bekuh tuh ccungccaw balyn nynh myarya ngaeangthua te mih kalan Solomon maepaw acikuh paw maepaw langkhe pynkheihlan a ccue`ae.
44003012	Te kha-e kha Piter nynh he a muih tuh ccungccaw`ae kha, “Israel ccungccaw`ae, nanning pawccemou hynh-e hynh nae ngaeangthua? Hynh-e paw hynh kaening nynh kaemaw thungnaw te, Pachia phe kae zyn keiccuze kae cciasah khopaw hawte nanning nynh kaening hynh pawccemou raerae nae do oh?
44003013	Abraham, Isaak te Jakob Pachia, ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh a Ccapaw Jesu kha phu-esah vae; kha-e Jesu kha nanning nynh Pilat kalan na ah oh zah aning nynh saw lan he a noukuh tuh nanning nynh amaw kha saw lan phe na ei oh.
44003014	Thuasalama nanning nynh Athyaapaw te Adingpaw kha na vua oh zah ccungccaw theihtupaw kha nae kalan sawpya lan na ngiaku oh.
44003015	Te hiinnaw Bawipaw kha nanning nynh na chia oh, kha-e Bawipaw kha Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate phe a thosah vae, ou kha-e konglang kaening tuh ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.
44003016	Te Jesu min zynnaw liate, tuh-e amaw min nynh na muih oh zah na ny oh paw hynh-e paw hynh a thawsae sah. Athua, amaw kyate mue paw zynnaw nynh nanning balyn malang hynh-e paw hynh accingpaw dannaw kha a pya.
44003017	“Te atu mah, uteno`ae, nanning ae uk oh paw uktu`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte nanning nynh mah na ny khyh oh keiccu nynh na cyi oh cipaw ka ny.
44003018	Thuasalama Kri tuh a teing cih cite langmaw lya Pachia nynh a profeh`ae balyn khalang kyate a langsaty paw kha, hynhte a ccingsah paw nynh thua.
44003019	Tukeiccu Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kyate thawzung thawsanaw ccyh yn thuasah nawlan, nae seinaw khawsungpya athua nawlan te,
44003020	nanning hanlan a khang vae paw Jesu Kri kha Pachia nynh yn saw nawlan ngaesikuh oh lah lung paleihkuh oh.
44003021	Laephipi thotakaw te amaw kya-e athyaapaw profeh`ae khalang kyate Pachia nynh a hosyapaw uccaw balyn bua nungthuinaw a thua mawlaezung vaawran nynh kha-e Kri kha a lehkhan cih.
44003022	Pawccecize Mawsi nynh ah minpaaw`ae kalan, ‘BAWIPAW nae Pachia nynh nae uno`ae kyate kamaw yn lopaw Profeh lukheit kha nanning hanlan yn pousah cih. Aning nynh nanning kalan a hopaw miakaw kha na la ngae cih oh.
44003023	Te ou tuhte kha-e Profehbya a ngae leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw ccungccaw`ae laku kyate khaleih ro athua cih,’ a cipya`ae.
44003024	“Athua, profeh Samuel kyate tho zah amaw koute a ho paw profeh`ae balyn nynh mah a la ho`ae hawte hynh-e nin`ae kong hynh a hoty`ae.
44003025	Nanning tuh profeh`ae ccaaw nynh na thua oh; te Pachia nynh Abraham kalan, ‘Na ciihan kyate laephi kya-e minphuin balyn nynh hythuaccou cih`ae,’ cite a hopaw, ah minpaaw`ae ryte a rae paw byakin te asekuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
44003026	Nanning milu raveih nynh cyiseinaw kyate na paleihku oh paw kya, nanning kha hythuapya khylan, Pachia nynh a Ccapaw Jesu kha thosah zah masaty nanning kalan yn saw,” cite Piter nynh a hopya`ae.
44004001	Te locceihtu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kalan a hopya`ae lyakhe ranpibawi`ae, tempal ngawtu`ae te Sadusi`ae tuh oun thuabua`ae zah,
44004002	locceihtu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha ccangpah`ae zah Jesu liate a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kong a ho`ae keiccuze myarya mih lungvaw a saw.
44004003	Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah tuhlya khuazi vae keiccuze minmin kha awkhualan cia thunginn kya a nung`ae.
44004004	Tuhzemah mih phunghopaw kha a thae paw ccungccaw patae nynh a zyn`ae; tuhte a zyn`ae paw tuh milu lante thungpangaw loukaw acih`ae.
44004005	Ou tuhte awkhualan he athua tuh uktu`ae, piccang`ae, te kawbya ccangpatu`ae,
44004006	te ranpibawi lupi Annas, te Kaiafas, Johan, Alexanda te ranpibawi ciihan`ae balyn tuh Jerusalem kya pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae.
44004007	Te minmin nynh Piter te Johan kha angaelung kya nung`ae zah, “Paw thungnaw te mou, tukhyhze hung min liate mou nanning nynh hynh-e hynh na cyi oh?” cite a khia`ae.
44004008	Oute Piter tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw uktu`ae te Israel piccang`ae nanning,
44004009	a cyikuh kho leipaw ccungccapaw hanlan rae paw ahoypaw ryalaw keiccu, pawcihte nynh aning tuh a dan cipaw keiccu, atunin kaening tuh akaw-aleih bya nae khia oh athua lanze;
44004010	nanning nynh na khiade oh zah Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Nazareth paw Jesu Kri min liate, amaw liate nynh hynh-e ccungccapaw tuh nanning malang ngedan te a thadyn cipaw hynh nanning balynte Israel ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nyh oh.
44004011	Hynh-e tuh, ‘Nanning inn saktu`ae nynh na nue oh paw lung, aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang paw kha nynh thua.’
44004012	Mingccangpaw kya khumnaw kharyh um khyh; pawccecize Jesu min laelan aening oun khum kho lanpaw vaawran zakaw ccungccaw`ae laku ccangpaw min um khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44004013	Atu Piter te Johan kya-e rawthungnaw kha minmin nynh muih`ae zah minmin tuh ccawthya lei`ae, huataw ccungccaw`ae cipaw kha he nyh`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua. Te minmin luning tuh Jesu ryte po umkheih`ae paw cipaw kha bua a nythui`ae.
44004014	Te dansah athua paw ccungccapaw nynh minmin ryte phang a thadyn paw kha a muih`ae tuh rawsete pawsang ho kho vae khyh`ae.
44004015	Thuasalama locceihtu`ae kha kungsi zung kyate pou lan kaw a pya`ae koute minmin nynh mimaw laku byahokuh`ae.
44004016	“Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh pawte ah cyih cih oh? Minmin kyate raerae alangkuh paw muihsanaw kha Jerusalem kya um`ae paw balyn kalan phe langkuh vae zah aening nynh kha-e kha ah ei kho vae khyh oh.
44004017	Thuasalama kha-e kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya houh apazaeku khyh nawlan, atu te hung ccungccaw sanmah hynh-e min te a hopya vae khyh ccaw`ae minmin kha thawte ah khee ngaw oh,” cite a hokuh`ae.
44004018	Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha ko`ae zah Jesu min liate kharyh a ho khyh nawlan`ae te a ccangpya khyh nawlan`ae kawpya`ae.
44004019	Thuasalama Piter te Johan nynh minmin kha, “Pachia kawngae laeze nanning kawngae hua lanpaw tuh Pachia malang akyh cih tou, kyh lan khyh tou cipaw naemaw nynh byapia oh.
44004020	Pawccecize kaening tuh kae muih paw te kae thae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ho leite kae um kho khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
44004021	Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae tungvaw detahnaw lanpaw pawsang he muih khyh`ae tuh furawsya ki`ae zah phe a cciasah`ae. Pawccecize kha-e acyikuh paw hanlan ccungccaw balyn nynh Pachia kha thehoysah`ae keiccu nynh thua.
44004022	Pawccecize hynh-e dannaw muihsanaw a tungvaw kya alangkuh paw ccungccapaw tuh kum sungpali lae acih vae.
44004023	Te he a cciasah`ae te locceihtu`ae tuh mimaw mih phu kalan cceih`ae zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh mih kalan a hopya`ae paw balyn kha a thaesah`ae.
44004024	Te minmin nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, pynkheih lante Pachia kalan roisaw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, nang tuh vaawran te laephi te rili te kha-e kya um paw balyn a raetupaw Pachia nynh na thua.
44004025	Nang nynh na seepaw David khalang kyate, ‘Pawccemou minphuin`ae nynh mih bungpaw zah ccungccaw`ae nynh ccakaepaw uccaw kong hynh a pheeku`ae?
44004026	Laephi siapharan`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah uktu`ae nynh BAWIPAW te a Kri kha rawsete pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae,’ cite phe na hoty vae.
44004027	-
44004028	“Langmaw lya na kuih nynh cyi lan cite a paccynpaw te na eenaw nynh cyi lan a la paccyn vae paw miakaw kha cyi khylan, satho phe na thuh vae paw, athyaapaw na Ccapaw Jesu kha Herod te Pontias Pilat nynh Zenta`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae ryte e khuapi kyahin pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah a rawse`ae paw tuh thangccingpaw nynh thua.
44004029	Te pou Bawipaw, atu minmin kya-e furawnaw hynh dotua. Na bya hynh rawhoy te kae ho kho nawlan rawthungnaw oun pyabua.
44004030	Athyaapaw na Ccapaw Jesu min liate muihsanaw te ngaeangnaw`ae a langku nawlan, ngeccih dansah khylan na kuih yn dyngtua,” cite sawsang`ae.
44004031	Te minmin sawsang`ae koute pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae ahmin tuh ahy; te minmin balyn tuh Thyaa Muisaw te beih`ae zah Pachia bya kha rawhoy te a ho`ae.
44004032	Te a zyn`ae paw ccungccaw zapi tuh thinlung ccangkheit te hiinnaw-muisaw ccangkheit hoi`ae zah hung nynh sanmah a uccaw ccangkhakheit kha kamaw kya-e ci vae khyh; thuasalama pawpaw balyn kha a mangkheih`ae.
44004033	Te Bawipaw Jesu thothuinaw kong kha locceihtu`ae nynh alepipaw thungnaw te ccaekiakhan`ae zah alepipaw thawccinaw tuh minmin balyn tungvaw kya a um.
44004034	Minmin laku ahoboupaw ccungccaw hung sanmah um khyh; pawccecize laekua hoi`ae paw te inn hoi`ae paw balyn nynh kha-e`ae kha zua`ae zah, a zuanaw`ae paw amee kha oun ccyng`ae.
44004035	Locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a pung`ae; te lukhakheit hanlan ahobou thyhte ccungccaw miakaw kha a nee`ae.
44004036	Te Barnabas cite locceihtu`ae nynh minphu`ae paw, (tuh-e asuilan tuh thawzungpyanaw ccapaw cipaw), Saiparas ram e paw Levi ciihan paw Joses tuh,
44004037	a hoi paw laekua kha zua zah kha-e a zuanaw mee phua kha yn ccyng zah locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a nung.
44005001	Thuasalama Ananias cikuh paw ccungccapaw nynh a zu Sapphira ryte a hoi`ae paw laekua kha a zua`ae.
44005002	Te amee abang kha a zu mah a nyhbua lante a nungkubang. Te abang kha yn ccyng zah locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a nung.
44005003	Te Piter nynh, “Ananias, Thyaa Muisaw kha hyngpya khylan te laekua na zuanaw mee abang nungkubang khylan pawccemou Setan nynh na thinlung kha phe ae biasah?
44005004	Kha-e kha na zua maw, na kya-e thua khyh tou? Kha-e kha na zua koute namaw kaw khya khyh tou? Pawccemou na thinlung kya hynhcihte na poi? Ccungccaw`ae kha na hyngpah khyh lahyn, thuasalama Pachia lakha na hyngpya,” a ci.
44005005	Te Ananias tuh hynh-e bya he a thae tuh khuliakuh zah phe a chih; te hynh-e kong a thae`ae paw ccungccaw balyn tuh myarya a rih`ae.
44005006	Te ccangvae`ae nynh thokuh`ae zah Ananias kha ah lung`ae koute poukhae`ae zah a u`ae.
44005007	Te tuh-e koute suimilan ccangthung loukaw he aro koute a zu tuh paw nynh acyiku cipaw ny leite yn tee.
44005008	Te Piter nynh, “Laekua kha tuhzeih mawte tou na zua oh? Kamaw hynh yn hopya tua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh, “Athua, tuhzeih mawte nynh kae zua,” a ci.
44005009	Oute Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw Muisaw syntaw khylan pawcihtemou pynkheihlan nae lung aloku? Dotua, na vawpaw a uh`ae paw mih ccu tuh thuakawzung nynh a um ung, te nang kha mah ae cciakhae cih`ae,” a cipya.
44005010	Oute Sapphira tuh Piter ccu leihpaw khe vaekheihmawte khuliakuh zah phe a chih; te ccangvae`ae nynh tee`ae zah a chi paw kha he muih`ae tuh cciakhae`ae zah a vawpaw pe khe a uubua`ae.
44005011	Te hynh-e kong a thae paw ccungccaw patae te kriccawbu balyn tuh myarya a rih`ae.
44005012	Te locceihtu`ae kuih liate ccungccaw`ae laku muihsanaw`ae te khuaruarunaw`ae patae langsaku athua. Te minmin balyn tuh Solomon Maepaw kya pynkheihlan a um`ae.
44005013	Te tuhlaepaw hung ccungccaw sanmah minmin kalan pykuh bua ngan khyh`ae; thuasalama ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin kha kou a hothung`ae.
44005014	Te nopi ry, pise ry ccungccaw zapi zyntu`ae kha Bawipaw kalan houhouh biachih athua.
44005015	Piter nynh po yn ccia vae ze a mynlyh nynh san lukhakheit tungvaw kya a khaw ccaw cite ngeccih`ae kha laanpi lang oun cciakhae`ae zah ikhung te iphae vawlan a nung`ae.
44005016	A pepan e khua`ae kyate ccungccaw zapi mah Jerusalem lang oun thua`ae zah ngeccih`ae te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae nynh vawsaw pya`ae paw kha oun cciakhae`ae; te minmin balyn tuh marya dansah athua`ae.
44005017	Oute ranpibawi lupi te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw, Sadusi`ae balyn tuh thokuh`ae zah thinrianaw te phe beih`ae.
44005018	Te locceihtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah ranzae thunginn lungkhu khe a saw`ae.
44005019	Thuasalama khuazi khe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh thunginn thuakaw`ae kha hung zah minmin kha poukhae`ae zah,
44005020	“Cceih oh, tempal kya thadyn oh lah hynh-e hiinnaw bya`ae balyn hynh ccungccaw`ae kalan hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.
44005021	Te minmin nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh awkhua takaw khe tempal lungkhu lang tee`ae zah a ccangpya`ae. Thuasalama ranpibawi lupi te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw nynh oun thua`ae zah kungsi`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae kya-e piccang`ae balyn kha ko`ae zah locceihtu`ae kha mih kalan cciakhae khylan ccungccaw`ae kha thunginn lang a saw`ae.
44005022	Thuasalama tempal ringtu`ae nynh thunginn kya thua`ae zah zuitu`ae kha he muih vae khyh`ae tuh ki`ae zah,
44005023	“Thunginn tynkaringlan akhawkuh paw kha kae muih ccaccing, te thung a ngawtu`ae mah thuakaw malang atolang khe a la thadyn`ae; thuasalama thuakaw he kae hung tuh a lungkhu kya hung ccungccaw sanmah kae muih khyh!” cite a ho`ae.
44005024	Atu ranpibawi lupi, te tempal ngawtu lupi te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh kha-e kong kha he thae`ae tuh paw vema yn cyikuh cih cite mih khuaruaru.
44005025	Oute ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah, “Dotua oh, nanning nynh thunginn kya na saw oh paw ccungccaw`ae tuh tempal kya thadyn`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha a ccangpya`ae!” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
44005026	Oute tempal ngawtu lupi tuh tempal ngawtu`ae ryte cceih`ae zah locceihtu`ae kha reihi- reih-ae nung leite a cciakhae`ae; pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh lung te oun deihsei cih`ae cite a rih`ae.
44005027	Te minmin kha cciakhae`ae zah kungsi`ae malang khe a nung`ae. Te ranpibawi lupi nynh,
44005028	“Hynh-e min te na ccangpah lan khyh oh cite tyntetyn lang nanning kha kaw kae pya khyh oh tou? Te dotua oh, nanning nynh Jerusalem kya nae doctrine te phe na biasah oh zah hynh-e Ccungccapaw chii hynh kaening tungvaw thuasah lan na paccynku oh!” cite minmin kha a khia`ae.
44005029	Oute Piter te ccangpaw zuitu`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae bya laeze Pachia bya hynh kaening tuh kae ngae hua aho.
44005030	Nanning nynh thing vawlan na sae oh zah na chia oh paw Jesu kha aening ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh phe thosah vae.
44005031	Israel`ae kha ngaesikunaw te seingaethyanaw pya khylan Pachia nynh amaw kha uktu Bawi lang te Khumtu lang khang zah a ranglang khe phe a hangthung vae.
44005032	Te kaening tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae konglang a ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua; te Pachia nynh amaw kaw a ngae paw ccungccaw`ae kha a pya paw Thyaa Muisaw mah ccaekia nynh athuabua,” a ci`ae.
44005033	Tuh-e bya he thae`ae tuh mih bungpaw zah minmin kha chia lan khuakhanku`ae.
44005034	Oute ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh sawtua`ae paw, kawbya ccangpatu, Kamaliel acikuh paw, Farasipaw nynh kungsi kya thadyn zah locceihtu`ae kha atolang sosoh pousah lan kawpya`ae.
44005035	Te ccungccaw`ae kha, “Israel ccungccaw`ae nanning, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tungvaw cyi lan na paccynku vae oh paw hynh hoyte tuakuh oh.
44005036	Pawccecize anuhlang lya Theudas acikuh paw nynh thokuh zah amaw te amaw kha ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thuabua cite a pooku. Te ccungccaw zapali loukaw amaw kalan a mungkuh bua`ae. Aning tuh chia thua zah amaw kawngae`ae paw balyn tuh pung phiakuh`ae zah pawlang tang khyh`ae.
44005037	Tuh-e paw koute milu ccazing law ccyh lyakhe Judas acikuh paw Galilee paw nynh thokuh zah ccungccaw patae kha amaw nuhlang a zuisahku`ae. Aning mah phe chih zah amaw a zui`ae paw balyn mah pung phiakuh`ae.
44005038	Te atu nanning kha kae hopya oh, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh sibia oh lah mimaw um lan um`ae sah; pawccecize hynh-e khuakhannaw te hynh-e ryalawnaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya-e athua ze pawlang tang lan khyh.
44005039	Thuasalama e tuh Pachia kya-e athua lanze nanning nynh na roh kho lan khyh oh; naemaw kha Pachia rawsetu`ae lang poh nae tang sei paleih oh zya,” cite a hopya`ae.
44005040	Te tuh-e bya tuh minmin nynh mih nawccah; te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha ko`ae zah a bua`ae koute Jesu min te phung na ho vae lan khyh oh cite kawpya`ae zah minmin kha a cciasah`ae.
44005041	Locceihtu`ae tuh Jesu min hanlan maethyanaw teing lan angaekuh`ae cite oun tuabua`ae cikuh`ae zah kungsi`ae mitmuihnaw kyate lungtuate a pou`ae.
44005042	Te Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite tempal kya te inn takyh kya ccangpyanaw te phunghonaw kha nin takyh dae khyh`ae.
44006001	Te tuh-e ccyh lya zuitu`ae he a pungthung`ae tuh Helenih`ae nynh Hebru`ae kha rawsete ccohnuakunaw yn pou; pawccecize Helenih`ae mih numae`ae kha nin takyh looh pyanaw kya pyabua khyh`ae cite a ccohnuaku`ae.
44006002	Oute locceihtu luhaw laening nynh zuitu`ae patae kha ko`ae zah, “Aening nynh Pachia bya hynh cciataw te ccaboi rya hynh ah law lan oh ccan khyh.
44006003	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, Thyaa Muisaw te, hawnaw te phe beihpaw, thehoyccoupaw ccungccaw lusari kha nanning laku ccung oh, hynh-e ryalaw hanlan minmin kha ah khang oh ccaw.
44006004	Thuasalama aening tuh sawsangnaw kalan te Pachia bya ryalawnaw kalan hynh pei ah pyakuh ngaw oh,” a ci`ae.
44006005	Te tuh-e bya nynh ccungccaw zapi khaleih kha lungrythuasah. Te minmin nynh zynnaw te, Thyaa Muisaw te, phe beihpaw Stifen, te Filip, Prokhoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, te Antiok khua paw Jew beiknaw kalan a paleikuh paw Nikolas kha a po`ae.
44006006	Khae` ae kha locceihtu`ae malang a nung`ae; te locceihtu`ae nynh sawsangpah`ae zah mih kuih kha minmin tungvaw a khan`ae.
44006007	Te Pachia bya tuh pazaekuh zah zuitu`ae tuh Jerusalem kya houh pungthung`ae; te ranpibawi`ae patae pi nynh zynnaw kaw a ngae`ae.
44006008	Te Stifen tuh zynnaw te, thungnaw te, phe beihpaw thua zah myarya alepaw khuaruaru ngaeangnaw te muihsanaw kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya a langsaku.
44006009	Oute a lue`ae paw kya-e Sinakok a ci`ae paw kyate Sairenia`ae, Alexandria`ae, Silisia ram e te Asia ram e ccungccaw`ae abang nynh thokuh`ae zah Stifen ryte a eikuh`ae.
44006010	Tuhzemah Stifen nynh a honawpaw hawnaw te Muisaw kha minmin nynh khee kho khyh`ae.
44006011	Oute, “Hynh-e paw nynh Mawsi te Pachia kha alue lante bya a ho paw kaening nynh phe kae thae,” cite a ho lanpaw ccungccaw`ae kha minmin nynh aphiru lante zya a soih`ae.
44006012	Te minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae, piccang`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha a hy`ae; te Stifen kha ccianua`ae zah a kyng`ae, te kungsi zung lang a cciakhae`ae.
44006013	Te minmin nynh ahme leipaw ccaekia`ae kha konua`ae zah, kha-e`ae nynh, “Hynh-e paw nynh hynh-e athyaapaw hmin te Kawbya hynh alue lante bya pei a ho;
44006014	pawccecize, ‘Nazareth paw hynh-e Jesu nynh hynh-e hmin hynh yn roh cih zah Mawsi nynh aening oun pya paw phungbya kha yn rulae cih,’ cite hynh-e paw nynh a hopaw kha kaening nynh phe kae thae,” a ci`ae.
44006015	Te kungsi zung kya a dahung`ae paw balyn nynh Stifen kha rirido`ae tuh a mae kha vaaw ccungccapaw mae hawte a muih`ae.
44007001	Te ranpibawi lupi nynh, “Tuh-e bya`ae tuh tuhte thua tou?” cite a khia.
44007002	Te Stifen nynh, “Uteno`ae te paaw`ae, la ngaetua oh: Ah minpaaw Abraham nynh Haran kya a um maw, Mesopotamia ram kya a um lyaze phu-enaw Pachia nynh a kya langkuh zah,
44007003	‘Na umnaw ram kyate pou lah na puithua`ae kha poutaw`ae lah kae nynh kae muihsah cih paw ram kalan khe cceih,’ a cipya.
44007004	“Oute Abraham tuh Kaldian ram kyate toikuh zah Haran kyakhe a um; te tuin kyate a paaw he chih tuh atu nanning na umnaw oh hynh-e ram kalan hin Pachia nynh a nuesaku.
44007005	Te e ram kya ccuphelyh sanmah Pachia nynh amaw kha rho lang pya khyh; tuhzemah Abraham nynh ccaaw lukheit san a saah mawze amaw te a ciihan`ae hanlan e ram hynh rho lang kae pya cih cite Pachia nynh bya phe kinpyaku vae.
44007006	Te Pachia nynh hynhte a ho: A ciihan`ae tuh ram ccangpaw kya a khia a vekuh cih`ae, te minmin tuh seetangnaw kalan cciakhae athua cih`ae zah kum zapali cia ming`ae nynh a tua a sah cih`ae.
44007007	‘Te minmin seetangnaw kya a nung`ae paw minphuin kha kae nynh bya ka pia cih,’ Pachia nynh a ci; ‘ou tuhkoute minmin tuh a pou cih`ae zah hynh-e hmin kya kamaw kha rya yn lawpah cih`ae,’ a ci.
44007008	Te Pachia nynh vindung awkunaw te asekuhpaw byakinnaw kha Abraham kalan a pya. Tukeiccu Abraham nynh Isaak kha saah zah nin taryanaw kya vindung awpya, te Isaak nynh Jakob a saah, te Jakob nynh ciihan kyaze phinthonaw paaw`ae luhaw laening kha a saah.
44007009	“Te ciihan kyaze paaw`ae nynh eiungnaw hoi`ae zah Josef kha Izip ram lang a zua`ae. Thuasalama Pachia tuh Josef ryte um zah,
44007010	a vawsawnaw balyn kyate amaw kha luesah zah Izip siapharan Pharoh malang maehoynaw te hawnaw kha a pya; te Pharoh nynh Izip ram uktu lang te a innbyn balyn uktu lang Josef kha a khang.
44007011	“Oute Izip ram balyn te Kanaan ram balyn kya ccakangnaw te alepipaw vawsawnaw um zah ah paaw`ae tuh ae lanpaw hoi vae khyh`ae.
44007012	Thuasalama Jakob nynh Izip ram kya looh a um cipaw he a thae tuh ah minpaaw`ae kha masaty a saw`ae.
44007013	Te vaeningnaw kya Josef nynh a u`ae kha a nysaku`ae; te Josef puithua`ae kha Pharoh kalan a nysah`ae.
44007014	Oute Josef nynh a paaw Jakob kha byataw zah a puithua`ae balyn sungsari lu pangaw kha amaw kalan a kobua`ae.
44007015	Te Jakob tuh Izip ram lang cceihbung zah tuin kya amaw te ah minpaaw`ae tuh phe chih`ae.
44007016	Te minmin kha Shekem khua lan cciakhae`ae zah Shekem kyaze paaw athua paw Hamor a ccaaw`ae kya-e Abraham nynh phua te a re paw shawku kyakhe a ccy`ae.
44007017	“Thuasalama Pachia nynh Abraham kya byakinpyakupaw byakinnaw ccyh thuanaw he anae tuh kha-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Izip ram kya pungthung`ae zah,
44007018	Josef kha a nyh leipaw ccangpaw siapharan alangkuh cia a pungthung`ae.
44007019	Kha-e paw nynh aening ah puithua`ae kha phee`ae zah mih ccaaw taraw`ae kha a chi ccaw`ae cite ccaring na vua cih oh cite ah minpaaw`ae kha a tua a sah`ae.
44007020	“Ou tuh-e ccyh lya tuin myarya apuithyapaw Mawsi tuh pui zah a paaw inn kya sathung cia a kua`ae.
44007021	Te aning kha ccaring he vua`ae te Pharoh ccanung nynh khuinkuh zah amaw a ccapaw lang a kuaku.
44007022	Te Mawsi tuh Izip ccungccaw`ae kya-e hawnaw balyn kha marya ccangkuh zah byahonaw kya te ryalawnaw kya a thungpaw nynh thua.
44007023	“Te aning nynh kum sungpali he accing tuh Israel ccungccaw`ae a uno`ae kalan pae rynaw thinlung yn hoi.
44007024	Te a unopaw lukheit kha Izippaw nynh a tua a sah paw kha he a muih tuh pangkhaw zah a hanlan ccaeliarupya, te Izippaw kha phe a buatheih.
44007025	Te Pachia nynh minmin kha hynh-e paw kuih liate yn luesah cih`ae cipaw kha a uno`ae nynh mang a nyhthya cih`ae cite Mawsi nynh a tuaku; thuasalama minmin nynh nyhthya khyh`ae.
44007026	Te awkhualan mimaw te mimaw a pekuh`ae paw kalan khe cceih zah, ‘Ccungccaw`ae pi hynh lou, nanning tuh uteno khaw na thua oh, pawccemou naemaw te naemaw na peku oh?’ cite minmin kha a phia`ae.
44007027	“Thuasalama a innpaw paw kha atazae leite a cyihtupaw nynh Mawsi kha daetu zah, ‘Hung nynh mou nang hynh kaening tungvaw uktu lang te byapiatu lang ae khang?
44007028	Inkhawnin Izippaw na chia hawte kamaw hynh chia lan nae ry tou?’ a ci.
44007029	“Tuh-e bya kha Mawsi nynh he a thae tuh ccue zah Midian ram kyakhe mikhiapaw lang a tang, tuin kya ccapaw luning a saah.
44007030	“Te kum sungpali he aro tuh Sinai Mua kin rangkaw khe thabu kya aruapaw maeesoi kyakhe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Mawsi kalan a langkuh.
44007031	Kha-e kha Mawsi nynh he a muih tuh a ngaeangthua zah a pe lante do lan cite he a naekuh tuh Bawipaw kyate roi nynh a kalan yn ccae zah,
44007032	‘Kae tuh na minpaaw`ae Pachia, Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia te Jakob Pachia nynh ka thua,’ a cipya. Te Mawsi tuh thyngkuh zah do ngan vae khyh.
44007033	Oute BAWIPAW nynh, ‘Na phanah kha na ccu kyate khahkuh, pawccecize na thadynnaw hmin tuh athyaapaw laekua nynh thua.
44007034	Izip ram kya um`ae paw ka ccungccaw`ae kya-e vawsaw riathaenaw kha phe ka muih ccaccing vae, te minmin nynh a siaruanaw`ae paw roi kha phe ka thae vae zah minmin kha thua khylan nynh kae rungbung; atu rang lah nang kha Izip ram lang kae saw cih,’ a cipya.
44007035	“ ‘Hung nynh mou nang hynh uktu lang te byapiatu lang ae khang?’ cite minmin nynh a nue`ae paw kha-e Mawsi ccaccei kha Pachia nynh uktu lang te luesatu lang thabu kya yn langkuh paw vaaw ccungccapaw liate a saw paw nynh thua.
44007036	Aning nynh Israel ccungccaw`ae kha poukhae`ae zah Izip ram kya, Rili Se kya te rangkaw kyakhe kum sungpali lungkhu khuaruaru ngaeangnaw te muihsanaw kha a langsapya`ae.
44007037	“Tuh-e paw tuh Israel ccungccaw`ae kalan, ‘BAWIPAW nae Pachia nynh nae uno`ae kyate kamaw alopaw Profeh lukheit kha nanning hanlan yn pousah cih, amaw bya kha na ngae cih oh,’ cite a hotupaw Mawsi nynh athua.
44007038	“Aning tuh rangkaw kya pumkunaw kya thuasah, Sinai Mua kya amaw kalan bya a hopah paw vaaw ccungccapaw ryte thuasah, aening ah minpaaw`ae ryte thuasah a la um paw, aening kalan pya lanpaw ahiinpaw byaphy kha a mue paw nynh thua.
44007039	Amaw bya kha aening ah minpaaw`ae nynh la ngae khyh`ae, thuasalama phe a nue`ae. Te mih thinlung kyate Izip ram lang bua ki a ry`ae keiccu,
44007040	Aaron kha, ‘Kaening malang a cceih lanpaw pachia`ae kha kaening hanlan yn raepah; Izip ram kyate kaening oun cciakhaetupaw hynh-e Mawsi kya pawcihte nynh acyiku cipaw kae nynh vae khyh,’ cite a hopya`ae.
44007041	Te tuh-e nin kya minmin nynh vaetua tohlaw kha rae`ae zah kha-e zohtuh kalan silawkunaw a rae`ae. Mimaw mih kuih te a rae`ae paw kya mih lungpaw.
44007042	Profeh`ae ccauh kya, ‘Pou Israel ccungccaw`ae, nanning nynh rangkaw kya kum sungpali cia na chia oh paw saring`ae te silawkunaw`ae kha kamaw kalan tou nae pya oh?
44007043	Nanning nynh Moloh e bu te nae pachia Remphan kya-e awsi, beik lan na raeku oh paw azuh`ae kha phe na lawku vae oh; tukeiccu kae mah nanning kha Babilon khuapi khunglang kae cciakhae cih oh,’ cite azeikuh hawte, Pachia nynh paleihtawkuh`ae zah vaawran kya-e uccaw`ae kha beik khylan minmin kha phe a vua vae`ae.
44007044	“Mawsi nynh a muih paw pungsan thyhte ccaekia te asekuhpaw beikbuu kha na rae cih cite Pachia nynh Mawsi kha a hopya hawte, rangkaw kya ccaekia te asekuhpaw beikbuu kha aening ah minpaaw`ae nynh a hoi`ae.
44007045	Nuhlang te a thua`ae paw aening ah paaw`ae nynh kha-e beikbuu kha Zenta`ae nynh a peenaw`ae ram lungkhu lang Joshua ryte a teekhae`ae. Kha-e Zenta`ae kha Pachia nynh David she kyacia aening ah minpaaw`ae kyate a deepya`ae.
44007046	David tuh Pachia kya-e maehoynaw kha mue zah Jakob Pachia umnaw lanpaw ahmin muepya lan a peki.
44007047	Thuasalama Solomon nynh Pachia hanlan tempal kha a sak.
44007048	“Tuhzemah Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia tuh kuih te rae paw tempal kya um khyh.
44007049	“ ‘Vaawran tuh ka suitungkhung thua zah laephi tuh ka ccusynaw nynh thua; pawtahawpaw inn mou nanning nynh nae sakpah cih oh?’ BAWIPAW nynh a ci. ‘Tukhyhze ka hae-ungnaw ahmin tuh pawtahawpaw mou athua?
44007050	Hynh-e`ae balyn tuh ka kuih nynh a rae paw thua khyh tou? a ci,’ cite profeh nynh a ho hawte nynh thua.
44007051	“Lungkhung`ae zah thinlung kya te nakaring kya vindung awkuh lei`ae paw nanning! Thyaa Muisaw kha pei na rawse oh; nae minpaaw`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte nanning mah na cyibua oh.
44007052	Nae minpaaw`ae nynh hung profeh kha mou tuasah leite a nung`ae? Adingpaw Ccungccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw kong a hopaty`ae paw kha minmin nynh phe chia`ae; atu nanning tuh kha-e Adingpaw a pheetu`ae te a theihtu`ae nynh na thua oh.
44007053	Nanning tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae paccynpyanaw liate kawbya kha na mue oh zemah na zui khyh oh,” cite Stifen nynh a ci.
44007054	Minmin nynh hynh-e bya`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh mih bungpaw zah Stifen kha mih hawzynua`ae.
44007055	Thuasalama Stifen tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah vaawran langkhe riridothung zah Pachia phu-enaw te Pachia ranglang a thadyn paw Jesu kha a muih.
44007056	Te Stifen nynh, “Dotua oh, vaawran ahungkuhpaw te Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh Pachia ranglang a thadyn paw kha ka muih,” a ci.
44007057	Oute minmin nynh roi accae lante thawte sia`ae zah mih nakaring kha huhkuh`ae zah pynkheih lante Stifen kha a ccuenua`ae,
44007058	te khuapi atolang khe ccaring vua`ae zah lung te a deih`ae. Te ccaekia`ae nynh mih uccaw`ae kha Saul acikuh paw ccangvaepaw ccu leihpaw khe a pung`ae.
44007059	Te minmin nynh lung te a deih`ae lyakhe, Stifen nynh Bawipaw kha ko zah, “Bawipaw Jesu, ka muisaw hynh yn lawpah,” a ci.
44007060	Te a ccukharutung zah, “Bawipaw, hynh-e seinaw hynh minmin kya ccuinpah nan`ae,” cite roi accae lante a sia. Te hynh-e he a ho koute zya a ih vae.
44008001	Te Stifen a chianaw`ae kya Saul mah a nawccahbua. Tuh ccyh lya Jerusalem kya um paw kriccawbu kya alepipaw tuasahnaw a um; te locceihtu`ae holeite, kriccaw`ae balyn tuh Judah pee te Samaria pee kya po phiariphiarae pung a um`ae.
44008002	Te beiknaw lante a zuakuhpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Stifen kha uh`ae zah a hanlan thawmawte a raw a khui`ae.
44008003	Saul nynh tuh kriccawbu thawte ronaw kha a rae. Inn takyh lungkhu lang tee zah nopi`ae, pise`ae kha sue`ae zah thunginn kya a sang`ae.
44008004	Tukeiccu phiariphiarae um`ae paw nynh ahmin takyh lang cceih`ae zah Pachia bya kha a ho`ae.
44008005	Oute Filip tuh Samaria khuapi lang cceihbung zah Kri thehoypaw kha a hopya`ae.
44008006	Te ccungccaw zapi nynh thae`ae zah Filip nynh a langsakupaw muihsanaw`ae kha he muih`ae tuh a hopaw bya kha pynkheihlan a ngae`ae.
44008007	Pawccecize athyaa leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccaw`ae lungkhu te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tuh raerae sia`ae zah a pou`ae; te kuihccuchihpaw patae te a ccukhou`ae paw patae tuh a dan`ae.
44008008	Te tuh-e khuapi kya alepipaw lungtuanaw a um.
44008009	Thuasalama Simon acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit nynh tuh-e khuapi kya langmaw lya mitleihthyanaw la pia he zah amaw tuh alesaepaw ccungccaw nynh ka thua la cikuh zah Samaria khuapi kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha mih ngaeang la thuasah`ae.
44008010	Te adih huapaw kyate alehua paw kyacia, minmin balyn nynh amaw kalan khe mih nawtua`ae zah, “E ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kya-e alepaw thungnaw nynh thua,” cite a ho`ae.
44008011	Te mitleihthyanaw te minmin kha khaw cia mih ngaeangthuasah vae`ae keiccuze minmin nynh amaw kalan mih nawtua`ae.
44008012	Thuasalama Filip nynh Pachia peenaw konglang te Jesu Kri min kong a hopaw kha minmin nynh he a zyn`ae tuh nopi ry, pise ry baptisma-in`ae.
44008013	Oute Simon amaw mah a zyn bua vae; te baptisma-in koute Filip kya zuikuh bua zah alangkuh paw khuaruaru lan um paw ryalaw`ae te muihsanaw`ae kha muih zah a ngaeang myarya thua.
44008014	Te Jerusalem kya um paw locceihtu`ae nynh Pachia bya kha Samaria`ae nynh phe ccoubua vae`ae cipaw kha he a thae`ae tuh Piter te Johan kha minmin kalan a saw`ae.
44008015	Tuh-e`ae nynh he thua`ae tuh Samaria`ae nynh Thyaa Muisaw a ccoubua ccaw`ae cite mih hanlan sawsangpya`ae.
44008016	Pawccecize minmin tuh Bawipaw Jesu min kya kyalya baptisma-in`ae zah minmin kyaze hung tungvaw sanmah Thyaa Muisaw ccah bang loh khyh.
44008017	Oute Piter te Johan nynh mih kuih kha mih tungvaw khang`ae zah minmin nynh Thyaa Muisaw kha a mue`ae.
44008018	Te locceihtu`ae kuih khangnaw liate Thyaa Muisaw tuh mue athua cipaw kha Simon nynh he a muih tuh minmin kha phua pya`ae zah,
44008019	“A tungvaw kuih ka khang paw miakaw nynh Thyaa Muisaw a ccoubua nawlan kae mah hynh-e kawhoinaw kha yn pyabua oh,” a cipya`ae.
44008020	Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Pachia lasung tuh phua te re kho lan cite na tuaku keiccuze na phua tuh namaw ryte rohsah!
44008021	Nang tuh hynh-e kya na sekuh bua khyh; pawccecize na thinlung tuh Pachia mitmuihnaw kya hme khyh.
44008022	Tukeiccu hynh-e na hoyleinaw kong hynh ngaesikuh lah na thinlung-tuanaw kha ngaethya na thua nawlan Pachia kalan sawsangkuh.
44008023	Pawccecize nang tuh khyanaw kya-e sanyngkhaw kya te hoyleinaw kya-e seetangnaw kya nynh na um cipaw ka ny,” a cipya.
44008024	Oute Simon nynh, “Hynh-e na hopaw uccaw`ae hynh ka tungvaw kya ccangkheit san a thua khyh nawlan nanning nynh ka hanlan Bawipaw kalan saw oun sangpah bua oh,” cite a khung.
44008025	Te minmin nynh ccaekiakhan`ae zah Bawipaw bya kha he a ho`ae koute Jerusalem lang ki`ae zah Samaria`ae khua patae kya thehoypaw kha a ho`ae.
44008026	Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh Filip kha, “Thokuh lah Jerusalem kyate Gaza lang a cceihbung paw rangkaw laanpi khate alia langkhe cceihbung,” cite a hopya. Tuh-e tuh rangkaw nynh thua.
44008027	Te Filip tuh thokuh zah a cceih. Te dotua, Ethiopia siapharannung Kandas kuihkaw alepipaw kawhoinaw hoitu, siapharannung sisua balyn dooihtu tingreihkuh paw Ethiopiapaw tuh Pachia beik lan cite Jerusalem lang cceih zah,
44008028	he a ki lyakhe, amaw vaetualee kyakhe dahung zah profeh Isaiah ccauh kha a ria.
44008029	Te Muisaw nynh Filip kha, “Cceih, naekuh lah hynh-e vaetualee kalan kaebua,” a cipya.
44008030	Te Filip nynh a kalan khe ccue zah, tuh-e paw nynh profeh Isaiah ccauh a ria paw kha he a thae tuh, “Na ria paw kha nang nynh na thaethya tou?” cite a khia.
44008031	Te aning nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh yn hopya khyh lanze pawtemou kae nynh ka thaethya kho cih?” a ci. Te aning nynh Filip kha amaw ryte dahungkheih lan yn kaebua cite a ko.
44008032	Kha-e paw nynh a ria paw Ccathyaa tuh: “Sawtheihtupaw kalan a cciakhae`ae paw tuu hawte amaw kha a cciakhae`ae; te tuutaw nynh a mingngotupaw malang sia leite a um hawte aning tuh a mung kha a myh.
44008033	Zakaw a sangsakunaw kya ming`ae nynh atazae lei lante amaw kha byapia`ae; amaw hiinnaw kha laephi kyate lawpya athua keiccuze hung nynh mou a ciihan`ae kha a thaesah vae cih?” a cikuh.
44008034	Tuh-e tingreihkuh paw nynh, “Hynh-e hynh profeh nynh hungmou a honuathe? Amaw tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou a honuathe? Beih yn hopah,” cite Filip kha a khia.
44008035	Oute Filip nynh kha-e Ccathyaa khate tho zah Jesu kong kha a hopya.
44008036	Minmin nynh tuhte laanpi kya he a cceih`ae tuh tui umnaw sang kheit kya a thua`ae; te tingreihkuh paw nynh, “Dotua, hynh-e kya tui phang um; baptisma-in lan pawnynh mou kamaw hynh yn khaw?” a ci.
44008037	Te Filip nynh, “Nang nynh na thinlung balynte na zyn thua ze na in kho,” a cipya. Te aning nynh, “Jesu Kri tuh Pachia Ccapaw cipaw ka zyn,” cite a khung.
44008038	Te vaetualee kha thadyn sah lan kawpya zah minmin paryhte, Filip te tingreihkuh paw, tui lungkhu lang cceihbung`ae zah Filip nynh kha-e paw kha baptisma-in sah.
44008039	Te minmin nynh tui kyate he oun pou`ae tuh Bawipaw kya-e Muisaw nynh Filip kha po zoukhae zah tingreihkuh paw nynh muih vae khyh; te aning tuh a ccianaw laanpi kya lungtuate a cceih.
44008040	Thuasalama Filip tuh Azotas khua kyakhe langkuh zah tuin kyate Sisaria khua kyacia khua takyh kalan khe cciate thehoypaw kha a ho.
44009001	Te Saul tuh Bawipaw zuitu`ae kha rawsete furawnaw te chianaw kha hy lang sue zah ranpibawi lupi kalan khe cceih zah,
44009002	pise zemah, nopi zemah e Ccianaw kya-e lukhakheit kha a muih ze kyng lan zah Jerusalem lang cciakhae khylan cite Damaskas khua kya um paw sinakok uktu`ae kalan pya lanpaw ccaw`ae kha amaw kyakhe a ngiaku.
44009003	Te tuhte khuaccung zah Damaskas khua pe yn thua; te vaawran kyate awnaw nynh amaw po voilu lan vaekheihmawte phaephae a ah.
44009004	Te aning tuh laephi kya a khuliakuh; te, “Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah?” cite a hopah paw roi kha a thae.
44009005	Te Saul nynh, “Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?” cite a khung. Te Bawipaw nynh, “Kae tuh na tua na sah paw Jesu nynh ka thua; ccungzuing kha na sy lanze na hanlan arupaw nynh thua,” a cipya.
44009006	Te aning nynh thyngkute a ngaeangthua zah, “Bawipaw, pawmou nae cyisah ry?” a ci. Te Bawipaw nynh, “Thokuh lah khualae lungkhu langkhe cceih lah na cyi lanpaw kha ae la hopah cih`ae,” a cipya.
44009007	Te amaw ryte khuaccung`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh yccae leite a thadyn`ae, roi kha a thae`ae zemah hung ccungccaw san muih khyh`ae.
44009008	Te Saul tuh laephi kyate thokuh zah a mit he dae tuh hung sanmah muih kho vae khyh; te minmin nynh a kuih te kyng`ae zah Damaskas khua lungkhu lang a cciakhae`ae.
44009009	Te aning tuh nin thung cia ngawmuih khyh zah looh mah ae khyh, tui mah neih khyh.
44009010	Te Damaskas khua kya Ananias acikuh paw zuitu lukheit a um; Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kalan vizin kyate, “Ananias,” cite a ko. Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, dotua e kya mang ka um,” a ci.
44009011	Te Bawipaw nynh, “Thokuh lah Adingpaw cite minphu`ae paw laanpi langkhe cceih lah Judas inn kyakhe Tarsuh khua paw Saul acikuh paw kha la ccung, pawccecize aning tuh sawsang cciamang.
44009012	Ananias acikuh paw nynh yn tee zah a mit ngawmuih nawlan amaw tungvaw a kuih khang paw kha vizin kyate phe a muih vae,” a cipya.
44009013	Oute Ananias nynh, “Bawipaw, kha-e paw nynh Jerusalem kya na mithyaa`ae tungvaw hoyleinaw kha pawcih nynh a rae cipaw kha ccungccaw patae nynh a ho`ae paw ka thae.
44009014	Te na min a ko paw balyn kha kyng kho nawlan, e kya kawhoinaw kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate a mue,” a ci.
44009015	Thuasalama Bawipaw nynh, “La cceih, pawccecize aning tuh Zenta`ae, siapharan`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw min ccaekiakhan khylan kamaw nynh ka popaw uccaw nynh thua.
44009016	Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw min keiccuze pawcih nynh vawsaw teing cih cipaw kae nynh amaw kha ka langsapah cih,” a cipya.
44009017	Te Ananias tuh cceih zah inn lungkhu lang a tee; te a kuih kha Saul tungvaw khang zah, “Ka neitaw Saul, nae ccia lya laanpi kya na kalan yn langkuh paw Bawipaw Jesu ccaccei nynh, nang ngaw na muih nawlan te Thyaa Muisaw te phe na bia nawlan kamaw hynh yn saw,” a cipya.
44009018	Te vaekheihmawte Saul mit kyate ngasawkaleih akhuakuh paw hawte thua zah ngawmuih vae, te thokuh zah baptisma-in.
44009019	Te aning tuh aepaw ae zah a thaw yn sae vae. Oute Saul tuh Damaskas khua kya um paw zuitu`ae ryte nin khaw cia a umkheih`ae.
44009020	Te Paul nynh sinakok kyakhe, “Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua,” cite Kri kong kha palou a ho kanmaw vae.
44009021	Te a hopaw kha a thae paw balyn nynh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw hynh Jerusalem kya Bawipaw min te sawsang`ae paw kha a rohtu te minmin kha hee lan zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan cciakhae khylan cite hynhlang yn cceihtupaw kha thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
44009022	Thuasalama Saul tuh a thaw houhouh sae zah hynh-e Jesu tuh Kri ccaccing nynh thua cite he a ccaesah tuh Damaskas khua kya um paw Jew`ae kha mih ngaeangthuasah`ae.
44009023	Te nin patae aro koute Jew`ae nynh Saul kha chia lan cite khuakhanku`ae.
44009024	Thuasalama kha-e mih khuakhannaw kha Saul nynh phe a ny. Te minmin nynh Saul kha kae chia ccaw cite koikua kha khuazi, khuadae pei a ngaw`ae.
44009025	Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh Saul kha khuazi khe laah`ae zah sua kya phang`ae zah khua lungrua vawlan te a sawbung`ae.
44009026	Te Saul nynh Jerusalem lang he a thua tuh zuitu`ae kalan mungku bua lan a noukuh; thuasalama minmin balyn nynh aning tuh zuitu nynh athua cipaw zyn khyh`ae zah amaw kha a rih`ae.
44009027	Thuasalama Barnabas nynh amaw kha hoei zah locceihtu`ae kalan a cciakhae. Te aning nynh Bawipaw kha laanpi kya pawcihte nynh a muih cipaw, Bawipaw nynh a kalan byahopya paw te aning nynh Damaskas kya Jesu min te rawhoy te phungho cipaw kha a hopya`ae.
44009028	Te Saul tuh Jerusalem kya locceihtu`ae ryte teekheih`ae zah a poukheih vae`ae.
44009029	Te Saul nynh Bawipaw Jesu min te rawhoy te phung a ho; te Helenih`ae ryte bya a eikuh`ae; te minmin nynh Saul kha chia lan a nouku`ae.
44009030	Kha-e kha uteno`ae nynh he nyh`ae tuh Saul kha Sisaria khua lang cciakhae bung`ae zah Tarsuh khua lang a saw`ae.
44009031	Oute Judah ram, Galilee ram te Samaria ram balyn kya kriccawbu`ae tuh daenaw hoi`ae zah tynsathung athua`ae. Te Bawipaw rawrinaw kya te Thyaa Muisaw ngaengansanaw kyakhe um`ae zah a pungthung`ae.
44009032	Ou tuhcihte Piter tuh ahmin takyh kalan po khuaccung zah Luda khua kya a um paw mithyaa`ae kalan po a thua.
44009033	Te tuin kya kum tarya cia a iphae kya huekuh zah a kuihccuchihpaw Aenias acikuh paw ccungccapaw kha a muih.
44009034	Te Piter nynh, “Aenias, Jesu Kri nynh nang kha ae dansah, thokuh lah na iphae kha kuekuh,” a cipya. Te aning tuh vaekheihmawte po a thokuh.
44009035	Te Luda khua te Saron khua kya um`ae paw balyn nynh khae paw kha muih`ae zah Bawipaw kalan a paleihkuh`ae.
44009036	Joppa khua kya Tabitha acikuh nung zuitu lukheit a um; Tabitha cipaw asuilan tuh Dorkas cipaw nynh thua. Tuh-e nopinung tuh ahoypaw ryalaw te thuasah, pyanaw cyisahnaw te thuasah phe beihpaw nynh thua.
44009037	Te tuh-e nin ccyh lya aning tuh ccih zah phe a chih; tui he a sing`ae koute palung khaan kyakhe a nung`ae.
44009038	Te Luda khua tuh Joppa khua te anaekuh paw thua zah tuh-e khua kya Piter a um cipaw kha zuitu`ae nynh he thae`ae tuh Piter nynh mih kalan arangte yn ccia ccaw cite ccungccaw luning kha Piter kalan saw`ae zah a kosah`ae.
44009039	Oute Piter tuh thokuh zah minmin ryte a cceih`ae. He a thua tuh palung khaan lang a kaekhae`ae; te numae`ae balyn nynh a pe khe thadynte rah`ae zah minmin ryte Dorkas nynh a um lyaze a kua paw angki te uccaw`ae kha a muihsah`ae.
44009040	Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin balyn kha pung a pousah`ae; te ccukharutung zah sawsang. Te kha-e a rhua kalan khe maeleihkuh zah, “Tabitha, tho,” a ci. Te kha-e nung nynh a mit kha dae zah Piter kha he a muih tuh thokuh zah a dahung.
44009041	Te Piter nynh a kuih kha pya zah po a tho; te mithyaa`ae te numae`ae kha ko`ae zah a hiin vae paw kha-e nung kha a muihsah`ae.
44009042	Te kha-e kong kha Joppa khua kya po a ny`ae, te ccungccaw patae nynh Bawipaw kha a zyn`ae.
44009043	Ou tuhcihte Piter tuh Joppa khua kyakhe Simon acikuh paw saphua uccaw raetupaw ryte nin patae cia a umkheih`ae.
44010001	Sisaria khua kya Itali rhawkawphu acikuh paw kyaze rhawkaw zakheit uktu rhawbawipaw Kawnelia acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit a um.
44010002	Tuh-e paw tuh amaw inn kya um`ae paw balyn ryte Pachia kalan a zuakuhpaw te Pachia rawrihpaw thua zah ccungccaw`ae kha patae pya zah Pachia kalan tyty sawsangpaw nynh thua.
44010003	Nin kheit tuh zete suimilan ccangtakuanaw loukaw khe Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a kalan yn cceih zah, “Kawnelia!” cite a ko paw kha aning nynh vizin kya ccaerarihlan phe a muih.
44010004	Te vaaw ccungccapaw kha riri he a do tuh rih zah, “Bawipaw, e tuh pawmou?” cite a khia. Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Na sawsangnaw te ryachi`ae na bawngnawpaw tuh liathuinaw lante Pachia malang phe a thua vae.
44010005	Atu Joppa khua langkhe ccungccaw`ae kha saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kokuh.
44010006	Aning tuh saphua raetupaw Simon inn kya nynh a thua, a inn tuh rili kin nynh a um. Aning nynh na cyi lanpaw kha ae la hopah cih,” a cipya.
44010007	Te bya a hopah paw vaaw ccungccapaw he a pou koute, Kawnealia nynh a inn kya-e see`ae luning te amaw kha pei ryalawpah`ae paw kyaze Pachia kalan a zuakuhpaw rhawkapaw kha a ko`ae.
44010008	Te kha-e uccaw`ae kong balyn kha a hopah`ae koute minmin kha Joppa khua lang a saw`ae.
44010009	Awkhualan minmin tuh cceih`ae zah khua kalan he oun naekuh`ae tuh, Piter tuh suimilan ccangtaruhnaw khe sawsang khylan inn tungvaw langkhe a kae.
44010010	Te myarya a vuelaw zah aepaw a ae ry; thuasalama aepaw a dopya`ae lyakhe Piter tuh ngawphukuh zah,
44010011	vaawran ahungkuhpaw te arae sangpali kya a khii`ae paw alepipaw boeiphae alopaw uccaw tuh amaw kalan yn rungbung zah laephi kalan yn sawbung`ae paw kha a muih.
44010012	Tuh-e uccaw kya ccupali asae paw laephi kya-e rangsaw`ae phin, sarepaw`ae phin te vue te a vaw`ae paw phin balyn, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae phin a um.
44010013	Te roi ccangkheit a kalan yn thua zah, “Piter, thokuh, theih lah ae,” a cipya.
44010014	Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, thua kho lan khyh. Pawccecize huatawpaw te athyaa leipaw uccaw`ae hynh vaekheit sanmah ka ae boi khyh,” a ci.
44010015	Te vaeningnaw roi nynh, “Pachia nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw kha nang nynh huatawpaw ci nan,” a cipya.
44010016	Hynhcihte vaethung cia acyikuh koute tuhe uccaw tuh vaawran lang bua lawthung athua.
44010017	Piter nynh a muih paw vizin hynh paw suilan mou athua ngaw cite he a tuaku cciamang lyakhe, Kawnelia nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Simon inn kha oun zaahbia`ae zah sakoih malang khe a thadyn`ae.
44010018	Te Piter cite min thawpaw a hoi paw Simon kha e kya a thua tou cite khia lan a ko`ae.
44010019	Piter nynh vizin kong a tua cciamang lyakhe, Muisaw nynh, “Dotua, ccungccaw luthung nynh nang kha ae ccung`ae.
44010020	Tukeiccu thokuh lah rungbung, lunghiinnaw kharyh hoi leite minmin ryte cceihbua, pawccecize minmin tuh kamaw nynh kae saw`ae paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
44010021	Oute Piter tuh Kawnelia nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kalan khe rungbung zah, “Dotua oh, kae tuh nanning nynh na ccung oh paw nynh ka thua, paw konglang mou nanning nae thua oh?” a ci.
44010022	Te minmin nynh, “Pachia rawrih zah Jew minphuin balyn laku thehoyccoupaw te adingpaw, rhawbawipaw Kawnelia tuh nang kha amaw inn lang kosah lan zah na bya thae khylan athyaapaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh phe a hopya vae,” a cipya`ae.
44010023	Te Piter nynh minmin kha inn lungkhu lang ko`ae zah tuin kya a thuasah`ae. Te awkhualan Piter tuh minmin ryte cceihbua zah Joppa khua e uno`ae abang mah a zuikuh bua`ae.
44010024	Te awkhualan koute minmin tuh Sisaria khua lungkhu lang a tee`ae. Te Kawnelia nynh minmin kha la ngaw`ae zah a vaeccaw`ae te a ruiban`ae kha a kobua`ae.
44010025	Te Piter he yn tee tuh Kawnelia nynh cciadue zah a ccu leihpaw khe bakhungte a beik.
44010026	Thuasalama Piter nynh aning kha tho zah, “Thadyn, kae mah ccungccaw nynh ka thua,” a cipya.
44010027	Te Kawnelia ryte byahokuh`ae zah he a tee tuh ccungccaw patae pynkheihlan a um`ae paw kha a muih.
44010028	Te Piter nynh, “Jew ccungccaw lukheit hanlan minphuin ccangpaw kalan ccia lanpaw te kungku lanpaw tuh aphung thua khyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh. Tuhzemah hung ccungccaw kha sanmah huatawpaw, thyaa khyh cite ka ci vae khyh nawlan Pachia nynh kae kha phe yn langsapya vae.
44010029	Tukeiccu kae kha he oun ko`ae tuh mya leite kae cceih; tukeiccu pawkeiccumou kamaw hynh nae kosah oh cipaw kae khiatua ry oh?” a cipya`ae.
44010030	Te Kawnelia nynh, “Nin pali aro vae, atu suimilan ccyh kyacia kae tuh looh-ae ka sung; suimilan ccangtakuanaw ccyh kya ka inn kyakhe saw ka sang, te dotua, uccaw phaephae ahpaw alawkuh paw ccungccapaw nynh ka malang khe thadyn zah,
44010031	‘Kawnelia, na sawsangnaw tuh thaepya thua zah ryachi`ae na bawngnawpaw tuh Pachia malang syntaw athua vae.
44010032	Tukeiccu Joppa khua lang ccungccaw saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kokuh; aning tuh rili kin kya saphua raetupaw Simon inn kya nynh a thua. Aning nynh he yn thua vae ze nang kha ae hopah cih,’ yn cipya.
44010033	Tukeiccu kae nynh arangte na kalan kae saw`ae, te nang nynh nae thua paw tuh kou hoy lan na cyi vae. Tukeiccu Pachia nynh nang ae hopya paw balyn kha ngae khylan kaening balyn tuh atu Pachia malang kae thua vae,” a ci.
44010034	Oute Piter nynh a khalang kha aw zah, “Thanccing langte Pachia tuh ccungccaw maedo khyh cipaw ka ny.
44010035	Thuasalama minphuin takyh kya amaw kha rawrih zah ahmepaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh amaw nynh lehkhan.
44010036	Pawpaw balyn kyaze Bawi athua paw, Jesu Kri liate daenaw thehoypaw kha hote, Israel ccungccaw`ae kalan Pachia nynh a saw paw bya,
44010037	Johan nynh a ho paw baptisma koute Galilee ram kyate tho zah Judah ram balyn kya po thaesah athua paw kha-e bya kha nanning nynh na ny oh.
44010038	Tuh-e tuh Pachia nynh Thyaa Muisaw te thuasah, thungnaw te thuasah Nazareth paw Jesu kha satho a thuh; Pachia nynh a umkhae keiccuze aning tuh ahoypaw rya kha lawte, diabolos nynh vawsaw a pya`ae paw balyn kha dansah te khua a ccung cipaw na ny oh.
44010039	Te kaening tuh Jew`ae ram kya te Jerusalem kya Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw`ae balyn konglang ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua; amaw kha minmin nynh thing vawlan saete a chia`ae.
44010040	Amaw kha Pachia nynh nin thungnaw kya thosah zah a muihsah`ae;
44010041	ccungccaw balyn kha muihsah khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia nynh a poty vae paw ccaekia`ae athua paw, a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui koute amaw ryte aekheih`ae zah a neihkheih`ae paw, kaening kha nynh oun muihsah.
44010042	Te aning tuh a chihpaw te a hiinpaw byapiatu lang cite Pachia nynh sathothuhpaw nynh athua cipaw ccaekiakhan khylan te ccungccaw`ae kha hopya khylan kaening hynh aning nynh kaw oun pya.
44010043	Hunghung zemah amaw kha a zyn paw tuh amaw min liate seingaethyanaw kha a mue cih cite profeh`ae balyn nynh amaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae,” a ci.
44010044	Piter nynh tuh-e bya a ho cciamang lyakhe bya a thae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw khe Thyaa Muisaw accah.
44010045	Te Zenta`ae tungvaw kya mah Thyaa Muisaw lasung tuh ccaenua athuabua keiccuze Piter ryte oun cceihkheih`ae paw vindung awkuh`ae paw zyntu`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua.
44010046	Pawccecize khae` ae nynh bya ccangpaw te ho`ae zah Pachia phu-esah`ae paw kha minmin nynh a thae`ae.
44010047	Oute Piter nynh, “Aening hawte Thyaa Muisaw a muebua`ae paw e ccungccaw`ae nynh baptisma-in khyh nawlan`ae hung nynh mou tui kha a khee kho cih?” a ci.
44010048	Te Bawipaw min kya baptisma-in lan minmin kha kawpya`ae. Oute nin sosoh a umhin ccaw cite Piter kha a kangku`ae.
44011001	Te Judah ram kya um`ae paw locceihtu`ae te uteno`ae nynh Zenta`ae mah Pachia bya lehkhan bua vae`ae cipaw kha a thae`ae.
44011002	Te Piter tuh Jerusalem kya he yn thua tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh,
44011003	“Nang tuh vindung awkuh leipaw ccungccaw`ae kalan na cceih zah minmin ryte na aekheih oh,” cite a seisah`ae.
44011004	Thuasalama Piter nynh kha-e konglang kha athonaw te atue te hynhte a hopya`ae:
44011005	“Kae tuh Joppa khua kya saw ka sang lyakhe, ka ngawphukuh zah alepipaw boeiphae alopaw uccaw ccangkheit tuh vaawran kyate kipali kyate oun sahbung`ae zah ka kalan yn thua paw kha vizin kya ka muih.
44011006	Kha-e kha riri ka do zah he ka tua tuh, ccupali asaepaw laephi kya-e lorangsaw`ae te sarepaw`ae te vue te a vaw`ae paw phin te vawlae-e pavaw`ae kha ka muih.
44011007	Te, ‘Piter, thokuh, theih lah ae,’ cite kamaw yn hopah paw roi kha ka thae.
44011008	Thuasalama kae nynh, ‘Thua kho lan khyh, Bawipaw! Pawccecize huatawpaw te athyaa leipaw uccaw`ae hynh vaekheit sanmah ka khalang lungkhu lang tee boi khyh,’ ka ci.
44011009	Thuasalama vaawran kyate roi nynh, ‘Pachia nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw kha nang nynh huatawpaw ci nan,’ cite bua yn khung.
44011010	Hynhcihte vaethung cia acikuh koute khae` ae balyn kha vaawran lang bua lawthung athua.
44011011	Te dotua, tuh-e ccyh lya tuin Sisaria khua kyate kamaw kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae luthung tuh ka umnaw inn malang oun thua`ae.
44011012	Te lunghiinnaw kharyh hoi leite, minmin ryte cciakheih lan Muisaw nynh kae kha yn hopya. Tuhlaeze hynh-e uno`ae lutaruh nynh kamaw ryte cceihbua`ae zah tuh-e ccungccapaw inn lungkhu lang kae tee.
44011013	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a inn malang thadyn zah Kawnelia kha, ‘Joppa khua lang ccungccaw`ae saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kosah`ae.
44011014	Tuh-e paw nynh nang te na inn kya um`ae paw balyn nynh khumnaw na mue nawlan oh paw bya kha ae hopah cih oh,’ cite a hopya paw kha aning nynh kaening kha bua yn hopya.
44011015	Te kae nynh phung he ka ho tuh, atakaw lya aening tungvaw a ccaw hawte Thyaa Muisaw tuh minmin tungvaw kyakhe a ccahbua.
44011016	Oute, ‘Johan nynh tuh tui kya baptisma-insah ccaccing`ae, thuasalama nanning tuh Thyaa Muisaw te baptisma-insah na thua cih oh,’ cite Bawipaw nynh a ho paw a bya kha kae nynh ka liathui vae.
44011017	Bawipaw Jesu Kri a zyn`ae paw aening kha Pachia nynh lasung oun pya hawte minmin kha mah a pyabua`ae paw nynh thua; Pachia kha khee kho nawlan kae tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw mou ka thua?” cite Piter nynh a ci.
44011018	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh zyadae`ae zah, “Tuhte lanze Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kha mah hiinnaw muesabua lan ngaesikunaw a pyabua`ae latu,” cite Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
44011019	Oute Stifen konglang te atho paw vawsaw riathaenaw keiccuze phiariphiarae a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Finisia, Saiparas, te Antiok khua phe thua lang cia cceih`ae zah Bawipaw bya kha hung kalan sanmah ho leite, Jew`ae kalan kyalya nynh a hopya`ae.
44011020	Te kha-e`ae kyaze abang tuh Saiparas te Sairenia khua e ccungccaw`ae thua`ae zah Antiok khua kya he a thua`ae te Greek bya a ho`ae paw kalan Bawipaw Jesu kong kha a hopya`ae.
44011021	Te Bawipaw kuih tuh minmin ryte um zah ccungccaw patae nynh zyn`ae zah Bawipaw kalan a paleihkuh`ae.
44011022	Te kha-e thungpang kha Jerusalem kya um paw kriccawbu nynh he a thae tuh Antiok khua lang po a ccia ccaw cite minmin nynh Barnabas kha a saw`ae.
44011023	Aning nynh he a thua tuh Pachia thawccinaw kha muih zah a lungtua, te eenaw a hoi paw thinlung te Bawipaw kya po atyn nawlan`ae minmin balyn kha thawzungpya`ae.
44011024	Pawccecize aning tuh ccungccahoypaw thua zah Thyaa Muisaw te thuasah, zynnaw te thuasah phe beihpaw nynh thua. Te ccungccaw pataepi kha Bawipaw kalan biachih athua`ae.
44011025	Oute Barnabas tuh Saul kha ccung khylan Tarsuh khua lang a cceih.
