44011026	Te he a muih tuh Antiok khua lang a cciakhae. Ou tuhcihte minmin tuh kum kheit lungkhu kriccawbu ryte umkheih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha leih a ccangpya`ae. Te Antiok khua kyakhe nynh zuitu`ae kha Kriccaw`ae cite masaty ko athua`ae.
44011027	Te tuh-e nin`ae kya profeh`ae abang tuh Jerusalem kyate Antiok khua lang oun thua`ae.
44011028	Te minmin lakuze Akabus acikuh paw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Laephipi balyn kya myarya alepaw ccakangnaw yn thua vae cih,” cite Muisaw liate a hoty. Ou tuh-e ccakangnaw tuh Sizar siapharan Klaudias ccyh lya nynh athua.
44011029	Oute zuitu`ae, luraveih nynh a taeningnaw thyhte Judah ram kya um`ae paw uno`ae kha bawngnaw kybua lan`ae cite byapaeku`ae.
44011030	Tuhte minmin nynh cyih`ae zah Barnabas te Saul kyate kha-e kha kriccaw piccang`ae kalan a ky`ae.
44012001	Tuh-e ccyh lya Herod siapharan nynh kriccawbu kya-e abang kha vawsaw pya khylan a kyng`ae.
44012002	Te aning nynh Johan a upaw James kha thaloi te phe a chia.
44012003	Te kha-e nynh Jew`ae lungrythuasah cipaw kha he a muih tuh Piter kha mah ranoih a kyngsah`ae. Tuh lya tuh ransi py leipaw sanlou poi nin nynh thua.
44012004	Te Piter kha kyngsah`ae zah Kawtaw Poi koute ccungccaw`ae kalan thuakhae lan cite tuakuh zah Piter kha a ngawtu`ae rhawkaw haw laetaruh kuih kalan ah zah thunginn kya a saw.
44012005	Tukeiccu Piter tuh thunginn kya a um; thuasalama kriccawbu nynh amaw hanlan apaekuh lei lante Pachia kalan sawsangnaw te a ngiapya`ae.
44012006	Te Herod nynh Piter kha pousah lan a cidyn, kha-e khuazi khe, Piter tuh sivarui zung ning te hee`ae zah rhawkaw luning laku khe a i; thuakaw ngawtu`ae nynh thuakaw malang te thunginn kha a ngaw`ae.
44012007	Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh yn langkuh zah thunginn kya phaephae yn aw; te Piter a napang kha phah bia zah, “Arangte tho kanmaw!” cipah zah Piter kha a tho. Te sivarui`ae tuh Piter kuih kyate pung accah.
44012008	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh Piter kha, “Taesung sungkuh lah na phanah kha nawkuh,” a cipya. Te Piter nynh a ho hawte a cyi. Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Na boei kha zingkuh lah kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
44012009	Te Piter nynh cceih zah amaw kha a zui, tuhzemah vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a cyi paw tuh thanccingpaw nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh, thuasalama vizin nynh ka muih cite nynh a tuaku.
44012010	Minmin nynh ccangkheitnaw te ccangningnaw a ngawtu`ae kha he a lue`ae te khua lungkhu lang a tee paw sivaw koikua kalan a thua`ae tuh, tuh-e koikua tuh amaw hung lan ahungkuh; te minmin tuh toikuh`ae zah laanpi ccangkheit kya a ccia lya`ae khe vaaw ccungccapaw tuh vaekheihmawte Piter kyate phe a pou.
44012011	Te Piter nynh he a nyhkuh tuh, “Atu Bawipaw nynh a vaaw ccungccapaw yn saw zah Herod kuih kyate thuasah, Jew`ae balyn nynh ngaehoinaw kyate thuasah kamaw hynh phe yn luesah vae cipaw ccaerarihlan atu phe ka ny,” a ciku.
44012012	Te kha-e kong kha a tua lyakhe, ccungccaw patae nynh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah sawsangnaw`ae, Marka acikuh paw, Johan a nung Meri inn lang yn thua.
44012013	Te Piter nynh koikua kalan e thuakaw kha he a khua tuh Rhoda cikuh paw nopinung taraw nynh nawngae lan yn cceih.
44012014	Te Piter roi cipaw he a nyh tuh a lungtua pawte thuakaw kha hung vae leite ccue kanmaw zah, “Koikua malang Piter phang thadyn,” cite a hopya`ae.
44012015	Te minmin nynh, “Nang tuh na ngae,” cite kha-e nung kha a ci`ae. Thuasalama aning nynh, “Thanccingpaw nynh thua,” cite thawte a ho. Te minmin nynh, “Piter a vaaw ccungccapaw nynh athua cih,” a ci`ae.
44012016	Thuasalama Piter nynh banban pei khua zah minmin nynh thuakaw kha he hung`ae tuh amaw kha muih`ae zah mih ngaeang pung thua.
44012017	Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin kha zya a dae ccaw`ae cite a kuih te piapah`ae zah Bawipaw nynh amaw kha pawcihte nynh a poukhae cipaw kha minmin kalan a hopya`ae. Te Piter nynh, “Cceih oh lah hynh-e`ae kong hynh James te uno`ae kha la hopah oh,” a ci. Oute toikuh zah ccanglang khe a cceih.
44012018	Te khua he yn dae tuh Piter kya acyikuh paw konglang khate rhawkaw`ae laku ngaluinngaluin ccaenaw alepi a um.
44012019	Te Herod nynh Piter kha ccung zah he muih khyh tuh a ngawtu`ae kha akaw-aleih byakhia`ae zah minmin tuh chia lan accan cite kaw a tho. Te Herod tuh Judah ram kyate Sisaria khua lang cceihbung zah tuin kya a um.
44012020	Te Herod tuh Tai khua e ccungccaw`ae te Sidon khua e ccungccaw`ae elan myarya a thinria; thuasalama minmin nynh pynkheihlan a kalan oun thua`ae zah Blastas acikuh paw siapharanpaw kya-e ryaccinkhantu kha zya hykuh`ae zah a lungdae nawlan a ngiasah`ae. Pawccecize mih ram tuh siapharanpaw ram nynh a kuabua paw nynh thua.
44012021	Te a khya`ae paw nin kyakhe Herod tuh siapharan uccaw te ccaankuh zah a suitungkhung vawlan dahungte minmin kha byahopya`ae.
44012022	Te ccungccaw`ae nynh, “E roi tuh ccungccaw roi thua khyh, pachia roi nynh thua,” cite a sia`ae.
44012023	Te Pachia kha phu-e a pya khyh keiccuze Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh vaekheihmawte Herod kha a bua; te aning tuh zangpaw`ae nynh ae`ae zah phe a chih.
44012024	Thuasalama Pachia bya tuh lethung zah houh a pungthung.
44012025	Te Barnabas te Saul tuh mih ryalaw phe a thangsah`ae koute Jerusalem kyate ki`ae zah Marka acikuh paw Johan kha mah a hoeibua`ae.
44013001	Antiok khua kya a um paw kriccawbu kya profeh`ae te ccangpatu`ae a la um`ae. Tuhe` ae tuh: Barnabas, Nika cite a ko`ae paw Simeon, Sairenia pee e paw Lusias, tetrarch Herod ryte a lethung kheih`ae paw Manaen, te Saul nynh thua`ae.
44013002	Minmin nynh Bawipaw rya kha lah`ae zah looh-ae he sung`ae tuh, Thyaa Muisaw nynh, “Ka konua`ae paw ryalaw law khylan Barnabas te Saul kha kamaw hanlan accangte oun phiapah oh,” a ci.
44013003	Te minmin nynh looh-aesung`ae zah sawsang`ae, te minmin tungvaw mih kuih khang`ae zah minmin kha a saw`ae.
44013004	Tuhte minmin tuh Thyaa Muisaw nynh a saw`ae thyhte Selusia khua lang cceih`ae zah tuin kyate Saiparas tuikoih kalan sanphalung te a cceih`ae.
44013005	Te Salamis khua kya a um`ae lyakhe minmin nynh Jew`ae sinakok kyakhe Pachia bya kha a ho`ae; te minmin bawngtu lang Johan kha mah a hoeibua`ae.
44013006	Te minmin nynh tuikoih kya po cceih`ae zah Pafo khua he thua`ae tuh, nawthyapaw ahme leipaw profeh, Barjesu acikuh paw Jew paw lukheit kha a muih`ae.
44013007	Tuh-e paw tuh ram uktupaw, myarya ahawpaw Serkias Paulu ryte nynh a um`ae; Paulu nynh Pachia bya kha thae a ry keiccuze Barnabas te Saul kha a koku`ae.
44013008	Thuasalama nawthyapaw Elimas (pawccecize tuh-e tuh a min asuilan nynh thua) nynh ram uktupaw kha zynnaw kyate paleihsaku khylan zuakuh zah locceihtu`ae kha a rawse`ae.
44013009	Oute Paul cite mah a ko`ae paw Saul tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah kha-e paw kha rirido zah,
44013010	“Thyaruhnaw balyn, hyngpyanaw balynte phe beihpaw diabolos ccapaw, dingnaw`ae balyn rhawpaw lou, nang tuh Bawipaw kya-e ahmepaw laanpi kha rosah leite na ung kho khyh tou?
44013011	Atu maw, dotua, Bawipaw kuih tuh na tungvaw a thua cih, te nang tuh na mitmoh cih zah ccyh sosoh khuanin na muih lan khyh,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte a mit pung zi zah a tungvaw mohnaw a thua; te a kuih te a dungbua lanpaw ccungccaw kha a zaahku.
44013012	Oute ram uktupaw nynh kha-e acyikuh paw kha he a muih tuh zyn zah Bawipaw kya-e ccangpyanaw kha a ngaeangthua.
44013013	Paul te a cceihkheih`ae paw tuh Pafo khua kyate rili kalan sahkuh`ae zah Pamfilia ram Perka khua khe he thua`ae tuh, Johan tuh minmin kyate pou zah sanphalung te Jerusalem lang a ki.
44013014	Thuasalama minmin tuh Perka khua kyate toikuh`ae zah Pisidia ram kya Antiok khua khe a thua`ae, te Sabbath nin kya sinakok lungkhu lang tee`ae zah a dahung`ae.
44013015	Te Kawbya te Profeh`ae ccauh kha a ria`ae koute sinakok uktu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha oun saw`ae zah, “Uteno`ae, nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae thawzungpya lanpaw bya na hoi oh ze, hopah oh,” cite a hosapya`ae.
44013016	Te Paul nynh thadyn zah a kuih te piapah`ae zah, “Israel ccungccaw`ae te Pachia rawrih`ae paw nanning, ngaetua oh:
44013017	Hynh-e Israel ccungccaw`ae Pachia nynh aening ah minpaaw`ae kha po`ae zah Izip ram kya mikhia`ae hawte a um`ae lyakhe a hangthung`ae, te athungpaw a kuih te minmin kha kha-e ram kyate a poukhae`ae.
44013018	Te ccyh kum sungpali loukaw cia rangkaw kyakhe minmin ozia kha phang a ngaesang.
44013019	Te Kanaan ram kya-e minphuin`ae phin sari kha phe a ropah kou`ae te, kha-e`ae mih ram kha ccungthy dungte Israel`ae kha a nee`ae.
44013020	“Te tuh-e`ae koute profeh Samuel alangku maw kum zapali sungpangaw loukaw cia byapiatu`ae kha Pachia nynh mih hanlan a pya`ae.
44013021	Tuhkoute minmin nynh siapharan kha ngiakuh`ae zah Pachia nynh Kish ccapaw Saul, Benjamin ciihan paw kha minmin hanlan kum sungpali cia a pya`ae.
44013022	Te kha-e paw kha he a nue koute David kha mih siapharan lang a khanpya`ae; David konglang te Pachia nynh ccaekiakhan zah a hopaw tuh: ‘Ka rynaw balyn a ccingsah cih paw, ka thinlung yn tung paw ccungccapaw, Jessi ccapaw David kha phe ka muih vae,’ a ci.
44013023	Hynh-e ccungccapaw ciihan kyate, byakinpyakupaw thyhte Pachia nynh Khumtu Jesu kha Israel`ae hanlan phe a langsaku vae.
44013024	Amaw yn thua maw, Johan nynh ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha Israel ccungccaw balyn kalan phe a hoty vae.
44013025	Te Johan nynh a ryalaw a thangsah dyn khe, ‘Kae hynh hung cite mou nae tua oh? Kae tuh kha-e paw ka thua khyh. Thuasalama dotua oh, kamaw nuhlang yn cceih paw Lukheit a um; kha-e paw a ccukoh khahpya lan sanmah kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh,’ cite a ho.
44013026	“Abraham ciihan athua paw uteno`ae, te nanning laku kyaze Pachia rawrih`ae paw, nanning kalan nynh hynh-e khumnaw bya tuh saw athua.
44013027	Pawccecize Jerusalem kya um`ae paw te mih uktu`ae nynh amaw kha thuasah, Sabbath nin takyh kya a ria`ae paw profeh`ae bya kha thuasah a ny khyh`ae keiccuze, amaw kha seibenaw`ae liate minmin nynh profeh`ae bya kha a ccingsah`ae.
44013028	Amaw kya chi lan accansah paw cyiseinaw ccangkheit san a muih lei`ae pite, Pilat nynh a chia ccaw cite minmin nynh a ngia`ae.
44013029	Te amaw konglang azeikuh paw balyn kha minmin nynh phe a ccingsah`ae koute amaw rhua kha vaelantung kyate lah`ae zah shaw lungkhu a ccy`ae.
44013030	Thuasalama Pachia nynh amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah.
44013031	Te aning tuh Galilee ram kyate Jerusalem lang amaw ryte a cceihkheih`ae paw kalan nin patae cia a langkuh, tuh-e`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae kalan amaw ccaekia`ae nynh thua`ae.
44013032	Te minpaaw`ae kalan a rae paw byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw thungpang hoypaw kha kaening nynh nae kalan kae hopya oh.
44013033	Sam ccangningnaw kya, ‘Nang tuh ka Ccapaw nynh na thua, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,’ cite azeiku hawte; Pachia nynh Jesu kha bua a thosathuinaw liate ah minpaaw`ae kya byakinpyakupaw kha mih ccaaw`ae aening hanlan a ccingsah.
44013034	Te ronaw kalan kharyh a ki vae khyh nawlan, amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah cipaw kha hynhcihte bua a ho; ‘David kya-e phe ariapaw thawccinaw kha nanning kae pya cih oh,’ a ci.
44013035	Tukeiccu ccangpaw Sam kya mah, ‘Namaw kya-e Athyaapaw kha ronaw kalan thua lan na ua lan khyh,’ cite bua a ho.
44013036	“David tuh amaw she lungkhu Pachia rynaw kha phe a rae koute, phe i zah a minpaaw`ae kya phe a ccybua`ae keiccu ronaw kalan phe a thua.
44013037	Thuasalama Pachia nynh bua a thosah paw aning tuh ronaw kalan thua vae khyh.
44013038	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, tuh-e Bawipaw liate nynh seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw kong kha nanning kalan hopya athua cipaw te,
44013039	Mawsi Kawbya nynh thyaa ae ccousah kho khyh oh paw kyate, a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw liate pawpaw balyn kyate thyaaccou`ae cipaw hynh nanning nynh nyh oh.
44013040	Tukeiccu, profeh`ae kya ho athua paw uccaw kha nae tungvaw a thua khyh nawlan raeringkuh oh; a ho paw tuh:
44013041	‘Ccungccaw sarya`ae paw nanning, dotua oh, nae ngaeangthua sah lah roh oh! Pawccecize nanning ccyh lya ryalaw ccangkheit kha kae nynh ka law, kha-e ryalaw kha ccungccaw lukheit nynh nanning kalan ae hopya oh zemah nanning nynh kharyh na zyn lan khyh oh,’ acikuh,” cite Paul nynh a hopya`ae.
44013042	Te Jew`ae tuh sinakok kyate he a pou`ae te, Zenta`ae nynh kha-e bya`ae kha malang Sabbath nin kya bua nae hopah ung cih oh cite a ngiaku`ae.
44013043	Pumkunaw he athang te Jew`ae patae te Jew beiknaw kalan a tee thaw`ae paw, beiknaw lante azuakuh`ae paw nynh Paul te Barnabas kha a zui`ae; kha-e`ae nynh minmin kha hopah`ae zah Pachia thawccinaw kya atyn nawlan`ae a hy`ae.
44013044	Te malang Sabbath nin kya Pachia bya kha ngae khylan a khuapi balynte vya ccing lang pynkheihlan oun thua`ae.
44013045	Thuasalama Jew`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha he muih`ae tuh eiungnaw te phe beih`ae; te Paul nynh a ho paw kha rawse`ae zah a ei`ae, alue lante byaho`ae.
44013046	Oute Paul te Barnabas nynh, “Pachia bya hynh masaty nanning hopya lan accanpaw nynh thua; thuasalama nanning nynh kha-e kha na vua oh zah zungzae hiinnaw tuh kae ngaekuh khyh cite bya na piaku oh keiccu, do oh, kaening tuh Zenta`ae kalan kae maeleihkuh vae.
44013047	Pawccecize Bawipaw nynh, ‘Laephi athangnaw cia nang tuh khumnaw hanlan na thua nawlan, Zenta`ae hanlan awnaw lang nang kha phe kae khang vae,’ cite kaening kha kaw phe oun pya vae,” cite rawhoy te a ho`ae.
44013048	Te kha-e bya kha Zenta`ae nynh he thae`ae tuh mih lungtua zah Bawipaw bya kha phuesah` ae; te zungzae hiinnaw hanlan khang athuapaw miakaw nynh a zyn`ae.
44013049	Te Bawipaw bya tuh ram balyn kya khaleih apazaekuh.
44013050	Thuasalama beiknaw lante a zuakuh`ae paw, sawtua lan um paw nopi`ae, te khualae e pise lupi`ae kha Jew`ae nynh hy`ae zah Paul te Barnabas tuasahnaw kha a pousah`ae; te mih ram kyate a deesah`ae.
44013051	Thuasalama Paul te Barnabas nynh mih ccu kya-e laenoi kha pheihnuakuh`ae zah Ikoniam khua langkhe a cceih`ae.
44013052	Te zuitu`ae tuh lungtuanaw ryte Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih`ae.
44014001	Ou tuhcihte Ikonia khua kya minmin luning tuh paryhte Jew`ae sinakok lungkhu lang tee`ae zah phungho`ae; oute Jew`ae te Greek`ae ccungccaw zapipi nynh a zyn`ae.
44014002	Thuasalama a zyn leipaw Jew`ae nynh Zenta`ae kha hy`ae zah uno`ae kha rawse khylan mih thinlung kha ahoy leipaw lan a rae`ae.
44014003	Tukeiccu minmin tuh khaw cia um`ae zah Bawipaw liate rawhoy te phung a ho`ae, Bawipaw nynh a thawccinaw bya hanlan ccaekia pya`ae zah muihsanaw te khuaruaru ngaeangnaw kha minmin kyate a langsaku.
44014004	Thuasalama khualae e ccungccaw zapi tuh thoh phiakuh`ae zah abang tuh Jew`ae kalan pang`ae zah abang tuh locceihtu`ae kalan a pang`ae.
44014005	Te Zenta`ae te Jew`ae nynh mih uktu`ae ryte locceihtu`ae kha zia lan`ae zah lung te deih lan`ae cite vaekheihte oun ccuenua`ae cipaw kha,
44014006	locceihtu`ae nynh he nyh`ae tuh Lykonia ram kya um paw Lystra khua te Derbe khua lang, te tuin pepan um paw khua lang a ccue`ae.
44014007	Tuin kya thehoynaw kha a ho`ae.
44014008	Te Lystra khua kya a nung vue kya mawte a ccukhoupaw, laanpi kharyh cceih boi leipaw, ccungccapaw lukheit tuh la dahung zah,
44014009	Paul nynh a hopaw bya kha a thae. Paul nynh kha-e paw kha rirido zah, phe dan lan ciate aning nynh zynnaw a hoi cipaw he a nyh tuh,
44014010	“Na ccu te lawbabinlan thadyn,” cite roi accae lante a hopya. Te aning tuh thokuh zah laanpi a cceih.
44014011	Te Paul nynh a cyi paw kha ccungccaw`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh, “Khozi-pachia`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae alo lante aening kalan oun rungbung`ae,” cite Lykonia bya te mih roi saw`ae zah a ho`ae.
44014012	Te minmin nynh Barnabas kha Zeus cite ko`ae zah Paul tuh phunghotu lupi athua keiccuze Herme cite a ko`ae.
44014013	Te tuh-e khua malang a um paw tempal a hoitu Zeus a ranpibawi nynh vaetua tangnua`ae te haetapawsi`ae kha koikua kalan yn cciakhae, ccungccaw zapi ryte silawkunaw rae lan cite a ry`ae.
44014014	Kha-e kha locceihtu`ae Barnabas te Paul nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih uccaw`ae kha ccahrae sei`ae zah ccungccaw`ae laku lang ccue`ae zah,
44014015	“Ccungccaw oh, pawccemou hynhte na cyi oh? Kaening mah nanning hawte ccungccaw`ae nynh kae thua, nanning nynh hynh-e accakaepaw uccaw`ae kyate vaawran te laephi, rili te kha-e`ae kya um paw miakaw balyn raetu, a hiinpaw Pachia kalan na paleihku oh ccaw cite kaening tuh nae kalan thehoypaw kae hopaw nynh kae thua.
44014016	Langmaw lya tuh Pachia nynh minphuin`ae balyn kha mimaw mih laanpi kya ccia lan a la ua`ae.
44014017	Tuhzemah ahoypaw oun cyipya paw kya amaw a um paw kha ccaekia langsaku leite um khyh, vaawran kyate khua oun rawsapya zah thingthae-eccang a pousah paw kumvaelori kha oun pya, ah thinlung kha aepaw te oun byngsah zah lungtuanaw te phe oun biasah,” cite thawmawte a sia`ae.
44014018	Te hynh-e byaho`ae paw khate mih kalan silawkunaw a rae khyh nawlan`ae ccungccaw zapi kha minmin nynh kou ru lante a khee kho`ae.
44014019	Te Jew`ae abang tuh Antiok te Ikonia khua`ae kyate tuhlang oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw zapi kha hy`ae zah Paul kha lung te a deih`ae, phe chih vae cite tua`ae zah khua atolang khe a sue`ae.
44014020	Tuhzemah zuitu`ae nynh a pe phang thadynlu`ae lyakhe, Paul tuh thokuh zah khua lungkhu lang bua a tee. Awkhualan tuh Barnabas ryte Derbe khua lang a cceih`ae.
44014021	Tuh-e khua kya thehoypaw kha he ho`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha zuitu`ae lang a rae`ae koute, minmin tuh Lystra khua, Ikonia khua te Antiok khua lang bua a ki`ae.
44014022	Zuitu`ae thinlung kha thawzung pyate, zynnaw kya atyn nawlan`ae minmin kha hyte, “Aening tuh vawsawrunaw patae tungbiate nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang ah tee hahe cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44014023	Te kriccawbu takyh kya piccang`ae kha khang`ae zah looh-aesung te sawsang`ae koute, minmin nynh a zyn`ae paw Bawipaw kalan minmin kha a ah`ae.
44014024	Te minmin tuh Pisidia ram kha po a khung`ae koute Pamfilia ram lungkhu lang a thua`ae.
44014025	Te minmin nynh Perka kya Bawipaw bya kha a ho`ae koute Attalia khua lang a cceihbung`ae.
44014026	Te tuin kyate minmin nynh phe a lyng vae`ae paw ryalaw hanlan Pachia thawccinaw kalan mimaw kha a ahnaw`ae Antiok khua langkhe sanphalung te a cceih`ae.
44014027	He thua`ae zah kriccawbu`ae kha pynkheihlan he suelua`ae koute Pachia nynh minmin ryte a cyi paw balyn, te Zenta`ae elan zynnaw thuakaw kha pawcihte nynh a hungpya`ae cipaw kha bua a hopyathui`ae.
44014028	Te tuin kya minmin tuh zuitu`ae ryte khaw cia a umkheih`ae.
44015001	Te Judah ram kyate Antiok lang oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh, “Mawsi phungbya thyhhawte vindung aw na thua khyh oh ze khumpaw na thua kho lan khyh oh,” cite uteno`ae kha a ccangpya`ae.
44015002	Tukeiccu Paul te Barnabas tuh tuh-e`ae ryte lungloku leinaw alepi hoi`ae zah eikunaw he a hoi`ae tuh, uteno`ae nynh Paul, Barnabas te minmin kyaze ccangpaw uno`ae abang tuh tuh-e konglang, locceihtu`ae te piccang`ae kalan Jerusalem lang cciathung lan accan cite byapae`ae.
44015003	Te kriccawbu nynh laanpi langkhe saw`ae zah Paul te Barnabas tuh Finisia te Samaria ram kha po a khung`ae, Zenta`ae rulaekunaw kong kha a hopya`ae; te uteno`ae balyn kha myarya mih lungtuasah`ae.
44015004	Te minmin Jerusalem kya he thua`ae tuh locceihtu`ae, pastor`ae te kriccawbu nynh lehkhan`ae, te Pachia nynh minmin mangte a cyi paw balyn kha minmin nynh bua a hopya`ae.
44015005	Thuasalama Farasi`ae phu kyate a zyn`ae paw abang nynh thadyn`ae zah, “Zenta`ae kha vindung ah aw oh ho zah Mawsi Kawbya zui lan kaw ah pya oh aho,” a ci`ae.
44015006	Oute locceihtu`ae te pastor`ae tuh tuh-e kong tuakheih lan a sueluakuh`ae.
44015007	Te eikunaw patae he a um tuh Piter nynh thadyn zah, “Uteno`ae, Zenta`ae nynh ka khalang kyate thehoypaw bya a thae nawlan`ae te a zyn nawlan`ae anuhlang lyakhe aening laku Pachia nynh yn po cipaw kha na ny oh.
44015008	Te thinlung a nyh paw Pachia nynh Thyaa Muisaw kha aening oun pya hawte minmin kha mah pyate minmin hanlan ccaekia a langsah.
44015009	Te zynnaw liate mih thinlung kha ccikan te, aening te minmin laku laesanaw umsah khyh.
44015010	Tukeiccu atu aening nynh mah thuasah, ah minpaaw`ae nynh mah thuasah ah phu kho lei oh paw taphu kha zuitu`ae nging vawlan khang lante pawccemou Pachia kha na syntaw oh?
44015011	Thuasalama Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw liate minmin tuh khum athua`ae hawte aening mah khum ah thuabua cih oh cite ah zyn oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44015012	Oute ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh daebabilan um`ae zah Barnabas te Paul nynh mimaw kha Pachia nynh mangte ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw`ae te khuaruarunaw`ae Zenta`ae laku a langsakupaw kong a ho`ae paw kha a ngae`ae.
44015013	Te minmin tuh daetedae lang a um`ae koute, James nynh tho zah, “Uteno oh, ka ho paw hynh oun ngaepya tua oh:
44015014	amaw min hanlan Zenta`ae kyate ccungccaw phinkheit kha poh thua khylan Pachia nynh masaty Zenta`ae kha pawcihte nynh a pae`ae cipaw kha Simeon nynh phe a ho vae.
44015015	Te tuh-e bya te profeh`ae bya tuh accawkuh, Ccathyaa kya hynhte azeikuh hawte:
44015016	‘Hynh-e koute kae tuh bua kae ki cih zah phe a pu vae paw David bu kha bua ka sakthui cih, te kha-e aronahpaw kha bua ka sakthui cih zah bua ka thadynsah cih;
44015017	Ou tuhte kamaw min liate ko athua`ae paw, Zenta`ae balyn mah athua`ae paw tuhlaepaw ccungccaw`ae nynh BAWIPAW kha a ccung`ae ccaw cite, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn a raetupaw BAWIPAW nynh a ci,’ cite azeikuh.
44015018	“Laephipi thotakaw te Pachia nynh a ryalaw balyn kha marya a ny.
44015019	Tukeiccu kae nynh ka hory paw tuh, Zenta`ae laku kyate Pachia kalan oun paleihkuh`ae paw kha aening nynh vawsaw pya nan oh sih.
44015020	Thuasalama zohtuh`ae nynh a nungsisaku`ae paw kha thuasah, ohhuakunaw kha thuasah, nging-o te a chia`ae paw kha thuasah, chii kha thuasah minmin nynh a sung nawlan`ae aening nynh ccaw ky oh sih.
44015021	Pawccecize Mawsi nynh langmaw lya mawte khua takyh kya a kawbya a ho`ae paw kha phe a hoi vae keiccu, Sabbath nin takyh sinakok`ae kya a kawbya tuh ria athua,” a ci.
44015022	Oute mimaw phu kyaze po athua`ae paw, uteno`ae lakuze cciakhaetu`ae Barsabas acikuh paw Judas te Sailas kha Antiok khua lang Paul te Barnabas ryte saw lan a ci`ae paw bya nynh locceihtu`ae, piccang`ae te kriccawbu khaleih kha mih lunghoysah.
44015023	Te ccaw zei`ae zah minmin kyate a ky`ae paw tuh, “Locceihtu`ae, piccang`ae te uteno`ae nynh Antiok khua kya te Siria ram te Silisia ram kya na um oh paw Zenta`ae na thua oh paw uteno`ae kha kae beihlang oh!
44015024	Kaening nynh kaw kae pya lei`ae paw, kaening kyate oun cceih`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh nanning kha, ‘Vindung na awku oh ho zah Kawbya na zui oh aho,’ cipaw bya khate nanning kha vawsaw ae pya oh, nae lungria ae thaesah oh cipaw kaening nynh kae thae pawte,
44015025	-
44015026	ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min hanlan mih hiinnaw chihchih hiinhiin acih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae, kae sungsahpaw Paul te Barnabas ryte, popaw ccungccaw`ae kha nanning kalan saw lan kaening nynh lunglokute kae tungkuh zah ahoy kae ci.
44015027	Tukeiccu kaening nynh Judas te Sailas hynh nae kalan kae saw`ae, minmin nynh kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha mih khalang te ae la hopah cih oh.
44015028	Pawccecize hynh-e ahopaw uccaw`ae laelan nanning tungvaw khe ari huapaw phupaw khang lanpaw tuh Thyaa Muisaw hanlan te kaening hanlan ahoypaw thua khyh.
44015029	Tuh-e ahopaw uccaw`ae tuh: nanning nynh zohtuh kalan silawnawpaw`ae kha thuasah, chii kha thuasah, nging-ote a chia`ae paw kha thuasah, ohhuakunaw kha thuasah la sung oh. Kha-e`ae kha na sungku oh ze, kou ahoypaw nynh thua. Ngedan te.” cite a zei`ae.
44015030	Tuhte minmin kha he a cciasah`ae tuh Antiok khua lang a thua`ae; te ccungccaw zapi kha pynkheihlan a suelua`ae koute ccaky kha a pya`ae.
44015031	Kha-e ccaw kha minmin nynh he a ria`ae tuh thawzung pyanawpaw athua keiccu mih lungtua.
44015032	Te Judas te Sailas mimaw mah profeh`ae athua`ae thyhte bya pataepi te uteno`ae kha thawzungpya`ae zah lungthawsaesah`ae.
44015033	Te minmin tuh tuin kya ccyh khuekheih a um`ae koute uteno`ae nynh locceihtu`ae kalan ngaengante a kisah`ae.
44015034	Tuhzemah Sailas tuh tuin kya umhy lanze ahoy cih cite a tuaku.
44015035	Paul te Barnabas mah Antiok khua kya um`ae zah ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae patae ryte Bawipaw bya kha ccangpah`ae zah a hopya`ae.
44015036	Te nin khaw aro koute Paul nynh Barnabas kha, “Aening nynh Bawipaw bya ah honaw khua takyh kya um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh pawcihtemou a um`ae cipaw ah dotua ccaw ki sih lah paebua sih`ae,” a cipya.
44015037	Te Barnabas nynh Marka acikuh paw Johan kha mimaw ryte hoeibua lan phe a la tuaku vae.
44015038	Thuasalama Paul nynh Pamfilia ram kyate, minmin kyate ki zah ryalawnaw kalan minmin ry a cceihbua vae leipaw Marka kha hoeibua lan ccang khyh cite varyn a tuaku.
44015039	Tuhte minmin laku lungloku leinaw tuh eih ru keiccu lukheit te lukheit phiakuh`ae zah Barnabas nynh Marka kha hoei zah Saiparas tuikoih kalan kohlung te a cceih`ae.
44015040	Te uteno`ae nynh Paul kha Bawipaw thawccinaw kalan he ah`ae te Paul nynh Sailas kha pokuh zah a pou.
44015041	Te kriccawbu`ae kha thawzung pyate Siria te Silisia ram lang po a cceih.
44016001	Oute Paul tuh Derbe khua te Lystra khua lang a thua. Te dotua, tuin kya Timote acikuh paw zuitu lukheit a la um. A nung tuh a zyn paw Jew nopinung nynh thua, thuasalama a paaw tuh Greek paw nynh thua.
44016002	Timote tuh Lystra khua te Ikonia khua kya um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh thehoyccousah`ae paw nynh thua.
44016003	Paul nynh kha-e paw kha amaw ryte cciasabua lan a ry. Te a paaw tuh Greek minphuin athua paw kha tuh-e ram kya um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh phe a ny`ae keiccuze Timote kha hoei zah vindung a aw pya.
44016004	Te minmin nynh khua`ae kalan po cceih`ae zah Jerusalem kya um`ae paw locceihtu`ae te piccang`ae nynh byapaenaw`ae paw ccaw`ae kha a zui ccaw`ae cite po a nebia`ae.
44016005	Ou tuhte kriccawbu`ae tuh zynnaw kya tynsah thua`ae zah nin takyh milu akaethung.
44016006	Te Frikia te Galati ram kha po he a cceih`ae tuh Asia ram kya Pachia bya ho lanpaw kha Thyaa Muisaw nynh phe a khee`ae.
44016007	Te Mysia ram kalan he thua`ae tuh Bithynia ram lungkhu lang ccia lan a noukuh`ae, thuasalama Muisaw nynh ua khyh`ae.
44016008	Te minmin tuh Mysia ram kha po cciakhung`ae zah Troas khua lang a thua`ae.
44016009	Te khuazi khe Paul kalan vizin yn langkuh. Mesidonia paw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Mesidonia ram lang po yn cceih lah kaening hynh oun bawng,” cite Paul kha a ngia.
44016010	Te vizin kha a muih koute, Mesidonia ram lang ccia lan palou kae paccynkuh vae; minmin kalan thehoypaw ho khylan Bawipaw nynh kaening kha oun ko cite kae tuakuh.
44016011	Tukeiccu Troas khua kyate kohlung te kae thokuh zah Samothrasia tuikoih kalan dingrarihlan kae cceih zah awkhualan tuh Neapolis khua kya kae thua.
44016012	Te tuin kyate Mesidonia ram sang kheit kya abapihua paw khua, Rom koloni athua paw, Filipi khua kya kae thua zah tuin kya nin khaw cia kae um.
44016013	Te Sabbath nin kya kaening tuh khua akhunglang sawsangnaw leih raenaw`ae vawkhu kin langkhe kae cceih zah kae dahung, te tuhlang oun thua`ae paw nopi`ae kha kae hopya`ae.
44016014	Te sekakungpaw uccaw a zuatu, Thiatira khua e Lidia acikuh paw nopinung lukheit tuh Pachia a beik paw thua zah kaening kong kha yn thae; te Paul nynh a ho paw uccaw`ae kha hoyte ngae khylan Bawipaw nynh kha-e nung thinlung kha a hung.
44016015	Te kha-e nung te a innbyn`ae tuh baptisma-in kou`ae te, aning nynh, “Kae tuh Bawipaw hanlan zyn lan um paw cite nae tua oh ze ka inn lang rang oh lah umhin oh,” cite kaening kha thawte oun ngia. Te kaening kha thawte oun kang.
44016016	Ou tuhte kaening tuh sawsangnaw kalan kae ccia lya, malang e konglang hothyanaw a hoi paw muisaw bahkuhpaw seenung taraw lukheit nynh kaening kha yn cciadue. Malang yn cyikuh lanpaw kong a hotynaw liate a bawi a zua`ae kha patae a muepya`ae.
44016017	Kha-e nung nynh Paul te kaening kha yn zui zah, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh aening kha khumnaw laanpi oun muihsah`ae paw, ahang huaccepaw Pachia see`ae nynh thua`ae,” cite thawte a sia.
44016018	Te aning nynh khate nin patae cia a cyi. Thuasalama Paul nynh thinlung ccite nuhlang maeleihkuh zah muisaw kha, “Kha-e nung lungkhu te pou, Jesu Kri min te kaw kae pya,” a cipya. Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya mawtuin aning tuh po a pou.
44016019	Te kha-e nung a bawi`ae nynh a muenaw`ae paw ngaehoinaw tuh um vae khyh cipaw kha he muih`ae tuh Paul te Sailas kha kyng`ae zah uccaw zuanaw hmin kalan kawhoitu`ae kalan khe a dung`ae.
44016020	Te minmin kha khuabawi`ae kalan cciakhae`ae zah, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Jew`ae mang athua`ae pite ah khua kha myarya vawsaw oun pya`ae.
44016021	Te Rom`ae athua paw aening nynh lawku lan accan leipaw te zui lan accan leipaw phung`ae kha oun ccangpya`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
44016022	Te minmin kha rawsete ccungccaw zapi tuh pynkheihlan a thokuh`ae, te khuabawi`ae nynh mih uccaw`ae kha ccarae sei`ae zah minmin kha tungbang te bua lan kawpya`ae.
44016023	Te minmin nynh avae patae a bua`ae koute minmin kha thunginn lungkhu lang sah`ae zah ahoyte ring lan thung uktupaw kha byatawsya`ae.
44016024	Khate byatawsya`ae thyhte thung uktupaw nynh minmin kha alungkhu-e thunginn lungkhu lang phang`ae zah mih ccu kha tunglua te phang khii`ae.
44016025	Te ziraccyng khe Paul te Sailas nynh sawsang`ae zah Pachia thehoysanaw lawsah`ae; te thungccah`ae nynh a ngae`ae.
44016026	Te tua lei pite thawte innruisuekuh zah thunginn leihpaw tuh pung ahy; te vaekheihmawte thuakaw`ae balyn pung hungkuh zah thungccah`ae miakaw kya-e sivarui`ae tuh pung phoukuh.
44016027	Te thung uktupaw tuh a inaw kyate yn thaekuh zah thunginn thuakaw`ae pung ahungkuhpaw kha he a muih tuh thungccah`ae pung ccue vae cih`ae cite tua zah amaw te amaw chiaku lan vae cite a thaloi kha a thuaku.
44016028	Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Namaw te namaw kha vawsaw pyakuh nan, pawccecize kae balynte e kya pung kae um,” cite thawte sia zah a hopya.
44016029	Oute thung uktu nynh maee kha kokhae`ae zah arangte tee zah Paul te Sailas malang thyngkute a bakhung.
44016030	Te minmin kha poukhae`ae zah, “Bawihaepaw oh; khumnaw mue khylan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite a khia`ae.
44016031	Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha zyn lah nang tuh khum na thua cih, te na innbyn`ae mah khum athua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
44016032	Te minmin nynh kha-e paw te a inn kya um`ae paw balyn kha Bawipaw bya a hopya`ae.
44016033	Te aning nynh Paul te Sailas kha tuh-e khuazi, tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya mawtuin cciakhae`ae zah mih vaemaw kha a singpya`ae; te aning te a innbyn`ae balyn tuh palou baptisma-in`ae.
44016034	Te aning nynh minmin kha a inn lungkhu lang hoei`ae zah looh a dang`ae; te a innbyn`ae balyn ryte Pachia a zyn`ae pawte kou a lungtua.
44016035	Te khua he yn dae tuh khuabawi`ae nynh palih bawi`ae kha saw`ae zah, “Kha-e ccungccaw`ae kha cceih`ae sah,” a cipya`ae.
44016036	Te thung uktu nynh kha-e bya kha Paul kalan hopah zah, “Khuabawi`ae nynh nanning kha la saw ccavae oh cite ccungccaw`ae oun saw`ae, tukeiccu atu pou oh lah daebabilan la cceih ccavae oh,” a cipya.
44016037	Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Rom`ae athua paw kaening hynh ahoyte akaw-aleih byakhia leite minmin nynh zapi malang oun bua`ae zah thunginn lungkhu lang oun saw`ae; te atu aphirute tou hung oun saw cih`ae? Tuhte ccei soh! Mimaw ccaccei oun cceih`ae sah lah kaening hynh oun thua`ae sah,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
44016038	Te palih bawi`ae nynh kha-e bya kha khuabawi`ae kalan a hopya`ae; te Paul te Sailas tuh Rom`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh a rih vae`ae.
44016039	Te khuabawi`ae tuh oun cceih`ae zah minmin kha thawte bohkuh`ae zah a poukhae`ae; te kha-e khua kyate pou lan a ngia`ae.
44016040	Te Paul te Sailas tuh thunginn kyate pou`ae zah Lidia inn lang a tee`ae; te minmin nynh uteno`ae kha he muih`ae tuh thawzungpya`ae zah a pou`ae.
44017001	Te Paul te Sailas tuh Amfipolis khua te Apollonia khua kha po khung`ae zah Thesalonika khua lang a thua`ae, tuh-e kya Jew`ae sinakok ccangkheit a um.
44017002	Te Paul tuh leih a cyimae hawte, minmin kalan teebua zah Sabbath nin ninthung cia minmin ryte Ccathyaa kya-e kha a hokuh`ae.
44017003	Kri tuh a teing ho zah a chih`ae paw kyate bua a thothui aho cite ccaesapah`ae zah a langsapya`ae. Te, “Nae kalan kae nynh ka hopaw hynh-e Jesu tuh Kri nynh athua,” cite a hopya`ae.
44017004	Te abang ccungccaw tuh zyn`ae zah Paul te Sailas ryte a mungkuh bua`ae; te beiknaw lante azuakuh`ae paw Greek ccungccaw zapipi te abapi huapaw nopi`ae patae mah a mungkuh bua`ae.
44017005	Thuasalama a zyn leipaw Jew`ae nynh mih eiung zah kungkunaw hmin kya-e ccungccahoy lei`ae kha a hoeinua`ae, te a khia a vekuh`ae paw kha suelua`ae zah khualae balyn kha siarisiarae a umsah`ae; te Jason a inn kha koih`ae zah minmin kha ccungccaw`ae malang poukhae lan a ccung`ae.
44017006	Minmin kha he muih khyh`ae tuh Jason te uno`ae abang kha khua uktu`ae kalan dung`ae zah, “Laephipi kubuleih`ae paw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynhlang mah oun thua`ae.
44017007	Jason nynh minmin kha thuasah`ae, te minmin balyn nynh, ‘Jesu acikuh paw ccangpaw Siapharan a um,’ ci`ae zah Sizar siapharan awda`ae kha a rawse`ae,” cite thawte a sia`ae.
44017008	Te minmin nynh kha-e bya a thae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae te khua uktu`ae kha lungvawsawsah`ae.
44017009	Te Jason te mingccang`ae kyate aamahkhan pyakunawpaw a lawkuh`ae koute minmin kha a cciasah`ae.
44017010	Te uteno`ae nynh vaekheihmawte Paul te Sailas kha khuazi khe Beria khua lang a saw`ae; tuh-e khua kya he thua`ae te Jew`ae sinakok lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
44017011	Beria khuaccaw`ae tuh Thesalonika khuaccaw`ae laeze mih lung-ua hua, minmin tuh pekinaw thinlung te Pachia bya kha lawkuh`ae zah tuh-e uccaw`ae tuh akyh vema, kyh khyh vema cipaw kha nin takyhte Ccathyaa te a dokhia`ae.
44017012	Tukeiccu minmin kyaze ccungccaw patae nynh a zyn`ae; sawtua lan um paw Greek nopi`ae te pise`ae patae mah a zyn`ae.
44017013	Thuasalama Thesalonika khua kya-e Jew`ae nynh Beria khua kya Paul nynh Pachia bya a ho cipaw he a nyh`ae tuh, tuhlang tuin cceih`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha a hy`ae.
44017014	Oute uteno`ae nynh vaekheihmawte Paul kha rili kalan ccia lan a saw`ae; thuasalama Sailas te Timote tuh tuin kya a um ung`ae.
44017015	Te Paul a saw`ae paw nynh Athen khua kyacia a saw`ae; te Sailas te Timote kha arangte a kalan oun cceih`ae sah cipaw kawpyapaw a mue`ae koute minmin tuh a ki`ae.
44017016	Paul nynh Sailas te Timote kha Athen khua kya a ngaw`ae lyakhe, kha-e khua tuh zohtuh`ae te phe abeih cipaw kha he a muih tuh a lung vawsaw.
44017017	Tukeiccu sinakok kyakhe Jew`ae te Pachia beik`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha thuasah, kungkunaw hmin kya leih a tungkuh`ae paw kha thuasah nin takyh bya a hokhae`ae.
44017018	Oute Epikurian te Stoik filosofa`ae abang tuh Paul te a khungkuh`ae. Te abang nynh, “E paw katua-katua ccohkuh paw hynh pawmou a hory?” a ci`ae. Paul nynh Jesu te thothuinaw kong kha a hopya`ae keiccuze mingccang`ae nynh, “Aning tuh ramccangpaw pachia`ae kong a hopatupaw nynh alo,” a ci`ae.
44017019	Te minmin nynh Paul kha hoei`ae zah Areopakas lang cciakhae`ae zah, “Nang nynh na hopaw hynh-e ccangpyanaw athawpaw hynh kaening nynh kae nybua ze so?
44017020	Pawccecize nang nynh kae nakaring te thae boi leipaw uccaw`ae kha nae thuakhae; tukeiccu hynh-e uccaw`ae asuilan tuh pawmou athua cipaw kae nyhry,” cite a hopya`ae.
44017021	Pawccecize Athen khuaccaw`ae balynte tuin kya um`ae paw mikhia`ae tuh athawpaw thungpang ho lanpaw te ngae lanpaw kya laelan mih ccyh kha thangsah he khyh`ae.
44017022	Oute Paul tuh Areopakas kungsi kyakhe thadyn zah, “Athen ccungccaw`ae, pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh beiknaw kou na peki oh cipaw ka ny.
44017023	Pawccecize po ka cceih zah na beik oh paw kha he ka do tuh, ‘NY LEIPAW PACHIA KALAN,’ cite ccawtawkuh paw silawhang ccangkheit kha ka muih. Tukeiccu nanning nynh ny leite na beik oh paw Pachia kong kha kae nynh kae hopya oh.
44017024	Laephipi te tuin kya um paw uccaw balyn a raetupaw Pachia, aning tuh vaawran te laephi Bawipaw athua thyhhawte kuih te rae paw tempal`ae kya um khyh.
44017025	Aning tuh ccungccaw balyn kha hiinnaw, hy te pawpaw balyn a pyatupaw athua thyhhawte, pawsang mah a hanlan ho khyh zah ccungccaw`ae kuih te lawpyaku mah a hanlan ho khyh.
44017026	Te aning nynh laephi vawlan balyn um lan ccungccaw phin miakaw kha chii phinkheit kyate a rae; te mih ccyh ccangsapaw kha thuasah, mih umnaw ramri kha thuasah a khyapya`ae.
44017027	Ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw kha a ccung`ae ccaw cite, amaw tuh aening lu raveihte ah sawkuh khyh oh zemah, amaw kha zah`ae sah lah a muih`ae ccaw cite.
44017028	Pawccecize aening tuh amaw kya nynh ah hiin oh, ah pia oh zah ah um oh; nanning lakuze ccawphuatu`ae abang nynh, ‘Aening mah amaw ciihan nynh ah thua oh,’ cite a phua`ae hawte nynh thua.
44017029	Ou tuhte Pachia kya-e ciihan ah thua oh keiccu, ccungccaw cyithyanaw te tuanaw liate rae paw sui, khyh ze phua, khyh ze lung te nynh Pachiathuanaw tuh aloku cite aening nynh ah tua lan oh ccang khyh.
44017030	Te hynh-e nynaw hoi khyh ccyh kha Pachia nynh a muih leipaw olante a um pya`ae, thuasalama atu tuh ahmin takyh kya um paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha ngaesiku lan kaw a pya`ae.
44017031	Pawccemacize, Pachia nynh phe a khang vae paw Ccungccapaw liate laephi ccungccaw`ae kha dingnaw kya byapia cih paw nin, nin kheit kha phe a khyade vae. A chih`ae paw kyate amaw kha a thosahnaw liate ccungccaw balyn hanlan zyn lan um paw ccaekia kha phe a pya vae,” cite Paul nynh a ho.
44017032	Te minmin nynh a chih`ae paw thothuinaw kong kha he a thae`ae tuh abang nynh a sarya`ae; mingccang`ae nynh, “Hynh-e kong hynh kaening nynh na bya bua kae ngae ung cih,” a ci`ae.
44017033	Ou tuhkoute Paul tuh minmin laku kyate phe a pou vae.
44017034	Tuhzemah ccungccaw abang tuh Paul kalan pang`ae zah a zyn`ae; tuh-e`ae kya Dionisias cikuh paw Areopakas memba paw, Damaris cikuh paw nopinung lukheit te ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae a umbua`ae.
44018001	Hynh-e`ae koute Paul tuh Athen khua kyate pou zah Korin khua kyakhe a thua.
44018002	Te Jew`ae balyn tuh Rom khuapi kyate marya a pou cih`ae cite Klaudias siapharanpaw nynh kawpya keiccuze, aro mawze Itali ram kyate a la thua paw, Pontas ram kya a pui paw Akuila acikuh paw Jew paw te a zu Prisilla kha Paul nynh muih`ae zah minmin kyakhe a thua.
44018003	Te Paul tuh alokuhpaw ryalaw a lah paw athua keiccu minmin kya umbua zah rya a lahbua; pawccecize mih ryalaw tuh anuekuh thya paw ryabuu a raetu`ae nynh thua`ae.
44018004	Te Sabbath nin takyh Paul nynh sinakok kya bya hokhae`ae zah Jew`ae te Greek`ae kha a hy`ae.
44018005	Thuasalama Sailas te Timote Mesidonia ram kyate he oun thua`ae tuh Muisaw nynh Paul kha a lungthosah zah Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite Jew`ae kalan ccaekiakhan vae.
44018006	Te Jew`ae nynh rawse`ae zah alue lante bya he honua`ae tuh, Paul nynh a uccaw kha thyng zah, “Nae chii tuh naemaw nae lu vawlan thua vae sah, kae tuh ka thya; atu kyate kae tuh Zenta`ae kalan nynh ka cceih vae cih,” cite minmin kha a cipya`ae.
44018007	Te tuin kyate Paul tuh pou zah Pachia a beik paw, Jastas acikuh paw ccungccapaw inn lungkhu langkhe a tee; tuh-e paw inn tuh sinakok te phang abekuh.
44018008	Te sinakok uktupaw Krispas tuh amaw innbyn`ae balyn ryte Bawipaw kha a zyn`ae, te Korin khuaccaw`ae patae mah thae`ae zah a zyn`ae, te baptisma-in`ae.
44018009	Oute khuazi khe Bawipaw nynh Paul kalan vizin te bya hopah zah, “Rih nan, thuasalama ho ccaleih lah dae nan.
44018010	Pawccecize kae na kya ka um zah nang kha vaemaw muesah lan hung nynh san ae zia lan khyh; pawccecize hynh-e khua kya ccungccaw patae ka hoi,” a cipya.
44018011	Te Paul nynh minmin kha Pachia bya ccangpyate kum kheit sataruh cia khe kya a um.
44018012	Te Kalio tuh Akhai ram mangki lang a tang lya, Jew`ae nynh lungnging te Paul kha rawse`ae zah byapianaw tungkhung malang thuakhae`ae zah,
44018013	“Hynh-e paw nynh Kawbya te arawsekuh lante Pachia kha beik khylan ccungccaw`ae a soih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
44018014	Te Paul nynh a khalang aw lan he a noukuh tuh, Kalio nynh Jew`ae kha, “Pou Jew`ae, hynh-e tuh aseipaw uccaw te ahoy leipaw uccaw athua lanze nanning kha kae ngaesangpya nawlan oh akonglang a um cih.
44018015	Thuasalama hynh-e tuh bya konglang, min konglang te nae kawbya konglang te byakhianawpaw athua zetuh naemaw te naemaw la piakuh oh; pawccecize tuhtahawpaw konglang kae byapia lan ka ry khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44018016	Te minmin kha byapianaw tungkhung kyate pung a dee`ae.
44018017	Oute Greek`ae balyn nynh sinakok uktupaw Sosthene kha kyng`ae zah byapianaw tungkhung malang khe a bua`ae. Te Kalio tuh kha-e uccaw`ae kha pawlangria leite hung a ung.
44018018	Te Paul tuh tuin kya khaw a um ung. Te uteno`ae kyate akhue lawkuh zah tuin te Siria ram lang Prisilla te Akuila ryte sanphalung te a cceih`ae. Byakinkunaw phe a rae keiccuze Kenkhrea khua kyakhe a sang phe a ngokusya.
44018019	Te Efesa khua a thua`ae tuh Paul nynh minmin kha tuin kya a cciataw`ae; thuasalama amaw tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah Jew`ae ryte byahokuh`ae.
44018020	Te minmin nynh mimaw ryte khaw umkheih lan Paul kha he a ngia`ae tuh Paul tuh a nawccah khyh.
44018021	Thuasalama minmin kha beihsya`ae zah, “Atu yn um lanpaw hynh-e poi kha pawpawte thua zemah Jerusalem kya nynh ka la mangbua cih; thuasalama Pachia rynaw athua ze nanning kalan bua kae ki cih,” a cipya`ae. Te Efesa kyate sanphalung te a cceih.
44018022	Te aning tuh Sisaria khua kya he a thua tuh khualae lang kaethung zah kriccawbu kha a beih`ae, te Antiok lang a cceihbung.
44018023	Te tuin kya azawlya a um koute Paul tuh pou zah Galati ram kyate Frikia ram kya po khuaccung zah zuitu`ae balyn kha thawzungpya`ae.
44018024	Te Alexandria khua kya a pui paw, byaho kou apuakuh paw, Ccathyaa kou nyh paw, Apollos cikuh paw Jew paw lukheit tuh Efesa khua lang yn thua.
44018025	Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh Bawipaw laanpi kya thuihei paw nynh athua; muisaw kya lungthawsae paw thua zah aning nynh Bawipaw kya-e uccaw`ae kong kha ho zah hmerarihlan a ccangpya; tuhzemah Johan baptisma kong rou kha nynh a ny.
44018026	Te aning nynh sinakok kyakhe rawhoyte yn ho vae. Akuila te Prisilla nynh a hopaw kha he a thae`ae tuh, kha-e paw kha mih kalan hoei`ae zah Pachia laanpi kha houh ahme lante a ccaesapya`ae.
44018027	Te aning nynh Akhai ram lang po he a cceih ry tuh amaw kha lehkhan ccaw`ae cite uteno`ae nynh zuitu`ae kalan ccawzeipya`ae; te aning nynh he a thua tuh thawccinaw liate a zyn`ae paw kha patae a bawng`ae;
44018028	pawccecize Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cipaw kha Ccathyaa kyate langsapyate ccungccaw zapi malang Jew`ae kha rawhoy te phe a ei kho`ae.
44019001	Ou tuhcihte Apollos tuh Korin khua kya a um lyakhe, Paul tuh thalang-e ram kha po yn cciakhung zah Efesa khua kya yn thua, te zuitu`ae abang kha a muih`ae.
44019002	Te minmin kha, “He na zyn lya oh te Thyaa Muisaw na mue vae oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Thyaa Muisaw a um cipaw heize kae thae boi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
44019003	Te Paul nynh, “Tuhte lanze paw baptisma mou na in oh?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Johan kya-e baptisma,” a ci`ae.
44019004	Oute Paul nynh, “Johan nynh tuh ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kha insah`ae zah amaw koute yn thua lanpaw kha a zyn`ae ccaw cite ccungccaw`ae kha a hopya`ae, tuh-e paw tuh Kri Jesu kha nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
44019005	Minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh, Bawipaw Jesu min kya baptismain` ae.
44019006	Te Paul nynh minmin tungvaw a kuih he a khang tuh Thyaa Muisaw minmin tungvaw yn thua; te minmin tuh bya ccangpaw te ho`ae zah profehbya a ho`ae.
44019007	Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh abalynte luhaw laening loukaw acih`ae.
44019008	Te Paul tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah sawpaw sathung cia Pachia peenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha hokhae`ae zah soihbiate rawhoy te a ho.
44019009	Thuasalama ccungccaw abang tuh mih lungkhung zah zyn khyh`ae, ccungccaw zapi malang kha-e Ccianaw kong kha thethya he a ho`ae tuh Paul tuh minmin kyate pou zah zuitu`ae kha a poukhae`ae, te Tirannas kya-e siainn kyakhe nin takyh bya hokhae`ae.
44019010	Te tuhcihte kum ning cia aro, tukeiccu Asia ram kya um paw ccungccaw balyn, Jew`ae mah Greek`ae mah Bawipaw Jesu bya kha a thae`ae.
44019011	Te Pachia nynh Paul kuih mangte acyikuh boi leipaw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha a langsaku.
44019012	Ou tuhte Paul a pyn kya-e pavua, tukhyhze taeccia uccaw ccangkhakheit kha ngeccih`ae kalan ccyngpah`ae zah ccinaw`ae tuh minmin kyate phe a pou, te ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae mah phe toikuh`ae.
44019013	Oute ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae adeethya`ae paw, a khia a vekuh`ae paw Jew`ae abang nynh, “Paul nynh a hopaw Jesu liate nanning kha kae dee oh,” cite ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae nynh a ccungnua`ae paw tungvaw khe Bawipaw Jesu min kha konua lan a lawku`ae.
44019014	Jew ranpibawi alepaw Skeva cikuh paw ccaaw`ae lusari a la um`ae, minmin nynh tuhte a cyih`ae.
44019015	Te ahoy leipaw muisaw nynh, “Jesu tuh ka nyh, Paul mah ka nyh, thuasalama nanning tuh hungmou na thua oh?” cite a khung`ae.
44019016	Te ahoy leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccapaw nynh minmin tungvaw thohnuakuh`ae zah phe a tae`ae, te phe a risah`ae keiccu, minmin tuh kha-e inn kyate sasete ccue`ae zah vaemaw a muebia`ae.
44019017	Te hynh-e tuh Efesa kya um`ae paw Jew`ae te Greek`ae balyn nynh marya a ny`ae; te minmin balyn nynh rih`ae zah Bawipaw Jesu min kha phu-esah`ae.
44019018	Te a zyn paw ccungccaw patae oun thua`ae zah mih cyisahnaw`ae kha langsakuh`ae zah seiphykuh`ae.
44019019	Mitleihthya`ae paw patae nynh mah mih ccauh`ae kha marya oun ccyng`ae zah ccungccaw balyn malang khe maee te a rua`ae. Kha-e ccauh`ae mee kha tua`ae zah ngunphua thung sungpangaw mee acih cipaw a muih`ae.
44019020	Ou tuhte Pachia bya tuh thungnaw te lethung zah a tae.
44019021	Hynh-e`ae acyikuh koute, Paul nynh Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kha po he a khung koute Jerusalem lang ccia lan a thinlung kya noukuh zah, “Tuin kya he ka thua koute Rom khuapi mah ka muih hahe aho cih,” a ci.
44019022	Tukeiccu amaw ryalawpah`ae paw luning, Timote te Erastas kha Mesidonia ram lang a saw`ae, thuasalama amaw tuh Asia ram kya sosoh a umhy ung.
44019023	Tuh ccyh lya tuh-e Ccianaw konglang te byalungnaw alepi apou.
44019024	Pawccecize Demetrias cikuh paw phualaeetupaw lukheit nynh Artemis khozinung kya-e phua-inn taraw`ae kha rae zah phualaeetu`ae kha patae leih a muesah`ae.
44019025	Tuh-e paw nynh phualaeetu`ae te tuhtahawpaw ryalah paw ccungccaw`ae kha ko`ae zah, “Ccungccaw oh, hynh-e ryalawnaw kya nynh aening muenaw tuh a um cipaw na ny oh.
44019026	Te hynh-e Paul nynh, ‘Kuih te rae paw tuh pachia thua khyh,’ cite ho zah Efesa khua kya kyalya thua leite Asia ram balyn mah ccungccaw patae kha soih`ae zah a paleihsaku`ae paw kha na muih oh zah na thae oh.
44019027	Ou tuhte aening phualaeepaw thyanaw hynh ccakaepaw lang yn tang cih cipaw thinphang lan a um kyalya thualeite alesaepaw khozinung Artemis kya-e tempal mah pawlangria vae lan khyh`ae zah Asia ram balynte laephipi nynh a beik`ae paw amaw phu-e lesaenaw mah yn roh cih cipaw thinphang lan a um,” cite a hopya`ae.
44019028	Minmin nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae`ae tuh myarya mih bungpaw zah, “Efesa`ae kya-e Artemis tuh alesaepaw nynh thua!” cite a sia`ae.
44019029	Te khualae balyn tuh byalungnaw te phe beih zah Paul ryte khuaccungkheih`ae paw Mesidonia ccungccaw`ae Kaias te Aristarkhas kha kyng`ae zah poidonaw inn lungkhu langkhe lungngingte po a teekhae`ae.
44019030	Te Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae kalan teebua lan he a noukuh tuh zuitu`ae nynh ua khyh`ae.
44019031	Te Asia ram kyaze lupi athua`ae paw, Paul a ruiban`ae abang nynh poidonaw inn lungkhu lang amaw te amaw a phungkuh bua khyh nawlan a kalan ccungccaw saw`ae zah a soihbiasah`ae.
44019032	Ccungccaw sueluakuh`ae paw tuh keisukeilae pung a um keiccuze abang nynh ccangte sia`ae zah abang nynh phinccang lante a sia`ae, alunghua tuh pawkeiccu nynh pynkheihlan kae thua cipaw mah nyh khyh`ae.
44019033	Te Jew`ae nynh Alexanda kha malang toisakuh`ae zah ccungccaw zapi kyate a poukhae`ae. Alexanda nynh a kuih kha dyngpah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kalan amaw hanlan hokunaw rae lan a ry.
44019034	Thuasalama minmin nynh aning tuh Jew paw cipaw he a nyh`ae tuh mih balyn mawte, “Efesa`ae kya-e Artemis tuh alesaepaw nynh thua!” cite suimilan ccangning loukaw cia roi kheit lante thawte a sia`ae.
44019035	Te khua ccazipaw nynh ccungccaw`ae kha a daesah`ae koute, “Efesa ccungccaw`ae, Efesa khua tuh alesaepaw Artemis khozinung a tempal te Zeus pachia kyate yn ccah paw zohtuh a ringtu nynh thua cipaw hynh a nyh leipaw hungmou a um?
44019036	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh ei kho leipaw athua keiccu, daetedae lang na um oh ho zah na rangsah lan oh ccan khyh.
44019037	Pawccecize tempal uccaw mah a luade`ae paw thua khyh zah nae khozinung mah thethyaho`ae paw athua leipaw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh nanning nynh hynhlang nae thuakhae oh.
44019038	Tukeiccu Demetrias thuasah, amaw ryte um`ae paw phualaeetu`ae nynh thuasah lukhakheit tungvaw byalungnaw a hoi`ae ze byapia zung um zah vuethoh`ae mah a um; mimaw te mimaw thuakhaekuh`ae sah.
44019039	Thuasalama nanning nynh ccangpaw akong hory paw na hoi oh ze, aphung thyhte khuapumkunaw kya nynh byapae lanpaw athua.
44019040	Pawccecize atunin e byalungnaw keiccu aening hynh byakhianaw kya oun ko cih`ae cipaw ri lan a um, pawccecize hynh-e atazae leipaw sueluakunaw hanlan aening nynh ah hoku lan oh paw oun hoi lan khyh oh,” a ci.
44019041	Hynhte he a ho koute a pumkuh`ae paw kha phe a pousah`ae.
44020001	Tuh-e byalungnaw adae koute Paul nynh zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah a beihsya`ae koute Mesidonia ram lang ccia lan a thokuh.
44020002	Te tuh-e pee kya po cceih zah zuitu`ae kha thawzung pyanaw bya patae a hopah`ae koute Greece ram lang a thua.
44020003	Te tuin kya sawpaw sathung a um. Te Siria ram lang sanphalung te ccia lan vae cite he a noukuh tuh Jew`ae nynh phee lan a nounuaku`ae keiccu Mesidonia ram langte ki lan a tuaku vae.
44020004	Te Beria khua paw Sopater, Thesalonika khua paw Aristarkhas te Sekundus, Derbe khua paw Kaias te Timote, te Asia ram kya-e Taichikas te Trofimas tuh Paul kya Asia ram lang a cceihbua`ae.
44020005	Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh malang la cceihty`ae zah Troas khua kyakhe kaening kha oun la ngaw`ae.
44020006	Te Ransi phing leipaw Sanlou Poi he athang koute kaening tuh Filipi khua kyate sanphalung te kae cceih zah nin pangaw cihte minmin umnaw`ae Troas khua kae thua, tuin kya nin sari kae um.
44020007	Te lonaw kyaze masaty nin kya zuitu`ae nynh sanlou ia lan pynkheihlan he oun thua`ae tuh, Paul tuh awkhualan thoku lan phe a noukuh vae keiccuze minmin kha phung hopah`ae zah ziraccyng cia po a pia.
44020008	Te minmin nynh pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae palung khaan kya maeekhua patae a aw`ae.
44020009	Te Utikhas cikuh paw ccangvaepaw tuh thanlang-aw kin kya dahung zah bubu a la ngawphukuh; Paul nynh khaw cia phung he ho tuh, tuh-e paw tuh a ngawphukuh lante khaan thungnaw kyate boh ccah zah phe chihpaw kha a khuin`ae.
44020010	Te Paul tuh rungbung zah kha-e paw tungvaw a bakhung thing, te varyng pum zah, “Nae lungvawsaw nan sah, pawccecize a hiinnaw tuh amaw kya phang a um,” a ci.
44020011	Te Paul tuh bua kaethung zah sanlou kha eih zah a ae`ae, te khua phe dae lang cia, khaw cia bya a ho koute phe a pou.
44020012	Te minmin nynh ccangvaepaw kha a hiin te cciakhae`ae zah myarya mih ngaengan.
44020013	Te kaening tuh sanphalung kalan kae cceihty zah Assos khua kalan sanphalung te kae cceih, tuin e Paul kha hoeibua lan vae cite kae noukuh; pawccecize aning tuh ccu te ccia lan cite phe a la noukuh vae keiccu khahcihte a paccynpaw athua.
44020014	Aning tuh kaening ryte Assos khua kya he kae tungkuh tuh amaw kha kae hoeibua zah Mitylen khua lang kae cceih.
44020015	Te tuin kyate sanphalung te kae cceih zah awkhualan tuh Khios tuikoih te adekunaw kya kae thua. Te ccangpaw nin kya Samos tuikoih kya kae thua zah Trokilliam tuikoih pe kae hae-ung. Te ccangpaw nin kya Miletas khua kae thua.
44020016	Paul nynh Pentikos Nin kya athua kho ze Jerusalem kya phe thua lante a rangsaku keiccuze Asia ram kya khaw aro ry khyh pawte Efesa khua kha po cciakhung lante phe a tuakuty vae.
44020017	Te Miletas khua kyate Paul nynh Efesa khua lang ccungccaw saw zah kriccawbu kya-e pastor`ae kha a ko`ae.
44020018	Te minmin nynh a kalan he oun thua`ae tuh Paul nynh, “Asia ram lungkhu lang kae thua takaw nin kyate nanning ryte ka um lungkhu balyn pawcihte nynh ka um cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh,
44020019	zakawsangsakunaw thinlung balyn te, mitphi patae lua te, Jew`ae kya-e pheenaw keiccu ka tungvaw thua paw syntawnaw`ae kha teingbiate Bawipaw rya ka law paw kha na ny oh.
44020020	Nae hanlan athane paw, pawsang mah ka thuru bang khyh, ccungccaw zapi kya thuasah, inn kheit koute inn kheit thuasah nanning kha kae hopah oh zah kae ccangpya oh.
44020021	Pachia kalan ngaesikunaw kong te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya zynnaw kong kha Jew`ae kalan te Greek`ae kalan mah ccaekia ka khan paw kha mah na ny oh.
44020022	Te atu, dotua, kae tuh Muisaw liate hede ka thua zah Jerusalem lang ka cceih, tuin kya ka tungvaw paw nynh yn thua cih cipaw ka nyh khyh.
44020023	Heedenawpaw te vawsaw riathaenaw nynh kamaw kha phang yn ngaw cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh khua takyh kya kamaw kong ccaekiakhan paw rou nynh ka ny.
44020024	Thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw te asekuhpaw thehoypaw kha ccaekiakhan khylan Bawipaw Jesu kyate ka mue paw ryalaw athua paw te ka ryalaw kha lungtuate ka thang kho nawlan kha-e vawsaw riathaenaw`ae kha pawlang ka ria vae khyh zah ka hiinnaw mah ka duakuh vae khyh.
44020025	“Te atu, kae nynh ka cceih zah Pachia peenaw kong kae hopya oh paw nanning balyn nynh ka mae hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh cipaw ka ny.
44020026	Tukeiccu kae tuh ccungccaw balyn chii kyate ka thya cipaw atu nin nanning kalan ccaekia ka khan.
44020027	Pawccecize Pachia khuakhannaw balyn kha nanning kalan phy lan ka syngkuh khyh.
44020028	Tukeiccu naemaw te naemaw raeringkuh oh lah Pachia nynh amaw a chii te a re paw Pachia kriccawbu kha dooih khylan Thyaa Muisaw nynh nanning kha dooihtu`ae lang ae khangnua oh paw tuuphu`ae balyn kha mah la raering oh.
44020029	Pawccecize kamaw phe ka pou koute rehahanpaw suizaw`ae nynh tuuphu`ae kha haangbang leite nanning laku lang oun tee cih`ae cipaw hynh ka ny.
44020030	Zuitu`ae kha mih kalan soih khylan ahme leipaw bya a ho paw ccungccaw`ae kha naemaw ccaccei kyate mah oun pou cih`ae.
44020031	Tukeiccu raeringkuh oh lah kum thung lungkhu khuazi khuadae mitphi ryte ccungccaw miakaw kha raeringpya lan ka dae khyh paw kha la ning nan oh.
44020032	“Te uteno`ae, atu nanning kha Pachia kalan te amaw thawccinaw bya kalan kae ah oh; tuh-e nynh nanning kha ae lethungsah kho oh zah thyaasah athua vae`ae paw balyn ryte nanning kha rho uccaw ae pya kho oh.
44020033	Kae tuh hung ccungccaw kya-e phua, sui, uccaw`ae mah ka dua bang khyh.
44020034	Athua, hynh-e ka kuih`ae nynh kamaw elan ahoboupaw hanlan te kamaw ryte um`ae paw hanlan ryalawpya cipaw naemaw ccaccei nynh phe na ny oh.
44020035	Hynh hawte ryalaw lawte thawzungzya`ae paw kha nanning nynh na bawng oh aho cipaw nanning kalan marya kae langsapya vae oh. Te, ‘Mue paw laeze pya paw nynh hythua a um hua,’ cite Bawipaw Jesu nynh a hopaw bya kha la liathui oh,” cite Paul nynh a hopya`ae.
44020036	Te tuhte he a ho koute a ccukharutung zah minmin balyn ryte sawsang`ae.
44020037	Te minmin balyn tuh thawmawte rah`ae zah Paul a nging kha pum`ae zah a myng`ae,
44020038	amaw mae kha nae muih vae lan khyh oh cite a hopaw bya keiccu mih ngae houh athah. Te Paul kha sanphalung kyacia a dohaw`ae.
44021001	Ou tuhcihte minmin ryte kae phiakuh koute sanphalung te kae cceih, dingrarihlan kae cceih zah Kos tuikoih kya kae thua, awkhualan tuh Rhodes tuikoih kya kae thua, te tuin kyate Patara khua kya kae thua.
44021002	Te Finisia ram lang cceih paw sanphalung kha kae muih zah kae ccikuh bua zah kae cceihbua.
44021003	Saiparas tuikoih kha he kae muih tuh voilang khe kae cciataw zah Siria ram lang kae cceih zah Tai khua kya a hae-ung, pawccecize sanphalung nynh a phupaw uccaw kha tuin kya saw lan a cih.
44021004	Te zuitu`ae kha kae muih`ae zah tuin kya nin sari kae um. Jerusalem lang a cciathung khyh nawlan minmin nynh Paul kha Muisaw liate a hopya`ae.
44021005	Te nin sari he aro te kae pou zah he kae cceih tuh minmin balyn nynh mih zu mih ccaaw`ae ryte khua khunglang cia oun dohaw`ae. Te rili kin kya ccukharutungte saw kae sang.
44021006	Lukheit koute lukheit kae beihkuhsya zah kaening tuh sanphalung vawlan kae kae, te minmin tuh inn lang a ki`ae.
44021007	Te Tai khua kyate kae khuaccungpaw he kae thangsah tuh Tolemai khua kya kae thua, te uteno`ae kha kae beih`ae zah minmin ryte nin kheit kae umkheih.
44021008	Te awkhualan nin kya Paul ryte kae pou zah Sisaria khua kya kae thua, te evangelist lusari kyaze lukheit athua paw Filip inn lungkhu lang kae tee zah amaw ryte kae um.
44021009	Tuh-e paw nynh profehbya ho`ae paw liaccady ccanung lu pali a hoi.
44021010	Te tuin kya nin patae kae um tuh Akabus cikuh paw profeh lukheit Judah ram kyate yn thua.
44021011	Te kaening kalan he yn thua tuh Paul kya-e taesung kha lawkuh zah a kuih te a ccu kha heekuh zah, “ ‘Hynh-e taesung a hoi paw ccungccapaw hynh Jerusalem kya Jew`ae nynh hynh hawte a khii cih`ae zah Zenta`ae kuih kalan a ah cih`ae,’ cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh a ho,” a ci.
44021012	Te tuh-e bya tuh he kae thae tuh kaening ry tuh-e hmin kya um`ae paw ry, Jerusalem lang a ccia khyh nawlan Paul kha kae soihbia.
44021013	Oute Paul nynh tho zah, “Pawccemou na rah oh zah ka thinlung nae koisah oh? Bawipaw Jesu min hanlan Jerusalem kya khiiku lanpaw kyalya thua leite chi lan heize paccynkute ka um,” a ci.
44021014	Te hopya kho he a um khyh tuh kaening tuh zya kae dae zah, “Bawipaw rynaw thyhte thua vae sah,” kae ci.
44021015	Tuh-e koute kae uccaw`ae kha kae lawkuh zah Jerusalem lang kae cceihthung.
44021016	Sisaria khua e zuitu`ae abang mah kaening ryte a cceihbua`ae, te minmin nynh kaening kae thua cihnaw Mnason cikuh paw Saiparaspaw, a kum tang vae paw zuitu kha oun hoeibua`ae.
44021017	Te Jerusalem kya he kae thua tuh uteno`ae nynh lungtuate leh oun khan`ae.
44021018	Awkhualan Paul tuh kaening ryte James kalan cceihbua zah kriccaw piccang`ae balyn a la um`ae.
44021019	Te Paul nynh minmin kha beih`ae zah amaw a ryalawnaw liate Pachia nynh Zenta`ae laku a cyipaw kha marya a hopya`ae.
44021020	Te minmin nynh tuh-e he a thae`ae tuh Bawipaw kha phu-esah`ae, te Paul kha, “Kae neitaw, a zyn paw Jew`ae milu athung asang hozeih nynh a um`ae cipaw kha na muih, te minmin balyn tuh Kawbya kalan a zuakuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
44021021	Te Zenta`ae laku um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh mih ccaaw`ae vindung aw ho vae khyh, aphung thyhte mah zui ho vae khyh cite na cipah`ae zah Mawsi kawbya kha vua khylan na ccangpya`ae cipaw na kong kha minmin nynh phe a thae vae`ae.
44021022	Tukeiccu pawte cyi lan? Ccungccaw zapi tuh oun sueluakuh mamin cih`ae, pawccecize nang na thua cipaw kha phe a thae cih`ae.
44021023	Tukeiccu hynh-e nang kae hopya paw hynh cyih. Byakinkunaw phe a rae vae`ae paw ccungccaw lupali kae hoi`ae.
44021024	Minmin kha cciakhae`ae lah minmin ryte ccikankuh oh, mih sang a ngoku ccaw`ae amee kha la pyapah`ae; ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh na konglang a thae`ae paw kha accakaepaw nynh thua cipaw a ny ccaw`ae, te namaw mah kawbya na zui zah kawbya thyhte na um cipaw kha oun nyh cih`ae.
44021025	Thuasalama a zyn paw Zenta`ae konglang tuh khahtahawpaw kha zui ho khyh, zohtuh kalan silawnaw`ae paw, chii, ngingmae te chia paw te ohhuakunaw kyate rou nynh mimaw te mimaw kha a sungku`ae aho cite ccaw kae zei zah bya phe kae pae vae`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
44021026	Oute Paul nynh kha-e ccungccaw`ae kha a cciakhae`ae, te awkhualan khe minmin ryte amaw kha a ccikankuh koute, ccikankunaw nin tuh phe accing vae cipaw kha thaesah khylan`ae tempal lungkhu lang a tee, tuh-e ccyh kya nynh minmin lu raveih hanlan silawkunaw tuh rae lanpaw athua.
44021027	Te nin sari vyavya he acihte Asia ram kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh Paul kha tempal kya he muih`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha hy`ae zah a kyng`ae,
44021028	“Israel ccungccaw`ae oun bawng oh, hynh-e paw tuh ah ccungccaw`ae kha thuasah, Kawbya kha thuasah, te hynh-e hmin kha thuasah, rawsete ahmin takyh kya ccungccaw balyn kha a ccangpah paw nynh thua, te tuhlaeze Greek`ae kha mah tempal lungkhu lang teekhae`ae zah hynh-e athyaapaw hmin hynh phe a thusah vae,” cite a sia`ae.
44021029	(Pawccecize langmaw lya khua lungkhu khe Paul ryte Efesa khuapaw Trofimas kha minmin nynh muih`ae zah kha-e paw kha tempal lungkhu lang Paul nynh a teekhae cite a tua`ae keiccu nynh thua).
44021030	Khualae balyn ngaluinngaluin accae; te ccungccaw`ae nynh pynkheihlan oun ccue`ae zah Paul kha kyng`ae zah tempal voidu kyate po poukhae`ae, te vaekheihmawte thuakaw`ae kha phe a khaw`ae.
44021031	Te minmin nynh Paul kha chia lan cite a nounuaku`ae lyakhe Jerusalem khua balyn kya byalungnaw a um cipaw thungpang kha rhawkaw thungkheit uk paw rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh,
44021032	rhawkaw`ae te rhawkaw zakheit uktupaw rhawbawi`ae kha arangte ko`ae zah minmin kalan a ccuenua bung`ae. Te minmin nynh rhawbawipaw te rhawkaw`ae kha he muih`ae tuh Paul kha bua vae khyh`ae.
44021033	Oute rhawbawipaw nynh Paul pe langkhe cceih zah a kyng, sivarui ccangning te khii lan kawpya`ae; te aning tuh hungmou, pawmou a cyi cipaw kha a khia`ae.
44021034	Te ccungccaw zapi laku abang nynh ccangte sia`ae zah abang nynh ccanglang te a sia`ae keiccu, rhawbawipaw nynh accaccingpaw kha a ny kho khyh keiccuze Paul kha rhawkaw inn lungkhu lang phang oh cite kawpya`ae.
44021035	Te nawkui kya he a thua tuh ccungccaw`ae myarya so`ae keiccuze rhawkaw`ae nynh Paul kha hang`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
44021036	Pawccecize ccungccaw zapi nynh, “Theih oh!” cite sia`ae zah a zuibia`ae.
44021037	Te rhawkaw inn lungkhu lang teedyn khe Paul nynh, “Nang kha bya kae hopya ze?” cite rhawbawipaw kha a khia. Rhawbawipaw nynh, “Greek bya na hothya tou?
44021038	Nang hynh anuhlang lyaze ccungccaw na rawse zah damiah thung pali kha rangkaw lang a cciakhae paw Izip ccungccapaw kha na thua khyh tou?” cite a khia.
44021039	Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Kae tuh Silisia ram, Tarsuh khua kya a pui paw Jew paw nynh ka thua, anyaa leipaw khuapi kya um paw nynh ka thua, e ccungccaw`ae kalan byahonaw kaw yn pyabua, kae ngiaku,” a cipya.
44021040	Rhawbawipaw nynh kaw pya zah Paul tuh nawkui vawlan thadyn zah ccungccaw`ae kha a kuih te syntawnaw a pya`ae. Te khaw cia daebabilan he a um`ae te Paul nynh Hebru bya te hynhte a ho:
44022001	“Uteno`ae te paaw`ae, nanning kalan atu ka thungkhawkunawpaw bya hynh la ngaetua oh,” a ci.
44022002	Te Hebru bya te a ho paw kha minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh houh daebabilan a um`ae. Te Paul nynh,
44022003	“Kae tuh Silisia ram Tarsuh khua kya a pui paw Jew ccungccaw nynh ka thua, tuhzemah hynh-e khua kya ka lethung zah Kamaliel ccu leihpaw kya paaw`ae kawbya phung thyhte phe ccing lan a ccangpya`ae paw te atunin nanning balyn hawte Pachia kalan myarya a zuakuhpaw nynh ka thua.
44022004	Pise mah nopi mah ka hee`ae zah thunginn lungkhu lang ka saw`ae; hynh-e Ccianaw kha chinaw phe phah lang cia ka tua ka sah.
44022005	Tuhte ranpibawi lupi te piccang`ae phu balyn mah kae ka ccaekia`ae nynh thua`ae, minmin kyate uteno`ae kalan a ky`ae paw ccaw kha kae mah ka ccyng zah Damaskas khua kya um`ae paw, kha-e beiknaw a beik`ae paw kha detah khylan sivarui te hee lan`ae zah Jerusalem lang ky lan`ae cite Damaskas lang ka cceih.
44022006	“Ou tuhte kae tuh khua ka ccung zah Damaskas khua lang vyavya ka thuadyn, ninthuccyng loukaw khe, vaawran kyate alepipaw awnaw tuh vaekheihmawte ka pepan khe phae yn aw.
44022007	Te kae tuh laephi kalan ka khuliakuh zah, ‘Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah?’ cite a hopaw roi kha ka thae.
44022008	Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?’ cite ka khung. Te aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh nang nynh na tua na sah paw Nazareth paw Jesu nynh ka thua,’ yn cipya.
44022009	“Te kamaw ryte a cceihbua`ae paw nynh awnaw kha phe muih bua ccaccing`ae zah a rih`ae, thuasalama ka kalan bya ho paw kha-e paw roi kha minmin nynh thaebua khyh`ae.
44022010	Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, pawmou ka cyih cih?’ ka ci. Te Bawipaw nynh, ‘Thokuh lah Damaskas khua lungkhu langkhe cceih, tuin kya na cyi lanpaw balyn kha ae hopah cih`ae,’ yn cipya.
44022011	Te tuh-e awnaw phu-enaw keiccuze kae tuh ngaw he ka muih kho khyh tuh, kamaw ryte a cceihbua`ae paw nynh mih kuih te oun cciakhae`ae zah Damaskas khua lungkhu lang ka thua.
44022012	“Te tuin kya um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh thehoyccousah`ae paw, Kawbya thyhte kou a zuakuhpaw ccungccapaw Ananias nynh,
44022013	ka kalan yn thua zah ka pe thadyn zah, ‘Ka neitaw Saul, ngawmuih ccavae,’ yn cipya. Tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya amaw kha ka dothung zah ka muih.
44022014	Te aning nynh, ‘Nang nynh Pachia rynaw kha na ny nawlan, te Midingpaw kha na muih nawlan, te amaw khalang kya-e roi kha na thae nawlan cite ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh nang kha phe ae po vae.
44022015	Pawccecize na muih paw te na thae paw kha ccungccaw`ae balyn kalan ho lan nang tuh amaw ccaekia na thua cih.
44022016	Te atu pawccemou phang na ngaw? Thokuh lah baptismain, te Bawipaw min kha kote na seinaw`ae kha la singkuh,’ yn cipya.
44022017	“Ou tuhcihte Jerusalem lang bua ka ki zah tempal voidu lungkhu kya saw ka sang cciamang lyakhe, kae tuh phe ka la ngawphukuh zah,
44022018	kamaw kha, ‘Rangsakuh lah Jerusalem kyate arangte pou; pawccecize kamaw konglang nang nynh ccaekia na khan paw kha minmin nynh lehkhan lan khyh`ae,’ cite yn hopatupaw kha ka muih.
44022019	Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang ae zyn`ae paw kha sinakok miakaw kya ka bua`ae zah thung ka saw`ae cipaw kha minmin nynh a ny`ae.
44022020	Te namaw e sawlangchia athua paw Stifen a chii lua lyakha kae mah a pe ka thadynbua zah a chinaw kya ka nawccahbua, te amaw theih`ae paw mih uccaw`ae kha a ngawpah`ae paw nynh ka thua,’ ka ci.
44022021	Te aning nynh, ‘La cceih; pawccecize nang kha Zenta`ae kalan e kyate asawnaw lang kae saw cih,’ yn cipya,” cite Paul nynh a ci.
44022022	Te minmin nynh kha-e bya kha he a ho cia a ngaepya`ae, oute mih roi saw`ae zah, “Tuhtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh laephi kyate ccaring vua oh; pawccecize aning tuh hiin lan ngaekuh khyh!” a ci`ae.
44022023	Ou tuhte minmin nynh a sia`ae, mih uccaw phaekuh`ae zah vuiping kha he a theithung`ae tuh,
44022024	rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha pawccemou tuhte a sianua`ae cipaw ny khylan, rhawkaw-inn lungkhu lang phang oh lah ziabua te byakhia thuasah cite kaw a pya`ae.
44022025	Te minmin nynh saphuarui te he a hee`ae tuh Paul nynh a pe a thadyn paw rhawbawipaw kha, “Rom ccungccaw athua paw te seibe lan um leipaw ccungccaw hynh nanning nynh ziabua lan accan tou?” a cipya.
44022026	Tuh-e tuh rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh cceih zah rhawbawi lupi kha, “Na cyi dyn khe raeringkuh vae lou; pawccecize hynh-e paw tuh Rom ccungccapaw nynh athua,” cite a hopya.
44022027	Oute rhawbawi lupi nynh yn cceih zah Paul kha, “Nang hynh Rom ccungccapaw na thua tou? Oun hopah,” a cipya. Paul nynh, “Ka thua,” a ci.
44022028	Te rhawbawi lupi nynh, “Phua patae pyate nynh kae tuh Rom ccungccawthuanaw hynh ka mue,” a ci. Te Paul nynh, “Thuasalama kae tuh puinaw kyate nynh ka mue,” a ci.
44022029	Oute Paul kha byakhia lan acih`ae paw tuh a kyate vaekheihmawte phe pou`ae; te aning tuh Rom paw nynh athua cipaw kha thuasah, te amaw a khiidepaw kha thuasah rhawbawi lupi nynh he a nyh tuh a rih vae.
44022030	Awkhualan, Jew`ae nynh pawkeiccumou Paul kha seibe`ae cipaw phe ria lan a ny ry keiccuze rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha supah zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kungsi`ae balyn kha tungku lan kawpya`ae, te Paul kha cciakhae bung zah mih malang khe a nung.
44023001	Te Paul nynh kungsi`ae kha rirido`ae zah, “Uteno`ae kae tuh atunin cia Pachia malang mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ahoypaw te nynh ka hiin,” a ci.
44023002	Te ranpibawi lupi Ananias nynh Paul a mung kha bua oh cite a pe thadyn`ae paw kha kawpya`ae.
44023003	Oute Paul nynh, “Arawpaw sithuh`ae paw lungrua! Pachia nynh nang kha ae bua vae cih. Pawccecize nang tuh kae kha Kawbya thyhte byapia lan khaw na dahung, te Kawbya te arawsekuh lante kae kha bua lan kaw na pya`ae tou?” a ci.
44023004	Te a pe thadyn`ae paw nynh, “Nang nynh Pachia kya-e ranpibawi lupi kha na sang tou?” a ci`ae.
44023005	Oute Paul nynh, “Uteno`ae, aning tuh ranpibawi lupi cipaw ka nyh khyh; pawccecize, ‘Na ccungccaw`ae uktupaw kha a thethya na ho lan khyh,’ cite azeikuh,” a ci.
44023006	Thuasalama tuh-e`ae kya phu kheit tuh Sadusi`ae thua zah ccangpaw phu tuh Farasi`ae nynh thua cipaw kha Paul nynh he a nyh tuh, “Uteno`ae, kae tuh Farasipaw nynh ka thua, Farasipaw ccapaw nynh ka thua, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw te ngaehoinaw kong keiccu nynh kae tuh byapia ka thua,” cite kungsi`ae kyakhe thawte a sia.
44023007	Ou tuhte he a ho tuh Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae laku byaeikunaw yn pou zah ccungccaw zapi tuh phe phiakuh`ae.
44023008	Pawccecize Sadusi`ae nynh tuh thothuinaw um khyh, vaaw ccungccaw um khyh, muisaw mah um khyh a ci`ae; thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh tuh paryh a um a ci`ae.
44023009	Te siaruanaw pipi yn pou. Te Farasi`ae kalan a pang`ae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh thokuh`ae zah thawte a ei`ae: “Hynh-e paw kya a seipaw kharyh kae muih khyh. Muisaw nynh thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw nynh thuasah a kalan byahopya lan thua ze, Pachia hynh rawsete dou nan oh sih,” a ci`ae.
44023010	Te thawmawte eikunaw he a um tuh, ccungccaw`ae nynh Paul kha oun sue cih`ae zah phe oun paethungku cih`ae cite rhawbawi lupi nynh a thinphang keiccuze rhawkaw`ae kha cciabung lan te minmin laku kyate Paul kha thawte poukhae lan zah rhawkawinn lungkhu lang teekhae lan kaw a pya`ae.
44023011	Te awkhualan khuazi kya Bawipaw nynh Paul pe khe thadyn zah, “Paul, na thawmuin sah; pawccecize Jerusalem kya kamaw kong ccaekia na khan hawte Rom khuapi kya mah ccaekia na khan ung cih,” a cipya.
44023012	Te khua he adae tuh Jew`ae abang nynh aphu te um`ae zah, “Aening nynh Paul kha ah chia mawlaezung oh ae lei lan zah tui mah nia lei lan,” cite mimaw te mimaw kha thyalawkute byakanku`ae.
44023013	Tuh-e pheenaw a rae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh milu sungpali lae acih`ae.
44023014	Te minmin nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Paul kae chia makhia pawsang mah kae ae lan khyh cite kaemaw te kaemaw thyalawkute bya phe kae kanku vae.
44023015	Tukeiccu awkhualan rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha nanning kalan yn cciakhae ccaw, amaw kha houh aria lan byakhia aho vae cih paw olante oun cih oh lah, nanning nynh kungsi`ae ryte rhawbawi lupi kha oun hopah oh; te Paul tuh nanning kalan yn thua maw khe kaening tuh amaw kha chia lan paccynkute kae um vae,” cite a hopya`ae.
44023016	Te Paul a ccianung ccapaw nynh kha-e minmin nynh a buih`ae paw kong kha he a thae tuh cceih zah rhawkaw-inn lungkhu lang tee zah Paul kha phe a hopya.
44023017	Oute Paul nynh rhawbawi lukheit kha ko zah, “Hynh-e ccangvaepaw taraw hynh rhawbawi lupi kalan la cciakhae, pawccecize amaw kha a hopya lanpaw uccaw a um,” a cipya.
44023018	Tukeiccu rhawbawipaw nynh kha-e ccangvaepaw kha rhawbawi lupi kalan cciakhae zah, “Thungccahpaw Paul nynh kae kha a kalan yn ko zah, nang na kalan ccangkheit hopya lanpaw a hoi paw e ccangvaepaw hynh na kalan beih la cciakhae cite yn naw,” a cipya.
44023019	Oute rhawbawi lupi nynh ccangvaepaw tuh a kuih te kyng zah a makhaete zya cciakhae zah, “Pawmou hopya lan nae ry paw tuh?” cite a khia.
44023020	Te aning nynh, “Nang nynh awkhualan Paul kha kungsi`ae kalan nae cciakhae ccaw cite, Jew`ae nynh Paul kha houh aria lan byakhia aho ung paw olante namaw kha ngia lan cite mih naw phe accah vae`ae.
44023021	Thuasalama nang nynh minmin kha ngaepah nan`ae; pawccecize Paul kha kae chia mawlaezung ae paw kae ae lan khyh zah tui kae neih lan khyh cite mimaw te mimaw thyalawkute byakankuh`ae paw Jew`ae sungpali lae nynh Paul kha phang a buih vae`ae; te na kyate byakinpyakupaw kha ngaw`ae zah atu paccynkute a um vae`ae,” a cipya.
44023022	Tukeiccu rhawbawi lupi nynh ccangvaepaw kha pousah zah, “Hynh-e uccaw nae hopya cipaw hynh hung ccungccaw sanmah la hopah nan vae lou,” cite byatawsya.
44023023	Te aning nynh rhawbawi`ae luning kha ko`ae zah, “Sisaria khua lang ccia lan rhawkaw zaning te marang ccikuhpaw sungsari te ccoi kyng`ae paw zaning kha atu awkhua suimilan ccangthungnaw kya pou lan paccyn oh.
44023024	Te Paul a cciku lanpaw saring kha khangpah oh lah ram uktu Felik kalan khyndadyhlan cciakhae oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44023025	Te aning nynh hynhcihte ccaw ccangkheit a zei:
44023026	“Klaudias Lysias nynh, ahoy huaccepaw ram uktu Felik, nang kha kae beihlang.
44023027	Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh Jew`ae nynh kyng`ae zah chia lan vae cite he a nouku`ae lyakhe; aning tuh Rom ccungccapaw nynh thua cipaw kae nynh ka ny pawte, rhawkaw`ae ryte kae cceih zah amaw hynh kae luesah.
44023028	Te pawkeiccumou minmin nynh amaw hynh seibe`ae cipaw ka ny ry pawte, amaw hynh kungsi`ae kalan ka thuakhae.
44023029	Chi lan accanpaw seinaw, thungsaw lan accanpaw seinaw keiccu seibe`ae paw thua leite, mimaw kawbya te asekuhpaw byakhianaw`ae keiccu nynh seibe`ae cipaw kha ka ny.
44023030	Te Jew`ae nynh e paw hynh phang a buih`ae cipaw kha he oun hopah`ae tuh, na kalan palou kae ky zah amaw seibetu`ae kha mah paw kong nynh seibe`ae cipaw na malang a la ho ccaw`ae cite kaw kae pya`ae. Ngedan te,” cite ccaw a ky.
44023031	Oute rhawkaw`ae tuh kawpya athua hawte Paul kha thua`ae zah khuazi khe Antipatris khua lang a cciakhae`ae.
44023032	Awkhualan marang ccikuh paw ccungccaw`ae kha Paul ryte ccia lan cciataw`ae zah mimaw tuh rhawkaw-inn lang phe a ki`ae.
44023033	Te marang ccikuh`ae paw nynh Sisaria khua kya he thua`ae tuh ram uktu kalan ccaky kha a pya`ae; Paul kha mah a malang khe a ah`ae.
44023034	Te ram uktu nynh ccaky kha he a ria koute paw pee kya-e mou na thua cite Paul kha a khia. Te aning tuh Silisia pee kya-e paw cipaw he a nyh tuh,
44023035	“Nang sei ae betu`ae paw he oun thua`ae te na kong tuh ka thae cih,” a cipya. Te Paul kha Herod Byapianaw Khaan kya ngaw lan kawpya`ae.
44024001	Te nin pangaw acih koute ranpibawi lupi Ananias tuh piccang`ae ry, Tertullas cikuh paw byahothya paw ryte Sisaria khua lang a cceihbung`ae; minmin nynh Paul kha rawsete ram uktu kha a hopya`ae.
44024002	-
44024003	Te Paul kha he a ko`ae te Tertullas nynh tho zah hynhte seibe: “Aphu-e huapaw Felik, namaw liate nynh kaening tuh alepipaw daenaw kha kae mue zah malang elan na muih khonaw liate nynh hynh-e minphuin tuh kaethungnaw a um cipaw kha muihte, ahmin takyh kya balyn lungtuabya hote kha-e kha kae ccou.
44024004	Tuhzemah na hanlan ngaemyng phe um paw ka thua khyh nawlan adynnaw te kae ho cih paw bya hynh lungsaenaw te nae la ngaepya nawlan kae ngiaku.
44024005	Pawccecize Nazareth`ae beiknaw phu kya cciakhaetu lang tang zah laephipi ahmin takyh kya Jew`ae balyn kha phiakunaw rae lan a hytupaw hynh-e ccungccahoy leipaw hynh kaening nynh kae muih.
44024006	Aning tuh tempal thethyasah lan a zuakuhpaw nynh thua, te kaening nynh kae kyng zah kaemaw kawbya thyhhawte byapia lan kae ry.
44024007	Thuasalama rhawbawi lupi Lysias nynh rhawkaw`ae ryte oun thua`ae zah kae kuih kyate po cciakhaede zah,
44024008	amaw seibetu`ae kha na kalan ccia lan kaw oun pya; te amaw hynh akaw-aleih bya nae khia cih zah kaening nynh sei kae benawpaw balyn tuh namaw marya phe nae nyh kho cih,” a cipya.
44024009	Te Jew`ae nynh mah tuh-e bya`ae tuh thanccingpaw nynh thua cite nawccawkhae`ae.
44024010	Oute ram uktu nynh Paul kha bya ho lan kuih te syntawnaw a langsapah koute Paul nynh, “Nang tuh hynh-e minphuin kya kum patae cia byapiatu na thua paw ka ny pawte kamaw hanlan lungpaw thawmuinte ka hokuh ngan,
44024011	pawccemacize Pachia beik khylan Jerusalem lang ka cciathung paw hynh nin haw laening rou nynh aro ung cipaw phang na nyh mamin cih.
44024012	Tempal voidu lungkhu hung ccungccaw te sanmah kae eikupaw minmin nynh oun muih boi khyh`ae, sinakok kya thuasah, khua lungkhu thuasah ccungccaw`ae keisukeilae um lan mah ka hy`ae paw oun muih boi khyh`ae.
44024013	Atu minmin nynh kamaw sei oun be`ae paw mah ccaekia langsakuh kho lan khyh`ae.
44024014	Thuasalama minmin nynh ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw a ci`ae paw Ccianaw thyhte kae paaw`ae Pachia kha kae nynh ka beik cipaw na malang vuan ka khanku. Kawbya kya azeikuh paw te Profeh`ae ccauh kya azeikuh paw balyn kha ka zyn.
44024015	Te adingpaw te ading leipaw paryh chinaw kyate thothuinaw a um vae cih cite minmin nynh a ngaehoi`ae hawte kae mah Pachia kya ngaehoinaw a hoi paw nynh ka thua.
44024016	Hynh-e keiccu, Pachia malang thuasah, ccungccaw`ae malang thuasah aluepaw cyiseinaw um leite mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ka hoi kho nawlan thawte pei ka zuakuh.
44024017	“Kum patae aro koute, atu ka minphuin`ae kalan ryachi`ae bawngnawpaw te Pachia kalan hlupaw ccyng khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua.
44024018	Khahlya tempal voidu lungkhu kya ka ccikankupaw kha Asia ram kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae abang nynh phe oun muih`ae, ccungccaw zapi um khyh, keisukeilae um paw mah um khyh.
44024019	Minmin nynh kamaw kya seibe lanpaw a um lanze na malang ccaccei oun be lan`ae paw nynh thua.
44024020	-
44024021	Tukhyhze, kae kungsi`ae malang ka thadyn lyakha, minmin laku ka thadyn zah, ‘A chih`ae paw thothuinaw konglang te nynh kae tuh atunin nanning nynh akaw-aleih bya nae khia oh paw athua,’ cite ka sia paw bya kawkheit laelan, ahoy leipaw ccangkhakheit ka cyipaw ka tungvaw a muih`ae lanze, atu hynh-e kya a um`ae paw nynh hotua`ae sah,” cite Paul nynh a ci.
44024022	Tuh-e bya`ae kha Felik nynh he a thae tuh, tuh-e Ccianaw kha houh a nyhthya paw athua thyhhawte, kha-e kha nungbia ung zah, “Rhawbawi lupi Lysias yn thua te nynh nae bya hynh kae pia ung cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
44024023	Te Paul kha ring khylan te luenaw pya khylan, te a ruiban`ae nynh ccangkhakheit cyipya lanpaw khyh ze a kalan paebua lanpaw kha a khee khyh nawlan rhawbawipaw kha kaw a pya.
44024024	Te nin sosoh aro koute, Felik tuh Jew nopinung athua paw a zu Drusilla ryte he oun thua`ae tuh Paul kha a kosah`ae, te Kri kya zynnaw konglang bya kha a ngae.
44024025	Te Paul nynh dingnaw kong, mawtemaw sungkunaw kong te yn thua vae cih paw byapianaw kong kha he a hopah`ae tuh Felik tuh rih zah, “Atu tuh la ki hin, accanthyapaw ccyh he kae mue te bua kae ko cih,” cite Paul kha a cipya.
44024026	Aning nynh yn luesah ccaw cite Paul nynh phua yn pya be mah cite a ngaehoi keiccuze Paul kha pei leih kosah`ae zah bya leih hokhae.
44024027	Thuasalama kum ning acih koute Porsias Festas nynh Felik ryalaw kha a mue; te Felik nynh Jew`ae lunghoynaw a rae ry pawte Paul kha thungsawsya.
44025001	Festas tuh tuh-e pee kalan he a thua te, nin thung acih koute Sisaria kyate Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
44025002	Oute ranpibawi lupi te Jew`ae kyaze piccang lupi`ae nynh Paul kha rawsete bya hopya`ae.
44025003	Minmin nynh Paul kha laanpi kya buih lan zah chia lan cite a paccynku`ae keiccuze Jerusalem lang bua yn sawpya ccaw cite thohkhannaw a ngiaku`ae.
44025004	Thuasalama Festas nynh, “Paul tuh Sisaria kya nynh thunginn kya a um, te kamaw mah aro mawze tuhlang ka cceih vae cih.
44025005	Tukeiccu nanning lakuze a cceihbua khopaw nynh kamaw ryte cceihbua oh lah Paul kya seinaw a um lanze sei na be cih oh,” cite a khung`ae.
44025006	Te minmin ryte nin haw lae he a um koute Sisaria khua lang a cceihbung. Te awkhualan tuh byapianaw tungkhung vawlan dahung zah Paul kha oun cciakhae`ae sah cite kawpya`ae.
44025007	Te Paul he yn thua tuh Jerusalem kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh a pe khate koihlu`ae zah ccaekia a langsaku kho lei`ae paw, alepaw seinaw patae kha Paul tungvaw a khang`ae.
44025008	Paul nynh a hanlan khungkuh zah, “Kae tuh Jew`ae kawbya kya mah ka sei khyh, tempal voidu lungkhu kya mah ka sei khyh, Sizar siapharan kya mah ka sei khyh, pawpaw kya sanmah ka sei khyh,” a ci.
44025009	Thuasalama Festas nynh Jew`ae lunghoynaw a rae ry pawte, Paul kha, “Jerusalem lang cciathung lan zah tuin kya hynh-e`ae kong ka malang byapiaku lan na ry tou?” cite a khia.
44025010	Oute Paul nynh, “Kae tuh Sizar kya-e byapianaw tungkhung malang nynh ka thadyn, tuin kya nynh byapia lan mah ka ccan; namaw nynh hoyte phe na ny thyhhawte Jew`ae kya pawsang ka seinaw um khyh.
44025011	Kae tuh a seipaw ka thua ze, tukhyhze chi lan ccangpaw seinaw ka rae lanze, chi lan ka eikuh lan khyh; thuasalama hynh-e`ae nynh sei yn be`ae paw tuh kharyh akyh khyh lanze, hung nynh sanmah kae hynh minmin kalan yn ah kho khyh`ae. Sizar kalan azu ka khan,” a ci.
44025012	Oute Festas nynh kungsi`ae ryte phe a hokuh`ae koute, “Nang tuh Sizar kalan ii azu na khan? Sizar kalan sou na la cceih cih,” a cipya.
44025013	Te nin sosoh aro koute, Siapharan Akrippa te a zu Bernis tuh Festas kha beih khylan Sisaria khua lang oun thua`ae.
44025014	Te minmin tuh tuin kya khaw um`ae koute Festas nynh Paul konglang kha siapharan kalan hynhte a hopya: “Felik nynh thungsawsya paw ccungccapaw lukheit a um.
44025015	Kae Jerusalem kya ka um lya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Jew piccang`ae nynh kha-e paw kong kha oun hopah`ae zah amaw kha rawsete byapia lan oun ngia`ae.
