44025016	Kae nynh, ‘Seibe`ae paw ccungccaw tuh seibetu`ae ryte hawiliakute a tungku`ae maw, te a tungvaw seibe`ae paw konglang a hoku maw tuh hunghung zemah ronaw kalan ah thua lan khyh cite Rom`ae phung a um,’ cite ka khung`ae.
44025017	Tukeiccu minmin nynh hynhlang he oun thua`ae te aro lei lante, awkhualan kya kae tuh byapianaw tungkhung vawlan ka dahung zah tuh-e paw kha thuakhae lan kaw ka pya`ae.
44025018	Amaw kha rawsete seibetu`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah kae nynh ka tua paw seibenaw kha ccangkheit san thuakhae khyh`ae.
44025019	Thuasalama mimaw beiknaw kong te Jesu cikuh paw, tuh-e paw tuh chih zah bua a hiinthui cite Paul nynh a ho paw kong kha byaeikunaw`ae a hoi`ae.
44025020	Te tuh-e byaeikunaw kong kha kae nynh ka nythya khyh keiccuze, Jerusalem lang ccia lan zah hynh-e kong hynh byapiaku lan ry ngaw ta ry ngaw khyh ta cipaw Paul kha ka khia.
44025021	Thuasalama Aukastas nynh byapae ccaw cite Paul nynh azukhan keiccuze, Sizar kalan amaw kha ka ky mawlaezung balyn tuh thungsaw thuasah cite kaw ka pya`ae,” a cipya.
44025022	Oute Akrippa nynh Festas kha, “Kae kamaw mah tuh-e paw bya tuh thaebua lan ka ry,” a cipya. Felik nynh, “Awkhualan na thae cih,” a cipya.
44025023	Te awkhualan Akrippa te Bernis tuh lyccaccu lante oun thua`ae zah rhawbawi lupi`ae ry, khua kya-e minthaanpaw ccungccaw`ae ryte Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Festas kaw te Paul kha oun teekhae`ae.
44025024	Te Festas nynh, “Siapharanpaw Akrippa te e kya kaening ry na um oh paw ccungccaw`ae balyn, hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh na muih oh, Jerusalem kya thuasah, e khua kya thuasah Jew`ae zapi balyn nynh hynh-e paw kong kamaw hynh thawte oun ngia`ae zah aning tuh hiin lan kharyh ngaekuh khyh cite a sia`ae.
44025025	Thuasalama kae nynh chi lan accanpaw seinaw a cyi paw kharyh um khyh cipaw he ka muih tuh amaw ccaccei nynh mah Aukastas kalan azu a khan pawte a kalan ky lan bya ka pae.
44025026	Kha-e paw konglang phe riapaw kae nynh ka bawipaw kalan ka zei lanpaw um khyh. Tukeiccu nynh amaw hynh nanning malang kae poukhae, abapi lante Siapharanpaw Akrippa nang na malang, akaw-aleih bya phe na khia oh koute kae nynh zei lanpaw ka hoi ccaw cite nynh kae poukhae.
44025027	Pawccecize thungccahpaw lukheit kha rawsete seibe`ae paw langsapya leite saw lanpaw tuh angaekuh cite ka tua khyh,” a ci.
44026001	Oute Akrippa nynh Paul kha, “Namaw hanlan na hokuh kho vae,” a cipya. Oute Paul nynh a kuih kha dyng zah a hanlan hynhte a hoku:
44026002	“Siapharanpaw Akrippa, Jew ccungccaw`ae nynh kae sei oun be`ae paw kong balynte asekuh lante atunin na malang kamaw hanlan hoku khonaw ka mue vae cih keiccu ka vehoy cite ka tuaku.
44026003	Abapi lante nang tuh Jew`ae phung te Jew`ae byakhianaw te asekuhpaw balyn kya myarya na thya cipaw ka ny keiccu ka vehoy cite ka tuaku. Tukeiccu lungsaete nae la ngaepya nawlan kae ngiaku.
44026004	“Atakaw lya mawte ka minphuin`ae laku Jerusalem kya ka um zah ka ngawphue lyate ka hiinnaw ozia kha Jew`ae balyn nynh pung a ny`ae paw nynh thua.
44026005	Kae beiknaw kyaze kae tuh asi-asah aru huapaw phu Farasi lukheit ka thua paw kha minmin nynh ccaekiakhanry`ae ze atakaw lya mawte phe oun ny`ae paw nynh thua.
44026006	Te kae minpaaw`ae kalan Pachia nynh a rae paw byakinpyakupaw ngaehoinaw keiccu nynh atu kae tuh ka thadyn zah bya oun pia`ae paw athua.
44026007	Tuh-e byakinpyakupaw kha mue lan cite ngaehoi`ae zah kae minphuin phin haw laening nynh Pachia rya kha khuazi khuadae a law`ae. Siapharanpaw Akrippa, tuh-e ngaehoinaw kong keiccu nynh kae tuh Jew`ae nynh sei oun be`ae.
44026008	Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kha a thosah cipaw tuh pawccemou nanning nynh zyn kho um leipaw lante na tua oh?
44026009	“Nazarethpaw Jesu min te arawsekuh lante uccaw patae ka cyi aho cite kae mah ka la tuaku ccaccing.
44026010	Tuh-e kha Jerusalem kya ka la cyi, te alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate kawhoinaw kha ka mue zah mithyaa`ae patae kha thunginn kya ka saw`ae; te minmin kha he a chia vae`ae ze minmin kha rawsete ka nawccahbua.
44026011	Pachia alue lante bya ho ccaw`ae cite minmin kha ka suase`ae zah sinakok takyh kyakhe minmin kha pei de ka tah`ae; te minmin tungvaw myarya ka thinria zah ramccangpaw khua`ae kyacia minmin kha ka tua ka sah`ae.
44026012	“Tuhte alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate kawhoinaw te kawpyanaw ryte Damaskas khua lang he ka cceih tuh,
44026013	Pou siapharanpaw, ninthuccyng lya laanpi kyakhe vaawran kyate awnaw kha ka muih, tuh-e tuh khuanin a awpaw laeze awhua zah kae, te kae cceihkheih`ae paw kae pepan kya phaephae a aw.
44026014	Te kae balynte laephi kalan he kae khuliakuh tuh kamaw kalan a hopaw roi ccangkheit ka thae zah Hebru bya te, ‘Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah? Ccungzuing sy lanpaw tuh na hanlan arupaw nynh thua,’ cite yn hopya.
44026015	Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?’ ka ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh nang nynh na tua na sah paw Jesu nynh ka thua.
44026016	Thuasalama thokuh lah na ccu te thadyn tua; pawccecize nang kha ka ryalahtu lang rae khylan, te na muih paw hynh-e uccaw`ae kong te na kalan kae langsakuh cih paw uccaw`ae kong ccaekiakhantu lang rae khylan nynh kae tuh na kalan kae langku.
44026017	Nang kha Jew ccungccaw`ae kyate thuasah, Zenta`ae kyate thuasah kae luesah cih, minmin kalan atu nang kha kae saw;
44026018	mih mit awsah khylan, mohnaw kyate awnaw kalan paleihsaku khylan, Setan kawhoinaw kyate Pachia kalan paleihsaku khylan, mih seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw a muebua nawlan`ae, te kamaw kya zynnaw liate thyaasah athua`ae paw laku rho uccaw a muebua nawlan`ae nang kha kae saw,’ yn cipya.
44026019	“Tukeiccu Siapharanpaw Akrippa, vaawran kyate yn thua paw tuh-e vizin kya kae tuh kawngae leipaw ka thua khyh.
44026020	Thuasalama Damaskas kya um`ae paw kalan masaty ka ho, te Jerusalem kya, oute Judah pee kya balyn, te Zenta`ae kalan balyn, minmin nynh a ngaesiku nawlan`ae te Pachia kalan paleihku khylan, ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw ryalaw law khylan ka hopya`ae.
44026021	Hynh-e`ae konglang keiccuze Jew`ae nynh kamaw kha tempal voidu kya oun kyng`ae zah chia lan oun nounuaku`ae.
44026022	-
44026023	Tuhzemah Pachia kyate bawngnaw ka mue keiccu nynh atu nin cia ka hiinbua ung. Kri tuh a teing cih cite, aning tuh a chih`ae paw kyate masaty a tho paw athua cih cite, te Jew ccungccaw`ae kalan te Zenta`ae kalan awnaw bya kha a thaesah cih`ae cite profeh`ae te Mawsi nynh oun cyikuh lanpaw a ho`ae paw laelan ccangpaw kha ho leite, adihpaw te alepaw ccungccaw`ae kalan ccaekiakhante ka um,” a ci.
44026024	Tuhte Paul nynh amaw hanlan bya he a hokuh tuh, Festas nynh roi accae lante, “Paul, nang tuh na lungccing vae khyh. Patae na ccangkupaw nynh phe ae ngaesah vae!” a cipya.
44026025	Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Aphu-e huapaw Festas, kae tuh ka ngae khyh lahyn; thuasalama byaccing bya te lungkyhpaw bya`ae nynh ka ho.
44026026	Pawccecize siapharanpaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh phe a ny paw nynh thua, amaw malang khe kae nynh rawhoy te ka ho; pawccecize hynh-e uccaw tuh akin-akae kya cyi paw thua khyh keiccu hynh-e`ae tuh aning nynh a ny leipaw um khyh cipaw phe ka ny.
44026027	Siapharanpaw Akrippa, profeh`ae bya kha na zyn tou? Na zyn cipaw ka ny,” a ci.
44026028	Te Akrippa nynh Paul kha, “Kriccaw thua lan vyathy nae zynsah,” a cipya.
44026029	Te Paul nynh, “Hynh-e sivarui`ae holeite, nang kyalya thua leite atunin ka bya a thae`ae paw balyn mah kamaw hawte vyathy kyalya thua leite kamaw hawte phe na thua ccaccing nawlan oh Pachia kalan saw ka sang,” a cipya.
44026030	Te tuhte he a ho koute siapharanpaw, ram uktupaw te Bernis, te minmin ryte a dahungkheih`ae paw tuh thokuh`ae zah,
44026031	ccanglang he a pou`ae te, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh chi lan accanpaw, tukhyhze thungccaw lan accanpaw pawsang a cyi paw um khyh,” cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
44026032	Oute Akrippa nynh Festas kha, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh Sizar kalan azukhan khyh lanze phe luesah lanpaw,” cite a hopya.
44027001	Oute kaening tuh Itali ram lang sanphalung te ccia lan cite bya he pae`ae tuh, minmin nynh Paul te ccangpaw thungccah`ae kha Aukastas rhawkawphu kyaze rhawbawipaw, Julias kalan khe a ah`ae.
44027002	Te Adramyttium sanphalung lungkhu lang kae tee zah Asia ram rili kin lang po ccia lan vae cite eenaw te kae thokuh. Mesidoniapaw, Thesalonika khua-e paw Aristarkhas tuh kaening ryte a cceihbua.
44027003	Te awkhualan tuh Sidon khua kya kae thua. Te Julias nynh Paul kha thawccih zah a ban`ae kalan ccia lan te minmin dooihnaw mue lan luenaw a pya.
44027004	Te tuin kyate he kae thokuh tuh khivae nynh arawsekuh lante azaw keiccuze Saiparas tuikoih rekunaw kalan kae cceih.
44027005	Te Silisia ram te Pamfilia ram e rili vawlan po kae cceih zah Lysia ram e Myra khua kya kae thua.
44027006	Te tuin kya rhawbawipaw nynh Itali ram lang yn cceih paw Alexandria sanphalung kha muih zah tuh-e kya kaening kha oun teesah.
44027007	Te byabyate nin patae he kae cceih tuh vawsawte Kanidas khua pe kae thua, khivae nynh po ccia lanpaw oun ua khyh pawte, Salmone khua te arawsekuhpaw Krete tuikoih rekunaw kalan kae cceih.
44027008	Kha-e kha vawsawte kae lue koute, Lasia khuapi pe, ‘Puithya Hae-ungnaw’ cikuh paw ahmin kya kae thua.
44027009	Ccyh khaw he aro te, Looh-aesung nin tuh phe athang vae keiccuze atu sanphalung te khuaccungpaw tuh ri lan um paw athua pawte, Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae kha tuanaw pya`ae zah,
44027010	“Ccungccaw`ae, atu e khuaccungpaw tuh sanphalung te uccaw`ae kyalya thua leite, ah hiinnaw mah shungnaw te ronaw pipi oun tung vae cih oh cipaw ka ny,” a cipya`ae.
44027011	Tuhzemah rhawbawipaw nynh Paul bya laeze sanphalung a mungtu te a hoitu bya kha a zynhua.
44027012	Te tuh-e sanphalung hae-ungnaw tuh khoccihsaw hanlan accanthya khyh keiccu, Finisia lang phya kho ze phya lan, tuin kya khoccihsaw um lan cite ccungccaw alunghua nynh bua ccia lan tuanaw pya`ae. Finisia tuh Krete tuikoih kya um paw sanphalung hae-ungnaw thua zah niccaw-deilang te niccawthalang nynh a hawi.
44027013	Te deilang e khivae nynh byabyate he yn zaw tuh mih eenaw phe kae mue vae cite tuakuh`ae zah, sanphalung kha supah`ae zah Krete tuikoih pe lang a cciasah`ae.
44027014	Thuasalama khaw aro mawze Euroklydon cikuh paw myarya rupaw khise yn tho zah sanphalung kha yn mung vae.
44027015	Te sanphalung nynh khivae kha taening kho vae khyh zah khivae nynh po he a cciakhae tuh kaening mah khivae zawnaw lang yn mungbia vae.
44027016	Te Klauda cikuh paw tuikoih taraw pe a ccue lya, kohlung taraw kha myarya thawbang te kae khynsah.
44027017	Kohlung kha sanphalung kalan a khang`ae koute liarue`ae kha mang`ae zah sanphalung kha a khiide`ae; te Syrtis tuideinaw kya yn khangkuh sei cih cite a ri`ae pawte sanphalung boeidaw kha khah`ae zah khivae nynh hung mungbia vae.
44027018	Khise nynh myarya oun hebia pawte awkhualan tuh sanphalung kya-e phupaw`ae kha a vuabang`ae.
44027019	Te nin thungnaw kya sanphalung uccaw`ae kha kae kuih te kae vua vae.
44027020	Te nin khaw cia khuanin te awsi`ae langkuh vae khyh`ae zah khise zawpaw po aru ung keiccu kae lue cih cite kae ngaehoi paw balyn tuh phya azo vae.
44027021	Thuasalama aepaw ae leite khaw kae um koute, Paul nynh minmin ngaelung te thadyn zah, “Ccungccaw`ae, nanning nynh ka bya kha na la ngae oh zah Krete kyate ah ccia khyh oh ze hynh-e sungnaw te ronaw pipi kyate phe ah lue cih oh paw.
44027022	Te atu zemah lungngaengante um oh; pawccecize sanphalung holeite hung ccungccaw sanmah a hiinnaw a shung paw um lan khyh.
44027023	Pawccemacize kamaw yn hoitupaw te kae nynh ka beik paw Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh atu khuazi kya ka pe yn thadyn zah,
44027024	‘Paul, rih nan, nang tuh Sizar malang thuakhae na thua cih. Te dotua, nang ryte sanphalung kya na cceihkheih oh paw balyn kha Pachia nynh phe ae pya vae,’ cite yn hopya.
44027025	Tukeiccu, ccungccaw`ae ngaengante um oh; pawccecize kae yn hopya thyhhawte yn cyikuh cih cite Pachia kha ka zyn.
44027026	Tuhzemah tuikoih ccangkhakheit vawlan aening kha oun lae mamin cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
44027027	Thuasalama zi haw laepali he cih tuh kaening kha Adria rili kya oun khiakhaekuh bungthung lya, ziraccyng loukaw khe, laerou kalan kae naekuh vae cite sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh a tua`ae.
44027028	Tui kha he a toutua`ae tuh lang kuin akhupaw kha a muih`ae; te rakyh asawnaw lang he a cceih`ae te bua toutua`ae zah lang haw laepangaw akhupaw kha a muih`ae.
44027029	Oute lungpi kha phe kae diasei cih cite rih`ae zah sanphalung nuhlang te sivawhinpi ccangpali kha tui lungkhu lang a saw`ae, te khuadae ccaw vae cite sawsang`ae.
44027030	Te sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh sanphalung kyate zya ccue lan noukuh`ae zah kohlung kha rili lungkhu lang he sahbung`ae tuh, sanphalung malang te sivawhinpi`ae a sah`ae paw olante a umsaku`ae.
44027031	Paul nynh rhawbawipaw te rhawkaw`ae kha, “Hynh-e sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh sanphalung kya a um khyh`ae ze, nanning na lue kho lan khyh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
44027032	Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh kohlung rui`ae kha phya bae`ae zah phe a ccawsah`ae.
44027033	Te khua vyavya yn dae tuh, Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha looh ae lan thawte hopah`ae zah, “Nanning nynh phang na ngaw oh zah aepaw leite, pawsang ae leite na um oh paw atunin nin haw laepalinaw nynh thua vae.
44027034	Tukeiccu aepaw ae ccavae oh cite kae ngia oh, pawccecize aepaw tuh nae ngedannaw hanlan nynh thua; pawccecize nanning laku hung sanmah a sangrua ccangkheit khuakuh lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
44027035	Tuhte he a ho koute Paul nynh sanlou kha lawkuh zah minmin balyn malang khe Pachia kalan lungtuabya hote sanlou kha eih zah a ae vae.
44027036	Oute minmin balyn mah mih lungngaengan zah looh a ae bua vae`ae.
44027037	Tuh-e sanphalung kya a um`ae paw kae balynte zaning sungsari lu taruh kae cih.
44027038	Te minmin nynh phe byn lan a ae`ae koute chanvuiphaw kha rili lungkhu lang vua`ae zah sanphalung kha phupaw a zawsah pya`ae.
44027039	Te khua he yn dae tuh kha-e lorang kha nyh khyh`ae; thuasalama akouleihnaw sang kheit kya sanphalung umnaw a um paw kha a muih`ae, athua kho ze tuhlang khe sanphalung kha cciasah lan cite a paccynku`ae.
44027040	Te sivawhinpi`ae kha supah`ae zah rili kyakhe a cciataw`ae, te zawnawpaw khiidenawpaw liarue`ae kha phou`ae zah malang e boeidaw kha a dawpya`ae, oute varan langkhe khivae a mungsah bia`ae.
44027041	Te rili sanning te atungkunaw hmin kya mangthua`ae tuh minmin nynh sanphalung kha varan lang a khangsakuh`ae, te sanphalung malang tuh varan lang kha mohdia zah phang abingkuh tuh nuekuh kho vae khyh; thuasalama anuhlang tuh rili tuileih eih aru keiccuze phe a khya.
44027042	Te thungccah`ae nynh tui oun zeih cih`ae zah oun lue cih`ae cite mih thinphang paw te rhawkaw`ae nynh thungccah`ae kha chia lan cite a paccynku`ae.
44027043	Thuasalama rhawbawipaw nynh Paul kha a luesah ry pawte minmin paccynkunaw kha khee zah tuizeih khopaw nynh masaty toikuh`ae sah lah varan lang zua`ae sah;
44027044	te tuhlaepaw nynh thingphe`ae te sanphalung akhyanahpaw thing`ae te zua`ae sah cite kaw a pya`ae. Ou tuhte minmin balyn tuh khyndadyhlan laerou kalan pung a zua`ae.
44028001	Tuhte he a zua`ae te tuh-e tuikoih tuh Malta tuikoih nynh thua cipaw minmin nynh a ny`ae.
44028002	Te tuin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh kaening kha thawccinaw alepi oun langsapya`ae; pawccecize tuhlya khuarah zah eih akyaa keiccuze maee oun tuapah`ae zah kaening balyn kha oun thuasah`ae.
44028003	Te Paul nynh ccungparei`ae ccekheit khui zah maee vawlan he a phungbia tuh maee aso keiccuze fupaw sakheit yn pou zah Paul kuih kya phang vekuh.
44028004	Te tuin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh Paul kuih kya fupaw phang vekuh paw kha he a muih`ae tuh; “E ccungccapaw tuh ccungccaw theihtupaw nynh athua mamin cih, rili kyate a lue zemah hiin khylan Dingnaw nynh ua vae khyh,” cite mimaw te mimaw a hokuh`ae.
44028005	Tuhzemah Paul nynh fupaw kha maee lungkhu lang valah he zah ccapyh sanmah vaemaw mue khyh.
44028006	Tuhzemah aning tuh pung yn phin vae cih, tukhyhze vaekheihmawte yn khuliakuh cih zah phe yn chih cih cite minmin nynh phang a do`ae. Thuasalama khaw cia do`ae zah Paul tuh pawtua um khyh paw kha a muih`ae tuh mih lung paleih`ae zah, “Aning tuh khozipachia nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
44028007	Tuh-e lorang kya Publias acikuh paw, tuikoih kya khuabawi paw laephi a um; tuh-e khuabawi paw nynh kaening kha oun thuasah zah nin thung cia hoyte oun dooih.
44028008	Ou tuhlya, Publias a paaw tuh ngelingpaw te chii te toikupaw te a la ikhaekuh. Te Paul nynh a kalan tee zah a tungvaw a kuih khangte sawsangpah zah phe a dan.
44028009	Hynh-e he acyihkuh koute, tuh-e tuikoih kyaze ccinaw hoi`ae paw mingccang`ae mah oun thua`ae zah phe a dan`ae.
44028010	Tuh-e`ae nynh kaening kha sawtuanaw patae oun pya`ae, te kaening he kae thokuh tuh kae hanlan ahoboupaw miakaw kha oun phusaku`ae.
44028011	Te sawpaw sathung acih koute, kha-e tuikoih kyakhe khoccihsaw phe a thangsah paw, Apheipaw Uno`ae pungsan akepaw Alexandria sanphalung khate kaening tuh bua kae thokuh.
44028012	Te Sirakus khua kya kae thua zah tuin kya nin thung kae um.
44028013	Te tuin kyate po kae ve zah Rezium khua kya kae thua; nin kheit kae um koute deilang e khivae yn zaw zah nin ningnaw kya Puteoli khua kya kae thua.
44028014	Tuin kya uteno`ae kha kae muih`ae zah minmin nynh nin sari um lan oun ngia`ae thyhte kae um. Tuhkoute Rom khuapi lang kae cceih.
44028015	Te Rom khua e uteno`ae nynh kaening the kha he a thae`ae tuh kaening kha cciadue khylan Appias Kungkunaw khua te Balah-inn Innthung khua phe thua lang cia oun cceih`ae. Te Paul nynh minmin kha he a muih`ae tuh Pachia kha thehoysah zah a thawmuin.
44028016	Te Rom khuapi kya he kae thua tuh rhawbawipaw nynh thungccah`ae kha a ngawtupaw lupipaw kalan a ah`ae, thuasalama Paul tuh a makhaete amaw a ngawtupaw rhawkapaw ryte um lan a ua.
44028017	Ou tuhte nin thung acih koute Paul nynh Jew`ae piccang`ae kha pynkheihlan a ko`ae. Te minmin nynh pynkheihlan he oun thua`ae te, Paul nynh minmin kha, “Uteno`ae, ah ccungccaw te arawsekuh lante thuasah, ah paaw`ae phung te arawsekuh lante thuasah pawsang ka cyi paw a um lei pite nynh thung oun sah`ae zah Jerusalem kyate Rom ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan oun ah`ae.
44028018	Rom ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw kha akaw-aleih bya he oun khia`ae tuh luesah oun ry`ae; pawccecize kamaw kya chinaw aphah paw seinaw um khyh.
44028019	Thuasalama Jew`ae nynh kha-e kha he a ei`ae tuh Sizar kalan azukhan lan ka umkhaekuh kho vae khyh, tuh-e tuh ka minphuin`ae kha seibe lanpaw ccangkhakheit ka hoi cipaw thua khyh.
44028020	Hynh-e keiccu nynh nanning kha kae ko oh, nanning muih khylan te nanning ryte byahoku khylan nynh kae ko oh; Israel`ae ngaehoinaw keiccu nynh kae tuh hynh-e sivarui te oun khii`ae,” a ci.
44028021	Te minmin nynh, “Nang te asekuh lante Judah ram kyate ccaw`ae kae mue khyh, oun thua`ae paw uno`ae hung nynh sanmah na thethya a phy paw, a ho paw mah um khyh.
44028022	Thuasalama na tua paw kha paw nynh thua cipaw thaetua kae ry; pawccecize hynh-e beiknaw tuh ahmin takyh kya a rawse`ae paw beiknaw nynh thua cipaw kae ny,” cite a khung`ae.
44028023	Te minmin nynh nin kheit kha khyapah`ae zah Paul a ryanaw kalan ccungccaw patae oun thua`ae. Paul nynh minmin kha Pachia peenaw kong ccaekiakhanpya`ae, Jesu konglang minmin kha zynsah khylan Mawsi Kawbya kya-e te Profeh`ae bya kha awkhua te zete cia a hopya`ae.
44028024	Te abang nynh kha-e bya a hopaw kha zyn`ae zah abang tuh zyn khyh`ae.
44028025	Tuhte mimaw te mimaw laku mih lung he lokuh khyh tuh phe a pou`ae; tuhlya Paul nynh bya kawkheit a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Thyaa Muisaw nynh ah minpaaw`ae kalan profeh Isaiah kyate hmerarihlan a hopaw tuh:
44028026	‘Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kalan khe cceih lah, “Nanning nynh thae paw tuh mang na thae cih oh zah na thaethya lan khyh oh; muihpaw tuh mang na muih cih oh zah na nyhthya lan khyh oh.
44028027	Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae thinlung tuh marae moh, mih nakaring tuh karae rua zah mih mit phe masi`ae; tuhkhyh lanze mih mit te ngawmuih cih`ae zah mih nakaring te a thae cih`ae. Te mih thinlung te a thaethya cih`ae, te phe rulaekuh cih`ae zah kae nynh phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,” cite hopah`ae,’ a ci.
44028028	“Tukeiccuze Pachia kya-e khumnaw tuh Zenta`ae kalan ky phe thua vae zah minmin nynh a thae vae cih`ae cipaw hynh nanning nyh ccavae oh!” cite Paul nynh a ci.
44028029	Te hynh-e bya`ae kha he a ho koute, Jew`ae tuh pou`ae zah mimaw te mimaw laku thawte eikunaw a hoi`ae.
44028030	Te Paul tuh amaw nynh a hohkupaw inn kya kum ning phe ccing lang um zah amaw kalan oun thua`ae paw balyn kha a thuasah`ae.
44028031	A kheetu um leite, rawhoy te Pachia peenaw kha hopyate, Bawipaw Jesu Kri kong kha ccangpyate nynh a um.
45001001	Locceihtu cite ko athua paw, Jesu Kri seepaw, Paul tuh Pachia thehoypaw hanlan thoh phia athua.
45001002	Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh athyaapaw Ccathyaa`ae kya amaw profeh`ae liate langmawpi te bya phe la kinty vae`ae.
45001003	Tuh-e tuh pynsaw lante David ciihan lang rae athua paw, aening ah Bawipaw, Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri konglang nynh athua.
45001004	Te a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw liate, thyaanaw kya-e Muisaw lante, thungnaw ryte aning tuh Pachia Ccapaw cite phy athua.
45001005	Minphuin`ae balyn laku zynnaw kalan kawngaenaw hanlan te Jesu a min hanlan, amaw liate kaening tuh thawccinaw te locceihtuthuanaw kha kae mue.
45001006	Tuh-e`ae laku nanning mah Jesu Kri kya-e kopaw nynh na thuabua oh.
45001007	Pachia nynh sungsah`ae paw, mithyaa`ae cite ko na thua oh paw, Rom khuapi kya na um oh paw balyn kalan ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.
45001008	Nanning nae zynnaw tuh laephipi khaleih po athaan keiccuze nanning balyn hanlan Jesu Kri liate ka Pachia kalan masaty lungtuabya ka ho.
45001009	Pawccecize ka sawsangnaw kya nanning kha apaekuh lei lante pei kae lia oh cipaw tuh a Ccapaw kya-e thehoypaw honaw kya ka muisaw te rya ka lawpyapaw Pachia tuh ka ccaekia nynh thua.
45001010	Atu eih aro maw Pachia rynaw liate yn ccangthya ze nanning kalan thua kho nawlan, khuaccungnaw ka hoi kho nawlan saw ka sangkuh.
45001011	Pawccecize nanning nynh varyn na tyn nawlan oh, muisaw lasung abang kha nanning kae neethung ccaw oh cite nanning kha myarya kae muihry oh.
45001012	Tuh-e tuh nanning kya-e zynnaw te kae ka kya-e zynnaw paryh liate nanning ryte pynkheihlan ka ngaengan bua ccaw cipaw nynh thua.
45001013	Uteno`ae, kae nynh ccangpaw Zenta`ae kyate athae abang ka mue hawte; nanning kyate mah athae abang ka mue ccaw cite nanning kalan ccia lan pei ka noukuh paw hynh nanning ny leite na um lan oh paw ka ry khyh, thuasalama atu cia yn khaw paw pei a um.
45001014	Kae tuh Greek`ae kalan te apuathopaw ccungccaw`ae kalan, ahawpaw kalan, te angaeepaw kalan paryh laeba umtu nynh ka thua.
45001015	Tukeiccu, kae ka kya a um thyhte, Rom khuapi kya na um oh paw nanning kalan mah thehoypaw hopya lan kae tuh paccynkute ka um.
45001016	Pawccecize kae tuh Kri kya-e thehoypaw hanlan ka maethah khyh; pawccecize hynh-e tuh Jew`ae hanlan masaty, te Greek`ae hanlan mah, a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw hanlan khumnaw mue nawlan Pachia kya-e thungnaw nynh thua.
45001017	Pawccecize, “Adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih,” cite azeiku hawte, tuh-e zynnaw kya nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw tuh zynnaw kyate zynnaw kalan langsapya athua vae.
45001018	Pawccecize byaccing kha dingleinaw kya a ccyngkuh paw ccungccaw`ae kya-e dingleinaw te Pachia pawlangria leinaw balyn kha rawsete Pachia thinrianaw tuh vaawran kyate yn langkuh.
45001019	Pawkeiccumacize ny lan accanpaw Pachia konglang tuh minmin kyakhe phe langsah athua vae, pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e kha minmin kalan phe a langsapya vae`ae.
45001020	Pawccecize, a rae paw uccaw`ae liate Pachia kya-e zungzae thungnaw te Pachiathuanaw athua paw, muih kho leipaw Pachia uccaw`ae kha laephipi raenaw kyate tho zah ccaerarihlan muih thua vae zah thaethya phe athua vae, tukeiccuze minmin tuh ngaethya kho thua lan khyh`ae.
45001021	Pawkeiccumacize, minmin nynh Pachia phang nyh`ae pite, Pachia kha phu-esah lan accan thyhte phu-esah khyh`ae; Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho khyh`ae, thuasalama accakaepaw tuanaw kha hoi`ae zah angaeepaw mih thinlung tuh phe amoh.
45001022	Mimaw te mimaw kha hawsakuh`ae zah mingaee`ae lang nynh a tang`ae,
45001023	te arohthya leipaw Pachia kya-e phu-enaw kha arohthyapaw ccungccaw muinsan lang, pavaw`ae te ccupali sae paw lorangsaw`ae te avawpaw lorangsaw`ae muinsan lang minmin nynh a rulae`ae.
45001024	Tukeiccu Pachia nynh mah minmin kha mimaw te mimaw kya mih pyn kha thethyasah khylan mih thinlung kya-e duanaw thyhte athyaa leipaw kalan minmin kha phe a ah`ae.
45001025	Minmin tuh Pachia kya-e byaccing kha hyngbya lang phe a rulae`ae paw te Raetu Pachia laeze rae paw uccaw kha a beik`ae paw nynh athua`ae. Tuh-e Raetu Bawipaw tuh zungzae thehoysah athua. Amen.
45001026	Hynh-e keiccu Pachia nynh minmin kha maethyaziachi lan um paw ryduanaw kalan phe a ah`ae, pawccecize mih nopi`ae ccaccei nynh mah aphungpaw te arawsekuh lante aphung thua leite mih kya-e kha a mang`ae.
45001027	Te tuhhawte pise`ae nynh mah nopi kya-e mang paw aphungpaw kha cciatawte, lukheit te lukheit kalan ryduanaw maee rua zah pise te pise nynh maethya lan ung paw rya kha a law`ae; te mimaw mih cciaseinaw thyhte seidetahnaw kha a mue`ae.
45001028	Te minmin nynh Pachia maw kharyh a ny ry khyh`ae keiccu, angaekuh leipaw uccaw`ae cyi khylan Pachia nynh minmin kha duarynawpaw thinlung kalan a ah`ae thyhte; minmin tuh,
45001029	dingleinaw, ohhuakunaw, hoyleinaw, karangkunaw, othyanaw, eiungnaw, ccungccaw chianaw, eikunaw, lingkunaw, ming`ae do ry leinaw, thethyahonaw tuh-e`ae balynte phe beih`ae zah,
45001030	ccungccaw thanho`ae paw, Pachia a huatu`ae, ccungccaw pawlangria lei`ae paw, a tansakuh`ae paw, a pookuh`ae paw, ahoy leipaw uccaw raetu`ae, nungpaaw kawngae lei`ae,
45001031	thaethyanaw hoi lei`ae paw, kawbya rohtu`ae paw, aphungpaw thyhte sungsanaw hoi lei`ae paw, lung-umtungpah`ae paw, ngaethya-umsanaw hoi lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
45001032	Hynhtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih`ae paw tuh chi lan accan`ae cipaw Pachia byapianaw kha phang a nyh`ae pite khahtahawpaw kha a cyi`ae apiaze, khahtahawpaw a cyih`ae paw tungvaw kya mih lungrythua.
45002001	Tukeiccu ming`ae byapiatupaw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh hung ccungccaw na thua zemah ngaethya kho na thua lan khyh; pawccecize nang nynh bya na pianua paw uccaw ccacceimaw kha namaw nynh bua na cyibua keiccu, ming`ae bya na pianaw`ae kya namaw te namaw sei na bekuhpaw nynh na thua.
45002002	Thuasalama Pachia byapianaw tuh byaccing thyhte khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a rae`ae paw te arawsekuh cipaw kaening nynh phe kae ny ccaccing.
45002003	Te khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih`ae paw kha bya na pia zah kha-e ccaccei bua a cyih bua paw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh Pachia byapianaw kyate ka lue cih cite tou na tuaku?
45002004	Tukhyhze Pachia a hoynawpaw nynh nang kha ngaesikunaw kalan ae cciakhae cipaw ny leite, a hoynawpaw te a ngaesangnaw, te a lungsaenaw`ae kha nang nynh pawlangria leite tou na ung?
45002005	Thuasalama na lungkhungnaw te ngaesiku ry leinaw thinlung keiccu, Pachia kya-e adingpaw byapianaw langsapyaku nin, thinrianaw nin kya namaw hanlan thinrianaw kha na ccyku.
45002006	Pachia nynh ccungccaw miakaw kha a cyisahnaw thyhte cyinaw mee kha a pya cih.
45002007	Ahoypaw ryalaw kha pei lah zah phu-enaw, sawtuanaw te chi kho leinaw a ccung`ae paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw kha a pya cih`ae.
45002008	Thuasalama eikumang`ae zah byaccing kawngae leite ding leinaw kawngae`ae paw tuh bungpawnaw te thinrianaw kha a tung cih`ae.
45002009	Masaty Jew`ae, ou tuhkoute Greek`ae mah hoyleinaw a cyih paw ccungccaw miakaw tungvaw kya tuh runaw te vawsaw riathaenaw kha a tung cih`ae.
45002010	Thuasalama masaty Jew`ae, ou tuhkoute Greek`ae mah ahoypaw ryalah paw ccungccaw miakaw kha phu-enaw, sawtuanaw te daenaw kha a pya cih`ae.
45002011	Pawccecize Pachia kya ccungccaw laesahnaw cipaw um khyh.
45002012	Pawccecize Kawbya leite a sei`ae paw miakaw tuh Kawbya leite a roh cih`ae; te Kawbya kya a sei`ae paw miakaw mah Kawbya liate byapia athua cih`ae.
45002013	Pawccecize Kawbya a thae`ae paw hynh Pachia malang a ding`ae paw thua khyh, thuasalama Kawbya a zui`ae paw kha nynh thyaaccousah athua cih`ae.
45002014	Pawccecize Kawbya hoi lei`ae paw Zenta`ae nynh Kawbya hoi lei`ae pite Kawbya kya um paw uccaw`ae kha aphung lante a zui`ae tuh kha-e kha mih hanlan kawbya lang oun tang.
45002015	Tuh-e nynh mih thinlung kya azeikuh paw Kawbya ryalawnaw kha a langsaku, mimaw nykunaw thinlung nynh mah ccaekiakhan zah mih tuanaw nynh mah lukheit te lukheit kha seibekuh`ae, tukhyhze athungkhawku`ae.
45002016	Kae nynh ka hopaw thehoypaw thyhte Pachia nynh Jesu Kri liate ccungccaw`ae kya-e aphiru cyisahnaw`ae kha bya yn pia cih nin kya tuhte byapia cih.
45002017	Dotua, nang tuh Jew paw cite ko na thua zah Kawbya kya na doliakuh paw te Pachia kya na pookuh paw nynh na thua.
45002018	Pachia rynaw kha na nyh zah Kawbya te thuihei na thua thyhte phe ahoytheih paw uccaw`ae kha na phiathya,
45002019	te nang tuh mitmoh`ae kha laanpi cciakhaetu, te mohnaw kya um`ae paw kha awnaw muihsatu nynh ka thua.
45002020	Te mingaee`ae kha a thuiheitu, imua`ae kha a ccangpatu, Kawbya kya um paw byaccing te nynaw a hoi paw nynh ka thua cite na zynku lanze,
45002021	tukeiccu mingccang`ae a ccangpatupaw nang, pawccemou namaw te namaw na ccangpyaku khyh? Ccungccaw tuh ru lan ccan khyh cite phunghopaw nang, namaw so na ruh tou?
45002022	Ccungccaw tuh milae zu seikhae lan ccan khyh cite a ho paw nang, namaw so milae zu na seikhae tou? Zohtuh kha luathua-aeui lang a ria paw nang, namaw so zohtuh-tempal uccaw kha na luade tou?
45002023	Kawbya liate a pookuh paw nang, kawbya ronaw liate Pachia tuh the na thyaasah tou?
45002024	Pawccecize, “Nanning keiccuze Pachia min tuh Zenta`ae laku kya thethya ccousah athua,” cite a zeiku hawte nynh thua.
45002025	Pawccecize, nang nynh Kawbya kha na zui lanze, vindung awkupaw tuh athane ccaccing; thuasalama nang tuh Kawbya a rohtu na thua ze, na vindung awkupaw tuh vindung awku leipaw lang nynh phe a tang.
45002026	Tukeiccu vindung awkuh leipaw nynh Kawbya kya-e dingnaw kha a zui lanze, a vindung awku leipaw tuh vindung awkupaw lang riapya thua lan khyh tou?
45002027	Te pynsaw lante vindung awkuh leipaw nynh aphung lante Kawbya kha a ccingsah lanze, azeikuh paw Kawbya te vindung awkupaw mang a hoi pite Kawbya kha a ccingsah leipaw nang kha bya ae pia lan khyh tou?
45002028	Pawccecize atolang te kyalya Jew athua paw tuh Jew paw ccaccing thua khyh; ngesaw kya atolang te kyalya vindung awkupaw mah vindung awkupaw ccaccing thua khyh;
45002029	thuasalama alungkhu langte Jew athua paw nynh Jew paw ccaccing athua, te vindung awkupaw mah kawbya kya thua khyh, Muisaw kya thinlung kyate vindung awkupaw nynh athua; tuh-e paw thehoysanaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia kya-e nynh athua.
45003001	Tuhte lanze, Jewthuanaw nynh paw thanenaw mou a ung? Tukhyhze vindung awkupaw nynh pawmou accungkia?
45003002	Ccungkianaw patae a um. Abapi lante Jew`ae kalan nynh Pachia kya-e bya`ae tuh pya athua.
45003003	Minmin abang nynh a zyn khyh`ae paw tuh pawte ho lan? Minmin a zyn leinaw`ae nynh Pachia kya-e zyn lan umnaw kha thanesah leite um ngaw ta?
45003004	Tuhte thua khyh. “Athua, na hopaw kya nang tuh na ding zah bya ae pia vae`ae ze nang tuh na tae,” cite azeiku hawte Pachia tuh ading, thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw tuh ahyngpaw nynh thua.
45003005	Thuasalama aening ah dingleinaw oh nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha a langsaku lanze, pawte ah ho cih oh? Aening kha thin oun rianuapaw Pachia tuh ding khyh tou? (Hynhte ka hopaw tuh ccungccaw hawte nynh ka ho.)
45003006	Tuhte thua khyh. Tuhte athua lanze Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou byapia cih?
45003007	Pawccecize kae ka hyngnaw liate Pachia kya-e byaccing tuh a phu-enaw kalan houh a lungsathung ze, kae kha miseipaw hawte pawccemou bya oun pia`ae?
45003008	Te, “Ahoypaw a langku nawlan ahoy leipaw kha cyih oh sih,” cite ccungccaw abang nynh kaening kha thethya oun ccousahry`ae pawte, nanning nynh na ho oh oun ci`ae. Kae ho thyhte a ho cih`ae tou? Tuhte a ho`ae paw tuh seibe lan accan`ae.
45003009	Tuhte lanze pawcihte? Aening Jew`ae tuh minmin laeze ah hoyhua oh tou? Ccapyh sanmah ah hoyhua khyh oh; pawccecize Jew`ae te Greek`ae balyn tuh paryhte seinaw marya hoi`ae cite langmaw phe kae langsaku vae.
45003010	Hynhte azeiku hawte, “Adingpaw hung san um khyh, lukheit sanmah um khyh.
45003011	A thaethya paw hung san um khyh, Pachia kha a ccung paw hung san um khyh.
45003012	Ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh laanpi pung me vae`ae, mih balyn mawte ccungkia vae khyh`ae, ahoypaw a cyih paw hung san um khyh, lukheit sanmah um khyh.
45003013	Mih lotharue tuh ahungkuhpaw shawku nynh thua, mih lae te pheenaw a mang`ae, fuparepaw sy tuh mih mung lungkhu a um.
45003014	Mih khalang tuh thyalawnaw bya te byakhahpaw te nynh phe abia.
45003015	Mih ccu tuh chii luasah lan a khyrang;
45003016	mih ccianaw laanpi kya ronaw te runaw a um.
45003017	Te daenaw laanpi kha minmin nynh nyh khyh`ae.
45003018	Mih mitdae kya Pachia rawrinaw cipaw kharyh um khyh,” cite azeikuh.
45003019	Kawbya nynh a hopaw miakaw tuh Kawbya zakaw a um`ae paw hanlan nynh a ho cipaw ah ny oh, ou tuhte khalang miakaw nynh bya ho ngan lei lante laephi ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Pachia malang seibe athua`ae.
45003020	Tukeiccu Kawbya cyisahnaw liate hung ccungccaw sanmah Pachia malang thyaaccou kho lan khyh; pawccecize Kawbya liate nynh seinaw kha nyku athua.
45003021	Thuasalama atu Kawbya te Profeh`ae bya nynh ccaekiakhan`ae thyhhawte Kawbya te asekuh leipaw Pachia kya-e dingnaw tuh phe yn langkuh vae.
45003022	Tuh-e dingnaw tuh Jesu Kri kha zynnaw liate a zyn paw ccungccaw balyn hanlan te tuh-e`ae balyn tungvaw kya a um paw Pachia kya-e dingnaw ccaccei kha nynh athua; pawccecize laesakunaw cipaw kharyh um khyh.
45003023	Pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh phe sei vae`ae zah Pachia phu-enaw kalan phah kho vae khyh`ae.
45003024	Kri Jesu kya um paw sawkhawnaw liate Pachia thawccinaw keiccu nynh alakaw te thyaaccouku.
45003025	-
45003026	Pachia nynh a ngaesangnaw liate langmaw-e seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw hanlan, a dingnaw kha langsaku khylan, atu ccyh lya a dingnaw kha phy khylan, Jesu a zyn paw ccungccaw kha thyaaccousatupaw thua khylan te amaw tuh adingpaw athua nawlan, Jesu chii kha zynnaw liate kha-e Kri kha lungdaesapaw silawkunaw lang Pachia nynh phe a khang vae.
45003027	Tuhte lanze pookunaw tuh pawkyamou? Pookunaw lanpaw umbua khyh. Paw kawbya te mou a nue? Cyisahnaw kawbya te tou? Thua khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya-e kawbya liate nynh a nue.
45003028	Tukeiccu ccungccaw tuh Kawbya cyisahnaw um leite zynnaw liate nynh thyaaccouku cite kae thangsah.
45003029	Pachia tuh Jew`ae Pachia kyalya tou? Zenta`ae Pachia so thuabua khyh tou? Athua, Zenta`ae Pachia mah athuabua.
45003030	Vindung awkupaw kha zynnaw liate, te vindung awku leipaw kha zynnaw liate thyaa a ccousah cih paw tuh Pachia ccangkheit nynh thua.
45003031	Tuhte lanze zynnaw liate aening nynh Kawbya tuh thanesah leite tou a ung oh? Tuhte thua khyh, Kawbya kha ah tynsah oh paw nynh thua.
45004001	Tuhte lanze pawtemou ah ho cih oh? Aening ah minpaaw Abraham tuh pynsaw lante paw thanenaw mou a mue?
45004002	Abraham tuh cyisahnaw liate thyaaccou athua ze, a pooku lanpaw a hoi, thuasalama Pachia malang hoi khyh.
45004003	Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh pawtemou a ho? “Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah a zynnaw kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua,” a ci.
45004004	Ryalah paw ccungccaw tuh thawccinaw liate cite riapakuh khyh, thuasalama atekuhpaw ryalaw mee nynh a ccou.
45004005	Thuasalama ryalah leipaw, Pachia nyh leipaw ccungccaw kha thyaaccousatupaw kha a zyn paw tuh, kha-e a zynnaw kha dingnaw lang riapya athua.
45004006	Tuhhawte cyisahnaw um leite Pachia nynh dingnaw a bebua paw ccungccapaw kya-e hythuanaw kong kha David nynh a ho paw tuh:
45004007	“A cyiseimenaw`ae ngaethya athua`ae paw te mih seinaw`ae khawpya athua`ae paw tuh lungtua`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
45004008	BAWIPAW nynh sei a be leipaw ccungccapaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a ci.
45004009	Tuhte lanze, hynh-e hythuanaw tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw tungvaw kyalya tou a thua? Tukhyhze vindung awkuh lei`ae paw tungvaw so thuabua khyh tou? Pawccecize, Abraham hanlan a zynnaw kha a dingnaw lang riapya athua ah ci oh.
45004010	Tuhte lanze tuh-e tuh pawcihtemou riapya athua? Vindung a awku maw tou, tukhyhze vindung a awkuh koute tou? A awkuh koute riapya paw thua khyh, a awku maw riapya paw nynh thua.
45004011	Vindung awkupaw syntawnaw leite a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae kha dingnaw lang riapya nawlan thuasah, Abraham tuh a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae balyn paawthuanaw lang thuasah,
45004012	te vindung awkuh`ae paw paaw kyalya thua leite, ah minpaaw Abraham nynh vindung a awku mawze a hoi paw zynnaw ccusy a zui`ae paw, vindung awkuh lei`ae paw paaw mah athua nawlan thuasah, Abraham nynh vindung awku mawze a hoi paw zynnaw kya-e dingnaw tazeih athua paw vindung awkupaw kya-e syntawnaw kha a mue.
45004013	Pawccecize aning tuh laephipi rhoccoutu a thua cih cite byakinpyakupaw tuh Abraham kalan mah thuasah, a ciihan`ae kalan mah thuasah Kawbya liate thua khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya-e dingnaw liate nynh athua.
45004014	Pawccecize Kawbya te asekuh`ae paw nynh rhoccoutu`ae athua ze, zynnaw tuh alakaw vae, byakinpyakupaw mah paw ccungkia vae khyh.
45004015	Pawkeiccumacize Kawbya nynh tuh thinrianaw kha a thuakhae; thuasalama Kawbya um leinaw tuh cyiseimenaw um khyh.
45004016	Tukeiccu byakinpyakupaw tuh Kawbya te asekuh`ae paw hanlan kyalya thua leite, aening balyn paaw athua paw Abraham kya-e zynnaw te asekuh`ae paw hanlan mah athuabua nawlan, Abraham ciihan`ae balyn kalan phe ria nawlan, thawccinaw liate nynh dingnaw tuh a ccouku cipaw aria nawlan zynnaw liate nynh a mueku.
45004017	“Nang kha minphuin pataepi paaw lang phe kae rae vae,” cite azeiku hawte; a chih`ae paw a thosatu te a um loh leipaw uccaw`ae kha a um vae paw hawte a ho paw Pachia, amaw nynh a zyn paw Pachia ccaccei malang Abraham tuh aening balyn paaw nynh athua.
45004018	“Na ciihan tuh tuhhawte nynh athua cih,” cite a hopya paw bya thyhhawte Abraham nynh kae tuh minphuin pataepi paaw lang ka tang cih cite ngaehoinaw hoi lan accan lei pite zyn zah a ngaehoi.
45004019	Te zynnaw kya thawzya leite, amaw kum tuh kum zakheit loukaw a ci vae zemah amaw pyn kha a chih vae paw hawte tuakuh khyh zah a zu Sarah vuebua mah phe a chih vae cite tua khyh.
45004020	Zyn leinaw liate Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw kha lunghiinnaw hoi khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya thawsae zah Pachia kha phu-enaw a pya.
45004021	Pachia nynh bya yn kinpyakupaw tuh yn ccingsapya kho cite varyn a zyn.
45004022	Tukeiccu, “A zynnaw kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua.”
45004023	Tuhte “A hanlan riapya athua” cite Abraham elan kyalya azeikuh paw thua khyh.
45004024	Thuasalama aening hanlan mah azeikuh paw nynh thua. A chih`ae paw kyate ah Bawipaw Jesu a thosatupaw kha aening nynh ah zyn oh ze kha-e zynnaw kha aening dingnaw lang riapya athua cih.
45004025	Bawipaw Jesu tuh aening seimenaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae kalan a ah`ae, te aening thyaaccounaw hanlan bua thosathui athua.
45005001	Tukeiccu zynnaw liate thyaaccou ah thua vae oh zah ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate aening tuh Pachia te ccawkunaw ah hoi oh.
45005002	Aening ah thadynnaw oh kya hynh-e thawccinaw lungkhu lang amaw zynnaw liate nynh aening naeku khonaw ah hoi oh, te Pachia kya-e phu-enaw kha ngaehoinaw liate aening ah lungtua.
45005003	Te hynh-e kya kyalya thua khyh, vawsawrunaw kya mah aening ah lungtua; pawccecize vawsawrunaw nynh ngaesangnaw kha a thuakhae.
45005004	Te ngaesangnaw nynh tungpaw muihpaw kha thuakhae zah, tungpaw muihpaw nynh ngaehoinaw kha a thuakhae;
45005005	Ngaehoinaw nynh maethyanaw kha poukhae khyh, pawkeiccumacize aening kalan pya athua paw Thyaa Muisaw liate aening ah thinlung lungkhu lang Pachia sungsahnaw kha ccaenua phe athua vae.
45005006	Pawccecize aening tuh thawzung leite ah um ccyh lya oh, accyh he zaw lyakhe Kri tuh Pachia nyh lei`ae paw hanlan a chih.
45005007	Pawccecize adingpaw ccungccaw hanlan a chipah cih paw ccungccaw kou akhing cih, tuhzemah ccungccahoypaw hanlan a chih ngan paw poh um ccamah ny lei.
45005008	Thuasalama aening tuh misei`ae ah thua cciamang lya oh khe, Kri nynh aening hanlan a chi paw tuh Pachia nynh aening kha pawcih nynh oun sungsah cipaw oun langsapyaku.
45005009	Tuhlae lanze, atu amaw chii liate thyaaccoukuh vae zah amaw liate Pachia thinrianaw kyate aening tuh ah lue vae cih oh.
45005010	Pawccecize aening tuh rhaw`ae ah thua lya oh khe, a Ccapaw chinaw liate Pachia kalan ah ccawkuthui vae oh thua ze, tuhlae lanze phe ah ccawkuthui vae oh pawte amaw hiinnaw liate aening tuh khum ah thua vae cih oh.
45005011	Te tuh-e kyalya thua leite, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate aening tuh ccawkuthuinaw atu phe ah mue vae oh zah amaw liate Pachia kya lungtuanaw ah hoi oh.
45005012	Pawccemacize ccungccapaw lukheit liate seinaw tuh laephipi lungkhu lang tee zah seinaw liate chinaw a tee thyhhawte, ccungccaw balyn tuh pung aseikuh vae keiccuze chinaw nynh marya pung yn thuanua vae.
45005013	Pawccecize Kawbya pya athua maw balyn laephipi kya seinaw tuh phe a um vae; thuasalama Kawbya a um maw e seinaw tuh riapya thua loh khyh.
45005014	Tuhzemah Adam kyate Mawsi kyacia chinaw nynh phe a uk vae; Adam nynh kawngae khyh hawte a sei bua lei`ae paw tungvaw mah phe a uk, tuh-e Adam tuh nyalang yn thua vae cih paw kya-e langsakupaw muinsan nynh athua.
45005015	Thuasalama cyiseimenaw te alakaw te mue paw lasung tuh lokuh khyh. Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit cyiseimenaw keiccu ccungccaw patae tuh a chi`ae lanze, tuhlae lanze, Pachia kya-e thawccinaw te ccungccaw lukheit athua paw Jesu Kri liate thawccinaw lasung tuh ccungccaw patae hanlan houh alung.
45005016	Te a seipaw ccungccapaw lukheit liate yn thua paw te thawccinaw lasung tuh lokuh khyh, pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit liate byapianaw nynh seibenaw kha a thuakhae, thuasalama thawccinaw lasung tuh cyiseimenaw pataepi mawte thyaaccousanaw nynh thua.
45005017	Pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit seinaw keiccuze, tuh-e paw liate chinaw nynh a uk lanze, tuhlae lanze, thawccinaw phe beih lang a ccou`ae paw te dingnaw lasung a ccou`ae paw nynh tuh lukheitpaw Jesu Kri liate hiinnaw kya houh a uk cih`ae.
45005018	Tukeiccu lukheitpaw cyiseimenaw keiccu ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh seibyapianaw a tungkuh, tuhhawte lukheitpaw dingnaw liate ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw kya hiinnaw te asekuhpaw thyaaccounaw a muekuh.
45005019	Pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit nynh kawngae leinaw liate ccungccaw patae tuh misei`ae lang tangsah athua`ae hawte lukheitpaw kawngaenaw liate ccungccaw patae tuh miding`ae lang tangsah athua cih`ae.
45005020	Tuhlae lanze, cyiseimenaw houh alung nawlan nynh Kawbya tuh yn tee, thuasalama seinaw alungnaw kya thawccinaw houh alunghua;
45005021	tuh-e tuh, seinaw nynh chinaw kya a uk hawte ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate thawccinaw nynh dingnaw liate zungzae hiinnaw kya a uknaw lanpaw nynh thua.
45006001	Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Thawccinaw houh alung ccaw cite seinaw tou banban pei ah rae cih oh?
45006002	Tuhte thua khyh. Seinaw kalan a chih vae`ae paw aening tuh pawcihtemou tuh-e kyatuin ah hiin ung cih oh?
45006003	Kri Jesu lungkhu lang baptisma-in vae`ae paw aening balyn tuh a chinaw lungkhu lang baptisma- inkuh vae cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou?
45006004	Tukeiccu a chinaw lungkhu lang baptisma-inkunaw liate aening tuh amaw ryte ah uhkuh bua oh. Ou tuhte Kri tuh Paaw phu-enaw thungnaw liate a chih`ae paw kyate thosathui athua hawte, aening mah hiinnaw athawpaw kya ah cciabua nawlan oh nynh thua.
45006005	Pawccecize a chinaw kya alokuh lante aening tuh pynkheihlan ah bingkuh bua oh athua ze, a thothuinaw kya mah pynkheihlan phe lokuh lante ah bingkuh bua cih oh.
45006006	Aening ah ccungccaw rynpaw kha amaw ryte khiade athua paw tuh sei pyn hynh ro khylan nynh thua cipaw ah ny oh, ou tuhte aening nynh seinaw rya ah law vae khyh nawlan oh.
45006007	Pawccecize a chih vae paw ccungccaw tuh seinaw kyate phe a lue vae.
45006008	Atu aening tuh Kri ryte ah chi oh thua ze, amaw ryte ah hiin cih oh cite mah ah zyn oh.
45006009	Pawccecize, Kri tuh a chih`ae paw kyate thosah he athua te chih lae vae khyh, chinaw nynh a tungvaw kya uknaw kaw hoi kho vae khyh cipaw ah ny oh.
45006010	Pawccecize Kri nynh a chi paw tuh seinaw hanlan vaekheit rou nynh a chi, thuasalama a hiinpaw tuh Pachia hanlan nynh a hiin.
45006011	Tuhhawte nanning mah seinaw kalan tuh phe kae chih ccaccing cite tuakuh oh, thuasalama Pachia kalan tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu liate kae hiin cite naemaw te naemaw kha la tuakuh oh.
45006012	Tukeiccu, nae pynsaw ryduanaw kawngaenaw khylan a chihthyapaw nae pyn kya seinaw nynh la uk nan vae sah.
45006013	Nae pyn kya-e`ae mah seinaw hanlan ding leinaw zunghe lante la pyakuh nan oh; thuasalama a chih`ae paw kyate bua a hiin`ae paw ccungccaw`ae hawte naemaw te naemaw kha Pachia kalan pyakuh oh lah nae pyn kya-e`ae kha mah dingnaw zunghe lante Pachia kalan pyakuh oh.
45006014	Pawccecize nanning tuh Kawbya zakaw na um vae khyh oh, thuasalama thawccinaw zakaw nynh na um oh; tukeiccu seinaw nynh nanning tungvaw kawhoinaw hoi vae lan khyh.
45006015	Tuhte lanze pawcihtemou? Aening tuh Kawbya zakaw ah um vae khyh oh, thuasalama thawccinaw zakaw ah um vae oh keiccu tuh ah sei cih oh tou te? Tuhte thua khyh.
45006016	Nanning nynh chinaw te asekuhpaw seinaw kalan na pyakuh oh zemah, tukhyhze dingnaw te asekuhpaw kawngaenaw kalan na pyakuh oh zemah, lukhakheit kalan naemaw te naemaw kha see`ae lang na pyaku oh lan thua ze, nanning tuh tuh-e paw a kaw na ngae oh paw see`ae nynh kae thua cipaw na nyhkuh khyh oh tou?
45006017	Thuasalama Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho lan accan. Pawccecize nanning tuh seinaw kya-e see`ae nynh na la thua oh paw, thuasalama atu tuh nae kalan phy athua paw doctrine kha nae thinlung kyate phe na lawku vae oh.
45006018	Seinaw kyate luesah phe na thua vae oh thyhte, nanning tuh dingnaw see`ae lang nynh na tang vae oh.
45006019	Nae pynsaw lante na ccing khyh oh keiccu nynh ccungccaw phung lante kae hopya oh; pawccecize nae pyn kya-e`ae kha seimenaw hanlan, athyaa leipaw kalan te seimenaw kalan see`ae lang na la pyakuh oh hawte atu mah nae pyn kya-e`ae kha thyaanaw hanlan, dingnaw kalan see`ae lang pyakuh oh.
45006020	Pawccecize nanning tuh seinaw see`ae na la thua lya oh kha dingnaw kyate na la lue oh.
45006021	Tuhte lanze atu nanning nynh nae maethyakhaekupaw tuh-e uccaw`ae kya paw thanenaw mou na mue oh? Pawccecize tuh-e uccaw`ae athangnaw tuh chinaw nynh thua.
45006022	Thuasalama atu nanning tuh seinaw kyate luesah na thua oh zah Pachia see`ae lang na tang oh thyhte thyaanaw hanlan thanenaw kha na mue oh, te athangnaw lang zungzae hiinnaw kha na mue cih oh.
45006023	Pawccecize seinaw mee tuh chinaw nynh thua; thuasalama Pachia kya-e lasung tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu liate zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua.
45007001	Kawbya a nyh`ae paw uno`ae, nae kalan kae hopya oh. Kawbya nynh ccungccaw lukheit tungvaw a hiin lungkhu balyn uknaw kaw a hoi cipaw kha nanning na nyh khyh oh tou?
45007002	Pawccecize vawpaw a hoi vae paw nopinung tuh a vawpaw a chi makhia Kawbya liate a vawpaw kalan hede athua; thuasalama a vawpaw tuh a chi lanze a vawpaw te asekuhpaw kawbya kyate aning tuh a lue.
45007003	Tukeiccu tuh a vawpaw phang a hiin lyakhe, ccangpaw pise kha a umkhae lanze aning tuh vawpaw tungvaw ohhuakuhnung cite ko athua cih; thuasalama a vawpaw tuh a chi lanze, aning tuh kawbya kyate a lue, tukeiccu pise ccangpaw a umkhae zemah vawpaw tungvaw ohhuakuhnung thua vae khyh.
45007004	Ou tuhhawte ka uno`ae, nanning mah Kri pyn liate Kawbya kya chisah na thua oh, pawtecize a chih`ae paw kyate a thothuipaw, mingccangpaw Kri kalan zu lang na tang nawlan oh, te Pachia hanlan athae ah thae nawlan oh nynh thua.
45007005	Pawccecize aening tuh pynsaw kya ah um lya oh tuh seinaw te asekuhpaw ryduanaw`ae nynh Kawbya liate oun thokuh zah chinaw hanlan athae poukhae khylan aening ah pyn kya-e`ae kya rya a lah he.
45007006	Thuasalama atu tuh Kawbya kya-e arynpaw kya thua vae leite, Muisaw kya-e athawpaw kya aening nynh rya ah law nawlan oh aening tuh ah chih oh zah phang oun khiidepaw Kawbya kyate phe ah lue vae oh.
45007007	Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Kawbya tuh a sei tou? Tuhte thua khyh! Kawbya leite tuh seinaw hynh ka la nyh lan khyh, thuasalama Kawbya liate nynh ka ny. Pawccecize Kawbya nynh, “Na dua lan khyh,” cite a la ho khyh ze, kae tuh duanaw kong hynh ka la nyh lan khyh.
45007008	Thuasalama seinaw nynh kawpyapaw liate akhue mue zah duanaw aphuinphuin balyn kha kae ka kya a poukhae; pawccecize Kawbya leite seinaw tuh a chih.
45007009	Langmaw lya Kawbya leite nynh kae tuh ka la hiin, thuasalama kawpyapaw he yn thua tuh seinaw nynh a hiin vae, kae tuh ka chih.
45007010	Hiinnaw hanlan khang paw tuh-e kawpyapaw tuh chinaw a thuakhae paw kha ka muih.
45007011	Pawccecize seinaw tuh kawbya liate akhue mue zah kae kha yn ling, te kha-e liate kae kha phe yn chia.
45007012	Tukeiccuze Kawbya tuh athyaa, te kawpyapaw mah athyaa, ding zah ahoy.
45007013	Tuhte lanze tuh-e ahoypaw nynh kae ka hanlan chinaw tou yn raepya? Tuhte thua khyh! Thuasalama seinaw nynh seinaw kha a langsaku ccaw cite ahoypaw uccaw liate kae ka kya chinaw rya kha a law; tuh-e tuh seinaw hynh kawpyapaw liate tuh myarya a seipaw lang a tang nawlan nynh thua.
45007014	Pawccecize Kawbya tuh muisaw lante asekuhpaw nynh thua cipaw ah ny oh; thuasalama kae tuh pynsaw ccungccaw, seinaw see tang khylan zua paw nynh ka thua.
45007015	Pawccecize ka cyi paw kha ka thaethyapaw thua khyh. Ka cyi ry paw kha ka cyih khyh, thuasalama ka hua paw kha nynh ka cyi.
45007016	Tuhte ka ry leipaw kha ka cyi lan thua ze Kawbya tuh ahoy cite Kawbya kalan ka nawccah.
45007017	Tuhte lanze atu kha-e a cyih paw tuh kae ka thua vae khyh, thuasalama kae ka kya um paw seinaw nynh a cyih.
45007018	Pawccecize kae ka kya, ka pynsaw kya ahoypaw kharyh um khyh cipaw ka ny; pawccecize kae ka kya cyirynaw a um, thuasalama ahoypaw kha pawcihte nynh cyi lan cipaw ka muih khyh.
45007019	Pawccecize ka cyi ry paw ahoypaw kha ka cyih khyh, thuasalama ka cyi ry leipaw ahoy leipaw kha nynh ka cyi.
45007020	Ka cyi ry leipaw kha atu ka cyi lan thua ze, kha-e a cyih paw tuh kae ka thua vae khyh, thuasalama ka kya um paw seinaw nynh a cyih.
45007021	Tuhte ahoypaw ka cyi ry lya ahoy leipaw yn cyisah paw ka kya a um cite kawbya ccangkheit ka muih.
45007022	Pawccecize kae tuh alungkhu lang-e ka ccungccaw lante Pachia Kawbya kya ka lungrythua.
45007023	Thuasalama ka pyn kya-e`ae kya, ka thinlungtuanaw kya-e kawbya kha doute a rawsepaw te ka pyn kya-e`ae kya um paw seinaw kawbya kalan, seetangnaw lungkhu lang kae kha yn cciakhae paw ccangpaw kawbya kha ka muih.
45007024	Pawcih ngaethya lan um paw babang mou kae hynh! Hynh-e chinaw pyn kyate hung nynh mou kae hynh yn luesah cih?
45007025	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate yn luesatupaw Pachia kha ka thehoysah. Ou tuhte ka thinlung tetuh Pachia Kawbya rya kha ka lah, thuasalama ka pynsaw lante seinaw kawbya rya nynh ka law.
45008001	Tukeiccu atu Kri Jesu kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh seibenaw um vae khyh, minmin tuh pynsaw rynaw thyhte hiin vae khyh`ae, thuasalama Muisaw rynaw thyhte nynh a hiin`ae.
45008002	Pawccecize Kri Jesu kya um paw hiinnaw kya-e Muisaw kawbya nynh seinaw kawbya kyate thuasah, chinaw kawbya kyate thuasah kae kha phe yn luesah vae.
45008003	Pawccecize pynsaw liate Kawbya tuh thawzya zah a cyi kho leipaw kha Pachia nynh cyipya khylan, a seithyapaw pynsaw muinsan lante seinaw hanlan amaw a ccapaw kha yn saw zah pynsaw kyakhe seinaw kha sei a be.
45008004	Tuhte pynsawthuanaw thyhte a hiin lei`ae paw, thuasalama Muisaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw aening kya Kawbya kya-e dingnaw tuh accing nawlan nynh thua.
45008005	Pawccecize pynsawthuanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw nynh tuh pynsaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua`ae; thuasalama Muisawthuanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw nynh tuh Muisaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua`ae.
45008006	Pynsaw tuanaw tuh chinaw nynh thua, thuasalama muisaw tuanaw tuh hiinnaw te daenaw nynh thua.
45008007	Pawkeiccumacize pynsaw tuanaw tuh Pachia te arawsekuh, pawccecize pynsaw tuanaw tuh Pachia Kawbya kha zui khyh, zui mah zui kho khyh.
45008008	Tukeiccu pynsaw kya um`ae paw nynh tuh Pachia lung tung kho khyh`ae.
45008009	Thuasalama Pachia Muisaw tuh nanning kya a um lan thua ze, nanning tuh pynsaw kya na um khyh oh, Muisaw kya nynh na um vae oh. Atu lukhakheit nynh Kri kya-e Muisaw kha a hoi khyh lanze, aning tuh Kri te sekuh khyh.
45008010	Te Kri tuh nanning kya a um lanze, pyn tuh seinaw keiccuze a chih, thuasalama Muisaw tuh dingnaw keiccuze a hiin.
45008011	Thuasalama Jesu kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosatupaw, a Muisaw kha nanning kya a um lanze, Kri kha chinaw kyate a thosatupaw nynh nanning kya a um paw amaw Muisaw liate a chihthyapaw nae pyn kha ae hiinsah cih oh.
45008012	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, aening tuh pynsawthuanaw thyhte hiin khylan pynsaw kalan lae um`ae paw ah thua vae khyh oh.
45008013	Pawccecize pynsaw thyhte na hiin oh athua ze na chih vae cih oh; thuasalama Muisaw liate pyn kya-e cyisahnaw kha na chisah oh ze na hiin cih oh.
45008014	Pawccecize Pachia kya-e Muisaw nynh a cciakhae`ae paw miakaw tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
45008015	Pawccecize nanning nynh a rihthya paw seetangnaw kya-e muisaw kha bua na mue khyh oh, thuasalama ccaawthuanaw Muisaw kha phe na mue vae oh, ou tuh-e te nynh, “Abba, Apang,” cite ah ko oh.
45008016	Aening tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh cipaw Muisaw amaw ccaccei nynh aening muisaw ryte ccaekia a khan.
45008017	Te ccaaw`ae ah thua oh ze rhoccoutu`ae nynh ah thua vae oh, Pachia kya-e rhoccoutu`ae te Kri ryte rhoccoukheihtu`ae nynh ah thua oh; amaw ryte ah teingkheih oh ze, pynkheihlan phu-esah ah thuabua cih oh.
45008018	Pawccecize aening kya yn langkuh vae cih paw phu-enaw te atu lya e teingnaw`ae tuh khingkhia lan sanmah ngaekuh khyh cite nynh ka tua.
45008019	Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae nynh Pachia ccaaw`ae oun langku nawlan`ae paw kha myaryasangkae ngaehoinaw te phang a ngawdae`ae.
45008020	Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae tuh accakaepaw lang nynh rae athua`ae. Tuhte raeku a ry`ae paw thua khyh; thuasalama a raetupaw nynh ngaehoinaw kya tuhcihte a rae keiccu nynh tuhte athua`ae.
45008021	Pawkeiccumacize rae paw uccaw`ae maw mah ronaw seetangnaw kyate Pachia ccaaw`ae kya-e aphu-epaw luenaw lungkhu lang poh thua athua cih`ae.
45008022	Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae balyn tuh atu cia pynkheihlan hawkhaekuh`ae zah neitangia teing`ae cipaw ah ny oh.
45008023	Minmin kyalya thua leite, Muisaw thae`ae kya-e masaty a hoi`ae paw aening kha mah ccaawthuanaw athua paw ah pyn sawkhawnaw kha ngaehoibiate ahmaw lungkhu kya ah hawkhaekuh oh.
45008024	Pawccecize aening tuh ngaehoinaw liate khum ah thua oh; thuasalama phe muih vae paw ngaehoinaw tuh ngaehoi paw thua vae khyh; pawccecize lukhakheit nynh phe a muih vae paw uccaw kha pawccemou a ngaehoi ung cih?
45008025	Thuasalama aening nynh ah muih lei oh paw kha ah ngaehoi oh ze, kha-e kha aening nynh lungsaete ah ngaw oh.
45008026	Tuhhawte aening ah ccing leinaw oh kya Muisaw nynh mah yn bawng; pawccecize sawsang lan ah ccang oh thyhte, pawcihte nynh sawsang lan cipaw ah nyh khyh oh; thuasalama aening sawsang lan bya te ho kho leipaw hawkhaekunaw khate Muisaw amaw ccaccei nynh aening hanlan yn ngiapya.
45008027	Thinlung a ccungtupaw nynh tuh Muisaw tuanaw kha a ny; pawkeiccumacize Muisaw nynh mithyaa`ae hanlan Pachia rynaw thyhte a ngiapya`ae.
45008028	Pachia kha a sungsah`ae paw, amaw a eenaw thyhte a ko paw ccungccaw`ae hanlan pawpaw balyn tuh pynkheihlan ahoy lante cci nynh acyiku cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.
45008029	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kha uteno`ae pataepi lakuze ccatawccaaw lang atang ccaw cite Pachia nynh phe a nyty paw ccungccaw`ae kha a Ccapaw muinsan te aloku nawlan phe a syntawty`ae.
45008030	Tuhte phe a syntawty paw minmin kha ko mah a ko`ae; te a ko`ae paw kha thyaaccousah`ae; te thyaaccousah`ae paw kha phu-e ccousah bua`ae.
45008031	Tuhte lanze hynh-e uccaw`ae kya pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Pachia tuh aening ryte a um ze hung nynh mou aening kha oun rawse kho ung cih?
45008032	Amaw a Ccapaw heize hang leite aening balyn hanlan oun pyatupaw Pachia nynh Ccapaw ryte pawpaw balyn kha alakaw te aening pya leite ung ngaw tou?
45008033	Pachia nynh a po`ae paw kha hung nynh mou sei a be cih? Thyaaccousatupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
45008034	Seibetupaw tuh hungmou? Chih zah a chi kyalya thua leite bua a thothuipaw, Pachia a ranglang ccaccei kya a um paw, aening hanlan oun ngiapatupaw tuh Kri ccaccei nynh thua.
45008035	Kri kya-e sungsanaw kyate hung nynh mou aening kha oun phiasakuh cih? Vawsawrunaw nynh tou? Thinlungccinaw nynh tou? Tuasakunaw nynh tou? Ccakangnaw nynh tou? Ccakaete umnaw nynh tou? Ronaw nynh tou? Zunghe nynh tou oun phiasakuh cih?
45008036	“Nang na keiccuze kaening tuh a nin ninlang oun chiabia`ae; chia lan a nungde`ae paw tuu`ae lang nynh kaening kha oun ria`ae,” cite a la zeiku hawte nynh thua.
45008037	Oun phia kho lanpaw um khyh. Aening kha oun sungsahtupaw amaw liate, aening tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kya, taetu`ae pasing nynh ah thua oh.
45008038	Pawccecize chinaw thuasah, hiinnaw thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw`ae thuasah, lupithuanaw thuasah, thungnaw thuasah, atu a um paw uccaw`ae thuasah, oun thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae thuasah;
45008039	ahangnaw thuasah, akhunaw thuasah, ccangpaw rae paw uccaw thuasah, ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu kya um paw Pachia kya-e sungsakunaw kyate aening kha oun phia kho lan khyh cite kae ka lungtyn.
45009001	Kri kya byaccing nynh ka ho, ka hyng khyh. Kamaw nykunawpaw thinlung nynh mah Thyaa Muisaw ryte kamaw kalan te ccaekiakhan paw tuh:
45009002	Kae tuh alepipaw lungriathaenaw ka hoi zah ka thinlung kya ngaethyanaw apaekuh lei lan ka hoi.
45009003	Pawccecize pynsaw lante ka puipaw vaeccaw`ae athua paw ka uno`ae hanlan kamaw te kamaw tuh Kri kyate thyalawnaw ccou lan cia heize ka ry.
45009004	Tuh-e`ae tuh Israel`ae nynh thua`ae. Te ccaawthuanaw, phu-enaw, byakin`ae, te Kawbya pyanaw, te Pachia ryalawnaw, te byakinpyakupaw`ae te asekuh`ae paw,
45009005	minpaaw`ae te asekuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Pynsaw lante Kri tuh minmin kyate nynh yn thua. Tuh-e Kri tuh tynre balyn kyaze kawhoitu thua zah zungzae hythuapyatu Pachia nynh thua. Amen.
45009006	Tuhzemah Pachia bya tuh atyn leipaw hawte ka hopaw thua khyh. Pawccecize Israel athua`ae paw balyn hynh Israel marya thua khyh`ae.
45009007	Abraham kyate a tho`ae paw balyn mah Abraham ccaaw`ae marya thua khyh`ae; thuasalama, “Na ciihan tuh Isaak kya rou nynh ko athua cih,” acihkuh.
45009008	Tuhte a hopaw tuh pynsaw ccaaw`ae tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae thua khyh cinawpaw nynh thua; thuasalama byakinpyakupaw kya-e ccaaw`ae kha nynh ciihan lan ria athua.
45009009	Byakinpyakupaw kya-e bya tuh hynhte acikuh: “Atu kae hopya ccyh yn thua te kae kae thua cih zah Sarah nynh ccapaw yn hoi cih,” a ci.
45009010	Tuh-e kyalya thua khyh, Rebeka nynh lukheitpaw, ah paaw Isaak liate ccaaw a poi lyakhe,
45009011	ccaaw`ae a pui maw`ae, ahoypaw te athahpaw mah a rae maw`ae khe, Pachia paccynnaw tuh ryalawnaw liate thua khyh, thuasalama a kotupaw nynh a ponaw thyhte athua nawlan,
45009012	Rebeka kalan khe, “Atawccapaw nynh asoipaw see lang yn tang cih,” cite a hopya.
45009013	Tuhhawte, “Jakob tuh ka sungsah, thuasalama Esau tuh ka hua,” cite azeikuh.
45009014	Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Pachia tuh taza khyh tou? Tuhte thua khyh.
45009015	Pawccecize Pachia nynh Mawsi kalan, “Ngaethya ka umsah ry paw kha ngaethya ka umsah cih zah thaw ka cciry paw kha thaw ka ccih cih,” cite a hopya.
45009016	Tukeiccu a ry paw ccungccaw kya-e thua khyh, a ccue paw ccungccaw kya-e mah thua khyh, thuasalama ngaethyaumsanaw a langsakutupaw Pachia kya-e nynh thua.
45009017	Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh Faro kalan a ho paw tuh, “Ka thungnaw kha nang na kya langsaku khylan, te ka min hynh laephipi kya balyn po thaansah khylan, hynh-e paccynnaw elan nynh nang kha kae hangthung,” a cipya.
45009018	Tukeiccu Pachia nynh ngaethya-umsah ry paw kha ngaethya-umsah zah lungkhungsah ry paw kha a lungkhungsah.
45009019	Tuhte lanze, “Pawccemou Pachia nynh cyiseimenaw yn muihpya? Hung nynh mou a rynaw kha a khee boi?” cite nae cipah cih tou.
45009020	Pachia kha rawsete a khung paw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh hungmou na thua? Rae paw uccaw nynh a raetupaw kha, “Pawccemou hynhcihte nae rae,” cite a hopah cih tou?
45009021	Ang raetupaw nynh anglae tungvaw kya kawhoi khyh tou? Anglae pumkheit mawkhate zung kheit kha ang hoypaw lang, te zung kheit kha anghoy leipaw lang raenaw kaw hoi khyh tou?
45009022	Pachia nynh amaw thinrianaw kha langsaku lan te a thungnaw kha nysah lan`ae mang a ry pite, ronaw hanlan a paccyn vae paw a thinrianua paw ang`ae kya lungsaenaw pipi te phang a ngaesang lanze pawmou ho lan ung?
45009023	Te Pachia nynh phu-enaw hanlan a paccynty vae paw, ngaethyaumsanaw ccou`ae paw ang`ae tungvaw kya a phu-enaw kya-e hoirungnaw kha langsaku khylan a cyi paw nynh thua.
45009024	Tuh-e ang`ae tuh Jew`ae kyate kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kyate oun ko paw aening so ah thua khyh oh tou?
45009025	Hosia kya mah Pachia nynh, “Ka ccungccaw`ae athua leipaw kha, ‘Ka ccungccaw`ae,’ cite ka ko cih`ae zah ka sungsah nung athua leipaw kha, ‘Ka sungsah,’ cite ka ko cih.”
45009026	“Ou tuhcihte, ‘Nanning tuh ka ccungccaw`ae na thua khyh oh,’ cite a honaw`ae kyakhe, minmin tuh a hiinpaw Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko athua cih`ae,” cite a ho.
45009027	Israel`ae te asekuh lante Isaiah nynh mah, “Israel ccaaw`ae milu tuh rili kya-e laesia hawte athua zemah, alaepaw rou nynh khum athua cih`ae.
45009028	Pawccecize ryalaw kha a thangsah cih; dingnaw kya adynsah cih; pawkeiccumacize BAWIPAW nynh adynpaw ryalaw kha laephi vawlan a rae cih,” cite a sia.
45009029	Tuhhawte Isaiah nynh langmaw lya, “Sabaoth BAWIPAW nynh aening hanlan ccacii kha yn hangpya khyh lanze aening tuh Sodom khuapi hawte ah thua cih oh zah Komorah khuapi te phe ah lokuh vae cih oh,” cite a ho.
45009030	Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Dingnaw kha a zui lei`ae paw Zenta`ae nynh dingnaw kha phe a phya vae`ae, tuh-e dingnaw tuh zynnaw kya-e nynh thua.
45009031	Thuasalama dingnaw kawbya a zui`ae paw Israel`ae nynh dingnaw kawbya kha phah khyh`ae.
45009032	Pawccemou? Pawkeiccumacize zynnaw liate zui khyh`ae, thuasalama Kawbya cyisahnaw liate a zui`ae keiccu nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize kha-e thykupawkunawpaw lung kya phe thykuh`ae.
45009033	“Dotua oh! Thykupawkunawpaw lung te seisanawpaw lung kha Zion mua kya ka nung, te hunghung zemah amaw kha a zyn paw tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” cite azeikuh hawte nynh thua.
45010001	Uteno`ae, Israel`ae hanlan ka thinlung kya-e ka rynaw te Pachia kalan ka sawsangnaw tuh minmin nynh khumnaw a ccoubua ccaw`ae ci nynh thua.
45010002	Pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kalan lungzuanaw a hoi`ae, thuasalama nythyanaw thyhte thua khyh cipaw minmin elan ccaekia ka khan.
45010003	Pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha ny lei pite, mimaw kya-e dingnaw kha tynsah khylan a zuaku`ae keiccu Pachia kya-e dingnaw kalan mimaw te mimaw kha pyakuh vae khyh`ae.
45010004	Pawccecize a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw hanlan Kri tuh dingnaw lang Kawbya accingnaw nynh thua.
45010005	Pawccecize Mawsi nynh, “Kha-e`ae a cyih paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e`ae liate nynh a hiin cih,” cite Kawbya te asekuhpaw dingnaw kong kha a zei.
45010006	Thuasalama zynnaw te asekuhpaw dingnaw kong tuh hynhte nynh a ho. “ ‘Hungmou vaawran lang a kaethung cih?’ cite na thinlung kya ho nan,” (Tuh-e tuh Kri kha sawbung khylan hungmou a kaethung cih cirypaw nynh thua)
45010007	tukhyhze, “ ‘Hungmou akhunaw lang a rungbung cih?’ cite mah na thinlung kya ho nan,” (Tuh-e tuh Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate bua poukhae khylan hungmou a rungbung cih cirypaw nynh thua) a ci.
45010008	Thuasalama paw a ci mou? “Bya tuh nang te anaekuh, na khalang kya te na thinlung kya anaekuh,” a ci. (Tuh-e tuh kaening nynh kae hopaw, zynnaw bya hynh nynh thua.)
45010009	Pawtecize Bawipaw Jesu kha na khalang te ccaekia na khan zah amaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate Pachia nynh phe a thosah vae cite na zyn lanze, nang tuh khum na thua cih.
45010010	Pawccecize dingnaw hanlan ccungccaw nynh thinlung kya a zyn, te khumnaw hanlan khalang te ccaekiakhannaw a rae.
45010011	Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh, “Hunghung zemah amaw a zyn paw balyn tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” a ci.
45010012	Pawccecize Jew te Greek phin laku laesanaw um vae khyh, pawccecize ccungccaw balyn luki Bawipaw lukheit rou nynh a um. Amaw kha a ko`ae paw balyn hanlan aning tuh myarya a hoirung.
45010013	Pawccecize, “Hunghung zemah BAWIPAW min a ko paw miakaw tuh khumnaw a mue cih.”
45010014	Tuhzemah minmin nynh a zyn lei`ae paw kha pawcihtemou a ko cih`ae? Te minmin nynh a konglang a thae lei`ae paw kha pawcihtemou a zyn cih`ae? Te phunghotu um leite pawcihtemou minmin nynh a thae cih`ae?
45010015	Te minmin kha a saw khyh`ae lanze minmin nynh pawcihtemou phungho cih`ae? Tuhhawte, “Daenaw kong thehoypaw phungho`ae paw te ahoypaw kong lungtua lan um paw thehoypaw oun phu`ae paw mih ccu tuh pawcih babang apuithya!” cite azeikuh.
45010016	Thuasalama minmin balyn nynh thehoypaw kha ngae khyh`ae. Pawccecize Isaiah nynh, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh kae ho paw kha hung nynh mou a zyn?” cite a ho.
45010017	Tukeiccu zynnaw tuh thaenaw kyate nynh yn thua, te thaenaw tuh Pachia bya kyate nynh thua.
45010018	Thuasalama, minmin tuh la thae loh khyh`ae tou? ka ci. Phe a thae ccaccing vae`ae. “Minmin mih roi tuh laephi balyn kyacia phe thua vae zah mih bya tuh laephipi athangnaw kyacia phe thua vae,” a ci.
45010019	Thuasalama kae nynh, “Israel`ae nynh nyh khyh`ae tou?” ka ci. Masaty Mawsi nynh, “Ria bua athua leipaw minphuin liate nanning kha eiungnaw kae hoisah cih oh zah angaeepaw minphuin liate nae thin kae riasah cih oh,” cite a la ho.
45010020	Thuasalama Isaiah tuh myarya a rawhoy zah, “Kamaw kha oun ccung lei`ae paw nynh kae kha phe oun muih vae`ae; ka konglang oun khia lei`ae paw kalan kae phe ka langkuh vae,” cite a ho.
45010021	Thuasalama Israel`ae kalan Isaiah nynh, “Kawngae leipaw te a ei khopaw minphuin kalan khe ninlang ka kuih ka dyng,” cite a ho.
45011001	Tuhte lanze, Pachia nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha ccaring vua vae tou? ka ci. Tuhte thua khyh! Pawccecize kae mah Israel lukheit nynh ka thua, Abraham ciihan, Benjamin phin nynh ka thua.
45011002	Pachia nynh phe a nyty vae paw a ccungccaw`ae kha ccaring vua khyh. Elijah konglang Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou? Israel`ae te arawsekuh lante aning nynh Pachia kalan a ngiakupaw tuh pawtemacize,
45011003	“BAWIPAW, minmin nynh na profeh`ae kha phe theih`ae zah na silawhang`ae kha phya a ro vae`ae, te ka makhae nynh alaepaw ka um vae, te ka hiinnaw kha oun ccung`ae,” a ci.
45011004	Thuasalama Pachia nynh a kalan a khung paw tuh: “Baal pachia kalan ccukharutung lei`ae paw ccungccaw thungsari kha kamaw hanlan phang ka haangkuh bang ung,” a cipya.
45011005	Ou tuhhawte atu ccyh lya mah thawccinaw liate ponaw thyhte a po`ae paw alaepaw a um.
45011006	Te thawccinaw liate athua ze, ryalawnaw liate kharyh thua vae khyh; athua lanze thawccinaw tuh thawccinaw thua vae lan khyh. Thuasalama cyisahnaw liate athua lanze thawccinaw liate thua vae khyh; athua lanze cyisahnaw tuh cyisahnaw thua vae khyh.
45011007	Tuhte lanze pawcihtemou? Israel`ae nynh a ccung`ae paw kha mue khyh`ae, thuasalama po`ae paw nynh kha-e kha a mue`ae, te tuhlaepaw`ae tuh mih mit pung moh`ae.
45011008	Tuh-e tuh, “Mit`ae nynh ngawmuih khyh nawlan`ae, te nakaring`ae nynh nawthae khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh minmin kha ngawthuanawpaw muisaw kha a pya`ae, atunin cia,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
45011009	Te David nynh, “Mih ccaboi tuh mih hanlan kaang lang te tahphung lang tang sah, thykupawku nawlan te ccaeliaru nawlan tang sah.
45011010	Mih mit tuh ngawmuih kho lei lan moh sah lah mih ke tuh pei ky sah,” a ci.
45011011	Tuhte lanze Israel`ae tuh a khuliaku ccaw`ae cite phe thykuh`ae tou? ka ci. Tuhte thua khyh. Thuasalama minmin eiungnaw lang minmin cyiseimenaw liate khumnaw tuh Zenta`ae kalan yn thua vae.
45011012	Atu Israel`ae cyiseimenaw tuh laephipi hoirungnaw lang yn tang zah minmin nyaabungnaw tuh Zenta`ae hoirungnaw lang a tang ze, minmin ccingnaw tuh pawcihmou houh alung cih!
45011013	Tuhzemah kae tuh Zenta`ae locceihtu ka thua thyhhawte, ka ryalawnaw kha ka hothung zah Zenta`ae nanning kae hopya oh.
45011014	Ccangkhakheit te ka vaeccaw`ae kha mih lungthonaw ka rae zah minmin abang kha khumnaw ka ccousah bua ccaw`ae ci nynh thua.
45011015	Pawccecize minmin kha ccaring vuanawpaw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae ccawkuthuinaw lang a tang ze, minmin kha bua lehkhannaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate hiinthuinaw lang thua lan khyh tou?
45011016	Te masaty ccathae tuh athyaa ze vaepoi balyn mah athyaa cih; te atharui tuh athyaa ze aran`ae mah athyaa bua cih.
45011017	Te aran`ae abang kha khya`ae zah rangkaw e oliv thingku athua paw, nang kha minmin kya ae piade`ae zah aran`ae ryte pynkheihlan oliv thingku kya-e atharui te athotui kha na ccoubua lanze,
45011018	a khya`ae paw aran`ae tungvaw la ponuakuh nan, thuasalama na pooku lan thua ze, nang nynh atharui kha na phu khyh, thuasalama atharui nynh nynh nang kha ae phu.
45011019	Tuhte lanze nang nynh, “Kae kha yn piade nawlan`ae nynh aran`ae kha a khya`ae,” na ci ngaw rei.
45011020	Athua rou; zyn leinaw keiccuze minmin tuh khya`ae zah nang tuh zynnaw liate na thadyn. Tansakuh nan, rinaw palia kha hoi.
45011021	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a umty paw aran`ae hei kha a haang khyh lanze nang mah ae haanglae lan khyh.
45011022	Tukeiccu Pachia a hoynaw te phe ccihtheihpaw byapianaw kha dotua; a khuliakuh`ae paw tungvaw phe ccihtheihpaw byapianaw kha a thuasah, thuasalama nang tuh a hoynaw kya na tyn ze Pachia kya-e hoynaw kha na kalan a thuasah cih, tuhzemah a hoynaw kya na tyn khyh lanze nang mah thoh bae na thua cih.
45011023	Te minmin mah zyn leinaw kya pei a tyn khyh`ae ze piade bua athua cih`ae; pawccecize minmin kha bua piade lan Pachia tuh a cyih kho.
45011024	Pawccecize rangkaw amaw po lan popaw oliv thingku kyate nang kha thoh ae bae`ae zah ahoypaw oliv thingku kya athuanaw te accawkuh lei pite piade na thua lanze, a umtypaw aran`ae athua paw minmin kha mimaw oliv thingku kya houh piade thua lan khyh`ae tou?
45011025	Pawccecize uteno`ae, naemaw na tuakunaw oh kya na hawsaku khyh nawlan oh, Zenta`ae kya-e ccingnaw a tee makhia Israel`ae abang kya mohnaw tuh a thua, tuh-e mohnaw athua paw, hynh-e byakhupaw hynh ny leite na um lan oh paw kha ka ry khyh.
45011026	Tuhcihte azeiku hawte Israel`ae balyn tuh khumnaw mue cih`ae; “Zion mua kyate Luesatupaw yn thua cih zah aning nynh Pachia pawlangria leinaw kha Jakob ciihan`ae kyate a nuepah cih`ae.
45011027	Te mih seinaw`ae kha he ka lawpah`ae te hynhe tuh minmin hanlan kamaw byakin nynh athua,” cite azeikuh.
45011028	Thehoypaw te asekuh lante nanning keiccuze minmin tuh rhaw`ae nynh thua`ae, thuasalama Pachia ponaw te asekuh lante tuh minpaaw`ae keiccuze minmin tuh sungsah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
45011029	Pawccecize Pachia kya-e lasung`ae te Pachia konaw tuh rulae kho leipaw nynh thua.
45011030	Pawccecize langmaw lya nanning tuh Pachia kawngae lei`ae na la thua oh salamah atu tuh minmin kawngae leinaw liate ngaethya-umsanaw kha na ccou oh hawte,
45011031	tuhhawte nanning na ccou oh paw ngaethyaumsanaw liate minmin mah ngaethya-umsanaw a ccoubua nawlan`ae nynh minmin mah atu kawngae khyh`ae.
45011032	Pawccecize Pachia nynh ccungccaw balyn tungvaw kya ngaethya-umsanaw kha a hoi nawlan minmin balyn kha kawngae leinaw kya pung a khung`ae.
45011033	Pachia kya-e hawnaw te nynaw paryh tuh myarya khu zah eih ko kaesy ccarei! A byapianaw`ae tuh thaethya kho um khyh zah a ccianaw`ae tuh muih kho um khyh ccarei!
45011034	“Pawccecize BAWIPAW a tuanaw-thinlung kha hung nynh mou phe a nyh? Tukhyhze hungmou amaw khuakhankhaetu lang a tang boi?”
45011035	“Tukhyhze Pachia nynh bua a pyaru nawlan hung nynh mou amaw kha masaty a pya tou?”
45011036	Pawccecize pawpaw tynre balyn tuh amaw kyate, amaw liate, amaw hanlan nynh thua. Amaw kya phu-enaw zungzae umsah. Amen.
45012001	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, nae pyn kha ahiinpaw, athyaapaw te Pachia kalan douccahpaw silawku nawlan na pyaku nawlan oh Pachia kya-e ngaethya-umsanaw liate nanning kha kae ngia oh; tuh-e pyakupaw rya tuh nanning nynh na cyi lan oh accanpaw rya nynh thua.
45012002	Te nanning nynh hynh-e she kya-e muinsanke nan oh, thuasalama ahoypaw uccaw, ry lan um paw, accingpaw uccaw cihkuh`ae paw, Pachia rynaw tuh paw hynh nynh thua cipaw na langsaku thya nawlan oh, nae thinlung bua thawsanaw liate muinsan rulaekuh oh.
45012003	Pawccecize nanning laku ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw te amaw kha a tuaku lan accannaw laelan la tuakuh nan sah, thuasalama Pachia nynh milu raveih kha zynnaw tounawpaw a pya thyhte amaw kha kou ngaekuh lante a tuaku nawlan, ka mue paw thawccinaw liate nanning kha kae hopya oh.
45012004	Pawccecize aening nynh pyn pynkheit kya pyn kyae` ae patae ah hoi oh zah pyn kya-e`ae balyn tuh alokuhpaw ryalaw cci a hoi khyh`ae hawte,
45012005	tuhhawte patae cih`ae paw aening mah Kri kya pyn kheit ah thua oh zah lu raveihte pyn kya-e`ae nynh ah thua oh.
45012006	Tuhte aening yn pyapaw thawccinaw thyhte alokuh leipaw lasung`ae kha ah mue oh zah profehbyahonaw a mue paw nynh zynnaw a hoi zeihte profehbya ho sah.
45012007	Beiknaw ryalawnaw a mue paw nynh ryalawnaw kya tyn sah, te a ccangpatu nynh ccangpyanaw kya tyn sah,
45012008	a hytupaw nynh hynaw rya kha lah sah, a pyatupaw nynh hysanaw te pya sah, a uktupaw nynh zuakunaw te uk sah, ngaethya-umsanaw a langsatupaw nynh lungtua thawmuinte langsah sah.
45012009	Sungsakunaw kya tuh cyiruhnaw um nan sah. Athahpaw kha luathua-ae-ui lang ria oh lah ahoypaw kha varyn bekuh oh.
45012010	Uteno`ae, u te neitaw sasaw hawte lukheit te lukheit kha thawccikute sungsakuh oh; sawtuakunaw kya lukheit te lukheit sawtuakuh hua oh;
45012011	thawzung thuanaw kya thawnaw leite thinlung thanccingte Bawipaw rya kha lah oh;
45012012	ngaehoinaw kya lungtua oh; vawsawrunaw kya lungsae oh; sawsangnaw kya pei tyn oh;
45012013	mithyaa`ae kha mih hobounaw kya la bawngbua oh; mikhia dooihnaw kha kou hoy lante la rae oh.
45012014	Nanning ae tua ae sah oh paw kha hythuapya oh, hythuapya oh lah thyalaw nan oh.
45012015	Lungtua`ae paw ryte lungtuabua oh lah a rah`ae paw ryte la rah bua oh.
45012016	Lukheit te lukheit lunglokute la um oh. Tuanaw-thinlung kya tansakuh nan oh, thuasalama a nyaa`ae paw ryte vaeccawtang oh. Naemaw tuakunaw kya hawsakuh nan oh.
45012017	Hunghung sanmah athahpaw hanlan athahpaw te ccaeliaru nan oh, ccungccaw balyn mitmuihnaw kya ahoypaw uccaw tuanaw hoi oh.
45012018	Athua kho lanze, naemaw kya ccawkunaw a um thyhhawte, ccungccaw`ae balyn ryte ccawkute la um oh.
45012019	Sungsah`ae paw, naemaw nynh naemaw hanlan ccaeliaru nan oh, thuasalama Pachia thinrianaw hanlan nungpah oh, pawccecize Bawipaw nynh, “Ccaeliarunaw tuh kamaw kya-e, kamaw nynh ka liaru cih,” a ci cite azeikuh.
45012020	Tukeiccu, “Nang na rhawpaw kha a vuelaw ze looh la dang; a tuihaw ze nia lanpaw kha la pya; pawccecize tuhte na cyinaw kya nang nynh kha-e paw lu vawlan maee-e`ae kha na pungpah cih.”
45012021	Athahpaw khate la taesakuh nan, thuasalama athahpaw kha ahoypaw te la tae.
45013001	Uknaw lante kawhoi`ae paw kalan ccungccaw miakaw nynh kawngae`ae sah. Pawccecize Pachia kyate laelan tuh kawhoinaw cipaw um khyh, kawhoinaw`ae tuh Pachia nynh khang paw nynh thua.
45013002	Tukeiccu hunghung zemah kawhoinaw kha a rawsepaw tuh Pachia khangnaw kha a rawsepaw nynh thua, te tuhte a rawsepaw tuh mimaw tungvaw seibyapianaw a ing cih`ae.
45013003	Pawccecize uktu`ae tuh ahoypaw ryalah`ae paw hanlan ri lanpaw thua khyh, thuasalama ahoy leipaw ryalah`ae paw nynh a ri lan`ae paw nynh thua. Kawhoi`ae paw kha ri leite tou na um ry? Ahoypaw rya kha lah lah kawhoinaw kyate thehoysanaw kha na ccou cih.
45013004	Pawccecize aning tuh nang na hoynaw hanlan Pachia kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua. Thuasalama ahoy leipaw rya na law ze la rih; pawccecize aning tuh thaloi kha alakaw lang ccyng khyh; pawccecize ccungccaw tungvaw thinrianaw thuakhae zah ccaeliarutupaw Pachia kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua.
45013005	Tukeiccuze thinrianaw keiccu kyalya nanning nynh kaw na ngae lan oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama ahmaw te ahmaw nykunaw thinlung keiccu mah kaw na ngae lanpaw nynh thua.
45013006	Hynh keiccuze nanning mah ngunto pya oh, pawccecize uktu`ae tuh Pachia ryalahtu`ae thua`ae zah hynh-e mih ryalaw hanlan mimaw kha pei pyakuh`ae paw nynh thua.
45013007	Tukeiccu ccungccaw miakaw kha mue lan a ccan`ae thyhte la pya oh; ngunto accanpaw kha ngunto pya oh; ngunkhoi accanpaw kha ngunkhoi pya oh, rawri lan accanpaw kha rawrih oh; sawtua lan accanpaw kha sawtua oh.
45013008	Lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lanpaw laelan hung kalan sanmah laeba um nan oh; pawccecize mingccangpaw a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh Kawbya kha phe a ccingsah vae.
45013009	Pawccecize, “Milae zu la seikhae nan,” “Ccungccaw la theih nan,” “La ruh nan,” “Ahme leipaw ccaekia la khan nan,” “Milae uccaw la dua nan,” cikuh paw laelan ccangpaw kawpyapaw a um lan zemah, “Na innpaw kha namaw na sungsaku hawte la sungsah,” cikuh paw hynh-e kawpyapaw nynh marya a khung.
45013010	Sungsakunaw nynh tuh a innpaw kya ahoy leipaw rae boi khyh. Tukeiccu sungsakunaw tuh Kawbya ccingnaw nynh thua.
45013011	Te, accyh kha nybiate, atu tuh inaw kyate tho ccyh phe zaw vae; pawccecize aening ah zyn lya oh laeze khumnaw tuh atu nynh aening kalan anaeku hua.
45013012	Khuazi tuh vyavya thang zah khuadae thua lan cih vae, tukeiccu aening nynh mohnaw ryalaw`ae kha vua ccavae oh sih lah awnaw rhawuccaw kha lawkuh ccavae oh sih.
45013013	Zu-ae hoysanaw, ruinaw, ohhuakurynaw, ccouseikunaw, ziakubuakunaw, te eiungkunaw, hynh-e`ae kya um leite, ninthu ccyh hawte aening nynh kou ngaekuh lante hiin oh sih.
45013014	Thuasalama Bawipaw Jesu Kri khate ccaankuh oh lah pynsaw ryduanaw ccingsah khylan pynsaw hanlan uapah nan oh.
45014001	Zynnaw kya thawzyapaw ccungccaw kha lehkhan oh, thuasalama lunghiin lan um paw eikunaw kha raekhae nan oh.
45014002	Pawccecize aepaw miakaw tuh ae lan accan cite lukheit nynh a zyn, thuasalama thawzyapaw nynh tuh enaw-ekan rou kha a ae.
45014003	Marya a ae paw nynh a ae leipaw kha dothatheih nan sah, te a ae leipaw nynh a ae paw kha byapia nan sah, pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha lehkhan vae paw nynh thua.
45014004	Ming`ae seepaw kha byapiatupaw nang tuh hungmou na thua? Aning tuh a thadyn zemah amaw a bawipaw hanlan, a khuliaku zemah amaw a bawipaw hanlan khaw. Athua, aning tuh thadynsah athua cih, pawccecize Pachia nynh aning kha a thadynsah kho.
45014005	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh nin kheit tuh ccangpaw nin laeze asunghua cite a tua, mingccangpaw nynh nin miakaw tuh phe lokuh lante a tua. Ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw thinlung kya phe ccaesakuh sah.
45014006	Ninsaw kha a sung paw ccungccaw tuh Bawipaw maedote nynh a sung, ninsaw kha a sung leipaw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote nynh a sung khyh; a ae paw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote nynh a ae, pawccecize Pachia kalan lungtuabya a ho; te a ae leipaw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote ae khyh zah Pachia kalan lungtuabya a ho.
45014007	Pawccecize aening kyaze hung sanmah amaw hanlan kyalya a hiinpaw um khyh, hung sanmah amaw hanlan chih khyh.
45014008	Pawccecize aening tuh ah hiin oh zemah Bawipaw hanlan nynh ah hiin oh; ah chi oh zemah Bawipaw hanlan nynh ah chi oh; tukeiccu ah hiin oh zemah, ah chi oh zemah aening tuh Bawipaw kya-e nynh ah thua oh.
45014009	Pawccecize Kri tuh a chihpaw te a hiinpaw paryh Bawipaw lang a tang ccaw cite chih zah a thothui, te a hiin.
45014010	Thuasalama pawccemou nang nynh na uno kha bya na pia? Pawccemou na uno kha pawlangria leite na um? Pawccecize aening balyn tuh Kri a byapianaw tungkhung malang pung ah thadyn cih oh paw nynh thua.
45014011	Pawccecize, “BAWIPAW nynh ka hiin thyhhawte ka malang ccungccaw miakaw ccukharutung cih`ae zah mimaw mih lae te Pachia kalan ccaekiakhan cih`ae a ci,” cite azeikuh.
45014012	Tukeiccu aening luraveih tuh ahmaw cyisahnaw ccazing thyhte Pachia kalan ah thuakhae cih oh.
45014013	Tukeiccu aening lukheit te lukheit kharyh byapiakuh nan vae oh sih, thuasalama hynhte palia bya la pae oh; hung nynh sanmah a uno ccianaw kya thykupawkunaw, tukhyhze khuliasakunaw kha nungkhaw nan sah.
45014014	Pawpaw aepaw sanmah huataw tetuh thu khyh cipaw kae nynh Bawipaw Jesu liate ka zynkuh zah ka ny; thuasalama ccangkhakheit kha thyaa khyh cite a tua paw ccungccaw hanlan tuh kha-e kha a hanlan athu.
45014015	Thuasalama na uno tuh na aepaw keiccu a thinlungcci lanze nang tuh sungsakunaw thyhte na hiin khyh. Kri nynh a hanlan a chipya paw kha nang nynh na aepaw te la roh nan.
