Kaening nynh kae teingpaw, kha-e teingnaw`ae phang ngaesangnaw tuh accungkiapaw nynh thua. Tukhyhze kaening tuh ngaengansah kae thua ze, tuh-e tuh nae ngaengannaw hanlan te khumnaw hanlan nynh thua.
47001007	Te nanning hanlan kaening ngaehoinaw tuh tynkaring. Nanning tuh teingnaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh na thua oh cipaw kae ny hawte, ngaengannaw mah a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
47001008	Pawccecize uteno`ae, Asia ram kya kaening kya yn thua paw vawsawnaw kha nanning ny leite na um lan oh paw kae ry khyh. Tou kho um lei lan, thawzung nynh taening lei lan, hiinnaw heize ngaehoi um vae lei lan kaening tuh phuripaw nynh oun ne.
47001009	Kaening nynh kaemaw te kaemaw kae doliaku khyh nawlan, thuasalama a chih`ae paw a thosah paw Pachia kha kae doliaku nawlan, kaemaw tuh chi lan byapae vae paw nynh kae thua.
47001010	Tuh-e Pachia nynh khacih alepaw chinaw kyate kaening kha oun luesah zah atu mah oun luesah. Amaw nynh bua oun luesah ung cih cite amaw kha kae doliakuh.
47001011	Ccungccaw patae nynh kaening oun pya`ae paw lasung hanlan, ccungccaw patae nynh kaening ccelang lungtuabya a ho nawlan`ae nanning nynh mah sawsangnaw te pynkheihlan nae bawng oh.
47001012	Pawccecize kaening kae pookunaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, pynsaw hawnaw te thua leite, thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw liate, lungthyaanaw te, te thanccingte Pachia rawrinaw te nynh laephipi kyahin kae um cipaw tuh kaemaw nykunawpaw thinlung nynh ccaekiakhan; nanning kya khate nynh houh kae um.
47001013	Pawccecize nanning nynh na ria oh zah phe na thaethya vae oh paw laelan, ccangpaw uccaw kha nanning kalan kae zei khyh; athangnaw cia hei nanning nynh khaleih na thaethya cih oh cite ka ngaehoi.
47001014	Nanning nynh kaening hynh abang te nae thaethya vae oh hawte, Bawipaw Jesu nin kya nanning tuh kaening kae pookunaw na thua oh hawte, kaening mah nanning na pookunaw oh paw nynh kae thua.
47001015	Te nanning nynh vaeningnaw thanenaw na hoi ccaw oh cite hynh-e zynkunaw kya, kae tuh nanning kalan thuaty lan ka tuakuh.
47001016	Te nanning kha po cciakhung lan zah Mesidonia ram lungkhu lang ccia lan, te Mesidonia ram kyate nanning kalan bua thua lan zah nanning nynh Judah ram lang ka khuaccungnaw kya nae cciakhae ccaw oh cite ka tuakuh.
47001017	Tukeiccu tuhte ka tuaku lyakha zawphalae lang tou ka cyi? Tukhyhze ka paccynkupaw uccaw kha kamaw kya Athua, Athua, ci lante Thua khyh, Thua khyh, hung ci lan cite ccungccaw lante tou ka paccynku?
47001018	Thuasalama Pachia tuh zyn lan um paw athua thyhte, nae kya kae hopaw bya tuh, Athua te Thua khyh cipaw thua khyh.
47001019	Pawccecize kaening, kamaw, Silvanas te Timote nynh kae hopaw Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri tuh Athua, Thua khyh, cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama amaw kya tuh Athua ci mawcci.
47001020	Pawccecize amaw kya Pachia kya-e byakinkupaw balyn tuh Athua, ci thua zah aening liate Pachia phuenaw hanlan amaw kya tuh Amen, ci nynh thua.
47001021	Atu nanning ryte kaening kha Kri kya oun tynsah paw te aening satho oun thuh paw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
47001022	Tuh-e Pachia nynh aening kha tazeih phe oun khia vae pyatypaw lante Thyaa Muisaw kha ah thinlung kya phe yn pya vae.
47001023	Tuhlaeze nanning kha vawsaw kae pya ry khyh oh pawte nynh kae tuh Korin khuapi kalan kae thua vae khyh cipaw ka hiinnaw-muisaw tungvaw ccaekia lang Pachia kha ka koku.
47001024	Nae zynnaw vawlan uknaw kaw kae hoi paw thua khyh, thuasalama nae lungtuanaw elan ryalahkheihtu`ae nynh kae thua; pawccecize zynnaw liate nynh nanning tuh na thadyn oh.
47002001	Thuasalama ngaethyanaw ryte nanning kalan bua kae thua lan khyh cite kamaw te kamaw bya phe ka paeku vae.
47002002	Pawccecize kae nynh nanning kha ngae kae thyasah oh ze, kae nynh ngae ka thyasah paw nanning laelan hungmou kae lung yn tuasah paw tuh?
47002003	Te he kae thua vae ze, lungtuanaw hoi lan ka ccan paw ccungccaw`ae kyate ngaethyanaw ka hoi sei khyh nawlan nynh hynh-e ccaccei hynh nae kalan ka zei; ka lungtuanaw tuh nae balyn lungtuanaw nynh thua cipaw nae balyn kya zynkunaw ka hoi.
47002004	Pawccecize vawsawnaw pataepi kyate, lungriathaenaw kyate, mitphi patae ryte nynh nae kalan ka zei, nae thinlung cci ccaw cite ka zei khyh, thuasalama nanning kha pawcih nynh kae sungsah oh cipaw na ny oh ccaw cite nynh ka zei.
47002005	Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh thinlungccinaw a pousah lanze, kamaw hynh thinlung yn ccisah khyh, thuasalama nae balynte azawnaw thinlung ae ccisah oh; ou tuhte nae balyn tungvaw eih a reipaw ka thua khyh nawlan.
47002006	Ccungccaw lunghua nynh a pya`ae paw detahnaw tuh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw hanlan azaw.
47002007	Phin ccang lante, nanning nynh kha-e paw kha ngaethya paleih oh lah soihbia paleih oh; tukhyh lanze khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha eih ngaethyanaw nynh phe a laangsei cih.
47002008	Tukeiccu kha-e paw na sungsanaw oh paw kha nanning nynh la langsapah oh cite kae ngia oh.
47002009	Pawccecize pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh kaw na ngae oh ta cipaw ka ny ry keiccu nynh hynhte ka zei.
47002010	Nanning nynh ccangkhakheit na ngaethya oh paw ccungccaw kha kae nynh mah ka ngaethya; pawccecize kae nynh ccangkhakheit kha ka ngaethya ze, kha-e paw kha Kri malang nanning liate nynh ka ngaethya.
47002011	Tukhyh lanze, Setan nynh aening kya ccyhhoypaw kha a lawkuh sei cih; pawccecize a thyaruhnaw kha ny leite ah um khyh oh.
47002012	Tuhlaeze, Kri thehoypaw ho lan Troas khua lang he ka thua tuh Bawipaw nynh kae kha thuakaw yn hungpya.
47002013	Ka neitaw Titu kha ka muih khyh keiccuze ka lungdae khyh; te minmin kha akhue ka dyhkuh`ae zah tuin kyate Mesidonia lang ka cceih.
47002014	Atu Kri kya taenaw kalan aening kha pei yn cciakhae paw te ahmin takyh kya aening liate amaw nynaw mynkhuhpaw a langsakuh paw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thuasah.
47002015	Pawccecize kaening tuh khum athua`ae paw kya thuasah, aroh`ae paw kya thuasah, Pachia kalan Kri kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua.
47002016	Lukheitpaw hanlan chinaw kyacia chinaw kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua; mingccangpaw hanlan hiinnaw kyacia hiinnaw kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua. E uccaw`ae hanlan hungmou a zaw paw a um?
47002017	Pawccecize kaening tuh ccungccaw patae hawte, Pachia bya kha amia lang a zuakuh`ae paw kae thua khyh; thuasalama Pachia kya-e`ae hawte thinlung thanccingte, Kri kya Pachia malang nynh kae ho.
47003001	Kaening tuh kaemaw te kaemaw tou bua kae thehoysakuh? Tukhyhze nanning kalan thehoysanawpaw ccaw`ae khyh ze nanning kyate thehoysanawpaw ccaw`ae kha, mingccang`ae abang hawte kaening kae peki tou?
47003002	Nanning tuh kae thinlung kya azeikuh paw ccaw, ccungccaw balyn nynh nyh`ae zah a ria`ae paw, kaening ccaw nynh na thua oh.
47003003	Ccatui te zei paw na thua khyh oh, thuasalama a hiinpaw Pachia Muisaw te zei paw nynh na thua oh; lung ccalung kya zei na thua khyh oh, thuasalama thinlung kya-e ngesaw ccalung kya zei paw na thua oh zah kaening ryalawnaw liate raerae alangkuh lan phy paw Kri kya-e ccaw nynh na thua oh.
47003004	Te kaening tuh Kri liate Pachia kalan tuhtahawpaw doliakunaw kae hoi.
47003005	Ccangkhakheit kha kaemaw kyate oun thua paw tuaku lan kaemaw te kaemaw phe kae ccing cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama kaening kya-e ccingnaw tuh Pachia kyate nynh thua.
47003006	Tuh-e Pachia nynh byakin thaw kya-e ryalahtu`ae olante kaening kha phe oun rae vae; ccaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama Muisaw kya-e nynh thua; pawccecize ccaw nynh tuh a chia, thuasalama Muisaw nynh tuh hiinnaw a pya.
47003007	Thuasalama azo avae paw Mawsi mitmae phu-enaw keiccuze, Israel ccungccaw`ae nynh a mae kha riri a do kho lei lan`ae cia, lungphe vawlan khiate zei paw, chinaw ryalawnaw tuh a phu-e lan thua ze,
47003008	Muisaw ryalawnaw tuh houh phu-esah thua lan khyh tou?
47003009	Pawccecize seibenaw rylawnaw nynh phuenaw a hoi lanze, dingnaw ryalawnaw tuh phu-enaw te houh abeih cih.
47003010	Pawccecize tuh-e phe beihpaw phu-enaw keiccu, langmaw phu-esah a la thua paw hei kha phu-enaw hoi vae khyh.
47003011	Pawccecize azo avae paw nynh a phu-e lanze, po atynpaw tuh houh a phu-e.
47003012	Tuhte khahtahawpaw ngaehoinaw kae hoi keiccuze kaening tuh rawhoy te nynh kae ho.
47003013	Te azo lyaccya paw uccaw athangnaw kha Israel`ae nynh riri a do kho khyh`ae ccaw cite a mae a khungkuhpaw Mawsi hawte kae thua khyh.
47003014	Thuasalama mih tuanaw-thinlung tuh phe amoh; pawccecize atunin cia Byakin Ryn rianaw kya tuh-e khungkupaw tuh lawpya leite phang a um ung; tuh-e khungkupaw tuh Kri kya nynh zosah athua.
47003015	Thuasalama atunin cia hei Mawsi kawbya kha he a ria vae `ae ze, mih thinlung kha khungkupaw nynh phang a bong ung.
47003016	Tuhzemah lukheit nynh Bawipaw kalan he a paleihkuh tuh khungkupaw kha lawpya athua vae.
47003017	Te Bawipaw tuh Muisaw nynh thua; te Bawipaw kya-e Muisaw a umnaw tuh luenaw a um.
47003018	Thuasalama aening balyn tuh lyngpyapaw mitmae lyngpya te muinsado kya do hawte, Bawipaw phu-enaw kha ah do oh; Bawipaw Muisaw liate rulaepaw hawte, aening tuh phu-enaw kyate phu-enaw kalan alokuhpaw muinsan lungkhu lang rulae ah thua cciamang oh.
47004001	Tukeiccu kaening tuh ngaethya umsanaw kha kae ccou hawte, hynh-e ryalawnaw hynh kae hoi thyhte kae lungthang khyh.
47004002	Thuasalama thyaruhnaw te hiin leite, Pachia bya kha ccungccaw ling nawlan mang leite, maethya lan um paw thuruh paw uccaw`ae kha phya kae vua vae. Thuasalama byaccing langsapyakunaw liate, Pachia malang ccungccaw miakaw mawtemaw nykunaw kalan kaemaw te kaemaw kha kae ahkuh.
47004003	Thuasalama kaening kya-e thehoypaw tuh phang khung athua heize, tuh-e tuh azo lya ccya`ae paw kalan nynh phang khungpya athua.
47004004	Pachia muinsan athua paw, Kri kya-e aphu-epaw thehoypaw awnaw nynh a zyn lei`ae paw kya a aw khyh nawlan, kha-e`ae tuanawthinlung kha atu she e pachia nynh phe amohsah.
47004005	Pawccecize kaening nynh kaemaw kong kha kae ho khyh, thuasalama Kri Jesu tuh Bawipaw nynh athua cipaw, te Jesu keiccuze kaening tuh nanning see`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha kae ho.
47004006	Pawccecize mohnaw kyate awnaw awsah khylan, kawpyatupaw Pachia nynh Jesu Kri mae kya Pachia kya-e phuenaw nynawpaw awnaw kha pya khylan, ah thinlung kya phe a awsah vae.
47004007	Thuasalama thungnaw kya-e lesae huaccenaw tuh kaening kya-e thua leite, Pachia kya-e athua nawlan, laephi ang`ae kya hynh-e sisua hynh kaening nynh kae hoi.
47004008	Hawlang hawlang te vawsaw kae tung, tuhzemah phe miade kae thua khyh; kae lungvawsaw, thuasalama kae lungthang khyh;
47004009	oun tua oun sah`ae, thuasalama ccaring vuasya kae thua khyh; oun khulia`ae zemah ro kae thua khyh.
47004010	Jesu a hiinnaw kha mah kae pyn kya a langku ccaw cite Bawipaw Jesu a chinaw kha kae pyn kya pei kae phubia.
47004011	Pawccecize Jesu a hiinnaw kha mah a chihthyapaw kae pynsaw kya a langku ccaw cite, Jesu keiccuze a hiin`ae paw kaening kha chinaw kalan pei oun thuakhae`ae.
47004012	Tukeiccu kaening kya tuh chinaw nynh ryalah, thuasalama nanning kya tuh hiinnaw nynh ryalah.
47004013	Te, “Kae tuh ka zyn, tukeiccu nynh ka ho,” cite azeiku thyhte, alokuhpaw zynnaw muisaw kha kae hoi pawte, kaening mah kae zyn, tukeiccu nynh kae ho.
47004014	Bawipaw Jesu kha a thosatupaw nynh Jesu liate kaening kha mah oun thosabua cih zah nanning ryte amaw kalan oun umsah bua cih cite kae ny.
47004015	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh lungtuabya honaw liate, Pachia phu-enaw hanlan, paepaeluipaw thawccinaw tuh phe abia ccaw cite, pawpaw balyn tuh nanning hanlan nynh thua.
47004016	Tukeiccu kae lungthang khyh. Atolang-e kae ccungccaw tuh rohsah lazemah, alungkhu lang-e ccungccaw tuh nin kheit koute nin kheit thawsah athua.
47004017	Pawccecize sosoh kyalya teing athua paw, zawbahaepaw kae kya-e vawsawnaw nynh myaryasangkae akhingccipaw zungzae phu-enaw kha kae hanlan houh oun raepya.
47004018	Tukeiccu muih paw uccaw`ae kha kae do khyh, thuasalama muih leipaw uccaw`ae kha nynh kae do; pawccecize muih paw uccaw`ae tuh sosoh nynh atyn, thuasalama muih leipaw uccaw`ae tuh zungzae atyn.
47005001	Pawccecize a laephi inn, hynh-e bu hynh ro athua lanze, kuih te rae leipaw inn, Pachia nynh sak paw inn, zungzae atynpaw vaawran kya ah hoi oh cipaw ah ny oh.
47005002	Pawccecize vaawran a um paw aening umnawpaw ryte ccaanku lanpaw kha myarya ah peki oh pawte, e laephi inn kya aening tuh ah hawkhaekuh oh.
47005003	Tuhte phe ah ccaanku vae oh ze, aening tuh ah sahse te oun muih vae lan khyh`ae.
47005004	Pawccecize e bu kya ah um oh paw aening tuh phupaw nynh phang oun ne pawte ah hawkhaekuh oh; uccaw te ah ccaankuh ry khyh oh keiccu thua khyh; thuasalama a chihthyapaw kha hiinnaw nynh po a laang ccaw cite, aening tuh houh ccaan ah thua oh.
47005005	Atu hynh-e uccaw ccaccei hanlan aening oun paccyntupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua. Tuh-e Pachia nynh Muisaw athua paw pyatypaw kha mah phe oun pya vae.
47005006	Tukeiccu aening tuh pyn inn kya ah um lya oh tuh, Bawipaw kya ah um khyh oh cipaw kha nybiate, pei ah zynku oh.
47005007	Pawccecize aening tuh zynnaw liate nynh ah hiin oh, muihnaw liate ah hiin khyh oh.
47005008	Pyn kya um vae leite, Bawipaw ryte umkheih lanpaw kha ah ry oh zah ah zynku oh.
47005009	Tukeiccu aening tuh ah um oh zemah, ah um vae khyh oh zemah, amaw lungrythuasah lanpaw kha nynh ah paccynku oh.
47005010	Pawccecize ahoypaw thuasah, athahpaw thuasah pynsaw kya a cyi paw thathyhte milu raveih nynh a cyi paw kha a mue nawlan, aening balyn tuh Kri byapianaw tungkhung malang marya ah langkuh hahe cih oh.
47005011	Tukeiccu Bawipaw rawrinaw kha nybiate, ccungccaw`ae kha kae soih`ae; thuasalama kaening tuh Pachia nynh hoyte ny paw nynh kae thua, naemaw nykunaw thinlung kya ny paw mah kae thua cite ka zyn.
47005012	Pawccecize nanning kalan kaemaw te kaemaw kha bua kae thehoysakuh khyh. Thuasalama thinlung kya thua leite mitmuihnaw kya a pookuh`ae paw kha na khung kho nawlan oh, kaening hanlan na pooku nawlan oh ccyhhoypaw kha kae pya oh.
47005013	Pawccecize kaening tuh lungkyh lei`ae paw kae thua ze, Pachia hanlan nynh thua, tukhyhze kaening tuh lungkyh`ae paw kae thua ze, nanning hanlan nynh thua.
47005014	Pawccecize, ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccungccaw balyn hanlan a chi lanze, ccungccaw balyn tuh a chih`ae cite;
47005015	te a hiin`ae paw nynh atu te mimaw hanlan hiin vae leite, mih hanlan chih zah bua a thothuipaw hanlan a hiin ccaw `ae cite nynh aning tuh ccungccaw balyn hanlan a chi cite kae tua pawte, Kri kya-e sungsakunaw nynh kaening kha umkhaeku kho lei lan rya oun naw.
47005016	Tukeiccu atu te vae tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah pynsaw lante kae nyh vae khyh; pynsaw lante Kri kha kae la ny zemah atu te vae tuh tuhte kae nyh vae khyh.
47005017	Tukeiccu lukhakheit tuh Kri kya a um lanze, aning tuh raethawpaw ccungccaw nynh thua; arynpaw uccaw`ae tuh marya azo vae; dotua, pawpaw balyn tuh athawpaw lang oun tang vae.
47005018	Te pawpaw balyn tuh Pachia kyate nynh thua; amaw kalan aening kha Jesu Kri liate bua oun ccawsakuthui zah bua ccawkuthuinawpaw ryalaw kha kaening oun pya;
47005019	tuhe tuh, Pachia tuh Kri kya um zah, laephi ccungccaw`ae mih cyiseinaw`ae kha ccuinpya vae leite, minmin kha amaw kalan bua a ccawsakuthui`ae cipaw kha nynh thua, te bua ccawsakuthuinawpaw bya kha kaening kalan phe oun ahpya vae.
47005020	Oute atu kaening tuh Kri hanlan locceihtu`ae nynh kae thua; kaening liate Pachia nynh ae hy oh paw hawte, nanning tuh Pachia kalan bua ccawkuthui oh cite Kri ccelang kaening nynh nanning kha kae ngia oh.
47005021	Pawccecize aening tuh Kri kya Pachia dingnaw ah thua nawlan oh, seinaw a nyh leipaw amaw kha Pachia nynh aening hanlan a seipaw lang a rae.
47006001	Te kaening, amaw ry pynkheihlan ryalahtu`ae nynh mah Pachia thawccinaw kha alakaw lang na ccou han khyh nawlan oh nanning kha kae ngia oh.
47006002	Pawccecize Pachia nynh hynhte a ho: “Lehkhan lan accan ccyh kya nang kha phe kae thaepya vae, te khumnaw nin kya nang kha phe kae bawng vae,” a ci; dotua, atu hynh lehkhan lan accan ccyh nynh thua; dotua, atu hynh khumnaw nin nynh thua.
47006003	Kae ryalawnaw tuh ccae athua khyh nawlan, ming`ae khuliakunaw kha pawpaw kya sanmah kae rae khyh.
47006004	Thuasalama pawpaw kya balyn, kaening tuh Pachia ryalahtu`ae kae thuanawpaw kha kaemaw nynh kae langsaku: Pataepi phang ngaesangnaw kya, vawsawnaw`ae kya, ahobounaw`ae kya, lungvawsawnaw`ae kya;
47006005	ziabuanaw`ae kya, thungsawnaw`ae kya, keisukeilae umnaw`ae kya, arupaw ryalawnaw`ae kya, i leite umnaw kya, haedante umnaw kyakhe,
47006006	thinlung thyaanaw liate, nynaw liate, khaw teingnaw liate, thawccithyanaw liate, Thyaa Muisaw liate, thanccingpaw sungsakunaw liate,
47006007	byaccing kyae bya liate, Pachia kya-e thungnaw liate, ranglang kuih te voilang kuih kya dingnaw kya-e zunghe liate,
47006008	sawtuanaw te sawtua leinaw liate, ahoy leipaw te ahoypaw thaesanaw liate; hyngbya ho`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, ahme`ae paw thua te;
47006009	a ny lei`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, marya a ny`ae paw thua te; a chih`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, dotua oh, kaening tuh kae hiin; detah`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, a chia lei`ae paw;
47006010	ngaethah`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah pei lungtua`ae paw; ryachi`ae hawte kae thua zemah ccungccaw patae a hoirungsah`ae paw; pawsang a hoi lei`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, pawpaw balyn a hoi`ae paw nynh kae thua. Hynh-e`ae kya Pachia ryalahtu`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha kae langsaku.
47006011	Pou Korin`ae! Kaening nynh nanning kha ccaerarihlan kae hopya vae oh, kae thinlung kha kobalae lang kae hungpya oh.
47006012	Kaening nynh kae khawsung khyh oh, thuasalama naemaw rynaw te nynh na khawsungku oh.
47006013	Atu kha-e kha pyaru nawlan, nanning mah nae thinlung hung oh, tuh-e tuh ccaaw`ae hawte nynh kae hopya oh.
47006014	Zyn leitu`ae ryte anginkuh lei lante pynkheihlan taphu phukheih nan oh. Pawccecize dingnaw nynh kawbya einaw ryte paw vaeccawkunaw mou a hoi? Te awnaw nynh mohnaw ryte paw ccawkunaw mou a hoi?
47006015	Te Kri nynh Belial ryte paw nawccawnaw mou a hoi? Tukhyhze zyntu nynh zyn leitu ryte paw bawngku buanaw mou a hoi?
47006016	Te Pachia kya-e tempal nynh zohtuh`ae ryte paw nawccawnaw mou a hoi? Pawccecize Pachia nynh: “Minmin kya kae ka um cih zah minmin laku ka cceih cih. Kae tuh mih Pachia ka thua cih zah minmin tuh ka ccungccaw`ae a thua cih`ae,” a ci hawte, nanning tuh a hiinpaw Pachia kya-e tempal nynh na thua oh.
47006017	Tukeiccu, “Minmin laku kyate pou oh lah phiakuh oh; athyaa leipaw kha hae nan oh, te nanning kha kae ccou cih oh, Bawipaw nynh a ci.”
47006018	Te, “Kae tuh nae Paaw ka thua cih zah nanning tuh ka ccapaw`ae te ka ccanung`ae na thua cih oh, cite Tynre cyih khotu BAWIPAW nynh a ci.”
47007001	Tukeiccu sungsah`ae, tuh-e byakinpyakupaw`ae ah hoi oh thyhte, Pachia rawrinaw kya thyaanaw kha ccingsah te, pynsaw te muisaw nungsikunaw balyn kyate ahmaw te ahmaw hynh ccikankuh oh sih.
47007002	Kaening hynh thinlung oun hungpah oh; kaening tuh hung ccungccaw kya sanmah kae cyihsei khyh, hung sanmah kae rosah khyh, hung sanmah kae hyngpah khyh.
47007003	Hynhte ka hopaw tuh nanning kha seibe khylan ka ho khyh; pawccecize nanning ryte chikheih lan te hiinkheih lan, nanning tuh kae thinlung kya na um oh cite langmaw lya phe kae hopya vae oh.
47007004	Nae kalan bya hopaw ka rawhoinaw tuh ale raria, nanning keiccu myarya ka pookuh; ngaengannaw te phe ka beih. Vawsawrunaw kae teingnaw kya balyn kae tuh myarya ka lungtua.
47007005	Pawccecize Mesidonia ram lungkhu lang he kae thua te kae pynsaw hae-ungnaw hoi khyh, thuasalama hawlang hawlang te vawsaw kae tung; atolang tuh doukunaw a um, alungkhu lang tuh rawrinaw a um.
47007006	Tuhzemah lungthawthang`ae paw kha ngaengansah paw Pachia nynh Titu yn thuanaw liate kaening kha ngae oun ngansah;
47007007	te Titu yn thuanaw liate kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama nanning nynh myarya na pekinaw oh paw, na raw na khuinaw oh paw, kamaw hanlan myarya na zuakunaw oh paw kong kha aning nynh he oun hopah tuh, nae kya aning tuh ngaengansah athuanawpaw, thawzungpyanaw liate ngaengansah kae thua; tukeiccu kae tuh houh ka lungtua.
47007008	Pawccecize ka ccaky te nanning kha ngae kae la thyasah oh hei ze, ka la ngaesiku zemah, atu ka ngaesikuh vae khyh; pawccecize kha-e ccaky nynh nanning kha ngae ae thyasah oh zemah sosoh rou nynh ngae ae thyasah oh cipaw ka muihthya.
47007009	Atu ka lungtua paw tuh nanning kha ngaethyasah na thua oh keiccu thua khyh, thuasalama nae ngaethyanaw nynh ngaesikunaw kalan ae cciakhae oh paw te nynh ka lungtua. Pawccecize pawpaw kya sanmah kaening keiccu nanning nynh zonaw vaenaw na tung khyh nawlan oh, Pachia rynaw thyhte nynh nanning tuh ngaethyasah na thua oh.
47007010	Pawccecize Pachia rynaw thyhte athua paw ngaethyanaw nynh tuh bua ngaethyakhaeku aho vae leipaw, khumnaw kalan a thuakhae paw ngaesikunaw kha a pousah; thuasalama laephipi e ngaethyanaw nynh tuh chinaw kha nynh a pousah.
47007011	Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw ccaccei hynh dotua oh, nanning tuh Pachia rynaw thyhte nae ngaethah cipaw tuh: taemyasawkunaw, naemaw te naemaw kya lungthyaanaw, atazae leipaw kya thinrianaw, rawrinaw, myarya pekinaw, thawte zuapyakunaw, seibe lan um leinaw`ae kha nae kya a pousah. Hynh-e uccaw kya nanning tuh na thyaa oh cipaw pawpaw balyn kya phe na langsaku vae oh.
47007012	Tukeiccu nae kalan ccaw ka zei zemah a cyihseipaw hanlan ka zei khyh, cyiseinaw a teingpaw hanlan mah ka zei khyh, thuasalama Pachia malang kaening nynh kae dooihnaw oh paw nae kya alangku nawlan nynh ka zei.
47007013	Tukeiccu nae ngaengannaw kya kaening mah ngaengansah kae thua. Te nanning balyn liate Titu muisaw tuh bua thawmuinsah athua keiccuze, Titu kya-e lungtuanaw hanlan kaening tuh myaryamaw kae lungtua.
47007014	Pawccecize nanning konglang amaw kya ccangkhakheit phe ka pooku vae ze, ka maethah khyh; thuasalama byaccing kya nanning kalan pawpaw balyn kha nae kya phe ka ho vae hawte, tuhhawte Titu malang kae pokunaw tuh mah thanccingpaw nynh thua.
47007015	Te rawrinaw te thyngkute amaw na lawku oh paw, nae balyn kawngaenaw kha aning nynh he a liathui tuh, nanning ae sungsanaw oh paw tuh houh ale.
47007016	Tukeiccu pawpaw balyn kya nanning kya zynkunaw ka hoi pawte kae tuh ka lungtua.
47008001	Tuhlaeze uteno`ae, Mesidonia ram e kriccawbu`ae kya pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw kha kaening nynh nanning kae nysah bua oh;
47008002	minmin tuh mih vawsawnaw kyaze alepipaw syntawnaw kya mih lungtuanaw phe abia paw, te myarya mih ryachiccih pite mih hysanaw kya-e hoirungnaw`ae kya phe abia paw kha kae nysah bua oh.
47008003	Pawccecize cyi khonaw thyhte, athua, cyi khonaw laelan hysah te pya rynaw a hoi`ae cite kae nynh ccaekia ka khan;
47008004	mih lasung kha kae lawku nawlan te mithyaa`ae ryalawpyanaw kya kaening bawngku bua nawlan, arangte kaening kha thawmawte oun ngia`ae.
47008005	Te kaening nynh kae la ngaehoi laelan, Pachia rynaw thyhte mimaw te mimaw kha Bawipaw kalan masaty pyakuh`ae zah kaening kalan mah a pyakuh`ae.
47008006	Tukeiccu Titu nynh nanning kya phe a tho vae hawte, kha-e thawccinaw kha nanning kya mah phe a thangsah nawlan, kaening nynh amaw kha thawte kae ngia.
47008007	Tuhte nanning tuh zynnaw kya, byahonaw kya, nynaw kya, thawte zuakunaw kya, te kaening nae sungsanaw oh kya, pawpaw kya miakaw na hoirung oh hawte, hynh-e thawccinaw kya mah hoirungbua oh.
47008008	Kawpyapaw liate ka ho khyh, thuasalama mingccang`ae nynh thawte zuakunaw liate, nanning kya-e sungsakunaw tuh thanccingpaw athua te thua khyh paw kha nynh kae syntaw ho.
47008009	Pawccecize, amaw ryachinaw liate nanning na hoirung nawlan oh, aning tuh a hoirung zemah nanning keiccuze a rya yn chi cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw kha na ny oh.
47008010	Te hynh-e kya tuanawroihnaw kae pya oh. Inkhawkum cyi lan na ry oh zah phe na tho vae oh paw rya kha po cyi lanpaw kyalya thua leite;
47008011	kha-e na cyi oh paw kha atu phe na thangsah hahe lan oh paw tuh nae hanlan ahoypaw nynh thua; cyi ry lan paccynkunaw a um hawkhate, na hoi oh paw kyate phe thangsanaw mah a um cih.
47008012	Pawccecize pya rynaw thinlung masaty a um lanze, ccungccaw nynh a hoi leipaw thyhte thua leite, a hoi paw thyhte a pya paw kha ccoupya athua.
47008013	Pawccecize mingccang`ae kha luesah lan zah nanning kha phurisah lan cite ka hory paw thua khyh;
47008014	thuasalama a nginkunaw liate, atu lya nanning paepaelui lan na hoi oh paw nynh minmin hobounaw kha a pyabua nawlan, te minmin paepaelui lan hoi paw nynh mah nanning hobounaw kha a pyabua nawlan, ou tuhte nginkunaw a um nawlan nynh ka hory.
47008015	Ccathyaa kya, “Pataepi a ccakhungkuh paw nynh alaepaw hoi lae khyh, pyhtari a ccakhungkuh paw nynh hobounaw hoi khyh,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
47008016	Thuasalama nanning hanlan ka hoi paw te alokuhpaw thanccingte tuapyanaw kha Titu thinlung lungkhu lang a phangtupaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thua sah.
47008017	Pawccecize kae hynawpaw kha nawccaw kyalya thua leite, houh a zuakuhpaw athua pawte amaw lungthote nae kalan a cceih.
47008018	Te thehoypaw honaw kya, kriccawbu`ae balyn kya thehoy po a ccou paw uno lukheit kha Titu ryte kaening nynh kae saw;
47008019	tuh kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama hynh-e lasung ry, kaening ryte khuaccungkheih lan kriccawbu`ae nynh a po`ae paw mah athua. Tuh-e lasung tuh Bawipaw amaw phu-e nawlan, te a paccynkuh paw nae thinlung kha langsaku khylan kaening nynh kae nee.
47008020	Hynh-e myarya alungpaw lasung kae neethungnaw kyahin, hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah kaening hynh yn ccae khyh nawlan kae raeringkuh.
47008021	Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kya kyalya thua leite, ccungccaw`ae mitmuihnaw kya mah ahmepaw uccaw kha kae pyabua paw nynh thua.
47008022	Te minmin ryte kae unopaw kha kaening nynh kae saw. Aning tuh uccaw patae kya myarya a zuakuhpaw nynh thua cipaw pei kae langsaku he, thuasalama atu nae tungvaw zynkunaw alepi a hoi keiccuze houh a zuakuhpaw nynh thua.
47008023	Titu kong kha lukhakheit nynh a khia ze, aning tuh kamaw ryte kae mungkuhpaw, te nanning te asekuh lante rya kae lahkheihpaw nynh thua. Tukhyhze kae uno`ae kong a khiapaw a um ze, minmin tuh kriccawbu`ae kya-e locceihtu`ae, Kri kya-e phu-enaw nynh thua`ae.
47008024	Tukeiccu minmin kalan te kriccawbu`ae malang nae kya-e sungsakunaw ccaekia te nanning hanlan kae pookunawpaw kha langsapah oh.
47009001	Mithyaa`ae hanlan ryalawpyanaw te asekuh lante nae kalan ccaw zei lanpaw tuh ka hanlan ccungkiapaw thua khyh.
47009002	Pawccecize na bawngrynaw oh paw kha ka ny, kha-e hanlan inkhawkum te Akhai ram um`ae paw tuh paccynkute a um vae`ae cite Mesidonia`ae kalan nanning kong ka pookuh; te nae kya-e rynaw pipi nynh ccungccaw patae kha myarya lungthosah`ae.
47009003	Tuhzemah nanning kong kae pookunawpaw tuh e kya alakaw athua khyh nawlan, phe ka ho vae hawte nanning nynh na paccynku nawlan oh cite uno`ae kha nae kalan kae nynh kae saw`ae.
47009004	Tukhyh lanze, Mesidonia`ae nynh kamaw ryte mang oun thuabua`ae zah nanning paccynku leite na um oh paw kha oun muih`ae ze, nanning nae maethah cih cipaw thua leite, rawhoy te kae pookupaw kya kaening kae maethahsei cih.
47009005	Tukeiccu langmaw bya phe na kinku vae oh paw, hysah te lasung pya paw kha na la paccynty nawlan oh nae kalan cciaty lan, uno`ae kha hy aho cite ka tuaku. Tuhte kha-e lasung tuh pya lan hysah leipaw uccaw hawte thua leite, hysahnaw te paccynty paw athua nawlan nynh thua.
47009006	Thuasalama pyhtari ccacii a vua paw nynh tuh pyhtari nynh a rue cih, te pataepi ccacii a vua paw tuh pataepi a rue cih, cipaw hynh nyh oh.
47009007	Ccungccaw miakaw nynh a thinlung kya a tuaku hawte pya sah, hysah leinaw te pya nan sah, pya khyh ze hoy khyh cipaw thinlung te pya nan sah, pawccecize lungthote a pyatupaw kha Pachia nynh a sungsah.
47009008	Te pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh ahobou lei lan khaleih pei na hoi oh zah, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw hanlan paepaelui lan na hoi nawlan oh, thawccinaw balyn kha nae hanlan phe biasah lan Pachia tuh a cyih kho.
47009009	“Aning nynh phe apazaesaku vae; aning nynh ryachi`ae kha phe a pya vae`ae; a dingnaw tuh zungzae cia a tyn,” cite azeiku hawkhate nynh thua.
47009010	Atu ccaciivuatupaw hanlan ccacii kha pya zah looh hanlan sanlou a pyatupaw nynh ccacii na vua oh paw kha ae pungsathungpah oh sah lah nae dingnaw athae`ae kha ae lungsathungpah oh sah.
47009011	Hysanaw te na pya nawlan oh nanning tuh pawpaw kya balyn hoirungsah na thua oh, tuh-e nynh kaening liate Pachia kalan lungtuabya a hosah cih`ae.
47009012	Pawccecize hynh-e ryalaw neethungnaw nynh mithyaa`ae hobounaw kyalya kha a pyabua paw thua leite, Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho paw patae kha mah phe a biasah.
47009013	Hynh-e ryalawnaw langsakunaw liate, Kri thehoypaw na lawku oh paw kawngaenaw elan te ccungccaw balyn kha hysah te na neethung oh paw elan, minmin nynh Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
47009014	Nae kya um paw myarya asungpaw Pachia thawccinaw keiccuze, nae hanlan saw a sang`ae tuh nanning kha myarya ae ngae oh.
47009015	Ho kho um leipaw a lasung hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thua sah!
47010001	Nanning na umnaw oh kya zakawsangsakuhpaw, thuasalama na um leinaw oh kya nanning kalan a rawthungpaw, kae, Paul kamaw nynh Kri kya-e nevyalyanaw te thawcci lungnenaw liate nanning kha kae ngia oh.
47010002	Thuasalama kaening kha pynsaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw hawte kaening kha oun tua`ae paw ccungccaw abang kha rawse lan, zynkunaw te rawhoysaku lan ka tuakupaw kha he kae thua vae ze raw ka hoysaku vae khyh nawlan kae ngia oh.
47010003	Pawccecize kaening tuh pynsaw lante kae hiin zemah, pynsaw rynaw thyhte kaening nynh rhaw kae dou khyh.
47010004	Pawccecize kaening rhawdounawpaw zunghe`ae tuh pynsaw zunghe`ae thua khyh, thuasalama khuarhawhohung` ae kha tingsah bung nawlan Pachia kya-e a thawsaepaw zunghe`ae nynh thua.
47010005	Kha-e zunghe`ae tuh eikunaw`ae thuasah, te Pachia nynaw a rawsepaw amaw te amaw a tansakuhpaw, ahangpaw uccaw miakaw kha thuasah sawbung nawlan, tuanaw miakaw kha Kri kawngae sah khylan seetangnaw kalan a thuakhae paw nynh thua.
47010006	Te nanning kawngaenaw tuh he accing te kawngae lei`ae paw balyn kha detah khylan paccynkute kae um.
47010007	Nanning nynh atolang alangku thyhte tou uccaw`ae kha na do oh? Lukhakheit nynh Kri kya-e nynh ka thua cite amaw te amaw a zynku lanze, aning tuh Kri kya-e athua hawte kaening mah Kri kya-e nynh kae thua cipaw, hynh-e hynh aning nynh bua tuabia sah.
47010008	Pawccecize, nanning ro nawlan thua leite, nanning tynsathung nawlan Bawipaw nynh kaening oun pya paw kae kya-e kawhoinaw kong kha kae nynh houh ka pokhaeku zemah, ka maethyakhaekuh lan khyh.
47010009	Ccaky`ae khate nanning kha ae fu ae raw oh paw ka thuasei zya.
47010010	Pawccecize, minmin nynh, “A ccaky`ae tuh a khingcci zah a thung, thuasalama a pyn phang umnaw kya tuh a nyaa, te a byaho pawlang um khyh,” a ci`ae.
47010011	Kaening tuh kaemaw kae um khyh lya ccaky kya um paw bya thyhte kae thua hawte, kaemaw kae umnaw zemah kae cyisahnaw kya khahawte nynh kae thua mamin, cipaw kha khahtahawpaw ccungccaw nynh tuabia sah.
47010012	Pawccecize mimaw te mimaw thehoysakuh`ae paw ryte kaemaw hynh kae riakuh bua ngan khyh, kae khinkhiakuh ngan khyh. Thuasalama mimaw te mimaw kha toukuh`ae zah, mimaw te mimaw a khinkhiakuh`ae paw, minmin tuh haw khyh`ae.
47010013	Tuhzemah po alue lante kaening nynh kae pookuh lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh kaening oun pya paw a loori lungkhu nynh kae pooku, tuh-e a loori nynh nanning kha phe ae khungbia oh.
47010014	Pawccecize nanning kalan kae phah leipaw olante hawte, kaemaw te kaemaw kha po alue lang kae dyngkuh khyh; pawccecize Kri thehoypaw ryte nynh nae kalan po kae thua.
47010015	Kaening nynh po alue lante, ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae ryalaw kya kae pookuh khyh; thuasalama nae zynnaw tuh a kaethung thyhte, nanning liate kaening tuh kae kya-e a loori kya myarya kosah kae thua cih cite ngaehoinaw kae hoi.
47010016	Ou tuhte nanning na umnaw oh khunglang kaening nynh thehoypaw kae ho nawlan te ccangpaw ccungccaw nynh phe a cyity vae paw a loori kya kae pooku khyh nawlan nynh thua.
47010017	Thuasalama, “A pookuhpaw ccungccaw tuh BAWIPAW kyakhe pookuh sah.”
47010018	Pawccecize amaw te amaw thehoysakuhpaw kha tuh Bawipaw nynh nawccawkhaepaw thua khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw nynh thehoysah paw rou kha nynh nawccawkhaepaw athua.
47011001	Ka ngaeenaw kyahin nanning nynh sosoh oun ngaesangpah oh ci ka ry, te nae ngaesangpya ccaccing oh.
47011002	Pawccecize kae tuh Pachia lante thawsianaw khate nae hanlan ka thawsia. Pawccecize kae nynh nanning kha athyaapaw liaccady hawte Kri kalan kae pya ccaw oh cite vawpaw lukheit kalan nanning kha phe kae chiapya vae oh.
47011003	Thuasalama fupaw nynh a thyaruhnaw liate Evi kha a ling hawte, phinkhakheit lante, nae thinlung-tuanaw`ae tuh Kri kya um paw thinlung thyaanaw kyate oun rohsei cih cipaw ka thinphang.
47011004	Pawccecize nae kalan yn thua paw nynh, kaening nynh kae ho leipaw ccangpaw Jesu kong kha a ho lanze, tukhyhze nanning nynh na ccou lei oh paw, phin ccangpaw muisaw kha na ccou oh ze, tukhyhze nanning nynh na lawku lei oh paw phin ccangpaw thehoypaw kha na lawku oh ze, kou hoy lang la ngaesang oh.
47011005	Pawccecize abapi huapaw locceihtu`ae laeze kae tuh kharyh ka nyaahua khyh cite ka tuaku.
47011006	Kae tuh byahonaw kya a thya leipaw ka thua zemah, nynaw kya tuh tuhte ka thua khyh. Thuasalama kaening tuh nanning laku pawpaw balyn kya khaleih kae langkuh.
47011007	Nanning hangthung na thua ccaw oh cite kamaw te kamaw zakawsangsaku te, Pachia thehoypaw nae kalan alakaw te kae hopya oh keiccu, kae tuh seinaw ka rae tou?
47011008	Nanning hanlan ryalawpya khylan ccangpaw kriccawbu`ae kya-e uccaw kha lawkute kae nynh ka lua`ae.
47011009	Kae tuh nanning ryte ka um lya, ka ho ka bou lyakha, hung sanmah ria ka thaesah khyh; pawccecize kae ka ho ka bou paw kha Mesidonia langte oun thua`ae paw uno`ae nynh phe oun pya`ae. Pawpaw balyn kya nanning kha phurisah paw ka thua khyh nawlan kamaw te kamaw ka raeringkuh, tuhte po ka raeringkuh cih.
47011010	Kri kya-e byaccing tuh kamaw kya a um thyhhawte, Akhai pee`ae lungkhu kya hung nynh sanmah hynh-e ka pookunawpaw hynh oun khee lan khyh.
47011011	Pawccemou? Nanning kha kae sungsah khyh oh keiccu tou? Pachia a nyh.
47011012	Thuasalama ccyhhoypaw a muery`ae paw nynh kaening hawte ming`ae nynh oun tuabua`ae sah cite a pookunaw`ae kya, minmin nynh ccyhhoypaw a mue khyh nawlan`ae, ka cyipaw kha po ka cyih ung cih.
47011013	Pawccecize khatahaw`ae paw tuh ahme leipaw locceihtu`ae, ccungccaw a phee`ae paw ryalahtu`ae, Kri kya-e locceihtu`ae lang mimaw te mimaw muinsan a rulaekuh `ae paw nynh thua`ae.
47011014	Te ngaeangthua lanpaw thua khyh! Pawccecize Setan nynh mah amaw te amaw kha awnaw kya-e vaaw ccungccaw olante a muinsan kha a rulaeku.
47011015	Tukeiccu a ryalahtu`ae nynh mah dingnaw ryalahtu`ae hawte mih muinsan rulaeku`ae paw tuh ngaeang lanpaw thua khyh; minmin athangnaw tuh mih ryalawnaw`ae thyhte nynh athua cih.
47011016	Hung nynh sanmah kamaw hynh mingaeepaw hawte yn tua nan sah cite bua ka ho. Tuhte yn tua paw a um ze, kae nynh ccapyh ka pooku nawlan, kamaw hynh mingaeepaw hawte oun ccou oh.
47011017	Ka hopaw hynh Bawipaw rynaw thyhte ka ho khyh, thuasalama hynh-e rawhoinawpaw pookunaw kya ngaeeccaccu lang nynh ka ho.
47011018	Ccungccaw patae nynh pynsaw lante a pooku`ae pawte kae mah ka pokuh bua cih.
47011019	Pawccecize naemaw tuh na haw oh pawte nanning nynh mingaee`ae kha lungtuate na ngaesangpya oh.
47011020	Lukhakheit nynh nanning kha seetangnaw lungkhu lang ae cciakhae oh ze, lukhakheit nynh phe ae ae oh ze, lukhakheit nynh ae luade oh ze, lukhakheit nynh ae poonuaku oh ze, lukhakheit nynh nae mae kya ae bia oh ze, nanning nynh na ngaesang oh.
47011021	Kaening tuh myarya kae la nyaa cipaw kae maethyanaw kha nynh ka ho. Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh ccangkhakheit kya a zynku lanze, kae mah ka zynkuh bua cite ngaeeccaccu lang nynh ka ho.
47011022	Minmin tuh Hebru`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua. Minmin tuh Israel`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua. Minmin tuh Abraham ciihan`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua.
47011023	Minmin tuh Kri kya-e ryalahtu`ae thua tou? Kae tuh houh ka thua cite mingaeepaw hawte nynh ka ho. Thawmawte houh ryalah paw, ziabuanaw riatae lei a tungpaw, atu te atu thung a ccah paw, chinaw rhaw`ae te atu te atu a tungkuh `ae paw nynh ka thua.
47011024	Jew`ae nynh vae sungpali accing nawlan vaekheit ary lante oun bua`ae paw, vae pangaw ka tung.
47011025	Ruising te oun bua`ae paw vaethung acih; lung te vaekheit oun deih`ae, sanphalung ronaw vaethung ka tung; zi kheit te nin kheit rili lungkhu ka um.
47011026	Atu te atu khua ka ccung, tui kya-e vawsawrunaw, damiah`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, ka ccungccaw`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, Zenta`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, khualipi kya vawsawrunaw, rangkaw kya vawsawrunaw, rili kya vawsawrunaw, ahme leipaw uno`ae laku vawsawrunaw kha ka tung.
47011027	Bangnaw te kou arupaw ryalaw, atu te atu i leite um paw, vuelawnaw te tuihawnaw, atu te atu looh-ae leite um paw, akyaapaw kya te uccaw leite um paw kha ka tung.
47011028	Kha-e atolang e uccaw`ae laelan, kriccawbu`ae balyn hanlan thawte ka thawsianawpaw nin takyh ka tungvaw a um.
47011029	Kae ka nyaa khyh ze, hungmou anyaa? Kae ka lungkhu maee lang rua leite, hungmou a maeleihsakuh paw a um?
47011030	Ka pooku lan accan lanze, kamaw ka nyaanaw`ae konglang kha nynh ka pookuh cih.
47011031	Kae tuh ka hyng khyh cipaw kha zungzae thehoysah athua paw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw, Pachia nynh phe a ny.
47011032	Damaskas khuapi kya, Aretas siapharanpaw kuihkaw ram uktupaw nynh rhawkawphu ryte Damaskas khuapi a ngaw lyakhe, kamaw kha kyng lan yn ry.
47011033	Te kae kha sua lungkhu oun phang`ae zah thanlang-aw kyate, khua lungrua kyate oun sahbung`ae zah ram uktupaw kuih kyate phe ka lue.
47012001	Ka hanlan pooku lanpaw tuh athanepaw thua khyh. Bawipaw kya-e vizin te byaphy kong kha ka ho ung cih.
47012002	Kum haw laepali lae aro vae lyakhe Kri kya um paw ccungccaw lukheit tuh vaawran khaan thungnaw kalan lawthung athua paw kha ka ny, pyn ryte ta, tukhyhze pyn umbia leite ta cipaw ka nyh khyh, Pachia nynh a nyh.
47012003	-
47012004	Te kha-e ccungccapaw tuh Paradis lungkhu lang lawthung thua zah ccungccaw lukheit hanlan ho lan accan leipaw te ho kho leipaw bya`ae kha aning nynh a thae. Ou khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha ka ny. Pyn ryte ta, tukhyhze pyn umbia leite ta cipaw ka nyh khyh, Pachia nynh a nyh.
47012005	Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha ka pokhaekuh cih, tuhzemah kamaw ka nyaanaw kya laelan kamaw te kamaw tuh ka pookuh lan khyh.
47012006	Pawccecize pooku lan ka ry zemah kae tuh mingaeepaw ka thua lan khyh. Pawccecize kae tuh byaccing nynh ka ho cih. Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh kamaw yn muihpaw laelan, kamaw kong a thae paw laelan kamaw hynh yn tuasei khyh nawlan kae tuh ho leite ka sungkuh.
47012007	Te myarya alungpaw byaphy`ae liate tou kho lei lan cia ka tansaku sei khyh nawlan ka ngesaw kya hingpaw kha pya ka thua, tou kho lei lang cia ka tansaku sei khyh nawlan Setan kya-e locceihtupaw nynh kamaw kha vawsaw yn pya.
47012008	Hynh-e uccaw hynh kamaw kyate a pou ccaw cite Bawipaw kalan vaethung ka ngiakuh.
47012009	Te Bawipaw nynh kamaw kha, “Ka thawccinaw tuh na hanlan azaw; pawccecize ka thungnaw tuh nyaanaw kya phe ccingsah athua,” yn cipya. Tukeiccu Kri thungnaw tuh kamaw tungvaw atyn nawlan, ka nyaanaw`ae kya nynh lungtuate houh ka pookuh vae cih.
47012010	Tukeiccu Kri hanlan teingpaw nyaanaw`ae kya, sarisaryanaw`ae kya, ryachinaw`ae kya, yn tua yn sahnaw`ae kya, vawsawnaw`ae kya nynh ka lungrythua. Pawccecize kae he ka nyaa tuh, kae tuh ka thawsae.
47012011	Pookunaw kya kae tuh mingaeepaw lang nynh ka tang; nanning nynh tuhte nae nangse oh. Pawccecize nanning nynh kae hynh thehoysah lan ka ccan, pawccecize kae tuh pawsang ka thua khyh zemah lupi huapaw locceihtu`ae laeze ka nyaahua khyh.
47012012	Lungccuanaw te, muihsanaw kya, khuaruarunaw te athungpaw ryalaw`ae kya, locceihtu ka thuanawpaw muihsanaw tuh nanning laku langsapya athua ccaccing vae.
47012013	Kae tuh nae kya phuripaw ka thua khyh paw laelan, ccangpaw kriccawbu`ae laeze pawkyamou nanning tuh na nyaahua oh? Hynh-e ka menaw hanlan oun ngaethya oh!
47012014	Dotua oh, vaethungnaw nae kalan bua thua lan ka paccynkuh. Te nanning hanlan phuripaw ka thua lan khyh; pawccecize nae kya-e uccaw kha ka ccungkuh khyh, thuasalama naemaw kha nynh kae ccung oh. Pawccecize ccaaw`ae nynh nungpaaw`ae hanlan uccaw ccypya lan ccan khyh, thuasalama nungpaaw`ae nynh ccaaw`ae hanlan a ccypah`ae.
47012015	Te kae nynh nanning kha houhouh kae sungsah oh zah nanning nynh nae sungsahnaw oh tuh ryryh azyabung zemah, nae muisaw hanlan ka hoi paw kha myarya lungtuate ka thangkuh cih zah kamaw mah ka thangkuh ung cih.
47012016	Thuasalama tuhte athua ze la thuasah, nanning kha kae nynh phupaw kae risah khyh oh. Tuhzemah a pheethyapaw ka thua thyhte, pheenaw te nynh nanning kha kae kyng oh.
47012017	Nae kalan kae saw`ae paw lukhakheit liate, nae kya-e amia kae nynh ka lawkuh tou?
47012018	Titu kha nae kalan ccia lan ka ngia zah amaw ryte uno lukheit kae nynh kae saw. Titu nynh nae kya-e ae lawpakuh oh tou? Kaening tuh alokuhpaw thinlungtuanaw te kae cceih kheih khyh tou? Alokuhpaw laanpi kha kae zui kheih khyh tou?
47012019	Kaening nynh kaemaw te kaemaw hynh nae malang kae dangsaku cite tou bua nae tua oh? Kri kya Pachia malang nynh kaening bya kae ho. Thuasalama kou sungsah`ae paw, nanning tynsathungnaw hanlan nynh pawpaw balyn kha kae cyi.
47012020	Pawccecize kae he kae thua vae ze, nanning kha ka ry hawte kae muih lan khyh oh paw te kae kha na ry oh hawte nae muih lan khyh oh paw ka thinphang; nae kya eikunaw, eiungkunaw, thinrianaw, peku maekunaw, thanhokunaw, milae thethyahonaw, tansakunaw, keisukeilae umnaw a um sei cih cipaw thuasah;
47012021	kae he bua kae thua vae ze nungsikunaw, ohhuakunaw, sahpaw eih rynaw te phe sei`ae zah a ngaesikuh lei`ae paw patae hanlan ka raw ka khui nawlan, ka Pachia nynh kamaw kha nanning laku zakaw yn sangsah cih cipaw thuasah ka thinphang.
47013001	Hynh-e hynh nae kalan kae kae thua paw vaethungnaw nynh athua cih. “Ccaekia luning, tukhyhze luthung khalang liate bya miakaw tuh tynsah athua cih.”
47013002	Kae nynh langmaw phe kae hopya vae oh, te vaeningnaw nae kya ka um paw hawte kae hopyaty vae oh; te atu nae kya ka um leite, kae bua kae thua lanze hung sanmah ka haang lan khyh cite langmaw a sei`ae paw te tuhlaepaw balyn kalan ccaw kae zei.
47013003	Nae kya a nyaa leipaw, thuasalama athungpaw Kri nynh kamaw kya bya ho ta cipaw ccaekia kha na ccung oh keiccu tuh kae haang lan khyh oh.
47013004	Pawccecize nyaanaw kya amaw tuh khiade athua zemah, Pachia thungnaw liate aning tuh bua a hiin. Te kaening mah amaw kya kae nyaa, thuasalama Pachia thungnaw liate kaening tuh amaw ryte nae kalan kae hiin cih.
47013005	Zynnaw kya na um oh ta, na um khyh oh ta cipaw naemaw te naemaw sihseikuh oh. Naemaw te naemaw syntawkuh oh. Ccing khyh cite nue paw na thua khyh oh ze, Jesu Kri tuh nae kya a um cipaw naemaw te naemaw na nyhkuh khyh oh tou?
47013006	Thuasalama kaening tuh ccing khyh cite nue paw kae thua khyh cipaw na nyh cih oh cite ka zyn.
47013007	Atu nanning nynh ahoy leipaw kha kharyh na cyi khyh oh ccaw cite Pachia kalan saw ka sang. Kaening tuh nawccawkhaepaw nynh kae thua cite langsaku ry paw thua khyh, thuasalama kaening tuh nawccawkhae lei`ae paw hawte kae la thua zemah nanning nynh ahoypaw uccaw kha na cyi ccaw oh cite nynh saw ka sang.
47013008	Pawccecize byaccing rawsete kaening tuh pawsang mah kae cyih kho khyh, thuasalama byaccing hanlan nynh kae cyi.
47013009	Pawccecize kaening he kae nyaa zah nanning nae thawsae vae ze, kae lungtua; te nanning na ccing nawlan oh hei saw kae sangpya oh.
47013010	Tukeiccu ka um khyh lya hynh e uccaw`ae hynh nae kalan ka zei. Ka um lanze ronaw hanlan thua leite, tynsathungnaw hanlan Bawipaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw kawhoinaw thyhte rehahannaw kha ka mangsei cih.
47013011	Nyathyakou, uteno`ae ngedan te. Marya ccing oh. Ngaengante um oh, tuanaw-thinlung ccangkheit te um oh, daebabilan um oh; te sungsakunaw te daenaw Pachia tuh nanning ry a um cih.
47013012	Athyaapaw myngkupaw khate lukheit te lukheit beihlangkuh oh.
47013013	Mithyaa`ae balyn nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
47013014	Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw, Pachia sungsanaw, te Thyaa Muisaw vaeccawkunaw tuh nae balyn tungvaw kya la um sah. Amen.
48001001	Ccungccaw`ae kya-e locceihtu athua leipaw, ccungccaw liate mah athua leipaw, thuasalama a chih`ae paw kyate Jesu kha a thosatupaw Paaw Pachia te Jesu Kri liate locceihtu athua paw Paul,
48001002	te kamaw ryte a um`ae paw uteno`ae balyn nynh Galati pee e kriccawbu`ae kha kae beihlang oh.
48001003	Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning kya la um sah.
48001004	Ah Paaw Pachia rynaw thyhte hynh-e atu e ahoy leipaw she kyate aening kha luesah khylan cite, aening seinaw`ae hanlan Jesu nynh amaw te amaw kha a pyaku.
48001005	Tuh-e Paaw kalan phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae la um sah. Amen.
48001006	Kri kya-e thawccinaw liate nanning ae kotu oh paw kyate ccangpaw thehoypaw kalan na paleihkuh kanmaw vae oh cipaw ka ngaeangthua.
48001007	Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh thehoypaw ccaccing thua khyh; thuasalama nanning kha vawsaw pya ae ry oh zah Kri thehoypaw kha ahme leipaw lang a paleihry`ae paw ccungccaw abang a um.
48001008	Thuasalama kaening zemah thuasah, tukhyhze vaawran kyate vaaw ccungccaw nynh zemah thuasah, nanning kalan kaening nynh phe kae hopya vae oh paw thehoypaw laelan ccangpaw thehoypaw kha a ho paw a um lanze aning tuh thyalaw thua sah.
48001009	Nanning nynh phe na lawku vae oh paw thehoypaw laelan ccangpaw thehoypaw kha nanning kalan a ho paw a um ze, tuh-e paw tuh thyalaw thua sah, cite langmaw lya phe kae ho vae hawte, atu kae nynh bua ka ho.
48001010	Pawccecize atu kae tuh ccungccaw kya-e maehoynaw tou ka ccungku? Tukhyhze Pachia kya-e tou? Tukhyhze kae tuh ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasah lan tou ka ccungku? Pawccecize kae nynh ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasah lan ka ccungku lanze, kae tuh Kri seepaw ka thua vae lan khyh.
48001011	Thuasalama uteno`ae, kae nynh ka ho paw thehoypaw tuh ccungccaw kya-e thua khyh cipaw nanning kha kae nysah ry oh.
48001012	Pawccecize kha-e thehoypaw kha kae nynh ccungccaw kyate ka mue khyh, kha-e kha hung nynh san yn ccangpah khyh`ae, thuasalama Jesu Kri kya-e byaphy liate nynh ka mue.
48001013	Pawccecize athang vae paw ccyh kya, Jew`ae beiknaw kya ka cyisahnaw kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh; Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kha tou kho um lei lan ka tua ka sah zah ro lan ka la zuakuh.
48001014	Ka minpaaw`ae kya-e phungzae`ae kha myaryamaw houh pangkhaete ka minphuin`ae kya kamaw te kae kum akhinkuh`ae paw patae laeze Jew`ae beiknaw kya ka la zuakuh hua.
48001015	-
48001016	Thuasalama Zenta`ae laku kya Jesu Kri thehoypaw kong kha ho khylan ka nung vue kyate kamaw yn phiatu te a thawccinaw liate yn kotupaw Pachia nynh kamaw kya a Ccapaw kong phy lan a lungry he thua tuh, chiisaw te khua ka rua kanmaw khyh.
48001017	Kamaw laeze langmaw locceihtu athuaty`ae paw kalan Jerusalem lang mah ka cceihthung khyh; thuasalama Arabia ram lungkhu lang nynh ka ccia, oute Damaskas lang bua ka ki.
48001018	Tuhkoute kum thung aro koute Piter te tungku khylan Jerusalem lang ka cceihthung, te amaw ryte nin haw laepangaw kae umkheih.
48001019	Thuasalama Bawipaw a neitaw James holeite ccangpaw locceihtu`ae hung sanmah ka muih khyh.
48001020	Atu nanning kalan ka zei`ae paw hynh, dotua oh, Pachia malang ka hyng paw thua khyh.
48001021	Tuhkoute Siria te Silisia ram`ae lungkhu lang ka thua.
48001022	Te Kri kya um paw Judea pee e kriccawbu`ae kalan kae tuh ka mitmae langkute ny ka thua khyh.
48001023	Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Langmaw lya aening oun tua oun sahtupaw nynh langmaw amaw nynh a ro paw zynnaw kha atu amaw nynh a ho ki vae,” cite kyalya nynh a thae`ae.
48001024	Oute minmin nynh kamaw keiccuze Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
48002001	Oute kum haw laepali aro koute kae tuh Titu kha ka hoeibua zah Barnabas ryte Jerusalem lang bua kae cceihthung.
48002002	Te byaphy liate ka cceihthung zah Zenta`ae laku ka hopaw thehoypaw khate minmin kha ka ccuepe`ae, thuasalama kae nynh ka cyi vae paw te ka cyi lei lanpaw kha pawpawte mah alakaw lang athua khyh nawlan sawtua lan um`ae paw kalan nynh ka makhaete ka hopya`ae.
48002003	Thuasalama kamaw ryte kae um paw Titu tuh Greek paw lukheit mang athua pite vindung awku lan nangse khyh`ae.
48002004	Te Kri Jesu kya kaening nynh kae hoi paw luenaw kha dophi lan zah kaening kha seetangnaw kalan thuakhae khylan cite ny leipaw ccungccaw`ae nynh aphiru lante oun thuakhae`ae paw ahme leipaw uteno`ae keiccu nynh tuhte a cyi`ae.
48002005	Ahmepaw thehoypaw tuh nanning kya po atyn ccaw cite, kaening nynh sosoh sanmah ahme leipaw uteno`ae kalan kae ahkuh khyh.
48002006	Thuasalama hynh-e`ae kyaze sawtua lan um`ae paw, minmin tuh hung ccungccaw athua`ae zemah, ka hanlan pawtua um khyh. Pachia tuh ccungccaw maedo khyh, pawccecize minmin te tungkupaw nynh ka phungho kha pawsang biachih khyh`ae.
48002007	Thuasalama arawsekuh lante, vindung awkuh`ae paw hanlan thehoypaw kha Piter kalan a pya hawte, vindung awkuh lei`ae paw hanlan thehoypaw kha kamaw kalan pya athua paw kha minmin nynh he nyh`ae zah,
48002008	(Pawccecize vindung awkuh`ae paw kalan Piter kha locceihtu thua lan ryalahtupaw nynh Zenta`ae kalan kae kha locceihtu thuasah lan ka kya mah ryalah kalang),
48002009	rungpi hawte a tua`ae paw James, Sefas te Johan nynh kamaw pya athua paw thawccinaw kha he nyh`ae tuh, mimaw tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw kalan ccia lan zah kaening tuh Zenta`ae kalan cciasah khylan ranglang kuih nawccawkhaenaw kha kamaw te Barnabas kha oun pya`ae.
48002010	Kaening nynh ryachi`ae kae ning lei lanpaw rou kha minmin nynh oun rypya`ae, tuh-e tuh kae nynh mah lungthote cyi lan ka nungdekupaw nynh thua.
48002011	Thuasalama Antiok khua kalan Piter he yn thua tuh, aning tuh ccae lan a um keiccu a maedo leite ka pe.
48002012	Pawccecize ccungccaw abang nynh James kyate oun thua maw`ae ze Piter tuh Zenta`ae ryte a aekheih`ae; thuasalama minmin he oun thua`ae tuh, Piter tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw rawri keiccuze nuhlang thungkuh zah Zenta`ae kyate phe a phiakuh.
48002013	Te ccangpaw Jew`ae tuh Piter ryte alokuh lante a cyiruh`ae; ou tuhte minmin cyiruhnaw nynh Barnabas kha mah mih kalan phe a pangsah bua.
48002014	Thuasalama minmin nynh thehoypaw kya-e byaccing thyhte hmerarihlan hiin khyh`ae cipaw he ka muih tuh, mih balyn malang Piter kha, “Nang nynh Jew ccungccaw na thua pite Jew`ae hawte um leite, Zenta`ae phung thyhte na um lanze, pawccemou nang nynh Zenta`ae kha Jew`ae phung thyhte um lan na nangse`ae?
48002015	“Pynsawthuanaw lante aening tuh Jew`ae ah thua oh zah Zenta`ae misei`ae ah thua khyh oh.
48002016	Te ccungccaw lukheit tuh Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate thyaaccoukuh khyh, thuasalama Jesu Kri zynnaw liate nynh thyaaccouku cipaw ah ny oh. Kri zynnaw liate aening tuh thyaaccou oh ccaw cite, Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate thua leite, Jesu Kri kha aening nynh phe ah zyn vae oh. Pawccecize Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate hung ccungccaw sanmah thyaaccou kho thua lan khyh.
48002017	“Thuasalama Kri liate thyaaccouku ccaw cite aening nynh ah ccung cciamang lya oh heize, ahmaw te ahmaw mah misei`ae cite ah muihku oh lanze, tukeiccu Kri tuh seinaw ryalahtu tou a thua? Tuhte thua khyh!
48002018	Pawccecize kae nynh phe ka ro vae paw uccaw kha bua ka sakthui lanze, kamaw te kamaw kha kawbya rohtupaw lang a raekuh paw nynh ka thua.
48002019	Pawccecize Pachia hanlan ka hiin kho nawlan, Kawbya liate kae tuh Kawbya kalan ka chih.
48002020	Kae tuh Kri ryte khiade ka thua, tuhzemah ka hiin ung. Tuhzemah kae ka hiin khyh, thuasalama kae ka kya Kri nynh a hiin. Atu pynsaw kya kae ka hiin paw hiinnaw tuh kamaw hynh yn sungsah zah kae ka hanlan amaw te amaw a pyakuh paw Pachia Ccapaw zynnaw liate nynh ka hiin.
48002021	Pachia thawccinaw kha kae nynh ka vua khyh, pawccecize dingnaw tuh Kawbya liate a ccouku lanze, Kri tuh alakaw lang nynh a chihhang vae,” ka cipya.
48003001	Pou Galati mingaee`ae, phe a khiade vae`ae paw Jesu Kri kha nanning laku ccaerarihlan langsapya athua vae te, byaccing kha nanning nynh na zyn khyh nawlan oh hung nynh mou nanning kha phe ae mua oh?
48003002	Hynh-e kyalya hynh nynh nanning kyate ny ka ry: Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate tou nanning nynh Muisaw kha na mue oh? Tukhyhze zynnaw kya-e thaenaw liate tou na mue oh?
48003003	Myaryamaw na ngaee oh ang tou? Muisaw kya rya phe na tho vae oh pite, pynsaw liate tou atu nanning tuh ccingsah na thua oh?
48003004	Uccaw patae kha alakaw lang tou na teing hang oh? Alakaw lang tou a tanghang cih?
48003005	Tuhlaeze nanning kha Muisaw ae pya oh zah nanning laku thungnaw ryalahtupaw nynh kha-e kha Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae te tou a cyi? Tukhyhze zynnaw kya-e thaenaw liate tou a cyi?
48003006	Tuhhawte, “Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah kha-e kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua.”.
48003007	Tukeiccu zynnaw a hoi`ae paw, minmin tuh Abraham ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw nyh oh.
48003008	Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kha zynnaw liate thyaaccousah cih`ae cite Ccathyaa nynh phe muihty zah, “Nang na kya minphuin`ae balyn nynh hythuaccou cih`ae,” cite Abraham kalan thehoypaw kha phe a hoty vae.
48003009	Tukeiccu zynnaw a hoi`ae paw tuh a zyn paw Abraham ryte hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
48003010	Pawccecize Kawbya cyisahnaw a doliakuh`ae paw miakaw tuh thyalawnaw zakaw nynh um`ae; pawccecize, “Kawbya ccauh kya cyi lan azeikuh paw balyn kha pei a zui leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thyalaw thua sah,” cite azeikuh.
48003011	Thuasalama Pachia malang hung ccungccaw sanmah Kawbya liate thyaaccoupaw um khyh cipaw tuh ccaerarihlan lang alangkuh. Pawccecize, “Adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih,” a cikuh.
48003012	Kawbya tuh zynnaw te sekuh khyh. Thuasalama Ccathyaa nynh, “Kawbya`ae a zui paw ccungccaw tuh Kawbya`ae liate nynh a hiin cih,” a ci.
48003013	Pawccecize, “Thing kya sae athua paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thyalawpaw nynh thua,” cite azeikuh hawte, Kri tuh aening keiccuze thyalawnaw a ccou paw thua zah Kawbya kya-e thyalawnaw kyate aening kha phe oun sawkhaw vae.
48003014	Ou tuhte Abraham nynh a mue paw hythuanaw tuh Jesu Kri liate Zenta`ae kalan a thuabua nawlan, aening nynh zynnaw liate byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw Muisaw kha ah mue nawlan oh.
48003015	Uteno`ae, ccungccaw`ae phung thyhte nynh ka ho. Ccungccaw lukheit kya-e byakin heize tynsah athua lanze, hung ccungccaw nynh san roh vae khyh, bia mah biachih vae khyh.
48003016	Byakinpyakupaw`ae kha Abraham te a ciihan hanlan nynh raepya athua. Pataepaw hawte, “Ciihan`ae hanlan,” cite Pachia nynh ho khyh; thuasalama lukheitpaw hawte, “Na ciihan hanlan,” cite nynh a ho, tuh-e paw tuh Kri nynh thua.
48003017	E hynh kae hopya oh; Kri kya Pachia nynh phe a tynsah vae paw byakin kha kum zapali sungthung alue koute a um paw Kawbya nynh roh kho vae khyh; byakinpyakupaw kha accakaepaw lang Kawbya nynh tangsah kho khyh.
48003018	Pawccecize rho uccaw tuh Kawbya kya-e athua lanze, byakinpyakupaw kya-e thua vae khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw liate nynh Abraham kha rho uccaw a pya.
48003019	Tuhte lanze pawkeiccumou Kawbya tuh yn thua? Byakinpyakupaw raepya athua paw kalan Ciihan a thua cia, cyiseinaw`ae keiccu nynh Kawbya tuh biachih athua. Vaaw ccungccaw`ae liate nynh kha-e kha ccawkunaw raetupaw kuih liate pya athua.
48003020	Te ccawkunaw raetupaw tuh lukheit hanlan rou thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia tuh ccangkheit nynh thua.
48003021	Tuhte lanze Kawbya tuh Pachia kya-e byakinpyakupaw te arawsekuh tou? Tuhte thua khyh. Pawccecize hiinnaw phe a pya khopaw Kawbya kha pya a la thua vae ze, thanccing lante dingnaw tuh Kawbya liate nynh athua vae cih.
48003022	Thuasalama a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae kha Jesu Kri zynnaw liate byakinpyakupaw kha pya athua nawlan, Ccathyaa nynh ccungccaw balyn kha seinaw zakaw pung oun khung.
48003023	Thuasalama zynnaw yn thua maw, aening tuh Kawbya zakaw nynh khung ah thua oh, nyalang yn langkuh vae cih paw zynnaw kalan phe oun la khawsung`ae.
48003024	Tukeiccu aening tuh zynnaw liate thyaaccou ah thua nawlan oh, Kawbya tuh aening kha Kri kalan thuakhae khylan, aening yn ccangpatu nynh thua.
48003025	Thuasalama zynnaw he yn thua koute, aening tuh yn ccangpatu zakaw ah um vae khyh oh.
48003026	Pawccecize Kri Jesu zynnaw liate nanning balyn tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh na thua oh.
48003027	Pawccecize Kri lungkhu lang baptisma-in vae`ae paw nanning balyn tuh Kri kha phe na lawkuh vae oh paw nynh thua.
48003028	Kri kya Jew paw ci um vae khyh, Greek paw ci um vae khyh, a luepaw ci um vae khyh, see ci um vae khyh, pise ci um vae khyh, nopi ci um vae khyh; pawccecize Kri Jesu kya nanning balyn tuh ccangkheitpaw nynh na thua vae oh.
48003029	Te nanning tuh Kri kya-e na thua oh lanze, nanning tuh Abraham ciihan nynh na thua vae oh, te byakinpyakupaw thyhte rhoccoutu`ae nynh na thua vae oh.
48004001	Atu kae hopya oh, rhoccoutu tuh uccaw balyn kha a hoitupaw mang athua zemah, imua athua lungkhu balyn tuh see lukheit te alaenaw um khyh.
48004002	Thuasalama a paaw nynh a khyapaw ccyh azaw mawlaezung tuh dooihtu`ae te ringtu`ae zakaw nynh a um ung.
48004003	Tuhhawte aening mah imua`ae ah thua lya oh tuh laephipi e atakaw ccangpyanaw kya-e seetangnaw zakaw kya nynh ah la um oh.
48004004	-
48004005	Thuasalama accyh ccingnaw he yn thua tetuh Kawbya zakaw um`ae paw kha sawkhaw khylan, ccaaw`ae kya-e ccaawthuanaw kha aening nynh ah ccoubua nawlan oh, nopinung vue kya poisah zah Kawbya zakaw yn puisah paw a Ccapaw kha Pachia nynh yn saw.
48004006	Te nanning tuh ccaaw`ae na thua oh keiccuze, “Abba, Apang!” cite a kosah paw, a Ccapaw kya-e Muisaw kha nanning nae thinlung`ae lungkhu lang Pachia nynh phe a saw vae.
48004007	Tukeiccu nang tuh see na thua vae khyh, thuasalama ccapaw nynh na thua vae, te ccapaw na thua vae lanze Kri liate Pachia kya-e rhoccoutu nynh na thua vae.
48004008	Tuhzemah langmaw nanning nynh Pachia na la ny khyh oh lyakha, pachia athua lei`ae paw kha nanning nynh aphungpaw lante rya na lawpya oh.
48004009	Thuasalama atu nanning nynh Pachia kha phe na ny vae oh, tukhyhze Pachia nynh phe ae ny vae oh paw nynh a thawzyapaw, anyaapaw huhan`ae kalan pawccemou bua na paleihku oh? Pawccemou tuh-e kalan see lang bua tang khylan nanning nynh na ry ung oh?
48004010	Nanning nynh nin`ae te sawpaw`ae, kumvaelori`ae te kum`ae kha na tuasethya oh.
48004011	Kae tuh nanning kya alakaw lang nynh ryalaw phe ka law hang vae cite nanning keiccu ka thinphang.
48004012	Uteno`ae, kae tuh nanning hawte ka thua keiccu, kae hawte nanning thuabua oh cite kae ngia oh; nanning nynh ka tungvaw kharyh na cyihsei khyh oh.
48004013	Kae nynh ka pynsaw nyaanaw ryte nae kalan thehoypaw masaty ka ho cipaw kha nanning nynh na ny oh.
48004014	Ka pynsaw kya ka tungpaw syntawnaw kha nanning nynh pawlangria leite na um khyh oh, kamaw mah nae deebia khyh oh; thuasalama Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw hawte thuasah, Jesu Kri hawte thuasah kamaw kha nae lehkhan oh.
48004015	Tuhte lanze nanning nynh hythuanaw na ccou oh paw tuh pawmou athua? Pawccecize, athua kho ze nanning nynh nae mit`ae kha poh khoiku lan zah kamaw kha phe pya lan hei na ry oh cite langmaw nanning konglang ccaekia ka khan.
48004016	Tukeiccu atu kae nynh byaccing kha nanning kae hopya oh keiccu kae tuh nae rhawpaw lang tou ka tang?
48004017	Minmin nynh nanning ae lungmung oh paw tuh, nae hanlan ahoypaw elan thua khyh; ou nanning nynh minmin kha na lungmungru nawlan oh, te minmin nynh nanning kha kamaw kyate phiasaku lan ae ry oh paw te nynh thua.
48004018	Thuasalama nanning ryte kae ka um lya kyalya ahoypaw kha myarya na lungmung lan oh paw thua khyh, ahoypaw kha pei na lungmung lan oh paw nynh thua.
48004019	Kri kha nanning kya phe a raekuh lan cia ccaawpuinaw neitangia bua ka teingpya`ae paw ka ccaaw taraw`ae,
48004020	atu nanning ryte um lan ka ry zah ka byaho rulaeku lan ka ry, pawccecize nanning kya lunghiinnaw ka hoi.
48004021	Kawbya zakaw a umry`ae paw nanning, Kawbya kha phe na thae vae oh khaw? Yn hopya tua oh.
48004022	Pawccecize Abraham nynh ccaaw`ae luning a hoi, lukheit tuh seenung ccaaw, lukheit tuh a luepaw nopinung ccaaw nynh thua cite Ccathyaa nynh a ho.
48004023	Seenung ccaaw tuh pynsaw lante a pui paw nynh thua, thuasalama a luepaw nopinung ccaaw tuh byakinpyakupaw liate a puipaw nynh thua.
48004024	Tuh-e`ae kong tuh tousenawpaw nynh thua: Pawccecize hynh-e nopi luning`ae tuh byakin`ae ccangning nynh thua; Hakar athua paw byakin ccangkheit tuh Sinai Mua kyate thua zah see ccaaw`ae kha a pousah.
48004025	Pawccecize hynh-e Hakar tuh Arabia ram kya um paw Sinai Mua nynh thua, te atu um paw Jerusalem te nynh aloku. Amaw a ccaaw`ae ryte seetangnaw kya nynh um`ae.
48004026	Thuasalama luki lang a um paw Jerusalem tuh aening balyn kya-e ah nung athua paw, a luepaw nopinung nynh thua.
48004027	Pawccecize, “Ccaawsaah leipaw a tinnung nang, na lungtua sah; neitangia a teing lei nung nang, roisaw lah sia; pawccecize a cciataw vae`ae paw nopinung nynh vawpaw a hoi paw nopinung laeze ccaaw`ae patae a hoihua,” cite azeikuh.
48004028	Uteno`ae, atu aening tuh Isaak hawte byakinpyakupaw kya-e ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh.
48004029	Thuasalama pynsaw lante a pui paw ccaaw nynh Muisaw liate a pui paw ccaaw kha a tua a sah hawte, tuhawmawte nynh atu mah athua.
48004030	Tuhzemah Ccathyaa nynh paw a ci mou? “Seenung te a ccapaw kha dae dee`ae; pawccecize seenung a ccapaw nynh a luepaw nopinung ccapaw ryte rhoccoutu lang tangkheih lan khyh,” a ci.
48004031	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, aening tuh seenung ccaaw`ae ah thua khyh oh, thuasalama a luepaw nopinung ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh.
48005001	Tukeiccu Kri nynh aening phe oun luesah vae paw luenaw kyakhe tynkaring lang thadyn oh, seetangnaw kya-e taphu khate bua bawkuh nan vae oh.
48005002	Dotua oh, kae Paul nynh nanning kae hopya oh paw tuh, nanning tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw na thua oh ze, Kri tuh nanning hanlan pawsang athanenaw um khyh.
48005003	Pawccecize vindung awkuh paw ccungccaw miakaw kalan ccaekia bua ka khan paw tuh kha-e paw tuh Kawbya khaleih zui lan laeba umtupaw nynh thua.
48005004	Kawbya liate thyaaccou`ae paw nanning miakaw hanlan Kri tuh nae hanlan pawlang tang vae khyh; nanning tuh thawccinaw kyate phe na khuliakuh vae oh.
48005005	Pawccecize aening tuh zynnaw liate dingnaw kya-e ngaehoinaw kha Muisaw liate nynh phang ah ngaw oh.
48005006	Pawccecize Jesu Kri kya vindung awkupaw thuasah, vindung awku leipaw mah thuasah pawsang thane khyh; thuasalama sungsakunaw liate ryalah paw zynnaw nynh athane.
48005007	Nanning tuh kou hoy lang na ccue vae oh, byaccing kha nanning nynh na ngae khyh nawlan oh hung nynh mou nanning kha ae khee oh?
48005008	Hynh-e soihnawpaw tuh nanning ae ko oh paw kyate yn thua khyh.
48005009	Ditaripaw ransi nynh vaedi khaleih kha pung a thosah.
48005010	Nanning lungccang na hoi lan khyh oh cite Bawipaw liate nae kya zynkunaw ka hoi. Thuasalama nanning vawsaw ae pyatu oh paw ccungccaw tuh hunghung athua zemah byapianaw kha a ing cih.
48005011	Uteno`ae, kae nynh vindung awkunaw kong kha ka ho ung lanze, pawccemou tuasahkunaw kha pei ka teing ung? Tuhte ka ho lanze, vaelantung kya-e thykupawkunaw tuh phe adae cih.
48005012	Nanning vawsaw ae pya oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha thoh bae`ae sah ci hei ka ry!
48005013	Pawccecize uteno`ae, nanning tuh luenaw kalan ko na thua vae oh, tuhzemah pynsaw ccyhhoypaw hanlan luenaw kha mang nan oh, thuasalama sungsakunaw liate lukheit te lukheit ryalawpakuh oh.
48005014	Pawccecize Kawbya balyn tuh, “Na innpaw kha namaw hawkhate na sungsah cih,” acikuh paw hynh-e bya kyahin phe accing.
48005015	Thuasalama nanning nynh lukheit te lukheit na teikuh oh zah na laangku oh ze, lukheit te lukheit na roku khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh!
48005016	Te kae nynh, Muisaw te hiin oh lah pynsaw duanaw kha nanning nynh na ccingsah lang khyh oh, kae cipya oh.
48005017	Pawccecize pynsaw rynaw tuh Muisaw rynaw te rawsekuh zah Muisaw rynaw mah pynsaw rynaw te arawsekuh. Hynhe` ae tuh ccangkheit te ccangkheit arawsekuh`ae; tukeiccu nanning nynh na cyi ry oh paw kha na cyih khyh oh.
48005018	Thuasalama nanning kha Muisaw nynh ae cciakhae oh ze, nanning tuh Kawbya zakaw na um vae khyh oh.
48005019	Pynsaw cyisahnaw`ae tuh raerae a langkuh. Tuh-e`ae tuh: milae zu milae vawpaw seikhaepaw, ohhuakunaw, nungsikunaw, sahpaw eih rynaw;
48005020	zohtuhbeiknaw, ccungccaw nawthyanaw, huakunaw, byalungnaw, ccungingkunaw, thinria bungpawnaw, ahmaw hanlan kyalya tuakunaw, lungnging leinaw, ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw,
48005021	eiungnaw, ccungccaw chianaw, ruinaw, aeniapoituakunaw, te khahtahawpaw cyisahnaw`ae nynh thua. Khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Pachia peenaw kha rhoccou lan khyh`ae cite langmaw lya ka ho vae hawte, kha-e`ae kong kha nanning kae hopyaty oh.
48005022	Thuasalama Muisaw thae tuh sungsakunaw, lungpawnaw, daenaw, lungsaenaw, tuathyanaw, hoynaw, lungzinaw,
48005023	nevyalyanaw, sungku khonaw nynh thua. Khahtahawpaw a rawsepaw kawbya um khyh.
48005024	Kri kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh pynsaw te pynsaw rynaw te duanaw`ae kha phe a khiade vae`ae.
48005025	Aening nynh Muisaw kya ah hiin oh thua ze, Muisaw kya mah cceih oh sih.
48005026	Lukheit te lukheit ccyaku te, lukheit te lukheit eiungkute accakaepaw pookunaw kha aening nynh peki nan oh sih.
48006001	Uteno`ae, ccungccaw lukheit tuh seinaw kya phe a phungku lanze, muisaw ccungccaw`ae nanning nynh nevyalyapaw thinlung te khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha a umtynaw kya bua umsah oh; namaw mah tuhounaw na tung khyh nawlan la raeringkuh.
48006002	Lukheit te lukheit kya-e aripaw phupaw`ae kha duekute nanning nynh Kri kya-e kawbya kha la ccingsah oh.
48006003	Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh pawsang athua leite thanccingpaw maman lante a tuaku lanze, amaw te amaw kha a lingkuh paw nynh thua.
48006004	Te ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw a ryalaw kha sihseikuh sah, te mingccangpaw kya thua leite amaw makhae kyakhe aning tuh lungpawnaw a hoi cih.
48006005	Pawccecize ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw a phupaw kha a phukuh cih.
48006006	Bya a ccangkuh paw ccungccaw nynh a ccangpatupaw kha ahoypaw uccaw balyn khate neethungbua sah.
48006007	Lingsakuh nan oh, Pachia tuh pawlangria leite nung kho thua khyh; pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccaciivua paw kha, a vua thyhte kha-e kha bua a rue cih.
48006008	Pawccecize a pynsaw hanlan ccaciivua paw nynh pynsaw kya-e aroh paw kha a rue cih; thuasalama Muisaw hanlan ccaciivua paw nynh tuh Muisaw kya-e zungzae hiinnaw kha a rue cih.
48006009	Te ahoypaw ryalawnaw kya thawbang lungthang nan oh sih; pawccecize tuhte ah lungthawthang khyh ze, accyh he yn zawte aening nynh ah ruekuh cih oh.
48006010	Tukeiccu aening nynh ccyhhoypaw ah mue oh thyhte, ccungccaw balyn hanlan ahoypaw cyipah oh sih. Abapi lante zynnaw kya-e innbyn`ae hanlan ahoypaw cyipah oh sih.
48006011	Pawcih alepaw ccaw kha nynh kamaw ka kuih te nanning kalan ka zei cipaw na muih oh!
48006012	Mimaw mih pynsaw maehoynaw a langsakuh ry`ae paw ccungccaw patae nynh nanning kha vindung awku lan ae nangse oh; tuhte a cyi`ae paw tuh Kri kya-e vaelantung keiccuze a tua a sahnaw`ae paw kha minmin nynh kae teing sei cih cite a tuaku`ae keiccu nynh thua.
48006013	Pawccecize vindung awkuh`ae paw mimaw mah Kawbya kha zui khyh`ae. Thuasalama nanning nae pynsaw kya a pookury`ae pawte nynh nanning kha vindung awkuh`ae sah ci ae ry oh.
48006014	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e vaelantung kya laelan kae nynh ka pooku lanpaw kharyh um khyh; tuh-e vaelantung liate laephipi tuh kae ka hanlan khiade thua vae zah kae mah laephipi hanlan khiade ka thua vae.
48006015	Pawccecize Kri Jesu kya tuh vindung awkupaw thuasah, vindung awku leipaw thuasah pawsang thane khyh, thuasalama raethawpaw kha nynh athane.
48006016	Hynh-e upadi phung thyhte a zui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw kya thuasah, Pachia kya-e Israel`ae kya thuasah, daenaw te ngaethya-umsanaw tuh la um vae sah.
48006017	Atu liate hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah kamaw hynh vawsaw yn pya nan vae sah; pawccecize Bawipaw Jesu kya-e vaemaw daelaepaw kha ka pyn kya a phubia paw nynh ka thua.
48006018	Uteno`ae, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae thinlung kya la um vae sah. Amen.
49001001	Pachia rynaw thyhte Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw Paul nynh Efesa khua kya a um`ae paw mithyaa`ae te Kri Jesu kya zyn lan um`ae paw kalan kae beihlang oh.
49001002	Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.
49001003	Kri kya vaawran te asekuhpaw muisaw hythuanaw`ae balyn ryte aening kha hythua oun pyatupaw ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw Pachia ccaccei tuh thehoy te um sah.
49001004	Tuhhawte Pachia malang aening tuh sungsakunaw kya ah thyaa nawlan oh te ccaenaw a hoi leipaw ah thua nawlan oh, laephipi athotakaw mawze aening kha Kri kya phe oun po vae hawte.
49001005	A lungrythuasahpaw amaw a rynaw thyhte, Jesu Kri liate amaw kalan ccaaw`ae hawte ccaawthuanaw khylan aening kha langmawpi te phe oun la paccynde vae.
49001006	A Sungsahpaw Ccapaw kya aening oun lehkhannawpaw tuh a phuepaw a thawccinaw kha thehoysah khylan nynh thua.
49001007	Ccapaw a thawccinaw hoirungnaw thyhte, a chii liate seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw athua paw sawkhawnaw kha amaw kya aening nynh ah mue oh.
49001008	Tuh-e thawccinaw kha hawnaw balynte thaethyanaw te aening kalan paepaelui lan oun raepya vae.
49001009	Amaw nynh phe a paccynkuty vae paw ahoypaw a lungrythuanaw thyhte Pachia nynh a rynaw kya-e byakhupaw kha aening kalan phe yn nysah vae.
49001010	Ou tuhte accyh`ae accingnaw kya-e ccyhphianaw kya, aning nynh vaawran kya um paw te laephi kya um paw paryhte Kri amaw ccaccei kyakhe pawpaw balyn kha pynkheihlan sang kheit kya pung a suelua nawlan nynh thua.
49001011	Amaw a khuakhannaw thyhte pawpaw balyn kha a cyihtupaw Pachia nynh amaw a eenaw thyhte langmawpi te phe a paccynde vae thyhte Kri kyakhe aening mah rhoccounaw kha ah mue oh.
49001012	Ou tuhte Kri kha masaty a ngaehoikuh`ae paw aening tuh amaw phu-enaw thehoysah paw ah thua nawlan oh nynh thua.
49001013	Nanning mah nae kya-e khumnaw thehoypaw athua paw byaccing bya kha na thae oh koute amaw kha na zyn oh, nanning nynh amaw kha na zyn oh koute Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw Thyaa Muisaw khate nanning tuh tazeihkhia na thua vae oh.
49001014	Pachia nynh a re vae paw, a hoi paw uccaw kha a sawkhaw makhia cia, tuh-e Muisaw tuh aening rho uccaw kya-e pyatypaw nynh thua, tuh-e tuh a phu-enaw kha thehoysah nawlan nynh thua.
49001015	Tukeiccu Bawipaw Jesu na zynnaw oh paw te mithyaa`ae balyn na sungsanaw oh paw kha he ka thae tuh,
49001016	nanning hanlan dae leite lungtuabya ka ho zah nanning kha ka sawsangnaw kya tyty kae lia oh.
49001017	Saw ka sang paw tuh: ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Pachia, phu-enaw Paaw nynh hawnaw muisaw te amaw kya-e nynaw byaphy kha nanning ae pya nawlan oh,
49001018	thaethya nawlan nae thinlung mit ae awsapya nawlan oh, amaw konawpaw ngaehoinaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan oh, te mithyaa`ae kya um paw amaw kya-e rho uccaw phuenaw hoirungnaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan oh,
49001019	te amaw kya-e myarya athungpaw thungnaw kya-e ryalawnaw thyhte, a zyn`ae paw aening kalan amaw kya-e a thawsaepaw thungnaw tuh hohcih nynh ale cipaw na ny nawlan oh, saw kae sangpya oh.
49001020	Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate thosah zah vaawran kya amaw a ranglang khe a dahungsah lya, kha-e thungnaw te nynh Kri kya Paaw nynh rya a law.
49001021	Alupihuanaw balyn, cyi khonaw balyn, thungnaw balyn, te ukkunaw balyn kya ahanghua lante a dahungsah, te atu she kyalya thua leite yn thua vae cih paw she kyacia minphukuh paw min miakaw balyn kya ahanghua lante a nung.
49001022	Te pawpaw balyn kha Kri a ccuphe kaw marya nung zah pawpaw balyn kyaze lu lang amaw kha kriccawbu hanlan a pya.
49001023	Tuh-e kriccawbu tuh pawpaw kya pawpaw balyn phe biasah paw amaw ccingnaw athua paw a pyn nynh athua.
49002001	Te ccouseikunaw`ae te seinaw`ae kya a chih vae`ae paw nanning kha Pachia nynh ae hiinsah oh.
49002002	Langmaw lya nanning tuh hynh-e laephipi ccianaw thyhte kha-e`ae kya na la hiin oh, khivae kya-e thungnaw uktu bawi paw rynaw thyhte, kawngae lei`ae paw ccaaw`ae kya atu ryalah paw muisaw rynaw thyhte na la hiin oh.
49002003	Tuh-e`ae laku aening balyn mah langmaw lya pynsaw rynaw te thinlung rynaw kha ccingsah te ah pynsaw duanaw`ae kya ah la ciakuh bua oh. Mingccang`ae hawnaw te, aening mah thuanaw lante thinrianaw a ccou`ae paw ccaaw`ae nynh ah la thua oh.
49002004	Thuasalama ngaethya-umsanaw te phe beihpaw Pachia nynh aening kha myarya alepaw a sungsanaw te oun sungsah keiccu,
49002005	seinaw kya ah chi oh lyakhe, Kri ryte pynkheihlan aening kha oun hiinsah vae, (thawccinaw liate nanning tuh khum na thua vae oh),
49002006	te pynkheihlan oun thosah zah Kri Jesu kya vaawran hmin`ae kya pynkheihlan oun dahungsah vae.
49002007	Ou tuhte yn thua lanpaw she kya myaryamaw alungpaw a thawccinaw kha a tuathyanaw liate Kri Jesu kya aening kalan oun langsapya nawlan nynh thua.
49002008	Pawccecize thawccinaw keiccuze zynnaw liate nanning tuh khum na thua vae oh. Naemaw te naemaw liate thua khyh, Pachia lasung nynh thua.
49002009	Ryalawnaw liate thua khyh, tukhyh lanze lukhakheit nynh phe a pookuh sei cih.
49002010	Pawccecize aening tuh amaw nynh oun rae paw, ahoypaw ryalaw`ae law khylan Kri Jesu kya rae paw nynh ah thua oh. Tuh-e ahoypaw ryalaw`ae kya aening nynh ah hiin nawlan oh Pachia nynh phe a la paccynty vae.
49002011	Tukeiccu langmaw lya, pynsaw kya kuih te rae paw vindung awkunaw a ccou`ae paw nynh nanning kha vindung awkuh lei`ae paw ae ci oh paw te pynsaw lante nanning tuh Zenta`ae na la thua oh paw kha liathui oh.
49002012	Tuh ccyh lya nanning tuh Kri leite na la um oh paw, Israel khuaram toonaw kyate khycce`ae na la thua oh paw, byakinpyakupaw kya-e byakin`ae kyate mikhia`ae na la thua oh paw, ngaehoinaw hoi lei`ae paw, te laephipi kya Pachia leite na la um oh paw kha liathui oh.
49002013	Thuasalama langmaw lya kou na la sawkuh oh paw nanning kha Kri chii liate Kri Jesu kya atu tuh naesaku na thua vae oh.
49002014	Pawccecize amaw tuh aening bua ccawkunaw nynh thua. Aning nynh alaku-e arihkhawpaw lungrua kha pung tingsabung zah minphuin phinning kha phinkheit lang phe a rae vae.
49002015	Ccangpyakunaw`ae kya a um paw, kawpyapaw`ae Kawbya athua paw rhawkunaw kha amaw pynsaw kya phe a rosah vae; minphuin phinning kha amaw kya athawpaw ccungccaw ccangkheit lang rae khylan nynh bua ccawkunaw kha a rae.
49002016	Te aning nynh minphuin phinning kha pyn pynkheit kya Pachia te bua ccawsakuthui khylan nynh rhawkunaw kha vaelantung liate phe a maemih.
49002017	Te Kri nynh yn thua zah asawnaw kya um`ae paw nanning kalan te anaenaw kya um`ae paw kalan daenaw thehoypaw kha a ho.
49002018	Pawccecize amaw liate Muisaw ccangkheit liate aening paryh tuh Paaw kalan thua khonaw ah hoi oh.
49002019	Tukeiccu atu nanning tuh mikhia`ae te minphuinccang`ae na thua vae khyh oh, thuasalama mithyaa`ae ryte khuaccaw`ae nynh na thua vae oh, Pachia innbyn kya-e`ae nynh na thua vae oh.
49002020	Nanning tuh locceihtu`ae te profeh`ae athua paw lung-inn athonaw vawlan sakthyh paw nynh na thua oh, Jesu Kri amaw tuh abapi huapaw alukipaccy lung nynh thua.
49002021	Amaw kya sak paw inn balyn tuh rekuhmamia lang sak thua zah Bawipaw kya athyaapaw tempal lang a lethung.
49002022	Muisaw liate Pachia a um nawlan nanning kha mah amaw kya pynkheihlan sak na thua oh.
49003001	Tuh-e keiccuze kae Paul tuh nanning Zenta`ae hanlan Jesu Kri keiccu thungccahpaw nynh ka thua.
49003002	Nanning thanenaw hanlan kamaw pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw kya-e dooihnawrya kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae mamin vae cih oh.
49003003	Tuh-e tuh, byaphy liate Pachia nynh byakhupaw kha kamaw phe yn nysah vae (dyntari te ccaw phe kae zei vae hawte,
49003004	kha-e kha nanning nynh he na ria oh te, Kri kya-e byakhupaw kya ka nynaw kha nanning nynh na thaethya nawlan oh cite),
49003005	kha-e byakhupaw kha amaw kya-e athyaapaw locceihtu`ae te profeh`ae kalan Muisaw liate atu lya phe a phypya`ae hawte, ccangpaw she kya ccungccaw ccaaw`ae kalan la phypah khyh`ae.
49003006	Tuh-e tuh, thehoypaw liate Zenta`ae mah rhoccoubua`ae paw thua nawlan, phe alokuhpaw pyn kya-e thua nawlan, te Kri kya a byakinpyakupaw kya-e a neethungkuh bua`ae paw thua nawlan nynh thua.
49003007	Amaw thungnaw kya-e ccungkiapaw ryalawnaw liate, kamaw pya athua paw Pachia kyae thawccinaw lasung thyhte, kae tuh kha-e thehoypaw ryalahtu lang kae tang.
49003008	Tou kho um leipaw Kri kya-e hoirungnaw kha Zenta`ae kalan ka ho nawlan, mithyaa`ae balyn kyaze anyaa huapaw laeze houh anyaa huapaw kamaw kha hynh-e thawccinaw kha pya ka thua.
49003009	Pawpaw balyn Jesu Kri liate a raetupaw Pachia kya laephipi athotakaw kyate phisi athua paw kha-e byakhupaw kya-e vaeccawtangnaw tuh pawhynh nynh thua cipaw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha muihsah khylan hynh-e thawccinaw kha pya ka thua.
49003010	Tuhte muihsah rynawpaw tuh Pachia hawnaw aphuinphuin kha vaawran e uktu`ae kalan te kawhoitu`ae kalan kriccawbu liate atu nysah bua athua nawlan nynh thua.
49003011	Tuh-e tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu kya Pachia nynh zungzae atynpaw eenaw thyhte a ccingsahpaw nynh thua.
49003012	Kri zynnaw liate zynkute rawhoynaw te Pachia kalan thua khonaw kha amaw kya ah hoi oh.
49003013	Tukeiccu nanning kya-e phuenaw athua paw, nanning hanlan ka teingpaw vawsawnaw`ae keiccuze nae lungthang khyh nawlan kae ngia oh.
49003014	Hynh-e keiccu nynh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw kalan ccukharu ka tung.
49003015	Amaw kyate nynh vaawran kya te laephi kya innbyn khaleih tuh minphu athua.
49003016	Saw ka sang paw tuh: amaw phu-enaw kya-e hoirungnaw thyhte Pachia nynh nanning kha ae pya nawlan oh, amaw Muisaw thungnaw liate alungkhu lang-e ccungccapaw kha thawzung te thawsaesah athua nawlan,
49003017	te zynnaw liate Kri tuh nanning thinlung kya a um nawlan; te sungsakunaw kya nanning tuh tharuisaw te bingku na thua vae oh thyhte,
49003018	mithyaa`ae balyn ryte Kri kya-e sungsanaw akopaw, asaepaw, akhupaw te ahangpaw kha na nythya nawlan oh,
49003019	nynaw po aluepaw Kri kya-e sungsanaw kha na ny nawlan oh; ou tuhte nanning tuh Pachia kyae ccingnaw balyn ryte phe na bia nawlan oh saw ka sang.
49003020	Atu aening kya ryalah paw thungnaw thyhte, aening nynh ah ngia oh paw balyn, tukhyhze ah tua oh paw balyn laeze myaryamaw alunghua lante a cyih khopaw Pachia tuh,
49003021	Kri Jesu liate kriccawbu kya she balyn kya zungzae te zungzae cia phu-esah. Amen.
49004001	Tukeiccu Bawipaw keiccuze thungccahpaw kae Paul nynh ko na thua oh paw nanning kha, kha-e konaw te angaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh kae ngia oh.
49004002	Pawpaw balyn kya zakawsangsakunaw te, lungnenaw te, ngaesangnaw te, sungsakunaw kya lukheit te lukheit ngaethyaku te,
49004003	ccawkunaw te sueluakunaw kya Muisaw kya-e lungngingnaw kha tynsah khylan thawte zuakuh oh.
49004004	Nanning konaw kya-e ngaehoinaw tuh ccangkheit kyalya athua hawte, pyn pynkheit, Muisaw ccangkheit,
49004005	Bawipaw ccangkheit, zynnaw ccangkheit, baptisma ccangkheit,
49004006	pawpaw balyn Paaw athua paw Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um. Tuh-e Pachia tuh pawpaw balyn luki a um paw, teitei balyn kya a um paw, te nanning balyn kya a um paw nynh thua.
49004007	Thuasalama Kri kya-e lasung tounawpaw thyhte aening lu raveih tuh thawccinaw kha pya ah thua oh.
49004008	Tukeiccu, “Aning nynh ahangnaw lang he a kaethung tuh, kyngte thungsaw`ae paw kha a cciakhae`ae, te ccungccaw`ae kha lasung a pya`ae,” cite a ho.
49004009	(Atu, “Aning tuh a kaethung,” a cipaw tuh pawmou a hory? Masaty laephi anehuanaw kalan mah a rungbung paw kha nynh thua.
49004010	Yn rungbung paw aning tuh pawpaw balyn kha phe biasah khylan, vaawran`ae balyn luki lang a kaethung paw aning maw kha nynh thua.)
49004011	Te amaw ccaccei nynh ccungccaw abang kha locceihtuthuanaw, te abang kha profehthuanaw, abang kha evangelistthuanaw, abang kha pastor te ccangpatuthuanaw a pya`ae,
49004012	tuhte a pya`ae paw tuh Kri pyn kha tynsathung khylan, ryalawnaw kya-e ryalaw hanlan mithyaa`ae kha paccyn khylan,
49004013	aening balyn nynh zynnaw kya lunglokunaw te Pachia Ccapaw nynaw lunglokunaw kya ah thua oh cia, Kri kya-e ccingnaw pynrua tounawpaw athua paw, piccangthua vae paw ccungccaw athuakuh cia ah thua nawlan oh;
49004014	ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae nynh hyngpyanaw liate, a cyisakuh thyapaw thyaruhnaw te a pheethyapaw pheenaw kya ccangpyanaw khivae miakaw nynh po cciakhae`ae zah nuhlang malang ahekuh`ae paw imua`ae kharyh ah thua vae khyh nawlan oh,
49004015	thuasalama sungsakunaw kya byaccing kha hote, aening tuh lu athua paw Kri kya pawpaw kya balyn ah lethung nawlan oh,
49004016	amaw kyate atungkunaw miakaw nynh thawpya zah pyn balyn tuh rekuhmamia lang tungkuh`ae zah akyngkuh`ae, pyn kya-e raveih nynh ccungkia lang rya a law`ae thyhte, sungsakunaw kya kha-e pyn kha tynsathung nawlan pyn kha a lethungsah.
49004017	Tukeiccuze tuhlaepaw Zenta`ae nynh accakaepaw mih tuanaw-thinlung kya a hiin`ae hawte nanning nynh na hiinbua khyh nawlan oh e hynh ka ho zah Bawipaw kya ccaekia ka khan.
