49004018	Minmin kya nythyanaw kharyh a um khyh keiccu, mih thinlung mitmoh keiccu, mih thaethyanaw tuh karae amoh, Pachia kya-e hiinnaw kyate phe a phiakuh vae`ae.
49004019	Minmin tuh maethya ny leite, eih duanaw te nungsikunaw tynre kha cyi khylan mimaw te mimaw kha myarya ohhuakurynaw kalan a ahkuh`ae.
49004020	Thuasalama nanning tuh Kri kong kha tuhte na ccangkuh khyh oh;
49004021	byaccing tuh Jesu kya a um hawte, amaw kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh zah amaw nynh phe ae ccangpya vae oh lanze,
49004022	langmaw nae ozia te asekuh lante a hyngthyapaw ryduanaw thyhte phe aroh vae paw arynpaw ccungccaw kha nanning nynh na vua nawlan oh,
49004023	te nae tuanaw-thinlung muisaw kha thawsahte na um nawlan oh,
49004024	te ahmepaw dingnaw kya te thyaanaw kya Pachia hawmawte rae athua paw, athawpaw ccungccaw kha nanning nynh na lawku nawlan oh nynh thua.
49004025	Tukeiccu hyngbya kha nungbiate, “Nanning lu raveih nynh nae innpaw`ae ryte byaccing kha ho oh,” pawccecize aening tuh lukheit te lukheit pyn kyae` ae nynh ah thua oh.
49004026	“Nae thinria zemah sei nan oh:” nae bungpawnaw khate khuanin ccawsah nan oh.
49004027	Diabolos kha umnaw ua nan oh.
49004028	Aruhpaw ccungccaw nynh kharyh ruh nan vae sah, thuasalama ahoboupaw ccungccaw kha pyabua lanpaw a hoi nawlan, amaw a kuih te ahoypaw ryalaw kha zuakute lah sah.
49004029	Anungsikuhpaw bya kaw kheit san nae khalang kyate pou nan sah. Thuasalama a thaetu`ae kha Pachia thawccinaw a neethungbua nawlan, tynsathungnaw hanlan athanepaw ahoypaw bya palia pousah oh.
49004030	Sawkhawnaw nin hanlan nanning tazeih ae khianaw oh paw, Pachia Thyaa Muisaw kha thinlungccisah nan oh.
49004031	Thinlung kya phang poi paw balyn, bungpawnaw, thinrianaw, sianuakupaw, te thethya hokupaw, milae rosahrynawpaw balyn kha nae kyate dae vua oh.
49004032	Te lukheit te lukheit thawccihkuh thya oh lah ngaethya-umsakuh oh, Kri kya Pachia nynh nanning kha ae ngaethya vae oh hawte lukheit te lukheit ngaethyakuh oh.
49005001	Tukeiccu kou sungsahpaw ccaaw`ae na thua oh hawte, Pachia dosuinkuh`ae paw thua oh.
49005002	Kri nynh aening kha yn sungsahpawte, Pachia malang mynkhuhpaw pyapaw te silawku nawlan amaw te amaw kha aening halan a pyaku hawte, sungsakunaw kya hiin oh.
49005003	Thuasalama mithyaa`ae elan angaekuh hawte ohhuakunaw, thyaa leinaw tynre, tukhyhze karangkunaw kha nanning laku ho ci um boi nan vae sah;
49005004	nungsikunaw, angaekuh leipaw ccyasakupaw, ngaeeccaccu lang bya hopaw mah um nan vae sah, thuasalama lungtuabya palia la ho oh.
49005005	Pawccecize, a ohhuakuhpaw, athyaa leipaw, zohtuhbeiktu athua paw a karangkuhpaw ccungccaw tuh Kri te Pachia peenaw kya rho uccaw kharyh hoibua khyh cipaw kha na ny oh.
49005006	Ccakaepaw bya`ae khate hung ccungccaw nynh san ae la ling nan oh sah; pawccecize khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae keiccu nynh Pachia thinrianaw tuh kawngae leipaw ccaaw`ae tungvaw kya a thua.
49005007	Tukeiccu nanning tuh minmin ryte la mungkuh bua nan oh.
49005008	Pawccecize langmaw lya nanning tuh mohnaw nynh na la thua oh, thuasalama atu tuh Bawipaw kya awnaw nynh na thua vae oh; tukeiccu awnaw ccaaw`ae hawte hiin oh.
49005009	Pawccecize Muisaw athae tuh hoynaw tynre kya, dingnaw te byaccing kya nynh a um.
49005010	Bawipaw lungrythua paw uccaw kha ccangku lan zuakuh oh.
49005011	Te athae thae leipaw mohnaw ryalaw`ae ryte vaeccawtang nan oh, thuasalama kha-e`ae kha seinaw muihsakuh oh.
49005012	Pawccecize minmin nynh aphiru lante a cyi`ae paw kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha ho lan heize maethya lan um paw nynh thua.
49005013	Thuasalama awnaw liate langsapya athua paw seinaw miakaw tuh ccaerarihlan muih kho athua, pawccecize pawpaw balyn a langsakuh thya paw tuh awnaw nynh thua.
49005014	Tukeiccu Pachia nynh, “A ih paw nang, tho ccavae, a chih`ae paw kyate tho lah Kri nynh nang kha awnaw ae pya cih,” a ci.
49005015	Tukeiccu angaeepaw hawte thua leite, thuasalama ahawpaw hawte myarya raeringkute hiin oh.
49005016	Ninsaw`ae tuh ahoy vae khyh keiccuze accyh kha mangkuh thya oh.
49005017	Tukeiccu ngaee nan vae oh, thuasalama Bawipaw rynaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw kha thaethya ccavae oh.
49005018	Te azaw ci um leipaw misutui te rui nan oh, thuasalama Muisaw te phe beih oh.
49005019	Sam law`ae, thehoysanaw law`ae te muisaw law`ae khate lukheit te lukheit byahokuh oh lah nae thinlung kya ahoypaw roi sawbiate Bawipaw kalan law sah oh.
49005020	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min te Paaw Pachia kalan pawpaw balyn hanlan lungtuabya pei ho oh.
49005021	Pachia rawri sawtuanaw liate lukheit te lukheit ahkuh oh.
49005022	Zu`ae, Bawipaw kalan ahkupaw hawkhate, nae vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh oh.
49005023	Pawccecize Kri tuh kriccawbu lu athua hawte, vawpaw tuh zu lu nynh athua; te Kri tuh pyn Khumtu nynh athua.
49005024	Tukeiccu kriccawbu nynh Kri kalan a ahku hawte zu`ae nynh pawpaw kya balyn mih vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh`ae sah.
49005025	Kri nynh kriccawbu kha sungsah zah amaw kha kha-e hanlan a pyaku hawte, vawpaw`ae nae zu`ae kha sungsah oh.
49005026	Kri nynh bya athua paw tui te singpyanaw liate kriccawbu kha thyaasah nawlan te a ccikan nawlan;
49005027	akalyhkuhpaw khyh ze, akhinkuhpaw, tukhyhze khahtahawpaw ccangkhakheit sanmah a um leipaw, aphu-epaw kriccawbu kha amaw kalan thuakhae khylan; ou tuhte kriccawbu tuh athyaa nawlan te ccaenaw um khyh nawlan amaw kha a pyaku.
49005028	Tukeiccu vawpaw`ae nynh mimaw mih pyn a sungsah`ae hawmawte mih zu`ae kha a sungsah`ae aho. A zu a sungsahpaw tuh amaw kha a sungsakuh paw nynh thua.
49005029	Pawccecize amaw a ngesaw a hua paw hung sanmah um khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw nynh kriccawbu kha a dooih a kua hawkhate, amaw pyn kha a dooih a kua.
49005030	Pawccecize aening tuh amaw ngesaw kya-e, amaw ru`ae kya-e, te amaw a pyn kya-e`ae nynh athua oh.
49005031	“Hynh-e keiccuze pise nynh a nung te a paaw kha a cciataw cih zah a zu kalan a bekuh cih, te minmin luning tuh ngesaw kheit lang a tang cih`ae.”
49005032	E tuh myarya byakhupaw nynh thua. Thuasalama Kri te kriccawbu kong kha nynh ka ho.
49005033	Tuhzemah nanning lu raveih nynh naemaw na sungsaku oh hawkhate nae zu`ae kha mah sungsah oh. Te zu nynh vawpaw kha sawtua sah.
49006001	Imua`ae, Bawipaw kya nae nung nae paaw`ae kawngae oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh ahmepaw nynh thua.
49006002	Byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw masaty kawpyapaw tuh: “Na nung te na paaw kha sawtua,” acikuh,
49006003	“ou tuhte na hanlan ahoy nawlan, te laephi vawlan asaepi na hiin nawlan nynh thua.”
49006004	Te nanning paaw`ae, nae ccaaw`ae kha thinriasah nan oh, thuasalama Bawipaw kya-e ccangpyanaw te thuiheinaw khate minmin kha cciakhae thung oh.
49006005	See`ae, Kri kawngae hawte, rawrinaw te thyngkute, thinlung thanccingte, pynsaw lante nae bawizua`ae kawngae oh.
49006006	Ccungccaw lungrythuasahpaw hawte, mitmuihnaw kya kyalya kawngaepaw thua leite, thuasalama Kri kya-e see`ae hawte, thinlung kyate Pachia rynaw kha cyite,
49006007	ccungccaw`ae kalan ryalawpyapaw hawte thua leite, Bawipaw ryalawpah paw hawte, ahoypaw thinlung khate ryalawpah oh.
49006008	See athua zemah, a luepaw athua zemah, lukhakheit nynh ahoypaw kha a cyi ze, kha-e kha Bawipaw kyate a mue cih cipaw nyh oh.
49006009	Te nanning bawizua`ae, furawnaw kha sungku te, nae see`ae kha tuhhawte cyih bua oh. Nanning nae Bawipaw mah vaawran kya a um cipaw te amaw tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah maedo khyh cipaw kha nyh oh.
49006010	Nyathyakou ka uno`ae, Bawipaw kya te a thawsaenaw thungnaw kya nae thawsae sah.
49006011	Diabolos hyngpyanaw kha na dou kho nawlan oh Pachia kya-e rhawuccaw khaleih kha lawkuh oh.
49006012	Pawccecize aening tuh ngesaw te chii a hoi paw rhaw te ah doukuh oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama ahang huaccepaw`ae ryte, thungnaw`ae ryte, hynh-e she mohnaw kya-e uktu`ae ryte, vaawran um paw ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae ryte nynh ah doukuh oh.
49006013	Tukeiccu Pachia kya-e rhawuccaw khaleih kha lawkuh oh, ou tuhte athah-aruhpaw nin kya nanning nynh na douku kho nawlan oh, pawpaw balyn phe na thangsah kho nawlan oh te na thadynnua kho nawlan oh.
49006014	Tukeiccu, byaccing athua paw taesung khate nae cce kha cciaku te, te dingnaw athua paw bykhawphua kha zingku te;
49006015	te daenaw athua paw thehoypaw paccynkunaw kha ccukoh lang kohkute;
49006016	kha-e`ae balyn laelan, zynnaw athua paw rhawphua kha ccyngkute varyn thadyn oh; kha-e zynnaw te nynh ahoy leipaw lukheitpaw kya-e maee lang ruapaw thee`ae balyn kha nanning nynh na the kho cih oh.
49006017	Te khumnaw athua paw sivawlukhung te Pachia bya athua paw Muisaw thaloi kha ccyngkuh oh.
49006018	Sawsangnaw phin balynte, ngianaw balynte Muisaw kya sawsang zungzae oh; te mithyaa`ae balyn hanlan taemyasawkunaw balynte, ngianaw balynte ngawrando oh.
49006019	Te thehoypaw kya-e byakhupaw kha nysah khylan`ae, ka khalang hynh rawhoy te ka aw kho nawlan, ho khonaw kha kamaw pya ka thua nawlan, kae ka hanlan mah sawsang oh.
49006020	Tuh-e thehoypaw hanlan kae tuh saw paw kosale ka thua zah kha-e keiccuze sivarui`ae te khii ka thua; tukeiccu ho lan ka ccang hawte kha-e kha rawhoy te ka ho kho nawlan saw oun sangpabua oh.
49006021	Thuasalama kamaw kya acyihkuh paw konglang kha nanning nynh na ny nawlan oh, sungsahpaw uno te Bawipaw kya zyn lan um paw ryalahtu athua paw Taichikas nynh pawpaw balyn kha nanning marya ae la nysah cih oh.
49006022	Alokuhpaw eenaw hanlan amaw kha nae kalan kae saw, ou tuhte nanning nynh kaening konglang kha na ny nawlan oh, te aning nynh nae thinlung kha ngaengansah khylan nynh kae saw.
49006023	Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate daenaw te zynnaw ryte sungsakunaw tuh uteno`ae kyakhe la um sah.
49006024	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha thinlung thanccingte a sungsah`ae paw balyn kya thawccinaw tuh la um sah. Amen.
50001001	Jesu Kri see`ae Paul te Timote nynh Filipi khua um`ae paw, Jesu Kri kya-e mithyaa`ae balyn, dooihtu`ae te kriccaw piccang`ae nae kalan kae beihlang oh.
50001002	Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning tungvaw kya la um sah.
50001003	Nanning liathuinaw takyh kya ka Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
50001004	Nanning balyn hanlan ka sawsangnaw takyh kya lungtuate ngiapyanaw kha pei ka rae.
50001005	Pawccecize, thehoypaw kya nanning na umbuanaw oh paw tuh masaty nin kyate atu cia,
50001006	nanning kya ahoypaw ryalaw phe a tho vae paw Pachia nynh Jesu Kri nin a thua cia kha-e kha a ccingsah cih cite hynh-e uccaw kong kya zynkunaw ka hoi.
50001007	Nanning balyn kong tua lanpaw tuh ka hanlan accanpaw nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize thehoypaw kong thung ka ccawnaw`ae kya thuasah, thehoypaw elan ka thungkhawkunaw kya thuasah, thehoypaw ka tynsanaw kya thuasah nanning balyn tuh kamaw ry thawccinaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua oh keiccu nanning tuh ka thinlung kya na um oh.
50001008	Pawccecize Jesu Kri thawccinaw te nanning balyn kha pawcih babang nynh kae ngae oh cipaw Pachia tuh ka ccaekia nynh thua.
50001009	Te saw ka sang paw tuh nynaw kya te phiathyanaw balyn kya nanning sungsanaw tuh houhouh alungthung nawlan,
50001010	ahoy huaccepaw uccaw`ae kha nanning nynh nae nawccawkhae nawlan, nanning nynh thinlung thanccing na thua nawlan oh, te Kri nin kyacia ccaenaw um leipaw na thua nawlan oh,
50001011	Pachia phu-e nawlan te thehoysah nawlan, Jesu Kri liate athua paw dingnaw kya-e athae`ae khate phe na bia nawlan oh saw ka sang.
50001012	Thuasalama uteno`ae, ka tungvaw acyikuh paw uccaw`ae tuh thehoypaw houh apazaeku nawlan nynh acyiku cipaw kha nyh oh ci ka ry.
50001013	Ou tuhte Kri keiccu kae oun khiinaw`ae paw tuh siapharan inn ngawtu`ae khaleihte tuhlaepaw`ae kalan balyn a langkuh.
50001014	Te Bawipaw kya uteno`ae alunghua tuh, kamaw oun khiinaw`ae paw keiccu zynkunaw oun hoi`ae zah Pachia bya ho lan rawthungnaw houh hoi vae`ae.
50001015	Ccungccaw abang nynh eiungnaw te peku maekunaw lante Kri kong kha a ho ccaccing`ae. Abang nynh mah ahoypaw rynaw lante a ho`ae.
50001016	A hoty`ae paw nynh thinlung ccaccingte thua leite, eikurynaw te, kamaw oun khiinaw`ae kya vawsawnaw khyngchih khylan tuakute mimaw elan eenaw te Kri kong kha a ho`ae.
50001017	Thuasalama nyalang a ho`ae paw nynh kae tuh thehoypaw thungkhawnaw hanlan khang paw nynh thua cipaw nybiate sungsakunaw te nynh a ho`ae.
50001018	Tuhte lanze pawte? Pawpawte a ho`ae zemah, cyisakunaw te thua zemah, tukhyhze thanccingte thua zemah, Kri kong tuh ho athua. Te tuh-e kya kae ka lungtua. Ou, ka lung bua tua ung cih.
50001019	Pawccecize nanning sawsangnaw liate thuasah, Jesu Kri Muisaw bawngnaw liate thuasah, tuh-e`ae tuh kamaw ka lue nawlan yn tang cih cipaw ka ny.
50001020	Kae nynh myaryasangkae ka ngaehoi paw ngaehoinaw thyhte pawpaw kya sanmah kae tuh ka maethah lan khyh. Thuasalama ka raw pei hoy hawte, rawhoynaw balyn ryte hiinnaw te tou, tukhyhze chinaw te tou, atu mah Kri tuh ka pyn kya langsaku athua cih.
50001021	Pawccecize kae ka hanlan ka hiin paw tuh Kri nynh thua, te chi lanpaw tuh amia.
50001022	Thuasalama pynsaw kya kae ka hiin ze, tuh-e tuh ka ryalaw kya-e athae nynh thua, tuhzemah kae nynh pawmou ka poku cih cipaw ka nyh khyh.
50001023	Pawccecize kae tuh ccangning laku areihkunaw kya nynh ka um. Pou lan zah Kri ryte umkheih lan rynaw ka hoi, tuh-e tuh myarya ahoy huapaw nynh thua.
50001024	Tuhzemah pynsaw kya kae ka hiin ung lanpaw tuh nanning hanlan houh ahopaw nynh thua.
50001025	Te hynh-e zynkunaw hynh hoite, nanning lethungnaw hanlan te nae zynnaw kya-e lungtuanaw hanlan kae tuh ka um cih zah nanning balyn ryte ka um ung cih cipaw ka ny.
50001026	Ou tuhte nanning kalan bua kae thuanaw liate, nae kya-e lungtuanaw tuh Jesu Kri kya houh alung nawlan.
50001027	Pawpawte thua zemah nanning nae umtu ziazae tuh Kri kya-e thehoypaw te, angaekuh lante thuasah. Ou tuhte kae kae thua zah nanning kae muih oh ze thuasah, tukhyhze kae ka um khyh ze thuasah, nanning tuh thehoypaw te asekuhpaw zynnaw hanlan tuanaw pynkheihlan na zuakuh oh zah muisaw ccangkheit kya tynkaring lang na thadyn oh cipaw nanning kong kha kae nynh ka thae nawlan.
50001028	Te pawpaw kya sanmah nae rhaw`ae raw kha rih nan oh. Tuh-e tuh minmin hanlan ronawpaw a langsakuh paw muihsanaw nynh thua, thuasalama nanning hanlan tuh khumnaw nynh thua, tuh-e tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua.
50001029	-
50001030	Pawccecize kamaw kya na muih oh paw te atu na thae oh paw alokuhpaw rhawdounaw kha na hoi oh thyhte, amaw kha zyn lanpaw kyalya thua leite, thuasalama amaw hanlan teingbia lanpaw kha Kri ccelang nanning kalan pya athua.
50002001	Tukeiccu Kri kya thawzungpyakunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, sungsakunaw kya-e ngaengannaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, Muisaw kya-e vaeccawkunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, te tuapyanaw thinlung te ngaethyaumsakunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze,
50002002	nanning nae lunglokute alokuhpaw sungsakunaw hoibiate, nawccawkheihnaw te, te tuanawthinlung ccangkheit hoibiate, nanning nynh ka lungtuanaw kha oun ccingsah oh.
50002003	Peku maekurynaw te, tukhyhze accakaepaw pookunaw te pawsang mah cyih nan oh, thuasalama lu raveih nynh mingccang`ae kha amaw laeze ahoy huapaw lante zakawsangsakunaw thinlung te tua sah.
50002004	Ccungccaw miakaw nynh maw rya kyalya kha roihku leite mingccang`ae rya kha mah roihbia sah.
50002005	Kri Jesu kya a um paw hynh-e tuanaw-thinlung hynh nanning kya mah la um sah.
50002006	Kri tuh Pachia muinsan phang a ke pite, Pachia ryte nginku khylan kha-e kha luadeku lante tuakuh khyh.
50002007	Thuasalama amaw te amaw kha accakaepaw lang a raeku. Amaw tungvaw see muinsan kha lawkuh zah ccungccaw alo lante yn pui.
50002008	Ccungccaw muinsan kya muih athua, amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsakuh zah chinaw kyacia, vaelantung kya-e chinaw ccaccei kyacia kaw a ngae.
50002009	Tukeiccu Pachia nynh mah amaw kha kou hangthung zah min balyn laeze alesae huapaw min kha amaw a pya.
50002010	Ou tuhte vaawran um`ae paw, laephi vaw um`ae paw te lae kaw um`ae paw miakaw nynh Jesu min kya ccukharu a tung cih`ae zah,
50002011	Paaw Pachia phu-e nawlan khalang miakaw nynh Jesu Kri tuh Bawipaw nynh thua cite a ci cih`ae.
50002012	Tukeiccu ka sungsah`ae paw, kamaw ka um lya kyalya thua leite, nanning nynh kaw pei na ngae oh hawte, atu kamaw ka um khyhnaw kya houh kawngae te, rinaw te thyngkunaw te naemaw khumnaw elan ryalah oh.
50002013	Pawccecize amaw lungrythuapaw ahoypaw kha ry lan te cyi lan nanning kya ryalah paw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
50002014	Ccohku leite, eiku leite pawpaw balyn kha cyih oh.
50002015	Ou tuhte a lungkou paw te a ccouseikuh paw minphuin`ae laku kya nanning tuh ccaenaw um leipaw, seibe lan um leipaw, thuihei aho leipaw, Pachia ccaaw`ae na thua nawlan oh, kha-e`ae laku laephipi kya nanning tuh awnaw`ae hawte na aw oh.
50002016	Hiinnaw bya kha varyn kyngkuh oh; ou tuhte kae tuh alakaw lang ka ccuehang khyh cipaw, alakaw lang rya ka lahhan khyh cipaw kha Kri nin kya ka lungtua nawlan nynh thua.
50002017	Athua, nae zynnaw ryalawnaw te silawnaw vawlan kae tuh nia lan pyapaw-uccaw ka thua heize, ka lungtua zah nanning balyn ryte ka lungtua cih.
50002018	Tuhhawte nanning mah lungtua oh, kamaw ryte lungtua oh.
50002019	Thuasalama aro mawze Timote kha nanning kalan saw lan Bawipaw Jesu kha ka doliakuh, ou tuhte nanning kong kha he ka nyh te kae mah ka ngaengan nawlan.
50002020	Pawccecize aning nynh nanning thanenaw hanlan lungthyaa te dooih rynaw a hoi hawte alokuhpaw tuanaw a hoi paw ccungccaw hung san ka hoi khyh.
50002021	Pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh Jesu Kri kya-e uccaw`ae kha ccung khyh`ae, mimaw kya-e nynh a ccungku`ae.
50002022	Thuasalama ccapaw nynh paaw ryte rya a law hawte, Timote tuh thehoypaw ryalaw kya kamaw ryte ryalah paw nynh thua cipaw amaw kya-e ccaekia langsakupaw kha na ny oh.
50002023	Tukeiccu kamaw kya pawte nynh acyiku cipaw ccahe ka nyh tuh, amaw kha nae kalan palou saw lan ka ngaehoi.
50002024	Thuasalama kae kamaw mah aro mawze nae kalan kae thua cih cite Bawipaw kha ka doliakuh.
50002025	Tuhzemah ryalaw kya kamaw te kae mungkuhpaw, kamaw kya a zuikuh bua paw, rhawkaw hawte athua paw, ka ho ka bounaw kya rya yn lawpatupaw, nanning nae zeccuetu athua paw ka neitaw Epafroditas kha nanning kalan saw lan aho cite ka tuaku.
50002026	Pawccecize aning tuh kou accih cipaw kha nanning nynh phe na thae oh keiccu, aning nynh nanning balyn kha ae ngae oh zah a lungria kou thae.
50002027	Pawccecize aning tuh vya chih lang a ccih ccaccing; thuasalama Pachia nynh amaw kha ngaethya a umsah. Amaw kyalya ngaethya a umsah paw thua leite, ngaethyanaw vawlan ngaethyanaw ka hoi khyh nawlan kamaw mah ngaethya yn umsah.
50002028	Tukeiccu amaw kha he bua na muih oh te nae lungtua nawlan, te kae mah ka ngaethyapaw a zyahua nawlan nynh thawte zuakute amaw kha kae saw.
50002029	Tukeiccu lungtuanaw balyn ryte Bawipaw kya amaw kha lehkhan oh; te khatahaw`ae paw kha sawtua-muintuanaw la pya oh.
50002030	Pawccecize nanning nynh kamaw nae dooihnaw oh na bou oh paw kha ccingsapya khylan aning tuh a hiinnaw kha duaku leite, Kri ryalaw keiccuze vya a chibia.
50003001	Nyathyakou lang ka horypaw tuh ka uteno`ae, Bawipaw kya lungtua oh. Phe alokuhpaw nanning kalan bua zei lanpaw tuh ka hanlan pawtua um khyh, thuasalama kha-e tuh nae hanlan khynnaw nynh athua.
50003002	Ui`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, mih ngesaw a awkuh`ae paw kha la raeringkuh oh.
50003003	Pawccecize aening tuh Muisaw kya Pachia beik`ae paw, Kri Jesu kya lungtua`ae paw, te pynsaw kya zynkunaw a hoi lei`ae paw, vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
50003004	Tuhzemah kae mah pynsaw kya zynkunaw ka hoi paw nynh ka thua. Mingccangpaw lukhakheit nynh pynsaw kya doliaku lanpaw ka hoi cite a tuaku lanze, kae tuh houh ka hoi;
50003005	nin taryanaw kya vindung awkuh paw, Israel minphuin, Benjamin ciihan, Hebru`ae kyaze Hebrupaw, Kawbya te asekuh lante Farasipaw;
50003006	eih rynaw thinlung te asekuh lante kriccawbu a tua a sah paw; Kawbya kya um paw dingnaw te asekuh lante ccaenaw um leipaw nynh ka thua.
50003007	Thuasalama ka hanlan athanepaw kha-e`ae kha Kri keiccuze shungnawpaw lang nynh ka tua vae.
50003008	Athua, ka Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynaw ahoy huaccepaw elan pawpaw balyn kha mah shungnawpaw lang ka tua, kae nynh Kri kha ka mue nawlan amaw hanlan pawpaw balyn kha marya ka shung zah kha-e`ae kha ia lang nynh ka ria,
50003009	te kae tuh amaw kya muih ka thua nawlan, Kawbya kya a um paw kamaw dingnaw kha ka hoi khyh, thuasalama Kri zynnaw liate a muekuh paw dingnaw, zynnaw liate athua paw Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha nynh ka hoi.
50003010	Ou tuhte kae nynh amaw kha thuasah, a thothuinaw kya-e thungnaw kha thuasah, a teingnaw neethungku buanaw kha thuasah ka ny nawlan, a chinaw kya amaw ka lobua nawlan,
50003011	a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kalan pawpawte zemah ka phyabua nawlan ka ry.
50003012	Phe ka phahbua vae cipaw thua khyh; phe ka ccing vae cipaw mah ka thua khyh; thuasalama Kri Jesu nynh yn kyngnuathepaw hanlan kae nynh kha-e kha ka kyng nawlan ka deesui.
50003013	Uteno`ae phe ka kyng vae cite kamaw te kamaw ka tuakuh khyh, thuasalama ka cyi paw ccangkheit tuh nuhlang-e uccaw`ae kha ningte, malang um paw uccaw`ae kha phyate,
50003014	Kri Jesu kya luki lang-e Pachia konaw te asekuhpaw zuakunaw te mue paw lasung hanlan eenaw kuetung kalan ka ccuebua.
50003015	Tukeiccu piccang athua vae paw miakaw nynh khahtahawpaw tuanaw-thinlung kha hoi oh sih; te ccangkhakheit kya nanning nynh ccanglang te na tua oh ze, kha-e maw kha Pachia nynh nae kalan ae phypah cih oh.
50003016	Tuhzemah phe ah phya vae oh paw kalan khe, alokuhpaw phung thyhte cceih oh sih, alokuhpaw tuanawthinlung hoi oh sih.
50003017	Uteno`ae, kamaw thydokuh`ae paw thua oh, dosuinku lanpaw kaening hynh nae hoi vae oh thyhte, ou khate a hiin`ae paw kha la dokuh oh.
50003018	Pawccecize ccungccaw patae tuh Kri kya-e vaelantung rhaw`ae nynh thua`ae, tuhte a hiin`ae cipaw, minmin kong kha langmaw pei kae hopah vae oh zah atu mitphi te kae hopya ki oh.
50003019	Kha-e`ae athangnaw tuh ronaw nynh thua, mih pachia tuh mih vuebua nynh thua, mih phu-enaw tuh mih maethyanaw kya nynh thua, laephi uccaw`ae kha nynh mih thinlung kya a um.
50003020	Thuasalama aening ram ccungccawthuanaw tuh vaawran kya nynh thua. Tuin kyate yn thua lanpaw Khumtu Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha aening nynh mah ah ngaw oh.
50003021	Pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw nung lan aning tuh a cyih kho, kha-e liate a ryalawnaw thyhte a nyaapaw aening pyn hynh aphu-epaw amaw pyn alo lante yn rulae cih.
50004001	Tukeiccu ka lungtuanaw te ka suilukhung na thua oh paw, kou ka sungsah`ae zah kou ka ngae`ae paw, ka uno`ae, Bawipaw kya tynkaring lang thadyn oh, kou ka sungsah`ae paw.
50004002	Bawipaw kya tuanawthinlung aloku nawlan`ae Euodia kha thawte ka ngia zah Syntykhe kha mah thawte ka ngia.
50004003	Te ahmepaw ryalahkheihtu nang kha mah kae ngia; kamaw ry, Klement ry, te hiinnaw ccauh kya mih min um`ae paw tuhlaepaw kamaw ry ryalahkheihtu`ae ryte, thehoypaw ryalawnaw kya ryalahbua`ae paw nopi`ae kha la bawng`ae.
50004004	Bawipaw kya pei lungtua oh. Bua kae ho hin, lungtua oh!
50004005	Nae lungnenaw kha ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nyh`ae sah. Bawipaw tuh nae pe a um.
50004006	Pawpaw elan sanmah nae thinphang nan sah; thuasalama pawpaw balyn kya lungtuabya hote, sawsangnaw te ngianaw liate na ngiaku ry oh paw kha Pachia kalan nysah oh.
50004007	Te thaethyanaw balyn nynh a phya kho leipaw Pachia kya-e daenaw nynh Jesu Kri liate nae thinlung`ae te nae tuanaw`ae kha ae khynsah cih oh.
50004008	Nyathyakou lang uteno`ae, ahmepaw, sawtua lan um paw, adingpaw, athyaa-accipaw, ry lan um paw, thehoyccousah lan um paw; ccangkhakheit tuh aphute lanze, thehoysah lan angaeku lanze, kha-e`ae kha nae thinlung kya la tua oh.
50004009	Te nanning nynh kamaw kya phe na ccangkuh vae oh zah phe na lawku vae oh paw, phe na thae vae oh zah na muih vae oh paw, kha-e`ae kha la cyih oh, te daenaw Pachia tuh nanning kya a um cih.
50004010	Thuasalama atu nyathya kya kamaw nae dooihnaw oh paw tuh paepae bua alui pawte kae tuh Bawipaw kya myarya ka lungtua; nae la dooih oh zemah ccyhhoypaw na la mue khyh oh.
50004011	Ka ho ka bou keiccuze ka hopaw thua khyh, pawccecize kae tuh pawtahawpaw kya ka um zemah lungccingkhaeku lan phe ka ccangku vae.
50004012	Nyaasaku zia ka thya zah hoirung zia ka thya; vueso lan thuasah, vuelaw lan thuasah, hoirung lan te ryachi teing lan, teitei balyn kya te pawpaw balyn kya kae tuh ccangpya ka thua vae.
50004013	Kamaw thawzung yn pyatupaw Kri liate pawpaw balyn kha ka cyi kho.
50004014	Tuhzemah ka vawsawnaw na neethungku bua oh paw tuh kou hoy lang phe na cyi vae oh.
50004015	Thehoypaw hopaw athotakaw lya, Mesidonia ram kyate he ka pou lyakha, pyanaw te muenaw kya nanning holeite teitei-e kriccawbu nynh sanmah kamaw ryte neethungkuh bua khyh cipaw kha nanning Filipi`ae nynh mah na ny oh.
50004016	Pawccecize Thesalonika khua ka um lya heize, ka hanlan ahoboupaw kha vaekheit kyalya thua leite, bua nae ky oh.
50004017	Lasung kha ka ccungkupaw thua khyh, thuasalama na ccykunaw oh kya paepae aluipaw amia kha nynh kae ccungpya oh.
50004018	Thuasalama kae tuh pawpaw balyn ka hoi zah ka hoirung. Amynkhuhpaw, Pachia lungrythuasahpaw, douccahpaw silawkunaw athua paw, nanning nynh nae ky oh paw uccaw`ae kha Epafroditas kyate ka mue zah phe beih lang ka hoi.
50004019	Thuasalama ka Pachia nynh a phu-enaw kya a hoirungnaw thyhte nanning kya-e ahoboupaw balyn kha Kri Jesu liate ae pya cih oh.
50004020	Atu ah Paaw Pachia tuh zungzae te zungzae cia phu-esah. Amen.
50004021	Kri Jesu kya um paw mithyaa`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh. Kamaw ryte a um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
50004022	Mithyaa`ae balyn nynh ae beihlang oh, abapi lante Sizar inn kya um`ae paw nynh ae beihlang oh.
50004023	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um sah. Amen.
51001001	Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw kae, Paul te kae unopaw Timote nynh,
51001002	Kolosa kya um`ae paw mithyaa`ae te Kri kya zyn lan um paw uteno`ae kalan kae beihlang oh. Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah!
51001003	-
51001004	Nanning nynh Kri Jesu na zyn oh cipaw te mithyaa`ae balyn kha na sungsah oh cipaw kha kaening nynh he kae thae tuh nanning hanlan pei sawsang te, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw athua paw Pachia kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
51001005	Thehoypaw kya-e byaccing bya kha langmaw lya nanning nynh na thae oh pawte, vaawran kya nanning hanlan nungpya athua paw ngaehoinaw kha na hoi oh.
51001006	Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh laephipi balyn kya po pazaeku vae hawte nanning kalan mah yn thua. Byaccing kya Pachia kya-e thawccinaw na nyh oh zah kha-e na thae oh nin kyate nanning kya mah athae thae hawte, teitei kya balyn athae kha a poukhae.
51001007	Kae sungsahpaw rya kae lahkheihtupaw, Epafras kyate nanning mah phe na ccangkuh vae oh thyhte, aning tuh nanning hanlan Kri kya-e zyn lan um paw ryalahtu nynh thua.
51001008	Muisaw kyate na sungsakunaw oh paw kong kha kaening kalan aning nynh oun hopya.
51001009	Hynh-e keiccu kaening mah kha-e kae thae nin te nanning hanlan saw pei kae sangpah oh, te hawnaw balyn kya amaw rynaw nynaw te muisaw lante thaethyanaw te phe na bia nawlan oh saw kae sangpya oh.
51001010	Ou tuhte ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya pung liate, Pachia nynaw kya lethungte pawpaw balyn kya a lungrythua lante Bawipaw te angaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh;
51001011	lungtuanaw ryte pawpaw kya balyn ngaesang kho nawlan te lungsae nawlan, alesaepaw a thungnaw thyhte, thawzung khaleih te thawsaesah na thua nawlan oh saw kae sangpya oh.
51001012	Mithyaa`ae kya-e rho uccaw kha awnaw kya a neethungkuh bua`ae paw lang aening yn raetupaw Paaw kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
51001013	Amaw nynh mohnaw kawhoinaw kyate aening kha poh oun thua zah a sungsahpaw a Ccapaw kya-e peenaw lungkhu lang aening kha oun teesah.
51001014	Ccapaw a chiise liate nynh seingaethyanaw athuapaw sawkhawnaw kha aening ah mue oh.
51001015	Ccapaw tuh muih kho leipaw Pachia muinsan nynh thua, rae paw balyn kyaze ccatawccaaw nynh thua.
51001016	Pawccecize vaawran kya um paw, te laephi vaw um paw, muih khopaw te muih kho leipaw, suitungkhung`ae te ukkunaw`ae, lupi huacce thuanaw`ae te kawhoinaw`ae, pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate rae thua`ae zah amaw hanlan nynh thua.
51001017	Te pawpaw balyn a um mawze aning tuh um zah pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate nynh a um.
51001018	Aning tuh kriccawbu athua paw pyn kya-e lu nynh thua. Pawpaw balyn kya aning tuh ahang huaccepaw athua nawlan, athotakawnaw thua zah a chih`ae paw kyaze ccatawccaaw nynh thua.
51001019	Pawccecize pawpaw balyn ccingnaw tuh Ccapaw kya a um lanpaw kha Paaw a lungrythua.
51001020	Laephi kya um paw uccaw`ae thuasah, vaawran kya um paw uccaw`ae thuasah pawpaw balyn kha Ccapaw liate Pachia te bua ccawsakuthui khylan a vaelantung kya-e a chiise liate rhaw daenaw kha a rae.
51001021	Te langmaw lya nanning tuh Pachia te na la ccawkuh lei oh paw, ahoy leipaw ryalaw`ae keiccuze nae tuanaw-thinlung kya rhaw`ae nynh na la thua oh paw,
51001022	tuhzemah atu tuh nanning kha athyaapaw, ccaenaw um leipaw, douccahpaw lante amaw malang thuakhae khylan chinaw liate amaw pyn kya phe ae ccawsakuthui vae oh.
51001023	Nanning nynh zynnaw kya na bingkuh oh zah pia leite po na tyn oh ze, te vaawran zakaw um paw rae paw miakaw kalan ho athua vae paw, nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw, thehoypaw kya-e ngaehoinaw kyate na nueku khyh oh ze, amaw kalan ae thuakhae cih oh; kae Paul tuh tuh-e thehoypaw hanlan ryalahtu lang rae paw nynh ka thua.
51001024	Nanning hanlan vawsaw ka teingnaw kya atu ka lungtua. Te kriccawbu athua paw amaw pyn hanlan Kri vawsaw teingnaw kya aboupaw kha ka pynsaw kya ka ccingsah.
51001025	Pachia bya ccingsah khylan nanning hanlan kamaw pya athua paw Pachia kya-e synriatuthuanaw thyhte kae tuh kha-e kriccawbu hanlan ryalahtu lang rae ka thua.
51001026	Tuh-e byakhupaw tuh she`ae kya te ciihan`ae kya thuru a la thua, thuasalama atu tuh amaw mithyaa`ae kalan langsapya athua vae.
51001027	Zenta`ae laku hynh-e byakhupaw kya-e phu-enaw hoirungnaw kha mithyaa`ae nysah lan Pachia nynh a ry; tuh-e byakhupaw hoirungnaw tuh phuenaw kya-e ngaehoinaw athua paw, nanning kya a um paw Kri kha nynh thua.
51001028	Kri Jesu kya accingpaw lang ccungccaw miakaw kha kaening nynh kae thuakhae nawlan, ccungccaw miakaw kha raeringnaw pyate, hawnaw balyn ryte ccangpyate Kri kong kha kaening nynh kae ho.
51001029	Hynh-e eenaw hanlan kae mah rya ka lah, kamaw kya myarya athung lante ryalah paw a ryalawnaw thyhte thawte ka zuakuh.
51002001	Nanning hanlan, te Laodisia khua kya um`ae paw hanlan, te pynsaw kya ka mae oun muih boi lei`ae paw patae hanlan, pawcih alepaw rawsekunaw nynh ka hoi cipaw na ny oh ka ry.
51002002	Ou tuhte sungsakunaw kya pynkheihlan kheleku te, Paaw kya-e te Kri kya-e athua paw, Pachia kya-e byakhupaw nynaw kalan te thaethyanaw kya-e khaleih lungngaengankhaekunaw kalan phya khylan mih thinlung`ae tuh thawzungpya athua nawlan ka ry.
51002003	Kri kya hawnaw sisua`ae te nynaw sisua`ae balyn tuh thuru athua.
51002004	Hung ccungccaw nynh san soihpaw bya`ae te nanning kha ae ling khyh nawlan oh e hynh kae hopya oh.
51002005	Pawccecize kae tuh pynsaw lante nanning ryte ka umbua khyh zemah muisaw kya nanning ryte ka um. Nanning nynh angaekuh lante na cyi oh paw te Kri kya nae zynnaw a tynkaringpaw kha ka muih zah ka lungtua.
51002006	Tukeiccu Kri Jesu Bawipaw kha nanning nynh phe na lawku vae oh hawte, amaw kya hiin ccavae oh.
51002007	Amaw kya na bingkuh oh zah tynsathung na thua oh, te nanning tuh ccangpya na thua vae oh hawte, zynnaw kya tyn oh lah lungtuabya hote zynnaw kya phe biate amaw kya hiin oh.
51002008	Kri ccangpyanaw thyhte thua leite, ccungccaw`ae phung thyhte zui zah laephipi e atakaw phung`ae thyhte a zui paw, laephi thyahawnaw te accakaepaw lingkunaw`ae khate hung ccungccaw nynh san ae ro khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh.
51002009	Pawccecize Pachiathuanaw ccingnaw balyn tuh Kri kya nynh pynsaw lante a um.
51002010	Lupi huaccenaw te kawhoinaw balyn kyaze lu athua paw, amaw kya nanning tuh ccingsah na thua oh.
51002011	Kri kya-e vindung awkunaw liate pynsaw kya-e seinaw pyn kha khahku te, kuih te rae leipaw vindung awkunaw khate nanning mah amaw kya vindung aw na thua oh.
51002012	Baptisma kya Kri ryte na uhkuh bua oh. Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Pachia kya-e ryalawnaw zynnaw liate amaw ryte nanning mah na thothui bua oh.
51002013	Te nae seinaw kya te pynsaw vindung awku leinaw kya na chih oh paw nanning kha Kri ryte pynkheihlan Pachia nynh ae hiinsah oh, na cyiseimenaw oh balyn kha ae ngaethya oh.
51002014	Aening oun rawsepaw te ah rhawpaw athua paw, kuih te zei paw kawpyapaw`ae kha marya a the; te kha-e kha cciakhae zah vaelantung kya phe a khiade vae.
51002015	Lupi huaccenaw`ae te kawhoinaw`ae kha marya khah zah raerae alangkuh lan maethyasah`ae, te vaelantung liate kha-e`ae kha phe a tae kou.
51002016	Tukeiccu aenaw kya, nianaw kya, athyaapaw nin sungnaw kya, sawpaw adiapaw sungnaw kya, tukhyhze Sabbath nin sungnaw kya, hung nynh san bya ae la pia nan oh sah.
51002017	Kha-e`ae tuh yn thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae kya-e mynlyh nynh thua`ae; thuasalama accaccingpaw tuh Kri kya-e nynh thua.
51002018	Ahme leipaw zakawsangsakunaw kya te vaaw ccungccaw`ae beiknaw kya lungrythua te, hung nynh san nae ryalaw mee kha ae la ling nan oh sah; tuh-e paw tuh a pynsaw tuanaw-thinlung liate accakaepaw kya a tansakuh paw, a muih leipaw uccaw`ae kalan a teenua paw,
51002019	lu kha varyn a kyngkuh leipaw nynh thua. Lu kyate pyn balyn tuh kuaa thua zah rukhua atungkunaw`ae kyate pynkheihlan a khelekuh`ae, Pachia kya-e lethungnaw te a lethung`ae.
51002020	-
51002021	Tukeiccu laephipi kya-e atakaw phung`ae kyate nanning tuh Kri ryte na chi vae oh thua ze, laephipi kya phang na um oh paw hawte, pawccemou, “Hae nan, tangtua nan, kyng nan,” acikuh paw phungbya`ae kalan na ahku oh?
51002022	Kha-e`ae balyn tuh ccungccaw`ae ccangpyanaw te kawpyapaw`ae thyhte, mangnaw ryte azo cih paw uccaw`ae te asekuhpaw nynh thua.
51002023	Kha-e`ae tuh mawtemaw raekupaw beiknaw kya, te ahme leipaw zakawsangsakunaw kya hawnaw langkunaw a hoi ccaccing, te pyn kha pawlangria khyh; tuhzemah pynsaw lung rynaw kha rawsete pawpaw lang um khyh`ae.
51003001	Oute nanning tuh Kri ryte phe na thothui bua vae oh thua ze, Pachia ranglang Kri dahungnaw kya um paw vaawran lang-e uccaw`ae kha ccung oh.
51003002	Vaawran lang-e uccaw`ae kya nae tuanaw-thinlung kha nung oh, laephi uccaw`ae kya nung nan oh.
51003003	Pawccecize nanning tuh na chih oh zah nae hiinnaw tuh Kri ryte Pachia kya thuru athua.
51003004	Aening hiinnaw athua paw, Kri he yn langkuh te, nanning mah phu-enaw kya amaw ryte nae langkuh bua vae cih oh.
51003005	Tukeiccuze ohhuakunaw, nungsikunaw, sungku kho leipaw rynaw, ahoy leipaw duanaw, zohtuhbeiknaw athua paw karangkunaw cikuh`ae paw laephi vawlan um paw nae pyn kya-e`ae kha chisah oh.
51003006	Khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae keiccu nynh Pachia thinrianaw tuh kawngae leipaw ccaaw`ae tungvaw khe a thua.
51003007	Kha-e`ae kya na um lya oh, nanning mah kha-e`ae kya nynh na la hiin oh.
51003008	Thuasalama atu hynh-e`ae balyn: thinrianaw, bungpawnaw, thinlung hoy leipaw, thethyahonaw, nae khalang kyate anungsikuhpaw bya hopaw kha la vua oh.
51003009	Ccungccaw rynpaw te a cyisahnaw`ae kha phe na vua vae oh thyhte lukheit te lukheit hyngpakuh nan oh.
51003010	Te amaw a raetupaw muinsan lonaw thyhte, nynaw kya thawsathui athua paw ccungccaw thawpaw kha phe na lawkuh vae oh paw nynh na thua oh.
51003011	Tuh-e thawsathuinaw kya Greek ci um khyh, Jew ci um khyh, vindung awkuhpaw ci um khyh, vindung awkuh leipaw ci um khyh, barbariapaw ci um khyh, Saithiapaw ci um khyh, see ci um khyh, a luepaw ci um khyh; thuasalama Kri tuh pawpaw tynre thua zah pawpaw tynre kya balyn a um.
51003012	Tukeiccuze Pachia nynh popaw, athyaapaw te sungsahpaw na thua oh hawte, ngaethya-umsanaw, thawccikunaw, zakawsangsakunaw, lungnenaw, lungsaenaw kha lawkuh oh.
51003013	Lukhakheit nynh mingccangpaw kha rawsete byaeikunaw a hoi lanze, lukheit te lukheit ngaesangpyakute, lukheit te lukheit ngaethyakute, Kri nynh nanning kha ae ngaethya vae oh hawte, khahawte nanning mah la cyih bua oh.
51003014	Hynh-e`ae balyn laelan ccingnaw kya-e sueluakunaw athua paw sungsakunaw kha lawkuh oh.
51003015	Te Pachia kya-e daenaw nynh nae thinlung kha ae la uk oh sah; tuh-e khylan nynh nanning mah pyn pynkheit kya ko na thua oh; te lungtuabya hothya oh.
51003016	Kri bya tuh hawnaw tynre te nanning kya phe beih lang la um sah. Bawipaw kalan nae thinlung kya thawccinaw ryte law sahte, sam law`ae, thehoynaw law`ae te muisaw law`ae kya lukheit te lukheit ccangpyakute raeringnaw pyakuh oh.
51003017	Te bya na ho oh zemah, ryalaw na law oh zemah, Bawipaw Jesu min liate pawpaw balyn kha cyih oh lah amaw liate Paaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho oh.
51003018	Zu`ae, Bawipaw kya angaekuhpaw athua hawte naemaw te naemaw kha nae vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh oh.
51003019	Vawpaw`ae, nae zu`ae kha sungsah oh lah mih tungvaw eih rua ro paw thua nan oh.
51003020	Ccaaw`ae, pawpaw balyn kya nae nungpaaw`ae kaw la ngae oh. Pawccecize hynh-e tuh Bawipaw a lungry paw nynh thua.
51003021	Paaw`ae, nae ccaaw`ae kha thinriasah nan oh, mih lung oun rohsei cih.
51003022	See`ae, ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasahpaw hawte thua leite, mitmuihnaw lante kyalya thua leite, Pachia rawrite, thinlungphei leite pynsaw lante nae bawi nae zua`ae kaw kha pawpaw balyn kya la ngae oh.
51003023	Ccungccaw`ae rya a lah paw hawte thua leite, Bawipaw rya a lah paw hawte pawpaw na cyi oh zemah thinlung ccaccingte cyih oh.
51003024	Rho uccaw athua paw ryalaw mee kha Bawipaw kyate na mue cih oh cipaw kha nyh oh. Pawccecize nanning tuh Kri Bawipaw rya nynh na law oh.
51003025	Thuasalama aseipaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh a cyi paw hanlan kha pyaru athua cih; laesakunaw cipaw um khyh.
51004001	Bawizua`ae, nanning mah vaawran kya um paw Bawi kae hoi cipaw nyte, atazaepaw te atekuhpaw ryalaw mee kha nae see`ae kha pya oh.
51004002	Sawsangnaw kalan tyty pyakuh oh lah lungtuabya hote ngaw oh.
51004003	Kri kya-e byakhupaw kha kae ho nawlan, ho khonaw thuakaw kha Pachia nynh oun hungpya nawlan kaening hanlan mah saw oun la sangpah oh; kha-e byakhupaw keiccuze kae tuh sivarui te khii ka thua.
51004004	Kae nynh ho lan ka ccan thyhte kha-e byakhupaw kha ka langsaku nawlan, saw oun la sangpah bua oh.
51004005	Accyh kha sawkhawku te, atolang-e ccungccaw`ae kya hawnaw te la um oh.
51004006	Ccungccaw miakaw kha pawcihte nynh khung lan cipaw na ny nawlan oh, nae byaho tuh thawccinaw ryte loi te pei la ekhaekuh sah.
51004007	Bawipaw kya zyn lan um paw te rya kae lahkheihpaw, sungsahpaw ka neitaw Taichikas nynh ka konglang balyn kha nae kalan ae la hopah cih oh.
51004008	Ou kha-e eenaw khylan nynh amaw kha nae kalan kae saw. Ou tuhte aning nynh nae konglang kha a ny nawlan te nae thinlung kha ngaengansah nawlan nynh kae saw.
51004009	Nanning kyaze lukheit athua paw, zyn lan um paw te sungsahpaw ka neitaw Onesimas ryte kae saw`ae. Minmin nynh e kya acyikuh paw balyn kha ae nysah cih oh.
51004010	Kamaw ryte thung kae ccahkheih paw Aristarkhas te Barnabas a ccianung ccapaw Markas te Justas acikuh paw Jesu nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh. Markas konglang nanning bya kae tawsya vae oh. Nae kalan yn thua ze amaw kha leh la khan oh.
51004011	Minmin tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh thua. Minmin kyalya nynh Pachia peenaw hanlan rya kae lahkheihtu`ae te kamaw ngae yn ngansatu`ae athua.
51004012	Nanning lakuze lukheit athua paw, Kri seepaw Epafras nynh ae beihlang oh. Nanning nynh phe ccing lan na thadyn nawlan oh, te Pachia rynaw balyn kya phe na bia nawlan oh aning nynh nae hanlan thawte saw pei ae sangpya oh.
51004013	Nanning hanlan te Laodisia khua um`ae paw, te Hierapolis khua kya um`ae paw hanlan aning tuh lungthonaw alepi a hoi cipaw kae nynh ccaekia ka khan.
51004014	Sungsahpaw sibawi Luka te Demas nynh ae beihlang oh.
51004015	Laodisia khua kya um`ae paw uno`ae te Nymphas te a inn kya um paw kriccawbu kha la beihlang oh.
51004016	Te hynh-e ccaky hynh nanning laku he na ria oh koute Laodisia kriccawbu kya mah la riasah bua oh. Te tuhhawte Laodisia kyate mue paw ccaky kha mah nanning nynh la riabua oh.
51004017	Te Arkhippas kha, “Bawipaw kya na mue paw ryalaw kha na thangsah nawlan, la raeringkuh,” cite la hopah oh.
51004018	E beihlangnaw hynh Paul ka kuih te nynh ka zei. Kamaw oun khiinaw`ae paw kha la liathui oh. Thawccinaw tuh nae kya la um sah. Amen.
52001001	Paul, Sailas te Timote nynh Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya a um paw Thesalon khua e kriccawbu kha kae beihlang oh. Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah!
52001002	Nanning balyn hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho, kae sawsangnaw kya nanning kha pei kae hobia oh.
52001003	Ah Paaw Pachia malang, nae zynnaw kya-e na cyisahnaw oh, te sungsakunaw kya-e na zuakunaw oh, te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya ngaehoinaw kya-e ngaesangnaw kha tyty kae liathui.
52001004	Sungsahpaw uteno`ae, Pachia kya-e nanning ponaw kha kae ny.
52001005	Pawccecize kaening kya-e thehoypaw tuh nae kalan bya kyalya te yn thua khyh, thuasalama nanning hanlan kaening tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha na ny vae oh hawte, thungnaw te Thyaa Muisaw te phe ny ccaccingnaw ryte nynh yn thua.
52001006	Te nanning tuh vawsawnaw patae teingbiate, Thyaa Muisaw kya-e lungtuanaw ryte Pachia bya kha na lawkuh oh zah kaening thydokuh`ae paw te Bawipaw thydokuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
52001007	Tukeiccuze Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kya a zyn`ae paw balyn hanlan nanning tuh dosuinku lan um`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
52001008	Pawccecize nanning kyate Bawipaw bya roi tuh Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kya kyalya ccae khyh, thuasalama Pachia na zynnaw oh paw tuh ahmin takyh kya mah pung pazaekuh vae, tukeiccu kaening nynh pawpaw sanmah kae ho ho vae khyh.
52001009	Pawccecize kaening nynh nae kalan pawcihte nynh kae tee cipaw kaening konglang kha minmin nynh a ho`ae, te hiin zah ahmepaw Pachia ryalawpya khylan zohtuh`ae kyate Pachia kalan pawcihte nynh na paleihku oh cipaw,
52001010	yn thua lanpaw thinrianaw kyate aening kha yn luesatupaw Jesu, Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw, vaawran kyate yn thua cih paw a Ccapaw ngaw lanpaw kha a ho`ae.
52002001	Uteno`ae, nae kalan kaening nynh kae tee paw tuh accakaepaw thua khyh cipaw kha naemaw ccaccei nynh na ny oh.
52002002	Nanning nynh na ny oh hawte kaening tuh Filipi khua kya langmaw kae teing zah maethya oun law`ae koute rawsenaw pataepi ryte Pachia kha doliakute, Pachia thehoypaw kha nanning kalan rawhoy te kae ho.
52002003	Pawccecize kae hynaw oh paw tuh lingkunaw, nungsikunaw te pheekunaw kyate thua khyh.
52002004	Thuasalama thehoypaw kha zyn lan um lante ho khylan Pachia nynh nawccawkhaepaw kae thua thyhte, ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasahpaw hawte thua leite, kae thinlung oun syntawtupaw Pachia lungry thyhte nynh kae ho.
52002005	Pawccecize nanning nynh na ny oh hawte, kaening nynh lunglebya ho paw kha vaekhakheit san kae mang boi khyh, a karangku nawlan cyiruhnaw thinlung mah kae hoi khyh, Pachia tuh kae ccaekia nynh thua.
52002006	Kri kya-e locceihtu`ae kae thua hawte, hoku lanpaw kae hoi zemah, ccungccaw`ae kya phu-enaw kha kae ccungkuh khyh, nanning kya mah, mingccang`ae kya mah kae ccungkuh khyh.
52002007	Thuasalama oihtunung nynh a ccaaw`ae kha a oihsah`ae hawte nanning laku kaening tuh kae nevyalya.
52002008	Nanning tuh kou sungsah lan na um oh keiccuze myarya kae ngae oh, Pachia thehoypaw kyalya kha thua leite, kae hiinnaw hei kha neethung lan kae lungrythua.
52002009	Pawccecize uteno`ae, kae ryalaw te thawbangte rya kae law paw kha na ny oh. Nanning lukhakheit hanlan sanmah phuripaw kae thua khyh nawlan, khuazi khuadae ryalawku biate Pachia thehoypaw kha nae kalan kae hopya oh.
52002010	A zyn`ae paw nanning laku kaemaw te kaemaw kha thyaararih lang, dingrarih lante ccaenaw um lei lante pawcihte nynh kae hiin cipaw nanning tuh ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh, te Pachia mah ccaekia nynh thua.
52002011	Paaw nynh a ccaaw`ae kya a cyi hawte, kaening nynh nanning milu raveih kha pawcihte nynh kae hy oh, thawzung kae pya oh zah bya kae tawsya oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
52002012	Ou tuhte a peenaw lungkhu lang te a phu-enaw kalan ae ko oh paw Pachia te angaekuh lante nanning nynh na hiin nawlan oh nynh thua.
52002013	Kaening kyate na thae oh paw Pachia bya kha nanning nynh he na lawkuh oh te, ccungccaw`ae bya hawte na lawkuh khyh oh, thuasalama byaccing thua zah a zyn`ae paw nanning kya mah amawccih lante ryalah paw Pachia bya hawte na lawku oh keiccuze, hynh-e hanlan apaekuh lei lan Pachia kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
52002014	Pawccecize uteno`ae, nanning tuh Kri Jesu kya um paw, Judah pee e Pachia kriccawbu`ae thydokuh`ae paw lang na tang oh. Pawccecize minmin nynh Jew`ae kya-e a teing`ae hawte, nanning mah naemaw ccungccaw`ae kya-e khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae kha na teing bua oh.
52002015	Kha-e Jew`ae nynh Bawipaw Jesu te mih profeh`ae kha paryh a chia`ae, te kaening kha oun tua oun sah`ae; te minmin nynh Pachia kha lunghoysah khyh`ae, te ccungccaw balyn kha a rawse`ae.
52002016	Zenta`ae nynh khumnaw a muebua khyh ccaw`ae cite thehoypaw ho lan kaening kha oun khee`ae zah mih seinaw kha pei a biachihkuh`ae, tukeiccuze Pachia thinrianaw tuh minmin tungvaw khe khaleih accah.
52002017	Thuasalama uteno`ae, kaening tuh thinlung kyate thua leite, pyn lante nanning te sosoh ah phiakuh oh pawte nae mitmae muih khylan myarya kae peki zah thawmawte kae zuakuh.
52002018	Tukeiccu kaening tuh nae kalan thua lan kou kae ry. Kae, Paul mah atu te atu ka zuaku tua. Thuasalama Setan nynh kaening kha phe oun khee.
52002019	Kaening ngaehoinaw, tukhyhze lungtuanaw, tukhyhze lungpawnaw suilukhung tuh pawmou athua? Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua te, amaw malang e nanning ccaccei kha na thua khyh oh tou?
52002020	Pawccecize nanning tuh kae phu-enaw te lungtuanaw nynh na thua oh.
52003001	Tukeiccu kaening nynh he kae ngaesang kho khyh tuh, Athen khua kya kae makhaete umhy lanpaw tuh ahoy cite kae tua.
52003002	Te Kri thehoypaw kya rya kae lahkheihtu, Pachia rya a lahtupaw, kae neitaw Timote kha, nanning tynsathung khylan te nae zynnaw konglang te nanning kha thawzungpya khylan,
52003003	hynh-e vawsawnaw`ae keiccuze hung sanmah na pia khyh nawlan oh kae saw; pawccecize kaening tuh hynh-e`khylan khang paw nynh kae thua cipaw naemaw ccaccei nynh na ny oh.
52003004	Pawccecize kaening tuh nae kya kae um lyaze, vawsawnaw kae teing vae cih cite langmaw phe kae hopyaty vae oh. Ou tuhhawte acyikuh paw kha na ny oh.
52003005	Hynh-e keiccuze he ka ngaesang kho khyh tuh nae zynnaw kha ny khylan Timote kha kae saw. Tukhyh lanze tuhoutu nynh ccangkhakheit te nanning kha he ae tuh-ou oh tuh kae ryalaw kha alakaw lang a tangsei cih.
52003006	Thuasalama atu nae kyate kaening kalan Timote he yn thua tuh nae zynnaw te sungsakunaw thungpang hoypaw kha oun phupah zah, kaening tungvaw ahoypaw liathuinaw pei na hoi oh cipaw, te kaening nynh nanning kha kae muihry oh hawte kaening kha myarya muih nae ry oh cipaw oun hopya.
52003007	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, kae vawsawnaw balyn kya, te kae riathaenaw balyn kya nae zynnaw nynh kae ngae oun ngansah.
52003008	Pawccecize Bawipaw kya tynkaring na thadyn oh zetuh, atu kaening tuh kae hiin.
52003009	Ah Pachia malang nanning keiccuze kae lungtuanawpaw lungtuanaw balyn hanlan, nanning elan pawtahawpaw lungtuabya mou Pachia kalan bua kae ho kho ung cih?
52003010	Nae mae kha kae muih oh ccaw cite, te nae zynnaw kya aboupaw kha kae ccingsapya oh ccaw cite khuazi khuadae thawte saw kae sangpah oh.
52003011	Atu ah Pachia, Paaw amaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynh kae laanpi tuh nae kalan oun paccynpah vae sah.
52003012	Te nae kya kae cyi hawte, Bawipaw nynh ae pungthungsah oh sah lah ccungccaw balyn kya te lukheit te lukheit kya sungsakunaw te phe ae biasah vae oh sah.
52003013	A mithyaa`ae balyn ryte ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua vae ze, ah Pachia te Paaw malang thyaanaw kya ccaenaw um lei lante nae thinlung kha amaw nynh ae tynsah vae oh sah.
52004001	Tuhlaeze uteno`ae, nanning nynh pawcihte nynh hiin lan accan, Pachia kha pawcihte nynh a lungrythuasah lan accan cipaw kha kae kyate phe na mue vae oh hawte, houhouh na bia nawlan oh, Bawipaw Jesu liate kaening nynh kae ngia oh zah kae hy oh.
52004002	Pawccecize pawtahawpaw kawpyapaw`ae kha nynh Bawipaw Jesu liate kaening nynh kae pya oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
52004003	Pawccecize nanning thyaasanaw Pachia rynaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: nanning nynh ohhuakunaw kha na sungku nawlan oh,
52004004	nanning milu raveih nynh amaw pyn kya-e kha thyaasanaw te sawtuanaw kya pawcihte nynh hoi lan cipaw na ny nawlan oh,
52004005	Pachia nyh leipaw Zenta`ae hawte myarya ohhuakurynaw kya um leite;
52004006	hynh-e kong kya hung nynh san ccyhhoypaw a lawku khyh nawlan, te unopaw kha a hyngpya khyh nawlan Pachia nynh a ry. Pawccemacize kaening nynh phe kae hopah tou vae oh zah ccaekia phe kae khang vae hawte, Bawipaw tuh khahtahawpaw a cyih`ae paw balyn kha ccaeliatu nynh thua.
52004007	Pawccecize Pachia nynh athyaa leipaw kalan aening kha oun ko khyh, thuasalama thyaanaw kalan nynh oun ko.
52004008	Tukeiccu hynh-e pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw tuh ccungccaw kha pawlangria khyh paw thua leite, a Thyaa Muisaw oun pyatu Pachia kha pawlangria khyh paw nynh thua.
52004009	Thuasalama uteno sungsakunaw konglang te kae nynh nae kalan zei ho vae khyh. Pawccecize nanning tuh lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lan Pachia nynh a ccangpya vae paw nynh na thua oh.
52004010	Te Mesidonia ram kya um`ae paw uteno`ae balyn tungvaw kya nanning nynh khahcihte na cyipya ccaccing oh. Thuasalama uteno`ae, nanning nynh houhouh na pungthung nawlan oh kaening nynh thawte kae ngia oh.
52004011	Kaening nynh kaw kae pya vae oh hawte, daebabilan na umthya nawlan oh, te naemaw ryalaw kha nae kuih te na law nawlan oh kae ngia oh;
52004012	atolang e ccungccaw`ae kya kou ngaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh, te pawpaw sanmah na bou vae khyh nawlan oh kae ngia oh.
52004013	Thuasalama uteno`ae, ngaehoinaw a hoi leipaw mingccang`ae nynh mih ngaethya hawte nae ngaethya khyh nawlan a ih`ae paw konglang kha nanning nynh ny leite na um lan oh paw kha ka ry khyh.
52004014	Pawccecize Jesu tuh chih zah bua a thothui cite aening nynh ah zyn lan oh ze, tuhhawte Jesu kya a i`ae paw kha mah amaw ryte Pachia nynh a cciakhae cih`ae.
52004015	Bawipaw bya liate nanning kha e hynh kae hopya oh, Bawipaw yn thua cia, ah hiinhy oh paw aening nynh a ih vae`ae paw kha ah thoih lan khyh oh.
52004016	Pawccecize Bawipaw amaw tuh siaruanaw ryte lupi athua paw vaaw ccungccapaw roi ryte, Pachia mungkae roi ryte vaawran te yn rungbung cih zah Kri kya a chih`ae paw tuh masaty oun tho cih`ae.
52004017	Oute ah hiinhy oh paw aening tuh khivae kya Bawipaw te tungku khylan, minmin ryte pynkheihlan maeking kya hangthung ah thua cih oh, ou tuhte aening tuh Bawipaw ryte po umkheih lan vae.
52004018	Tukeiccu hynh-e bya`ae hynhte lukheit te lukheit thawzung pyakuh oh.
52005001	Thuasalama uteno`ae accyh te kumvaelori kong tuh kae nynh nae kalan zei ho vae khyh.
52005002	Pawccecize Bawipaw nin tuh khuazi kya miruh hawte nynh yn thua cih cipaw kha naemaw nynh ccaerarihlan na ny oh.
52005003	“ Daenaw te khynnaw a um,” a ci`ae lyakhe, ccaaw a poipaw nopinung tungvaw neitangia nynh a thuanua hawte, minmin tungvaw ronaw nynh vaekheihmawte a thuanua cih`ae zah minmin tuh lue lan khyh`ae.
52005004	Thuasalama uteno`ae, tuh-e nin nynh miruh hawte nanning tungvaw ae thuanua bua lan khyh oh, pawccecize nanning tuh mohnaw kya na um khyh oh.
52005005	Nanning balyn tuh awnaw ccaaw`ae te khuadae ccaaw`ae nynh na thua oh. Aening tuh khuazi ccaaw`ae ah thua khyh oh, mohnaw kya-e mah ah thua khyh oh.
52005006	Tukeiccu mingccang`ae nynh a i`ae hawte, aening ih nan oh sih, thuasalama aening tuh raeringku oh sih lah kyhrarihlan um oh sih.
52005007	Pawccecize a ih`ae paw tuh khuazi nynh a i`ae, te a rui`ae paw mah khuazi nynh a rui`ae.
52005008	Thuasalama khuadae ccaaw`ae ah thua oh paw aening tuh kyhrarihlan ung oh sih, zynnaw te sungsakunaw kya-e bykhaw saphua te khumnaw kya-e ngaehoinaw sivawlukhung khate ccaankuh oh sih.
52005009	Pawccecize Pachia thinrianaw kha teing khylan Pachia nynh aening kha yn khang khyh. Thuasalama ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate khumnaw mue khylan nynh yn khang.
52005010	Aening tuh ah thaeku oh zemah, ah i oh zemah, amaw ryte pynkheihlan um khylan, aening hanlan nynh Kri tuh a chi.
52005011	Tukeiccu nanning nynh leih na cyi oh hawkhate, naemaw te naemaw kha thawzungpyakuh oh lah lukheit te lukheit tynsakuh oh.
52005012	Uteno`ae, nanning laku ryalah`ae paw, Bawipaw kya nanning luki a um`ae paw, te nanning ae thuihei oh paw kha saw la tua oh cite kae ngia oh.
52005013	Te mih ryalawnaw liate minmin kha sungsakunaw kya myarya ahang lante la tua oh. Naemaw te naemaw laku la ccawkuh oh.
52005014	Uteno`ae, atu nanning kha kae ngia oh; mih ry thyhte a le`ae paw kha raeringnaw la pya oh, lungthawzya`ae paw kha thawzung la pya oh, thawzya`ae paw kha la bawng oh, ccungccaw balyn kya nae lung la sae sah.
52005015	Hunghung nynh sanmah lukhakheit kha ahoy leipaw hanlan ahoy leipaw te liaru nan sah, thuasalama naemaw laku te ccungccaw balyn kya ahoypaw kha pei la zui oh.
52005016	Pei lungtua oh.
52005017	Apaekuh lei lan sawsang oh.
52005018	Atyn-are balyn kya lungtuabya ho oh; pawccecize tuh-e tuh Kri Jesu kya nae hanlan Pachia rynaw nynh thua.
52005019	Muisaw kha daesah nan oh.
52005020	Profehbya ho paw kha pawlangria leite um nan oh.
52005021	Pawpaw balyn kha syntaw oh, ahoypaw uccaw kha tynkaring lang kyngkuh oh.
52005022	Ahoy leipaw miakaw kha sibia oh.
52005023	Te daenaw Pachia amaw ccaccei nynh nanning kha marya ae la thyaasah vae oh sah; te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua te, nae muisaw, nae thinlung te nae pyn khaleih kha ccaenaw um lei lan ae la khynsah vae oh sah.
52005024	Nanning ae kotu oh paw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua, kha-e kha mah a cyih cih.
52005025	Uteno`ae, kaening hanlan saw oun sangpah oh.
52005026	Athyaapaw myngkunaw khate uteno`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh.
52005027	E ccaky hynh athyaapaw uteno`ae balyn kalan la riapah oh cite Bawipaw liate kae nynh nanning kha bya kae tawsya oh.
52005028	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw tuh nae kya la um sah. Amen.
53001001	Paul, Sailas te Timote nynh ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya um`ae paw Thesalon kriccawbu kalan kae beihlang oh.
53001002	Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.
53001003	Uteno`ae, nae zynnaw tuh myarya lethung zah nanning kyaze milu raveih nynh lukheit te lukheit na sungsakunaw oh tuh paepae alui keiccuze kaening nynh cyi lan accan hawte nanning hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho.
53001004	Ou tuhte nanning ae tua ae sahnaw oh kya te nae vawsawnaw kya na ngaesang oh zah nae lungsaenawpaw te nae zynnawpaw elan Pachia kya-e kriccawbu`ae kya nanning hanlan kae pookuh.
53001005	Tuh-e tuh Pachia peenaw te angaekuh`ae paw cite nanning kha ria na thua nawlan oh, Pachia kya-e adingpaw byapianaw kha a langsakuh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e peenaw hanlan nynh nanning mah na teing oh.
53001006	Nanning vawsaw ae pya oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha vawsawnaw pyaru lanpaw tuh Pachia hanlan atazaepaw nynh thua.
53001007	Te Bawipaw Jesu nynh athungpaw a vaaw ccungccaw`ae ryte vaawran kyate he yn langku vae ze, vawsaw na teing oh paw nanning kha kaening ryte hae-ungnaw pya khylan,
53001008	Pachia a nyh lei`ae paw tungvaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thehoypaw kha a ngae lei`ae paw tungvaw kya aruapaw maee khate ccaeliaru paw tuh a hanlan atazaepaw nynh thua.
53001009	Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Bawipaw a umnaw kyate, te a thungnaw kya-e phu-enaw kyate phiate zungzae ronaw khate detah athua cih`ae,
53001010	nanning laku kae ccaekia kha na zyn oh keiccuze, a mithyaa`ae kya phu-esah athua nawlan te a zyn`ae paw balyn laku ngaeang thehoysah athua nawlan, tuh-e nin kya Kri he yn thua te tuhte detah athua cih`ae.
53001011	Tukeiccu hynh-e konaw te angaekuh lante ah Pachia nynh nanning kha ae riabua nawlan oh, te a hoynaw kya-e ahoypaw lungrythuanaw balyn kha a ccingsah nawlan, te zynnaw kya-e ryalaw kha thungnaw khate a ccingsah nawlan kaening mah nanning hanlan saw pei kae sang.
53001012	Ou tuhte ah Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw thyhte, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min tuh nanning kya phu-esah athua nawlan, te nanning kha amaw kya phu-esah na thuabua nawlan oh.
53002001	Atu uteno`ae, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thuanaw lanpaw te asekuh lante thuasah, te amaw kalan aening pynkheihlan ah sueluaku oh paw konglang te thuasah,
53002002	Kri kya-e nin tuh phe a thua vae paw lante, kaening kyate oun thua paw olante, muisaw te thuasah, tukhyhze bya te thuasah, tukhyhze ccaky te thuasah, taloi nae bungzou khyh nawlan, tukhyhze nae lungvawsaw khyh nawlan nanning kha kae ngia oh.
53002003	Hung ccungccaw nynh zemah pawpawte sanmah ae la ling nan oh sah. Tuh-e nin a thua maw, zynnaw kyate khuliakunaw masaty a umty cih, te seinaw ccungccapaw athua paw ronaw ccapaw kha yn langkuh cih.
53002004	Tuh-e paw nynh Pachia cite ko athua paw, tukhyhze beik athua paw kha rawse zah amaw te amaw kha kha-e balyn laelan a hangthungku, Pachia nynh ka thua cite amaw te amaw kha langku te, Pachia tempal kyakhe Pachia hawte nynh a dahung.
53002005	Nae kya ka um lyaze kha-e kong tuh phe kae hopya vae oh cipaw kha na syntaw vae khyh oh tou?
53002006	Te aning tuh amaw ccyh kya yn langku nawlan, atu paw nynh a khee ung cipaw na ny oh.
53002007	Pawccecize kawbya pawlangria leinaw kya-e byakhupaw tuh rya a lah cciamang vae. Tuhzemah atu a kheetupaw kha dae law athua makhia, kha-e kha po a khee ung cih.
53002008	Oute tuh mihoy leipaw tuh yn langkuh vae cih. Kha-e paw kha Bawipaw nynh a khalang kya-e hyte phe a maemih cih zah amaw yn thuanaw kya-e phaephae ahpaw khate phe a roh cih.
53002009	Tuh-e mihoy leipaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh Setan ryalawnaw te asekuhpaw thungnaw balyn ryte, muihsanaw`ae ryte, te ahyngpaw khuararunaw`ae ryte,
53002010	te ading leipaw lingnaw balyn ryte aroh cih`ae paw kya nynh yn thua cih. Pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh khumnaw mue khylan byaccing kya-e sungsakunaw kha a lawku khyh`ae keiccu nynh thua.
53002011	Hynh-e keiccu minmin nynh hyngbya kha a zyn ccaw`ae cite Pachia nynh mih tungvaw khe tynkaringpaw zynseinaw kha a sawnua cih`ae.
53002012	Ou tuhte byaccing kha zyn leite, dingleinaw kya a lungrythua paw balyn tuh seibe athua nawlan`ae nynh thua.
53002013	Thuasalama Bawipaw nynh a sungsah`ae paw uteno`ae, Muisaw nynh thyaasanaw liate, te byaccing kha zynnaw liate nanning tuh khumnaw mue khylan Pachia nynh atakaw lya mawte phe ae po vae oh keiccuze, nanning hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho lanpaw nynh thua.
53002014	Nanning nynh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e phu-enaw kha na ccoubua nawlan oh, kaening kya-e thehoypaw liate, kha-e khumnaw kalan nanning kha Pachia nynh ae ko oh.
53002015	Tukeiccuze uteno`ae, tynkaring lang thadyn oh lah kae bya te thuasah, kae ccaw te thuasah kae ccangpya oh paw kha varyn kyngkuh oh.
53002016	Aening kha oun sungsah zah thawccinaw liate zungzae ngaengannaw te ahoypaw ngaehoinaw oun pyatupaw, ah Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri amaw ccaccei nynh,
53002017	nae thinlung kha ngae ae ngansah oh sah lah ahoypaw bya te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya ae la tynsah vae oh sah.
53003001	Nyathyakou uteno`ae, Bawipaw bya tuh nanning kya phu-esah athua hawte, teitei balyn pung pazaekuh kanmaw zah phu-esah athua nawlan kaening hanlan saw oun la sangpah oh.
53003002	Acyih rarou paw, ahoy leipaw ccungccaw`ae kyate kaening hynh yn luesah nawlan saw oun la sangpah bua oh; pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh zynnaw hoi khyh`ae.
53003003	Thuasalama Bawipaw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua. Amaw nynh nanning kha ae tynsah cih oh zah mihoy leipaw kyate ae thungkhaw cih oh.
53003004	Te nanning kaw kae pya oh paw kha atu na cyih oh zah bua na la cyih ung cih oh cite nanning konglang te Bawipaw kya zynkunaw kae hoi.
53003005	Te Pachia sungsanaw lungkhu lang te Kri kya-e lungsaenaw lungkhu lang Bawipaw nynh nae thinlung kha ae la cciakhae oh sah.
53003006	Uteno`ae kaening kyate a mue`ae paw phung thyhte hiin leite angae-aduakuh lei lante a hiin`ae paw uteno miakaw kyate la phiakuh oh cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min te nanning kha kaw kae pya oh.
53003007	Pawccecize naemaw ccaccei nynh kaening kha pawcihte nynh dosuinku lan`ae cipaw na ny oh. Pawccecize kaening tuh nanning kyakhe angae-aduakuh lei lante kae um khyh.
53003008	Ccungccaw lukhakheit kya-e looh kha mah alakaw te kae aepah khyh; thuasalama nanning lukhakheit kya san phuripaw kae thua khyh nawlan, phe kae bang lang khuazi khuadae thawte rya kae lawkuh.
53003009	Tuhte rya kae lawku paw tuh nanning kya-e lawku lan kaw kae hoi khyh keiccu cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama nanning nynh kaening hynh dosuinku khylan nae zui oh ccaw cite nynh thua.
53003010	Pawccecize nanning ryte ah umkheih oh lyakha, lukhakheit nynh rya a law khyh lanze, aepaw mah ae nan sah cite kaw phe kae pya vae oh.
53003011	Pawccecize angae-aduakuh lei lante hiin zah ryalaw kharyh law leite, pei a ccukuh bua`ae paw ccungccaw abang nanning laku a um cite kae thae.
53003012	Khatahaw`ae paw tuh daebabilan ryalawkuh`ae sah lah mimaw looh kha ae`ae sah cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate kaw kae pya`ae zah thawte kae hy`ae.
53003013	Thuasalama uteno`ae, nanning tuh ahoypaw ryalawpaw kya nae lungthawthang nan sah.
53003014	Hynh-e ccaky kya-e kae bya hynh lukhakheit nynh a ngae khyh lanze, kha-e paw kha la syntaw oh lah a maethya nawlan la mungkuh nan oh.
53003015	Tuhzemah rhaw lukheit hawte tuh la tua nan oh, uno lukheit hawte raeringnaw la pya oh.
53003016	Atu daenaw Bawipaw amaw ccaccei nynh ccianaw miakaw kya nanning kha daenaw pei ae la pya vae oh sah. Bawipaw tuh nae balyn kya la um sah.
53003017	Kae beihlangnaw oh paw hynh Paul kamaw kuit ccaccei te nynh ka zei; tuh-e tuh ka ccaky takyh kya muihsanaw nynh thua.
53003018	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um vae sah. Amen.
54001001	Aening oun Khumtu Pachia kawpyapaw liate, te aening ngaehoinaw athua paw Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate, Jesu Kri locceihtu athua paw kae, Paul nynh,
54001002	zynnaw kya ka ccapaw ccaccing na thua paw Timote nang kha kae beihlang. Ah Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na tungvaw la um sah.
54001003	-
54001004	Ccungccaw abang nynh ccangpaw doctrine`ae kha a ccangpya`ae. Minmin nynh phungpaw huataw`ae te athangthya leipaw thokeinaw phungpaw`ae kha a ngaery`ae. Kha-e uccaw`ae nynh eikunaw kha a thuakhae. Zynnaw te Pachia lante asekuhpaw tynsathungnaw kha thawpya khyh`ae. Tukeiccu ccungccaw abang nynh tuhhawte a cyibua khyh nawlan`ae kaw na pya kho nawlan, Mesidonia ram lang ka ccia lyaze, Efesa khua khe na umhy ccaw cite nang kha kae ngia.
54001005	Kawpyapaw kya-e athangnaw tuh, athyaapaw thinlung kyate, ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw kyate, te cyiruhnaw um leipaw zynnaw kyate yn thua paw sungsakunaw nynh thua.
54001006	Tuh-e kyate ccungccaw abang nynh phe cciataw`ae zah accakaepaw byahokupaw kalan phe paleihkuh vae`ae.
54001007	Minmin tuh mimaw nynh a ho`ae paw toulou kha nyh khyh`ae, paw kong nynh kae ho cipaw san a nyh lei`ae pite kawbya ccangpatu`ae lang tang a ry`ae.
54001008	Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh Kawbya kha angaekuh lante a mang lanze, Kawbya tuh ahoy cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.
54001009	Kawbya tuh adingpaw ccungccaw hanlan rae paw thua khyh, thuasalama kawbya pawlangria lei`ae paw te kawngae lei`ae paw hanlan, Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw te misei`ae hanlan, athyaa lei`ae paw te maethya nyh lei`ae paw hanlan, paaw`ae te nung`ae theihtu`ae hanlan, ccungccaw theihtu`ae hanlan,
54001010	a ohhuakuh`ae paw hanlan, pise te pise a sei`ae paw hanlan, ccungccaw ruh`ae paw hanlan, mihyng`ae hanlan, ahme leite ccaesakuh`ae paw hanlan, te akyhpaw ccangpyakunaw te arawsekuhpaw uccaw hanlan nynh kawbya tuh rae athua cipaw mah ah ny oh.
54001011	Tuh-e akyhpaw ccangpyakunaw te nynh thehoyccoupaw Pachia kya-e aphuepaw thehoypaw tuh accawkuh. Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh kae ka kya pya athua.
54001012	Kae hynh thawzung yn pyatupaw ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha ka thehoysah. Kae hynh zyn lan um paw lang yn riabua zah a ryalawnaw lungkhu lang yn nungbua.
54001013	Kae tuh langmaw lya Pachia alue lante byahotupaw, ccungccaw a tua a sahtupaw, ccungccaw saryatupaw nynh ka thua. Thuasalama kha-e kha zyn leinaw kya ny leite ka la cyi paw athua keiccuze, ngaethya-umsanaw kha ka mue.
54001014	Ah Bawipaw kya-e thawccinaw tuh Jesu Kri kya um paw zynnaw te sungsakunaw ryte myaryasangkae alung.
54001015	Kri Jesu tuh misei`ae khum khylan nynh laephipi kalan yn thua cipaw tuh zyn lan um paw bya thua zah khaleih lawku lan accanpaw nynh thua. Tuh-e misei`ae laku kae tuh a sei huaccepaw nynh ka thua.
54001016	Tuhzemah zungzae hiinnaw hanlan atu koute amaw a zyn vae cih paw ccungccaw`ae nynh dosuinkupaw thua khylan, Jesu Kri nynh kamaw kya khaw cia teingnaw balyn kha masaty a langsaku nawlan, kae tuh ngaethyaumsanaw kha ka mue.
54001017	Atu zungzae atynpaw, a chih kho leipaw, muih kho um leipaw Siapharan, a makhae kyalya ahawpaw Pachia tungvaw sawtuanaw te phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.
54001018	Ka ccapaw Timote, nang na konglang te yn thua paw profehbya thyhte nang nynh ahoypaw rhaw kha na dou nawlan, hynh-e kawpyapaw hynh nang kha kae pya.
54001019	Zynnaw te ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw kha varyn la kyngkuh. Ccungccaw abang nynh kha-e zynnaw kha phe vuasya`ae zah minmin tuh arohpaw sanphalung hawte nynh thua`ae.
54001020	Tuh-e`ae laku Hymenaeas te Alexanda a umbua`ae. Minmin nynh saryapawbyaho vae khyh nawlan`ae, a ccangku ccaw`ae cite minmin kha Setan kalan phe ka ah vae`ae.
54002001	Tukeiccu, masaty lang ngiapyanaw, sawsangpyanaw, muisaw lante bohpyanaw te lungtuabya hopaw kha ccungccaw balyn hanlan la raepah`ae,
54002002	aening nynh Pachia nyh paw hiinnaw kya te sawtua lan um paw hiinnaw kya daenaw te ah hiin kho nawlan oh, te daebabipaw hiinnaw ah hoi kho nawlan oh siapharan`ae te kawhoitu`ae paw balyn hanlan saw la sangpah oh cite kae ngia.
54002003	Pawccecize hynh-e cyisahnaw tuh aening oun Khumtu Pachia malang ahoypaw te angaekuhpaw nynh thua.
54002004	Ccungccaw balyn nynh khumnaw mue`ae sah lah byaccing kha nyh`ae sah cite Pachia nynh a ry.
54002005	Pawccecize Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um. Te Pachia te ccungccaw`ae laku Ccawkunaw Raetu Ccungccapaw Kri Jesu lukheit nynh a um.
54002006	Amaw nynh ccungccaw balyn sawkhaw nawlan amaw kha a pyaku. Accyh azaw paw kya ccaekia khan khylan,
54002007	tuh-e khylan kae tuh phunghotu lang, locceihtu lang, te zynnaw te byaccing kha Zenta`ae ccangpatu lang khang paw nynh ka thua. Kri kya byaccing nynh ka ho, ka hyng khyh.
54002008	Tukeiccu athyaapaw kuih`ae kha hangthung te, thinrianaw te lunghiinnaw hoi leite pise`ae nynh teitei balyn sawsang`ae sah cite ka ry.
54002009	Tuh-e hawte, nopi`ae nynh mah uccaw lawkunaw kya, maethyaum leipaw boeining lawku te, ahoypaw ozia te kou angaekuh lante mimaw te mimaw kha ccaankuh`ae sah ci ka ry. Akhekuhpaw sang, sui, te pale`ae, te amee rupaw uccaw te ccaankuh nan`ae sah.
54002010	Thuasalama Pachia rawrinaw a hoi paw nopi`ae hanlan ahoypaw cyisahnaw`ae khate ccaankuh`ae sah ci ka ry.
54002011	Nopi nynh tuh kawngaenaw balynte daebabilan ccangkuh sah.
54002012	Thuasalama nopi nynh ccangpya lan, pise tungvaw kaw hoi lan ka ua khyh, daebabilan zya um sah.
54002013	Pawccecize Adam kha nynh masaty rae athua, oute nynh Evi kha rae athua.
54002014	Te Adam kha hyngpya thua khyh; thuasalama nopinung kha tuh hyngpya thua zah phe a sei.
54002015	Tuhzemah nopi`ae nynh maeethyaum leipaw boeining lawkute zynnaw kya, sungsakunaw kya, te thyaanaw kya a tyn`ae lanze, ccaawpuinaw kya khum athua cih`ae.
54003001	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh kriccawbu cciakhaetu lang a ry lanze ahoypaw ryalaw kha a ry paw nynh thua cipaw tuh akyhpaw bya nynh thua.
54003002	Oute kriccawbu cciakhaetu tuh ccaenaw um leipaw athua hahe cih, zu lukheit vawpaw athua cih, a yhkuh khopaw athua cih, a lungccing paw athua cih, a ozia hoypaw athua cih, mikhia dooihthya paw athua cih, a ccangpah khopaw athua cih;
54003003	misutui a rang leipaw, peku maeku mang leipaw, phua elan a karangkuh leipaw, a lungnepaw, milae uccaw a dua leipaw athua cih;
54003004	amaw a innbyn kha kou hoy lang a uk paw, a ccaaw`ae nynh sawtua rawrinaw khaleihte kawngaepyanaw a hoi`ae paw athua cih;
54003005	(pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh amaw a innbyn kha pawcihte nynh uk lan cipaw a ny khyh lanze, pawtemou Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kha a dooih kho cih?);
54003006	a zyn thawpaw thua lan khyh, tuhte athua ze, a tansakuh sei cih zah diabolos hawte detahnaw lungkhu lang a phungkuhsei cih.
54003007	Tuhlaeze, atolang e ccungccaw`ae laku thehoyccoupaw athua cih. Tukhyh lanze saryanaw lungkhu lang te diabolos kya-e kaang lungkhu lang a phungkuhsei cih.
54003008	Tuhhawte kriccaw piccang`ae mah sawtua lan um paw athua cih`ae, a lae phei paw thua lan khyh, misutui eih neih paw thua lan khyh, phua elan a karangkuhpaw thua lan khyh`ae.
54003009	Accipaw mawtemaw nykunaw kya zynnaw byakhupaw kha varyn a kyngkuh paw athua cih`ae.
54003010	Te minmin tuh masaty syntaw thua`ae sah. Oute ccaenaw um khyh`ae cipaw muih athua tetuh kriccaw piccang rya kha lah ccavae`ae sah.
54003011	Tuhhawte mih zu`ae mah sawtua lan um paw athua cih`ae, ming`ae thethya ho`ae paw thua lan khyh`ae, a yhkuh khopaw, pawpaw balyn kya zyn lan um paw athua cih`ae.
54003012	Kriccaw piccang`ae tuh zu lukheit vawpaw athua cih`ae. Mih ccaaw`ae te mih innbyn kha kou hoy lang a uk paw athua cih`ae.
54003013	Pawccecize kriccaw piccang ryalaw kha kou hoy lang a lah paw tuh mimaw elan ahoypaw thadynnaw kha a muekuh`ae paw te Kri Jesu kya um paw zynnaw kya rawhoynaw alepi a muekuh`ae paw nynh thua.
54003014	Aro mawze na kalan thua lan ngaehoite hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh kae nynh na kalan kae zei.
54003015	Thuasalama khaw kae ro lan thua ze, byaccing kya-e atungpi te abingkunaw athua paw, a hiinpaw Pachia kya-e kriccawbu athua paw, Pachia inn kya namaw te namaw kha pawcihte nynh ka um cih cipaw na nyku ccaw cite hynh-e`ae hynh na kalan kae zei.
54003016	Te ahmepaw beiknaw kya-e byakhupaw tuh alepaw uccaw nynh thua cipaw eiku lanpaw um khyh. Pachia tuh pynsaw lante phe yn langkuh vae. Muisaw liate thyaaccousah athua vae. Vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh phe muih vae`ae. Zenta`ae kya ho athua vae. Laephipi kya amaw kha phe zyn vae`ae. Phu-enaw vaawran lang lawthung phe athua vae.
54004001	Nyalang ccyh kya ccungccaw abang nynh zynnaw kha a poutaw cih`ae, lingthyapaw muihsaw`ae te raerangsaro`ae ccangpyanaw kha a ngae cih`ae cite atu Muisaw nynh raerae alangkuh lang a ho.
54004002	Kha-e`ae nynh cyiruhnaw kya hyngbya kha a ho`ae, mimaw nykunaw thinlung kha alingpaw sivaw khate phe pinsakuh`ae.
54004003	Zu te vaw tangnaw kha oun khee cih`ae, byaccing kha nyh zah a zyn`ae paw nynh lungtuabya hote ae lan accanpaw, Pachia nynh a rae paw, aepaw phin`ae kha sung lan kaw oun pya cih`ae.
54004004	Pawccecize, Pachia nynh a rae paw miakaw tuh ahoypaw nynh thua. Lungtuabya hote lawku lanze pawpaw mah sung lan ccan khyh.
54004005	Pawccecize Pachia bya liate thuasah, sawsangnaw liate thuasah pawpaw balyn tuh thyaasah athua.
54004006	E uccaw`ae kong hynh nang nynh uteno`ae kha na hopya lan`ae athua ze, nang tuh Jesu Kri ryalahtu hoypaw na thua cih. Namaw nynh phe na zui vae paw, ahoypaw doctrine te zynnaw bya`ae khate nang tuh na kuakuh cih.
54004007	Thuasalama atawpaw nopi`ae nynh tuanawte a ho`ae paw phungpaw`ae kha la vua lah Pachia lante hiinnaw kya namaw te namaw la leihcinh.
54004008	Pawccecize pynsaw lante leihcinh paw tuh ccapyh nynh athane. Thuasalama Pachia lante hiinnaw tuh atu e hiinshe te yn thua vae cih paw hiinshe kya-e byakinkupaw kha a hoi paw thua keiccuze pawpaw balyn hanlan athanepaw nynh thua.
54004009	Hynh-e bya tuh zyn lan umpaw bya thua zah khaleih lawku lan accanpaw nynh thua.
54004010	Hynh-e keiccuze aening tuh rya ah lah oh zah saryanaw kha ah teing oh. Pawkeiccumacize aening tuh ccungccaw balyn Khumtu athua paw, abapi lante a zyn`ae paw Khumtu athua paw, a hiinpaw Pachia kha a doliakuh`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
54004011	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh kawpya`ae lah la ccangpah`ae.
54004012	Na kum ano keiccu hung nynh san ae la dothatheih nan`ae sah. Thuasalama nang tuh bya kya, ozia kya, sungsakunaw kya, muisaw kya, zynnaw kya, thyaapapingnaw kya, zyntu`ae nynh dosuinkupaw la thua.
54004013	Kae kae thua makhia ccathyaa ria paw, ming`ae hybuanaw, te ccangpyanaw kha thawte la rae.
54004014	Pastor`ae nynh na tungvaw mih kuih he khan`ae te profehbyahonaw thyhte nang kha muisaw lasung pya na thua. Kha-e lasung kha mang lan la maah nan.
54004015	Na kaethungnaw kha ccungccaw balyn kya alangku nawlan, e uccaw`ae hynh pei la tua lah thawte la zuakuh.
54004016	Namaw te namaw thuasah, na ccangpyanaw thuasah la raeringkuh lah kha-e`ae kyakhe pei la tyn. Pawccecize khate na cyinaw liate namaw kha thuasah, na hopaw a thae`ae paw kha thuasah paryhte na khum cih`ae.
54005001	Kum tang huapaw kha la pe nan, thuasalama paaw hawte thawte la soihbia. Kum nohua paw pise`ae kha u te neitaw hawte,
54005002	kum tang huapaw nopi`ae kha nung`ae hawte, kum nohua paw nopi`ae kha ccia`ae hawte lungthyaanaw balynte la soihbia`ae.
54005003	Numae ccaccing athua paw numae`ae kha saw la tua`ae.
54005004	Thuasalama numae lukhakheit nynh ccaaw`ae, tukhyhze mintaw`ae a hoi lanze, innvaw kya Pachia sawtuanaw langsaku khylan, te mih nungpaaw`ae dooih ru khylan minmin tuh masaty innvaw khe ccangkuhty`ae sah. Pawccecize tuh-e tuh Pachia malang ahoypaw te nawccaw lan um paw nynh thua.
54005005	Numae ccaccing thua zah a makhaete a um paw nopi tuh Pachia kha doliakuh zah sawsangnaw te ngianaw kyakhe nynh khuazi khuadae po a tyn.
54005006	Thuasalama pynsaw hoysanaw kya a hiinpaw numaenung tuh phang a hiin pite a chihpaw nynh thua.
54005007	Minmin tuh ccaenaw a um khyh ccaw`ae, kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha kaw la pya`ae.
54005008	Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh amaw ccungccaw`ae kha a dooih khyh lanze, abapi lante amaw a innbyn`ae kha a dooih khyh lanze, zynnaw kha phe a vua paw nynh thua, zyn leitu laeze houh athah huapaw nynh thua.
54005009	Kum sungtaruh kaw e numae tuh numae ccazing kya teebua nan sah, pise lukheit zu po a la thua paw,
54005010	ahoypaw ryalaw`ae hanlan thehoyccousah`ae paw; imua`ae kha a kua ze, mikhia`ae kha a thuasah`ae ze, mithyaa`ae ccu kha a singpya ze, riathae`ae paw kha lunghoysah ze, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kha thawmawte a zui ze, ccazing kya la teebua sah.
54005011	Thuasalama kum ano huapaw numae`ae kha tuh la nue`ae. Pawccecize ohhuakurynaw he a hoi`ae tuh Kri kha rawsete vawpaw bua a hoiry`ae,
54005012	masaty-e mih zynnaw kha a vua vae`ae keiccuze minmin tuh seibenaw a mue`ae.
54005013	Tuhlaeze, inn kheit kyate inn kheit kalan pae`ae zah thawnawpaw kha a ccangku`ae. Mih thawnaw kyalya thua leite thanry`ae paw mah thua`ae zah ho lan accan leipaw a ho paw, a ccukuh bua paw nynh athua`ae.
54005014	Tukeiccuze a rhawtupaw nynh saryanaw lanpaw kha ccyhhoy a pya khyh nawlan, kum anohua`ae paw numae`ae tuh vawpaw la hoi`ae sah, ccaaw la saah`ae sah, innlo la dooih`ae sah cite ka ry.
54005015	Pawccecize abang tuh Setan nuhlang phe a paleihkuh vae`ae.
54005016	A zyn paw pise, tukhyhze a zyn paw nopi nynh numae`ae a hoi ze, mimaw nynh minmin kha dooih`ae sah lah kriccawbu kha tavuin pya thua nan sah. Ou tuhte numae ccaccing`ae kha kriccawbu nynh a dooih nawlan.
54005017	Ahoyte a uk`ae paw pastor`ae, abapi lante phunghonaw kya te ccangpyanaw kya ryalah`ae paw tuh sawtuanaw leih ning te ccou lan angaekuh`ae cite tua lanpaw nynh thua.
54005018	Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh, “Ccatan a tin paw tangnuapaw a mung kha na bucceih lan khyh,” a ci. Te, “Ryalahtupaw tuh a ryalaw mee mue lan accan,” bua a ci.
54005019	Ccaekia luning, tukhyhze luthung a um khyh ze, pastor sei a benaw`ae kha nawccawpah nan`ae.
54005020	Mingccang`ae nynh mah a ri ccaw`ae, a sei`ae paw kha ccungccaw balyn malang khe pe`ae.
54005021	Lukheit laeze lukheit maedo huanaw kharyh hoi leite, laesanaw te pawpaw sanmah na cyi khyh nawlan, Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri malang thuasah, popaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang thuasah e uccaw`ae hynh nang nynh na zui nawlan, bya kae tawsya.
54005022	Hung ccungccaw tungvaw sanmah na kuih palou la khang nan. Milae seinaw kha mah la neethungkuh bua nan, namaw te namaw kha la thyaasakuh.
54005023	Na vue elan te leih na ccinawpaw hanlan, tui kyalya kha la neih nan, thuasalama misutui beihtaraw kha la mangbia.
54005024	Ccungccaw abang seinaw tuh raerae alangkuh, mih seinaw`ae tuh byapianaw kalan laanmawty vae. Ccungccaw abang seinaw tuh nyalang te nynh alangku.
54005025	Tuhhawte ccungccaw abang kya-e ahoypaw ryalaw tuh raerae alangkuh, te alangkuh loh leipaw ahoypaw ryalaw`ae mah phisi kho thua lan khyh.
54006001	Pachia a min te a ccangpyanaw kha thethyaccou khyh nawlan, taphu kaw um paw see`ae miakaw nynh tuh mih bawi`ae kha myarya sawtua lan accan cite tua`ae sah.
54006002	Te zyntu bawi`ae a hoi paw see`ae nynh uteno athua`ae keiccuze pawlangria leite um nan`ae sah. Thuasalama thanenaw a ccou`ae paw tuh zyntu`ae te sungsah`ae paw athua`ae keiccu mih bawi`ae kha houh ryalawpah`ae sah. Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh la ccangpah`ae lah la hy`ae.
54006003	Lukhakheit nynh ccanglangte a ccangpya lan thua ze, te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri bya athua paw phe riapaw bya`ae kha a nawccaw khyh lan thua ze, te Pachia lante ccia paw te accawkuhpaw ccangpyakunaw kha a nawccaw khyh lan thua ze,
54006004	aning tuh pawsang ny leite a tansakuhpaw nynh thua. Thuasalama aning tuh byalungnaw te byaeikunaw kya a lungzua paw nynh thua. Tuh-e`ae kyate eiungnaw, peku maekunaw, thethyahonaw, ahoy leipaw lunghiinnaw,
54006005	ahoy leipaw tuanaw-thinlung kyate ccungccaw`ae ry thawte eikunaw kha a pou, te byaccing cipaw um khyh, Pachia lante ccia paw tuh muenawpaw nynh thua cite a tua`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kyate namaw kha la phiakuh.
54006006	Thuasalama lungryachikhaekunaw ryte Pachia lante ccia paw tuh alepipaw muenaw nynh thua.
54006007	Pawccecize laephipi lungkhu lang aening nynh pawsang mah ah thuakhae khyh oh; pawsang mah ah poukhae kho lan khyh oh cipaw phe aria.
54006008	Te aepaw te boeining-sungpue ah hoi oh paw khate ah lungryachikhaeku lanpaw nynh thua.
54006009	Thuasalama hoirung a ry`ae paw tuh tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang, kaang lungkhu lang, ngaeenaw patae te ronaw thuakhae paw ryduanaw lungkhu lang nynh a phungkuh cih`ae. Tuh-e`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha ronaw te zonaw kya a phungsaku`ae.
54006010	Pawccecize phua rynaw tuh ahoy leipaw phin balyn kyaze atharuipi nynh thua. Kha-e kha ccungccaw abang nynh he a dua`ae tuh zynnaw kyate phe a cceihsei vae`ae, te mimaw te mimaw kha ngaethyanaw pataepi khate a thuinkuh`ae.
54006011	Thuasalama, pou Pachia ccungccapaw, nang tuh kha-e uccaw`ae kha ccuetaw lah dingnaw, Pachia lante ccia paw, zynnaw, sungsakunaw, ngaesangnaw, nevyalyanaw kha la zui.
54006012	Zynnaw kya-e ahoypaw rhawtuknaw kha la tuk, zungzae hiinnaw kha varyn kyngkuh. Kha-e kalan nang tuh ko na thua zah ccaekia patae malang ahoypaw ccaekia phe na khang vae.
54006013	Pawpaw balyn hiinnaw a pyatupaw Pachia malang te Pontias Pilat malang ahoypaw ccaekia a khangtupaw Kri Jesu malang, nang kha bya kae tawsya paw tuh:
54006014	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn langkuh cia nang nynh athupaw beku leite, seibe lanpaw a um lei lante, kawpyapaw kha la zui cipaw nynh thua.
54006015	Tuh-e langkunaw kha Pachia nynh amaw accyh kya yn langsakuh cih. Aning tuh thehoyccoupaw, a makhae kyalya Athungpaw, siapharan`ae Siapharan te bawi`ae Bawipaw nynh thua.
54006016	Amaw rou nynh chi kho leinaw a hoi, hung ccungccaw nynh san a naeku kho leipaw awnaw kya a um paw nynh thua; amaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san muih boi khyh zah muih kho khyh; sawtuanaw te zungzae thungnaw tuh amaw kya um sah. Amen.
54006017	Atu she kya a hoirung`ae paw kha a tansaku khyh nawlan`ae, atyn leipaw hoirungnaw kha a doliaku khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama ah lungtua nawlan pawpaw balyn phe beih lang oun pyatupaw, a hiinpaw Pachia kha a doliaku nawlan`ae kawpya`ae.
54006018	Minmin nynh ahoypaw ryalaw kya a hoirung ccaw`ae, pyabua lan a paccynku ccaw`ae, neethungbua lan a ry ccaw`ae ahoypaw rya law lan kawpya`ae.
54006019	Zungzae hiinnaw kha a phyabua nawlan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw ccyh elan mimaw hanlan ahoypaw atungpi kha a ccakhungkuh cih`ae.
54006020	Pou Timote, na kya ae ahsya`ae paw kha la ring. Anungsikuhpaw te accakaepaw byahokupaw, te akyh lei lante nynaw a ci`ae paw, arawsekuh`ae paw kha la sibia.
54006021	Kha-e akyh leipaw nynaw kha lawku bua te ccungccaw abang nynh zynnaw kha phe a poutaw vae`ae. Thawccinaw tuh na kya la um vae sah. Amen.
55001001	Kri Jesu kya a um paw hiinnaw kya-e byakinpyakupaw thyhte, Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw Paul nynh,
