55001002	kou ka sungsahpaw ka ccapaw, Timote: Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na kya la um sah.
55001003	Khuazi khuadae ka sawsangnaw kya nang kha apaekuh lei lang kae liathui hawte, ka minpaaw`ae ka tawpaw`ae nynh rya a la lawpya`ae hawte, athyaapaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung te rya ka lawpyapaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
55001004	Na mitphi kha ka tuathui tuh lungtuanaw te phe ka bia nawlan nang kha muih lan myarya kae ry.
55001005	Na minnung Lois te na nung Eunis kya masaty a la um paw zynnaw hawte, cyiruhnaw um leipaw na zynnaw kha ka liathui; te kha-e zynnaw tuh nang na kya mah a um cipaw ccaerarihlan ka ny.
55001006	Tukeiccu ka kuih khangnaw liate na kya um paw Pachia lasung kha houh na ruasah nawlan, nang kha kae nysah thui ry.
55001007	Pawccecize Pachia nynh rawthyanaw muisaw kha aening oun pya khyh, thuasalama thungnaw, sungsakunaw, te mawtemaw yhku khonaw muisaw kha nynh oun pya.
55001008	Tukeiccu ah Bawipaw kya-e ccaekia kha thuasah, amaw keiccu thung a ccah paw kamaw kha thuasah mae oun thyakhae nan; thuasalama Pachia thungnaw liate thehoypaw hanlan teingnaw kha la neethungkuh bua.
55001009	Tuh-e Pachia nynh aening kha phe oun khum vae zah athyaapaw konaw te phe oun ko vae. Tuh-e tuh aening ah ryalawnaw thyhte thua khyh, thuasalama amaw a eenaw te laephipi atho mawze Kri Jesu kya aening pya athua paw a thawccinaw thyhte nynh aening kha oun ko.
55001010	Tuh-e thawccinaw tuh aening oun Khumtu Jesu Kri yn langkunaw liate atu alangkuh vae. Tuh-e Jesu nynh chinaw kha phe zosah zah hiinnaw te chi kho leinaw kha thehoypaw liate awnaw kalan a thuakhae.
55001011	Tuh-e thehoypaw phunghotu lang, locceihtu lang te Zenta`ae ccangpatu lang kae tuh khang ka thua.
55001012	Kha-e keiccu nynh hynh-e vawsawnaw`ae hynh kae mah ka teing. Tuhzemah ka maethah khyh. Pawccecize hung nynh ka zyn cipaw kha ka ny. Te amaw kalan kae nynh ka ah paw uccaw kha tuh-e nin kyacia a khynsah kho cipaw ka ny.
55001013	Kri Jesu kya a um paw zynnaw te sungsakunaw te asekuhpaw, kamaw kyate phe na thae vae paw dosuinku lan um paw ahmepaw bya kha varyn la kyngkuh.
55001014	Nang na kalan ahpya athuapaw, ahoypaw uccaw kha, aening kya a um paw Thyaa Muisaw liate la khynsah.
55001015	Asia ram kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh kamaw kha phe oun cciataw vae`ae cipaw nang nynh phe na ny. Tuh-e`ae kya Fykelas te Hemokene a umbua`ae.
55001016	Onesiphoras innbyn kha Bawipaw nynh ngaethya-umsanaw la pya`ae sah. Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw kha thaw pei yn muinsah he paw nynh thua. Kamaw sivarui te yn khii`ae paw kha mah mae yn thyakhae khyh.
55001017	Thuasalama Rom khuapi kya a um lya kamaw kha thawmawte yn la ccung zah phe yn muih.
55001018	Tuh-e nin kya Bawipaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha aning nynh a mue nawlan Bawipaw nynh la pyabua vae sah. Efesa khua kya kamaw hanlan pawcih nynh yn cyipya cipaw kha nang nynh phe na ny ccaccing.
55002001	Tukeiccu, ka ccapaw, nang tuh Kri Jesu kya a um paw thawccinaw kyakhe na thaw la sae sah.
55002002	Te ccaekia`ae patae laku kamaw kyate phe na thae vae paw uccaw`ae kha, zyn lan um paw ccungccaw`ae te ming`ae kha mah bua a ccangpah kho cih`ae paw kalan khe kha-e kha la ahpah`ae.
55002003	Tukeiccuze Jesu Kri kya-e rhawkaw hoypaw hawkhate, nang tuh vawsawnaw kha la ngaesang.
55002004	Rhawkaw nynh tuh amaw kha rhawkaw lang a potupaw lungrythuasah khylan amaw te amaw kha hynh-e hiinnaw kya-e uccaw`ae khate khawsakuh boi khyh.
55002005	Lukhakheit nynh khungtaekunaw kya khungtaekuh bua zah aphung thyhte khungtaeku khyh ze, haetapaw lukhung kha mue khyh.
55002006	Thawte reihkuhpaw loophopaw tuh masaty looh a mue paw athua hahe cih.
55002007	Ka hopaw kha hoyte la tua, te Bawipaw nynh pawpaw balyn kya thaethyanaw kha ae pya vae sah.
55002008	David ciihan athua paw Jesu Kri tuh kae nynh ka hopaw thehoypaw thyhte a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui cipaw kha la liathui.
55002009	Kha-e thehoypaw hanlan kae tuh ahoy leipaw ryalahtu hawte sivarui te khiinaw hei kha vawsaw ka teing; thuasalama Pachia bya tuh khii kho thua khyh.
55002010	Tukeiccuze popaw ccungccaw`ae nynh mah Kri Jesu kya a um paw khumnaw kha zungzae phu-enaw ryte a muebua nawlan`ae, minmin hanlan pawpaw balyn kha ka ngaesang.
55002011	Hynh-e tuh zyn lan um paw bya nynh thua: Pawccecize amaw ryte ah chi oh ze, amaw ryte ah hiinbua cih oh.
55002012	Aening ah teing oh ze, amaw ryte ah uk bua cih oh; amaw kha ah vua oh ze, aning nynh mah aening kha yn vua cih.
55002013	Aening tuh zyn lan ah um khyh oh zemah, aning tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua, amaw te amaw kha vuakuh kho khyh.
55002014	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh la tuasathui`ae. Athane leipaw te a thaetu`ae kha arosah paw bya kong kha minmin nynh a peku khyh nawlan`ae Bawipaw malang bya tawsya `ae.
55002015	Byaccing bya kha hmerarihlan phiathyate, maethya aho leipaw ryalahtu lukheit hawkhate, Pachia malang nawccawkhaepaw na thua nawlan, namaw te namaw kha langsaku khylan thawte zuakuh.
55002016	Thuasalama anungsikuhpaw, accakaepaw ccohkupaw kha la sungkuh. Pawccecize kha-e`ae nynh Pachia lante zuaku leinaw kalan houh ae kaethungsah cih.
55002017	Te mih bya tuh khensa ccinaw hawte apazaekuh cih. Tuh-e`ae laku Hymenaeas te Filetas a umbua`ae.
55002018	Minmin nynh thothuinaw tuh phe athang vae paw nynh thua a ci`ae keiccuze byaccing kyate phe a cceihsei vae`ae, te ccungccaw abang zynnaw kha phe a buleihpya`ae.
55002019	Tuhzemah Pachia kya-e atynpaw atungpi tuh a thadyn; hynh-e tazeihkhiapaw a hoi, “Bawipaw nynh amaw a ccungccaw`ae kha a ny,” te, “Kri min a phukuhpaw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh hoyleinaw kha poutaw sah,” acihkuh.
55002020	Thuasalama inn lepipaw kya sui ang`ae te phua ang`ae kyalya um khyh. Thing ang`ae te lae ang`ae mah a umbua. Abang tuh sawtuanaw hanlan thua zah abang tuh sawtua leinaw hanlan nynh thua.
55002021	Tukeiccuze ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh anungsikuhpaw uccaw kyate amaw te amaw kha a ccikanku lanze, aning tuh sawtuanaw hanlan mang lan um paw ang, thyaasah athuapaw, Bawipaw nynh mang lan asypaw, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw hanlan paccynpaw athua cih.
55002022	Ngawphue ryduanaw kha mah la ccuetaw, thuasalama athyaapaw thinlung hoi`ae paw, Bawipaw a ko`ae paw ryte dingnaw, zynnaw, sungsakunaw te daenaw kha la deesui.
55002023	Thuasalama angaeepaw te pawsang ny leipaw byakhianaw kha la sibia. Kha-e nynh tuh peku maekunaw kha nynh a thuakhae cipaw kha na ny.
55002024	Bawipaw ryalawpatu nynh tuh pekuh maekuh hahe lan khyh. Thuasalama ccungccaw balyn kya a nevyalya cih, a ccangpah kho cih zah a lungsae cih,
55002025	amaw a rawse`ae paw kha lungnenaw te a thuihei cih`ae, byaccing kha a ny nawlan`ae ngaesikunaw kha Pachia nynh minmin kha a pya ze yn pya cih`ae,
55002026	te minmin nynh tuathya nythyanaw kha a hoi ccaw`ae cite, te diabolos nynh a rynaw kha raesah khylan a kyngnaw`ae paw kaang kyate a lue cih`ae.
55003001	Nyathyakou nin tuh vawsawrunaw ccyh yn thua cih cipaw kha la nyh.
55003002	Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae tuh mimaw a sungsakuh`ae paw, phua a sungsah`ae paw, a pookuh`ae paw, a tansakuh`ae paw, Pachia thethyaho`ae paw, nung te paaw kawngae lei`ae paw, lungtuabya a hothya lei`ae paw, athyaa lei`ae paw,
55003003	sungsanaw hoi lei`ae paw, ccungccaw ngaethya lei`ae paw, milae thanho`ae paw, a syngkuh kho lei`ae paw, eih re kaesy`ae paw, ahoypaw a hua`ae paw,
55003004	lungzi lei`ae paw, paw peki lei`ae paw, alysakuh`ae paw, Pachia sungsahpaw laeze hoysanaw a ryhua`ae paw,
55003005	Pachia lante a cceih paw olante a umsaku`ae zemah kha-e thungnaw kha a vua`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha la sibia`ae.
55003006	Pawccecize tuhtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae tuh inn`ae lungkhu lang tee`ae zah seinaw nynh phang ne`ae paw, zoikadeih lang ling kho um paw nopi`ae kha see lang kyng`ae zah duanaw aphuinphuin te a cciakhae`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
55003007	Tuh-e`ae tuh pei a ccangkuh`ae pite byaccing nynaw kya a phah kho lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
55003008	Jannes te Jambres nynh Mawsi kha a dou`ae hawte kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh byaccing kha a dou`ae. Minmin tuh thinlung arohpaw ccungccaw`ae thua`ae zah zynnaw konglang te a nue`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
55003009	Thuasalama kha-e luning`ae a ngaeenaw`ae tuh phe alangku vae hawte hynh-e`ae mih ngaeenaw mah ccungccaw balyn malang a langkuh cih. Tukeiccu minmin tuh khalaeze lethung kho vae lan khyh`ae.
55003010	Thuasalama ka ccangpyanaw, ka hiinnaw ozia, ka eenaw, ka zynnaw, khaw ka teingnaw, sungsakunaw, ka ngaesangnaw,
55003011	Antiok khua kya, Ikoniam khua kya, Lystra khua kya ka tungpaw yn tua yn sahnaw`ae, vawsawrunaw`ae tuh pawtahawpaw tuasakunaw`ae kha nynh ka teing cipaw marya na ny; thuasalama kha-e`ae balyn kyate Bawipaw nynh kamaw kha yn luesah.
55003012	Athua, Kri Jesu kya Pachia rawrinaw te a hiinry`ae paw ccungccaw balyn nynh tuh tuasakunaw kha a teing cih`ae.
55003013	Thuasalama athahpaw ccungccaw`ae te ccungccaw pei a hyngpah`ae paw tuh houhouh athahpaw lang a tang cih`ae. Ming`ae kha a phee cih`ae zah mimaw mah phee athua cih`ae.
55003014	Thuasalama nang tuh phe na ccangku vae paw te phe na zyn ccaccing vae paw uccaw`ae kyakhe po la tyn, pawccecize hung kyate nynh na ccangku cipaw kha na ny.
55003015	Te na imua lya mawte nang tuh Ccathyaa kha phe na ny vae, kha-e Ccathyaa nynh Kri Jesu kya um paw zynnaw liate khumnaw mue lan nang kha ae hawsah kho.
55003016	Ccathyaa balyn tuh Pachia hysawnua paw nynh thua. Tuh-e Ccathyaa tuh ccangpyakunaw hanlan, seimuihsakunaw hanlan, raethuinaw hanlan, dingnaw kya thuiheikunaw hanlan athanepaw nynh thua.
55003017	Ou tuhte Pachia ccungccapaw tuh accing nawlan, ahoypaw ryalaw balyn hanlan khaleih paccynpaw athua nawlan nynh thua.
55004001	Tukeiccu Pachia malang te Bawipaw Jesu Kri malang kae nynh bya kae tawsya. Tuh-e Bawipaw nynh amaw yn langkunaw kya, te a peenaw kya a hiin`ae paw te a chih`ae paw kha byapia vae cih.
55004002	Pachia bya kha la ho! Accyh thua zemah, accyh thua khyh zemah la paccynkuh, lungsaenaw pipi ryte, thuiheinaw ryte mih seinaw kha la muihsakuh`ae, la pe`ae lah la hy`ae.
55004003	Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh ahmepaw ccangpyakunaw kha a ngaery khyh`ae ccyh yn thua cih, thuasalama azeipaw nakaring`ae keiccuze mimaw rynaw thyhte mimaw te mimaw kha ccangpatu`ae lang oun sueluakuh cih`ae.
55004004	Te minmin nynh mih nakaring`ae kha byaccing kyate oun paleih cih`ae zah phungpaw huataw`ae kalan oun paleihkuh cih`ae.
55004005	Thuasalama nang tuh pawpaw balyn kya la raeringkuh, riathaenaw`ae kha la ngaesang, evangelist ryalaw kha la lah, na ryalawpaw kha la ccingsah.
55004006	Pawccecize kae tuh nia lan pyapaw-uccaw hawte atu phang paccyn ka thua vae, te ka pou nawlan paw accyh tuh anae vae.
55004007	Kae nynh ahoypaw rhawtukkunaw kha phe ka tuk vae. Ccuetaekunaw kha phe ka thangsah vae. Zynnaw kha phe ka tynsah vae.
55004008	Atu te vae tuh dingnaw suilukhung kha kamaw hanlan nungpya athua vae. Tuh-e kha adingpaw byapiatu, Bawipaw nynh tuh-e nin kya kamaw kha yn pya cih. Kamaw kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama amaw yn langku lanpaw a ngaehoi`ae paw balyn kha mah a pya cih`ae.
55004009	Kamaw kalan aro maw thua lan thawte yn zuakuh.
55004010	Pawccecize Demas nynh hynh-e atu she hynh sungsahte, kamaw kha phe oun vuasya vae, te aning tuh Thesalonika khua lang phe a pou vae. Kresen tuh Galati kalan, Titu tuh Dalmatia kalan phe pou vae`ae.
55004011	Luka kyalya nynh kamaw ryte a um. Marka kha yn kobua lah namaw ryte oun cceih oh. Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw hanlan ryalawnaw kya accungkia.
55004012	Te Tykhikas kha Efesa lang phe ka saw vae.
55004013	Troas khua um paw Karpus kya ka cciataw paw angkiccua kha he nae ccia vae ze yn phubia, te ccaleih`ae, abapi lante saving-ccaleih`ae kha yn phubia.
55004014	Sohinlaeetupaw, Alexanda nynh kamaw tungvaw athahpaw patae a cyi; Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha amaw a ryalaw thyhte amee pyaru vae sah.
55004015	Amaw kha nang nynh la raeringkuh, pawccecize aning nynh kae ccangpyanaw`ae kha thawmawte a rawse.
55004016	Masaty ka thungkhawkunaw kya hung sanmah kamaw yn pangkhae khyh, thuasalama mih balynte phe oun vuasya`ae; kha-e hanlan mih tungvaw seibe thua nan sah.
55004017	Tuhzemah ou tuhte kamaw liate phunghopaw tuh khaleih phy athua nawlan te Zenta`ae balyn nynh marya a thae ccaw`ae cite kamaw kha Bawipaw nynh yn pangkhae zah thawzung yn pya. Te kae tuh chindeih khalang kyate luesah ka thua.
55004018	Bawipaw nynh ahoy leipaw ryalaw miakaw kyate kamaw kha yn luesah cih zah a vaawran peenaw kalan khyndadyhlan yn nung cih. Amaw kya phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.
55004019	Priska te Akuila, te Onesiphoras innbyn kha la beihlang`ae.
55004020	Erastas tuh Korin khua kya nynh a um; thuasalama Trofimas tuh a cci keiccu Miletas kya nynh phe ka cciataw.
55004021	Khoccihsaw athua maw kamaw kalan thua lan thawte yn zuakuh. Eubulas, Puden, Linas, Klaudia te uteno`ae balyn nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae.
55004022	Bawipaw Jesu Kri tuh na muisaw ryte la um sah. Thawccinaw tuh na kya la um sah. Amen.
56001001	Pachia nynh a po`ae paw zynnaw thyhte, te Pachia lante ccia paw te accawkuhpaw byaccing nynaw thyhte, Pachia seepaw te Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw, Paul nynh,
56001002	zungzae hiinnaw ngaehoinaw kya a hyng kho leipaw Pachia nynh accyh atho mawze byakinpyaku vae paw,
56001003	thuasalama accyh he azawte phunghonaw liate a bya kha phe a langsaku vae, kha-e kha aening oun Khumtu Pachia kya-e kawpyapaw thyhte kamaw kya pya athua.
56001004	Ranzae zynnaw lante ka ccapaw ccaccing athua paw Titu: Paaw Pachia te aening oun Khumtu Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na kya la um vae sah.
56001005	Ahobou ung paw uccaw`ae kha nang nynh kou hoy lang na la law ccaw cite, nang kha kaw phe kae pya vae hawkhate, khua takyh kya kriccaw piccang`ae na khang ccaw cite nynh, nang kha Krete tuikoih kyakhe kae cciataw;
56001006	na khang lanpaw ccungccaw tuh ccaenaw um leipaw athua ze, zu lukheit vawpaw athua ze, a ccaaw`ae tuh zyn lan um`ae paw thua`ae zah, a ccouseikuh`ae paw cite, nawngae lei`ae paw cite a ccae lei`ae paw athua ze khang lanpaw nynh thua.
56001007	Pawccecize kriccawbu cciakhaetu tuh Pachia kya-e synriatu athua hawte ccaenaw um leipaw, amaw rynaw te um leipaw, a thindyn leipaw, misutui a rang leipaw, peku maeku a mang leipaw, phua elan a karangkuh leipaw,
56001008	tuhkoute mikhia dooihthya paw, ahoypaw a sungsah paw, a tuathya paw, hmerarihpaw, thyaararihpaw, a sungkuh khopaw;
56001009	ahmepaw ccangpyanaw khate ming`ae kha a hy kho nawlan`ae te kha-e ccangpyanaw a rawse`ae paw kha mih seinaw a muihsaku kho nawlan`ae, aning tuh ccangpya a thua vae thyhhawte zyn lan um paw bya kha varyn a kyngkuh paw athua hahe cih.
56001010	Pawccecize nawngae lei`ae, accakaepaw byahotu`ae te lingtu`ae patae a um`ae. Abapi lante vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
56001011	Tuh-e`ae mih khalang tuh phang fu athua hahe cih, minmin nynh ahme leipaw muenaw a ry`ae keiccuze, ccangpya lan accan leipaw kha ccangpah`ae zah innbyn mawte phe a buleih`ae.
56001012	Mimaw kyaze minphuin kheit athua paw, mih profeh lukheit nynh, “Krete ccungccaw`ae tuh pei a hyng`ae paw, arepaw rangsaw`ae, thawnaw`ae paw aemoh`ae nynh thua`ae,” a ci.
56001013	Hynh-e bya hopaw tuh ahmepaw nynh thua. Tukeiccu minmin tuh zynnaw kya atyn nawlan`ae phe ccihtheih lang la pe`ae.
56001014	Byaccing kyate a paleihkuh paw ccungccaw kawpyapaw`ae te Jew`ae phungpaw huataw`ae kha pawlang a ria khyh nawlan`ae nynh thua.
56001015	Athyaapaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan tuh pawpaw balyn marya athyaa, thuasalama anungsikuhpaw te a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan tuh pawsang mah thyaa khyh. Thuasalama mih tuanaw-thinlung te mimaw nykunawpaw thinlung heize anungsikuh.
56001016	Minmin nynh Pachia kae nyh cite ho`ae salamah mih cyisahnaw kyate Pachia kha a vua`ae; pawccecize minmin tuh luathua-ae-ui lang um`ae paw, kawngae lei`ae paw, te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya ccungkia lei`ae paw nynh thua.
56002001	Thuasalama nang tuh akyhpaw ccangpyanaw te angaekuhpaw bya kha la ho.
56002002	Ou tuhte pawpi`ae tuh a lungkyhpaw, sawtua lan um paw, ngaesangnaw a hoi paw, zynnaw kya, sungsakunaw kya, lungsaenaw kya atynpaw athua nawlan`ae la ccangpah`ae.
56002003	Tuhhawte nungpi`ae kha mah umtu ziazae kya sawtua lan um paw athua nawlan`ae, milae thanthya a ho`ae paw athua khyh nawlan`ae, misutui eih a rang paw athua khyh nawlan`ae, ahoypaw uccaw`ae ccangpatu`ae athua nawlan`ae la ccangpah`ae.
56002004	Ou tuhte nungpi`ae nynh kum nohua`ae paw nopi`ae kha, mih vawpaw`ae sungsahpaw, mih ccaaw`ae sungsahpaw,
56002005	a tuathya paw, athyaapaw, innlo a dooihthya paw, ahoypaw, mih vawpaw`ae kawngae`ae paw athua nawlan`ae a thuihei ccaw`ae; ou tuhte Pachia bya tuh thethyaccousah athua khyh nawlan nynh thua.
56002006	Tuhhawte kum anopaw pise`ae kha a tuathya`ae paw thua nawlan la hy`ae.
56002007	Pawpaw balyn kya ahoypaw ryalaw`ae khate dosuinkupaw lang la langpakuh`ae. Ccangpyakunaw kya ccirarihnaw, lungzinaw, thanccing thuanaw te,
56002008	seibe kho a um leipaw accipaw byaho kha la mang. Ou tetuh ae rawsetupaw nynh na konglang athahpaw uccaw a ho lanpaw hoi vae leite maethya a bongkuh vae cih.
56002009	See`ae nynh pawpaw kya balyn mih bawi`ae kawngae nawlan`ae, mih lunghoysah nawlan`ae, bua a khungru khyh nawlan`ae,
56002010	a rupya khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama pawpaw kya balyn aening oun Khumtu Pachia ccangpyanaw kha minmin nynh a paccaan nawlan`ae, ahoypaw zyn lan umnaw balyn kha a langsaku nawlan`ae la hy`ae.
56002011	Pawccecize khumnaw yn thuakhae paw Pachia kya-e thawccinaw tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn kya phe a langkuh vae.
56002012	Pachia pawlangria leipaw te laephi lante ryduanaw`ae kha vuate, aening tuh kyhrarih lante, dingrarih lante, Pachia lante zuakute hynh-e atu she kya ah hiin lan oh paw nynh thua cite tuh-e thawccinaw nynh yn ccangpya.
56002013	Lungtua lan um paw ngaehoinaw te alesaepaw Pachia athua paw, aening Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e aphu-epaw langkunaw kha ah ngaehoi oh paw nynh thua.
56002014	Tuh-e Jesu Kri tuh cyiseimenaw balyn kyate aening kha sawkhaw khylan, te amaw elan ccungccaw`ae kha ccikan khylan, tuh-e a ccikan paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ahoypaw cyisahnaw kha mih lungzua nawlan amaw te amaw kha aening hanlan a pyaku.
56002015	Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh kawhoinaw balyn khate la hopah`ae, la hy`ae lah la pe`ae. Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah pawlangria leite ae la um nan`ae sah.
56003001	Uktu`ae te kawhoitu`ae nynh oun uknaw`ae kha nawccaw lan, kawngae lan, te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya paccynku khylan,
56003002	hung ccungccaw kong sanmah thethyaho khyh nawlan, peku maeku khyh nawlan, nevyalyapaw thua nawlan, ccungccaw`ae balyn kya lungnenaw kha langsakute a um nawlan`ae minmin kha la nysathui`ae.
56003003	Pawccecize langmaw lya tuh aening mah mingaee`ae, kawngae lei`ae, ming`ae nynh a phee`ae paw, ryduanaw aphuinphuin te hoysanaw`ae see nynh ah la thua oh, ahoy leipaw te eiungnaw kya hiinte, ming`ae nynh a hua`ae paw te lukheit te lukheit a huakuh`ae paw nynh ah la thua oh.
56003004	Thuasalama aening oun Khumtu Pachia kya-e thawccithyanaw te sungsanaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya he yn langkuh tuh,
56003005	aening nynh ah rae oh paw dingnaw cyisahnaw`ae liate thua leite, thuasalama amaw ngaethyaumsanaw thyhte bua saahthuinaw kya-e singpyanaw liate, te Thyaa Muisaw thawsathuinaw liate nynh aening kha yn khum.
56003006	Aening oun Khumtu Jesu Kri liate kha-e Muisaw kha aening tungvaw kya phe beih lang yn bu.
56003007	Ou tuhte a thawccinaw liate thyaaccousah ah thua oh koute, zungzae hiinnaw ngaehoinaw thyhte aening tuh rhoccoutu`ae ah thua nawlan oh nynh thua.
56003008	E tuh zyn lan um paw bya thua zah hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nang nynh atu te atu la ho ci ka ry. Ou tuhte Pachia a zyn`ae paw nynh ahoypaw cyisahnaw kya tyn lan a raeringku nawlan`ae nynh thua. E uccaw`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae hanlan hoy zah athanepaw nynh thua.
56003009	Thuasalama ngaeepaw byakhiakunaw`ae, thokeinaw`ae kong, byaeikunaw`ae, kawbya kong peku maekunaw`ae kha la sibia. Pawccecize kha-e`ae tuh ccungkia khyh zah athane leipaw nynh thua.
56003010	Phiasakunaw a rae paw ccungccaw kha vaekheit, vaening thuiheinaw na pya koute tuh la dee ccavae.
56003011	Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh amaw te amaw seibekuhpaw, a lungzi leipaw te a seipaw nynh thua cipaw na ny oh.
56003012	Artemas, khyh ze Tykhikas kha na kalan he kae saw te, Nikopolis khua cia ka kalan thua khonawte yn zuakuh. Pawccecize khoccihsaw lungkhu tuin kya um lante phe ka tuaku vae.
56003013	Kawbya a thya`ae paw Zenas te Apollos kha mih khuaccungnaw kya mih hanlan pawsang ahobou khyh nawlan zuapahkuh`ae lah la cciakhae`ae.
56003014	Te aening ah ccungccaw`ae mah athae thae leipaw athua khyh nawlan`ae, mih hanlan ahoboupaw kya mang lanpaw a hoi nawlan`ae, ahoypaw ryalaw pei law lan la ccangkuh`ae sah.
56003015	Ka kya a umbua`ae paw balyn nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Zynnaw kya aening oun sungsah`ae paw kha la beih`ae. Thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um vae sah. Amen.
57001001	Jesu Kri keiccu thung a ccah paw Paul te kae unopaw Timote nynh kou sungsahpaw te rya kae lahkheihpaw Filemon kalan,
57001002	te kae sungsahpaw Apphia te rhawkaw kae thuakheih paw Archippus kalan te na innbyn kya um paw kriccawbu kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
57001003	Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah.
57001004	Ka sawsangnaw kya nang kha pei sangpya biate ka Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
57001005	Pawccecize nang nynh Bawipaw Jesu kalan te mithyaa`ae balyn kalan na hoi paw na kya-e sungsakunaw te zynnaw kha ka thae pawte,
57001006	Kri Jesu liate na kya um paw ahoypaw uccaw miakaw nynaw liate na zynnaw kya-e hoiccaw tangnaw tuh ccungkia thanepaw lang a tang nawlan saw kae sangpya.
57001007	Pawccecize na sungsanaw kya ngaengansanaw te lungtuanaw alepi kaening kae hoi. Pawkeiccumacize ka unopaw, nang na liate mithyaa`ae thinlung tuh bua lungpawsah athua.
57001008	Tukeiccu nang kawpya lan accanpaw kha Kri liate kae tuh kou ka zynku zemah,
57001009	a kum tang vae paw lukheit athua paw, te atu mah Jesu Kri keiccu thungccahpaw Paul nynh sungsakunaw keiccuze kae ngia paleih.
57001010	Thung yn sawnaw`ae kya ka saah paw, ka ccapaw Onesimas hanlan nang kha kae ngia.
57001011	Langmaw lya aning tuh na hanlan ccungkia khyh, thuasalama atu tuh na hanlan te ka hanlan ccungkia vae.
57001012	Amaw kha na kalan bua kae saw. Tukeiccu nang nynh amaw kha leh la khan, tuh-e tuh kamaw ka thinlung kya-e nynh thua.
57001013	Thehoypaw keiccuze thung ka ccaw lungkhu aning nynh nang na ccelang kae kha rya yn lawpya nawlan amaw kha ka kya ka umsah ry paw nynh thua.
57001014	Thuasalama na hoynawpaw tuh nangsepaw keiccu hawte thua leite, lungthote athua nawlan na nawccaw leite pawsang ka cyihry khyh.
57001015	Pawccecize aning nynh na kyate sosoh taraw a la toikupaw tuh amaw kha nang nynh zungzae na hoi nawlan athua kho ci lante nynh a um.
57001016	Atu tuh see lukheit hawte thua vae leite, see laeze ahang lante la ccou ccavae. Abapi lante kamaw hanlan sungsahpaw uno nynh athua vae, te pynsaw lante thuasah, Bawipaw kya thuasah na hanlan pawcihmou houh sungsahpaw thua lan accan.
57001017	Tukeiccu nang nynh kamaw hynh ah mungkuhpaw lukheit lante nae tua ze amaw kha kamaw hawte la ccou.
57001018	Na tungvaw phe a cyisei ze, tukhyhze ccangkhakheit lae ae um ze, kha-e kha kae nynh laeba ka um paw lang la tua.
57001019	E hynh kae, Paul nynh kamaw ka kuih te ka zei paw nynh thua, kha-e kha kae pyaru cih. Tuhzemah nang nynh kamaw kya namaw te namaw heize laeba nae um cipaw kha kae hopah khyh.
57001020	Athua, ka unopaw, na kyate lungpawnaw kha Bawipaw kya yn muesahbua, Bawipaw min te nang nynh ka thinlung kha bua lungpawsah.
57001021	Nang nynh kaw na la ngae cih cite zynkunaw ka hoi pawte e ccaw hynh na kalan kae zei. Ka hopaw laehei nang nynh na la cyih cih cipaw ka ny.
57001022	Te ka thuanaw lanpaw kha mah yn la paccynpah; pawccecize nae sawsangnaw liate nae kalan bua thuasah ka thua cih cite ka ngaehoi.
57001023	Kri Jesu kya kamaw ryte thung kae ccahkheih paw Epafras nynh nang kha ae beihlang.
57001024	Te kamaw ry rya kae lahkheihtu`ae Marka, Aristarkhas, Demas te Luka nynh ae beihlang`ae.
57001025	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae muisaw kya la um vae sah. Amen.
58001001	Langmaw lyaze profeh`ae kyate ah minpaaw`ae kalan khe avae pataepi aphuinphuin te bya ho paw Pachia nynh,
58001002	hynh-e nyathyakou nin ccyh kya vae tuh amaw a Ccapaw kyate nynh aening kalan khe bya yn hopya vae. Kha-e Ccapaw kha pawpaw balyn rhoccoutu lang phe a khang vae. Amaw liate nynh laephipi hynh mah a rae.
58001003	Tuh-e Ccapaw tuh Pachia phu-enaw awnawpaw te Pachiathuanaw muinsan langsakunawpaw nynh thua. Athungpaw a bya liate nynh pawpaw balyn kha po a tynsah. Aening seinaw`ae kha amaw ccaccei nynh he yn thyaasapah koute ahangnaw kya Lesaenaw ranglang khe a dahung vae.
58001004	Vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze houh ahoy huaccepaw min kha rhoccounaw liate a mue keiccuze, Ccapaw tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze patae alesaehua.
58001005	Pawccecize, “Nang tuh ka Ccapaw nynh na thua, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,” cite thuasah; te bua, “Kae tuh a Paaw ka thua cih zah aning tuh ka Ccapaw athua cih,” cite thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw`ae kyaze hung kalan mou Pachia nynh a ho boi?
58001006	Te, masaty saah paw ccaaw kha laephi kalan he yn cciakhae lyaze, “Pachia vaaw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kha beik`ae sah,” a ci.
58001007	Te vaaw ccungccaw`ae konglang kha Pachia nynh, “A vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha muisaw lang rae zah a ryalawpatu`ae kha maeesoi lang a rae,” a ci.
58001008	Thuasalama Ccapaw konglang tuh, “Pou Pachia, na suitungkhung tuh zungzae te zungzae cia atynpaw nynh thua. Dingnaw hoitang tuh na peenaw hoitang nynh thua.
58001009	Dingnaw kha na sungsah zah kawbya pawlangria leinaw kha na hua. Tukeiccuze pou Pachia, na Pachia nynh nang kha na ruiban`ae luki lungtuanaw satho kha phe ae thuh vae,” a ci.
58001010	Te, “Pou BAWIPAW, atakaw lyate nang nynh laephi athonaw kha na bing, te vaawran`ae tuh na kuih te na rae`ae paw nynh thua.
58001011	Minmin tuh aroh cih`ae, thuasalama nang tuh na tyn zungzae. Te boeiningsungpue nynh apue hawte kha-e`ae tuh apue cih`ae.
58001012	Te minmin kha uccaw zungkheit hawte na bi cih`ae zah minmin tuh a rulaekuh cih`ae. Thuasalama nang tuh na rulaekuh khyh zah na kum`ae tuh thang lan khyh,” a ci.
58001013	Thuasalama, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia tuh, ka ranglang khe dahung,” cite vaaw ccungccaw`ae lakuze hung kalan san a ho boi tou?
58001014	Minmin balyn tuh khumnaw rho a ccou vae cih`ae paw kya ryalawpya khylan saw paw ryalawpatu muisaw`ae thua khyh`ae tou?
58002001	Tukeiccuze aening nynh ah thae oh paw kha houh ah tua ah roih hahe lan oh paw nynh thua, tuhkhyh lanze po cciakhae`ae paw ah thuasei cih oh.
58002002	Pawccecize vaaw ccungccaw`ae liate hopaw bya tuh rulae kho thua khyh zah cyiseimenaw miakaw te kawngae leinaw nynh cyisahnaw mee atazaepaw detahnaw kha a mue`ae lanze,
58002003	Bawipaw nynh masaty lya mawte a ho paw khumnaw, te amaw bya a thae`ae paw liate aening kya tynsah athua paw, myarya alepaw khumnaw kha aening nynh pawlang ah ria khyh oh ze, pawcihtemou ah lue cih oh?
58002004	M u i h s a n a w ` a e, khuaruarunaw`ae, te ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw aphuinphuin te Thyaa Muisaw nynh amaw rynaw thyhte a pya paw lasung`ae ryte Pachia nynh ccaekia a khan.
58002005	Pawccecize aening nynh ah ho oh paw, yn thua vae cih paw laephipi tuh Pachia nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kaw kya nung khyh.
58002006	Thuasalama Ccathyaa sangkheit kya lukheitpaw nynh, “Ccungccaw tuh paw thua zah te mou nang nynh na tua na lia? Tukhyhze, ccungccaw ccapaw tuh paw thua zah te mou nang nynh na la dooih?
58002007	Amaw kha vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ccapyh anehua lante na rae; amaw kha phu-enaw te sawtuanaw kha na khungsaku, na kuih te na rae paw uccaw`ae luki khe amaw kha na nung.
58002008	Pawpaw balyn kha amaw a ccu kawlang marya na nung,” cite ccaekiakhan zah a ho. Pawccecize pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw marya a nung cipaw tuh amaw zakaw a nung leipaw pawsang um khyh cipaw nynh thua. Thuasalama pawpaw balyn amaw zakaw marya a nung paw kha atu aening nynh ah muih loh khyh oh.
58002009	Thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw liate ccungccaw miakaw hanlan chinaw tangtua khylan, vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ccapyh anehua lante rae athua paw Jesu kha aening nynh ah muih oh. Chinaw a teing keiccuze aning tuh phu-enaw te sawtuanaw khate khungsah athua.
58002010	Pawccecize ccaaw`ae patae kha phu-enaw kalan a cciakhaenaw kya, pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate um zah amaw hanlan athua paw, mih khumnaw lupi kha teingnaw liate ccingsah athua nawlan, Pachia hanlan angaekuhpaw nynh thua.
58002011	Pawccecize a thyaasahtu te thyaasah athua paw balyn tuh paryhte ccangkheitpaw nynh thua`ae. Tukeiccu aning nynh minmin kha uno`ae cite ko lan a maethyakhaekuh khyh.
58002012	Aning nynh, “Ka uno`ae kalan na min kha ka siakhae cih, pumkunaw kya namaw thehoysanaw law kha ka sah cih,” acikuh.
58002013	Te, “Amaw kha ka doliakuh cih,” bua acikuh. Te, “Kae te Pachia nynh kamaw yn pya paw imua`ae tuh e kya kae um,” bua acikuh.
58002014	Tukeiccuze imua`ae tuh chii te saw kha a neethungkuh bua`ae paw athua`ae keiccuze, Kri amaw mah tuhhawte chii te saw kha a neethungkuh bua, ou tuhte chinaw tungvaw thungnaw a hoitupaw diabolos kha, chinaw liate aning nynh ro khylan,
58002015	te chinaw rawri`ae keiccuze mih hiin lungkhu balyn seetangnaw kya um`ae paw kha luesah khylan nynh thua.
58002016	Pawccecize Kri nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha bawng khyh`ae, thuasalama Abraham ciihan kha nynh a bawng.
58002017	Tukeiccu ccungccaw seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanaw rae khylan, Pachia te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kya Kri tuh thawccithyapaw te zyn lan um paw Ranpibawi Lupi athua nawlan, pawpaw balyn kya amaw a uno`ae hawte rae athua lanpaw tuh accanpaw nynh thua.
58002018	Amaw nynh tuh-ounaw kha phe a teing vae keiccuze, tuh-ounaw a teing`ae paw kha bawng lan a cyih kho.
58003001	Tukeiccuze vaawran te asekuhpaw konaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw, athyaapaw uteno`ae, aening nynh ccaekia ah khan oh paw Locceihtu te Ranpibawi Lupi athua paw Kri Jesu kong kha tuatua oh.
58003002	Mawsi nynh Pachia inn balyn kya zyn lan a um hawte, Jesu Kri mah amaw a khangtupaw kya zyn lan um paw nynh thua.
58003003	Inn saktupaw tuh inn laeze sawtuanaw a hoihua thyhhawte, Jesu tuh Mawsi laeze phu-enaw mue lan angaekuh huapaw nynh thua.
58003004	Pawccecize inn miakaw tuh ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh sak paw nynh thua, thuasalama pawpaw balyn a saktupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
58003005	Nyalang ho athua cih paw uccaw`ae kya-e ccaekia lang, see lukheit hawte Mawsi tuh Pachia inn balyn kya zyn lan um paw ccaccing nynh thua.
58003006	Thuasalama Kri tuh amaw a inn kya Ccapaw lukheit hawte zyn lan um paw nynh thua. Zynkunaw te ngaehoinaw kya-e lungtuanaw kha athangnaw cia tynkaring lang ah kynku oh ze, aening tuh amaw a inn nynh ah thua oh.
58003007	Tukeiccuze Thyaa Muisaw nynh, “Atunin amaw roi kha na thae lan oh ze,
58003008	rangkaw kya syntaw nin kya a rawse`ae lya hawte, nae thinlung kha khungsah nan oh.
58003009	Nae minpaaw`ae nynh kamaw kha yn tuhou` ae, yn syntaw`ae, te ka ryalaw`ae kha kum sungpali cia a muih`ae.
58003010	Tukeiccuze kae tuh kha-e ciihan kya ka thinlungccih zah, ‘Mih thinlung tuh palei cceihsei zah ka ccianaw kha nyh khyh`ae,’ ka ci.
58003011	Tukeiccu ka thinrianaw kya, ‘Minmin tuh ka haeungnaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae,’ cite bya ka kinku,” a ci.
58003012	Uteno`ae, nanning lukhakheit kya a hiinpaw Pachia kyate poutawnawpaw ahoy leipaw zyn leinaw thinlung a um khyh nawlan la raeringkuh oh.
58003013	Thuasalama, “Atunin,” cite ho athua lungkhu balyn lukheit te lukheit nin takyhte thawzung la pyakuh oh. Tukhyh lanze seinaw kya-e lingnaw liate nanning nae lungkhungsei cih.
58003014	Pawccecize aening nynh atakaw-e ah zynkunaw oh kha athangnaw cia tynkaring lang ah kyngku oh lanze, aening tuh Kri ryte a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh ah thua vae oh;
58003015	tuhte ah thua oh paw tuh, “Atunin amaw roi kha na thae oh lanze, rawsenaw kya hawte nae thinlung khung nan sah,” cite ho athua lyakhe ah thinlung khung khyh ze nynh thua.
58003016	Pawccecize phang a thae`ae pite amaw a rawse`ae paw tuh hung`ae mou? Mawsi nynh Izip ram kyate yn cciakhae`ae paw balyn kha thua khyh`ae tou?
58003017	Thuasalama kum sungpali lungkhu hung kya mou aning tuh a thinria? Mih rhua rangkaw kya a huekuh`ae paw, a sei`ae paw kya thua khyh tou?
58003018	Te a haeungnaw lungkhu lang minmin tuh tee lan khyh`ae cite hung kalan mou aning nynh ccaesaku? Kawngae lei`ae paw kalan thua khyh tou?
58003019	Tukeiccu zyn leinaw keiccuze minmin tuh tee kho khyh`ae cipaw ah muih oh.
58004001	Tukeiccu, amaw hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang teenaw lanpaw byakinpyakupaw phang a um pite, nanning kyaze lukhakheit nynh kha-e kha phya kho leite a um lanpaw tuh, aening rikhae oh sih.
58004002	Pawccecize minmin kalan mah hopya a la thua hawte, aening kalan thehoypaw tuh hopya athua vae; thuasalama a thae`ae paw nynh zynnaw te a lawku khyh`ae keiccuze, ho athua paw bya tuh minmin hanlan thane khyh.
58004003	Pawccecize a zyn`ae paw aening tuh kha-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang ah tee oh. Laephipi athonaw kyate ryalaw`ae tuh phe athang vae zemah, “Ka thinrianaw kya ccae ka sah hawte, ‘Ka haeungnaw lungkhu lang minmin nynh tee lan khyh`ae,’ ” cite a ho hawte nynh thua.
58004004	Pawccecize sangkheit kya nin sarinaw kong kha hynhte a ho, “Te nin sarinaw kya Pachia tuh a ryalaw`ae balyn kyate a hae-ung,” a ci.
58004005	Te tuh-e kya, “Minmin nynh ka hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae,” bua a ci.
58004006	Tukeiccu, ccungccaw abang hanlan tuh kha-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee khonaw phang a um, te masaty thehoypaw hopya athua`ae paw minmin tuh kawngae leinaw keiccuze tee khyh`ae.
58004007	“Atunin a roi kha na thae oh lanze nae thinlung khung nan sah,” cite langmaw lya a la ho vae hawte, ccyh khaw aro koute David kya, “Atunin” cite nin nin kheit kha a khyapya.
58004008	Pawccecize Joshua nynh minmin kha hae-ungnaw a la pya`ae ze, tuh-e koute nin ccangpaw kong kha Pachia nynh la ho vae lan khyh.
58004009	Tukeiccu Pachia ccungccaw`ae hanlan hae-ungnaw tuh a um ung.
58004010	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a ryalaw kyate a hae-ung hawte, Pachia kya-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang a tee paw ccungccaw tuh amaw ryalaw`ae kyate phe a haeung vae.
58004011	Tukeiccu kawngae leinaw kya-e alokuhpaw dosuinku lanpaw thyhte hung sanmah a khuliakuh khyh nawlan, tuh-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee khylan aening thawte zuakuh oh sih.
58004012	Pawccecize Pachia bya tuh ahiinpaw, athungpaw, te kynning mawte ahepaw thaloi laeze ahe huapaw nynh thua; hiinnawmuisaw te muisaw, kincui, te ru atungkunaw`ae phianaw cia hei a thuin khopaw, te thinlung kya-e tuanaw`ae te paccynkunaw`ae aphiathya paw nynh thua.
58004013	Amaw malang a langkuh leipaw rae paw uccaw pawsang um khyh. Thuasalama ahmaw konglang ah phypakuh cih oh paw amaw mitmuihnaw kya pawpaw balyn sahsete um zah raerae a langkuh.
58004014	Oute vaawran lang po a khung vae paw, alesaepaw Ranpibawi Lupi, Pachia Ccapaw Jesu ah hoi oh keiccu tuh ah ccaekiakhannaw kha tynkaring lang kyngkuh oh si.
58004015	Pawccecize aening ah nyaanaw oh kya thawccihthya leipaw Ranpibawi Lupi kha aening nynh ah hoi khyh oh, thuasalama aning tuh aening hawte pawpaw balyn lante tuh-ou a la thua, thuasalama sei leite nynh a um.
58004016	Tukeiccu ahoboupaw ccyh kya bawng kho nawlan, aening nynh ngaethyaumsanaw te thawccinaw ah mue nawlan oh, thawccinaw kya-e suitungkhung kalan rawhoy te cceih oh sih.
58005001	Ccungccaw laku kyate popaw ranpibawi lupi miakaw tuh seinaw hanlan silawkunaw te lasung`ae kha pya khylan, Pachia lante asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kya ccungccaw`ae hanlan khang paw nynh thua.
58005002	Amaw mah nyaanaw nynh phang ave paw athua keiccuze, aning tuh a nyhthya lei`ae paw tungvaw te a cceihsei`ae paw tungvaw ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi kho.
58005003	Te hynh-e keiccuze ccungccaw`ae hanlan te amaw hanlan, aning tuh seinaw hanlan silawpya lan ahopaw nynh thua.
58005004	Hynh-e sawtuanaw hynh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah amaw kalan lawkuh khyh, thuasalama Aaron a ko hawte Pachia nynh a ko paw ccungccaw nynh a lawkuh.
58005005	Tuhhawte Kri mah Ranpibawi Lupi thua khylan amaw te amaw kha phu-esakuh khyh, thuasalama, “Nang tuh ka Ccapaw, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,” a cih paw nynh amaw kha phuesah.
58005006	Ccathyaa ccanglang kya, “Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte, nang tuh zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,” cite mah a ho.
58005007	Aning tuh pynsaw lante a um lya chinaw kyate amaw kha a khum khopaw kalan thawte rawnaw te mitphi ryte, sawsangnaw te ngianaw kha a rae, te aning tuh Pachia rawri keiccuze thaepya athua.
58005008	Aning tuh Ccapaw mang athua zemah, a teingpaw uccaw`ae liate kawngaenaw kha a ccangkuh.
58005009	Te accingpaw lang rae athua koute, amaw kawngae`ae paw balyn hanlan aning tuh zungzae khumnaw athotupaw lang yn tang.
58005010	“Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte,” Ranpibawi Lupi lante Pachia nynh phe a ko vae paw nynh thua.
58005011	Amaw kong ho lanpaw patae kae hoi zemah nanning nynh na thaethya khyh oh keiccu tuh ccaesahpya lan aru.
58005012	Pawccecize atu nanning tuh ccangpatu`ae lang hei tang phe na zaw vae oh zemah, Pachia bya`ae athonaw kha bua ccangpyaku na ho ung oh. Te looh tangpaw thua leite samatei bua aho ung paw nynh na thua oh.
58005013	Pawccecize samatei kyalya a neih ung paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh dingnaw bya kha nythyanaw hoi khyh, pawccecize aning tuh imua nynh thua ung.
58005014	Thuasalama looh tangpaw tuh piccang`ae hanlan nynh thua, tuh-e`ae tuh ahoypaw te athahpaw paryh phiathya khylan mih nythyanaw a mangkuh thya`ae paw nynh thua.
58006001	Tukeiccuze Kri konglang atakaw ccangpyakunaw`ae kha cciataw te, piccangthuanaw kalan aening cceih oh sih. Achihpaw ryalaw kyate ngaesikunaw kong, Pachia zynnaw kong,
58006002	baptisma ccangpyakunaw kong, kuih khang paw kong, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw kong, te zungzae byapianaw kong ccangpyakunaw lungbing kha bua bing vae leite piccangthuanaw kalan cceih oh sih.
58006003	Te Pachia nynh oun ua lanze, hynh-e hynh aening nynh a cyih cih oh.
58006004	Pawccecize vaekheit awsah athua vae`ae paw, vaawrane lasung phe a tangtua vae`ae paw, te Thyaa Muisaw kya-e a neethungkuh bua vae`ae paw,
58006005	te Pachia kya-e ahoypaw bya te yn thua vae cih paw she kyae thungnaw`ae phe a tangtua vae`ae paw,
58006006	kha-e`ae nynh a khuliaku`ae lanze, Pachia Ccapaw kha mimaw hanlan athaw lante a khiade`ae paw thua zah raerae alangkuh lang maethyasah`ae paw athua keiccuze minmin kha ngaesikunaw kalan bua thawsathui lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.
58006007	Pawccecize laelung nynh amaw vawlan palei leih accah paw khuatui kha neih zah kha-e vawlan ryalahtupaw hanlan thingthae-eccang kha a pousahpya, te kha-e laelung tuh Pachia kyate hythuanaw kha a ccou.
58006008	Thuasalama hingpaw te thabu a pousah paw laelung tuh nue athua, te thyalawnaw kalan a naekuh vae, kha-e athangnaw tuh maee te rua lanpaw nynh thua vae.
58006009	Thuasalama sungsah`ae paw, hynhcihte nae kya kae ho zemah, nanning nynh khumnaw te azuikuh paw uccaw, nanning te asekuhpaw ahoyhuapaw uccaw`ae kha na cyih cih oh cite kae zynkuh.
58006010	Pawccecize amaw min hanlan na cyi oh paw, mithyaa`ae hanlan nanning nynh rya phe na lawpya vae oh paw te rya na lawpya ung oh paw kya, nae ryalaw te sungsahkunaw kya-e nae cyisahnaw kha phe ning lante Pachia tuh ading leipaw thua khyh.
58006011	Te na ngaehoinaw oh kha phe aria nawlan, alokuhpaw thawte zuakunaw kha athangnaw cia nanning lu raveih nynh na langsaku nawlan oh kou kae ry.
58006012	Ou tuhte nanning tuh nae thawnaw khyh nawlan, thuasalama byakinpyakupaw`ae kha zynnaw te ngaesangnaw liate rhoccou`ae paw thydokuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh kae ry.
58006013	Pawccecize Pachia nynh Abraham kha bya he a kinpakuh tuh, amaw lae ale huapaw min phya lanpaw a um khyh keiccu, amaw te amaw kha ccaesakuh zah,
58006014	“Thanccingte nang kha hythua kae pya ccaccing cih zah kae pungthungsah ccaccing cih,” a ci.
58006015	Tukeiccu aning nynh lungsaete a ngaesang koute byakinpyakupaw kha a mue.
58006016	Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh ale huapaw min phyate ccae leih sahku`ae, te byakinkupaw nynh tuh hopaw kha tynsah zah byaeikunaw balyn kha a thangsah.
58006017	Tuhte Pachia nynh a byakinpyakupaw rhoccoutu`ae kya arulaekuh kho leipaw a khuakhannaw kha ccaerarihlan langsaku a ry keiccu a byakinkupaw liate a tynsah.
58006018	Aening khynnaw ah mue vae oh paw nynh tuh ah malang nungpya athua paw ngaehoinaw kha ah kynku kho nawlan oh, alepipaw thawzung pyanaw ah hoi kho nawlan oh, a hanlan hyng lanpaw athua kho leipaw Pachia nynh arulaekuh kho leipaw uccaw ccangning kya hynhte a cyi.
58006019	Kha-e ngaehoinaw kha zokhawpaw boei lungkhu lang phe a tee paw, phe ria zah tynkaringpaw hiinnawmuisaw kya-e sivawhinpi hawte aening nynh ah hoi oh.
58006020	Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte zungzae Ranpibawi Lupi athua paw Jesu, aening hanlan zeccuetupaw tuh tuh-e kalan phe a tee vae.
58007001	Pawccecize tuh-e Melkhizedek, Salem siapharan, Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia kya-e ranpibawi nynh siapharan`ae chianaw kyate yn ki paw Abraham kha cciadue zah hythua a pya.
58007002	Abraham nynh mah amaw kha luadepaw uccaw`ae balyn kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha a pya. Masaty a min asuilan tuh “Dingnaw siapharan,” nynh thua, tuhkoute Salem siapharan mah athua, tuh-e tuh “Daenaw siapharan,” cipaw nynh thua.
58007003	Aning tuh paaw hoi khyh, nung hoi khyh, thokeinaw hoi khyh, umnaw atho nin hoi khyh zah hiinnaw athangnaw mah hoi khyh, thuasalama Pachia Ccapaw alo lante rae thua zah po atynpaw ranpibawi nynh thua.
58007004	E ccungccapaw tuh pawcih nynh alesae cipaw kha tuatua oh. Ciihan kyaze paaw athua paw Abraham nynh heize amaw kha luadepaw uccaw`ae kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha a pya.
58007005	Ranpibawithuanaw a hoi`ae paw Levi ccaaw`ae nynh mih uno`ae athua paw, ccungccaw`ae tuh Abraham ciihan athua`ae zemah minmin kyate pumhaw pumkheit kha Kawbya thyhte lawku lan kawpyapaw a hoi`ae.
58007006	Thuasalama a thokeinaw kha Levi kyate suih athua leipaw Melkhizedek tuh Abraham kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha ccou zah aning nynh byakinpyakupaw a mue paw Abraham kha hythua a pya.
58007007	Te anyaa huapaw kha alesae huapaw nynh hythua a pya cipaw tuh eiku lanpaw um khyh.
58007008	Te e kya a chihthyapaw ccungccaw`ae nynh pumhaw pumkheit kha a ccou`ae; thuasalama khuhlang tuh po a hiin cite ccaekia khanpya athua paw nynh pumhaw pumkheit kha a ccou.
58007009	Te pumhaw pumkheit a ccou paw Levi nynh mah Abraham kyate pumhaw pumkheit a pyabua cite ho lanpaw a um.
58007010	Pawccecize Melkhizedek nynh Abraham te a tungku lyakha Levi tuh a paaw pyn lungkhu nynh a um ung.
58007011	Tukeiccuze, Levi kyate a tho paw ranpibawithuanaw kaw khe ccungccaw`ae nynh Kawbya kha a mue`ae keiccuze, ccingnaw tuh Levi kyate a tho paw ranpibawithuanaw liate athua lanze, Aaronthuanaw thyhte ko leite, Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte ccangpaw ranpibawi yn pou lanpaw tuh pawmou aho ung?
58007012	Pawccecize ranpibawithuanaw tuh rulae athua keiccuze Kawbya mah rulae aho vae.
58007013	Pawccecize e uccaw`ae nynh a honuathepaw ccungccaw tuh ccangpaw phuin nynh thua. Tuh-e phuin kyate hung ccungccaw nynh san silawhang kya ryalawpah boi khyh.
58007014	Pawccecize ah Bawipaw tuh Judah phuin kyate nynh yn langku cipaw tuh phe aria. Tuhe phuin tuh ranpibawithuanaw te asekuh cipaw Mawsi nynh kharyh ho khyh.
58007015	Te Melkhizedek alo lante ccangpaw ranpibawi alangku lanze, tuh-e tuh houh ariapaw nynh thua.
58007016	Tuh-e paw tuh pynsaw lante kawpyapaw, kawbya thyhte ranpibawi thua khyh, thuasalama athang kho leipaw hiinnaw kya-e thungnaw thyhte nynh athua.
58007017	Pawccecize Pachia nynh, “Nang tuh Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte, zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,” cite ccaekia a khan.
58007018	Pawccecize, voihaw lante, langmaw-e kawpyatypaw tuh a thawzyanaw te accungkia khyhnaw keiccuze vua athua,
58007019	pawccecize Kawbya nynh pawsang ccingsah khyh; hawkheit lante, ahoy huapaw ngaehoinaw kha thuakhae athua, tuh-e ngaehoinaw liate aening tuh Pachia kalan ah naekuh oh.
58007020	Te ccaesakunaw um leite aning tuh ranpibawi lang tangsah thua khyh.
58007021	Pawccecize minmin tuh ccaesakunaw um leite ranpibawi`ae lang yn tang`ae paw nynh thua. Thuasalama aning tuh, “BAWIPAW tuh ccaesakuh zah ngaesikuh vae lan khyh, ‘Nang tuh Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,’ ” cite amaw kha ccaesakunaw te a cipatupaw liate nynh ranpibawi lang yn tang.
58007022	Tuh-e ccaesakunaw liate Jesu tuh ahoy huapaw byakin kya-e aamahkhan lang yn tang.
58007023	Te ranpibawi`ae tuh patae a um`ae, pawkeiccumacize po tynnaw kyate chinaw nynh a khaw`ae keiccuze nynh thua.
58007024	Thuasalama Jesu tuh zungzae atyn keiccuze, arulaekuh kho leipaw ranpibawithuanaw kha a hoi.
58007025	Amaw liate Pachia kalan oun cceih`ae paw hanlan ngiapyanaw rae khylan aning tuh zungzae a hiin keiccuze minmin kha athangnaw cia khum khylan a cyih kho.
58007026	Pawccecize athyaapaw, seibe lan accan leipaw, anungsikuh leipaw, misei`ae kyate a phiakuhpaw, te vaawran`ae laeze ahanghua lang rae athua paw tuh-e Ranpibawi Lupi tuh aening hanlan angaekuhpaw nynh thua.
58007027	Tuh-e ranpibawi lupi`ae hawte, masaty amaw seinaw hanlan, oute ccungccaw`ae seinaw hanlan nin takyh silawnaw rae ho vae khyh, pawccecize amaw a pyn a pyaku lyakhe, zungzae hanlan vaekheit te phe a ccingsah vae.
58007028	Pawccecize Kawbya nynh nyaanaw a hoi paw ccungccaw`ae kha ranpibawi lang a khang. Thuasalama Kawbya koute yn thua paw ccaesakunaw kya-e bya nynh zungzae accingpaw Ccapaw kha a khang.
58008001	Atu ah ho oh paw uccaw`ae kong abapi tuh: Vaawran`ae kya Lesaenaw suitungkhung ranglang a dahung paw, khahtahawpaw Ranpibawi Lupi kha aening ah hoi oh.
58008002	Aning tuh ccungccaw nynh sak leipaw, Bawipaw nynh a sak paw beikbuu ccaccing athua paw athyaapaw hmin kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua.
58008003	Pawccecize ranpibawi lupi miakaw tuh lasung`ae te silawnawpaw khate silawpya khylan khang paw nynh thua. Tukeiccu hynh-e paw mah silawpya nawlan ccangkhakheit a hoi aho.
58008004	Pawccecize aning tuh laephi vawlan hin a la um lanze, ranpibawi la thua lan khyh, pawccecize Kawbya thyhte lasung te silawpah paw ranpibawi`ae a um.
58008005	Minmin tuh vaawran te asekuhpaw uccaw pungsan te mynlyh rya nynh a law`ae. Tuh-e keiccu Mawsi nynh beikbuu kha sak lan vae cite he a noukuh tuh, “Mua vawlan nang na kya langsapya athua paw pungsan thyhhawte pawpaw balyn kha na rae nawlan raeringkuh,” cite Pachia nynh Mawsi kha raering a pya.
58008006	Thuasalama Jesu tuh ahoy huapaw byakinpyakupaw kya thadynsah athua paw, ahoy huapaw byakin kya-e Daenaw Raetu mah athua keiccuze atu aning tuh ahoy huaccepaw ryalaw kha phe a mue vae.
58008007	Pawccecize masaty e byakin tuh seimenaw a la um khyh lanze, vaeningnaw byakin kha ccung la thua vae lan khyh.
58008008	Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae kya Pachia nynh seimenaw muihpah`ae zah a ho paw tuh, “ Ngaetua oh, nin`ae yn thua cih, BAWIPAW nynh a ci, Israel innbyn te Judah innbyn ryte athawpaw byakin ka rae cih nin ccyh yn thua cih,
58008009	Izip ram kyate minmin kha kuih te ka sue`ae zah ka cciakhae lya`ae nin kya mih minpaaw`ae ryte ka rae paw byakin thyhte thua vae lan khyh. Ka byakin kya minmin nynh atyn khyh`ae keiccuze kae mah minmin kha ka dooih khyh`ae, cite BAWIPAW nynh a ci.
58008010	Pawccecize tuh-e nin`ae koute Israel innbyn ryte ka rae cih paw byakin tuh e hynh nynh thua, cite BAWIPAW nynh a ci. Ka kawbya`ae kha mih tuanawthinlung kya ka sang cih zah kha-e`ae kha mih thinlung kya ka zei cih; te kae tuh mih Pachia ka thua cih zah minmin tuh ka ccungccaw`ae athua cih`ae.
58008011	Te, ‘BAWIPAW kha nyh,’ cite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a innpaw kha ccangpah vae lan khyh`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh a uno kha ccangpah vae lan khyh`ae. Pawccecize adih huapaw kyate tho zah ale huapaw kyacia kamaw kha marya yn nyh vae cih`ae.
58008012	Pawccecize minmin ding leinaw kha ngaethya ka umsah cih`ae zah mih seinaw`ae te mih cyiseimenaw`ae kha kharyh ka ccykepah vae lan khyh`ae,” a ci.
58008013	“Byakin thawpaw,” a cipaw kya masaty byakin kha arynpaw lang phe a tangsah vae. Te ryn zah arohthyapaw uccaw tuh zo lan a cih vae.
58009001	Oute masaty byakin nynh hei Pachia ryalawpyanaw kaw`ae te laephi-e athyaapaw hmin kha a hoi ccaccing.
58009002	Pawccecize rae paw beikbuu a la um; masaty tuh-e lungkhu kya maeekhua awnawpaw te ccaboi, te nungpyapaw sanlou a um`ae, tuh-e khaan tuh athyaapaw hmin a ci`ae.
58009003	Te sanningnaw zokhawpaw boei nuhlang Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin a ci`ae paw khaan a um.
58009004	Tuh-e khaan kya sui pakephepaw te sui te po alekuh lang a lae`ae paw byakin kua a um, tuh-e lungkhu kyatuin manna a nungnaw`ae paw sui ang, anaw toih paw Aaron hoitang te byakin lungphe`ae a um.
58009005	Te tuh-e byakin Kua vawlan phu-enaw kya-e cherub`ae nynh ngaethyaumsanaw tungkhung kha phang a dawkhaw`ae, kha-e kong kha atu aening nynh phe ccing lan ah ho kho loh khyh oh.
58009006	Kha-e uccaw`ae kha tuhcihte paccyn he athua tuh, ranpibawi`ae nynh Pachia ryalaw kha lawte, beikbuu masaty akhaan lungkhu langkhe leih a tee`ae.
58009007	Thuasalama sanningnaw akhaan lungkhu lang tuh ranpibawi lupi rou nynh chii ryte kum kheit ze vaekheit kyalya a tee. Amaw te ccungccaw`ae nynh nyku leite a rae`ae paw seinaw hanlan kha-e chii te aning nynh si a law.
58009008	Masaty beikbuu phang a thadyn lya tuh Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang ccianaw tuh hungpya thua loh khyh cipaw kha hynhcihte Thyaa Muisaw nynh a muihsah.
58009009	Tuh-e beikbuu tuh atu ccyh hanlan muihsanawpaw nynh thua; tuh-e kya Pachia pyapaw te silawkunaw`ae paw kha a pya`ae, tuh-e nynh mawtemaw nykunaw te asekuh lante ryalahtupaw kha ccingsah kho khyh.
58009010	Tuh-e tuh aepaw, niapaw, singkupaw aphuinphuin te pynsaw te asekuhpaw phunglang`ae kyalya thua zah raethuinaw ccyh kyacia rou nynh mang athua.
58009011	Thuasalama Kri tuh yn thua vae cih paw ahoypaw uccaw`ae kya-e Ranpibawi Lupi hawte yn thua zah, kuih te rae leipaw, tuh-e horypaw tuh hynh-e raenaw kya-e athua leipaw, lesaehua zah houh accingpaw beikbuu liate,
58009012	aening hanlan zungzae sawkhawnaw kha hoite, mia`ae te vaetuataw`ae chii liate thua vae leite, amaw a chii liate Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang vaekheit rou a tee.
58009013	Pawccecize tangnuapaw`ae te mia`ae chii, te maee te u paw vaetua tohlaw buhaw`ae khate a thyaa lei`ae paw kha theipaw nynh pynsaw ccikanku nawlan a thyaasah kho lanze,
58009014	zungzae tynpaw Muisaw liate Pachia kya ccaenaw um leipaw, amaw te amaw a pyakuh paw, Kri chii nynh achihpaw ryalaw kyate a hiinpaw Pachia rya lawpya khylan naemaw nykunaw thinlung kha pawcihmou houh a thyaasah kho cih?
58009015	Tukeiccuze masaty byakin kaw e cyiseimenaw kya-e sawkhawnaw hanlan chinaw la um vae zah, zungzae tynpaw rho uccaw kya-e byakinpyakupaw kha ko athua`ae paw nynh a mue nawlan`ae aning tuh athawpaw byakin kya-e Daenaw Raetu nynh thua.
58009016	Pawccecize rhosuinaw a umnaw kya tuh rhosuitupaw chinaw a um aho hahe.
58009017	Pawccecize rhosuitupaw a chih koute nynh rhosuinaw tuh cyi khonaw a hoi, rhosuitu phang a hiin lya tuh rhosuinaw nynh kharyh kaw hoi kho khyh.
58009018	Tukeiccu masaty byakin hei kha chii leite tynsah thua khyh.
58009019	Pawccecize Mawsi nynh Kawbya thyhte ccungccaw`ae balyn kha kawpyapaw miakaw kha a hopah`ae koute vaetuataw chii, te mia chii te tui ryte sekakungpaw tuuming te hyssop kha laah zah ccauh te ccungccaw`ae balyn kha thei`ae zah.
58009020	“Hynh-e tuh Pachia nynh nanning ae pya oh paw byakin kya-e chii nynh thua,” a ci.
58009021	Tuhhawte beikbuu te Pachia ryalawnawpaw uccaw`ae balyn kha mah chii te pung a thei.
58009022	Te Kawbya thyhte pawpaw balyn vya thang lan chii liate thyaasah athua, te chii luanaw um leite seingaethyanaw um khyh.
58009023	Tukeiccu vaawran kya um paw uccaw`ae pungsan kha khahtahawpaw silawnaw`ae te thyaasah lanpaw tuh ahobou paw nynh thua, te vaawran te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae tuh kha-e`ae laeze ahoy huapaw silawnaw te nynh thyaasah athua.
58009024	Pawccecize thanccingpaw pungsan athua paw, kuih te rae paw athyaapaw hmin lungkhu lang Kri tuh tee khyh, thuasalama atu aening hanlan Pachia mitmuihnaw kya langku khylan, vaawran lungkhu lang nynh a tee.
58009025	Tuhzemah ranpibawi lupi nynh amaw chii athua leipaw ryte Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang kum takyh a tee hawte, Kri nynh amaw te amaw kha pei pyaku lan tee vae khyh.
58009026	Tuhte athua lanze, laephipi athotakaw te aning tuh pei a la teing vae cih; thuasalama atu she athangnaw kya, amaw silawnaw liate seinaw kha ccaring vua khylan vaekheit rou nynh a langku.
58009027	Te ccungccaw`ae hanlan vaekheit chi lanpaw tuh laerui-awde paw thua zah tuh-e koute byapianaw a um hawte,
58009028	Kri nynh ccungccaw patae seinaw kha phu khylan vaekheit kyalya a pyaku. Te amaw kha ngaehoite a ngaw paw ccungccaw`ae kha, khum khylan aning tuh seinaw leite vaeningnaw bua yn langkuh ung cih.
58010001	Pawccecize Kawbya tuh yn thua vae cih paw ahoypaw uccaw`ae mynlyh thua zah uccaw`ae muinsan ccaccing thua khyh, kum takyhte a pya he`ae paw alokuhpaw silawnaw khate oun thua`ae paw kha kharyh ccingsah kho khyh.
58010002	A ccingsah kho lanze, silawkunaw kha phe a la umtaw vae cih`ae khaw? Pawkeiccumacize a beiktu`ae tuh zungzae hanlan vaekheit te sei thyaasah athua vae`ae ze seinaw nykunawpaw la hoi lae vae lan khyh`ae.
58010003	Thuasalama kha-e silawnaw kya tuh seinaw bua liathuinaw kum takyhte a um.
58010004	Pawccecize tangnuapaw`ae te mia`ae chii nynh seinaw po lawpya lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.
58010005	Tukeiccu laephipi lang Kri yn thua lyaze aning nynh, “Silawnaw te pyapawuccaw kha nang nynh na ry khyh, thuasalama kamaw hanlan pyn kha phe nae paccynpya vae.
58010006	Apynpi te maee te u paw silawkunaw`ae te seinaw hanlan silawnaw`ae kya nang na lungrythua khyh.
58010007	Oute kae nynh, ‘Ccauh kuekuhpaw kya kamaw konglang azeiku thyhte ngaetua, pou Pachia na rynaw rae khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua,’ ka ci,” cite a ho.
58010008	Luki langkhe, “Kawbya thyhte silawnaw te pyapawuccaw` ae, te apynpi te maee te u paw silawnaw`ae te, seinaw hanlan pyapaw-uccaw`ae kha na ry khyh, kha-e`ae kya na lungrythua khyh,” (tuh-e`ae tuh kawbya thyhte pyapaw nynh thua) cite a ho koute,
58010009	aning nynh, “Ngaetua, pou Pachia, kae tuh na rynaw rae khylan nynh kae thua,” a ci. Vaeningnaw-e kha tynsah khylan masaty-e kha phe a vua.
58010010	Tuh-e rynaw liate, Jesu Kri pyn kha zungzae hanlan vaekheit rou pyanaw liate aening tuh thyaasah athua vae oh.
58010011	Te ranpibawi miakaw tuh nin takyh ryalawpya te a thadyn`ae, te seinaw kharyh a thyaasah kho leipaw alokuhpaw silawnaw khate pei silawpya`ae.
58010012	Thuasalama hynh-e paw tuh seinaw elan silawnaw ccangkheit kha zungzae hanlan a pya koute, Pachia ranglang khe a dahung vae.
58010013	Tuh-e ccyh kyate a rhaw`ae kha a ccusy lang rae athua makhia phang a ngaw vae.
58010014	Pawccecize pyapaw-uccaw ccangkheit liate thyaasah athua cciamang`ae paw kha aning nynh zungzae a ccingsah`ae.
58010015	Te Thyaa Muisaw mah kaening kya ccaekia nynh thua; pawccecize langmaw lya,
58010016	“Tuh-e nin`ae koute minmin ryte ka rae lanpaw byakin tuh e hynh nynh thua, BAWIPAW nynh a ci: ka kawbya`ae kha mih thinlung kya ka sang cih zah kha-e`ae kha mih tuanawthinlung kyakhe ka zei cih,” cite a ho koute,
58010017	“Mih seinaw`ae te kawbya pawlangria leipaw mih cyisahnaw`ae kha kharyh ka ccykepah vae lan khyh`ae,” a ci.
58010018	Atu hynh-e seingaethyanaw a umnaw kya, seinaw hanlan pyapaw-uccaw kharyh um vae khyh.
58010019	Tukeiccuze uteno`ae, Jesu chii liate Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang tee lan rawhoynaw ah hoi oh keiccu,
58010020	aening hanlan paccynpya athua paw, thaw zah ahiinpaw ccianawlaanpi liate, a pynsaw athua paw, zokhawpaw boei liate,
58010021	Pachia inn tungvaw Ranpibawi Lupi ah hoi oh keiccu,
58010022	ahoy leipaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kyate ah thinlung tuh thei thua vae zah ah pyn tuh tui ccipaw te sing athua vae keiccuze phe ariapaw zynnaw te thinlung thanccingte aening nynh Pachia kalan naekuh oh sih.
58010023	Ngaehoinaw kong ccaekiakhannaw kha hawlang hawlang pu leite varyn kyngkuh oh sih, pawccecize bya yn kinpakuh paw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua.
58010024	Te sungsakunaw te ahoypaw ryalaw kha lungthosah khylan lukheit te lukheit tuapakuh oh sih.
58010025	Ccungccaw abang nynh leih a cyimae`ae hawte, aening nynh pynkheihlan pumkupaw kha umtaw nan oh sih. Thuasalama lukheit te lukheit thawzung pyakuh oh sih. Nin tuh houhouh yn naekuh vae cipaw kha na muih oh hawte thawzung houh la pyakuh oh.
58010026	Pawccecize byaccing nynaw kha aening nynh phe ah mue oh koute lungrarou te aening ah sei oh lanze, seinaw hanlan silawkunaw um lae vae khyh.
58010027	Thuasalama ri lan um paw byapianaw yn thua lanpaw te rawsetu`ae kha phe ccung lan a u vae cih paw, bungpawnaw maee rou kha nynh a um vae.
58010028	Mawsi Kawbya kha pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw tuh ccaekia luning khyhze luthung kaw khe ngaethya-umsanaw mue leite a chih.
58010029	Pachia Ccapaw kha a ccu kaw syde zah amaw kha thyaasah athua paw byakin kya-e chiise kha athyaa leipaw uccaw lang ria zah thawccinaw Muisaw kha a saryapaw ccungccaw tuh pawcih alepaw detahnaw kha mou mue lan accan cite nanning nynh na tua oh?
58010030	Pawccecize, “Ccaeliarunaw tuh kamaw kya-e nynh thua, kae nynh ccae ka liaru cih,” cite Bawipaw nynh a ci. Te, “BAWIPAW nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha byapia cih,” bua a ci, cite a hotupaw kha kaening nynh kae ny.
58010031	A hiinpaw Pachia kuih lungkhu lang boh ccaw lanpaw tuh ri lan um paw uccaw nynh thua.
58010032	Thuasalama nanning awsah na thua oh koute alepaw vawsawnaw kya-e teingnaw na ngaesang oh paw, langmaw-e nin`ae kha bua liathuitua oh.
58010033	Vaekhakheit vae ze saryanaw`ae te vawsawnaw`ae liate nanning tuh maethyalaw na thua oh; te vaekhakheit vae ze nanning tuh tuhcihte a teing`ae paw ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
58010034	Pawccecize sivarui te yn khiinaw`ae kya nanning nynh thaw nae cci oh, te nanning nynh vaawran kya ahoy huapaw te atynpaw uccaw na hoi oh paw kha na nyku oh keiccu na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae ae luade oh paw kha lungtuate na ngaesang oh.
58010035	Tukeiccuze alepipaw ryalaw mee a hoi paw nae rawhoynaw kha vua nan oh.
58010036	Pawccecize Pachia rynaw kha na cyih oh koute byakinpyakupaw na mue nawlan oh ngaesangnaw na hoi oh aho.
58010037	“Pawccecize sosohtari aro koute yn thua cih paw tuh yn thua vae cih; yn ro vae lan khyh.
58010038	Te adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih; thuasalama lukhakheit nynh nuhlang a sihku lanze ka muisaw tuh kha-e paw kya a lungrythua lan khyh,” a ci.
58010039	Thuasalama aening tuh ronaw kalan nuhlang a sihkuh`ae paw ah thua khyh oh, thuasalama hiinnaw-muisaw khynnaw kalan zynnaw a hoi`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
58011001	Te zynnaw tuh ngaehoi paw uccaw`ae a um ccaccingpaw, muih loh leipaw uccaw`ae phe riasapaw kha nynh thua.
58011002	Pawccecize kha-e zynnaw liate nynh langmaw-e ccungccaw`ae tuh thehoysanaw kha a ccou`ae.
58011003	Laephipi tuh Pachia bya liate nynh rae athua cipaw kha zynnaw liate nynh ah thaethya oh; ou tuhte muihpaw uccaw`ae hynh muih khopaw uccaw`ae te rae paw thua khyh`ae.
58011004	Zynnaw liate Abel nynh Kain silawnaw laeze ahoy huapaw silawnaw kha Pachia kalan a pya. Pachia nynh amaw lasung kong ccaekia he a khan tuh zynnaw liate aning tuh ading cite ccaekia a mue. Te aning tuh a chi vae zemah zynnaw liate bya a ho ung.
58011005	Enok tuh chinaw a tung vae khyh ccaw cite zynnaw liate lawthung athua. Te, “Pachia nynh amaw kha phe a lawthung vae keiccuze aning tuh muih lan um vae khyh.” Pawccecize lawthung athua maw, aning tuh Pachia lungrythuasah cipaw ccaekia kha a hoi.
58011006	Te zynnaw leite Pachia a lungrythuasah lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh. Pawccecize Pachia kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia tuh a um cipaw te amaw kha thawte a ccung`ae paw kha amee pyatu nynh thua cipaw kha a zyn hahe aho.
58011007	Noah tuh muih loh leipaw uccaw`ae kong kha Pachia nynh raering a pya koute a innbyn khumnaw hanlan Pachia rawrinaw te zynnaw liate sanphalung kha a sak, kha-e zynnaw liate laephipi kha seibe zah zynnaw liate athua paw dingnaw rhoccoutu lang yn tang.
58011008	Abraham nynh rho lang a ccou vae cih paw ram langkhe ccia khylan ko he athua tuh zynnaw liate kaw a ngae; te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw ny leite a cceih.
58011009	Byakinpyakupaw ram kyakhe ccangpaw ram kya hawte zynnaw liate a um. Kha-e byakinpyakupaw kha amaw ry rhoccoutu athua`ae paw Isaak te Jakob ryte bu kyakhe a um`ae.
58011010	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a sak paw te a rae paw, athonaw a hoi paw khuapi kha aning nynh a ngaehoi.
58011011	Sarah nynh mah amaw kha byakinpakuhtupaw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua cite a tuaku keiccuze ccaawpoi kho lan cipaw zynnaw liate thawzung a mue. Te ccaawsaah kho lan a kum phe alue vae zemah ccaaw kha a saah.
58011012	Tukeiccuze achihpaw hawte athua vae paw lukheitpaw kyate vaawlui e awsi`ae hawte alungpaw, te rili kin um paw riatae leipaw laesia hawte ccaaw patae a pui`ae.
58011013	Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh byakinpyakupaw kha ccou leite zynnaw hoite phe chih`ae. Thuasalama asawpi te kha-e kha muihlang`ae zah a cciadue`ae, te minmin tuh laephi vawlan mikhia`ae te khuaccung`ae paw nynh kae thua cipaw ccaerarihlan a nyku`ae.
58011014	Pawccecize kha-e uccaw kong a ho`ae paw nynh minmin tuh mimaw ram nynh a ccung`ae cite ccaerarihlan a ho`ae.
58011015	Te a poutaw`ae paw ram kha minmin nynh palei a tuathui ccaccing`ae lanze, tuh-e kalan bua kithui lan ccyhhoypaw phe a hoi cih`ae paw.
58011016	Thuasalama minmin nynh ahoy huapaw ram, tuh-e tuh vaawran, kha nynh mih pe a ki. Tukeiccuze Pachia tuh mih Pachia cite koku lanpaw kha a maethah khyh. Pawccecize minmin hanlan khuapi kha Pachia nynh phe a paccynpya vae`ae.
58011017	Abraham tuh syntaw he athua lyakhe, zynnaw liate Isaak kha silawku nawlan a pya; te byakinpyakupaw a muetupaw nynh a hoithypaw a ccapaw kha phe a pya.
58011018	Amaw kong lante asekuh te, “Isaak kya nynh na ciihan tuh minphu athua cih,” cite hopya athua.
58011019	Pachia tuh achihpaw heize a thosathui kho cite aning nynh varyn a zyn; aning nynh muihsanaw lante a chih`ae paw kyate Isaak kha mah a mue.
58011020	Isaak nynh yn thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae kong lante Jakob te Esau kha zynnaw liate hythua a pya`ae.
58011021	Jakob nynh a chidyn khe Josef ccaaw`ae kha zynnaw liate ccarou hythua a pya`ae, te a hoitang dung kyakhe phang ngeikute Pachia kha a beik.
58011022	Josef nynh chi lan he cih tuh Israel ccaaw`ae nynh a pou lan`ae paw kong kha zynnaw liate hosya zah amaw a ru`ae konglang te bya a tawsya`ae.
58011023	Mawsi he a pui tuh apuithyapaw imua nynh thua cipaw kha a muih`ae keiccuze zynnaw liate siapharan awda kha ri vae leite a nung te a paaw nynh Mawsi kha zynnaw liate sawpaw sathung a thuru`ae.
58011024	Mawsi nynh piccang he thua tuh Faro ccanung a ccapaw cite koku lanpaw kha zynnaw liate phe a ei.
58011025	Seinaw kya-e lungrythuanaw kha sosoh hoysah lanpaw laeze Pachia ccungccaw`ae ryte vawsawnaw teing lanpaw kha a poku paleih.
58011026	Izip ram kya-e sisua`ae laeze Kri keiccuze saryakunaw tuh asung huapaw hoirungnaw nynh thua cite a tuaku. Pawccecize nyalang mue lanpaw ryalaw mee kha nynh a tua.
58011027	Siapharan thinrianaw kha ri leite Izip ram kha zynnaw liate a cciataw. Pawccecize muih kho leipaw Pachia kha a muih paw hawte aning tuh phang a ngaesang.
58011028	Ccatawccaaw`ae a rohtupaw nynh Israel ccatawccaaw`ae kha a tung khyh nawlan, Mawsi nynh Kawtaw Poi te chii theipaw kha zynnaw liate a rae.
58011029	Israel`ae nynh laerou kya ccia hawte zynnaw liate Rili Se kha po a zuaa`ae. Kha-e kha Izip`ae nynh he a zuaabua`ae tuh tui nynh pung a vu`ae.
58011030	Jeriko khua lungruapi kha nin sari a voilu`ae koute, zynnaw liate lungruapi tuh pung ating.
58011031	Ohhuanung Rahab tuh dophitu`ae kha ahoyte innccung a thuasah`ae keiccuze zynnaw liate aning tuh kawngae lei`ae paw ryte chihbua khyh.
58011032	Tuhlaelan pawmou ka ho ung cih? Gideon kong, Barak kong, Samson kong, Jefthah kong, David kong, Samuel te profeh`ae kong ho lan ccyh ka zaw lan khyh.
58011033	Tuh-e`ae tuh peenaw`ae kha zynnaw liate a tae`ae, dingnaw rya kha a law`ae, byakinpyakupaw a mue`ae, chindeih`ae khalang kha a myhsah`ae,
58011034	maee thungnaw kha a the`ae, thaloi haw kyate a lue`ae, thawzyanaw kyate a thawsaepaw lang rae athua`ae, rhawdounaw kya a rawthungpaw lang a tang`ae, ramccangpaw rhawkaw`ae a ccuesah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
58011035	Nopi`ae nynh mih michi`ae kha hiinnaw kalan bua thosahnaw te a mue`ae, te mingccang`ae tuh ahoy huapaw thothuinaw kha mue khylan minmin nynh luesanaw kha lawku leite tuasahnaw kha a teing`ae.
58011036	Te mingccang`ae tuh saryanaw te ziabuakunaw kha a teing`ae, athua, sivarui te khii`ae zah thungsaw`ae.
58011037	Lung te a deih`ae, thing-aw te phaebua`ae, a syntaw`ae, thaloi te a chia`ae, tuuphua te miaphua kha kikuh`ae zah a khiakuh`ae; boeining leite ae van ae leite a um`ae, vawsaw a teing`ae, ming`ae nynh a tua-a sah`ae;
58011038	laephipi tuh minmin te ngaekuh khyh. Minmin tuh rangkaw kya, mua`ae kya a la khiakuh`ae, lungkarung te laekarung`ae kya a la um`ae.
58011039	Te minmin balyn tuh zynnaw liate thehoynaw a ccou`ae zemah byakinpyakupaw kha mue khyh`ae.
58011040	Minmin tuh aening leite ccingsah athua khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh ahoy huapaw uccaw kha aening hanlan phe oun paccynpya vae.
58012001	Tukeiccu aening mah ccaekia athua paw maeking pi nynh phang oun koihlu keiccuze, zoikadeih lang kaang oun kaesah paw seinaw te phupaw miakaw kha ccanglang dae nung oh sih lah aening malang a um paw ccuetaekunaw kyakhe lungsaenaw te ccue oh sih.
58012002	Aening zynnaw athotu te ccingsatupaw Jesu kha rirido te ccue oh sih. Aning tuh maethyanaw kha pawlangria leite amaw malang nungpya athua paw lungtuanaw hanlan vaelantung kha phang ngaesang zah Pachia kya-e suitungkhung ranglang khe a dahung vae.
58012003	Pawccecize nanning nae hiinnawmuisaw`ae kya nae thawthang khyh nawlan te nae lungthawzya khyh nawlan misei`ae kya-e khahtahawpaw rawsenaw a ngaesangtupaw amaw kha la tuatua oh.
58012004	Nanning nynh seinaw dounaw kya chii phe lua lan ciate na dou loh khyh oh.
58012005	Te ccaaw`ae kya hopya hawte nanning hopya paw hynaw bya kha phe na ning vae oh. Tuh-e bya tuh: “Ka ccapaw, BAWIPAW thuiheinaw kha pawlangria leite um nan, amaw nynh ae pe vae ze na lungthang nan sah.
58012006	Pawccecize BAWIPAW nynh a sungsahpaw kha a thuihei, te aning nynh lehkhan paw ccaaw miakaw kha a zia a bua,” acikuh.
58012007	Thuiheinaw kha nanning nynh na ngaesang oh lanze, Pachia nynh nanning kha ccaaw`ae hawte ae ccuepe oh. Pawccecize paaw nynh a thuihei leipaw ccaaw um zaw?
58012008	Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw nynh a mue`ae paw thuiheinaw kha nanning nynh na muebua khyh oh ze, nanning tuh ccaaw ccaccing na thua khyh oh, ccalah nynh na thua oh.
58012009	Tuhlaeze aening yn thuihei paw pynsaw lante paaw`ae ah hoi oh, te minmin kha saw ah tua oh; muisaw`ae Paaw kaw te tuhlae houh umte ah hiin lan khyh oh tou?
58012010	Pawccecize tuh-e paaw`ae nynh mimaw nynh ahoy cite a tua`ae thyhte sosoh nynh yn thuihei`ae. Thuasalama Pachia nynh tuh amaw kya-e thyaararihnaw kha a neethungkuh bua`ae paw ah thua nawlan oh, aening thanenaw hanlan nynh yn thuihei.
58012011	Te thuiheinaw miakaw teing lya tuh lungpaw lan a um paw lo khyh, thuasalama ngaethya lan um paw nynh thua; tuhzemah thuiheinaw te kia athua`ae paw hanlan, kha-e nynh nyalang tuh daenaw te asekuhpaw dingnaw thae kha a thuakhaepya`ae.
58012012	Tukeiccuze balae ting paw kuih`ae te a thawzyapaw ccukharu`ae kha thawsaesah oh.
58012013	Te ccukhoupaw ccu akhahku khyh nawlan, dansah athua paleih nawlan, nae ccu hanlan laanpi kha dingsah oh.
58012014	Ccungccaw balyn ryte ccawkute um paw te thyaanaw kha deesui oh; thyaanaw leite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Bawipaw kha muih lan khyh.
58012015	Pachia thawccinaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san mue leite a um khyh nawlan, tukhyhlanze akhahpaw kyate yn pou paw tharui nynh nanning kha vawsaw ae pya khyh nawlan oh, te kha-e liate ccungccaw patae tuh nungsisaku athua cih`ae.
58012016	A ohhuakuhpaw a um khyh nawlan, tukhyhze a ccatawccaawthuanaw kha aepaw kawkheit lang phe a zuakuhpaw, Esau hawte Pachia pawlangria leipaw na thua khyh nawlan oh raeringkute ngawdo oh.
58012017	Pawccecize Esau nynh nyalang te hythuanaw kha rhoccou ry zah mitphi te thawmawte a ccung zemah ngaesiku nawlan a muihku vae khyh keiccuze aning tuh nue athua vae cipaw kha na ny oh.
58012018	Pawccecize nanning nynh kuih te tung kho um paw te maee nynh a u paw mua kalan, te maeking amanpaw kalan, mohnaw, khise,
58012019	mungkae roiccaepaw, bya roi a umnaw kalan khe na thua khyh oh; ou tuhte kha-e roi a thae`ae paw nynh bya kha mih kalan bua hopya athua vae khyh nawlan a ngia`ae.
58012020	Pawccecize, “Saring nynh heize kha-e mua kha a tung lanze lung te deih athua cih, tukhyhze thee te kaw athua cih,” cite kawpyapaw kha minmin nynh ngaesang kho khyh`ae.
58012021	Te tuh-e muih paw tuh myarya ri lan um paw thua zah Mawsi nynh, “Myaryasangkae ka rih zah ka thyngkuh,” a ci.
58012022	Thuasalama nanning tuh Zion Mua kalan, a hiinpaw Pachia khualipi athua paw vaw Jerusalem kalan, riatae lei vaaw ccungccaw`ae phu kalan,
58012023	vaawran kya min zei athua paw ccatawccaaw kya-e kriccawbu te lungtua lan um paw pumkunaw kalan, ccungccaw balyn Byapiatupaw Pachia kalan, phe ccing lang rae athua paw adingpaw ccungccaw muisaw`ae kalan,
58012024	te byakin thaw kya-e Daenaw Raetu Jesu kalan, te Abel kya-e laeze ahoy huapaw uccaw`ae kong a hopaw theipaw chii kalan nynh na thua oh.
58012025	A hotupaw kha nanning nynh na ei khyh nawlan oh raeringkuh oh. Pawccecize laephi vawlan a hotupaw kha a ei`ae paw minmin tuh detahnaw kha a lue khyh lan`ae ze, vaawran kyate a hotupaw kyate ah maeleihku oh lanze pawtemou ah lue kho cih oh.
58012026	Tuh ccyh lya amaw roi nynh laephi kha a hysah; thuasalama atu aning nynh, “Tuhzemah laephi kyalya thua vae leite, vaawran kha mah vaekheit bua ka hy ung cih,” cite byakinkute a ho.
58012027	Te hynh-e, “Tuhzemah vaekheit bua,” cipaw nynh a langsakupaw tuh hy kho a um leipaw uccaw`ae tuh po a um nawlan, ahy khopaw uccaw`ae, tuh-e tuh rae paw uccaw`ae nuenawpaw kha nynh thua.
58012028	Tukeiccuze ahy kho leipaw peenaw kha a ccou oh keiccu tuh, sawtuanaw te rawrinaw ryte douccah lante Pachia kha rya ah lawpya nawlan oh thawccinaw kha hoi oh sih.
58012029	Pawccecize aening ah Pachia tuh aruapaw maee nynh thua.
58013001	Uteno sungsakunaw kha po tynsah oh.
58013002	Mikhia`ae dooihpaw kha la ning nan oh. Pawccecize khate mikhia dooihnaw te abang nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha tua lei pite innccung a la thuasah`ae.
58013003	Minmin ryte thungccahkheih`ae paw hawte naemaw kha tuakuh oh lah thungccah`ae paw kha la ning nan oh. Naemaw mah pyn kya na um oh paw athua hawte, vawsawnaw a teing`ae paw kha la ning nan oh.
58013004	Ccungccaw balyn laku zu te vaw tangnaw tuh pawpaw balyn kya sawtua lan um paw nynh thua, te anungsikuh leipaw ikhung mah sawtua lan um paw nynh thua; thuasalama a ohhuakuh`ae paw te milae zu, milae vawpaw ry asei`ae paw tuh Pachia nynh byapia cih`ae.
58013005	Nae hiinzia tuh phua duanaw a hoi leipaw thua sah, na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae khate nae lungryachih sah. Pawccecize amaw nynh, “Nang kha kae cciataw boi lan khyh zah kae vua boi lan khyh,” a ci.
58013006	Tukeiccu, “BAWIPAW tuh kamaw yn bawngtu thua zah ka rih vae lan khyh. Ccungccaw nynh kamaw kya pawmou a cyihkho cih?” cite aening nynh raw hoite ah ho kho vae cih oh.
58013007	Nae kya Pachia bya ae hopah oh paw, nanning ae uk oh paw kha la ning nan oh. Mih hiinzia nynh a poukhae paw kha tuabiate, mih zynnaw kha zui oh.
58013008	Jesu Kri tuh inkhawnin, atunin, te zungzae cia lae khyh.
58013009	Ccangpyakunaw aphuinphuin te alokuh leipaw ccangpyakunaw`ae nynh ae la cciakhaesei nan oh sah. Pawccecize aepaw te thua leite, thawccinaw liate thinlung thawsaesah paw tuh ahoypaw nynh thua. Aepaw kyalya phang a tua`ae paw tuh kha-e aepaw nynh thanesah khyh`ae.
58013010	Silawhang kha aening ah hoi oh. Tuh-e kya tuh beikbuu ryalawpatu`ae nynh aenaw kaw hoi khyh`ae.
58013011	Pawccecize seinaw hanlan ranpibawi lupi nynh athyaapaw hmin lungkhu lang mih chii a teekhae paw, saring pyn`ae kha ryabuu atolang khe maee te a rua`ae.
58013012	Tukeiccuze Jesu mah amaw a chii te ccungccaw`ae kha thyaasah khylan koikua atolang khe a teing.
58013013	Tukeiccuze aening nynh amaw kya-e saryanaw kha phubiate ryabuu atolang amaw kalan khe cceih oh sih.
58013014	Pawccecize e kya aening tuh po atynpaw khualipi ah hoi khyh oh, thuasalama yn thua vae cih paw khualipi kha nynh ah ccung oh.
58013015	Tukeiccu amaw min kya lungtuabya hote, ah khalang`ae thae athua paw, thehoysanawpaw silawkunaw kha amaw liate Pachia kalan pei pya oh sih.
58013016	Thuasalama ahoypaw cyi lanpaw te neethungbua lanpaw kha la ning nan oh. Pawccecize khahtahawpaw silawnaw`ae kya Pachia tuh a lungry kou thua.
58013017	Nanning ae uktu oh paw kaw kha ngae oh lah naemaw kha minmin kalan la pyakuh oh. Pawccecize minmin tuh mimaw konglang a phykuh cih`ae paw hawte, nae hiinnawmuisaw ae ringpah oh paw nynh thua. Ngaethyanaw te thua leite lungtuanaw te kha-e kha cyih`ae sah. Pawccecize tuhte ngaethyanaw te cyi paw tuh nae hanlan athane leipaw nynh thua.
58013018	Kaening hanlan saw yn sangpah oh. Kaening tuh mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ahoypaw kae hoi zah pawpaw kya balyn kou hoy lante hiin lan kae ry cipaw kha kae nyku ccaccing.
58013019	Thuasalama kae tuh nae kalan taloi bua kae thua nawlan, hynh-e hanlan abapilante saw oun sangpah oh cite kae ngia oh.
58013020	Atu zungzae atynpaw byakin kya-e chii liate, tuu`ae kya-e alesaepaw Tuuringtu, ah Bawipaw Jesu kha a chih`ae paw kyate bua a thuakhaetupaw, daenaw Pachia nynh,
58013021	amaw malang a lungrythua paw rya kha Jesu Kri liate nae kya lawte, amaw rynaw kha cyi khylan ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya nanning kha ae ccingsah vae oh sah. Amaw Jesu Kri kya zungzae te zungzae cia phu-enaw um sah. Amen.
58013022	Te uteno`ae hynawpaw bya hynh la ngaesang oh cite kae ngia oh; pawccecize nae kalan ccaky tuh pyhtari te nynh ka zei.
58013023	Ah unopaw Timote kha phe a luesah vae`ae cipaw kha la nyh oh. Aning nynh aro maw yn thua lanze amaw ryte nanning kha kae muih cih oh.
58013024	Nanning ae uktu oh paw balyn te mithyaa`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh. Itali ram kya a um`ae paw nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
58013025	Nanning balyn kya thawccinaw la um sah. Amen.
59001001	Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri seepaw kae James nynh pung pazaekuh lang a phiakuh`ae paw Israel phin haw laening kha kae beihlang oh.
59001002	-
59001003	Ka uteno`ae, nae zynnaw kya-e syntawnaw nynh lungsaenaw kha a poukhae cipaw kha nyte, syntawnaw`ae aphuinphuin lungkhu lang he na phungku vae oh ze, kha-e kha marya lungtuanaw lang la ria oh.
59001004	Thuasalama nanning nynh pawsang hobounaw um leite khaleih phe na ccing nawlan oh, lungsaenaw nynh amaw kya-e accingpaw ryalaw kha hoi sah.
59001005	Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh hawnaw abou lanze, seibe leipaw, ccungccaw balyn kha hysate a pyatupaw Pachia kha aning nynh ngiakuh sah, te kha-e kha amaw kalan pya athua cih.
59001006	Thuasalama lunghiinnaw hoi leite, zynnaw te ngiakuh sah. Pawccecize lunghiinnaw a hoi paw tuh khivae nynh mung zah athekuhpaw rili kya-e tuileih te nynh aloku.
59001007	Pawccecize tuhte a um paw tuh-e ccungccapaw nynh tuh Bawipaw kyate ccangkhakheit ka mue cih cite tuakuh nan sah.
59001008	Tuanawthinlung apheipaw ccungccaw tuh a ccianaw balyn kya atyn leipaw nynh thua.
59001009	Zakawsang paw uno nynh tuh amaw hangthung athuanaw kyakhe lungtua sah.
59001010	Thuasalama mihoipaw nynh tuh amaw sawbungnaw kyakhe lungtua sah. Pawccemacize loo kya-e haetapaw hawte aning tuh azo cih.
59001011	Pawccecize khuanin nynh asopaw ryte ccahe apaw tuh kha-e nynh lonua kha naansah zah kha-e apaw tuh akhuakuh, te apuithyapaw a muinsan tuh azo; tuhhawte mihoipaw mah a ccianaw kya aroh cih.
59001012	Tuh-ounaw kha a ngaesang paw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua; pawccecize aning tuh syntaw he athua koute, Bawipaw nynh amaw a sungsah`ae paw elan byakinpyakupaw hiinnaw suilukhung kha a mue cih.
59001013	Tuh-ounaw kha a tung vae ze, “Pachia nynh kae tuh yn tuhou,” cite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ho nan sah; pawccecize Pachia tuh ahoy leipaw liate tuhou kho thua lan khyh, amaw nynh mah hung ccungccaw sanmah tuh-ou boi khyh.
59001014	Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw ryduanaw nynh soih zah he a sue vae ze, aning tuh ling athua vae.
59001015	Oute ryduanaw nynh ccaaw he a poi tuh kha-e nynh seinaw kha a saah. Te seinaw nynh he ale tuh chinaw kha a thuakhae.
59001016	Ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae, va lingsakuh nan oh.
59001017	Ahoypaw lasung miakaw te accingpaw lasung miakaw tuh a luki langte, te awnaw`ae Paaw kyate nynh oun thua`ae. Amaw kya tuh rulaekunaw um khyh zah paleihkunaw mynlyh cipaw um boi khyh.
59001018	Aening tuh amaw nynh a rae`ae paw balyn kyaze masaty a thae`ae phin ah thua nawlan oh, amaw a rynaw thyhte byaccing kya-e bya khate aening kha oun saah.
59001019	Tukeiccu ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae, ccungccaw miakaw tuh nawthae lan a khyrang sah, bya ho lan a khysung sah, thinria lan a khysung sah;
59001020	pawccecize ccungccaw thinrianaw nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha poukhae khyh.
59001021	Tukeiccu nungsikunaw balynte paepaeluipaw hoyleinaw kha dae nue oh lah, nae hiinnawmuisaw` ae a khum khopaw, bing athua paw Pachia bya kha lungnenaw te lawkuh oh.
59001022	Naemaw te naemaw kha lingku te, bya a thaetu`ae kyalya thua nan oh, thuasalama a cyihtu`ae la thua oh.
59001023	Pawccecize lukhakheit tuh bya thaetu thua zah a cyihtu athua khyh ze, aning tuh a puikhaepaw a mae kha muinsado kya a dokuh paw ccungccapaw te nynh aloku.
59001024	Pawccecize aning nynh amaw te amaw kha dokuh zah po a cceih, te aning tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw nynh thua cipaw kha phe a ning kanmaw.
59001025	Thuasalama luenaw kya-e accingpaw kawbya lungkhu lang do zah kha-e kya po atynpaw ccungccaw tuh, a ningthyapaw thaetu thua khyh, thuasalama ryalaw a lahtu nynh thua, tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh a cyipaw kya hythuaccoupaw athua cih.
59001026	Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh beiknaw lante a zuakuhpaw cite tuakuh zah a lae kha a kia khyh lanze, aning tuh amaw a thinlung a lingkuh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e paw beiknaw tuh accakaepaw nynh thua.
59001027	Paaw Pachia malang accikuhpaw te anungsikuh leipaw beiknaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Ngawraw`ae te numae`ae mih vawsawnaw kya paebua paw te amaw kha laephipi kyate kalouhku leite um paw kha nynh thua.
59002001	Ka uteno`ae, phu-enaw Bawipaw athua paw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri zynnaw kya ccungccaw laesahnaw la hoi nan oh.
59002002	Nanning na pumkunaw oh lungkhu lang ccungccaw lukheit nynh sui kuihpu te apuithyapaw uccaw lawkute yn teebua ze, te a ryachipaw mah anyaapaw uccaw lawkute yn teebua ze,
59002003	apuithyapaw uccaw te yn ccaankuh paw kha nanning nynh saw na tua oh zah, “E ahoypaw hmin kyahin dahung,” na cipah oh zah a ryachipaw kha, “Khuhlang khuin la thadyn,” tukhyhze, “Ka ccu nungnaw kyahin yn dahung,” na cipya oh lanze,
59002004	naemaw te naemaw laku ccungccaw laesanaw na hoi khyh oh tou? Te nanning tuh athahpaw tuanaw`ae ryte byapiatu`ae khaw na thua oh?
59002005	Ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae la ngaetua oh; hynh-e laephipi kya-e ryachi`ae kha zynnaw kya a hoirung nawlan`ae, te amaw a sungsah`ae paw hanlan byakinpyaku vae paw, peenaw rhoccoutu`ae lang Pachia nynh po khyh`ae tou?
59002006	Thuasalama nanning nynh ryachi`ae kha pawlangria leite na um oh. A hoirung`ae paw nynh nanning kha ae tua ae sah khyh oh zah byapianaw zung malang nanning kha ae sue khyh oh tou?
59002007	Nanning ae konaw oh paw, aphutepaw min kha minmin nynh thethya ho khyh`ae tou?
59002008	“Na innpaw kha namaw te namaw hawkhate na sungsah cih,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa thyhte alesaepaw kawbya kha na ccingsah oh ccaccing ze, kou hoy lan na cyih oh paw nynh thua.
59002009	Thuasalama maedonaw kha na hoi oh lanze, nanning tuh a sei`ae paw nynh na thua oh. Kawbya a lue`ae paw hawte kawbya nynh a sei cite a nysaku`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
59002010	Pawccecize hunghung zemah Kawbya khaleih kha zui salamah ccangkheit kya a thyku lanze, aning tuh kawbya marya a cyihseipaw nynh thua.
59002011	Pawccecize, “Milae zu seikhae nan,” cite a hotupaw nynh, “Ccungccaw theih nan,” cite mah a hobia. Atu nang tuh milae zu na seikhae khyh zemah ccungccaw na chia lanze, nang tuh kawbya zui leipaw nynh na thua.
59002012	Luenaw kya-e kawbya liate byapia athua vae cih`ae paw hawkhate, nanning mah bya ho oh lah tuhte cyih oh.
59002013	Pawccecize ngaethya-umsanaw a langsakuh leipaw ccungccaw tuh ngaethyaumsanaw leite byapianaw kha a mue cih. Ngaethya-umsanaw nynh byapianaw kha phe a tae.
59002014	Ka uteno`ae, ccungccaw lukheit nynh zynnaw ka hoi a ci zemah cyisahnaw`ae a hoi khyh ze pawmou athane? Kha-e zynnaw nynh amaw kha a khum kho cih tou?
59002015	Uno lukheit tukhyhze ccianung lukheit tuh uccaw leite um zah nin takyh aepaw kha hoi leite a um lanze,
