59002016	te nanning kyaze lukheit nynh minmin kha, “Daebabilan la cceih oh, nae khua la lungsah lah nae vue la so sah,” a cipya`ae, tuhzemah pyn hanlan ahopaw kha-e uccaw`ae kha na pya khyh oh ze, pawmou athane?
59002017	Tuhhawte zynnaw mah cyisahnaw um leite, a makhaete tuh achihpaw nynh thua.
59002018	Athua, ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Nang tuh zynnaw na hoi, te kae tuh cyisahnaw`ae ka hoi, na cyisahnaw um leite na zynnaw kha yn langsapya tua, te kae tuh ka zynnaw kha ka cyisahnaw`ae liate kae langsapah cih,” a ci ze a ci ngaw.
59002019	Nang nynh Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um cite na zyn, kou ahoy. Raerangsaro`ae nynh mah zyn`ae zah a thyngkuh`ae.
59002020	Thuasalama, pou mingaeepaw, cyisahnaw`ae um leite zynnaw tuh a chih cipaw hynh na nyhry tou?
59002021	Ah minpaaw Abraham nynh silawhang vawlan a ccapaw Isaak kha silawnaw lang he a pya tuh, cyisahnaw`ae liate aning tuh thyaaccou khyh tou?
59002022	A zynnaw tuh a cyisahnaw`ae ryte pawcihte nynh ryalaw cipaw te cyisahnaw`ae liate nynh zynnaw tuh accingpaw lang rae athua cipaw kha na muih ta?
59002023	“Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah kha-e kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh phe accing. Te aning tuh Pachia banpaw cite ko athua.
59002024	Oute ccungccaw tuh zynnaw kyalya liate thua leite, cyisahnaw`ae liate nynh thyaaccou a thua cipaw kha nanning nynh na muih oh.
59002025	Tuhhawte ohhuanung Rahab kha mah, zeccuetu`ae kha innccung ua`ae zah minmin kha ccangpaw ccianaw kalan phe a saw`ae tuh, cyisahnaw`ae liate aning tuh thyaaccou thua khyh tou?
59002026	Pawccecize muisaw um leite pyn tuh a chih, tuhhawte cyisahnaw`ae um leite zynnaw mah achihpaw nynh thua.
59003001	Ka uteno`ae, aening tuh aru huapaw byapianaw kha ah mue cih oh cipaw kha nybiate ccangpatu`ae patae la thua nan oh.
59003002	Pawccecize aening balyn tuh uccaw patae kya ah thypawkuh oh. Lukhakheit nynh bya kya a sei khyh ze, tuh-e paw tuh accingpaw ccungccaw nynh thua. Aning tuh a pyn khaleih kha a taekuh khopaw nynh thua.
59003003	Dotua oh, marang`ae nynh aening kaw a ngae ccaw`ae cite mih mung kya rangtei kha ah teisah oh, te mih pyn khaleih kha ah mae kho oh.
59003004	Sanphalung`ae kha mah dotua oh: kha-e`ae tuh myarya le`ae zah khivae arupaw rou nynh a mung kho zemah a mungtupaw nynh ditaripaw maenawpaw khate a rynaw langkhe phe a mae.
59003005	Tuhhawte lae tuh pyn kya-e ditaripaw athua zemah myarya a pookuh thya. Maee-ia taraw nynh pawcih alepaw lorang mah a u kho cipaw kha dotua oh!
59003006	Te lae tuh maee nynh thua. Seimenaw laephipi nynh thua. Tuhhawte nynh lae tuh ah pyn kya-e`ae laku athua, pyn khaleih kha a nungsisaku; te aphungpaw ccianaw kha maee vawlan khe a nung; te kha-e kha hell maee vawlan nung athua.
59003007	Pawccecize rangsaw`ae phin miakaw, pavaw`ae phin, vue te a vaw`ae paw phin, rili kya um paw ngasaw`ae phin kha ngaesah kho thua zah ccungccaw`ae nynh phe a la ngaesah`ae.
59003008	Thuasalama lae tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ngaesah kho khyh, uk kho leipaw athahpaw uccaw nynh thua, a chisah khopaw asy te nynh phe abia.
59003009	Tuh-e lae te ah Paaw Pachia kha hythua ah pya oh; te tuh-e te Pachia alo lante rae athua paw ccungccaw`ae kha thya ah law oh.
59003010	Khalang sang kheit kyate hythuanaw te thyalawnaw kha yn pou. Ka uno`ae, tuh-e`ae tuh tuhte cyiku lan ccan khyh.
59003011	Tuidy ccangkheit nynh tuinaw sang kheit kyate tui epaw te tui khahpaw kha pousah ta?
59003012	Ka uteno`ae, thaeku ku nynh oliv thae`ae kha thae kho ngaw ta? Misu ku nynh so thaeku thae kha thae kho ngaw ta? Tuhhawte tuinaw sangkheit nynh loi tuipaw te tui thuapaw kha paryh pousah khyh.
59003013	Nanning laku a lunghawpaw te a thaethyapaw ccungccaw tuh hungmou? Aning nynh hawnaw kya-e lungnenaw te ahoypaw ozia khate a ryalaw`ae kha langsakuh sah.
59003014	Thuasalama nae thinlung kya akhahpaw eiungnaw te peku maekunaw na hoi oh lanze, pookuh nan oh lah byaccing kha rawsete hyng nan oh.
59003015	Tuh-e hawnaw tuh luki langte yn thua paw thua khyh, thuasalama laephi hawnaw, pynsaw te asekuhpaw hawnaw te raerangsaro hawnaw nynh thua.
59003016	Pawccecize eiungnaw te peku maekunaw a umnaw tuh keisukeilae umnaw te athahpaw ryalaw`ae miakaw nynh a um.
59003017	Thuasalama luki lang-e hawnaw tuh masaty accikuh, oute ccawkunaw a umsah, nevyalya, soih lan a zoi, ngaethya-umsanaw te phe beih zah ahoypaw athae te phe beih, laesanaw um khyh zah cyiruhnaw um khyh.
59003018	Te ccawkunaw a rae`ae paw nynh dingnaw thae kha daenaw te ccaciivua`ae.
59004001	Nanning laku rhawtukkunaw`ae te peku maekunaw`ae tuh paw kyate mou oun thua`ae? Nae pyn kya-e`ae kya rhawtukkuh`ae paw naemaw ryduanaw`ae kyate oun thua khyh`ae tou?
59004002	Na ry na dua oh zah na hoi khyh oh. Na dua oh zah ccungccaw na chia oh, te na mue kho khyh oh. Na puihkuh oh zah rhaw na tukkuh oh. Tuhzemah na mue khyh oh; pawccemacize na ngia khyh oh.
59004003	Nanning nynh na ngia oh zemah na mue khyh oh; pawccemacize naemaw hoysanaw`ae hanlan karyh mang khylan phe na ngiakusei oh keiccu nynh thua.
59004004	Milae zu seikhaetu`ae te milae vawpaw seikhaetu`ae! Laephipi te vaeccawkunaw tuh Pachia ryte rhawkunaw nynh thua cipaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou? Tukeiccu hunghung zemah laephipi ruiban lang a tangry paw tuh Pachia rhawpaw lang a raekuh paw nynh thua.
59004005	“Aening kya a um paw Muisaw tuh ccunging lan ciate myarya a ry,” cite Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw hynh accakaepaw nynh thua cite tou na tua oh?
59004006	Thuasalama aning nynh thawccinaw kha houh lung a pya. Tukeiccu aning nynh, “Pachia tuh a pookuh`ae paw kha a rawse, thuasalama zakawsangsakuh`ae paw kha thaw a cci,” a ci.
59004007	Tukeiccu nanning Pachia kalan pyakuh oh. Diabolos kha rawse oh lah aning tuh nae kyate ae ccuetaw cih oh.
59004008	Pachia kalan naekuh oh lah aning mah nae kalan a naekuh cih. Misei`ae nae kuih kha ccikan oh, lungphei`ae paw nae thinlung kha thyaasah oh.
59004009	Ngaethah oh, khui oh lah rah oh. Nae nuinthuanaw tuh rawkhuinaw lang tang sah lah nae lungtuanaw tuh ngaethyanaw lang tang sah.
59004010	Bawipaw malang naemaw te naemaw zakawsangsakuh oh, lah aning nynh ae hangthung cih oh.
59004011	Uteno`ae, lukheit te lukheit thethya hokuh nan oh. A uno kha thethya ho zah a uno byapia paw ccungccaw tuh kawbya kha thethya ho zah kawbya byapiatu nynh a thua. Thuasalama nang nynh kawbya kha bya na pia lanze, nang tuh kawbya kawngaepaw na thua khyh, byapiatu nynh na thua.
59004012	A khum khopaw te a roh khopaw, Kawbya pyatu lukheit rou nynh a um. Mingccangpaw kha byapiatupaw nang tuh hungmou na thua? Awkhualan hanlan Pookuh nan
59004013	“Atunin, tukhyhze awkhualan tuhtahawpaw khuapi lungkhu lang ah cceih cih oh zah tuin kya kum kheit ah um ngaw oh, ah re cih oh zah ah zua cih oh, te amia mue lan,” cite a ho`ae paw nanning, atu ngaetua oh!
59004014	Tuhte na ho oh paw kya, awkhualan pawmou yn cyihkuh cih cipaw na nyh khyh oh. Pawccecize nae hiinnaw tuh pawmou athua? Nae hiinnaw tuh ccyh sosoh a langkuh koute phe avaepaw tuihu kha nynh athua.
59004015	Te, “Bawipaw nynh a ry lanze, aening ah hiin cih oh zah hynh-e khyh ze kha-e kha ah cyih cih oh,” cite nynh na ho lan oh accan.
59004016	Thuasalama atu nanning tuh na tansakunaw oh kya na pookuh oh; khahtahawpaw pookunaw balyn tuh ahoy leipaw nynh thua.
59004017	Tukeiccu ahoypaw cyi lanpaw kha nyh zah a cyih leipaw tuh a hanlan seinaw nynh thua.
59005001	Mihoi`ae, atu ngaetua oh, nae tungvaw yn thua lanpaw vawsaw riathaenaw hanlan rah oh lah rawkhui oh.
59005002	Nae hoirungnaw tuh phe aroh vae, te nae uccaw`ae tuh ari nynh phe a ae.
59005003	Nae sui te ngun tuh chihhangkae zah, kha-e chihhangkaepaw nynh nanning kha rawsete ccaekia lang a tang cih`ae zah maee hawte nae ngesaw kha a ae cih. Nyathyakou-e nin`ae hanlan nynh sisua kha na ccakhungku oh.
59005004	Ngaetua oh, nae leikua`ae kya ccatan aw`ae paw ryalahtu`ae kha ryalaw mee pya leite phe na hyngpya oh, te mih ryalaw mee nynh a sia`ae. Te loohruetu`ae siaruanaw tuh Sabaoth Bawipaw nakaring kalan phe a thua vae.
59005005	Laephi vawlan hoysanaw kya na hiin oh zah na hoysah oh. Chia nin lo nin hawkhate nae thinlung`ae kha na hoysakuh oh.
59005006	Adingpaw kha sei na be oh zah phe na chia oh; aning nynh nanning kha ae rawse ru khyh oh.
59005007	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, Bawipaw yn thua cia lungsaete la ngaw oh. Dotua oh, loophopaw nynh khuatui te hawkhua kha a mue cia, laephi kya-e aphutepaw athae apaw kha lungsaete phang a ngawdae.
59005008	Nanning mah nae lungsae sah, nae thinlung`ae kha tynsah oh; pawccecize Bawipaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh anae vae.
59005009	Uteno`ae, nanning byapia na thua khyh nawlan oh lukheit te lukheit ccohnuakuh nan oh; dotua oh, thuakaw malang byapiatu phang a thadyn.
59005010	Ka uteno`ae, Bawipaw min liate a ho`ae paw profeh`ae kha vawsaw teingnaw te lungsaenaw hanlan dosuinkupaw lang la lawkuh oh.
59005011	Dotua oh, a ngaesang kho`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw ah ci oh. Joba a ngaesangnaw kong kha phe na thae vae oh, te Bawipaw tuh myarya thawccihthyapaw te ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi paw nynh thua cipaw kha Bawipaw nynh a thangsahnaw kyakhe phe na muih vae oh.
59005012	Thuasalama ka uteno`ae, pawpaw balyn kya ccaesakuh nan oh, vaawran phyate mah ccaesakuh nan oh, laephi phyate mah ccaesakuh nan oh, pawpaw byakinkunaw te mah ccaesakuh nan oh. Thuasalama byapianaw lungkhu lang na phungku sei khyh nawlan oh, “Athua,” na ci oh paw kha “Athua,” ci oh lah “Thua khyh,” na ci oh paw kha “Thua khyh,” ci oh.
59005013	Nanning laku vawsaw teingpaw um tou? A um ze sawsang sah. A lungpaw paw um ta? A um ze sam law sah sah.
59005014	Nanning laku ngeccih um tou? A um ze kriccawbu kya-e pastor`ae kha ko sah lah minmin nynh Bawipaw min kya satho kha thuhpah`ae sah lah a tungvaw sawsangpah`ae sah.
59005015	Te zynnaw kya-e sawsangnaw nynh ngeccih kha a khum cih zah Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha a thosah cih. Seinaw kha phe a la rae ze aning tuh ngaethya athua cih.
59005016	Lukheit te lukheit na cyisei oh paw kha hopakuh oh; te nanning kha dansah na thua nawlan oh lukheit te lukheit sawsangpakuh oh. Adingpaw ccungccaw nynh thawmawte amawccih lante sawsangpaw tuh myarya a thanesah.
59005017	Elijah tuh aening hawte thuanaw alokuhpaw ccungccaw nynh thua, te aning nynh khuaraw khyh nawlan thawte sawsang; te laephi vawlan kum thung te sawpaw sataruh cia khuarah khyh.
59005018	Te aning nynh bua sawsang zah vaawran nynh khuarawsah, te laephi nynh a thae a pousah.
59005019	Uteno`ae, nanning laku lukhakheit tuh byaccing kyate phe cceihsei zah lukhakheit nynh amaw kha a paleihsaku lanze,
59005020	miseipaw kha a ccianaw menaw kyate a paleihsakuh paw ccungccaw nynh tuh chinaw kyate hiinnaw-muisaw kha a khum cih zah seinaw pataepi kha a khawpah cih cipaw kha la nyh sah.
60001001	Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw, Piter nynh Pontas, Galatia, Kapadosia, Asia, te Bithynia ram kya phiariphiarae um`ae paw khuaccung`ae paw kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
60001002	Kawngaenaw hanlan te Jesu Kri kya-e chii theinaw ccou nawlan, Muisaw kya-e thyaasanaw liate, Paaw Pachia nytynaw thyhte po`ae paw: Thawccinaw nae kya la um sah lah daenaw la pungthung sah.
60001003	Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw tuh thehoysah thua sah. A chih`ae paw kyate Jesu Kri thothuinaw liate ahiinpaw ngaehoinaw hoi nawlan, paepaeluipaw a ngaethyaumsanaw thyhte aening kha bua oun saah vae.
60001004	Tuh-e tuh nanning hanlan vaawran kya ccypya athua paw arohthya leipaw, anungsikuh leipaw, te anaanthya leipaw rho uccaw kha mue khylan nynh thua.
60001005	Nyathyakou ccyh kya langsaku khylan paccynpaw, zynnaw liate khumnaw mue nawlan Pachia kya-e thungnaw liate nanning tuh ccy na thua oh.
60001006	Syntawnaw`ae aphuinphuin liate, aho lanze atu ccyh sosoh nae ngaethya zemah e kyahin myarya lungtua oh.
60001007	Ou tuhte thanccingpaw nae zynnaw tuh arohthyapaw sui laeze aphute huapaw athua thyhte, maee te syntaw athua zemah, Jesu Kri yn langkunaw kya amaw thehoysah nawlan, sawtua nawlan te phuesah nawlan muih athua nawlan nynh thua.
60001008	Amaw kha na muih lei oh pite na sungsah oh; atu amaw kha na muih khyh oh zemah na zyn oh; phe beihpaw phu-enaw te ho kho um leipaw lungtuanaw khate nae lungtua.
60001009	Pawccecize nae hiinnaw-muisaw khumnaw athua paw, nae zynnaw kya-e thanenaw kha na mue oh keiccu nynh thua.
60001010	Nae kalan yn thua lanpaw thawccinaw kong a la phyty`ae paw profeh`ae nynh hynh-e khumnaw kong kha la khia`ae zah thawte la ccung`ae.
60001011	Kri teingnaw, te tuh-e yn zui lanpaw phu-enaw kha minmin kya um paw Kri Muisaw nynh he a langsapaty`ae tuh pawmou a hothery, tukhyhze paw ccyh mou a hothery cipaw kha thawte a ccung`ae.
60001012	Mimaw hanlan thua leite, thuasalama nanning hanlan nynh rya ae lawpya oh cipaw tuh mih kalan phy athua, vaawran kyate saw athua paw Thyaa Muisaw liate nae kalan thehoypaw a ho`ae paw liate khae` ae kha atu nae kalan thaesah athua vae. Kha-e uccaw`ae kha vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh rirido lan a ry`ae paw nynh thua.
60001013	Tukeiccu nae tuanawthinlung kha varyn cciakuh oh, kyhrarihlan um oh lah Jesu Kri langkunaw kya nae kalan thuakhae athua cih paw thawccinaw kha athangnaw cia ngaehoi oh.
60001014	Na la ny khyh lya oh, langmaw lya-e pynsaw ryduanaw`ae muinsan kha la ke nan vae oh, kawngaepaw ccaaw`ae hawkhate um ccavae oh.
60001015	Thuasalama nanning ae ko oh paw tuh athyaa thyhhawte, nae umtu ziazae balyn kya nanning mah thyaa oh.
60001016	Pawkeiccumacize, “Kae tuh ka thyaa keiccu, nanning mah thyaa oh,” cite azeikuh.
60001017	Ccungccaw`ae laesahnaw um leite, ccungccaw miakaw a ryalaw thyhte byapia paw, Paaw kha na ko na ngiaku oh ze, e kya na um lungkhu oh balyn amaw rawrinaw te la um oh.
60001018	Nae minpaaw`ae kyate na mue oh paw accakaepaw nae hiinnawzia kyate, phua te sui tahawpaw arohthyapaw uccaw`ae khate nanning tuh sawkhaw na thua khyh oh,
60001019	thuasalama ccaenaw um leipaw, athupaw um leipaw, tuutaw hawte athua paw, Kri kya-e aphutepaw chii te nynh sawkhaw na thua oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
60001020	Tuh-e Kri tuh laephipi atho mawze laerui-awde ty vae paw ccaccing nynh a la thua, thuasalama hynh-e nyathyakou ccyh`ae kyahin nanning hanlan yn langkuh.
60001021	Nae zynnaw te ngaehoinaw tuh Pachia kya athua nawlan, amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate thosah zah phu-enaw a pyatupaw Pachia kha Kri liate na zyn oh.
60001022	Muisaw liate byaccing kawngaenaw kya nae hiinnawmuisaw` ae kha phe na ccikanku vae oh thyhte, uteno`ae thanccingte sungsanaw kya, athyaapaw thinlung khate lukheit te lukheit thawmawte sungsakuh oh.
60001023	Pawccecize arohthyapaw ccacii te thua leite, arohthya leipaw, ahiinpaw te zungzae atynpaw Pachia bya liate nynh na puithui oh.
60001024	Pawccecize, “Ccungccaw balyn tuh lonua hawte nynh thua. Te ccungccaw phu-enaw balyn tuh lonuapaw hawte nynh thua. Lonua tuh anaan, te kha-e apaw tuh akhuakuh.
60001025	Thuasalama BAWIPAW bya tuh zungzae atyn.” Te tuh-e tuh thehoypaw liate nanning kalan hopya paw bya kha nynh thua.
60002001	Tukeiccu ahoy leipaw balyn, hyngpyakunaw balyn, thyaruhnaw, eiungnaw, te thanhokunawpaw`ae balyn kha ccaring vuate;
60002002	apuithawpaw imua`ae hawte, Pachia bya accipaw samatei kha peki oh; ou tuhte kha-e liate nanning nynh na lethung nawlan oh,
60002003	Bawipaw tuh thawccithyapaw nynh athua cipaw kha phe na tangtua vae oh ccaccing lanze, peki oh.
60002004	Ccungccaw`ae nynh a nue`ae paw, thuasalama Pachia nynh a popaw, aphutepaw, ahiinpaw lung athua paw amaw kalan nae thua oh hawte,
60002005	nanning kha mah ahiinpaw lung`ae hawte muisaw lante sak paw inn nynh na thua oh, Jesu Kri liate Pachia kalan douccahpaw, muisaw lante silawkunaw`ae kha pya khylan, athyaapaw ranpibawi nynh na thua oh.
60002006	Tukeiccu Ccathyaa kya, “Dotua oh, popaw lung, aphutepaw, abapi huapaw aki lang-e lung kha Zion kya ka nung, te amaw kha a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” cite a um.
60002007	Tukeiccu a zyn paw nanning hanlan aning tuh aphutepaw nynh thua. Thuasalama a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan, “Inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang,”
60002008	te, “Thykupawkunaw lung, khuliakunaw lungpi,” lang yn tang. Bya kha a ngae khyh`ae keiccu nynh athyapawkuh` ae; minmin tuh kha-e hanlan khang paw nynh thua`ae.
60002009	Thuasalama nanning tuh mohnaw kyate ngaeang lan um paw amaw kya-e awnaw lungkhu lang ae kotu oh paw a hoynaw kha siakhae khylan popaw ccungccaw, bawiphin ranpibawi ciihan, athyaapaw minphuin, amaw nynh a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh na thua oh.
60002010	Langmaw lya tuh Pachia ccungccaw na la thua khyh oh, thuasalama atu tuh Pachia ccungccaw nynh na thua vae oh. Langmaw lya ngaethyaumsanaw na la ccou khyh oh, thuasalama atu tuh ngaethyaumsanaw na ccou vae oh.
60002011	Sungsah`ae paw, ramccang`ae te mikhia`ae na thua oh keiccu tuh hiinnawmuisaw rhawdou paw pynsaw ryduanaw`ae kha na sungku nawlan oh, nanning kha kae hy oh.
60002012	Zenta`ae nynh nanning kha ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae hawte thethya he ae ho vae oh ze, minmin nynh a muih`ae paw ahoypaw nae ryalaw`ae liate Pachia paebuanaw nin kya Pachia kha phu-esah nawlan`ae, Zenta`ae laku ahoypaw ozia khate la hiin oh.
60002013	Tukeiccu kawhoitu lang ccungccaw nynh a khang`ae paw miakaw kalan Bawipaw keiccuze pyakuh oh; lupi huaccepaw hawte athua paw siapharan kalan thuasah,
60002014	tukhyhze ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae kha detah khylan te ahoypaw ryalahtu`ae kha thehoysah khylan, siapharan nynh a saw paw uktu`ae kalan thuasah pyakuh oh.
60002015	Pawccecize ahoyte cyinaw liate angaeepaw ccungccaw`ae ngaeenaw kha nanning nynh zya na daesah nawlan oh, tuhte cyi paw tuh Pachia rynaw nynh thua.
60002016	A luepaw hawte hiin oh, tuhzemah na luenaw oh paw kha ahoy leipaw khawsung nawlan mang leite, Pachia ryalawpatu`ae hawte um oh.
60002017	Ccungccaw balyn kha sawtua oh. Uno na thua oh paw kha sungsah oh. Pachia kha rawrih oh. Siapharan kha sawtua oh.
60002018	Ryalawpatu`ae, rinaw khaleihte nae bawizua`ae kalan pyakuh oh. Ahoypaw te nevyalyapaw bawizua kalan kyalya thua leite, are-aruapaw bawizua kalan mah pyakuh oh.
60002019	Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit tuh Pachia nynaw keiccuze thinlungccinaw kha atazae lei lante ngaesangte teingsah athua lanze, tuh-e tuh thehoysah lan accanpaw nynh thua.
60002020	Pawccecize na cyiseinaw oh keiccu ae zia ae bua oh paw kha lungsaete na ngaesang oh zeso phu-esah lanpaw pawmou a um? Thuasalama ahoypaw rya na lah oh zah kha-e hanlan lungsaete na ngaesang oh ze, tuh-e tuh Pachia malang thehoysah lan accanpaw nynh thua.
60002021	Pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh nanning tuh ko na thua oh. Kri nynh mah aening hanlan a teing keiccuze a ccuhnoh kha na zui ccaw oh cite aening kha dosuinku lanpaw yn cciatawpyasya:
60002022	“Aning tuh seinaw rae khyh. A khalang kya hyngbya muih lan um khyh.”
60002023	Aning tuh he a sarya vae`ae ze, bua sarya ru khyh; he a teing vae ze, aning nynh furaw khyh`ae, thuasalama hmerarihlan byapiatupaw kalan amaw kha a ahku.
60002024	Ou tuhte seinaw`ae kya a chih`ae paw aening tuh dingnaw hanlan ah hiin nawlan oh aning nynh aening seinaw`ae kha amaw a pyn kya thing vawlan yn phupya. A vaemaw`ae liate nanning tuh na dan vae oh.
60002025	Pawccecize nanning tuh laanpi phe a me paw tuu`ae hawte nynh na la thua oh; thuasalama atu tuh Tuuringtu te nae hiinnawmuisaw Dooihtu kalan phe na paleihkuh vae oh.
60003001	Tuhhawte, zu`ae nanning, nae vawpaw`ae kalan pyakuh oh. Ou tuhte vawpaw lukhakheit nynh Pachia bya kha a ngae khyh zemah, bya hopya liate thua leite zu`ae ozia liate minmin kha bua mue athua nawlan,
60003002	nae kya-e sawtuanaw te athyaapaw nae ozia kha minmin nynh he muih`ae te minmin kha bua mue athua nawlan nynh thua.
60003003	Na ccaankunaw oh paw tuh, atolang-e ccaankupaw, sangkhekupaw, sui lawkupaw, tukhyhze uccaw hoypaw lawkupaw kyalya thua leite,
60003004	thuasalama, nevyalyapaw te daebabipaw muisaw kya-e arohthya leipaw puithyanaw khate thinlung lungkhu e ccungccapaw kha la ccaan oh. Hynh-e tuh Pachia malang myarya aphutepaw nynh thua.
60003005	Pawccecize hynhcihte nynh langmaw lya Pachia doliakuh`ae paw, athyaapaw nopi`ae nynh mah mih vawpaw`ae kalan pyakute mimaw te, mimaw kha a ccaanku`ae.
60003006	Sarah nynh Abraham kawngae zah amaw kha ‘bawipaw’ cite a ko hawkhate, minmin mah kawngae`ae; nanning nynh ahoypaw kha na cyih oh zah rinaw hoi leite na um oh ze, nanning tuh Sarah ccanung`ae nynh na thua oh.
60003007	Tuhhawte vawpaw`ae nanning, nae sawsangnaw tuh akhawpaw a um khyh nawlan zu`ae tuh hiinnaw kya-e thawccinaw rhoccoutu`ae athuabua`ae thyhhawte, thawzya huapaw angphe hawkhate, zu kha sawtuanaw pyate thaekuthyanaw te pynkheihlan um oh.
60003008	Nyathyakou, lukheit te lukheit thawccikunaw hoite, nanning balyn tuanaw-thinlung lokuh oh, uteno hawte sungsakuh oh, ngaethya-umsakuh oh, tuapakuh thya oh.
60003009	Athahpaw hanlan athahpaw te liaru leite, saryanaw hanlan saryanaw te liaru leite, thuasalama hythuanaw te liaru oh. Pawccecize nanning tuh hythuanaw rhoccou khylan ko paw nynh na thua oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
60003010	Pawccecize, “Hiinnaw kha sungsah ry zah ahoypaw nin`ae muih lan a ry paw ccungccaw nynh tuh a lae kha athahpaw kyate syngkuh sah lah a mung kha hyngbya honaw kyate syngkuh sah.
60003011	Athahpaw kha sibia sah lah ahoypaw kha cyih sah; daenaw kha ccung sah lah kha-e kha deesui sah.
60003012	Pawccecize BAWIPAW mit tuh adingpaw ccungccaw tungvaw nynh a um. Te mih sawsangnaw`ae kha a nakaring`ae nynh a ngaepya. Thuasalama BAWIPAW mitmae nynh athahpaw ryalah`ae paw kha a dou.”
60003013	Nanning tuh ahoypaw uccaw thydokuh`ae paw na thua oh lanze, hung nynh mou nanning kha vawsaw ae pya cih oh?
60003014	Thuasalama dingnaw keiccuze na teing oh heize, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh; “Te minmin furawnaw kha rih nan oh, lungvaw mah saw nan oh.”
60003015	Thuasalama nae thinlung kya Bawipaw Pachia kha sawtua rawrih oh. Nanning kya um paw ngaehoinaw konglang ae khia oh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha nevyalyanaw te, rinaw te nae zynnaw thungkhawku khylan pei paccynkuh oh.
60003016	Ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae hawte nanning thethya ae honaw oh kya, Kri kya ahoypaw nae ozia kha ahme lei lante nynh sei kae be cite mih maethya nawlan, ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kha hoi oh.
60003017	Pawccecize Pachia rynaw athua lanze, athahpaw cyipaw hanlan laeze ahoypaw cyipaw hanlan teing lanpaw tuh ahoyhua.
60003018	Pawccecize Kri mah seinaw`ae keiccu vaekheit a teing, aening kha Pachia kalan thuakhae khylan adingpaw tuh ading lei`ae paw hanlan pynsaw kya chia athua zemah Muisaw liate hiinsah athua.
60003019	Tuh-e Muisaw liate Kri nynh mah cceih zah thunginn kya um paw muisaw`ae kha a thaesah`ae.
60003020	Tuh-e muisaw`ae tuh langmaw Noah she lya, sanphalung sak athua lya, Pachia nynh lungsaenaw te phang a ngaw lya`ae kawngae lei`ae paw kha nynh thua`ae, khae sanphalung kya zyataripaw ccungccaw lutarya kha tui liate khum athua`ae.
60003021	Tuh-e tuh Jesu Kri thothuinaw liate atu aening yn khum paw baptisma muihsanaw nynh thua. Tuhe baptisma tuh pynsaw kyate athupaw singpaw kha thua khyh, thuasalama ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kyate Pachia kalan byakinkupaw kha nynh thua.
60003022	Tuh-e Kri tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae, kawhoinaw`ae te thungnaw`ae kha amaw kawngae lan a pyasakuh`ae koute vaawran lang cceih zah Pachia ranglang khe a um vae.
60004001	Ou tuhte aening hanlan Kri nynh pynsaw kya a teing hawte, nanning mah tuhhawte alokuhpaw tuanaw-thinlung khate naemaw kha paccaankuh oh. Pawccecize pynsaw kya a teingpaw ccungccaw tuh seinaw kyate phe a lue vae.
60004002	Ou tuhte a pynsaw kya a hoi ung paw ccyh kha ccungccaw ryduanaw hanlan a hiin vae khyh nawlan, thuasalama Pachia rynaw hanlan a hiin nawlan nynh thua.
60004003	Pawccecize Zenta`ae rynaw cyi paw athua paw sahpawrynaw, ohhuakurynaw, ruinaw, eih hoysakaesynaw, zuaete hoysanaw, luathua-ae-ui lang um paw zohtuhbeiknaw`ae kya ah la ciaku lya oh, alia vae paw ah ccyh tuh phe azaw vae.
60004004	Tuh-e kya nanning tuh minmin ryte alokuhpaw ozia roh paw hiinnaw kya na umbua khyh oh paw kha minmin mih ngaeangthua zah nanning kha thethya ae ho oh.
60004005	A hiin`ae paw te a chih`ae paw byapia lan a paccynkuh paw amaw kalan mimaw konglang kha a phykuh cih`ae.
60004006	Tuh-e keiccu pynsaw kya ccungccaw lante minmin tuh byapia athua nawlan`ae, thuasalama Pachia malang muisaw kya a hiin nawlan`ae, a chih`ae paw kalan mah thehoypaw tuh ho a la thua.
60004007	Thuasalama pawpaw balyn athangnaw tuh anae vae; tukeiccu kyhrararih lang um oh lah sawsangnaw elan ngawrando oh.
60004008	Pawpaw balyn laeze lukheit te lukheit thawte sungsakunaw hoi oh; pawccecize, “Sungsakunaw nynh tuh seinaw pataepi kha a khawpya.”
60004009	Ccohku leite, lukheit te lukheit mikhia thuasakuh oh.
60004010	Ccungccaw miakaw nynh lasung kha na mue oh hawte, Pachia thawccinaw aphuinphuin kya-e ahoypaw synriatu`ae hawte, lukheit te lukheit ryalawpakuh oh.
60004011	Jesu Kri liate pawpaw balyn kya Pachia tuh phu-esah athua nawlan, lukhakheit nynh phungho lanze Pachia bya thathyhte ho sah, lukhakheit nynh ryalawpya lanze Pachia nynh a pya paw cyi khonaw thyhte lawpah sah. Phuenaw te uknawkaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia amaw kya-e nynh thua. Amen.
60004012	Sungsah`ae, ccangpaw mazi athua paw uccaw nanning kya acyikuh paw hawte, nanning syntaw khylan acyihkuh paw, maee lang ruapaw syntawnaw kha ngaeangthua lante tua nan oh.
60004013	Thuasalama a phu-enaw langkunaw he yn thua vae ze, myarya lungpawnaw ryte nae lungtuabua nawlan nanning tuh Kri teingnaw`ae a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua oh thyhhawte lungtua oh.
60004014	Kri min keiccuze sarya na thua oh ze, lungtua paw nynh na thua oh. Pawccecize phu-enaw kya-e Muisaw te Pachia kya-e Muisaw tuh nanning tungvaw a um; minmin kalan te aning tuh thethyaho athua, thuasalama nanning kalan te aning tuh phu-esah athua.
60004015	Thuasalama nanning kyaze hung sanmah ccungccatheihpaw hawte, tukhyhze miruhpaw hawte, tukhyhze ahoy leipaw ryalahtu hawte, tukhyhze ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae kong a ccukuh buapaw hawte la teing nan oh.
60004016	Tuhzemah lukhakheit nynh Kriccaw athua keiccu a teing lanze a maethah nan sah; thuasalama hynh-e hanlan Pachia kha phu-esah sah.
60004017	Pawccecize Pachia innbyn kya byapianaw tho lan accyh azaw vae. Te tuh-e tuh aening kya masaty a tho lanze, Pachia kya-e thehoypaw a ngae lei`ae paw kya-e athangnaw tuh pawcihte athua cih?
60004018	Te, “Adingpaw kha kou aru lante khum athua ze, Pachia pawlangria leipaw te miseipaw tuh paw kalan alangkuh cih`ae?”
60004019	Tukeiccu Pachia rynaw thyhte a teing`ae paw nynh tuh ahoypaw ryalawnaw kya mih hiinnaw-muisaw`ae kha zyn lan um paw Raetu kalan khe ahkuh`ae sah.
60005001	Piccang athuabuapaw, Kri teingnaw`ae kong ccaekia athua paw, te yn langkuh vae cih paw phu-enaw a neethungkuh buapaw mah athua paw, kae nynh nanning laku-e piccang`ae kha thawte kae hy oh.
60005002	Dooihtu`ae hawte nanning laku a um paw Pachia tuuphu`ae kha la dooih oh. Nangsepaw liate thua leite, thuasalama lungthote, anungsikuhpaw muenaw hanlan thua leite, thuasalama thawmuinte la dooih oh.
60005003	Dooih khylan nanning kalan pya athua`ae paw tungvaw kya bawisaku leite, thuasalama tuuphu`ae hanlan dosuinku lanpaw la thua oh.
60005004	Te Tuuringtu Lupi he yn langku vae ze, nanning tuh anaan kho leipaw phu-enaw suilukhung kha na mue cih oh.
60005005	Tuhhawte anohua`ae paw nanning, atawhua`ae paw kaw kha ngaepah oh. Athua, nae balynte lukheit te lukheit kawngaepahkuh oh, te zakawsangsakunaw khate ccaankuh oh; pawccecize, “Pachia nynh a tansakuhpaw kha a rawse, thuasalama zakawsangsakuhpaw kha thaw a cci.”
60005006	Tukeiccu accyh he yn zaw vae ze nanning kha Pachia nynh ae hangthung nawlan oh, Pachia kya-e a thawsaepaw kuihkaw khe naemaw te naemaw kha zakawsangsakuh oh.
60005007	Aning tuh nanning hanlan a tua paw athua keiccu, nae thinphangnaw balyn kha amaw tungvaw khaleih ah oh.
60005008	Kyhrarihlan um oh; raeringkute um oh; pawkeiccumacize nae rhawpaw diabolos tuh a sia a ruapaw chindeih hawte hung vema ka laang cih cite ccungte a khiakuh.
60005009	Laephipi kya a um paw nae uno`ae tuh khahtahawpaw riathaenaw`ae kha a teing`ae cipaw kha nybiate zynnaw kya varyn tynte diabolos kha la dou oh.
60005010	Thuasalama Kri Jesu liate zungzae tynpaw a phu-enaw kalan aening kha yn kotupaw, thawccinaw balyn a hoitupaw Pachia nynh sosoh na teing oh koute, nanning kha ae ccingsah cih oh, ae thadynsah cih oh, thaw ae saesah cih oh zah ae tynsah cih oh.
60005011	Amaw kya phu-enaw te thungnaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.
60005012	Nanning kha hybiate, na thadynnaw oh paw hynhe tuh Pachia kya-e ahmepaw thawccinaw nynh thua cipaw kha ccaekia langsapyate, Silvanas liate nae kalan ccaw dyntari kae zei. Aning tuh nae hanlan zyn lan um paw unopaw nynh thua cite ka tua paw nynh thua.
60005013	Babilon khuapi kya um paw, nanning ryte pynkheihlan po athua paw kriccawbu nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh; te ka ccapaw Marka nynh mah ae beihlang oh.
60005014	Sungsakunaw kya-e myngkunaw khate lukheit te lukheit beihlangkuh oh. Kri Jesu kya na um oh paw nanning balyn kya daenaw la um sah. Amen.
61001001	Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu te seepaw athua paw Simon Piter nynh ah Pachia te Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e dingnaw liate aening kya-e te alokuhpaw, aphutepaw zynnaw a hoi`ae paw kalan:
61001002	Pachia nynaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu nynaw liate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning kya la pungthung sah.
61001003	Phu-enaw te hoyhuanaw liate aening yn kotupaw amaw nynaw liate, hiinnaw te Pachia lante zuakunaw te asekuhpaw uccaw balyn kha Pachia a thungnaw nynh aening kha phe yn pya vae.
61001004	Tuh-e`ae liate nanning tuh Pachiathuanaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua nawlan oh, myaryamaw alesaepaw te aphutepaw byakinpyakupaw`ae kha aening pya ah thua oh. Ryduanaw liate laephipi kya a um paw ronaw kyate luesah athuakuh koute nynh pya ah thua oh.
61001005	Te hynh-e khylan thawte zuakute nae zynnaw kya hiinzia hoynaw kha biachih oh, hiinzia hoynaw kya nynaw kha biachih oh;
61001006	nynaw kya ahmaw sungku khonaw kha biachih oh, ahmaw sungku khonaw kya taemyasawkunaw kha biachih oh, taemyasawkunaw kya Pachia lante zuakunaw kha biachih oh;
61001007	Pachia lante zuakunaw kya uteno thawccikunaw kha biachih oh, te uteno thawccikunaw kya sungsakunaw kha biachih oh.
61001008	Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kya um zah apungthung lanze, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynaw kya athae thaesah leite, thanesah leite ae nung lan khyh oh.
61001009	Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae ahoboupaw ccungccaw tuh a mitmoh zah asaw lang muih kho khyh, te arynpaw a seinaw`ae kyate aning tuh thyaasapya athua vae cipaw kha phe a ning.
61001010	Tukeiccu uteno`ae, nanning konaw te ponaw kha phe riasaku khylan thawte zuakuh paleih oh; pawccecize tuhte na cyi oh lanze nanning tuh na khuliakuh boi lan khyh oh.
61001011	Pawccecize hynhcihte nynh ah Bawipaw te oun Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e zungzae atynpaw peenaw lungkhu lang teenaw kha nanning hanlan phe beih lang raepya athua cih.
61001012	Tukeiccu kha-e uccaw`ae kha na nyh oh zah atu e byaccing kya tynsah na thua vae oh zemah, hynh-e uccaw`ae kong nanning kha pei liathuisah khylan kae tuh ka sawphahkuh lan khyh.
61001013	Athua, hynh-e bu kya kae ka um lungkhu balyn liathuisanaw te nanning kha lungthosah lanpaw tuh akyhpaw cite nynh ka tua.
61001014	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynh kamaw kha phe yn muihsah vae hawte, hynh-e ka bu tuh aro mawze ka cciataw hahe cih cipaw ka ny.
61001015	Tuhlaeze, kae ka chih koute nanning nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh pei na liathui nawlan oh kae thawte ka zuakuh cih.
61001016	Pawccecize ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thungnaw te yn thuanaw lanpaw kha nanning kalan kaening nynh he kae hopya vae oh ze cyiruh-ccaccu lang raenoihpaw phungpaw`ae kha kaening nynh kae mang khyh, thuasalama kaening tuh a lesaenaw kong mit te a muih`ae paw ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.
61001017	Pawccecize, Paaw Pachia kyate sawtuanaw te phu-enaw kha aning nynh he a mue tuh, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw kya ka lungrythua,” cite Alesae Huapaw Phu-enaw kyate amaw kalan roi yn thua.
61001018	Te vaawran kyate yn thua paw tuh-e roi kha athyaapaw mua vawlan amaw ryte kaening kae um lyakhe kae thae.
61001019	Te houh ariapaw profehbya kya-e bya kha mah aening ah hoi ung oh. Khua adae makhia nae thinlung kya nizy yn langkuh cia, mohnaw kya a awpaw awnaw hawkhate kha-e bya na ngae oh paw tuh nanning nynh kou hoy lang na cyi oh paw nynh thua.
61001020	Ccathyaa kya-e profehbya tuh maw rynaw te asuilan leihkupaw kyate thua khyh cipaw hynh masaty nyh oh.
61001021	Pawccecize profehbya tuh ccungccaw rynaw thyhte yn thua boi khyh, thuasalama Pachia kya-e athyaapaw ccungccaw`ae tuh Thyaa Muisaw nynh a cciakhae`ae thyhte nynh a ho`ae.
61002001	Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae laku ahme leipaw profeh`ae mah a la um`ae, tuhhawte ahme leipaw ccangpatu`ae nae laku yn langkuh cih`ae. Minmin nynh ccungccaw arosahthya paw ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw kha aphiru lante yn teekhae cih`ae, te mimaw kha a retupaw Bawipaw hei kha a ei`ae keiccu mimaw tungvaw arangpaw ronaw kha a thuakhaekuh`ae.
61002002	Te ccungccaw patae nynh mih kya-e ronawpaw kalan ccianaw kha a zui cih`ae zah minmin keiccuze byaccing kya-e ccianaw tuh thethyaho athua cih.
61002003	Duanaw liate hyngpaw bya`ae khate minmin nynh nanning kha amia ae ccungnawkuh cih oh. Langmaw lya mawte minmin byapianaw tuh amaw um lan hung um khyh, te minmin kya-e ronaw mah ih khyh.
61002004	Pawccecize aseipaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha Pachia nynh a haang khyh ze, thuasalama hell lungkhu lang boh sah`ae zah byapia khylan nungde zah mohnaw kya-e sivarui te phang a khii`ae ze;
61002005	te Pachia rawrih lei`ae paw umnaw laephipi vawlan tuipayn a ynsaku lyakha, arynpaw laephipi kha a haang khyh ze, thuasalama dingnaw phunghotu Noah ry ccungccaw lutarya kha a khum`ae ze;
61002006	te Sodom te Komorah khuapi`ae kha dae dawleih te buhaw lang tangsah zah ronaw kalan sei a be ze, Pachia rawri leite a hiin vae cih`ae paw hanlan dosuinku nawlan a rae ze;
61002007	te ccungccahoy lei`ae kya-e anungsikuhpaw ozia nynh lungvaw a sawsah paw adingpaw Lot kha a luesah ze,
61002008	(pawccecize tuh-e adingpaw ccungccapaw tuh minmin laku a um lya, mih kya-e kawbya pawlangria leipaw cyisahnaw`ae kha nin takyh muihte thaete, adingpaw a hiinnaw-muisaw tuh lungvawsawsah athua),
61002009	Oute Pachia rawrih`ae paw kha tuh-ounaw kyate pawcihte nynh luesah lan cipaw, te atazae lei`ae paw kha detah khylan byapianaw nin hanlan pawcihte nynh nungde lan cipaw Bawipaw nynh a ny.
61002010	Abapi lante athyaa leipaw kya-e ryduanaw kya pynsaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw te kawhoinaw pawlangria lei`ae paw kha pawcihte nynh detah lan cipaw Bawipaw nynh a ny. Minmin tuh apuaatho` ae paw, mih ry thyhte a um`ae paw, phu-e`ae paw kha thethya ho lan a rih lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
61002011	Mimaw laeze thunghua`ae zah mih thawsae huapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw malang minmin tungvaw kya saryapaw seibenaw kha rae khyh`ae.
61002012	Thuasalama minmin tuh kyng khylan te chia khylan rae athua paw, tuanaw hoi leipaw lorangsaw`ae hawte, mimaw nynh a ny lei`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha thethyaho`ae zah mimaw ccouseikunaw kya khaleih aroh cih`ae.
61002013	Te dingleinaw kya-e cyinaw mee kha a mue cih`ae. Khuadae ccyh kya hoysapaw kha minmin nynh lungrythua nawlan a ria`ae. Nanning ryte poitua lya`ae ming`ae lingnaw te ahoysah`ae, minmin tuh akalyhkuhpaw te athupaw abekuhpaw nynh thua`ae.
61002014	Lungtyn leipaw ccungccaw`ae kha soih te milae zu milae vawpaw kya seinaw mit te phe beih`ae zah sei leite um kho khyh`ae. Mih thinlung nynh karangkunaw kha thya zah minmin tuh thyalawpaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
61002015	Minmin nynh ahmepaw ccianaw kha vuasya`ae zah laanpi phe me vae`ae. Beor ccapaw, Balaam ccianaw kha nynh a zui`ae. Balaam tuh dingleinaw mee a ry paw nynh thua.
61002016	Thuasalama a cyiseimenaw hanlan aning tuh pe athua. Bya ho leipaw lann nynh ccungccaw roi lante bya ho zah kha-e profehpaw a ngaeenaw kha a khee.
61002017	Hynh-e`ae tuh tui a um leipaw tuikhua`ae, khisang nynh po cciakhae paw maeking`ae nynh thua`ae. Minmin hanlan karaezipaw mohnaw kha zungzae nungpya athua.
61002018	Pawccecize a cceihsei`ae paw kyate kou ru lante a lue`ae paw kha apokuh paw accakaepaw bya te thuasah, pynsaw ryduanaw`ae te thuasah, ohhuakunaw te thuasah minmin nynh a soih`ae.
61002019	Ming`ae kha luenaw kong byakinpyaku`ae lyakhe, mimaw te mimaw tuh ronaw see`ae nynh thua`ae. Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit tuh ccangkhakheit nynh a tae lanze, aning tuh tuh-e see nynh athua.
61002020	Pawccecize Bawipaw te Khumtu Jesu Kri nynaw liate minmin tuh laephipi kyae athu-anangpaw`ae kyate phe a lue`ae koute, kha-e`ae kya bua kaangkae`ae zah kha-e`ae nynh a tae`ae lanze, nyalang e minminthuanaw tuh atakaw laeze houh a seihua vae.
61002021	Pawccecize adingpaw laanpi kha phe a nyh kou`ae te, minmin kalan pya athua paw athyaapaw kawpyapaw kyate paleihku lae tuh kha-e adingpaw laanpi kha a la ny khyh`ae ze mih hanlan a la hoyhua cih paw.
61002022	Thuasalama, “Ui nynh tuh amaw a lua kha bua a kinua,” te, “A singkuh vae paw vohpinung nynh a ohkunaw ccingccua kha bua a kinua,” acikuh paw ahmepaw phungtangbya thyhte minmin tungvaw kya acyikuh.
61003001	Sungsah`ae paw, hynh-e vaeningnaw ccaky hynh atu nae kalan ka zei. Ccaky paryh khate na liathui nawlan oh athyaapaw nae tuanaw-thinlung kha kae thosah oh.
61003002	Langmaw lya athyaapaw profeh`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya`ae te Bawipaw Khumtu a locceihtu`ae athua paw kaening kawpyapaw kha nanning nynh na liathui nawlan oh nynh kae zei.
61003003	Masaty ny lanpaw tuh, nyathyakou ccyh kya, mimaw ryduanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw ccungccaw saryatu`ae oun langkuh cih`ae;
61003004	te minmin nynh, “Amaw yn thuanaw lanpaw byakinpyakupaw tuh teisangmou? Pawccecize minpaaw`ae a i`ae ccyh kyate tho zah pawpaw balyn tuh raenaw athonaw kya hawmawte nynh atu mah po acyiku,” a ci`ae.
61003005	Pawccecize langmaw lya vaawran`ae tuh Pachia bya liate nynh a la um, te tui akhung lang te tui kya nynh laephi hynh Pachia bya liate a um cipaw,
61003006	khaccyh lya a la um paw laephipi kha kha-e tui nynh khaleih vu zah phe aroh cipaw kha minmin nynh riarou nyhry khyh`ae.
61003007	Thuasalama atu a um paw vaawran`ae te laephi hynh, byapianaw nin te Pachia pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw`ae ronaw nin kyacia maee te rua khylan kha-e bya liate phang ccy athua.
61003008	Thuasalama sungsah`ae, Bawipaw hanlan nin kheit tuh kum thungkheit hawte, te kum thungkheit tuh nin kheit hawte athua paw hynh-e uccaw ccangkheit hynh ny leite um nan oh.
61003009	Ccungccaw abang nynh a khysungpaw lante a tua`ae hawte, Bawipaw tuh byakinpyakupaw kong lante a khysung khyh. Thuasalama ccungccaw balyn nynh a ngaesiku nawlan`ae, lukheit san aro lanpaw a ry khyh keiccu nynh aening kya a lungsae.
61003010	Thuasalama Bawipaw nin tuh khuazi kya miruh a thua hawte nynh yn thua cih. Tuh-e nin kya vaawran`ae tuh alepipaw siaruanaw khate azo cih, te laephipi raenawpaw uccaw`ae tuh myarya asopaw sonaw nynh palae tuisah cih, laephi mah, te laephi kya um paw ryalawnaw`ae mah maee nynh pung a u cih.
61003011	Oute hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh ro athua cih keiccuze, athyaapaw hiinnawzia te Pachia rawrinaw kya pawtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae lang mou thua lan na ccan oh?
61003012	Pachia kya-e nin yn thua lanpaw kha ngaehoite na ngaw oh paw thua keiccu tuhte na hiin lan oh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e nin keiccu vaawran`ae tuh maee te ro athua cih, te myarya asopaw sonaw nynh laephipi raenawpaw uccaw`ae kha pung a tuisah cih.
61003013	Tuhzemah aening tuh a byakinpyakupaw thyhte dingnaw a umnaw athawpaw vaawran`ae te athawpaw laephi nynh ah ngaw oh.
61003014	Tukeiccu sungsah`ae, kha-e uccaw`ae kha na ngaw oh keiccu, nanning tuh athupaw um leite, ccaenaw hoi leite, daenaw kya amaw nynh ae muih nawlan oh thawte zuakuh oh.
61003015	Aening nynh ah sungsah oh paw, ah unopaw Paul nynh mah amaw kya pya athua paw hawnaw thyhte nanning kalan phe a zei vae hawkhate, ah Bawipaw ngaesangnaw tuh khumnaw nynh thua cipaw kha la tuathya oh.
61003016	Hynh hawte a ccaky`ae balyn kya mah hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh a la ho. A ccaky`ae kya thaethya lan arupaw uccaw`ae abang a um. A ccangkuh lei`ae paw te atyn lei`ae paw nynh ccangpaw Ccathyaa`ae kha mah phe a maeleih`ae hawte mimaw ronaw hanlan phe maeleih`ae.
61003017	Tukeiccu, sungsah`ae nanning, hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na nyty vae oh hawte, ccungccahoy lei`ae kya-e cyiseinaw khate cciakhaesei na thua khyh nawlan oh, naemaw na tynnaw oh kyate na khuliaku khyh nawlan oh nanning mah la raeringkuh oh.
61003018	Thuasalama thawccinaw kya, te ah Bawipaw te Khumtu Jesu Kri nynaw kya lethung oh. Amaw kya atu te zungzae cia phu-enaw po um sah. Amen.
62001001	Athotakaw kyate a um vae paw, tuh-e tuh kaening nynh phe kae thae, kae mit te phe kae muih, hoyte phe kae do zah kae kuih te phe kae haetua paw hiinnaw Bya te asekuhpaw uccaw kha nanning kae hopya oh.
62001002	Pawccecize hiinnaw tuh yn langkuh zah kaening nynh phe kae muih vae. Kha-e zungzae hiinnaw kong kha ccaekia kae khan zah nanning kalan kae langsapya oh. Kha-e zungzae hiinnaw tuh Paaw ryte la um`ae zah kaening kalan yn langkuh.
62001003	Nanning mah kaening ryte vaeccawkunaw na hoibua ccaw oh cite kaening nynh phe kae muih vae paw te kae thae vae paw kha nanning kalan kae hopya oh. Te thanccingte kae kya-e vaeccawkunaw tuh Paaw te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri ryte nynh thua.
62001004	Te nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan nynh e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kalan kaening nynh kae zei.
62001005	Hynh-e tuh amaw kyate kae thae paw bya thua zah nanning kalan kae hopya oh. Tuh-e bya tuh: Pachia tuh awnaw thua zah amaw kya mohnaw kharyh um khyh.
62001006	Aening tuh amaw ryte vaeccawkunaw ah hoi oh cite aening nynh mang ah ho oh zemah mohnaw kya ah um oh ze ah hyng oh paw nynh thua, byaccing kya ah zui khyh oh.
62001007	Thuasalama Pachia tuh awnaw kya a um hawte, aening nynh awnaw kya ah um oh ze aening tuh lukheit te lukheit vaeccawkunaw ah hoi oh, te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri chii nynh seinaw balyn kyate aening kha phe oun thyaasah.
62001008	Seinaw ah hoi khyh oh cite aening nynh ah ho oh ze ahmaw te ahmaw ah lingkuh oh paw nynh thua. Byaccing tuh aening kya um khyh.
62001009	Ahmaw seinaw`ae kha aening nynh ah phykuh oh ze seinaw`ae kha ngaethya lan te dingleinaw balyn kyate aening kha thyaasah lan Pachia tuh zyn lan um zah adingpaw nynh thua.
62001010	Aening nynh ah sei khyh oh cite ah ho oh lanze Pachia kha hyngbya ah be oh paw thua zah amaw bya tuh aening kya um khyh.
62002001	Ka ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning nynh na sei khyh ccaw oh cite hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nae kalan kae nynh kae zei. Te lukhakheit nynh a sei lanze, aening oun hokhawtupaw ah hoi oh; amaw tuh Paaw ryte a um`ae paw adingpaw Jesu Kri nynh thua.
62002002	Te amaw tuh aening seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanawpaw nynh thua. Te aening seinaw`ae hanlan kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae balyn seinaw`ae hanlan mah athua.
62002003	Te aening nynh amaw kha ah ny oh cipaw ah ny nawlan oh paw tuh amaw kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh ze ah nyh oh.
62002004	“Amaw kha ka nyh,” ci zah amaw kawpyapaw`ae a zui leipaw ccungccaw tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Byaccing kha kha-e paw kya um khyh.
62002005	Thuasalama hunghung zemah amaw bya a zui paw tuh Pachia sungsanaw kha a kya accing ccaccing. Hynhcihte nynh aening tuh amaw kya ah um oh cipaw ah nyh oh.
62002006	Amaw kya ka um cite a ho paw nynh tuh Jesu nynh a hiin hawte aning mah a umbua aho.
62002007	Uteno`ae, nanning kalan athawpaw kawpyapaw kha ka zei khyh. Thuasalama nanning nynh atakaw kyate na hoi vae oh paw arynpaw kawpyapaw kha nynh ka zei. Arynpaw kawpyapaw tuh atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw bya kha nynh thua.
62002008	Athawpaw kawpyapaw ccangkheit nae kalan bua ka zei. Tuh-e tuh amaw kya, te nanning kya akyhpaw uccaw nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize mohnaw tuh zo cciamang zah ahmepaw awnaw tuh atu phe a aw vae.
62002009	Awnaw kya nynh ka um ci zah a uno kha a hua lanze, aning tuh mohnaw kya nynh atu cia phang a um ung.
62002010	A uno a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh awnaw kya tyn zah thysaku-pawsakunaw lanpaw tuh-e paw kya um khyh.
62002011	Thuasalama a uno a hua paw ccungccaw tuh mohnaw kya um zah mohnaw kya nynh a ccia. Kha-e mohnaw nynh a mit phe mohsah keiccuze teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw nyhkuh khyh.
62002012	Ccaaw taraw`ae, Bawipaw min liate Pachia nynh nae seinaw`ae kha ae ngaethya vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan kae nynh ccaw kae zei.
62002013	Paaw`ae, atakaw kyate a um vae paw amaw kha nanning nynh phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei. Ccangvae`ae, nanning nynh mihoy leipaw kha phe na tae vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei. Ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning nynh Paaw kha phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw ka zei.
62002014	Paaw`ae, atakaw kyate a um vae paw amaw kha nanning nynh phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae. Ccangvae`ae, nanning tuh nae thawsae zah Pachia bya nae kya atyn keiccuze mihoy leipaw kha phe na tae vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae.
62002015	Laephipi hynh sungsah nan oh. Laephipi kya a um paw uccaw`ae mah sungsah nan oh. Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh laephipi kha a sungsah lanze Paaw sungsanaw tuh kha-e paw kya um khyh.
62002016	Pawccecize laephipi kya a um paw uccaw`ae; pynsaw duanaw, mit duanaw, te hiinnaw kya-e tansakunaw tuh Paaw kya-e thua khyh`ae, thuasalama laephipi kya-e nynh thua`ae.
62002017	Laephipi te laephipi uccaw`ae duanaw tuh azo avae he. Thuasalama Pachia rynaw hawte a hiinpaw ccungccaw tuh zungzae atyn.
62002018	Ccaaw taraw`ae, atu ccyh tuh nyathyakou ccyh nynh thua. Antikri yn thua cih cite nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh hawte, atu ccacceimaw antikri patae um vae`ae. Tukeiccu atu ccyh tuh nyathyakou ccyh nynh thua cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.
62002019	Minmin tuh aening kyate a pou`ae, thuasalama minmin tuh aening te sekuh bua khyh`ae. Pawccecize minmin tuh aening te asekuh bua`ae lanze, aening ryte po a um cih`ae paw. Thuasalama minmin nynh a pou`ae paw tuh minmin balyn tuh aening te sekuh bua khyh`ae cipaw a langsaku`ae paw nynh thua.
62002020	Thuasalama Athyaapaw Lukheit nynh nanning kha satho phe ae thuh vae oh, te nanning nynh pawpaw balyn kha na ny oh.
62002021	Nanning nynh byaccing kha na ny khyh oh keiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei cipaw thua khyh. Thuasalama nanning nynh byaccing kha na nyh oh zah hyngbya tuh byaccing te kharyh sekuh khyh cipaw na ny oh keiccu nynh nae kalan ccaw ka zei.
62002022	Hungmou mihyngpaw tuh? Jesu tuh Kri thua khyh cite a ei paw ccungccaw tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Paaw te Ccapaw kha a ei paw ccungccaw tuh antikri nynh thua.
62002023	Hunghung zemah Ccapaw a ei paw ccungccaw tuh Paaw kha hoi khyh. Ccapaw kha ccaekia a khan paw nynh Paaw kha mah a hoi.
62002024	Tukeiccu nanning nynh atakaw kyate phe na thae vae oh paw bya kha nae kya la tynsah oh. Atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw bya nynh nae kya a tyn lanze, nanning mah Ccapaw kya te Paaw kya na tyn cih oh.
62002025	Pachia nynh aening oun kinpyakupaw byakinpyakunaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua.
62002026	Nanning ling lan ae ry oh paw ccungccaw`ae kong lante asekuhpaw hynh-e uccaw`ae kong kha nae kalan ka zei vae.
62002027	Thuasalama Pachia kyate na mue oh paw sathothuhnaw tuh nae kya atynpaw zah nanning tuh lukhakheit nynh ccangpyaku na ho vae khyh oh. Tuh-e sathothuhpaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha nanning ae ccangpya oh, tuh-e tuh akyhpaw thua zah hyngpaw thua khyh. Te tuh-e nynh nanning ae ccangpya oh thyhhawte nanning tuh amaw kya na tyn cih oh.
62002028	Te ccaaw taraw`ae, atu Ccapaw kya la tyn oh. Ou khate amaw he yn langku vae ze aening nynh zynkunaw ah hoi ccaw oh, te he yn thua vae ze amaw malang maethyanaw ah ccou khyh ccaw oh, amaw kya tyn oh.
62002029	Pachia tuh ading cipaw na ny oh lanze, dingnaw a rae paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh Pachia kyate a pui paw nynh thua cipaw na ny oh.
62003001	Dotua oh, Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko ah thua nawlan oh, pawtahawpaw sungsanaw babang mou Paaw nynh aening kha oun pya! Tukeiccu laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a ny khyh`ae keiccuze, aening kha mah oun nyh khyh`ae.
62003002	Sungsah`ae, atu aening tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh. Nyalang aening tuh pawte nynh ah thua cih oh cipaw langkuh lah khyh. Thuasalama Ccapaw he yn langkuh te aening tuh amaw te loku bua lan cipaw ah ny oh. Pawccecize aening nynh amaw kha athua thathyhte ah muih vae cih oh.
62003003	Te amaw tuh a ccikankuh hawte, amaw kya ngaehoinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kha a ccikankuh.
62003004	Hunghung zemah a seipaw tuh Kawbya po aluepaw nynh thua. Pawccecize seinaw tuh Kawbya po luepaw nynh thua.
62003005	Te aening seinaw`ae kha cciakhae khylan Ccapaw tuh yn langkuh cipaw na ny oh. Amaw kya tuh seinaw kharyh um khyh.
62003006	Hunghung zemah amaw kya atynpaw tuh sei khyh. Hunghung zemah pei a seipaw tuh amaw kha muih khyh zah ny mah nyh khyh.
62003007	Ccaaw taraw`ae, hung ccungccaw nynh san ae la ling nan oh sah. Kri tuh ading hawte dingnaw ryalah paw ccungccaw tuh adingpaw nynh thua.
62003008	Aseipaw ccungccaw tuh diabolos kya-e nynh thua, pawccecize diabolos tuh atakaw kyate pei a seipaw nynh thua. Diabolos ryalaw`ae kha ro khylan eenaw te nynh Pachia Ccapaw tuh yn langku.
62003009	Pachia nynh a saah paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh seinaw kha rae khyh. Pawccecize Pachia kya-e ccacii kha khae paw kya atyn. Te aning tuh Pachia nynh saah paw athua keiccuze sei kho khyh.
62003010	Pachia ccaaw`ae te diabolos ccaaw`ae tuh hynhcihte alangkuh: Hunghung zemah dingnaw ryalah leipaw tuh Pachia kya-e thua khyh. A uno a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw mah Pachia kya-e thua khyh.
62003011	Pawccecize atakaw kyate nanning nynh na thae vae oh paw phungbya tuh hynhte nynh thua: Aening lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lanpaw nynh thua.
62003012	Kain hawte thua nan oh sih, aning tuh mihoy leipaw kya-e thua zah amaw a neitaw kha phe a chia. Pawccemou a neitaw kha a chia? Pawccemacize amaw ryalaw`ae tuh hoy khyh zah a neitapaw ryalaw`ae tuh ading keiccu nynh thua.
62003013	Ka uno`ae, laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh ae hua oh ze nae ngaeangthua nan sah.
62003014	Aening nynh uteno`ae kha ah sungsah oh keiccuze, aening tuh chinaw kyate hiinnaw kalan ah khung vae oh cipaw ah ny oh. A uno a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw tuh chinaw kya nynh atyn.
62003015	Hunghung zemah a uno a hua paw tuh ccungccaw theihtu nynh thua. Te ccungccaw theihtu miakaw tuh atynpaw zungzae hiinnaw a kya hoi khyh cipaw na ny oh.
62003016	Kri nynh amaw hiinnaw kha aening hanlan a pyaku. Ou hynhcihte aening nynh Pachia sungsanaw kha ah nythya oh. Te aening mah uteno`ae hanlan ah hiinnaw kha ah pyaku lan oh accan.
62003017	Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh e laephi uccaw`ae kha mang a hoi pite a uno a ryachi kha muih zah ngaethyaumsanaw a hoi khyh lanze, pawtemou Pachia sungsanaw tuh kha-e paw kya a um kho cih?
62003018	Ka ccaaw taraw`ae, aening nynh ah bya te kyalya, khalang te kyalya sungsaku lan ccan khyh. Thuasalama cyisahnaw te thanccingte sungsaku lan accan.
62003019	Ou tuhte ze nynh aening tuh byaccing kya-e nynh ah thua oh cipaw ah nyh oh zah Pachia malang ah thinlung zynkunaw ah hoi cih oh.
62003020	Pawccecize ah thinlung nynh ahmaw kha sei oun be lanze, Pachia tuh aening thinlung laeze lesaehua zah pawpaw balyn pung a nyh paw nynh thua.
62003021	Sungsah`ae, ah thinlung nynh ahmaw hynh sei oun be khyh ze, Pachia malang aening zynkunaw ah hoi oh.
62003022	Te amaw kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh zah amaw lungrythua paw ryalaw`ae kha ah law oh keiccuze, ah ngiaku oh paw miakaw kha amaw kyate aening nynh ah mue oh.
62003023	A kawpyapaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: A Ccapaw Jesu Kri min kha aening nynh ah zyn lan oh paw te Ccapaw nynh kaw yn pya thyhhawte lukheit te lukheit ah sungsaku lan oh paw nynh thua.
62003024	Te Pachia kawpyapaw a zui paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya tyn zah Pachia mah kha-e paw kya atyn. Te aening oun pya paw Muisaw liate nynh Pachia tuh aening kya atyn cipaw ah ny oh.
62004001	Sungsah`ae, muisaw miakaw kha la zyn nan oh. Thuasalama muisaw`ae kha Pachia kya-e thua ta, thua khyh ta cipaw la syntaw oh. Pawkeiccumacize ahme leipaw profeh patae tuh laephipi lungkhu lang phe cceih vae`ae.
62004002	Pachia kya-e Muisaw tuh hynhte na nyh cih oh: Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante nynh yn thua cite ccaekiakhan paw muisaw miakaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua.
62004003	Te Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante nynh yn thua cite ccaekiakhan leipaw muisaw miakaw tuh Pachia kya-e thua khyh. Tuh-e muisaw tuh antikri kya-e nynh thua. Antikri tuh yn thua cih cite nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh. Te atu ccacceimaw tuh-e antikri muisaw tuh laephipi kya phe um vae.
62004004	Ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning tuh Pachia kya-e nynh na thua oh. Te minmin kha phe na tae vae oh. Pawkeiccumacize nanning kya a um paw aning tuh laephipi kya a um paw aning laeze alehua keiccu nynh thua.
62004005	Minmin tuh laephipi kya-e nynh thua`ae. Tukeiccu minmin nynh laephi te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha a hothya`ae. Te laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin bya kha a ngaepya`ae.
62004006	Aening tuh Pachia kya-e nynh ah thua oh. Pachia a nyh paw ccungccaw nynh ah bya kha a ngae. Pachia kya-e a thua leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh aening bya kha ngae khyh. Ou hynhcihte ahmepaw muisaw te ahyngpaw muisaw kha aening nynh ah ny oh.
62004007	Sungsah`ae, aening lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh sih, pawccecize sungsakunaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua. Te ming`ae a sungsahpaw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh saah paw thua zah Pachia kha a nyh.
62004008	Ming`ae a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha nyh khyh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh sungsakunaw nynh thua.
62004009	Hynhcihte nynh Pachia kya-e sungsakunaw tuh aening kalan a langku. Ccapaw liate aening ah hiinbua ccaw oh cite Pachia nynh a hoithypaw a Ccapaw kha laephipi kalan phe oun saw vae.
62004010	Sungsakunaw tuh hynh-e nynh thua: Aening nynh Pachia ah sungsah oh cipaw thua khyh. Thuasalama Pachia nynh aening kha oun sungsah zah a Ccapaw kha aening seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanawpaw lang cite oun saw.
62004011	Sungsah`ae, Pachia nynh aening hynh myarya oun sungsah lanze, aening mah lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lan accan.
62004012	Pachia kha hung ccungccaw nynh san vaekheit san muih boi khyh. Aening nynh lukheit te lukheit ah sungsaku oh ze, Pachia tuh aening kya um zah a sungsanaw kha aening kya a ccingsah.
62004013	Pachia nynh a Muisaw kha aening phe oun pya vae keiccuze, khahcihte aening tuh Pachia kya ah um oh zah Pachia tuh aening kya a um cipaw ah ny oh.
62004014	Laephi ccungccaw`ae Khumtu lang cite Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha yn saw cipaw kaening nynh phe kae muih zah kha-e kha ccaekia kae khan.
62004015	Hunghung zemah Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite ccaekiakhan paw tuh a kya Pachia um zah aning mah Pachia kya a um.
62004016	Te Pachia nynh aening hanlan a hoi paw sungsahnaw kha aening nynh phe ah nyh vae oh zah phe ah zyn vae oh. Pachia tuh sungsakunaw nynh thua, te sungsakunaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya atyn. Pachia mah kha-e paw kya atyn.
62004017	Byapianaw nin kya aening nynh rawhoynaw ah hoibua nawlan oh, aening laku kya sungsakunaw tuh hynhcihte ccingsah athua. Pawkeiccumacize amaw athua hawte aening mah e laephipi kya ah thuabua oh.
62004018	Sungsakunaw kya tuh rinaw um khyh. Accingpaw sungsakunaw nynh tuh rinaw kha ccaring a dee. Pawccecize rinaw nynh tuh riathaenaw kha a thuasah. Rinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh sungsakunaw kya ccingsah thua loh khyh.
62004019	Pachia nynh aening kha masaty oun sungsah keiccuze, aening nynh amaw kha ah sungsah oh.
62004020	Ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Pachia tuh ka sungsah,” ci zah amaw a uno kha a hua lanze, aning tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Pawccecize phang a muih paw amaw a uno kha a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw nynh a muih leipaw Pachia kha pawtemou a sungsah kho cih?
62004021	Te Pachia a sungsahpaw nynh tuh amaw a uno kha mah a sungsah hahe cih, acikuh paw hynh-e kawpyapaw kha amaw kyate aening ah hoi oh.
62005001	Hunghung zemah Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite a zyn paw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh a saah paw nynh thua. A saahtupaw Paaw kha a sungsahpaw miakaw nynh tuh Paaw nynh a saah paw ccaaw kha mah a sungsah.
62005002	Aening nynh Pachia kha ah sungsah oh zah a kawpyapaw`ae kha ah zui oh pawte Pachia ccaaw`ae kha ah sungsah oh cipaw aening ah ny oh.
62005003	Pawccecize Pachia sungsah cipaw tuh a kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh paw hynh nynh thua. Te a kawpyapaw`ae tuh phuripaw thua khyh.
62005004	Pawccecize Pachia nynh a saah paw miakaw nynh tuh laephipi kha phe a tae. Te laephipi a tae paw taenaw tuh aening ah zynnaw oh hynh nynh thua.
62005005	Laephipi a tae paw tuh hungmou? Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite a zyn paw ccungccaw kha thua khyh tou?
62005006	Tui lante thuasah, chii lante thuasah yn thua paw aning tuh Jesu Kri hynh nynh thua. Tui lante kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama tui lante, chii lante nynh yn thua. Te ccaekia a khantupaw tuh Muisaw nynh thua, pawccemacize Muisaw tuh byaccing nynh thua.
62005007	Pawccecize vaawran kya ccaekiakhan paw luthung a um`ae: Paaw lukheit, Bya lukheit, te Thyaa Muisaw lukheit nynh thua`ae. Te hynhe luthung`ae tuh ccangkheit nynh thua.
62005008	Te laephi vawlan ccaekiakhan paw ccangthung a um. Tuh-e`ae tuh Muisaw, tui te chii nynh thua`ae. Te hynh-e ccangthung`ae tuh ccangkheit kya mih lungnging.
62005009	Ccungccaw`ae ccaekia kha aening nynh ah lawkuh oh ze, Pachia ccaekia tuh houh alesaepaw nynh thua. Pawccecize hynh-e tuh Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kong ccaekiakhan paw Pachia ccaekia nynh thua.
62005010	Pachia Ccapaw a zyn paw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kya ccaekia a hoi. Pachia a zyn leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia kha hyngbya a hosah. Pawkeiccumacize Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kong ccaekiakhan paw kha aning nynh a zyn khyh keiccu nynh thua.
62005011	Ccaekia tuh e hynh nynh thua: Pachia nynh aening kha zungzae hiinnaw phe oun pya vae. Tuh-e hiinnaw tuh a Ccapaw kya nynh a um.
62005012	Ccapaw a hoi paw nynh hiinnaw kha a hoi. Pachia Ccapaw kha a hoi leipaw tuh hiinnaw kha hoi khyh.
62005013	Zungzae hiinnaw na hoi oh paw kha na nyku nawlan oh, te Pachia Ccapaw min kha na zyn nawlan oh, Pachia Ccapaw min a zyn`ae paw nanning kalan e uccaw`ae kong hynh kae zei.
62005014	Te Pachia kya aening rawhoynaw ah hoi oh paw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Aening nynh amaw rynaw thyhte ccangkhakheit kha ah ngiaku oh ze, Pachia nynh yn thaepya.
62005015	Te aening nynh ah ngiaku oh paw miakaw aning nynh yn thaepya cipaw ah ny oh lanze amaw kyate ah ngiaku oh paw kha ah mue oh cipaw ah ny oh.
62005016	A uno nynh chinaw kalan a phyasah leipaw seinaw a sei paw kha lukhakheit nynh a muih lanze, a hanlan sawsangpah cih. Te chinaw a phyasah leipaw seinaw a rae`ae paw kha Pachia nynh hiinnaw a pya cih`ae. Chinaw kalan a phyasah paw seinaw a um. Kha-e seinaw hanlan sawsangpah sah cite ka ho khyh.
62005017	Dingleinaw balyn tuh seinaw nynh thua. Te chinaw kalan a phyasah leipaw seinaw a um.
62005018	Hunghung zemah Pachia nynh a saah paw tuh sei khyh cipaw aening ah ny oh. Pachia nynh a saah paw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kha a ringkuh. Te mihoy leipaw nynh amaw kha tung kho khyh.
62005019	Aening tuh Pachia kya-e nynh ah thua oh cipaw te laephipi khaleih tuh mihoy leipaw kuih kya nynh a um cipaw ah ny oh.
62005020	Te ahmepaw amaw kha ah ny nawlan oh, Pachia Ccapaw tuh phe yn thua vae zah aening kha thaethyanaw phe yn pya vae cipaw ah ny oh; te aening tuh ahmepaw amaw kya te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri kya nynh ah um oh. Aning tuh ahmepaw Pachia thua zah zungzae hiinnaw mah athua.
62005021	Ccaaw taraw`ae, zohtuh`ae kha la sibia oh. Amen.
63001001	A kum tang vae paw kae, Johan nynh, byaccing kya ka sungsah`ae paw, popaw bawinung te a ccaaw`ae kalan ccaw kae ky oh. Kae kyalya nynh kae sungsah oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama byaccing a nyh`ae paw balyn nynh ae sungsah oh.
63001002	Kaening kya um zah kaening ryte zungzae a um cih paw byaccing keiccu nynh nanning kha kae sungsah oh.
63001003	Paaw Pachia kyate thuasah, Paaw a Ccapaw, Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thuasah byaccing te sungsakunaw kya thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah.
63001004	Paaw kyate kawpyapaw kha kaening nynh kae mue thyhhawte na ccaaw`ae abang nynh byaccing kya a ccia`ae paw kha ka muih tuh myarya ka lungtua.
63001005	Bawinung, athawpaw kawpyapaw hynh na kalan kae zei khyh. Thuasalama atakaw kyate kae hoi vae paw kawpyapaw kha nynh kae zei. Atu nang kae ngia ry paw tuh aening lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh sih cipaw nynh thua.
63001006	Te a kawpyapaw`ae thyhte aening nynh ah hiin oh paw hynh nynh sungsakunaw cipaw tuh athua. Atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh hawte, kha-e kawpyapaw kya na cceih cih oh cipaw kha nynh kawpyapaw tuh athua.
63001007	Pawccecize ccungccaw lingtu`ae patae laephipi lungkhu lang phe tee vae`ae. Minmin nynh Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante yn thua cipaw ccaekiakhan khyh`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh ccungccaw lingtu te antikri nynh thua.
63001008	Aening nynh rya ah law oh paw kha ah shung khyh nawlan oh, thuasalama phe ccing paw ryalaw mee ah mue nawlan oh, naemaw te naemaw la raeringkuh oh.
63001009	Hunghung zemah Kri ccangpyanaw kya tyn khyh zah kawngae leipaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha hoi khyh. Kri ccangpyanaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh Paaw te Ccapaw kha paryh a hoi.
63001010	Kha-e ccangpyanaw kha ccyngku leite, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh nanning kalan yn thua lanze nae inn lungkhu lang la thuasah nan oh. Beih mah la beih nan oh.
63001011	Pawccecize kha-e paw kha a beih paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e paw kya-e ahoy leipaw cyisahnaw`ae a neethungkuh bua paw nynh thua.
63001012	Nanning kalan zei lanpaw uccaw`ae patae ka hoi zemah ccanaw te ccatui te zei lan ka ry vae khyh. Thuasalama ah lungtuanaw phe abia nawlan nanning kalan kae thua cih zah nanning ryte hawiliakute byabeihku lan cipaw ka ngaehoi.
63001013	Po athua paw na neitanung a ccaaw`ae nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Amen.
64001001	A kum tang vae paw kae, Johan nynh, byaccing kya ka sungsahpaw, kou sungsahpaw Kaias kalan ccaw kae ky.
64001002	Kou sungsahpaw, na hiinnawmuisaw a pungthung hawte, nang tuh pawpaw balyn kya na pungthung nawlan te na ngedan nawlan saw kae sangpah.
64001003	Pawccecize nang nynh byaccing kya na hiin thyhhawte, nang na kya um paw byaccing kong kha uteno`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah ccaekia he khan`ae tuh myarya ka lungtua.
64001004	Ka ccaaw`ae nynh byaccing kya a hiin`ae cipaw ka thae paw lungtuanaw laeze ale huapaw lungtuanaw ka hoi khyh.
64001005	Kou sungsahpaw, nang nynh uteno`ae kya te mikhia`ae kya na cyipya`ae paw miakaw tuh zyn lan um lante nynh na cyi.
64001006	Minmin nynh nang na kya-e sungsakunaw kong kha kriccawbu malang ccaekiakhan`ae. Nang nynh minmin kha mih khuaccungnaw kya Pachia ccaaw te angaekuh lante na saw`ae lanze, nang tuh kou hoy lang na cyih cih.
64001007	Pawccemacize minmin tuh amaw min hanlan cceih`ae zah Zenta`ae kyate pawsang mah lawkuh khyh`ae.
64001008	Tukeiccu aening tuh byaccing rya a lahbua`ae paw ah thua nawlan oh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha aening nynh lehkhan lan accan.
64001009	Kriccawbu kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae; thuasalama minmin lakuze lupi huapaw lang tang a ry paw Diotrephes nynh kaening kha kaw yn ua khyh.
64001010	Tukeiccu kae thua vae ze amaw a cyisahnaw kha a liathui nawlan a cyipaw kha ka dianah cih. Aning nynh ahoy leipaw bya`ae te kaening kha sarisarya oun ci. Te tuh-e te a lungryachih khyh zah uteno`ae kha mah innccung ua khyh`ae apiaze innccung ua ry`ae paw kha mah phe khee`ae zah kriccawbu kyate minmin kha a dee`ae.
64001011	Kou sungsahpaw, ahoy leipaw kha kaheihlawkuh nan, thuasalama ahoypaw kha lawkuh. Ahoypaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua, thuasalama ahoy leipaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha muih vae khyh.
64001012	Ccungccaw miakaw nynh Demetrias a hoynaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae, te byaccing nynh mah a kong ccaekiakhan. Te kaening nynh mah a kong ccaekia kae khan. Te ccaekia kae khan paw tuh akyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh.
64001013	Kae nynh zei lanpaw uccaw patae ka hoi ung. Thuasalama ccatui te ccaccung te na kalan ka zei ry vae khyh.
64001014	Thuasalama aro maw nang kha kae muih cih zah hawiliakute lukheit te lukheit byahoku lan cite ka ngaehoi. Daenaw na kya la um vae sah. Kae ruiban`ae nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Ruiban`ae kha mih min te la beih`ae.
65001001	Jesu Kri seepaw, te James neitapaw, kae Jude nynh, Paaw Pachia liate thyaasah athua`ae paw te Jesu Kri kya ccy thua`ae zah ko athua`ae paw kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
65001002	Ngaethya-umsanaw, daenaw te sungsakunaw tuh nanning kya la pungthung sah.
65001003	Sungsah`ae, aening nynh ah mue kalang oh paw khumnaw kong kha nae kalan zei lan thawte he ka zuakuh lyakhe, mithyaa`ae kalan vaekheit te zungzae cia a la pya vae`ae paw zynnaw hanlan nanning nynh thawte na dou nawlan oh nanning kha hy khylan nae kalan ccaw zei lan aho.
65001004	Pawccecize ccungccaw abang tuh nanning laku aphirute zya oun tee vae`ae. Minmin tuh langmawpi te seibenaw hanlan syntaw ah thua vae`ae paw, Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Minmin tuh ah Pachia kya-e thawccinaw kha pynsaw eih ohhuakury nawlan a rulae`ae paw, te amakhae kyalya paw Bawipaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha a vua`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
65001005	Tukeiccu, Bawipaw nynh Israel ccungccaw`ae kha Izip ram kyate phe a khum`ae, tuhkoute a zyn lei`ae paw kha phe bua a ro`ae cipaw kha nanning nynh phe na va ny vae oh zemah bua kae liathuisah ry oh.
65001006	Te masaty e mih thuanaw thyhte a um lei`ae paw, thuasalama mih umnaw phe a cciataw`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha alesaepaw nin kya-e byapianaw hanlan, mohnaw zakaw khe zungzae atynpaw sivarui te Pachia nynh phang a khung`ae.
65001007	Tuhhawte Sodom te Komorah, te mih pepan e khuapi`ae mah tuh-e`ae hawkhate mimaw te mimaw kha ohhuakunaw kalan pyakuh`ae zah ccaccangpaw ngesaw rynaw kalan a zuiku`ae keiccu, zungzae maee te detahnaw kha a teing`ae, ou khate kha-e`ae tuh dosuinkupaw lang nung athua`ae.
65001008	Tuhhawte hynh-e maansatu`ae mah mih pynsaw kha a nungsisakuh`ae, kawhoinaw kha pawlangria khyh`ae; te a lesae`ae paw kha thethya a ho`ae.
65001009	Tuhzemah vaaw ccungccaw lupi Mikhael tuh Mawsi a rhua konglang te diabolos ryte doukuh`ae zah he a eikuh`ae tuh sanruinpaw seibenaw kha honua ngan khyh, thuasalama, “Bawipaw nynh nang kha ae pe sah!” a cipya.
65001010	Thuasalama kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh mimaw nynh a ny lei`ae paw kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha thethya a ho`ae; thuasalama nythyanaw a hoi lei`ae paw sarangpaw`ae hawte, puikhaepaw nynaw uccaw`ae khate mimaw te mimaw kha a rosaku`ae.
65001011	Minmin tuh paw ngaethya lan a um babang! Pawccecize minmin tuh Kain ccianaw kya nynh phe a cciabua vae`ae. Te amia mue khylan Balaam cyiseinaw thyhte karangkute dekuh bua`ae zah Korah a dounaw kyakhe phe roh`ae.
65001012	Minmin tuh nanning ryte poi he a tua`ae tuh na ry oh paw poi`ae kya ri leite, mimaw te mimaw kyalya loohdangkuh`ae paw, abekuhpaw athupaw nynh thua`ae. Minmin tuh khivae nynh po a cciakhae paw khuatui a um leipaw maeking`ae; vaening a chihpaw, atharui kyate phe khohbia`ae paw, athae a um leipaw, tangvaw ccyh-e thingku`ae;
65001013	mimaw maethyanaw tuiphua a pousah paw rili kya-e kou rupaw tuileih; po amohpaw mohnaw kha zungzae cia paccynpya athua paw azoupaw awsi`ae nynh thua`ae.
65001014	-
65001015	Te Adam kyate she sarinaw athua paw Enok mah hynh-e`ae kong hynh profehbya a ho. A ho paw tuh: “Dotua, Bawipaw tuh, ccungccaw balyn kha byapia khylan, minmin lakuze Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw balyn nynh Pachia pawlangria leite a cyi`ae paw mih cyisahnaw`ae balyn kha seinaw muihsaku khylan, te Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw misei`ae nynh amaw kha rawsete a ho`ae paw rehahanpaw mih byaho`ae kha muihsaku khylan, a mithyaa`ae thung haw ryte yn thua cih,” a ci.
65001016	Tuh-e`ae tuh pei ccohkuh`ae paw, milae seinaw muihpatu`ae, mimaw ryduanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Te mih khalang nynh tansakupaw bya`ae kha a ho`ae; mimaw amia muenaw elan ccungccaw`ae kha thehoysah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
65001017	Thuasalama sungsah`ae, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a locceihtu`ae nynh langmaw lya a ho`ae paw bya`ae kha nanning nynh la liathui oh.
65001018	Nyathyakou ccyh kya, mimaw kya-e Pachia pawlangria leipaw ryduanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw, ccungccaw saryatu`ae yn langkuh cih`ae ae cipya oh paw kha la liathui oh.
65001019	Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh ccungccaw a phiasakuh`ae paw, Muisaw hoi leite pynsaw kya ahoysah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
65001020	Thuasalama sungsah`ae, nanning tuh naemaw kyae athyaa huaccepaw zynnaw vawlan naemaw te naemaw kha tynsathungku te, Thyaa Muisaw kya sawsang te,
65001021	zungzae hiinnaw hanlan ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e ngaethya-umsanaw kha ngaehoite, Pachia sungsanaw kyakhe naemaw te naemaw kha ccykuh oh.
65001022	Te phiathyanaw kha hoibiate ccungccaw abang kha thawccih oh.
65001023	Te pynsaw liate anungsikuhpaw uccaw hei kha huate, mingccang`ae kha maee lungkhu te dae sue oh lah rawrinaw te la khum oh.
65001024	Atu thykupawkunaw kyate nanning kha khynsah khylan, te myarya lungtuanaw ryte a phu-enaw umnaw malang khe, seinaw leite nanning kha thuakhae khylan a cyih khotupaw,
65001025	amakhae kyalya ahawpaw aening oun Khumtu Pachia tungvaw, phuenaw te lesaenaw, uknawkaw te thungnaw tuh atu te zungzae cia la um sah. Amen.
66001001	Aro mawze yn cikuh hahe cih paw uccaw`ae kha a see`ae kalan langsapya khylan, Pachia nynh Jesu kalan a pya paw, Jesu Kri kya-e Byaphy. Te kha-e byaphy kha a vaaw ccungccapaw liate a seepaw Johan kalan Jesu nynh ky zah a nysah.
66001002	Johan nynh Pachia bya te Jesu Kri kya-e ccaekia te a muih paw balyn kha ccaekiakhan.
66001003	Hynh-e profehbya`ae kha a ria paw, te a thae`ae paw, te kha-e kya azeikuh paw uccaw`ae kha a zui`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua`ae; pawccecize accyh tuh anae vae.
66001004	Kae, Johan nynh Asia ram kya um paw kriccawbu busari kha kae beihlang oh. Atu lya a um paw, langmaw a la um vae paw te bua yn thua cih paw amaw kyate thuasah, a suitungkhung malang a um`ae paw Muisaw`ae ccangsari kyate thuasah,
66001005	te zyn lan um paw ccaekia a thua paw, a chih`ae paw kyate masaty saah paw te laephi siapharan`ae uktu bawi athua paw Jesu Kri kyate thuasah, thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning tungvaw la um sah. Aening kha yn sungsah zah amaw a chii kya aening seinaw`ae yn singpah paw,
66001006	te a Paaw te Pachia kalan aening kha siapharan`ae lang te ranpibawi`ae lang yn rae paw, amaw tungvaw phu-enaw te uknawkaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia la um sah. Amen.
66001007	Dotua oh, Jesu tuh maeking`ae ryte nynh yn thua. Te mit miakaw nynh amaw kha a muih cih`ae, te amaw kha po a thuin`ae paw nynh hei amaw kha a muih cih`ae. Te laephi kya-e minphuin`ae balyn tuh amaw keiccuze a rah-a khui cih`ae. Ou tuhmawte nynh thua, Amen.
66001008	“Kae tuh Alfa te Omega, Athonaw te Athangnaw, atu lya a um paw, langmaw a la um vae paw te bua yn thua cih paw, Athung Huaccepaw nynh ka thua,” cite Bawipaw nynh a ci.
66001009	Jesu Kri kya-e vawsawrunaw kya, peenaw kya te ngaesangnaw kya nanning ry a mungkuh bua paw, nae upaw mah ka thua paw kae, Johan tuh Pachia bya keiccu te Jesu Kri kya-e ccaekia keiccuze Patmos cikuh paw tuikoih kyakhe ka um.
66001010	Bawipaw Nin kya kae tuh Muisaw kya ka um zah kamaw nuhlang khe mungkae roi hawte, myarya accaepaw roi kha ka thae.
66001011	Tuh-e roi nynh, “Kae tuh Alfa te Omega, Masaty te Nyathyakou nynh ka thua,” te, “Nang nynh na muih cih paw kha ccauh kyakhe zei lah Asia ram kya a um paw kriccawbu busari kalan ky`ae, Efesa khua lang, Smyrna khua lang, Perkamos khua lang, Thiatira khua lang, Sardis khua lang, Filadefia khua lang te Laodisia khua langkhe ky`ae,” a ci.
66001012	Te kamaw ryte bya ho paw roi kha muih khylan ka maeleihkuh. Te he ka maeleihkuh tuh, sui maeekhua awnawpaw ccangsari,
66001013	te maeekhua awnawpaw ccangsari angaelung khe Ccungccaw Ccapaw alopaw lukheit kha ka muih. Tuh-e paw tuh a ccu phe thua lang cia uccaw kha zingkuh zah a by kyakhe sui taeccia te a cciakuh.
66001014	A lu te a sang tuh tuuming hawte, vuiraw hawkhate araw. Te a mit tuh maeesoi hawte nynh thua.
66001015	Te a ccu tuh maeesopi kya phe a phung vae`ae paw accipaw sohin nynh alo. Te a roi tuh tuiphua patae roiccaepaw nynh alo.
66001016	Te a ranglang kuih kya awsi ccangsari a ccyng; te a khalang lungkhu te hawning te ahepaw thaloi a pou; te a maesue tuh amaw thawzung kya phaephae ahpaw khuanin hawte nynh thua.
66001017	Amaw kha he ka muih tuh, a ccu leihpaw khe achihpaw hawte ka khuliakuh. Te a ranglang kuih kha ka tungvaw khe khang zah kamaw kha, “Rih nan, kae tuh Masaty te Nyathyakou nynh ka thua.
66001018	Kae tuh ka la chih zah bua a hiinpaw nynh ka thua; te dotua, kae tuh zungzae cia po a hiinpaw nynh ka thua. Amen. Te Hades toh te Chinaw toh kha ka hoi.
66001019	Na muih vae paw uccaw`ae, atu lya a um paw uccaw`ae, te atu koute yn cyikuh vae cih paw uccaw`ae kha zei.
66001020	Ka ranglang kuih kya na muih paw awsi ccangsari kya-e byakhupaw te sui maeekhua awnawpaw ccangsari tuh: awsi ccangsari`ae tuh kriccawbu busari kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh thua; te na muih paw maeekhua awnawpaw ccangsari`ae tuh kriccawbu busari kha nynh thua.
66002001	“Efesa kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘A ranglang kuih kya awsi ccangsari a ccyngtupaw, sui maeekhua awnawpaw ccangsari angaelung kya a cceihtupaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho.
66002002	“Na ryalaw`ae, thawte rya na law paw te na ngaesangnaw`ae, te ccungccahoy lei`ae kha na ngaesang kho khyh cipaw kha ka ny. Te locceihtu`ae nynh kae thua ci`ae zemah akaw-aleih bya na khia`ae zah athua lei`ae paw, mihyng`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw phe na muih paw kha thuasah;
66002003	taemya phang na sawkuh zah ngaesangnaw na hoi paw te ka min keiccuze thawte rya na lah zah na lungthawthang khyh paw kha thuasah ka ny.
66002004	Tuhzemah nang rawsete ho lanpaw ka hoi, pawkeiccumacize na kya-e masaty sungsanaw kha nang nynh phe na cciataw vae.
66002005	Tukeiccu paw kyate nynh ka khuliaku cipaw kha liathui lah ngaesikuh, te masaty-e ryalaw`ae kha lah. Tukhyh lanze na kalan arangte kae thua cih zah na ngaesikuh khyh ze, na maeekhua awnawpaw kha a umnaw kyate phe kae nuepah cih.
66002006	Thuasalama kae nynh mah ka hua paw, Nikolaitan`ae cyisahnaw`ae kha nang nynh na hua cite ho lanpaw na hoi.
66002007	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah. A taetupaw kha Pachia kya-e Paradis angaelung kya um paw hiinnaw thingku thae ae lan kaw ka pya cih.” ’
66002008	“Smyrna khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Chih zah bua a hiinpaw, Masaty te Nyathyakou athua paw nynh hynhe` ae hynh a ho.
66002009	“Na ryalaw`ae, na vawsawnaw, te na ryachinaw kha ka ny. Thuasalama nang tuh a hoirungpaw nynh na thua. Te Jew`ae nynh kae thua cite ho`ae zah athua lei`ae paw, thuasalama Setan kya-e sinakok athua`ae paw nynh alue lante byaho`ae paw kha mah ka ny.
66002010	Na teing vae cih paw uccaw`ae ccangkheit sanmah rih nan. Dotua, nanning tuh syntawnaw teing khylan, diabolos nynh nanning kyaze abang kha thunginn lungkhu lang a sang cih`ae, te nin haw lungkhu vawsawnaw na tung cih oh. Chinaw kyacia nang tuh zyn lan um paw la thua, te hiinnaw suilukhung kha nang kae pya cih.
66002011	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah. A taetupaw tuh vaeningnaw chinaw kha teing vae lan khyh.” ’
66002012	“Te Perkamos khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Voining te ahepaw thaloi a hoi paw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho.
66002013	“Na ryalaw`ae te na umnaw kha ka ny, tuh-e kya nynh Setan suitungkhung tuh a um. Te kamaw min kha tynkaring lang na kynku cipaw, te Setan a umnaw, nanning laku kya chia athuapaw, zyn lan um paw kamaw martyr, Antipas nin ccyh lyakhe nang nynh kamaw zynnaw kha na ei khyh cipaw ka ny.
66002014	Thuasalama nang rawsete ho lanpaw ccapyh ka hoi. Pawkeiccumacize Israel ccungccaw`ae malang thykupawkunaw nungkhaw khylan, zohtuh`ae kalan silawnawpaw uccaw`ae ae khylan, te ohhuakunaw raesah khylan Balak a ccangpah paw Balaam ccangpyanaw a ccyngkuh`ae paw kha khe kya na hoi`ae,
66002015	tukeiccu kae nynh ka hua paw uccaw, Nikolaitan`ae ccangpyanaw a kyngkuh`ae paw kha mah na hoi`ae.
66002016	Ngaesikuh, tukhyh lanze na kalan arangte kae thua cih zah ka khalang kya-e thaloi khate minmin kha rhaw ka tuk cih`ae.
66002017	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw hynh nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah. A taetupaw kha thurupaw manna ae lan kaw ka pya cih, te amaw kha arawpaw lung ka pya cih. Te kha-e lung kya athawpaw min azeikuh, kha-e min kha kha-e lung a mue paw laelan hung nynh san nyh khyh.” ’
66002018	“Te Thiatira khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Maeesoi alopaw mit a hoitupaw, accipaw sohin alopaw ccu a hoitupaw, Pachia Ccapaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho.
66002019	“Na ryalaw`ae, na sungsanaw, na ryalawpyapaw, na zynnaw, te na ngaesangnaw, te na cyisahnaw`ae kha ka ny. Te nyathyakou e na cyisahnaw`ae tuh masaty e lae alung cipaw ka ny.
66002020	Tuhzemah nang rawsete ho lanpaw ccapyh ka hoi. Pawccemacize ka rya yn lawpatu`ae kha ohhuakunaw raesah khylan, zohtuh`ae kalan silawnawpaw kha ae sah khylan, ccangpya lan te soih lan, amaw te amaw kha profehnung a cikuh nung, kha-e nopinung Jezebel kha nang nynh kaw na ua.
66002021	Te a ohhuakunaw konglang te ngaesiku khylan ccyh hohse ka pya zemah aning tuh ngaesikuh khyh.
66002022	Dotua, amaw kha ccinaw ikhung kalan dae ka vua cih, te amaw ryte a tuaseikuh`ae paw kha mih cyisahnaw`ae a ngaesiku khyh`ae lanze, alepipaw vawsawrunaw lungkhu lang ka vua cih`ae.
66002023	Te a ccaaw`ae kha chinaw te ka theih cih`ae; te kae tuh tuanaw-thinlung te thinlung`ae a zaahtu nynh ka thua cipaw kha kriccawbu`ae balyn nynh oun nyh cih`ae; te nanning milu raveih kha nae ryalaw`ae thyhte kae pya cih oh.
66002024	Thuasalama nanning kalan te Thiatira khua kya um paw tuhlaepaw`ae kalan kae hopya oh, minmin nynh a ho`ae hawte, Setan kya-e akhupaw uccaw kha a nyh lei`ae paw, hynh-e doctrine a hoi lei`ae paw ccungccaw patae, nae tungvaw ccangpaw phupaw ka khang vae lan khyh.
66002025	Thuasalama na hoi oh paw kha kae kae thua cia varyn kyngkuh oh.
66002026	Te a taetupaw te ka ryalaw`ae kha athangnaw cia a ccykekuh paw tuh minphuin`ae tungvaw kawhoinaw kha ka pya cih,
66002027	‘Aning nynh minmin kha sivaw tungbang khate a uk cih`ae; angvohtupaw kya-e ang`ae hawkhate minmin tuh palae tui lang a koi cih`ae.’ Kae nynh ka Paaw kyate ka mue hawte, kawhoinaw kha ka pya cih.
66002028	Te amaw kha nizy-awsi ka pya cih.
66002029	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah.” ’
66003001	“Sardis khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Pachia kya-e Muisaw`ae ccangsari te awsi ccangsari a hoitupaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho, “Na ryalaw`ae kha ka ny. Nang tuh na hiin cite min na hoi, zemah na chih cipaw ka ny.
66003002	Ahoyte ngawdo. Te chi lan a cih vae paw, a um ung paw uccaw`ae kha thawzungpya`ae; pawccecize Pachia malang na ryalaw`ae tuh accing cite ka muih khyh.
66003003	Tukeiccu pawcihtemou na mue zah na thae cipaw kha liathui lah varyn kyngkuh, te ngaesikuh. Tukeiccu ngaw na do khyh lanze, miruh hawte na kalan kae thua cih zah hotuh ccyh nynh na kya kae thua cih cipaw na nyh lan khyh.
66003004	Sardis khua ccaccei kyakhe mih uccaw`ae a nungsisakuh lei`ae paw ccungccaw min ccapyh na hoi`ae. Minmin tuh angaekuhpaw athua`ae keiccuze, arawpaw uccaw lawkute kamaw ryte a cceihbua cih`ae.
66003005	A taetupaw tuh arawpaw uccaw kha lawsaku athua cih. Te hiinnaw ccauh kyate amaw min kha ka the vae lan khyh. Thuasalama ka Paaw malang te a vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang amaw min kha ccaekia ka khan cih.
66003006	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah.” ’
66003007	“Filadefia khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Athyaapaw, ahmepaw, “David kya-e toh a hoitupaw, hung ccungccaw nynh san a khaw kho lei lan a hungtupaw, te hung ccungccaw nynh san hung kho lei lan a khawtupaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho.”
66003008	“Na ryalaw`ae kha ka ny. Dotua, hung ccungccaw nynh san a khaw kho leipaw, ahungkuhpaw thuakaw kha na malang phe ka nung vae. Pawccecize nang tuh thawzung ccapyh nynh na hoi, te ka bya kha na ccykekuh zah ka min kha na vua khyh.
66003009	Dotua, Jew`ae nynh kae thua ci`ae zah athua lei`ae paw, thuasalama a hyng`ae paw kha Setan kyae sinakok lang ka rae cih`ae. Dotua, na ccu malang beik sah khylan, te nang kha kae sungsah cipaw nysah khylan minmin kha na kalan kae thuasah cih`ae.
66003010	Ka kawpyapaw kha po tynsah lan nang nynh na ccykeku keiccuze, laephi vawlan a um`ae paw kha syntaw khylan, laephipi balyn kya yn thua vae cih paw tuhounaw suimilan ccyh kyate nang kha kae nynh mah kae khynsah cih.
66003011	Dotua, arangte kae thua vae cih. Hung ccungccaw nynh san na suilukhung kha a lawku khyh nawlan, na hoi vae paw kha varyn kyngkuh.
