66003012	A taetupaw kha ka Pachia kya-e tempal kya rungpi lang ka rae cih. Te aning tuh atolang kharyh pou vae lan khyh. Te ka Pachia min te ka Pachia kya-e khuapi min kha amaw tungvaw khe ka zei cih; tuh-e khuapi tuh ka Pachia kyate vaawran langte yn rungbung paw, Jerusalem Thawpaw nynh thua; te athawpaw ka min kha mah amaw tungvaw khe ka zei cih.
66003013	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a hopaw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah.” ’
66003014	“Laodisia khua kya um paw kriccawbu kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw kalan hynhte zei, ‘Pachia kya-e raenaw Athonaw athuapaw, Zyn lan um paw te Ahmepaw Ccaekia, Amen nynh hynh-e`ae hynh a ho,
66003015	“Na ryalaw`ae kha ka ny. Nang tuh kyaa mah na kyaa khyh, so mah na so khyh cipaw ka ny. Nang tuh na kyaa ze kyaa, tukhyhze na so ze so ci ka ry.
66003016	Ou tuhte nang tuh kyaa mah kyaa lei, so mah so lei, lalungpaw na thua keiccuze ka khalang kyate nang kha kae thoi vae cih.
66003017	Nang nynh, ‘Kae tuh ka hoirung zah uccaw`ae ryte ka kaethung, te pawsang mah ka ho ka bou vae khyh,’ na ci keiccuze nang tuh myarya a riathaepaw, thawcci lan um paw, a ryachipaw, a mitmohpaw, te ccakaete a um paw na thua paw kha na nyku khyh keiccu;
66003018	nang kha hynhte tuanaw kae pya: nang tuh na hoirung ccaw, maee kya phe thyaasah vae paw sui kha kamaw kya-e rekuh, na ccakaete na um paw maethyanaw kha a langku khyh nawlan uccaw na lawku ccaw, arawpaw uccaw kha kamaw kya-e rekuh; te ngaw na muih nawlan na mit kha mitccisi na thuhku ccaw, kamaw kya-e rekuh.
66003019	Ka sungsahpaw miakaw kha ka pe`ae zah ka thuihei`ae. Tukeiccu na lungthosah lah ngaesikuh.
66003020	Dotua, kae tuh thuakawzung khe ka thadyn zah ka khua. Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka roi thae zah thuakaw yn hungpya ze, kha-e paw kalan ka tee cih zah amaw ryte ka ae cih, te aning mah kamaw ryte a ae cih.
66003021	Kae tuh ka tae zah ka Paaw suitungkhung vawlan ka Paaw ryte kae dahung hawte, a taetupaw kha ka suitungkhung vawlan kamaw ryte dahung lan kaw ka pya cih.
66003022	Kriccawbu`ae kalan Muisaw nynh a ho paw kha nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah,” ’ ” yn cipya.
66004001	Hynh-e koute ka do zah vaawran kya thuakaw ahungkuhpaw kha ka muih. Te masaty roi ka thae paw tuh kamaw ryte bya ho paw mungkae roi hawkhate nynh thua; tuh-e roi nynh, “Hynhlang yn kaethung, lah hynh-e koute yn cyikuh hahe cih paw uccaw`ae kha nang kae muihsah cih,” yn cipya.
66004002	Te vaekheihmawte kae tuh Muisaw kyakhe ka um. Te dotua, vaawran kya suitungkhung ccangkheit nung athua. Te suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw a um.
66004003	Te tuinkya a dahung paw tuh do lanze jasper lung te sardias lung hawte nynh alangku. Te suitungkhung po voilu lang muihnaw kya emerald lung hawte athua paw sawdoihpaw a um.
66004004	Tuh-e suitungkhung po voilu lang ccangpaw suitungkhung`ae ccangkuin laepali a um. Tuh-e suitungkhung`ae vawlan piccang`ae lukuin laepali tuh arawpaw uccaw`ae kha lawkute a dahung`ae paw kha ka muih. Minmin tuh mih lu kya suilukhung`ae a khungkuh`ae.
66004005	Suitungkhung kyate khozawlaepaw, riakawpaw te roiccaepaw`ae a pou; te suitungkhung malang Pachia kya-e Muisaw`ae ccangsari athua paw, maeekhua ccangsari a awkuh paw a um.
66004006	Te suitungkhung malang khe lung-awmito te alokuhpaw muinsado rili a um. Te suitungkhung angaelung kya te suitungkhung a pepan kyakhe, a malang te a nuhlang mit`ae te phe beihpaw ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali a um.
66004007	Te masaty a hiinpaw rangsaw tuh chindeih te nynh aloku. Ccanningnaw ahiinpaw rangsaw tuh vaetuataw te nynh aloku. Ccanthungnaw ahiinpaw rangsaw tuh ccungccaw hawte mitmae a hoi. Ccanpalinaw ahiinpaw rangsaw tuh azoupaw mosipi te nynh aloku.
66004008	Te tuh-e ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali tuh sake ketaruh cci a hoi`ae. Atolang te alungkhu lang tuh mit te phe beih`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Langmaw a la um vae paw, te atu a um paw, te yn thua lanpaw, Athung Huaccepaw Bawipaw Pachia tuh athyaa, athyaa, athyaa!” cite khuazi khuadae hae-ung leite a ho`ae.
66004009	Te suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw, zungzae te zungzae cia a hiinpaw kalan khe kha-e ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae nynh phu-enaw te sawtuanaw kha pya`ae zah lungtuabya he a ho`ae tuh,
66004010	suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw malang khe piccang`ae lukuin laepali tuh bakhung`ae zah zungzae te zungzae cia a hiinpaw kha a beik`ae, te suitungkhung malang khe mih suilukhung`ae kha nungsya`ae zah,
66004011	“Pou Bawipaw, phuenaw te sawtuanaw te thungnaw kha mue lan nang tuh na ngaekuh; pawccecize pawpaw balyn tuh nang nynh phe na rae vae, te na rynaw liate kha-e`ae tuh rae thua`ae zah a um`ae,” a ci`ae.
66005001	Te alungkhu lang te anuhlang ccawzeikuh zah tazeih ccangsari te khia athuapaw ccaleih ccangkheit kha suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw a ranglang kuih kyakhe ka muih.
66005002	Te a thawsaepaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Kha-e ccaleih kia lan te tazeih`ae kha phou lan hungmou a ngaekuh?” cite thawte khua-o paw kha ka muih.
66005003	Te vaawran kya, laephi kya, laephi kaw kya kha-e ccaleih a kia kho lanpaw te kha-e a do kho lanpaw hung ccungccaw sanmah um khyh.
66005004	Te kha-e ccaleih kia lan, te ria lan, te kha-e do lan angaekuhpaw hung sanmah muih lan a um khyh keiccuze kae tuh thawte ka rah.
66005005	Te piccang`ae kyaze lukheitpaw nynh, “Rah nan, dotua Judah phin kya-e Chindeih, David Tharuipi nynh ccaleih kha kia lan te kha-e kya-e tazeih ccangsari phou lan phe a tae vae,” cite kamaw kha yn hopya.
66005006	Te kae nynh ka do zah suitungkhung te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali angaelung kya te piccang`ae angaelung kyakhe phe a chia vae`ae paw hawte athua paw, Tuutaw a thadyn paw kha ka muih. Tuh-e Tuutaw tuh laephi balyn kalan saw paw Pachia kya-e Muisaw ccangsari athua paw, ki kisari te mit ccangsari a hoi.
66005007	Te aning nynh yn thua zah suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw a ranglang kuih kyate ccaleih kha a law.
66005008	Te aning nynh ccaleih kha he a laah tuh ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali te piccang`ae kuin laepali nynh Tuutaw malang khe a bakhung`ae, minmin lu raveih tuh tintang te mithyaa`ae sawsangnaw athua paw mynkhuhpaw te phe beihpaw sui pakekhupaw`ae kha a hoi`ae.
66005009	Te minmin nynh, “Ccaleih kha law lan te kha-e kya-e tazeih`ae kha kia lan nang tuh na ngaekuh, pawccecize nang tuh chia na la thua zah phin miakaw, bya miakaw, ccungccaw miakaw, te minphuin miakaw kyate kaening hynh na chiise liate Pachia hanlan nae sawkhaw.
66005010	“Te kae Pachia hanlan kaening kha siapharan`ae lang te ranpibawi`ae lang phe nae rae vae zah kaening tuh laephi vawlan kae uk vae cih,” cite athawpaw law kha a sah`ae.
66005011	Te ka do zah suitungkhung te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae te piccang`ae pepan khe vaaw ccungccaw`ae patae roi kha ka thae. Tuh-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae milu tuh thung haw leih thung haw, te athung asang`ae kya-e athung asang`ae zeih acih`ae.
66005012	Minmin nynh, “Chia athua vae paw Tuutaw tuh thungnaw, hoirungnaw, hawnaw, thawzung, sawtuanaw, phu-enaw te hythuanaw kha ccou lan a ngaekuh!” cite roi accae lante a ho`ae.
66005013	Te vaawran kya, laephi vawlan, laephi kaw um paw rae paw miakaw te rili kya um`ae paw te kha-e`ae kya um`ae paw balyn nynh, “Hythuanaw, te sawtuanaw te phuenaw te thungnaw tuh suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw kya te Tuutaw kya zungzae te zungzae cia um sah!” a ci`ae paw kha ka thae.
66005014	Te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali nynh, “Amen!” a ci`ae. Te piccang`ae lukuin laepali nynh bakhung`ae zah zungzae te zungzae cia a hiinpaw kha a beik`ae.
66006001	Tazeih`ae kyaze ccangkheit kha Tuutaw nynh he a kia tuh kae nynh ka muih, te riakawpaw roi hawte ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali kyaze sakheit nynh, “Rang lah yn do,” a cipaw roi kha ka thae.
66006002	Te ka do zah marang arawpaw sakheit ka muih. Kha-e marang vawlan a ccikuh paw nynh li kha a ccyngku. Te amaw kha suilukhung a pya`ae. Te aning tuh rhaw tae laliate, te rhaw tae lan po a cceih.
66006003	Te aning nynh vaeningnaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh, vaeningnaw ahiinpaw rangsaw nynh, “Rang lah yn do,” a cipaw kha ka thae.
66006004	Te ccangpaw marang sekakingpaw po a pou. Te laephi kyate daenaw kha a law ccaw cite, ccungccaw`ae nynh lukheit te lukheit a chiaku ccaw`ae cite, kha-e vawlan a ccikuh paw kha kawpya athua; te alepipaw thaloi kha mah pya athua.
66006005	Te ccangthungnaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh ccangthungnaw ahiinpaw rangsaw nynh, “Rang lah yn do,” a cipaw kha ka thae. Ka do zah marang amanpaw sakheit ka muih. Te kha-e vawlan a ccikuh paw nynh a kuih kyakhe zawccu kha a ccyngku.
66006006	Te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali angaelung kyate, “Denari kiakheit mee lang chanvui khoinik kawkheit te denari kiakheit mee lang barli khoinik kawthung a muekuh, te chitui te misutui kha rosah nan,” a cipaw roi kha ka thae.
66006007	Te ccangpalinaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh ccangpalinaw ahiinpaw rangsaw nynh, “Rang lah yn do,” a cipaw roi kha ka thae.
66006008	Te ka do zah marang apuapaw sakheit ka muih. Kha-e a ccikuh paw a min tuh Chinaw cikuh zah Hades nynh amaw kha a zui. Te laephi pumpali pumkheit vawlan thaloi te chia khylan, vuelawnaw te chia khylan, chinaw te chia khylan, te laephi kya-e sarepaw`ae te chia khylan minmin kha kawhoinaw a pya`ae.
66006009	Ccangpangawnaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh Pachia bya keiccuze, te mimaw ccaekia keiccuze a chia`ae paw mih hiinnawmuisaw` ae kha silawhang kaw khe ka muih.
66006010	Te minmin nynh, “Thyaa zah ahmepaw, pou Bawipaw, laephi vawlan a um`ae paw tungvaw kaening chii mee lang hohse cia mou byapiapya leite, ccaeliarupya leite na um cih?” cite thawte a sia`ae.
66006011	Minmin lu raveih tuh arawpaw angkiccua kha pya athua`ae. Mimaw hawte chia athuabua vae cih`ae paw, mimaw ryte ryalahkheih`ae paw te mih uno`ae milu tuh accing makhia, minmin tuh ccyh sosoh a haeung cih`ae cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
66006012	Ccangtaruhnaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh ka do zah alepipaw innruisuekuh paw a um. Te khuanin tuh saming te kua paw buri uccaw hawte phe amang, te sawpaw tuh chii hawte nynh thua.
66006013	Te thaeku ku tuh arupaw khisang nynh he a mung vae ze, accyh zaw leipaw thaeku`ae kha a khuaku hawte vaawran e awsi`ae tuh laephi kalan a ccah`ae.
66006014	Te ccaleih kha he kue vae ze a sungku hawte, vaawran tuh po a sungkuh. Mua miakaw te tuikoih miakaw tuh mimaw ungnaw kyate phe a nuekuh`ae.
66006015	Te laephi siapharan`ae, minthaanpaw ccungccaw`ae, a hoirungpaw ccungccaw`ae, rhawbawi`ae, alesaepaw ccungccaw`ae, te see miakaw, a luepaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh laekarung`ae kya te mua-e lung`ae kyakhe a rekuh`ae.
66006016	Te minmin nynh mua`ae te lung`ae kha, “Kaening tungvaw yn ccawthin oh lah suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw mitmae kyate, te Tuutaw thinrianaw kyate kaening hynh yn khaw oh!
66006017	Pawccecize a thinrianaw kya-e alesaepaw nin tuh yn thua vae, te hungmou a thadyn khopaw a um cih?” a cipya`ae.
66007001	Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute laephi ki kipali kya a thadyn`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lupali kha ka muih. Khisang nynh laephi vawlan, rili vawlan, te thingku kha a mung khyh nawlan laephi kya-e khisang`ae sangpali kha phang a kyng`ae.
66007002	Te a hiinpaw Pachia kya-e tazeih a hoi paw, nithua langte yn kaethung paw, ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw kha ka muih. Te kha-e paw nynh laephi te rili kha vawsaw pya khylan kaw a mue`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lupali kalan khe thawte sia zah,
66007003	“Ah Pachia see`ae kha mih terui kya tazeih phe ah khia mawlaezung oh, laephi thuasah, rili thuasah, thingku`ae kha thuasah vawsaw pya nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
66007004	Tazeihkhia athua`ae paw mih milu kha ka thae. Israel ccungccaw`ae kyaze phin balyn kyate thung zakheit sungpali thungpali kha tazeihkhia athua`ae.
66007005	Judah phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Reuben phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Gad phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae.
66007006	Asher phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Naftali phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Manasseh phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae.
66007007	Simeon phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Levi phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Issachar phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae.
66007008	Zebulun phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Josef phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae. Benjamin phin kyate thung haw laening kha tazeihkhia`ae.
66007009	Hynh-e koute ka do zah minphuin`ae balyn kya-e phin`ae, ccungccaw`ae te bya`ae hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a ria kho leipaw ccungccaw zapi pi tuh suitungkhung malang te Tuutaw malang khe a thadyn`ae. Minmin tuh arawpaw angkiccua kha lawkuh`ae zah mih kuih kya saruitah ange`ae kha ccyngbiate,
66007010	“Suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw ah Pachia kya te Tuutaw kya nynh khumnaw tuh a um!” cite roi accae lante thawte a sia`ae.
66007011	Te suitungkhung pepan, te piccang`ae te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali pepan khe vaaw ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh thadyn`ae zah suitungkhung malang khe bakhung`ae zah Pachia kha a beik`ae.
66007012	Te, “Amen! Hythuanaw te phu-enaw, hawnaw te lungtuabya honaw, sawtuanaw te thungnaw, te thawsaenaw tuh ah Pachia kya zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen,” a ci`ae.
66007013	Te piccang`ae kyaze lukheitpaw nynh tho zah, “Arawpaw angkiccuapaw a lawkuh`ae paw hynh-e`ae hynh hung`ae mou? Te teitemou minmin tuh oun thua`ae?” cite kamaw kha yn khia.
66007014	Te kae nynh, “Bawihaepaw, nang nynh na nyh,” ka cipya. Te aning nynh kamaw kha, “Hynhe` ae tuh alepipaw vawsawrunaw kyate oun pou`ae paw, te mih angkiccuapaw kha Tuutaw chii kya sukuh`ae zah kha-e kha a rawsah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
66007015	Tukeiccu minmin tuh Pachia kya-e suitungkhung malang khe um`ae zah amaw kha a tempal kya khuazi khuadae ryalawpya`ae; te suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw tuh minmin laku khe a um cih.
66007016	“Minmin tuh mih vuelaw boi vae lan khyh, mih tui mah haw boi vae lan khyh; khuanin nynh minmin kha u vae lan khyh`ae, maeeso nynh mah u vae lan khyh`ae.
66007017	“Pawccecize suitungkhung angaelung kya a um paw Tuutaw nynh minmin kha a dang cih`ae zah, te ahiinpaw tuivanaw kalan minmin kha a cciakhae vae cih`ae, te Pachia nynh mih mit kya-e mitphi balyn kha marya a fupah cih`ae,” yn cipya.
66008001	Te ccangsarinaw tazeih kha he a kia tuh vaawran kya suimilan a khoi loukaw daetedae.
66008002	Te Pachia malang a thadyn`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kha ka muih, te minmin kha mungkae ccangsari a pya`ae.
66008003	Te ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh yn thua zah sui pakephepaw kha ccyngkuh zah silawhang pe khe a thadyn. Te suitungkhung malang a um paw sui silawhang vawlan khe mithyaa`ae balyn kya-e sawsangnaw ryte thuakhae khylan maee te u paw mynkhuhpaw patae kha kha-e paw a pya`ae.
66008004	Te maee te u paw mynkhuhpaw a maeekhuh tuh mithyaa`ae kya-e sawsangnaw ryte vaaw ccungccapaw kuih kyate Pachia malang a kaethung.
66008005	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh pakephepaw kha laah zah kha-e kha silawhang kya-e maee khate phe a biasah, te laephi vawlan dae a vua; oute roi`ae, kholungthyhpaw, khozawlaekuhpaw, te innruisuekuhpaw a um.
66008006	Te mungkae ccangsari a hoi`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari tuh mungkae tu lan paccynkute a um vae`ae.
66008007	Masaty vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae a tu, te hya te chii ryte apykuhpaw maee palu a um`ae, te kha-e`ae kha laephi vawlan a sawbung`ae; te thingku`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh phya a u, te lonua a hingpaw balyn kha marya a u.
66008008	Te vaeningnaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu zah maee nynh a u paw mua alepipaw tuh rili lungkhu lang ccaring vua paw hawte nynh thua; te rili pumthung pumkheit tuh chii lang phe atang.
66008009	Te rili kya um paw rae paw a hysue`ae paw pumthung pumkheit tuh phe a chih`ae; te sanphalung`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh phya aroh.
66008010	Te vaethungnaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu zah maeekhua hawte aruapaw alepipaw awsi tuh vaawran kyate a ccah, te kha-e tuh vawpi`ae pumthung pumkheit vawlan te tuivanaw`ae vawlan khe accah.
66008011	Kha-e awsi min tuh ‘Eccangkary’ acikuh. Te tui`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh eccangkary lang phe atang; te tui tuh akhahpaw lang rae athua keiccu, tui keiccuze ccungccaw patae a chih`ae.
66008012	Te vaepalinaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu zah khuanin pumthung pumkheit, sawpaw pumthung pumkheit, te awsi`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh ziabua athua`ae, te kha-e`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh pung amoh; te khuadae pumthung pumkheit tuh aw khyh; khuazi mah tuhhawte nynh thua.
66008013	Te ka do zah vaawran angaelung kya po azoupaw vaaw ccungccapaw lukheit nynh, “Vaaw ccungccaw`ae luthung nynh oun tu vae cih`ae paw ccangpaw mungkae roi`ae keiccuze, laephi a too`ae paw hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang, paw ngaethya lan um babang, paw ngaethya lan um babang!” cite thawte a sia paw roi kha ka thae.
66009001	Vaepangawnaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu zah awsi ccangkheit tuh vaawran kyate laephi kalan accaw paw kha ka muih. Alaethy um leipaw hunghua toh kha kha-e paw kha a pya`ae.
66009002	Te aning nynh alaethy um leipaw hunghua kha he a hung tuh alepipaw maeephupi kya-e maeekhuh hawte hunghua lungkhu te maeekhuh a pouthung; te hunghua kya-e maeekhuh keiccuze khuanin te vawlae tuh pung amoh.
66009003	Te maeekhuh kyate laephi vawlan tungkhipaw`ae yn pou, te laephi kya-e zekang`ae nynh thungnaw a hoi`ae hawte minmin kha thungnaw pya athua`ae.
66009004	Te laephi kya-e lonua, ahinpaw uccaw ccangkhakheit sanmah, thingku ccangkhakheit sanmah vawsaw pya khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama mih terui kya Pachia kya-e tazeih a hoi leipaw ccungccaw`ae kyalya kha vawsaw pya nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya athua`ae.
66009005	Tazeih khia athua lei`ae paw kha minmin nynh chianaw kaw hoi khyh`ae, thuasalama sawpaw sapangaw cia minmin kha thawte a tua-a sah ccaw`ae cite kawpya athua`ae. Minmin tuasahnaw tuh zekang nynh ccungccaw a teih vae ze a tua a sahnaw, zekang`ae kya-e tuasahnaw te nynh aloku.
66009006	Tuh-e nin`ae ccyh kya ccungccaw`ae nynh chinaw kha a ccungkuh cih`ae zah muihkuh lan khyh`ae; te chi lan a ry`ae zemah chinaw nynh minmin kha a ccuetaw cih`ae.
66009007	Te tuh-e tungkhipaw`ae pungsan tuh rhawtuk lan paccyn`ae paw marang`ae te nynh aloku. Mih lu kya sui te rae paw suilukhung a khungkuh`ae paw hawte nynh thua. Mih mitmae tuh ccungccaw`ae mitmae te nynh aloku.
66009008	Te mih sang tuh nopi`ae sang hawte nynh thua, te mih haw tuh chindeih`ae haw hawte nynh thua.
66009009	Mih kya-e bykhawkunawpaw tuh sivaw bykhawkunawpaw hawte nynh thua. Te mih sake`ae a zaw`ae paw roi tuh rhawtuk lan a ccue`ae paw maranglee`ae patae roi te nynh aloku.
66009010	Zekang`ae hawte leihmae a hoi`ae. Mih leihmae kya khoizang`ae a um. Te sawpaw sapangaw cia ccungccaw`ae kha vawsaw pya lan thungnaw a hoi`ae.
66009011	Te minmin nynh siapharan lukheit a hoi`ae, tuh-e paw tuh alaethy um leipaw hunghua kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh thua. Hebru bya te a min tuh Abaddon cikuh zah Greek bya te a min tuh Apollyon acikuh.
66009012	Ngaethya lan um paw ccangkheit tuh phe alia vae. Dotua, hynh-e koute ngaethya lan um paw ccangning yn thua ung cih.
66009013	Te vaetaruhnaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu zah Pachia malang um paw sui silawhang kya-e ki kipali kyate roi roikheit ka thae.
66009014	Tuh-e roi nynh mungkae a hoitupaw vaetaruhnaw e, vaaw ccungccapaw kha, “Alepipaw Eufrates vawpi kya a khii`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lupali kha supah`ae,” a cipya.
66009015	Te ccungccaw`ae pumthung pumkheit kha chia khylan, tuh-e suimilan, tuh-e nin, tuh-e sawpaw, tuh-e kum hanlan a paccyn`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lupali kha a supya`ae.
66009016	Te marang ccikuh`ae paw rhawkaw phu milu tuh million zaning acih; te minmin milu ria paw kha ka thae.
66009017	Ou tuhte vizin kya marang`ae kha ka muih; tuh-e marang`ae tungvaw a ccikuh`ae paw tuh maee hawte asepaw, ke hawte amepaw, jacinth lung hawte ahinpaw bykhawnawpaw`ae kha a hoi`ae; te marang`ae lu tuh chindeih`ae lu te nynh aloku, te mih khalang lungkhu te maee te maeekhuh te kemaee a pou.
66009018	Mih khalang lungkhu te a pou paw maee, maeekhuh te kemaee, hynh-e phin thung keiccuze ccungccaw`ae pumthung pumkheit tuh phe a chih`ae.
66009019	Pawccecize mih thungnaw tuh mih khalang kya te mih leihmae kya nynh a um; pawccecize mih leihmae tuh fupaw`ae hawte lu a hoi`ae; kha-e leihmae khate minmin nynh vawsaw a pya`ae.
66009020	Te hynh-e vawsawnawpi`ae khate chia athua lei`ae paw, alaepaw ccungccaw`ae tuh raerangsaro`ae a beik khyh nawlan`ae, te ngawmuih kho leipaw, nawthae kho leipaw te a cceih kho leipaw sui zohtuh`ae, ngun zohtuh`ae, sohin zohtuh`ae, lung zohtuh`ae, thingphe zohtuh`ae kha minmin nynh a beik khyh nawlan`ae, mih kuih ryalaw`ae kha ngaesikuh khyh`ae.
66009021	Te ccungccaw a chia`ae paw, ccungccaw a naw`ae paw, a ohhuakunaw`ae paw te a ru`ae paw kha minmin nynh ngaesikuh khyh`ae.
66010001	Te a thawsaepaw ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw tuh maeking kha zingkute vaawran kyate yn cciabung paw kha ka muih; te a lu vawlan sawdoihpaw um zah a mitmae tuh khuanin hawte thua zah a ccu tuh maee tungpi`ae hawte nynh thua.
66010002	A kiakuh paw ccaleih taraw kha a kuih kya a ccyng, te a ranglang ccu kha rili vawlan sy zah a voilang ccu kha laephi vawlan a sy.
66010003	Te chindeih nynh a sia hawte roiccae lante thawte a sia; he a sia koute kholungthyhpaw roi vaesari accae.
66010004	Te kholungthyhpaw roi vaesari accae koute, kae tuh ccawzei lan ka noukuh vae; te vaawran kyate roi nynh, “Kholungthyhpaw roi vaesari accae paw uccaw kha tazeihkhia lah kha-e`ae kha zei nan,” cite kamaw yn hopya paw kha ka thae.
66010005	Te rili vawlan te laephi vawlan a thadyn paw ka muih paw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh vaawran lang a kuih kha hangthung zah
66010006	vaawran te vaawran kya um paw uccaw`ae, laephi te laephi kya um paw uccaw`ae, rili te rili kya um paw uccaw`ae a raetupaw, zungzae te zungzae cia a hiinpaw liate ccaesakuh zah ccyh ro vae lan khyh,
66010007	thuasalama Pachia nynh a see`ae, profeh`ae kalan phe a hopya vae`ae hawte, vaesarinaw e vaaw ccungccapaw roi yn ccae cih nin ccyh kya, mungkae he yn tu tetuh Pachia byakhupaw tuh accing vae cih, a ci.
66010008	Te vaawran kyate ka thae paw roi nynh kamaw kha bua yn hopah zah, “Rili vawlan te laephi vawlan a thadyn paw vaaw ccungccapaw kuih kya a kiakuh paw ccaleih taraw khu cceih lah yn lah,” yn cipya.
66010009	Te vaaw ccungccapaw kalan khe ka cceih zah amaw kha, “Ccaleih taraw kha yn pya,” ka cipya. Te aning nynh, “Lawkuh lah ae, na vue kya akhah cih, thuasalama na khalang kya tuh khoitui hawte a e cih,” yn cipya.
66010010	Te vaaw ccungccapaw kuih kyate ccaleih taraw kha ka lawkuh zah phe ka ae; ka khalang kya tuh khoitui hawte e zah, ccahe ka ae kou tuh ka vue kya akhah.
66010011	Te aning nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae patae, minphuin`ae, bya`ae te siapharan`ae kalan khe profehbya bua na ho hahe cih,” cite kamaw kha yn hopya.
66011001	Te hoitang alopaw phaeku ccangkheit kha kamaw yn pya; te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh thadyn zah, “Thokuh lah Pachia kya-e tempal te silawhang te khe kya a beik`ae paw kha toutua.
66011002	Thuasalama tempal atolang e voidu kha tuh cciataw lah tou nan; pawccecize kha-e tuh Zenta`ae kalan pya athua vae, te athyaapaw khualipi kha sawpaw sungpali saning cia minmin nynh ccu te a syde cih`ae.
66011003	Te ka ccaekia luning kha thungnaw ka pya cih`ae zah, te minmin nynh buri uccaw kha lawkute nin thungkheit zaning sungtaruh cia profehbya a ho cih`ae,” a ci.
66011004	Hynh-e`ae tuh laephi peetu Pachia malang a thadyn`ae paw maeekhua awnawpaw ccangning te oliv thingku kuning nynh thua`ae.
66011005	Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh minmin kha vawsaw pya a ry`ae ze mih khalang lungkhu te maee pou zah mih rhaw`ae kha po a laang`ae. Te ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh minmin kha vawsaw pya a ry`ae ze, tuh-e paw tuh ou tuhcihte chia a thua hahe cih.
66011006	Tuh-e`ae tuh mih profehbyaho lya`ae nin ccyh kya khuaraw khyh nawlan vaawran thuakaw khaw khonaw kawhoinaw a hoi`ae; te tui`ae kha chii lang tangsah khonaw, a ry takyh vae`ae ze vawsawnawpi aphuinphuin te laephi kha vawsaw pya khonaw thungnaw a hoi`ae.
66011007	Te minmin nynh ccaekiakhan`ae paw kha he a thangsah`ae tetuh alaethy um leipaw hunghua lungkhu te yn kaethung paw sarepaw nynh minmin kha rhawtuk cih`ae zah phe a tae cih`ae, te minmin kha phe a theih cih`ae.
66011008	Te muisaw lante Sodom te Izip a ci`ae paw, alepipaw khuapi e laanpi kyakhe mih rhua`ae tuh a um cih; tuh-e kya nynh ah Bawipaw kha mah a khiade`ae.
66011009	Te ccungccaw`ae, phin`ae, bya`ae te minphuin`ae nynh mih rhua`ae kha nin thung khoi lungkhu a muih cih`ae, zah shaw kya u lan phe a kang cih`ae.
66011010	Te laephi vawlan a um`ae paw tuh mih lungtua cih zah mih lungpaw cih, te lukheit te lukheit lasung a kykuh cih`ae; pawccemacize langmaw khae profeh`ae luning nynh laephi vawlan a um`ae paw kha phe ccihtheih lang a tua`ae keiccu nynh thua.
66011011	Te nin thung khoi acih koute Pachia kyate hiinnaw muisaw nynh minmin lungkhu langkhe tee zah minmin tuh mih ccu te a thadyn`ae, te minmin kha a muih`ae paw tuh myarya a rih`ae.
66011012	Te vaawran kyate alepipaw roi nynh, “Hynhlang yn kaethung oh,” cite a hopya`ae paw kha minmin nynh a thae`ae. Te minmin tuh maeking te vaawran lang a kaethung`ae, te mih rhaw`ae nynh a muih`ae.
66011013	Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya thawte innruisuekuh zah khuapi pumhaw pumkheit tuh pung ating, te innruisuekunaw kya ccungccaw`ae thungsari a chih`ae, te alaepaw ccungccaw`ae tuh rih`ae zah vaawran-e Pachia kha phu-enaw a pya`ae.
66011014	Vaeningnaw ngaethya lan um paw tuh phe alia vae. Dotua, vaethungnaw ngaethya lan um paw tuh arangte yn thua vae cih.
66011015	Te vaesarinaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mungkae tu; te vaawran kya thawte accaepaw roi`ae nynh, “Hynh-e laephipi peenaw`ae tuh ah Bawipaw kya-e peenaw lang te a Kri kya-e peenaw lang phe tang vae, te aning nynh zungzae te zungzae cia a uk vae cih!” cite a ho`ae.
66011016	Te Pachia malang mimaw suitungkhung vawlan a dahung`ae paw piccang`ae lukuin laepali nynh bakhung`ae zah Pachia kha beik`ae zah,
66011017	“Atu a um paw, langmaw a la um vae paw te yn thua lanpaw, Athung huaccepaw, pou Bawipaw Pachia, na kalan lungtuabya kae ho; pawccecize alesaepaw na thungnaw kha namaw kalan phe na lawkuh vae zah na uk vae.
66011018	“Minphuin`ae tuh mih thinria zah na bungpawnaw tuh yn thua vae; a chih`ae paw kha byapia khylan mih ccyh tuh yn thua vae. Te namaw rya ae lawpah`ae paw na profeh`ae, mithyaa`ae, te na min rawrih`ae paw ccungccaw adih ale`ae kha ryalaw mee na pya nawlan`ae, te laephi a roh`ae paw kha na ro nawlan`ae paw accyh tuh yn thua vae,” a ci`ae.
66011019	Te vaawran kya Pachia kya-e tempal tuh ahungkuh, te a tempal kyakhe amaw kya-e byakin kua kha muih athua. Te khozawlaekuhpaw, roi`ae, kholungthyhpaw, innruisuekuhpaw te alepipaw hya ccah paw a um`ae.
66012001	Te vaawran kya alepipaw muihsanaw a langkuh: nopinung lukheit tuh khuanin khate ccaankuh zah a ccu kaw khe sawpaw a um, te a lu vawlan awsi haw laening a um paw suilukhung kha a khungku.
66012002	Tuh-e nung tuh ccaawpoi, ccaawpui lan cih tuh neitangia accipawte thawte a siakhaekuh.
66012003	Te vaawran kya ccangpaw muihsanaw alangkuh. Dotua oh, lu lusari te ki kihaw, te a lu`ae vawlan suilukhung ccangsari a hoi paw, alepipaw sekakingpaw nakafupi a um.
66012004	Te a leihmae nynh vaawran e awsi`ae pumthung pumkheit kha sue zah kha-e`ae kha laephi kalan dae a vua; te ccaawpui lan a cih vae paw nopinung nynh a ccaaw kha ccahe yn pui vae ze, kha-e ccaaw kha po laang lan cite nakafupi tuh nopinung malang khe phang a thadyn.
66012005	Te nopinung nynh sivaw hoitang te minphuin`ae balyn kha a uk vae cih paw imua pise kha a saah; te a ccaaw tuh Pachia kalan te a suitungkhung kalan lawthung athua.
66012006	Te nin thungkheit zaning sungtaruh cia amaw kha loohdang athua ccaw cite Pachia nynh a paccynpya paw umnaw, rangkaw langkhe nopinung tuh phe a ccue.
66012007	Te vaawran kya rhawtukkunaw a um; Mikhael te a vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh nakafupi kha rhawtuk`ae, te nakafupi te a vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh rhawtuk`ae zah,
66012008	tae khyh`ae, te vaawran kya minmin hanlan umnaw kharyh muih lan um vae khyh.
66012009	Te laephipi khaleih a lingpaw, Diabolos te Setan a ci`ae paw, kha-e langmaw-e fupaw, alepipaw nakafupi tuh ccaring vua athua. Aning tuh laephi kalan ccaring vua thua zah amaw ryte a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha vua athua`ae.
66012010	Oute vaawran kya roi accaepaw nynh, “Atu khumnaw, te thawzung, te ah Pachia kya-e peenaw te a Kri kya-e thungnaw tuh athua vae; pawccecize ah uno`ae seibetupaw, ah Pachia malang khuazi khuadae minmin seibetupaw tuh sawbung athua vae.
66012011	Te Tuutaw a chii liate, te mih ccaekia bya liate minmin nynh amaw kha a tae`ae; te minmin tuh chinaw kyacia mimaw hiinnaw kha sungsakuh khyh`ae.
66012012	Tukeiccu, pou vaawran`ae, te kha-e kya um`ae paw nanning lungtua oh! Laephi a too`ae paw te rili kya-e`ae elan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Pawccecize diabolos nynh amaw tuh ccyh sosoh rou nynh ka hoi vae cipaw kha a ny keiccuze, myarya thinria te, aning tuh nae kalan yn rungbung vae,” cite a ho paw kha ka thae.
66012013	Te nakafupi nynh laephi kalan amaw tuh vua athua paw kha he a muih tuh ccaaw pise a saah paw nopinung kha a tua a sah vae.
66012014	Te kha-e nopinung tuh fupaw mitmae kyate a lue nawlan, ccyh kheit, ccyh`ae te ccyh akhankuh cia amaw a dooihnaw`ae a umnaw, rangkaw langkhe a zou kho nawlan alepipaw mosipi sake kening kha pya athua.
66012015	Te kha-e nopinung kha tuileih nynh po a cciakhae ccaw cite, fupaw nynh a khalang lungkhu te tuileih tho paw hawte tui kha nopinung nuhlang te a pousah.
66012016	Te laephi nynh nopinung kha a bawng, te laephi nynh a khalang kha aw zah nakafupi nynh a khalang lungkhu te a pousah paw tuileih kha po a laang.
66012017	Te nakafupi tuh nopinung elan myarya a thinria zah Pachia kawpyapaw`ae a zui`ae paw te Jesu Kri kya-e ccaekia a hoi`ae paw, alaepaw nopinung ciihan kha rhawtuk khylan po a cceih.
66013001	Te rili kin laesia vawlan khe ka thadyn. Te sarepaw sakheit rili lungkhu te yn pouthung paw kha ka muih. Tuh-e sarepaw tuh lu lusari te ki kihaw a hoi; te a ki vawlan suilukhung ccanghaw, te a lu`ae vawlan Pachia thethyasah paw min a um.
66013002	Te ka muih paw sarepaw tuh kaesing te nynh aloku. A ccu tuh vong ccu te lokuh zah a khalang tuh chindeih khalang te nynh aloku. Te nakafupi nynh amaw thungnaw te a suitungkhung te alepaw kawhoinaw kha sarepaw kalan a pya.
66013003	Te a lu lukheit tuh chikhaeku khopaw vaemaw a mue paw hawkhate nynh thua; te chikhaeku khopaw a vaemaw tuh dansah athua. Te laephi ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah sarepaw nuhlang khe a zuikuh`ae.
66013004	Te minmin nynh sarepaw kha kawhoinaw a pyatupaw nakafupi kha a beik`ae; te sarepaw kha mah beik`ae zah, “Sarepaw alopaw hungmou a um? Hungmou amaw kha rhawtuk kho cih?” a ci`ae.
66013005	Te alesaepaw uccaw kong bya ho paw khalang te Pachia thethyasah paw bya ho paw khalang kha sarepaw kalan pya athua, te sawpaw sungpali saning po piakuh lang kawhoinaw kha mah pya athua.
66013006	Te Pachia kha rawsete thethyasahnaw kya, Pachia a min, a bu, te vaawran kya a um`ae paw kha thethyasah khylan a khalang kha a aw vae.
66013007	Te mithyaa`ae kha rhawtuk khylan, te minmin kha tae nawlan kaw a mue; te phin`ae balyn te bya`ae balyn minphuin`ae balyn tungvaw kawhoinaw kha amaw kya pya athua.
66013008	Te laephipi athotakaw te chia athua vae paw Tuutaw kya-e Hiinnaw Ccauh kya mih min zei athua leipaw, laephi vawlan a um`ae paw balyn nynh sarepaw kha oun beik cih`ae.
66013009	Nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thae sah.
66013010	Seetangnaw kalan ming`ae a cciakhae paw ccungccaw tuh amaw mah seetangnaw kalan a cceih cih; te thaloi te ccungccaw a theih paw tuh thaloi te amaw mah chia athua hahe cih. Hynhe kyahin mithyaa`ae zynnaw te lungsaenaw tuh a um.
66013011	Te ccangpaw sarepaw laephi lungkhu te yn pou paw kha ka muih; te aning tuh tuutaw hawte ki kining hoi zah nakafupi hawte nynh bya a ho.
66013012	Te tuh- e sarepaw nynh masaty sarepaw kya-e thungnaw balyn kha amaw phang a umnaw malang khe phya a mang; te aning nynh laephi te laephi kya um`ae paw kha chikhaeku khopaw vaemaw dansah athua vae paw masaty sarepaw kha a beiksah`ae.
66013013	Te aning nynh alepipaw muihsanaw kha a langsaku; te ccungccaw`ae muihnaw kya vaawran kyate laephi vawlan maee kha a ccawsah bung.
66013014	Te masaty e sarepaw malang langsaku lan, amaw pya athua paw muihsanaw`ae liate laephi vawlan a um`ae paw kha aning nynh a ling`ae. Thaloi te vaemaw mue zah a hiin ung paw sarepaw zohtuh kha raeku lan laephi vawlan a um`ae paw kha a hopya`ae.
66013015	Te sarepaw zohtuh nynh bya a ho kho nawlan thuasah, sarepaw zohtuh a beik leipaw miakaw tuh chia athua nawlan thuasah, sarepaw zohtuh kha hiinnaw pya khonaw thungnaw kha aning tuh pya athua.
66013016	Te aning nynh ccungccaw balyn kha, adihpaw mah alepaw mah, a hoirungpaw mah a ryachipaw mah, a luepaw mah see mah, mih ranglang kuih kya khyh ze mih terui kya syntawnaw a hoisah`ae.
66013017	Ou tuhte syntawnaw a hoi paw khyh ze sarepaw min a hoi paw khyh ze a min namba a hoi paw laelan hung ccungccaw nynh san a re khyh nawlan, tukhyhze a zua khyh nawlan nynh thua.
66013018	E kya hawnaw a um. Thaethyanaw a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh sarepaw namba kha ria sah; pawccecize e tuh ccungccaw namba nynh thua; te a namba tuh 666 nynh thua.
66014001	Te kae nynh ka do zah dotua, Tuutaw tuh Zion Mua vawlan khe a thadyn. Te mih terui kya a Paaw min azeikuh paw thung zakheit sungpali thungpali tuh amaw ryte a um`ae.
66014002	Te tuiphua atoikuh paw patae roi hawte, te myarya accaepaw kholungthyhpaw roi hawte vaawran kyate roi kha ka thae. Te tintang khua`ae paw nynh mih tintang a khua`ae paw roiccaepaw kha mah ka thae.
66014003	Suitungkhung malang, ahiinpaw rangsaw sapali te piccang`ae malang khe minmin nynh athawpaw law, hawkhate, law a sah`ae. Te kha-e law kha laephi kyate re athua`ae paw thung zakheit sungpali thungpali laelan hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ccangkuh kho khyh`ae.
66014004	Hynh-e`ae tuh ccangvaedy`ae athua`ae keiccu nopi`ae ryte anungsikuh lei`ae paw nynh thua. Minmin tuh Tuutaw a ccianaw lang miakaw a zui`ae paw nynh thua. Minmin tuh ccungccaw`ae laku kyate re thua`ae zah Pachia hanlan te Tuutaw hanlan masaty athae`ae nynh thua.
66014005	Mih khalang kya hyngbya um khyh, pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia suitungkhung malang seimenaw hoi khyh`ae.
66014006	Te laephi vawlan um`ae paw minphuin miakaw te phin miakaw, te bya te ccungccaw`ae kalan hopya lanpaw zungzae atynpaw thehoypaw a hoi paw, vaawran angaelung kya azoupaw ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh,
66014007	“Pachia kha rawrih oh lah amaw kha phu-enaw pya oh; pawccecize a byapianaw ccyh tuh yn thua vae; te vaawran, laephi, rili te tuivanaw`ae a raetupaw kha beik oh,” cite roi accae lante a ho paw kha ka muih.
66014008	Te ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Kha-e alesaepaw khualipi Babilon tuh phe a pu vae, phe a pu vae, pawkeiccumacize amaw ohhuakunaw kya-e thinrianaw misutui kha minphuin`ae balyn pung a niasah`ae keiccu nynh thua,” cite zuikuh zah a ho.
66014009	Te vaethungnaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh minmin kha zui`ae zah, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh sarepaw te kha-e sarepaw zohtuh kha a beik lan thua ze, te kha-e sarepaw kya-e syntawnaw kha a terui kya khyh ze a kuih kya a hoi lan thua ze,
66014010	tuh-e paw tuh Pachia thinrianaw banang lungkhu lang pyde leite a ccae`ae paw Pachia thinrianaw athua paw misutui kha a neih cih; te tuh-e paw tuh athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang te Tuutaw malang khe maee te kemaee te thawte a tua a sah cih`ae.
66014011	Te minmin tuasanawpaw maeekhuh tuh zungzae te zungzae cia a kaethung; te sarepaw te amaw zohtuh kha a beik`ae paw te amaw min syntawnaw a mue`ae paw tuh khuazi khuadae hae-ung khyh`ae,” cite roi accae lante a ho.
66014012	Hynh-e kya mithyaa`ae lungsaenaw a um; e`ae tuh Pachia kawpyapaw`ae te Jesu zynnaw kha a ccykekuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
66014013	Te vaawran kyate, “ ‘Atu kyate Bawipaw kya a chih`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,’ cite zei,” cite kamaw yn hopah paw roi kha ka thae. Muisaw nynh, “Athua, minmin tuh mih ryalaw`ae kyate a hae-ung ccaw vae`ae cite mih ryalaw`ae nynh mimaw kha a zuiding`ae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
66014014	Te kae nynh ka do tuh, dotua, arawpaw maeking a um. Te Ccungccaw Ccapaw alopaw nynh a lu vawlan suilukhung kha khungkuh zah a kuih kya ahepaw rungkou kha ccyngkute kha-e maeking vawlan khe a dahung.
66014015	Te ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh tempal lungkhu te yn pou zah, “Na rungkou kha moh sua lah loohrue ccavae, pawccecize laephi kya-e loohrue lanpaw phe avoi vae,” cite thawte sia zah maeking vawlan a dahung paw kha a hopya.
66014016	Te maeking vawlan a dahung paw nynh a rungkou kha laephi vawlan moh sua zah laephi tuh loohrue athua vae.
66014017	Te ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw tuh vaawran kya a um paw tempal lungkhu te yn pou zah aning mah ahepaw rungkou a hoibua.
66014018	Te maee tungvaw thungnaw a hoi paw, ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw tuh silawhang kyate yn pou. Te aning nynh ahepaw rungkou a ccyngkuh paw kalan khe, thawte sia zah, “Ahepaw na rungkou kha moh sua lah laephi kya-e misu thae ange`ae kha suelua, pawccecize misu thae`ae tuh phe avoi vae,” cite a hopya.
66014019	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a rungkou kha laephi vawlan khe moh sua zah laephi kya-e misu ku kha a suelua, te kha-e kha Pachia thinrianaw athua paw alepipaw misu mianawpaw lungkhu langkhe moh a phang.
66014020	Te misu mianawpaw tuh khualipi atolang khe miade athua, te chii tuh marang khawbaw phe phah lang farlong thungkheit zataruh asaw lang misu mianawpaw kyate a pou.
66015001	Te alesaepaw te ngaeang lan um paw ccangpaw muihsanaw kha vaawran kya ka muih. Tuh-e tuh nyathyakou e vawsawnawpi ccangsari a hoi`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari nynh thua; pawccecize kha-e`ae kya Pachia thinrianaw tuh phe accing.
66015002	Te maee te apykuhpaw thawlang rili alopaw kha ka muih. Te sarepaw tungvaw, sarepaw zohtuh tungvaw te amaw kya-e syntawnaw tungvaw te a min namba tungvaw taenaw a hoi`ae paw nynh Pachia kya-e tintang`ae kha ccyngkute thawlang rili vawlan a thadyn`ae paw kha ka muih.
66015003	Minmin nynh Pachia seepaw Mawsi law te Tuutaw law kha sah`ae zah, “Athung Huaccepaw Bawipaw Pachia, na ryalaw`ae tuh lesae zah ngaeang lan um paw nynh thua; mithyaa`ae Siapharan, nang na ccianaw laanpi`ae tuh ding zah ahme.
66015004	Pou Bawipaw na raw kha ri leite, na min kha phuesah leite hungmou a um cih? Pawccecize nang rou nynh athyaapaw na thua; na byapianaw`ae tuh phe a langku vae keiccuze, minphuin`ae balyn nynh yn thua cih`ae zah na malang khe ae beik cih`ae,” a ci`ae.
66015005	Te tuh-e koute he ka do tuh, dotua, vaawran kya ccaekiakhankunaw bu kya um paw tempal tuh ahungkuh.
66015006	Te vawsawnawpi ccangsari a hoi`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari tuh tempal lungkhu te oun pou`ae. Minmin tuh accipaw te arawpaw uccaw kha lawkuh`ae zah mih by kya sui taeccia khate a cciakuh`ae.
66015007	Te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali kyaze sakheit nynh zungzae te zungzae cia a hiinpaw Pachia a thinrianaw te phe beihpaw sui pakekhupaw ccangsari kha vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kalan khe a pya`ae.
66015008	Te tempal tuh Pachia a phu-enaw te a thungnaw kya-e maeekhuh te phe abeih; te vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kya-e vawsawnawpi ccangsari accing makhia hung ccungccaw sanmah tempal lungkhu lang tee kho khyh.
66016001	Te tempal lungkhu te myarya accaepaw roi nynh, “La cceih oh lah Pachia kya-e thinrianaw athua paw pakekhupaw`ae kha laephi vawlan ccae oh,” cite vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kalan a hopya`ae paw kha ka thae.
66016002	Te masaty e paw nynh cceih zah a pakekhupaw kha laephi vawlan khe a ccae; te sarepaw kya-e syntawnaw a hoi`ae paw te amaw azuh a beik`ae paw tungvaw kya myarya dothah zah luathua-ae-ui lang um paw balyh nynh a thuanua`ae.
66016003	Te luningnaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha rili vawlan khe a ccae; te rili tuh ccungccaw achihpaw chii hawte chii lang phe atang. Te rili kya um paw a hysuepaw miakaw marya a chih`ae.
66016004	Te luthungnaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha vapi`ae te tuivanaw`ae vawlan khe a ccae; te kha-e`ae tuh chii lang phe atang.
66016005	Te tui`ae kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Atu a um paw, langmaw a la um vae paw, te yn thua lanpaw, pou Bawipaw, nang tuh na ding, pawccemacize hynh-e`ae kha nang nynh bya na pia.
66016006	Pawccecize minmin nynh mithyaa`ae chii te profeh`ae chii kha a luasah`ae, te nang nynh minmin kha nia lan chii na pya`ae. Pawccecize minmin tuh a accan`ae paw nynh thua,” cite a ho paw kha ka thae.
66016007	Te ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh silawhang lungkhu te, “Athung Huaccepaw Bawipaw Pachia, na byapianaw`ae tuh ou tuhmawte kyh zah adingpaw nynh thua,” cite a ho paw kha ka thae.
66016008	Te lupalinaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha khuanin vawlan khe a ccae; te maee te ccungccaw`ae kha u lan amaw kha thungnaw pya athua.
66016009	Te myarya asopaw maeeso khate ccungccaw`ae tuh u thua`ae zah hynh-e vawsawnawpi tungvaw thungnaw kaw a hoitupaw Pachia min kha thethyasah`ae; te amaw kha phu-e pya lan ngaesikuh khyh`ae.
66016010	Te lupangawnaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha sarepaw suitungkhung vawlan khe a ccae; te a peenaw tuh mohnaw te phe beih vae; te eih cci keiccuze minmin tuh mih lae kha a teikuh`ae.
66016011	Mih kya-e a ccih paw`ae te mih balyh`ae keiccuze vaawran e Pachia kha thethyasah`ae zah mih cyisahnaw`ae kha ngaesikuh khyh`ae.
66016012	Te lutaruhnaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha alepipaw vawpi, Eufrates, vawlan khe a ccae; te nithua lang-e siapharan`ae ccianaw kha paccynpya khylan, kha-e kya-e tui tuh phe akang.
66016013	Te nakafupi khalang lungkhu te, sarepaw khalang lungkhu te, ahme leipaw profeh khalang lungkhu te buhphaw`ae hawte athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae ccangthung yn pou paw kha ka muih.
66016014	Pawccecize minmin tuh muihsanaw`ae a langsakuh paw raerangsaro`ae kya-e muisaw`ae nynh thua. Athung Huaccepaw Pachia kya-e kha-e alesaepaw nin kya rhawtukkunaw kalan minmin kha suelua khylan minmin tuh laephi te laephipi khaleih kya um paw siapharan`ae kalan khe a cceih`ae.
66016015	“Dotua, kae tuh miruh hawte nynh kae thua. Ccakaete a ccia khyh nawlan te a maethyanaw muihpya athua khyh nawlan, ngawdokuh paw te a uccaw a ccykuh paw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a ci.
66016016	Te Hebru bya te Armekeddon acikuh paw ahmin kyakhe nynh a suelua`ae.
66016017	Te lusarinaw e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a pakekhupaw kha khivae kyakhe a ccae, te vaawran e tempal kya um paw suitungkhung kyate myarya accaepaw roi yn pou zah, “Phe athang vae!” a ci.
66016018	Te roiccaepaw, kholungthyhpaw, te khozawlaepaw a um; te thawte innruisuekuh paw a um, laephi vawlan ccungccaw`ae um takawte tuhcih arupaw te tuhcih alepaw innruisuekuh paw tuh um boi khyh.
66016019	Te alepipaw khualipi tuh santhung lang phia thua zah minphuin`ae kya-e khuapi`ae tuh phe ating. Te Pachia thin phe riatheihnaw athua paw misutui banang kha niasah khylan alepipaw Babilon khualipi kha Pachia nynh a liathui vae.
66016020	Te tuikoih miakaw tuh pung a ccue kou`ae, te mua`ae tuh muih lan um vae khyh.
66016021	Te talent ccangkheit loukaw aripaw alepipaw hya tuh ccungccaw`ae tungvaw khe vaawran kyate a ccah. Te vawsawnawpi tuh myaryamaw ale keiccuze, tuh-e hya kya-e vawsawnawpi keiccuze ccungccaw`ae nynh Pachia kha thethyasah`ae.
66017001	Te pakekhupaw ccangsari a hoi paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kyaze lukheitpaw nynh yn thua zah kamaw kha bya yn hopya. Yn hopya paw tuh, “Hynhlang rang, tui`ae patae vawlan a dahung paw ohhuanung pi tungvaw byapianaw kha kae muihsah cih;
66017002	laephi siapharan`ae nynh ohhuakunaw kha amaw ryte a rae`ae; te laephi a too`ae paw tuh amawnung kya-e ohhuakunaw misutui khate pung a rui vae`ae,” yn cipya.
66017003	Tuhte kamaw kha Muisaw kya rangkaw langkhe yn cciakhae. Te lu lusari te ki kihaw a hoi paw, Pachia thethyasahnaw min`ae te phe beihpaw, sekakungpaw sarepaw vawlan a dahung paw nopinung kha ka muih.
66017004	Te nopinung tuh asepaw te sekakungpaw uccaw kha lawkuh zah sui, aphutepaw lung`ae te pale`ae khate a ccaankuh; a ohhuakunaw kya-e luathua-aeui lang um paw te nungsikunaw te phe beihpaw sui banang kha a kuih kyakhe a ccyngbia.
66017005	Te a terui kyakhe, “BYAKHUPAW, ALESAEPAW BABILON, OHHUA`AE NUNG TE LAEPHI KYA-E LUATHUA-AE-UI LANG UM PAW NUNG,” cite min azeikuh.
66017006	Te nopinung tuh mithyaa`ae chii khate, te Jesu keiccu a chia`ae paw martyr`ae chii khate phe a rui paw kha ka muih. Te kha-e nung kha he ka muih tuh kae tuh myarya ka ngaeangthua.
66017007	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Pawccemou na ngaeangthua? Kha-e nopinung kya-e byakhupaw, te kha-e nung a cciakhae paw lu lusari te ki kihaw a hoi paw sarepaw kya-e byakhupaw kha nang kae hopah ung cih.
66017008	Na muih paw sarepaw tuh langmaw la um zah atu um khyh, te alaethy um leipaw hunghua lungkhu te yn kaethung vae cih zah ronaw lungkhu lang a cceih cih. Te laephi vawlan a um`ae paw, laephipi athotakaw te Hiinnaw Ccauh kya mih min zei athua lei`ae paw nynh langmaw la um zah atu a um leipaw, te bua yn langkuh cih paw sarepaw kha he yn muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua vae cih.
66017009	“Te e kya hawnaw a hoi paw tuanaw-thinlung a um. Lu lusari tuh nopinung nynh a dahungnawpaw mua mua sari nynh thua.
66017010	Te siapharan`ae lusari mah a um`ae; lu pangaw tuh phe ccahbung vae`ae, te lukheit a um ung; te ccangpaw tuh yn thua loh khyh; he yn thua vae ze, aning tuh ccyh dyntari rou nynh atyn cih.
66017011	Te langmaw la um zah atu a um leipaw sarepaw tuh lutarya naw e siapharan ccaccei nynh thua, te lusarinaw e mah athua, te aning tuh ronaw lungkhu lang nynh a cceih cih.
66017012	“Te na muih paw ki kihaw tuh peenaw a mue loh leipaw siapharan luhaw nynh thua; thuasalama siapharan`ae hawte kawhoinaw kha sarepaw ryte suimilan ccangkheit lungkhu a muekheih`ae.
66017013	Tuh-e`ae tuh tuanaw-thinlung ccangkheit hoi`ae paw thua zah mih thungnaw te mih kawhoinaw kha sarepaw kalan a pya cih`ae.
66017014	“Tuh-e`ae nynh Tuutaw kha rhawtuk cih`ae zah Tuutaw nynh minmin kha phe a tae cih`ae. Pawccecize Tuutaw tuh bawi`ae Bawipaw te siapharan`ae Siapharan nynh thua. Te amaw ryte a umkheih`ae paw tuh ko athua`ae paw, po athua`ae paw te zyn lan um`ae paw nynh thua`ae,” yn cipya.
66017015	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Ohhuanung nynh a dahungnaw, na muih paw tui`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae te ccungccaw zapi te minphuin`ae te bya`ae nynh thua.
66017016	Te sarepaw vawlan um paw na muih paw ki kihaw`ae nynh ohhuanung kha a hua cih`ae zah a makhaete a nung cih`ae, te ccakaete a nung cih`ae; te a ngesaw kha a ae cih`ae zah amaw kha maee te a u cih`ae.
66017017	Pawccecize Pachia bya`ae accing mawlaezung, amaw rynaw kha ccingsah khylan, mih lungloku nawlan, te mih peenaw kha sarepaw kalan pya khylan, Pachia nynh mih thinlung kya phe a sang vae.
66017018	Te na muih paw nopinung tuh laephi siapharan`ae tungvaw a uk paw kha-e alepipaw khualipi kha nynh thua,” cite kamaw kha yn hopya.
66018001	Te hynh-e uccaw`ae koute alepipaw thungnaw a hoi paw ccangpaw vaaw ccungccapaw vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw kha ka muih. Te amaw phu-enaw khate laephi tuh phaephae a aw.
66018002	Te aning nynh roi accae lante thawte sia zah, “Alepipaw Babilon tuh phe a pu vae, phe a pu vae, te raerangsaro`ae umnaw lang nynh phe a tang vae, te anungsikuhpaw muisaw miakaw elan thunginn lang, te athyaa leipaw te hua lan um paw pavaw miakaw elan rekunaw lang nynh a tang vae.
66018003	Pawccecize minphuin`ae balyn tuh amaw ohhuakunaw kya-e thinrianaw athua paw misutui kha phe a nia vae`ae, te laephi siapharan`ae tuh amaw ryte pung ohhuakuh vae`ae, te laephi kungku`ae tuh amaw kya-e phe beihpaw hoirungnaw liate houh a hoirung vae`ae,” a ci.
66018004	Te vaawran langte ccangpaw roi kha ka thae, tuh-e roi nynh, “Ka ccungccaw`ae, nanning tuh kha-e nung kya-e seinaw`ae a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua khyh nawlan oh, te a vawsawnawpi`ae na muebua khyh nawlan oh, amaw lungkhu te oun pou oh.
66018005	Pawccecize a seinaw`ae tuh vaawran kalan phe thua vae zah a tazae leinaw`ae kha Pachia nynh phe a liathui vae.
66018006	Aning nynh nanning kha ae liaru oh hawte amaw kha liaru oh; a cyisahnaw`ae thyhte leih ning liaru oh; aning nynh a pyde paw banang kyakhe leih ning pydepah oh.
66018007	Aning nynh amaw te amaw kha myarya phu-esahkuh zah eih hoysah kaesy lang a um hawkhate, tuasahnaw te ngaethyanaw kha amaw pya oh; pawccecize aning nynh a thinlung kyakhe, ‘Kae tuh siapharan nung hawte nynh ka um, numae ka thua khyh, ngaethyanaw tuh ka tung lan khyh,’ a ciku.
66018008	Tukeiccu amaw a vawsawnawpi`ae, chinaw, rawkhuinaw te ccakangnaw nynh ninkheit kya a thuanua cih zah aning tuh maee nynh pung a u cih; pawccecize amaw kha byapiatupaw Bawipaw Pachia tuh a thawsaepaw nynh thua.
66018009	“Te amaw ryte ohhuakuh`ae zah eih hoysah kaesy lang amaw ry a umkheih`ae paw laephi siapharan`ae nynh amaw a rhua unaw`ae paw maeekhuh kha he a muih`ae tuh amaw elan a rah a khui vae cih`ae.
66018010	Amaw tuasahnaw rawri keiccuze asawpi langkhe thadyn`ae zah, ‘Ezou, ezou, khu-e alepipaw Babilon khualipi khulou! Khu-e athungpaw khualipi khulou! Suimilan ccangkheit kya na byapianaw tuh yn thua vae rei!’ a ci cih`ae.
66018011	“Te laephi kungku`ae tuh amaw elan yn rah yn khui vae cih`ae; pawccecize mih kungkunaw kya-e kha hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah kharyh re vae lan khyh`ae.
66018012	Mih kungkunaw uccaw`ae sui, ngun, aphutepaw lung`ae, pale`ae, uccaw nebaleihpaw, kadipa uccaw, po-uccaw, sekakungpaw uccaw, thyine thingphe aphuinphuin, saepawnua te rae paw uccaw aphuinphuin, amynkhuhpaw thing te rae paw uccaw aphuinphuin, sohin uccaw, sivaw uccaw te lungrawpaw uccaw,
66018013	cinnamon te mynkhuhpaw u paw, zimuin te frankinsens, misutui te oliv satho, chanvui akhuipaw, te chanvui, tuanaw-saring`ae te, tuu`ae, marang`ae te maranglee`ae, pyn`ae te ccungccaw muisaw`ae kha hung nynh san re vae lan khyh`ae.
66018014	“Te na hiinnaw-muisaw nynh kou a dua paw thingthae`ae tuh na kyate phe a pou vae`ae, te kou na hoysah paw uccaw te phaephae ahpaw uccaw`ae balyn tuh na kyate phe a pou vae`ae, te kha-e`ae kha kharyh na muih vae lan khyh.
66018015	Kha-e khuapi liate a hoirung`ae paw, kha-e uccaw`ae khate kungku`ae paw tuh amaw tuasahnaw rawrinaw keiccuze, asawpi langkhe a thadyn cih`ae zah rawte, khuite,
66018016	‘Ezou, ezou, nebaleihpaw uccaw, kadipa uccaw te sekakungpaw uccaw lawkuh zah sui te aphutepaw lung`ae te, pale`ae te accaankuh paw khu-e alepipaw khualipi khulou!
66018017	Khacih alungpaw hoirungnaw`ae tuh suimilan ccangkheit kya ccakaepaw lang phe a tang vae rei,’ yn ci cih`ae. Te sanphalung uktu`ae miakaw, sanphalung kya a cceihbua`ae paw balyn, sanphalung mung`ae paw, rili kya kungku`ae paw balyn nynh asawpi langkhe thadyn`ae zah,
66018018	amaw a ruanaw`ae paw maeekhuh kha he a muih`ae tuh, ‘Khu-e alepipaw khualipi te tei-e khuapi mou alokuhpaw a um?’ cite a sia`ae.
66018019	“Te minmin nynh laenoi kha mih lu vawlan phingkuh`ae zah, ‘Ezou, ezou, rili kya a cceih paw sanphalung`ae a hoi`ae paw balyn kha amaw hoirungnaw liate a hoirungsah bua paw khu-e khualipi khulou! Suimilan ccangkheit kyamaw phe aroh vae rei,’ cite rawte khuite a sia`ae.
66018020	“Pou vaawran, te athyaapaw locceihtu`ae te profeh`ae, amaw tungvaw lungtua oh! Pawccecize Pachia nynh nanning hanlan amaw kha ccae phe a liaru vae!” a cipaw kha ka thae.
66018021	Te a thawsaepaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh alepipaw sungmia-lung alopaw lung ccangkheit kha lawkuh zah rili lungkhu langkhe vua zah, “Hynh hawte Babilon khualipi tuh myarya ccih lang dae vuabung athua cih zah kharyh muih thua vae lan khyh.
66018022	Tintang a khua`ae paw roi, tyngdaw khua`ae paw roi, phyly tu`ae paw roi, mungkae tu`ae paw roi kha na kya kharyh thae um vae lan khyh; te kuih ryalawthya`ae paw ccungccaw lukheit san na kya muih lan um vae lan khyh; te sungmia-lung roi mah na kya kharyh thae um vae lan khyh.
66018023	Maeekhua a awnaw mah na kya kharyh aw vae lan khyh; te zudy ccangvaepaw te akaepaw liaccanung roi mah na kya kharyh thae um vae lan khyh; pawccecize na kungku`ae tuh laephi kya alesaepaw ccungccaw`ae nynh thua`ae; pawccecize minphuin`ae balyn tuh na nawthyanaw liate ling athua`ae.
66018024	Te profeh`ae chii, mithyaa`ae chii, te laephi vawlan chia athua`ae paw balyn chii tuh khae khuapi kyakhe muih athua`ae,” a ci.
66019001	Hynh-e koute vaawran kya ccungccaw zapi pi kyate thawte accaepaw roi nynh, “Halleluia! Khumnaw, phu-enaw, sawtuanaw te thungnaw tuh, Bawipaw ah Pachia kya-e nynh thua.
66019002	“Pawccecize a byapianaw`ae tuh kyh zah ading; pawccecize a ohhuakunaw liate laephi a rosah paw ohhuanung pi kha bya phe pia vae; te kha-e nung kuih liate luasah athua paw amaw see`ae chii hanlan a tungvaw phe ccaeliaru vae,” a cipaw kha ka thae.
66019003	Te minmin nynh, “Halleluia! A maeekhuh tuh zungzae te zungzae cia a kaethung,” bua a ci`ae.
66019004	Te piccang`ae lukuin laepali te ahiinpaw rangsaw`ae sapali nynh bakhung`ae zah suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw Pachia kha beik`ae zah, “Amen! Halleluia!” a ci`ae.
66019005	Te suitungkhung kyate roi yn thua zah, “Nanning Pachia see`ae balynte amaw rawrih`ae paw, adihpaw te alepaw balyn nynh paryhte ah Pachia kha thehoysah oh,” a ci.
66019006	Te ccungccaw zapi pi roi hawte, tuiphua`ae pataepi roi accaepaw hawte, te myarya athungpaw riakawpaw roi hawkhate ka thae. Tuh-e roiccaepaw nynh, “Halleluia! Pawccecize Tynre Cyih Khotu Bawipaw Pachia nynh a uk.
66019007	Lungtua oh sih lah ah lungpaw sah, te amaw kha phu-enaw pya oh sih; pawccecize Tuutaw zudy poi tuh yn thua vae, te a zu tuh amaw te amaw paccynkute a um vae,” a ci.
66019008	Te tuh-e nung tuh nebaleihpaw uccaw, athyaapaw te arawpaw uccaw te ccaanku lan kaw a mue; pawccecize nebaleihpaw uccaw tuh mithyaa`ae kya-e adingpaw cyisahnaw nynh thua.
66019009	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “ ‘Tuutaw zudy poi kalan kobua athua`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,’ cite zei,” cite kamaw kha yn hopya. Te aning nynh, “Hynh-e bya`ae tuh Pachia nynh a hopaw ccaccing nynh thua,” yn cipya.
66019010	Te kae tuh amaw kha beik khylan a ccu leihpaw khe ka bakhung. Te aning nynh kamaw kha, “Dotua, khahte cyih nan; kae tuh nang ryte ryalahkheihtu nynh ka thua, Jesu kya-e ccaekia a hoi`ae paw na uno`ae ryte ryalahkheihtu nynh ka thua, Pachia kha beik! Pawccecize Jesu kya-e ccaekia tuh profehbyaho paw kya-e muisaw nynh thua,” yn cipya.
66019011	Te vaawran ahungkuhpaw kha ka muih. Te dotua, arawpaw marang a um. Te kha-e marang vawlan a ccikuh paw tuh Zyn lan um paw cite, Ahmepaw cite ko athua, te aning nynh dingnaw kya byapia zah rhaw a tuk.
66019012	A mit tuh maeesoi hawte nynh thua. A lu vawlan suilukhung`ae a khungkuh. Te amaw laelan hung ccungccaw nynh san a ny leipaw min azeikuh paw a hoi.
66019013	Te chii kya moh dung paw bania-angki kha a kiku. Te a min tuh “Pachia Bya” a cikuh.
66019014	Te vaawran e rhawkaw`ae nynh arawpaw marang`ae ccikute, raw zah athyaapaw nebaleihpaw uccaw`ae kha lawkute amaw kha a zui`ae.
66019015	Te minphuin`ae kha ziabua nawlan ahepaw thaloi tuh a khalang lungkhu te a pou. Aning nynh minmin kha sivaw hoitang te a uk cih`ae. Athung Huaccepaw Pachia thinrianaw te renaw athua paw misu mianawpaw kha aning nynh a syde cih.
66019016	Te a bania vawlan te a phae vawlan khe, “SIAPHARAN`AE SIAPHARAN, TE BAWI`AE BAWIPAW,” cite azeikuh paw min kha a hoi.
66019017	Te vaaw ccungccapaw lukheit nynh khuanin kya a thadyn paw kha ka muih. Aning nynh vawlae angaelung kya a zou`ae paw pavaw`ae balyn kha roi thawte accae lante ko`ae zah, “Rang oh lah alesaepaw Pachia kya-e loohdangkunaw kalan naemaw te naemaw oun sueluakuh oh;
66019018	ou tuhte siapharan`ae ngesaw, rhawbawi`ae ngesaw, a thawsaepaw ccungccaw`ae ngesaw, marang`ae ngesaw te marangccikuh`ae paw ngesaw, a luepaw te see, adihpaw te alepaw paryh, ccungccaw balyn ngesaw kha na ae ccaw oh oun sueluakuh oh,” cite a sia.
66019019	Te sarepaw, te laephi siapharan`ae te mih rhawkaw`ae nynh marang tungvaw a ccikuh paw te a rhawkaw`ae kha rhawtuk khylan pynkheihlan oun sueluaku`ae paw kha ka muih.
66019020	Te sarepaw kha phe a kyng`ae. Te sarepaw kyae syntawnaw a hoi`ae paw te sarepaw azuh a beik`ae paw kha ling`ae zah sarepaw malang muihsanaw a langsakuh paw ahme leipaw profeh kha mah amaw ryte a kynbua`ae. Hynh-e luning`ae hynh paryhte a hiin`ae pite, kemaee te aruanaw maee tuili lungkhu lang a vua`ae.
66019021	Tuhlaepaw kha marang tungvaw a ccikuh paw a khalang lungkhu te yn pou paw thaloi khate chia athua`ae; te pavaw`ae balyn nynh minmin ngesaw kha phe byn lan a ae`ae.
66020001	Te a kuih kya, alaethy um leipaw hunghua toh te alepipaw sivarui a ccyng paw vaaw ccungccapaw lukheit vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw kha ka muih.
66020002	Te aning nynh langmaw-e fupaw, diabolos te Setan athuapaw nakafupi kha kyng zah kum thungkheit lungkhu phang a khii.
66020003	Te kum thungkheit phe accing cia minphuin`ae kha kharyh a ling vae khyh ccaw cite amaw kha alaethy um leipaw hunghua lungkhu lang vua zah phang khawsung zah avawlan tazeih phe a khia. Kum thungkheit accing koute aning tuh ccyh sosoh supya athua cih.
66020004	Te suitungkhung`ae te kha-e vawlan a dahung`ae paw kha ka muih. Minmin tuh byapianaw kaw a mue`ae. Te sarepaw te amaw azuh kha a beik lei`ae paw, mih terui kya khyh ze mih kuih kya sarepaw syntawnaw a hoi lei`ae paw, te Jesu ccaekiakhannaw keiccu te Pachia bya keiccuze mih lupae`ae paw mih muisaw`ae kha ka muih; te minmin tuh hiin`ae zah Kri ryte kum thungkheit a uk`ae.
66020005	Thuasalama tuhlaepaw a chih`ae paw tuh kum thungkheit athang makhia bua hiin khyh`ae. Hynh-e thothuinaw tuh masaty thothuinaw nynh thua.
66020006	Masaty thothuinaw kya a ungbua paw tuh hythuaccoupaw te athyaapaw nynh thua. Tuhtahawpaw ccungccaw tungvaw kya vaeningnaw chinaw nynh kaw hoi vae khyh; thuasalama minmin tuh Pachia ranpibawi`ae te Kri ranpibawi`ae athua vae cih`ae zah Kri ryte kum thungkheit a uk vae cih`ae.
66020007	Te kum thungkheit he athang te Setan tuh thung a ccawnaw kyate supya athua cih zah,
66020008	Gog te Magog acikuh paw, laephi kipali kya a um`ae paw minphuin`ae kha ling khylan, te rhawtuk lan minmin kha suelua khylan po a cceih cih, minmin namba tuh ria lanze rili laesia hawte nynh thua.
66020009	Te minmin tuh laephi akonaw vawlan cceihthung`ae zah mithyaa`ae umnaw hmin te sungsahpaw khuapi kha po a voilu`ae. Te vaawran lungkhu te Pachia kyate maee ccahbung zah minmin kha marya a ro`ae.
66020010	Te sarepaw te ahme leipaw profeh a umnaw`ae athua paw, kemaee te maee tuili lungkhu langkhe minmin a ling`ae paw diabolos tuh ccaring vua athua, te minmin tuh khuazi khuadae zungzae te zungzae cia vawsawnaw pya athua vae cih`ae.
66020011	Te alepipaw arawpaw suitungkhung te kha-e vawlan a dahung paw kha ka muih, khae paw mitmae kyate laephi te vaawran tuh ccue`ae zah mih hanlan umnaw muih lan um vae khyh.
66020012	Te a chih`ae paw, adihpaw te alepaw nynh Pachia malang a thadyn`ae paw kha ka muih; te ccauh`ae kha a kia`ae. Te Hiinnaw Ccauh athua paw ccangpaw ccauh kha mah kia athua. A chih`ae paw tuh mimaw mih ryalaw`ae thyhte, ccauh`ae kya azeikuh paw uccaw`ae thyhte byapia athua`ae.
66020013	Te rili nynh a kya um paw a chih`ae paw kha a poukhae, te Chinaw te Michikhua nynh mih kya um paw a chih`ae paw kha a poukhae`ae. Te ccungccaw miakaw tuh mih ryalaw`ae thyhte byapia athua`ae.
66020014	Te Chinaw te Michikhua tuh maee tuili lungkhu lang vua athua`ae. Hynh-e chinaw tuh vaeningnaw chinaw nynh thua.
66020015	Te Hiinnaw Ccauh kya a min azeikuh paw muih athua leipaw miakaw tuh maee tuili lungkhu lang vua athua`ae.
66021001	Te athawpaw vaawran te athawpaw laephi kha ka muih; pawccecize masaty vaawran te masaty laephi tuh phe azo vae, te rili mah um vae khyh.
66021002	Te kae, Johan nynh athyaapaw khualipi athua paw, Athawpaw Jerusalem tuh a vawpaw hanlan a ccaankuh paw akaepaw liaccanung hawte paccynkute, vaawran lungkhu te Pachia kyate yn rungbung paw kha ka muih.
66021003	Te vaawran kyate roi accaepaw nynh, “Dotua oh, Pachia kya-e beikbuu tuh ccungccaw`ae ryte nynh a um vae, te Pachia tuh minmin ryte a um vae cih, te minmin tuh a ccungccaw`ae athua vae cih`ae. Te Pachia amaw tuh minmin ryte a um cih zah mih Pachia athua vae cih.
66021004	Te Pachia nynh mih mit kyate mitphi balyn kha a fupah cih`ae. Chinaw um vae lan khyh. Ngaethyanaw, rawnaw, accihpaw cipaw um vae lan khyh; pawccecize langmaw-e uccaw`ae tuh pung azo vae`ae,” cite a ho paw kha ka thae.
66021005	Te suitungkhung vawlan a dahung paw nynh, “Dotua oh, pawpaw balyn kha athawpaw lang ka rae vae,” a ci. Te aning nynh kamaw kha, “Zei, pawccecize hynh-e bya`ae tuh akyhpaw te zyn lan um paw nynh thua,” yn cipya.
66021006	Te aning nynh kamaw kha, “Phe athang vae. Kae tuh Alfa te Omega, Athonaw te Athangnaw nynh ka thua. A tuihawpaw ccungccaw kha hiinnaw tuivanaw kya-e tui kha alakaw te ka pya cih.
66021007	A taetupaw tuh pawpaw balyn rhoccou cih, te kae tuh a Pachia ka thua cih zah aning tuh ka ccapaw athua cih.
66021008	Thuasalama mih rawthah`ae paw, a zyn lei`ae paw, luathua-ae-ui lang um`ae paw, ccungccatheih`ae paw, a ohhuakuh`ae paw, nawthya`ae paw, zohtuhbeik`ae paw, a hyng`ae paw balyn tuh kemaee te maee ryte aruapaw maee tuili kyakhe nynh mih hanpaw a hoi cih`ae, tuh-e tuh vaeningnaw chinaw nynh thua,” yn cipya.
66021009	Te nyathyakou e vawsawnawpi ccangsari te phe beihpaw pakekhupaw ccangsari a ccyng`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae lusari kyaze lukheit tuh kamaw kalan yn thua. Te kamaw kha bya yn beih zah, “Hynhlang rang, Tuutaw zu, akaepaw liaccanung kha kae muihsah cih,” yn cipya.
66021010	Te aning nynh alepipaw te ahangpaw mua kalan khe kamaw kha Muisaw kya yn cciakhae zah alepipaw khualipi, athyaapaw Jerusalem tuh vaawran lungkhu te Pachia kyate yn rungbung paw kha yn muihsah.
66021011	Tuh-e khualipi tuh Pachia kya-e phuenaw a hoi. A awnaw tuh lungawmito hawte accipaw jasper lung hawkhate, aphute huapaw lung te nynh aloku.
66021012	Te koikua haw laening um paw alepipaw te ahangpaw khua lungrua a hoi, tuh-e koikua`ae kya vaaw ccungccaw`ae haw laening a um, te kha-e koikua`ae kya Israel ccaaw`ae phin haw laening min kha zei athua.
66021013	Nithua lang koikua ccangthung, palung lang koikua ccangthung, deilang koikua ccangthung, te niccaw lang koikua ccangthung a um.
66021014	Te khuapi kya-e khua lungrua tuh athonaw lungbing haw laening a um, tuh-e`ae kya Tuutaw kya-e locceihtu`ae luhaw laening min a um.
66021015	Te kamaw ryte bya a ho paw tuh-e paw tuh khualipi, kha-e kya-e koikua`ae te kha-e khua lungrua kha tou nawlan sui phaeku ccangkheit a hoi.
66021016	Te khualipi tuh kipali te phe anginkuh. Asaepaw tuh akopaw cih ale. Te aning nynh khualipi kha phaeku te tou zah me thungkheit zapangaw acih. Kha-e kya-e asaepaw, akopaw te ahangpaw tuh phe nginkuh`ae.
66021017	Te kha-e khua lungrua kha tou zah vaaw ccungccapaw kya-e tounawpaw thyhte ccungccaw dung te, dung zakheit sungpali dung pali acih.
66021018	Kha-e khua lungrua saknawpaw tuh jasper lung nynh thua. Te khualipi tuh ccirarihpaw thawlang te alokuhpaw sui ccipaw nynh thua.
66021019	Te khuapi kya-e khua lungrua athonaw`ae tuh aphutepaw lung`ae aphuinphuin te nynh a ccaan`ae. Masaty athonaw tuh jasper lung, ccangningnaw tuh nila lung, ccangthungnaw tuh chalcedony lung, ccangpalinaw tuh emerald lung;
66021020	ccangpangawnaw tuh sardonyx lung, ccangtaruhnaw tuh sardias lung, ccangsarinaw tuh khrysolite lung, ccangtaryanaw tuh beryl lung, ccangtakuanaw tuh topaz lung, ccanghawnaw tuh chrysoprasus lung, haw laekheitnaw tuh jacinth lung, haw laeningnaw tuh amethyst lung nynh thua.
66021021	Te koikua haw laening`ae tuh pale haw laening nynh thua; koikua ccangkheit cci tuh pale ccangkheit cci nynh thua; te khualipi kya-e laanpi tuh awrarihpaw thawlang hawte sui ccipaw nynh thua.
66021022	Te kha-e khualipi kya tempal ka muih khyh; pawccecize Athung Huaccepaw Bawipaw Pachia te Tuutaw tuh kha-e khualipi kya-e tempal nynh thua.
66021023	Te kha-e khualipi kya a aw nawlan khuanin ho vae khyh, sawpaw mah ho vae khyh; pawccecize Pachia phuenaw nynh kha-e kha a awsah, te Tuutaw tuh kha-e kya-e awnaw nynh thua.
66021024	Te khumnaw a mue`ae paw minphuin`ae nynh kha-e khualipi a awnaw kyakhe a pae cih`ae; te laephi siapharan`ae nynh mih phu-enaw te sawtuanaw kha kha-e lungkhu lang a thuakhae cih`ae.
66021025	Te kha-e kya-e koikua kha khuadae ccyh kya kharyh khaw thua vae lan khyh; pawccecize tuin kya khuazi mazi um vae lan khyh.
66021026	Minphuin`ae kya-e phu-enaw te sawtuanaw kha minmin nynh kha-e lungkhu lang oun thuakhae cih`ae.
66021027	Kha-e lungkhu lang anungsikuhpaw uccaw teekhae thua lan khyh, luathua-ae-ui lang um paw ryalah paw, tukhyhze ahyngpaw tuh kha-e lungkhu lang kharyh tee lan khyh, thuasalama Tuutaw kya-e Hiinnaw Ccauh kya min zei athua`ae paw rou nynh a tee cih`ae.
66022001	Te Pachia suitungkhung te Tuutaw suitungkhung lungkhu te yn pou paw, lungawmito hawte accipaw, hiinnaw tui kya-e ccirarihpaw vaw kha vaaw ccungccapaw nynh kamaw kha yn muihsah.
66022002	Kha-e khuapi-e laanpi ngaelung te kha-e vawpi hawlang hawlang khe thingthae phin haw laening athae paw hiinnaw thingku a um. Tuh-e thingku tuh sawpaw takyhte a thae a pousah. Te tuh-e thingku anaw tuh minphuin`ae dansanaw hanlan nynh thua.
66022003	Thyalawnaw kharyh um vae lan khyh, thuasalama tuh-e khuapi kya Pachia kya-e te Tuutaw kya-e suitungkhung a um cih zah Pachia ryalawpatu`ae nynh amaw kha ryalawpah vae cih`ae.
66022004	Minmin nynh amaw mitmae kha a muih cih`ae zah amaw min tuh mih terui kya zei athua vae cih.
66022005	Tuin kya khuazi um vae lan khyh. Minmin tuh maeekhua ho vae lan khyh, khuanin kya-e awnaw mah ho vae lan khyh. Pawccecize Bawipaw Pachia nynh minmin kha awnaw a pya `ae, te minmin tuh zungzae te zungzae cia a uk vae cih`ae.
66022006	Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh kamaw kha, “Hynh-e bya`ae tuh zyn lan um paw te ahmepaw nynh thua,” yn cipya. Athyaapaw profeh`ae mih Bawipaw Pachia nynh aro mawze yn cyikuh hahe cih paw uccaw`ae kha a ryalawpatu`ae kalan langsapya khylan a vaaw ccungccapaw kha yn saw vae.
66022007	“ Dotua oh, kae tuh arangte kae thua vae cih. Hynh-e ccauh kya-e phytypaw bya`ae kha a ccykekuh paw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a ci.
66022008	Te kae, Johan nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae kha ka muih zah ka thae. Te he ka thae zah he ka muih tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae kamaw yn muihsah paw vaaw ccungccapaw ccu leihpaw khe beik lan cite ka bakhung.
66022009	Oute aning nynh kamaw kha, “Dotua, hynhte cyih nan, pawccecize kae tuh namaw ryte ryalahkheihtu nynh ka thua, te na uno`ae profeh`ae te hynh-e ccauh kya-e bya a ccykekuh`ae paw ryte ryalahkheihtu nynh ka thua. Pachia palia kha beik,” yn cipya.
66022010	Te aning nynh kamaw kha, “Hynh-e ccauh kya-e phytypaw bya`ae kha tazeihkhia nan; pawccecize accyh tuh anae vae.
66022011	Atazae leipaw ccungccaw tuh tazae leite um ccaleih hin sah, a nungsikuh paw tuh nungsikuh ccaleih hin sah, adingpaw tuh ding ccaleih hin sah, athyaapaw tuh thyaa ccaleih hin sah,” yn cipya.
66022012	“Dotua oh, kae tuh arangte kae thua vae cih. Te ccungccaw miakaw kha a ryalaw thyhte pya khylan kamaw kya-e ryalaw mee kha kae ccyngbia.
66022013	Kae tuh Alfa te Omega, Athonaw te Athangnaw, Masaty te Nyathyakou nynh ka thua,” a ci.
66022014	Hiinnaw thingku kya kaw a hoibua nawlan`ae te khualipi lungkhu lang koikua`ae kyate a teebua nawlan`ae, a kawpyapaw`ae a zui`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
66022015	Tuhzemah atolang tuh ui`ae, nawthya`ae paw, a ohhuakuh`ae paw, ccungccaw theihtu`ae, zohtuhbeik`ae paw, te hyngbya kha sungsah zah a ho paw miakaw nynh a um`ae.
66022016	“Kae, Jesu nynh kriccawbu`ae kya hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kalan ccaekiakhan sah khylan ka vaaw ccungccapaw kha kae saw. Kae tuh David Atharui te a Ciihan nynh ka thua, Phaephae ahpaw te Nizy Awsi nynh ka thua,” a ci.
66022017	Te Muisaw te akaepaw liaccanung nynh, “Rang!” a ci`ae. Te a thae paw ccungccaw nynh, “Rang!” ci sah. Te a tuihawpaw ccungccaw tuh rang sah. Te hunghung zemah a ry paw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw tui kha alakaw te lawkuh sah.
66022018	Pawccecize hynh-e ccauh kya-e hotypaw bya`ae a thae paw ccungccaw miakaw kalan kae nynh ccaekia ka khan paw tuh: lukhakheit nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh a biachih lanze, hynh-e ccauh kya azeikuh paw vawsawnawpi`ae kha Pachia nynh kha-e paw tungvaw a biachih cih.
66022019	Te lukhakheit nynh hynh-e phytypaw ccauh kyae bya`ae kha a lawbang lanze, Hiinnaw Ccauh kyate thuasah, athyaapaw khualipi lungkhu te thuasah, hynh-e ccauh kya zei athua paw uccaw`ae kyate thuasah, a hanpaw kha Pachia nynh phe a lawpah ru cih.
66022020	Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong ccaekiakhantupaw nynh, “Thanccingte, kae tuh arangte kae thua vae cih,” a ci. Amen. Tuhmawte Bawipaw Jesu yn thua ccavae.
66022021	Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um sah. Amen.
